text.0: Svayambhu: Paumacariu (Padmacarita) [the Rama story in Apabhramsa]
text.1: Based on the ed. by Harivallabha Cunilala Bhayani: Paumacariu of
text.2: Kaviraja Svayambhudeva (A Pre-tenth Century Puranic Epic in Apabhramsa).
text.3: Bombay : Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan 1953-1960 (Singhi Jain Series, 34-36)
text.4: Input by Eva De Clercq, Ghent (Belgium)
text.9: The sequence of the five kaṇḍas (Skt.: kāṇḍa),
text.10: which has not been integrated into the stanza numbering,
text.20: THIS GRETIL TEXT FILE IS FOR REFERENCE PURPOSES ONLY!
text.21: COPYRIGHT AND TERMS OF USAGE AS FOR SOURCE FILE.
text.23: (This file is to be used with a UTF-8 font and your browser's VIEW configuration
text.61: Unless indicated otherwise, accents have been dropped in order
text.63: For a comprehensive list of GRETIL encodings and formats see:
text.75: pahilaü jaẏakārĕvi parama-muṇi  $  muṇi-vaẏaṇĕ jāhã siddhanta-jhuṇi
text.76: jhuṇi jāhã aṇiṭṭhiẏa rattidiṇu  $  jiṇu hiẏaĕ ṇa phiṭṭaï ekku khaṇu
text.77: khaṇu khaṇu vi jāhã ṇa vicalaï maṇu  $  maṇu maggaï jāhã mokkha-gamaṇu
text.78: gamaṇu vi jahĩ ṇaü jammaṇu maraṇu
text.79: maraṇu vi kaha hoi muṇīvarahã  $  muṇivara je laggā jiṇavarahã
text.80: jiṇavara jeṃ līẏa māṇa parahŏ (?)  $  paru keva ḍhukku jeṃ pariẏaṇahŏ
text.81: pariẏaṇu maṇĕ maṇṇiu jehĩ tiṇu  $  tiṇa-samaü ṇāhĩ lahu ṇaraẏa-riṇu
text.82: riṇu kema hoi bhava-bhaẏa-rahiẏa  $  bhava-rahiẏa dhamma-saṃjama-sahiẏa
text.85: te ekka-maṇeṇa sa ẏaṃ bhu ĕṇa  $  vandiẏa guru paramāẏariẏa
text.114: iẏa caüvīsa vi parama-jiṇa  $  paṇaveppiṇu bhāveṃ
text.124: eha rāmakaha-sari sohantī  $  gaṇahara-devahĩ diṭṭha vahantī
text.136: vuhaẏaṇa saẏambhu paĩ viṇṇavaï  $  maĩ sarisaü aṇṇu ṇāhĩ kukaï
text.137: vāẏaraṇu kaẏāvi ṇa jāṇiẏaü  $  ṇaü vitti-suttu vakkhāṇiẏaü
text.138: ṇaü paccāhārahŏ tatti kiẏa  $  ṇaü saṃdhihĕ uppari vuddhi thiẏa
text.139: ṇaü ṇisuaü satta vihattiẏaü  $  chavvihaü samāsa-paüttiẏaü
text.140: chakkāraẏa dasa laẏāra ṇa suẏa  $  vīsovasagga paccaẏa vahuẏa
text.141: ṇa valāvala dhāu ṇivāẏa-gaṇu  $  ṇaü liṅgu uṇāi vakku vaẏaṇu
text.142: ṇaü ṇisuṇiu pañca-mahāẏa-kavvu (?)  $  ṇaü bharahu geu lakkhaṇu vi savvu
text.144: vavasāu to vi ṇaü pariharami  $  vari raḍḍāvaddhu kavvu karami
text.145: sāmaṇṇa bhāsa chuḍu sāvaḍaü  $  chuḍu āgama-jutti kā vi ghaḍaü
text.147: ĕhu sajjaṇa-loẏahŏ kiu viṇaü  $  jaṃ avuhu padarisiu appaṇaü
text.148: jaï ema virūsaï ko vi khalu  $  tahŏ hatthutthalliu leu chalu
text.150: pisuṇeṃ kiṃ abbhatthiĕṇa  $  jasu ko vi ṇa ruccaï
text.151: kiṃ chaṇa-candu mahāgahĕṇa  $  kampantu vi muccaï
text.155: avahatthĕvi khalaẏaṇu ṇiravasesu  $  pahilaü ṇiru vaṇṇami magahadesu
text.156: jahĩ pakka-kalamĕ kamaliṇi ṇisaṇṇa  $  alahanta taraṇi thera va visaṇṇa
text.158: jahĩ ucchu-vaṇaĩ pavaṇāhaẏāĩ  $  kampanti va pīlaṇa-bhaẏa-gaẏāĩ
text.159: jahĩ ṇandaṇavaṇaĩ maṇoharāĩ  $  ṇaccanti va cala-pallava-karāĩ
text.160: jahĩ phāḍima-vaẏaṇaĩ dāḍimāĩ  $  ṇajjanti tāĩ ṇaṃ kaï-muhāĩ
text.162: jahĩ dakkhā-maṇḍava pariẏalanti  $  puṇu panthiẏa rasa-salilaĩ piẏanti
text.165: ṇaṃ pihiviĕ ṇava-jovvaṇaĕ  $  sirĕ seharu āiddhaü
text.170: ṇaccaï va maruddhuẏa-dhaẏa-karaggu  $  dharaï va ṇivaḍantaü gaẏaṇa-maggu
text.172: ghummaï va gaĕhĩ maẏa-bhimbhalehĩ  $  uḍḍaï va turaṅgahĩ cañcalehĩ
text.173: ṇhāi va sasikanta-jaloharehĩ  $  paṇavaï va hāra-mehala-bharehĩ
text.174: pakkhalaï va ṇeura-ṇiẏalaehĩ  $  vipphuraï va kuṇḍala-juẏalaehĩ
text.175: kilikilaï va savvajaṇucchaveṇa  $  gajjaï va murava-bherī-raveṇa
text.183: tahĩ seṇiu ṇāmeṃ ṇaẏa-ṇivāsu  $  uvamijjaï ṇaravaï kavaṇu tāsu
text.184: kiṃ tiṇaẏaṇu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ visama-cakkhu  $  kiṃ sasaharu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ ekka-pakkhu
text.185: kiṃ diṇaẏaru ṇaṃ ṇaṃ dahaṇa-sīlu  $  kiṃ hari ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kama-muaṇa-līlu
text.186: kiṃ kuñjaru ṇaṃ ṇaṃ ṇicca-mattu  $  kiṃ giri ṇaṃ ṇaṃ vavasāẏa-cattu
text.187: kiṃ sāẏaru ṇaṃ ṇaṃ khāra-ṇīru  $  kiṃ vammahu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ haẏa-sarīru
text.188: kiṃ phaṇivaï ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kūra-bhāu  $  kiṃ māruu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ cala-sahāu
text.189: kiṃ mahumahu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kuḍila-vakku  $  kiṃ suravaï ṇaṃ ṇaṃ sahasa-akkhu
text.190: aṇuharaï puṇu vi jaï so jjĕ tāsu  $  vāmaddhu va dāhiṇa-addhu jāsu
text.202: thiu viula-mahīharĕ vaddhamāṇu  $  samasaraṇu vi jasu joẏaṇa-pamāṇu
text.203: pāẏāra tiṇṇi caü gourāĩ  $  vāraha gaṇa vāraha mandirāĩ
text.204: ubbhiẏa caü māṇava-thambha jāma  $  turamāṇeṃ keṇa vi ṇarĕṇa tāma
text.207: "jaṃ jhāẏahi jaṃ saṃbharahi  $  so jaga-guru āo"
text.212: gaü paẏaĩ satta romañciẏaṅgu  $  puṇu mahiẏalĕ ṇāviu uttamaṅgu
text.213: devāviẏa lahu āṇanda-bheri  $  tharahariẏa vasundhari jaga-jaṇeri
text.214: sa-kalattu sa-puttu sa-piṇḍavāsu  $  sa-pariẏaṇu sa-sāhaṇu saṭṭahāsu
text.217: pahilaĕ koṭṭhaĕ risi-saṃghu diṭṭhu  $  vīẏaĕ kappaṅgaṇa-jaṇu ṇiviṭṭhu
text.219: pañcamĕ vintariu suhāsiṇīu  $  chaṭṭhaĕ puṇu bhavaṇa-ṇivāsiṇīu
text.220: sattamĕ bhāvaṇa givvāṇa sāva  $  aṭṭhamĕ vintara saṃsuddha-bhāva
text.221: ṇavamaĕ joisa ṇamiuttamaṅgu  $  dahamaĕ kappāmara pulaïẏaṅgu
text.222: eẏārahamaĕ ṇaravara ṇiviṭṭha  $  vārahamaĕ tiriẏa ṇamanta diṭṭha
text.229: sira-siharĕ caḍāviẏa-karaẏalaggu  $  magahāhiu puṇu vandaṇahã laggu
text.236: paṇaveppiṇu jiṇu taggaẏa-maṇeṇa  $  puṇu pucchiu gottamasāmi teṇa
text.239: kahĕ jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ kema thiẏa  $  kaha rāhava-kerī
text.243: jagĕ loĕhĩ ḍhakkarivantaehĩ  $  uppāiu bhantiu bhantaehĩ
text.244: jaï kummeṃ dhariẏaü dharaṇi-vīḍhu  $  to kummu paḍantaü keṇa gīḍhu
text.245: jaï rāmahŏ tihuaṇu uvarĕ māi  $  to rāvaṇu kahĩ tiẏa levi jāi
text.246: aṇṇu vi kharadūsaṇa-samarĕ deva  $  pahu jujjhaï sujjhaï bhiccu keṃva
text.247: kiha tiẏamaï-kāraṇĕ kavivareṇa  $  ghāijjaï vāli sahoẏareṇa
text.248: kiha vāṇara girivara uvvahanti  $  vandhĕvi maẏaraharu samuttaranti
text.250: varisaddhu suaï kiha kumbhaẏaṇṇu  $  mahisā-koḍihi mi ṇa dhāi aṇṇu
text.253: so mandovari jaṇaṇi-sama  $  kiha lei vihīsaṇu"
text.257: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vuccaï gaṇahareṇa  $  suṇĕ seṇiẏa kiṃ vahu-vitthareṇa
text.258: pahilaü āẏāsu aṇantu sāu  $  ṇiravekkhu ṇirañjaṇu palaẏa-bhāu
text.259: taïlokku pariṭṭhiu majjhĕ tāsu  $  caüdaha rajjuẏa āẏāmu jāsu
text.260: tetthu vi jhallari-majjhāṇumāṇu  $  thiu tiriẏa-lou rajjuẏa-pamāṇu
text.261: tahĩ jamvūdīu mahā-pahāṇu  $  vittharĕṇa lakkhu joẏaṇa-pamāṇu
text.263: tāsu vi abbhantarĕ kaṇaẏa-selu  $  ṇavaṇavaï uvarĕ sahasekka-mūlu
text.264: tahŏ dāhiṇa-bhāeṃ bharahu thakku  $  chakkhaṇḍālaṅkiu ekka-cakku
text.271: pahilaü pahu paḍisui suẏavantaü  $  vīẏaü sammaï sammaïvantaü
text.272: taïẏaü khemaṅkaru khemaṅkaru  $  caüthaü khemandharu raṇĕ duddharu
text.273: pañcamu sīmaṅkaru dīhara-karu  $  chaṭṭhaü sīmandharu dharaṇīdharu
text.274: sattamu cāru-cakkhu cakkhubbhaü  $  tāsu kālĕ uppajjaï vimbhaü
text.275: sahasā canda-divāẏara-daṃsaṇĕ  $  saẏalu vi jaṇu āsaṅkiu ṇiẏa-maṇĕ
text.276: "ahŏ paramesara kulaẏara-sārā  $  kouhallu mahu eu bhaḍārā"
text.277: taṃ ṇisuṇevi ṇarāhiu ghosaï  $  "kamma-bhūmi laï evahĩ hosaï
text.278: puvva-videhĕ tiloāṇandeṃ  $  kahiu āsi mahu parama-jiṇindeṃ
text.285: puṇu jāu jasumbhaü atula-thāmu  $  puṇu vimalavāhaṇucchaliẏa-ṇāmu
text.286: puṇu sāhicandu candāhi jāu  $  marueu paseṇaï ṇāhirāu
text.287: tahŏ ṇāhihĕ pacchima-kulaẏarāsu  $  maruevi saī va purandarāsu
text.288: candahŏ rohiṇi va maṇohirāma  $  kandappahŏ raï va pasaṇṇa-ṇāma
text.289: sā ṇiralaṅkāra ji cāru-gatta  $  āharaṇa-riddhi para bhāra-metta
text.290: tahĕ ṇiẏa-lāvaṇṇu jĕ diṇṇa-sohu  $  malu kevalu para kuṅkuma-rasohu
text.291: pāseẏa-phuliṅgāvali jĕ cāru  $  para garuẏaü mottiẏa-hāru bhāru
text.292: loẏaṇa ji sahāveṃ dala-visāla  $  āḍamvaru para kandoṭṭa-māla
text.299: to etthantarĕ māṇava-veseṃ  $  āiu deviu indāeseṃ
text.301: sapparivāraü ḍhukkaü tettahĕ  $  sā maruevi bhaḍārī jettahĕ
text.302: kā vi viṇou kiṃ pi uppāẏaï  $  paḍhaï paṇaccaï gāẏaï vāẏaï
text.303: kā vi dei tamvolu sa-hattheṃ  $  savvāharaṇu kā vi sahũ vattheṃ
text.304: pāḍaï kā vi camaru kama dhovaï  $  kā vi samujjalu dappaṇu ḍhovaï
text.305: ukkhaẏa-khagga kā vi parirakkhaï  $  kā vi kiṃ pi akkhāṇaü akkhaï
text.306: kā vi jakkhakaddamĕṇa pasāhaï  $  kā vi sarīru tāhĕ saṃvāhaï
text.314: dīsaï pañcamuhu paīharacchi  $  dīsaï ṇava-kamalārūḍha lacchi
text.316: dīsaï diṇaẏaru kara-pajjalantu  $  dīsaï jhasa-juẏalu paribbhamantu
text.317: dīsaï jala-maṅgala-kalasu vaṇṇu  $  dīsaï kamalāẏaru kamala-chaṇṇu
text.318: dīsaï jalaṇihi gajjiẏa-jalohu  $  dīsaï siṃhāsaṇu diṇṇa-sohu
text.319: dīsaï vimāṇu ghaṇṭāli-muhalu  $  dīsaï ṇāgālaü savvu dhavalu
text.320: dīsaï maṇi-ṇiẏaru paripphurantu  $  dīsaï dhūmaddhaü dhagadhagantu
text.327: teṇa vi vihaseviṇu ema vuttu  $  "taü hosaï tihuaṇa-tilaü puttu
text.330: tahŏ divasahŏ laggĕvi addhu varisu  $  givvāṇa pavarisiẏa raẏaṇa-varisu
text.331: lahu ṇāhi-ṇarindahŏ taṇaẏa-gehu  $  avaïṇṇu bhaḍāraü ṇāṇa-dehu
text.332: thiu gabbhabbhintarĕ jiṇavarindu  $  ṇava-ṇaliṇi-pattĕ ṇaṃ salila-vindu
text.333: vasuhāra pavarisiẏa puṇu vi tāma  $  aṇṇu vi aṭṭhāraha pakkha jāma
text.337: uiu bhaḍāraü risaha-jiṇu  $  sa ĩ bhu vaṇa-divāẏaru
text.342: sahasā ṇevi surehĩ  $  meruhĩ ahisittu bhaḍāraü
text.347: bhāvaṇa-bhavaṇĕhĩ saṅkha pavajjiẏa  $  ṇaṃ ṇava-pāusĕ ṇava ghaṇa gajjiẏa
text.351: āsaṇa-kampu jāu amarindahŏ  $  jāṇĕvi jammuppatti jiṇindahŏ
text.360: amara-rāu saṃcalliu jāvĕhĩ  $  dhaṇaeṃ kiu kañcaṇamaü tāvĕhĩ
text.364: lahu sakkeẏa-ṇaẏari kiẏa jakkheṃ  $  pariẏañciẏa ti-vāra sahasakkheṃ
text.366: savva-jaṇahŏ uvasovaṇi deppiṇu  $  aggaĕ māẏā-vālu thaveppiṇu
text.367: ṇiu tihuaṇa-paramesaru tettahĕ  $  sapparivāru purandaru jettahĕ
text.369: jhatti surehĩ vimukka  $  caraṇovari diṭṭhi visālā
text.377: uppari dasa-joẏaṇĕhĩ divāẏaru  $  puṇu asīhĩ lakkhijjaï sasaharu
text.378: puṇu caūhĩ ṇakkhattahã pantiu  $  vuha-maṇḍalu vi caūhĩ tahiṃtiu
text.379: asura-manti tihĩ tihĩ saṃvaccharu  $  tihĩ aṅgāraü tihĩ ji saṇiccharu
text.380: aṭṭhāṇavaï sahāsa kameppiṇu  $  aṇṇu vi joẏaṇa-saü laṅgheppiṇu
text.381: paṇḍu-silovari suravara-sāraü  $  lahu siṃhāsaṇĕ ṭhaviu bhaḍāraü
text.383: ṇāvaï sirĕṇa laevi  $  mandaru darisāvaï loẏahŏ
text.384: "ehaü tihuaṇa-ṇāhu  $  kiṃ hoi ṇa hoi va joẏahŏ"
text.389: pūriẏa dhavala saṅkha kiu kalaẏalu  $  kehi mi ghosiu caüvihu maṅgalu
text.390: kehi mi āḍhattaĩ geẏāi mi  $  saragaẏa-paẏagaẏa-tālagaẏāi mi
text.391: kehi mi vāiu vajju maṇoharu  $  vāraha-tālaü solaha-akkharu
text.393: kehi mi ubbhiẏāĩ dhaẏa-cindhaĩ  $  kehi mi guru-thottaĩ pāraddhaĩ
text.394: kehi mi laïẏaü mālaï-mālaü  $  parimala-vahalaü bhasala-vamālaü
text.395: kehi mi veṇu kehĩ vara-vīṇaü  $  kehi mi tisariẏāu sara-līṇaü
text.397: jaṃ pariẏāṇiu jehĩ  $  taṃ tehĩ savvu viṇṇāsiu
text.402: pahilaü kalasu laïu amarindeṃ  $  vīẏaü huavaheṇa sāṇandeṃ
text.403: taïẏaü sarahaseṇa jamarāeṃ  $  caüthaü ṇeriẏa-deveṃ āeṃ
text.404: pañcamu varuṇeṃ samarĕ samattheṃ  $  chaṭṭhaü mārueṇa saĩ hattheṃ
text.405: sattamaü vi kuvera-ahihāṇeṃ  $  aṭṭhamu kalasu laïu īsāṇeṃ
text.406: ṇavamaü saṃbhāviu dharaṇindeṃ  $  dasamaü kalasu laïjjaï candeṃ
text.408: suravara-velli achiṇṇa raeppiṇu  $  cattāri vi samudda laṅgheppiṇu
text.409: khīra-mahaṇṇavĕ khīru bhareppiṇu  $  aṇṇahŏ aṇṇu samappaï leppiṇu
text.417: to etthantarĕ haẏa-paḍivakkheṃ  $  geṇhĕvi vajja-sūi sahasakkheṃ
text.418: kaṇṇa-jualu jaga-ṇāhahŏ vijjhaï  $  kuṇḍala-jualu jhatti āijjhaï
text.419: seharu sīsĕ hāru vacchatthalĕ  $  karĕ kaṅkaṇu kaḍisuttaü kaḍiẏalĕ
text.420: tihuaṇa-tilaẏahŏ tilaü thavanteṃ  $  maṇĕ āsaṅkiu dasasaẏaṇetteṃ
text.421: puṇu āḍhatta jiṇindahŏ vandaṇa  $  "jaẏa tihuaṇa-guru ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇa
text.424: jaẏa ṇamiehĩ ṇamiẏa paṇavijjahi  $  aruhu vuttu puṇu kahŏ uvamijjahi
text.427: bhavĕ bhavĕ amhahũ dejja  $  jiṇa guṇa-sampatti bhaḍārā"
text.432: rūvāloẏaṇĕ rūvāsattaĩ  $  titti ṇa janti purandara-ṇettaĩ
text.433: jahĩ ṇivaḍiẏaĩ tahĩ jĕ paṅguttaĩ  $  duvvala-ḍhoraĩ paṅkĕ va khuttaĩ
text.434: vāmakaraṅguṭṭhaü ṇiddārĕvi  $  vālahŏ tetthu amiu saṃcārĕvi
text.435: puṇu vi paḍīvaü maẏaṇa-viẏāraü  $  gampi aüjjhahĕ thaviu bhaḍāraü
text.436: sūreṃ meru-giri va pariẏañciu  $  puṇu dasa-saẏa kara karĕvi paṇacciu
text.438: jaṇaṇiĕ jaṃ ji diṭṭhu ahisittaü  $  risahu bhaṇĕvi puṇu risahu jĕ vuttaü
text.445: amara-kumārĕhĩ sahũ kīlantahŏ  $  puvvahũ vīsa lakkha laṅghantahŏ
text.446: ekka-divasĕ gaẏa paẏa kūvāreṃ  $  "deva deva mua bhukkhā-māreṃ
text.447: jāhã pasāeṃ amhe dhaṇṇā  $  te kappaẏaru savva ucchaṇṇā
text.448: evahĩ ko uvāu jīvevaĕ  $  bhoẏaṇĕ khāṇĕ pāṇĕ parihevaĕ"
text.449: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu jaga-sāraü  $  saẏala-kalaü dakkhavaï bhaḍāraü
text.450: aṇṇahũ asi masi kisi vāṇijjaü  $  aṇṇahũ viviha-paẏāraü vijjaü
text.451: kaïhĩ diṇĕhĩ pariṇāviu deviu  $  ṇanda-suṇandāiu siẏa-seviu
text.454: puvvahã lakkha tisaṭṭhi  $  gaẏa rajju karantahŏ jāvĕhĩ
text.460: maṇĕ cintāviu dasasaẏaloẏaṇu  $  "karami kiṃ pi vaïrāẏahŏ kāraṇu
text.461: jeṇa karaï suhi-satta-hiẏattaṇu  $  jeṇa pavattaï tittha-pavattaṇu
text.462: jeṇa sīlu vaü ṇiẏamu ṇa ṇāsaï  $  jeṇa ahiṃsā-dhammu paẏāsaï"
text.463: ema viẏappĕvi chaṇa-candāṇaṇa  $  puṇṇāusa kokkiẏa ṇīlañjaṇa
text.465: taṃ āesu lahĕvi gaẏa tettahĕ  $  thiu atthāṇĕ bhaḍāraü jettahĕ
text.466: pāujjiĕhĩ paüñjiu takkhaṇĕ  $  geu vajju jaṃ vuttaü lakkhaṇĕ
text.473: jaṃ ṇīlañjaṇa pāṇĕhĩ mukkī  $  jāẏa jiṇahŏ tā saṅka gurukkī
text.474: "dhiddhigatthu saṃsāru asāraü  $  aṇṇahŏ aṇṇu hoi kammāraü
text.475: aṇṇahŏ aṇṇu karaï bhiccattaṇu"  $  taṃ ji hūu vaïrāẏahŏ kāraṇu
text.476: loẏantiẏahĩ tāma paḍivohiu  $  "cāru deva jaṃ saĩ ummohiu
text.477: uvahihĩ ṇava-ṇava-koḍākoḍiu  $  ṇaṭṭhaü dhammu satthu parivāḍiu
text.479: pañca mahavvaẏa pañcāṇuvvaẏa  $  tiṇṇi guṇavvaẏa caü sikkhāvaẏa
text.483: "paĩ viṇu suṇṇaü mokkhu"  $  ṇaṃ jiṇa-hakkārā āẏā
text.488: devĕhĩ khandhu devi uccāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ taṃ siddhatthu parāiu
text.489: tahĩ uvavaṇĕ thovantaru thāĕvi  $  bharahahŏ rāẏa-lacchi karĕ lāĕvi
text.490: "ṇamaha parama-siddhāṇa" bhaṇanteṃ  $  kiu paẏāgĕ ṇikkhavaṇu turanteṃ
text.491: muṭṭhiu pañca bhareppiṇu laïẏaü  $  cāmīẏara-paḍalovarĕ thaviẏaü
text.493: teṇa samāṇu saṇeheṃ laïẏā  $  rāẏahã caü sahāsa pavvaïẏā
text.494: parimiu sasi jiha gaha-saṃghāeṃ  $  addhu varisu thiu kāosāeṃ
text.501: jiṇu aviulu avicalu vīsatthaü  $  thiu chammāsu palamviẏa-hatthaü
text.502: je ṇiva teṇa samaü pavvaïẏā  $  te dāruṇa-duvvāeṃ laïẏā
text.505: ghora-vīra-tava-caraṇĕhĩ bhaggā  $  ṇāsĕvi salilu pievaĕ laggā
text.506: keṇa vi mahiẏalĕ ghattiu appaü  $  "ho ho keṇa diṭṭhu paramappaü
text.507: pāṇa janti jaï eṇa ṇioeṃ  $  to kira teṇa kāĩ paraloeṃ"
text.508: ko vi phalaĩ toḍeppiṇu bhakkhaï  $  "jāhũ bhaṇevi ko vi kāṇekkhaï
text.510: ko vi ṇivāraï kiṃ pi  $  āmellĕvi calaṇa jiṇindahŏ
text.515: tahĩ tehaĕ paḍivannaĕ avasarĕ  $  daïvī vāṇi samuṭṭhiẏa amvarĕ
text.518: phalaĩ ma toḍahŏ jalu mā ḍohahŏ  $  ṇaṃ to ṇīsaṅgattaṇu chaṇḍahŏ"
text.519: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi tisa-bhukkhādaṇṇĕhĩ  $  uddhūliu appāṇaü aṇṇĕhĩ
text.520: aṇṇĕhĩ aṇṇa samaẏa uppāiẏa  $  tahĩ avasarĕ ṇami-viṇami parāiẏa
text.522: veṇṇi vi vihĩ calaṇĕhĩ ṇivaḍeppiṇu  $  thiẏa pāsĕhĩ jiṇu jaẏakāreppiṇu
text.524: cintiu ṇami-viṇamīhĩ  $  "vuttaü vi ṇa vollaï ṇāho
text.525: eu ṇa jāṇahũ āsi  $  kiu amhĕhĩ ko avarāho
text.529: jaï vi ṇa kiṃ pi dehi sura-sārā  $  to vari ekkasi volli bhaḍārā
text.530: aṇṇahũ desu vihañjĕvi diṇṇaü  $  amhahũ kiṃ pahu ṇiddākhiṇṇaü
text.531: aṇṇahũ diṇṇa turaṅgama gaẏavara  $  amhahũ kāĩ kiẏaü paramesara
text.532: aṇṇahũ diṇṇaü uttima-vesaü  $  amhahũ ālāveṇa vi saṃsaü"
text.533: ema jāma garahanti jiṇindahŏ  $  āsaṇu caliu tāma dharaṇindahŏ
text.534: avahi paüñjĕvi sapparivāraü  $  āu khaṇaddheṃ jetthu bhaḍāraü
text.535: lakkhiu vihi mi majjhĕ paramesaru  $  sasi-sūrantarālĕ ṇaṃ mandaru
text.536: turiu ti-vāraü bhāmari deppiṇu  $  jiṇavara-vandaṇahatti kareppiṇu
text.543: taṃ ṇisuṇevi diṇṇu paccuttaru  $  "pesiẏa ve vi āsi desantaru
text.544: dūraṭṭhāṇu jāma taṃ pāvahũ  $  jāma valevi paḍīvā āvahũ
text.545: tāma pihimi ṇiẏa-puttahã deppiṇu  $  amhahã thiu avaheri kareppiṇu
text.546: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vihasiẏa-muha-ẏandeṃ  $  diṇṇaü vijjaü ve dharaṇindeṃ
text.548: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇami-viṇamihĩ vuccaï  $  "aṇṇeṃ diṇṇī pihivi na ruccaï
text.549: jaï ṇigganthu dei saĩ hattheṃ  $  to amhe vi lehũ paramattheṃ"
text.550: taṃ ṇisuṇevi ve vi avaloĕvi  $  thiu aggaĕ so muṇivaru hoĕvi
text.552: hatthutthalliu teṇa  $  gaẏa ve vi laeppiṇu vijjaü
text.558: vahu-lāẏaṇṇa-vaṇṇa-saṃpaṇṇaü  $  āṇaï ko vi pasāhĕvi kaṇṇaü
text.559: celiu ko vi ko vi haẏa cañcala  $  raẏaṇaĩ ko vi ko vi vara maẏagala
text.560: ko vi suvaṇṇaĩ ruppaẏa-thālaĩ  $  ko vi dhaṇaĩ dhaṇṇaĩ asarālaĩ
text.561: ko vi amullāharaṇaĩ ḍhoẏaï  $  tāĩ bhaḍāraü ṇaü avaloẏaï
text.562: savvaĩ dhūli-samaĩ maṇṇantaü  $  paṭṭaṇu hatthiṇaẏaru saṃpattaü
text.563: jahĩ seẏaṃseṃ daṃsaṇu pāhiu  $  chuḍu chuḍu ṇiẏa-parivārahŏ sāhiu
text.564: "ajju païṭṭhu aṇaṅga-viẏāraü  $  maĩ pārāviu risahu bhaḍāraü
text.565: ikkhu-rasahŏ bhariẏañjali jaṃ je  $  gharĕ vasu-hāra pavarisiẏa taṃ je"
text.566: tāma caüddisu loeṃ chāiu  $  saccaü jeṃ jiṇu vārĕ parāiu
text.569: bhamiu ti-bhāmari dintu  $  mandarahŏ jema tārāẏaṇu
text.574: aṇṇu vi gomaeṇa saṃmajjaṇu  $  diṇṇa jaleṇa dhāra puṇu candaṇu
text.575: pupphaĩ akkhaẏāu vali dīvā  $  dhūva-vāsa jala-vāsa paḍīvā
text.577: ahiṇava-ikkhurasahŏ bhariẏañjali  $  tāva surehĩ mukku kusumañjali
text.579: kañcaṇa-raẏaṇahã koḍiu vāraha  $  paḍiẏa lakkha vattīsaṭṭhāraha
text.580: akkhaẏa-dāṇu bhaṇĕvi seẏaṃsahŏ  $  akkhaẏataïẏa ṇāũ kiu divasahŏ
text.582: jimiu bhaḍāraü jaṃ jĕ  $  seẏaṃseṃ appaü bhāvĕvi
text.583: vandiu risaha-jiṇindu  $  sirĕ sa ĩ bhu va-jualu caḍāvĕvi
text.594: rammaṃ mahā jaṃ ca puṇṇāẏa-ṇāehĩ  $  kusumiẏa-laẏā-velli-pallava-ṇihāehĩ
text.604: accaïẏa-jūhīhĩ jāsavaṇa-mallīhĩ  $  keẏaïĕ jāehĩ avarahi mi jāīhĩ
text.607: vaṇa-vaṇiẏahĕ  $  suha-jaṇiẏahĕ  $  uppari dhariu va moraü
text.616: satta-mahābhaẏa parisesantahŏ  $  aṭṭha duṭṭha maẏa ṇiṇṇāsantahŏ
text.617: ṇavavihu vambhaceru rakkhantahŏ  $  dasavihu parama-dhammu pālantahŏ
text.618: sui eẏārahaṅga jāṇantahŏ  $  vāraha aṇuvekkhaü cintantahŏ
text.620: paṇṇāraha pamāẏa vajjantahŏ  $  solahaviha kasāẏa muccantahŏ
text.621: sattāraha saṃjama pālantahŏ  $  aṭṭhāraha vi dosa ṇāsantahŏ
text.629: thiu jiṇu ṇiddhuẏa-kamma-raü  $  ṇaṃ sasaharu ṇijjalaharaü
text.635: aṇṇettahĕ sura-dunduhi vajjaï  $  ṇaṃ pakkhuhaṇĕ mahovahi gajjaï
text.636: divva bhāsa aṇṇettahĕ bhāsaï  $  aṇṇettahĕ kamma-raü paṇāsaï
text.638: aṭṭha vi pāḍihera uppaṇṇā  $  ṇaṃ thiẏa puṇṇa-puñja āsaṇṇā
text.640: iẏa cindhaĩ  $  jasu siddhaĩ  $  para-samāṇu jasu appaü
text.641: gaha-cakkahŏ  $  taïlokkahŏ  $  so jĕ deu paramappaü
text.647: tivihu kaṇaẏa-pāẏāru pabhāviu  $  vāraha koṭṭhā solaha vāviu
text.649: caü gouraĩ hema-pariẏariẏaĩ  $  ṇava ṇava thūhaĩ tahĩ vitthariẏaĩ
text.651: aṇṇu vi vattha-cakka-chatta-ddhaẏa  $  pharaharanta accanta samuṇṇaẏa
text.652: ekkekkaĕ dhaĕ ahiṇava-chāẏahũ  $  saü aṭṭhottaru citta-paḍāẏahũ
text.653: taṃ samasaraṇu pariṭṭhiu jāvahĩ  $  amara-rāu saṃcalliu tāvahĩ
text.663: kehi mi mesa mahisa visa kuñjara  $  kehi mi taccha riccha miga samvara
text.664: kehi mi karaha varāha turaṅgama  $  kehi mi haṃsa maūra vihaṅgama
text.665: kehi mi sasa sāraṅga pavaṅgama  $  kehi mi rahavara ṇaravara jaṅgama
text.666: kehi mi vaggha siṅgha gaẏa gaṇḍā  $  kehi mi garuḍa koñca kāraṇḍā
text.667: kehi mi suṃsuāra macchohara  $  ema parāiẏa saẏala vi suravara
text.668: dasa-paẏāra  vara bhavaṇa-ṇivāsiẏa  $  vintara aṭṭha pañca joīsiẏa
text.669: vahuviha kappāmara kokkantaü  $  īsāṇindu vi āu turantaü
text.679: joẏaṇa-lakkha-pamāṇu pariṭṭhiu  $  vīẏaü mandaru ṇāĩ samuṭṭhiu
text.681: ubbhiẏa dhaẏa dhūvantaĩ cindhaĩ  $  kiẏaĩ vaṇaĩ phala-phulla-samiddhaĩ
text.682: pokkhariṇiu ṇava paṅkaẏa saravara  $  dīhiẏa-vāvi-talāẏa laẏāhara
text.686: vandiṇa-phamphāvaẏahĩ paḍhantĕhĩ  $  kaṭṭhiẏavālĕhĩ ḍhou ṇa dintĕhĩ
text.687: indahŏ taṇiẏa riddhi avaloĕvi  $  ke vi visūriẏa vimuhā hoĕvi
text.694: tāma surāsura-vāhaṇaĩ  $  phalaĩ va sagga-dumahŏ taṇaĩ
text.698: jāĩ viuvvaṇa-sattiĕ hūẏaĩ  $  turiu tāĩ āmellahu rūaĩ
text.699: thiẏa devāsura indāeseṃ  $  savva paḍīvā teṇa ji veseṃ
text.700: ṇāṇā-jāṇa-vimāṇĕhĩ tettahĕ  $  ḍhukku samosaraṇe jiṇu jettahĕ
text.701: saẏala vi dūroṇāviẏa-matthā  $  saẏala vi kara-maülañjali-hatthā
text.702: saẏala vi jaẏajaẏakāru karantā  $  saẏala vi thotta-saẏāĩ paḍhantā
text.703: saẏala vi appāṇaü darisantā  $  ṇāmu gottu ṇiẏa-ṇilaü kahantā
text.705: tahĩ velaĕ  $  sura-melaĕ  $  teẏa-piṇḍu jiṇu chajjaï
text.716: jaẏa vammaha-ṇimmahaṇa mahāusa  $  jaẏa kali-koha-huāsaṇĕ pāusa
text.719: jaẏa kammāri-maḍapphara-bhañjaṇa  $  jaẏa ṇikkala ṇiravekkha ṇirañjaṇa
text.721: tuha sāsaṇu  $  duha-ṇāsaṇu  $  evahĩ uṇṇaï caḍiẏaü
text.722: jeṃ hontĕṇa  $  pahavantĕṇa  $  jagu saṃsārĕ ṇa paḍiẏaü"
text.726: taṃ valu taṃ devāgamaṇu  $  so jiṇavaru taṃ samasaraṇu
text.727: pekkhĕvi uvavaṇĕ avaẏariu  $  jāu mahantaü acchariu
text.728: paṭṭaṇĕ purimatālĕ jo rāṇaü  $  risahaseṇu ṇāmeṇa pahāṇaü
text.729: so devāgamu ṇiĕvi pahāsiu  $  "ko saẏaḍāmuha-vaṇĕ āvāsiu
text.730: kāsu eu evaḍḍu pahuttaṇu  $  jeṇa vimāṇahĩ ṇavaï ṇahaṅgaṇu"
text.731: taṃ ṇisuṇevi keṇa apphāliu  $  "ema deva maĩ savvu ṇihāliu
text.732: bharahesarahŏ vappu jo suvvaï  $  mahi-vallahu bhaṇevi jo thuvvaï
text.734: taṃ ṇisuṇevi maraṭṭeṃ melliu  $  sa-valu sa-vandhuvaggu saṃcalliu
text.735: taṃ samasaraṇu païṭṭhu turantaü  $  "jaẏa devāhideva" pabhaṇantaü
text.737: teeṃ tĕṇa  $  païsantĕṇa  $  suraha mi vibbhamu lāiu
text.742: pekkhĕvi taṃ devāgamaṇu  $  so jiṇu taṃ ji samosaraṇu
text.744: teṇa samāṇu parama gabbhesara  $  dikkhahã ṭhiẏa caürāsī ṇaravara
text.745: caü-kallāṇa-vihūi-saṇāhahŏ  $  gaṇahara te ji hūa jaga-ṇāhahŏ
text.746: avara vi je je bhāveṃ laïẏā  $  caürāsī sahāsa pavvaïẏā
text.748: ajjiẏa-gaṇahŏ saṅkha keṃ vujjhiẏa  $  deva vi dukkiẏa-kamma-malujjhiẏa
text.749: thiẏa caüpāseṃ parama-jiṇindahŏ  $  ṇaṃ tārā-gaha puṇṇima-candahŏ
text.750: vaïraĩ parisesavi thiẏa vaṇaẏara  $  mahisa turaṅgama kesari kuñjara
text.752: ahi ṇaüla vi  $  thiẏa saẏala vi  $  ekkahĩ uvasama-bhāvĕṇa
text.757: tāma viṇiggaẏa divva jhuṇi  $  kahaï tiloahŏ parama-muṇi
text.764: kālaĩ khetta-bhāva-paradavvaĩ  $  vāraha aṅgaĩ caüdaha puvvaĩ
text.766: titthaẏarattaṇāĩ indattaĩ  $  siddhattaṇaï mi kahaï samattaĩ
text.768: kiṃ vahuvĕṇa  $  ālāvĕṇa  $  tihuaṇĕ saẏalĕ gaviṭṭhaü
text.769: ṇaü ekku vi  $  tila-mettu vi  $  taṃ ji jiṇeṇa ṇa diṭṭhaü
text.773: dhammakkhāṇu saẏalu suṇĕvi  $  cañcalu jīviu maṇĕ muṇĕvi
text.775: keṇa vi pañcāṇuvvaẏa laïẏā  $  lou karevi ke vi pavvaïẏā
text.776: kehi mi guṇavaẏāĩ aṇusariẏaĩ  $  kehi mi sikkhāvaẏaĩ padhariẏaĩ
text.777: maüṇāṇatthamiẏaĩ avarekkahĩ  $  aṇṇĕhĩ kiẏa ṇivitti aṇṇekkahĩ
text.778: jo jaṃ maggaï taṃ tahŏ dei  $  hatthu bhaḍāraü ṇaü khañcei
text.779: amara vi gaẏa sammattu laeppiṇu  $  ṇiẏa ṇiẏa-liẏa-vāhaṇahĩ caḍeppiṇu
text.781: ubbhiẏa seẏa chatta siẏa-cāmaru  $  divva bhāsa bhāmaṇḍalu seharu
text.784: tahŏ thāṇahŏ  $  ujjāṇahŏ  $  gaü taṃ gaṅgā-sāẏaru
text.789: para-cakkehi mi ṇaviẏa kama  $  jāẏa riddhi sura-riddhi-sama
text.791: tahŏ daha-pañcāsaü ṇandaṇāhũ  $  caürāsī lakkhaĩ sandaṇāhũ
text.792: caürāsī lakkhaĩ gaẏavarāhũ  $  aṭṭhāraha koḍiu haẏavarāhũ
text.793: koḍīu tiṇṇi vara-dheṇuvāhã  $  vattīsa sahāsa ṇarāhivāhã
text.794: vattīsa sahāsaĩ maṇḍalāhũ  $  kammantĕ koḍi pavahaï halāhũ
text.795: ṇava ṇihiẏaü raẏaṇaĩ satta satta  $  chakkhaṇḍa i meiṇi ekka-chatta
text.797: jiha vappĕṇa  $  māhappĕṇa  $  laïu ṇāṇu taṃ kevalu
text.798: tiha puttĕṇa  $  jujjhantĕṇa  $  sa ĩ bhu va-valĕṇa mahīẏalu
text.800: saṭṭhihiṃ varisa-sahāsahĩ  $  puṇṇa-jaẏāsahĩ  $  bharahu aüjjha paīsaraï
text.805: païsaraï ṇa paṭṭaṇĕ cakka-raẏaṇu  $  jiha avuhabbhantarĕ sukaï-vaẏaṇu
text.806: jiha vambhaẏāri-muhĕ kāma-satthu  $  jiha goṭṭhaṅgaṇĕ maṇi-raẏaṇa-vatthu
text.807: jiha vāri-ṇivandhaṇĕ hatthi-jūhu  $  jiha dujjaṇa-jaṇĕ sajjaṇa-samūhu
text.808: jiha kiviṇa-ṇihelaṇĕ paṇaï-vindu  $  jiha vahula-pakkhĕ khaẏa-divasa-candu
text.809: jiha kāmiṇi-jaṇu māṇusĕ adavvĕ  $  jiha sammaddaṃsaṇu dūra-bhavvĕ
text.810: jiha mahuari-kulu duggandhĕ raṇṇĕ  $  jiha guru-garahiu aṇṇāṇa-kaṇṇĕ
text.811: jiha parama-sokkhu saṃsāra-dhammĕ  $  jiha jīva-daẏā-varu pāva-kammĕ
text.812: paḍhama-vihaṭṭihĕ tappurisu jema  $  ṇa paīsaï ujjhahĕ cakku tema
text.814: taṃ pekkhĕvi thakkantaü  $  vigghu karantaü  $  ṇaravaï vehāviddhaü
text.815: "kahahu manti-sāmantahŏ  $  jaẏa-jasa-mantahŏ  $  kiṃ mahu ko vi asiddhaü"
text.819: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi mantihĩ vuttu ema  $  jaṃ cintahi taṃ taṃ siddhu deva
text.820: chakkhaṇḍa vasundhari ṇava ṇihāṇa  $  caüdaha-vihehĩ raẏaṇĕhĩ samāṇa
text.821: ṇavaṇavaï sahāsa mahāgarāhũ  $  vattīsa sahasa desantarāhũ
text.822: avarāi mi siddhaĩ jāĩ jāĩ  $  ko lakkhĕvi sakkaï tāĩ tāĩ
text.823: para ekku ṇa sijjhaï sāhimāṇu  $  saẏa-pañca-savāẏa-dhaṇu-ppamāṇu
text.824: titthaṅkara-ṇandaṇu tuha kaṇiṭṭhu  $  aṭṭhāṇavaïhĩ bhāihĩ variṭṭhu
text.828: sīhu jema pakkhariẏaü  $  khantiĕ dhariẏaü  $  jaï so kaha vi viẏaṭṭaï
text.829: to sahũ khandhāvāreṃ  $  ekka-pahāreṃ  $  paï mi deva dalavaṭṭaï"
text.833: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi daṭṭhāhareṇa  $  bharaheṇa bharaha-paramesareṇa
text.834: paṭṭhaviẏa mahantā turiẏa tāsu  $  "vuccaï karĕ kera ṇarāhivāsu
text.835: jaï ṇaü paḍivaṇṇu kaẏāvi ema  $  tā tema karahu mahu bhiḍaï jema"
text.836: sikkhaviẏa mahantā gaẏa turanta  $  ṇivisaddheṃ poẏaṇa-ṇaẏaru patta
text.837: pujjĕvi pucchiẏa "āgamaṇu kāĩ"  $  tehi mi kahiẏaĩ vaẏaṇāĩ tāĩ
text.838: "ko tuhũ ko bharahu ṇa bheu ko vi  $  puhavīsaru dīsaï gampi to vi
text.839: jiha bhāẏara aṭṭhāṇavaï iẏara  $  jīvanti karĕvi tahŏ taṇiẏa kera
text.840: tiha tuhu mi maḍappharu pariharevi  $  jiu rāẏahŏ kerī kera levi"
text.842: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi bhaẏa-bhīseṃ  $  vāhuvalīseṃ  $  bharaha-dūa ṇibbhacchiẏa
text.843: "ekka kera vappikkī  $  pihimi-gurukkī  $  avara kera ṇa paḍicchiẏa
text.847: pavasanteṃ parama-jiṇesareṇa  $  jaṃ kiṃ pi vihañjĕvi diṇṇu teṇa
text.848: taṃ amhahũ sāsaṇu suha-ṇihāṇu  $  kiu vippiu ṇaü keṇa vi samāṇu
text.849: so pihimihĕ haũ poẏaṇahŏ sāmi  $  ṇaü demi ṇa lemi ṇa pāsu jāmi
text.850: diṭṭheṇa teṇa kira kavaṇu kajju  $  kiṃ tāsu pasāeṃ karami rajju
text.851: kiṃ tahŏ valeṇa haũ duṇṇivāru  $  kiṃ tahŏ valeṇa mahu purisaẏāru
text.852: kiṃ tahŏ valeṇa pāikka-lou  $  kiṃ tahŏ valeṇa sampaẏa-vihou
text.856: "jaï vi tujjhu imu maṇḍalu  $  vahu-cintiẏa-phalu  $  āsi samappiu vappeṃ
text.857: gāmu sīmu khalu khettu vi  $  sarisava-mettu vi  $  to vi ṇāhĩ viṇu kappeṃ"
text.861: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi palamva-vāhu  $  ṇaṃ candāiccahũ kuviu rāhu
text.862: "kahŏ taṇaü rajju kahŏ taṇaü bharahu  $  jaṃ jāṇahu taṃ mahu milĕvi karahu
text.863: so ekkeṃ cakkeṃ vahaï gavvu  $  kira vasikiu maĩ mahivīḍhu savvu
text.864: ṇaü jāṇaï hosaï kema kajju  $  kahŏ pāsiu ṇīsāvaṇṇu rajju
text.865: pariẏalaï jeṇa tahŏ taṇaü dappu  $  taṃ tehaü kallaĕ demi kappu
text.867: taṃ suṇĕvi mahantā gaẏa turanta  $  ṇivisaddheṃ bharahahŏ pāsu patta
text.868: jaṃ jema caviu taṃ kahiu tema  $  "paĩ tiṇa-sariso vi ṇa gaṇaï deva
text.870: ṇa karaï kera tuhārī  $  riu-khaẏa-kārī  $  ṇibbhaü māṇĕ mahāiu
text.871: meiṇi-ravaṇu samuḍḍĕvi  $  raṇa-piḍu maṇḍĕvi  $  jujjha-sajju thiu dāiu"
text.875: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jhatti palittu rāu  $  ṇaṃ jalaṇu jāla-mālā-sahāu
text.876: devāviu lahu saṇṇāha-tūru  $  saṇṇajjhaï sa-rahasu suhaḍa-sūru
text.877: āūriu valu caüraṅgu tāma  $  aṭṭhāraha akkhohaṇiu jāma
text.878: paricintiẏa ṇava ṇihi saṃcalanti  $  je sandaṇa-veseṃ paribhamanti
text.879: mahakālu kālu māṇavaü paṇḍu  $  paümakkhu saṅkhu piṅgalu pacaṇḍu
text.880: ṇaïsappu raẏaṇu ṇava ṇihiu eẏa  $  ṇaṃ thiẏa vahu-bhāẏahĩ puṇṇa-bheẏa
text.883: kŏ vi vatthaĩ kŏ vi bhoẏaṇaĩ dei  $  kŏ vi raẏaṇaĩ kŏ vi paharaṇaĩ ṇei
text.884: kŏ vi haẏa gaẏa kŏ vi osahiu dharaï  $  viṇṇāṇāharaṇahũ ko vi haraï
text.887: kāgaṇi-maṇi-tthavaï thiẏa  $  khagga-purohiẏa  $  te vi caüddaha cintiẏa
text.891: gaü bharahu paẏāṇaü devi jāma  $  heriĕhĩ kaṇiṭṭhahŏ kahiu tāma
text.892: "sahasā ṇīsaru saṇṇahĕvi deva  $  dīsaï paḍivakkhu samuddu jema"
text.893: taṃ suṇĕvi sa-rosu palamva-vāhu  $  saṇṇajjhaï poẏaṇa-ṇaẏara-ṇāhu
text.894: paḍu paḍaha samāhaẏa diṇṇa saṅkha  $  dhaẏa-daṇḍa chatta ubbhiẏa asaṅkha
text.895: kiu kalaẏalu laïẏaĩ paharaṇāĩ  $  kara-pahara-paẏaṭṭaĩ vāhaṇāĩ
text.896: ṇīsariu satta saṅkhohaṇīu  $  ekkaĕ seṇṇaĕ akkhohaṇīu
text.897: bharahesara-vāhuvalī vi te vi  $  āsaṇṇaĩ ḍhukkaĩ valaĩ ve vi
text.899: haẏa haẏahũ mahā-gaẏa gaẏavarāhũ  $  bhaḍa bhaḍahũ mahā-raha rahavarāhũ
text.902: ekkamekka kokkantaĩ  $  raṇĕ hakkantaĩ  $  ubhaẏa-valaĩ abbhiṭṭaĩ
text.913: ruhirollaĩ sarĕhĩ vihāviẏāĩ  $  ṇaṃ ve vi kusumbhĕhĩ rāviẏāĩ
text.915: pekkhĕvi valaĩ ghulantaĩ  $  mahihĩ paḍantaĩ  $  mantihĩ dhariẏa "ma bhaṇḍahŏ
text.916: kiṃ vahieṇa varāeṃ  $  bhaḍa-saṃghāeṃ  $  diṭṭhi-jujjhu vari maṇḍahŏ
text.920: pahilaü jujjhevaü diṭṭhi-jujjhu  $  jala-jujjhu paḍīvaü malla-jujjhu
text.921: jo tiṇṇi mi jujjhaĩ jiṇaï ajju  $  tahŏ ṇihi tahŏ raẏaṇaĩ tāsu rajju"
text.922: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi dukkhu ṇivāriẏāĩ  $  sāhaṇaĩ ve vi osāriẏāĩ
text.924: avaloiu bharaheṃ paḍhamu bhāi  $  kaïlāseṃ kañcaṇa-saïlu ṇāĩ
text.926: puṇu joiu vāhuvalīsareṇa  $  sarĕ kumuẏa-saṇḍu ṇaṃ diṇaẏareṇa
text.929: uvarilliẏaĕ visālaĕ  $  bhiuḍi-karālaĕ  $  heṭṭhima diṭṭhi parajjiẏa
text.930: ṇaṃ ṇava-jovvaṇaïttī  $  cañcala-cittī  $  kulavahu ijjaĕ tajjiẏa
text.934: jaṃ jiṇĕvi ṇa sakkiu diṭṭhi-jujjhu  $  pāraddhu khaṇaddheṃ salila-jujjhu
text.935: jalĕ païṭha pihimi-poẏaṇa-ṇarinda  $  ṇaṃ māṇasa-saravarĕ sura-gaïnda
text.937: pammukka jhalakka sahoẏarāsu  $  ṇaṃ vela samuddeṃ mahiharāsu
text.938: chuḍu vāhuvalihĕ vacchaẏalu patta  $  ṇibbhacchiẏa asaï va puṇu ṇiẏatta
text.939: para thiẏa urĕ toẏa-tusāra dhavala  $  ṇaṃ ṇahĕ tārā-ṇiurumva-vahala
text.940: puṇu pacchaĕ vāhuvalīsareṇa  $  āmelliẏa salila-jhalakka teṇa
text.943: ohaṭṭiu bharahesaru  $  thiu muha-kāẏaru  $  garua-rahallaĕ laïẏaü
text.948: jaṃ jiṇĕvi ṇa sakkiu salila-jujjhu  $  pāraddhu paḍīvaü malla-jujjhu
text.949: āvīlavi kacchaü vala-mahalla  $  akkhāḍaĕ ṇāĩ païṭṭha malla
text.950: ovaggiẏa puṇu kiẏa vāhu-sadda  $  ṇaṃ bhiḍiẏa suvanta-tiẏanta-sadda
text.952: sahũ bharaheṃ suharu karevi vāmu  $  puṇu pacchaĕ darisiu ṇiẏaẏa-thāmu
text.953: uccāiu ubhaẏa-karĕhĩ ṇarindu  $  sakkeṇa va jammaṇĕ jiṇa-varindu
text.955: kiu kalaẏalu sāhaṇĕ vijaü ghuṭṭhu  $  ṇaraṇāhu vilakkhīhūu suṭṭhu
text.957: cakka-raẏaṇu paricintiu  $  uppari ghattiu  $  carama-dehu teṃ vañciu
text.962: jaṃ mukku cakku cakkesareṇa  $  taṃ cintiu vāhuvalīsareṇa
text.963: "kiṃ pahu apphālami mahihĩ ajju  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ dhigatthu pariharami rajju
text.964: rajjahŏ kāraṇĕ kijjaï ajuttu  $  ghāevaü bhāẏaru vappu puttu
text.965: kiṃ āeṃ sāhami parama-mokkhu  $  jahĩ labbhaï acalu aṇantu sokkhu"
text.966: paricintĕvi suiru maṇeṇa ema  $  puṇu thaviu ṇarāhiu ḍimbhu jema
text.967: "mahu taṇiẏa pihimi tuhũ bhuñjĕ bhāẏa  $  somappahu kera karei rāẏa"
text.968: suṇisallu karĕvi jiṇu guru bhaṇevi  $  thiu pañca muṭṭhi sirĕ lou devi
text.969: olamviẏa-karaẏalu ekku varisu  $  aviolu acalu giri-meru-sarisu
text.972: khaṇu vi ṇa mukku bhaḍāraü  $  maẏaṇa-viẏāraü  $  ṇaṃ saṃsārahŏ bhīẏahĩ
text.977: taïlokka-piẏāmahu jaga-jaṇeru  $  samasaraṇu vi sa-gaṇu sa-pāḍiheru
text.978: thovĕhĩ divasĕhĩ bharahesaro vi  $  tahŏ vandaṇa-hattiĕ āu so vi
text.979: thottuggīriẏa guru-puraü bhāi  $  paraloẏa-mūlĕ ihalou ṇāĩ
text.981: "vāhuvali bhaḍārā suha-ṇihāṇu  $  keṃ kajjeṃ ajju ṇa hoi ṇāṇu"
text.983: "ajja vi īsīsi kasāu tāsu  $  jaṃ khettĕ tuhāraĕ kiu ṇivāsu
text.985: jaï bharahahŏ ji samappiu  $  to kiṃ cappiu  $  maĩ calaṇĕhĩ mahi-maṇḍalu
text.986: eṇa kasāeṃ laïẏaü  $  so pavvaïẏaü  $  teṇa ṇa pāvaï kevalu"
text.990: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi gaü bharahu tetthu  $  vāhuvali-bhaḍāraü acalu jetthu
text.991: savvaṅgu paḍiu calaṇehĩ tāsu  $  "taü taṇiẏa pihimi haũ tumha dāsu"
text.992: viṇṇavaï khamāvaï ema jāma  $  caü ghāi-kamma gaẏa khaẏahŏ tāma
text.993: uppaṇṇaü kevala-ṇāṇu vimalu  $  thiu dehu khaṇaddheṃ duddha-dhavalu
text.994: paümāsaṇu bhūsaṇu seẏa-camaru  $  bhā-maṇḍalu ekku jĕ chattu pavaru
text.995: atthakkaĕ āiu sura-ṇikāu  $  titthaẏara-puttu kevaliu jāu
text.996: thovahĩ divasahĩ tihuaṇa-jaṇāri  $  ṇāsiẏaghāiẏa-kamma vi caẏāri
text.999: risahu vi gaü ṇivvāṇahŏ  $  sāsaẏa-thāṇahŏ  $  bharahu vi ṇivvui pattaü
text.1000: akkakitti thiu ujjhahĕ  $  daṇu-duggejjhahĕ  $  rajju sa iṃ bhu ñjantaü
text.1007: tahĩ jĕ aüjjhahĩ vahaveṃ kāleṃ  $  ucchaṇṇeṃ ṇaravara-taru-jāleṃ
text.1009: tāsu puttu ṇāmeṃ tiẏasañjaü  $  puṇu jiẏasattu raṇaṅgaṇĕ dujjaü
text.1010: tāsu vijaẏa mahaevi maṇohara  $  pariṇiẏa thira-mālūra-paohara
text.1011: tāhĕ gabbhĕ bhava-bhaẏa-khaẏa-gāraü  $  uppajjaï suu ajiẏa-bhaḍāraü
text.1012: risahu jema vasuhāra-ṇimittaü  $  risahu jema meruhĩ ahisittaü
text.1013: risahu jema thiu vālakkīlaĕ  $  risahu jema pariṇāviu līlaĕ
text.1014: risahu jema rajju i bhuñjanteṃ  $  ekka-divaĕ ṇandaṇavaṇu janteṃ
text.1021: so ji mahāsaru tahĩ jĕ vaṇālaĕ  $  diṭṭhu jiṇāhiveṇa vettālaĕ
text.1023: taṃ ṇievi gaü parama-visāẏahŏ  $  "laï eha ji gaï jīvahŏ jāẏahŏ
text.1024: jo jīvantu diṭṭhu puvvaṇhaĕ  $  so aṅgāra-puñju avaraṇhaĕ
text.1025: jo ṇaravara-lakkhĕhĩ paṇavijjaï  $  so pahu muaü avāreṃ ṇijjaï
text.1026: jiha sañjhāĕ eu paṅkaẏa-vaṇu  $  tiha jarāĕ ghāijjaï jovvaṇu
text.1027: jīviu jamĕṇa sarīru huāseṃ  $  sattaĩ kāleṃ riddhi viṇāseṃ"
text.1028: cintaï ema bhaḍāraü jāvĕhĩ  $  loẏantiẏahĩ vivohiu tāvĕhĩ
text.1031: jiṇu pavvaïu turantu  $  dasahĩ sahāsahĩ sahiẏaü
text.1035: thiu chaṭṭhovavāsĕ sura-sāraü  $  vamhaẏatta-gharĕ thakku bhaḍāraü
text.1036: risahu jema pāraṇaü kareppiṇu  $  caüdaha saṃvacchara vihareppiṇu
text.1037: sukka-jhāṇu āūriu ṇimmalu  $  puṇu uppaṇṇu ṇāṇu tahŏ kevalu
text.1038: aṭṭha vi pāḍihera samasaraṇaü  $  jiha risahahŏ tiha devāgamaṇaü
text.1040: tahĩ jĕ kālĕ jiẏasattu-sahoẏaru  $  tiẏasañjaẏahŏ puttu jaẏasāẏaru
text.1041: jaẏasāẏarahŏ puttu sumaṇoharu  $  ṇāmeṃ saẏaru saẏala-cakkesaru
text.1042: bharahu jema sahũ ṇavahĩ ṇihāṇahĩ  $  raẏaṇĕhĩ caüdaha-vihahĩ pahāṇahĩ
text.1045: jīu va kamma-vaseṇa  $  ṇiu avaharĕvi turaṅgeṃ
text.1049: duṭṭhu turaṅgamu cañcala-chāẏahŏ  $  gaẏaü paṇāsĕvi pacchima-bhāẏahŏ
text.1050: païsaï suṇṇāraṇṇu mahāḍaï  $  jahĩ kali-kālahŏ hiẏavaü pāḍaï
text.1051: dukkhu dukkhu hari damiu ṇarindeṃ  $  ṇaṃ maẏaraddhaü parama-jiṇindeṃ
text.1052: tāma mahā-saru dīsaï sa-kamalu  $  cala-vīī taraṅga-bhaṅgura-jalu
text.1053: tahĩ laẏa-maṇḍavĕ uppallāṇĕvi  $  salilu pievi turaṅgamu ṇhāṇĕvi
text.1054: samu mellaï vettālahŏ jāvĕhĩ  $  tilaẏakesa sampāiẏa tāvĕhĩ
text.1055: dhīẏa suloẏaṇāhŏ valavantahŏ  $  vahiṇi sahoẏari dasasaẏaṇettahŏ
text.1056: kira sahũ sahiẏahĩ ḍhukkaï saravaru  $  dīsaï tāma saẏaru pihimīsaru
text.1058: viddhī kāma-sarehĩ  $  ekku vi paü ṇa paẏaṭṭaï
text.1063: keṇa vi kahiu gampi sahasakkhahŏ  $  "koūhalu kiṃ eu ṇa lakkhahŏ
text.1064: ekku aṇaṅga-samāṇu juvāṇaü  $  ṇaü jāṇahũ kiṃ pihimihĕ rāṇaü
text.1065: taṃ pekkhĕvi sasa tumhahã kerī  $  kāma-gaheṇa hūa vivarerī"
text.1066: taṃ ṇisuṇevi rāu romañciu  $  abbhantarĕ āṇandu paṇacciu
text.1067: "ṇemittiẏahĩ āsi jaṃ vuttaü  $  ĕu taṃ saẏarāgamaṇu ṇiruttaü"
text.1068: maṇĕ paricintĕvi papphullāṇaṇu  $  gaü turantu tahĩ dasasaẏaloẏaṇu
text.1070: sirĕ karaẏala karevi jokkāriu  $  diṇṇa kaṇṇa puṇu purĕ païsāriu
text.1077: tilakesa laeppiṇu gaü saẏaru  $  païsariu aüjjhāuri-ṇaẏaru
text.1078: sahasakkhu vi jaṇaṇa-vaïru sarĕvi  $  vijjāhara-sāhaṇu melavĕvi
text.1079: gaü uppari tāsu puṇṇaghaṇahŏ  $  jeṃ jīviu hariu suloẏaṇahŏ
text.1081: jo toẏadavāhaṇu tāsu suu  $  so raṇamuhĕ kaha vi kaha vi ṇa muu
text.1083: mambhīsa diṇṇa amaresarĕṇa  $  sa-vaïra-vittantu kahiu ṇarĕṇa
text.1084: je riu aṇupacchaĕ lagga tahŏ  $  gaẏa pāsu paḍīvā ṇiẏa-ṇivahŏ
text.1087: jima siddhālaĕ siddhu  $  tima samasaraṇĕ païṭṭhaü
text.1091: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pahu jhaṭṭi palittaü  $  ṇaṃ khaḍa-hāru huāsaṇĕ ghittaü
text.1092: "maru maru jaï vi jāi pāẏālahŏ  $  visahara-bhavaṇa-mūla-ghaṇa-jālahŏ
text.1093: païsaï jaï vi saraṇu sura-sevahũ  $  dasaviha-bhāvaṇavāsiẏa-devahũ
text.1094: païsaï jaï vi saraṇu thira-thāṇahũ  $  aṭṭha-vihahũ vintara-givvāṇahũ
text.1095: païsaï jaï vi saraṇu duvvārahũ  $  joisa-devahũ pañca-paẏārahũ
text.1097: maraï to vi mahu toẏadavāhaṇu"  $  païja karĕvi gaü dasasaẏaloẏaṇu
text.1098: pekkhĕvi māṇatthambhu jiṇindahŏ  $  maccharu māṇu vi galiu ṇarindahŏ
text.1099: so vi gampi samasaraṇu païṭṭhaü  $  jiṇu paṇaveppiṇu puraü ṇiviṭṭhaü
text.1100: vihi mi bhavantarāĩ vajjariẏaĩ  $  vihi mi jaṇaṇa-vaïraĩ parihariẏaĩ
text.1107: pabhaṇaï bhīmu bhīma-bhaḍa-bhañjaṇu  $  "tuhũ mahu aṇṇa-bhavantarĕ ṇandaṇu
text.1108: jiha ciru tiha evahi mi piẏāraü"  $  cumviu puṇu vi puṇu vi saẏavāraü
text.1109: "laï kāmuka-vimāṇu aviẏāreṃ  $  laï rakkhasiẏa vijja sahũ hāreṃ
text.1110: aṇṇu vi raẏaṇāẏara-pariẏañciẏa  $  duppaïsāra surehi mi vañciẏa
text.1111: tīsa parama joẏaṇa vitthiṇṇī  $  laṅkā-ṇaẏari tujjhu maĩ diṇṇī
text.1112: aṇṇu vi ekka-vāra chajjoẏaṇa  $  laï pāẏālalaṅka ghaṇavāhaṇa"
text.1113: bhīma-mahābhīmahũ āeseṃ  $  diṇṇu paẏāṇaü maṇĕ parioseṃ
text.1121: vahaveṃ kāleṃ vala-saṃpattiĕ  $  ajiẏa-jiṇahŏ gaü vandaṇa-hattiĕ
text.1122: taṃ samasaraṇu paīsaï jāvĕhĩ  $  saẏaru vi tahĩ jĕ parāiu tāvĕhĩ
text.1123: pucchiu ṇāhu pihimi-paripāleṃ  $  "kaï hosanti bhavanteṃ kāleṃ
text.1124: tumheṃ jehā vaẏa-guṇa-vantā  $  kaï titthaẏara deva aïkantā
text.1125: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi kandappa-viẏāraü  $  māgaha-bhāsaĕ kahaï bhaḍāraü
text.1126: "maĩ jehaü kevala-saṃpaṇṇaü  $  ekku ji risahu deu uppaṇṇaü
text.1127: paĩ jehaü chakkhaṇḍa-pahāṇaü  $  bharaha-ṇarāhiu ekku ji rāṇaü
text.1128: paĩ viṇu dasa hosanti ṇaresara  $  maĩ viṇu vāvīsa vi titthaṅkara
text.1129: ṇava valaeva ṇava ji ṇārāẏaṇa  $  hara eẏāraha ṇava ji dasāṇaṇa
text.1130: aṇṇu vi ekkuṇasaṭṭhi purāṇaĩ  $  jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ hosanti pahāṇaĩ"
text.1138: vahaveṃ kāleṃ sāsaẏa-thāṇahŏ  $  ajiẏa-bhaḍāraü gaü ṇivvāṇahŏ
text.1139: saẏarahŏ saẏala pihimi bhuñjantahŏ  $  raẏaṇa-ṇihāṇaĩ paripālantahŏ
text.1142: bharaha-kiẏaĩ maṇi-kañcaṇa-māṇaĩ  $  caüvīsa vi vandeppiṇu thāṇaĩ
text.1143: bhaṇaï bhaīrahi suṭṭhu viẏakkhaṇu  $  "karahũ kiṃ pi jiṇa-bhavaṇahũ rakkhaṇu
text.1144: kaḍḍhĕvi gaṅga bhamāḍahũ pāsĕhĩ"  $  taṃ ji samatthiu bhāi-sahāsĕhĩ
text.1151: takkhaṇĕ khou jāu ahi-loẏahŏ  $  dharaṇindahŏ sahāsa-phaḍa-ḍoẏahŏ
text.1152: āsīvisa-diṭṭhiĕ ṇikkhattiẏa  $  saẏala vi chārahŏ puñju pavattiẏa
text.1153: kaha vi kaha vi ṇa vi diṭṭhihĩ paḍiẏā  $  bhīma-bhaīrahi ve uvvariẏā
text.1154: dummaṇa dīṇa-vaẏaṇa pariẏattā  $  lahu sakkeẏa-ṇaẏari saṃpattā
text.1155: mantihĩ kahiu "kaha vi tiha bhindahŏ  $  jiha uḍḍanti ṇa pāṇa ṇarindahŏ"
text.1156: tāma sahā-maṇḍaü maṇḍijjaï  $  āsaṇu āsaṇeṇa pīḍijjaï
text.1157: mehalu mehaleṇa ālaggeṃ  $  hāreṃ hāru maüḍu maüḍaggeṃ
text.1161: saṭṭhi-sahāsahũ majjhĕ  $  ekku vi puttu ṇa āvaï
text.1165: bhīma-bhaīrahi tāma païṭṭhā  $  ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-āsaṇĕ gampi ṇiviṭṭhā
text.1166: pucchiẏa puṇu paripāliẏa-rajjeṃ  $  "iẏara ṇa païsaranti kiṃ kajjeṃ
text.1167: tehĩ viṇāsaṇāĩ vicchāẏaĩ  $  tāmarasāĩ va ṇiddhuẏagāẏaĩ"
text.1168: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu tahŏ mantihĩ  $  jāṇāviu pacchaṇṇa-paüttihĩ
text.1169: "he ṇaravaï ṇiẏa-kulahŏ paīvā  $  gaẏa diẏahā kiṃ enti paḍīvā
text.1170: jalavāhiṇi-pavāha ṇivvūḍhā  $  pariẏattanti kāĩ te mūḍhā
text.1172: jalavuvvuva-taraṅga-suracāvaĩ  $  kaï dīsanti viṇāsu ṇa bhāvaï
text.1175: kaü dīsanti paḍīvā  $  ujjhahĩ ekkahĩ miliẏā"
text.1179: jaṃ ṇiddarisu samāsaĕ diṇṇaü  $  taṃ cakkavaïhĕ hiẏavaü bhiṇṇaü
text.1180: "teṇa jĕ te atthāṇu ṇa ḍhukkā  $  phuḍu mahu keraü pesaṇu cukkā"
text.1181: laddhāvasarĕhĩ jaṃ aṇuhuttaü  $  bhaïrahi-bhīmahĩ kahiu ṇiruttaü
text.1182: taṃ ṇisuṇevi rāu mucchaṃgaü  $  paḍiu mahaddumu vva pavaṇāhaü
text.1183: tahi mi kālĕ sāmiẏa-sammāṇĕhĩ  $  bhiccĕhĩ jema ṇa melliu pāṇĕhĩ
text.1185: "kiṃ soeṃ kiṃ khandhāvāreṃ  $  vari pāvajja lemi aviẏāreṃ
text.1186: āẏaĕ lacchiĕ vahu jujjhāviẏa  $  pāhuṇaẏā iva vahu volāviẏa
text.1188: jo jo ko vi juvāṇu  $  tāsu tāsu kulaüttī
text.1189: meiṇi cheñchaï jema  $  kavaṇeṃ ṇarĕṇa ṇa bhuttī"
text.1193: pabhaṇiu bhīmu "hohi diḍhu rajjahŏ  $  haũ puṇu jāmi thāmi ṇiẏa-kajjahŏ"
text.1194: teṇa vi vuttu "ṇāhi vaü bhañjami  $  cheñchaï paĩ ji kahiẏa ṇaü bhuñjami"
text.1195: cattu bhīmu bhaïrahi hakkāriu  $  diṇṇa pihimi vaïsaṇĕ vaïsāriu
text.1196: appuṇu bharahu jema ṇikkhantaü  $  taü karevi puṇu ṇivvui pattaü
text.1197: tā ettahĕ viṇihaẏa-paḍivakkhahŏ  $  rajju karantahŏ tahŏ maharakkhahŏ
text.1198: devarakkhu uppaṇṇaü ṇandaṇu  $  ṇaravaï ekka-divasĕ gaü uvavaṇu
text.1199: kīlaṇa-vāvihĕ parimiu ṇārihĩ  $  ṇhāi gaïndu va sahũ gaṇiẏārihĩ
text.1200: ṇivaḍiẏa tāsu diṭṭhi tahĩ avasarĕ  $  jahĩ muu mahuẏaru kamalabbhantarĕ
text.1207: ṇiẏa-maṇĕ jāi visāẏahŏ jāvĕhĩ  $  savaṇa-saṅghu saṃpāiu tāvĕhĩ
text.1208: saẏala vi risi tiẏāla-jogesara  $  mahakaï gamaẏa vāi vāīsara
text.1211: saẏala vi ṇiẏa-tava-teeṃ diṇaẏara  $  gambhīrattaṇeṇa raẏaṇāẏara
text.1212: saẏala vi ghora-vīra-tava-tattā  $  saẏala vi saẏala-saṅga-paricattā
text.1213: saẏala vi kamma-vandha-viddhaṃsaṇa  $  saẏala vi saẏala-jīva-mambhīsaṇa
text.1216: saẏala vi carama-sarīra  $  saẏala vi ujjuẏa-cittā
text.1221: to etthantarĕ pahu āṇandiu  $  so risi-saṅghu turanteṃ vandiu
text.1224: jampaï sāhu "sāhu laṅkesara  $  paĩ jīvevaü aṭṭha jĕ vāsara
text.1225: jaṃ jāṇahi taṃ karahi turantaü"  $  ṇivisaddheṇa so vi ṇikkhantaü
text.1226: aṭṭha divasa saṃllehaṇa bhāvĕvi  $  aṭṭha divasa dāṇaĩ devāvĕvi
text.1227: aṭṭha divasa pujjaü ṇīsārĕvi  $  aṭṭha divasa paḍimaü ahisārĕvi
text.1228: aṭṭha divasa ārāhaṇa vāĕvi  $  gaü mokkhahŏ paramappaü jhāṇĕvi
text.1231: thiu amarāhiu jema  $  laṅka sa ïṃ bhu ñjantaü
text.1234: puṇu uppaṇṇu kittidhavalu dhavaliu jeṇa bhuaṇu ṇiẏa-kittiĕ
text.1235: yathā prathamas toyadavāhanaḥ. toyadavāhanasyāpatyaṃ maharakṣaḥ. maharakṣasyāpatyaṃ devarakṣaḥ. devarakṣasyāpatyaṃ rakṣaḥ. rakṣasyāpatyaṃ ādityaḥ. ādityasyāpatyam ādityarakṣaḥ. ādityarakṣasyāpatyaṃ bhīmaprabhaḥ. bhīmaprabhasyāpatyaṃ pūjarhan. pūjarhato 'patyaṃ jitabhāskaraḥ. jitabhāskarasyāpatyaṃ saṃparikīrtiḥ. saṃparikīrter sugrīvaḥ. sugrīvasyāpatyaṃ harigrīvaḥ. harigrīvasyāpatyaṃ śrīgrīvaḥ. śrīgrīvasyāpatyaṃ sumukhaḥ. sumukhasyāpatyaṃ suvyaktaḥ. suvyaktasyāpatyaṃ mṛgavegaḥ. mṛgavegasyāpatyaṃ bhānugatiḥ. bhāṇugater apatyam indraḥ. indrasyāpatyam indraprabhaḥ. indraprabhasyāpatyaṃ meghaḥ. meghasyāpatyaṃ siṃhavadanaḥ. siṃhavadanasyāpatyaṃ paviḥ. paver apatyaṃ indraviṭuḥ. indraviṭor apatyaṃ bhānudharmā. bhānudharmaṇo 'patyaṃ bhānuḥ. bhānor apatyaṃ surāriḥ. surārer apatyaṃ trijaṭaḥ. trijaṭasyāpatyaṃ bhīmaḥ. bhīmasyāpatyaṃ mahābhīmaḥ. mahābhīmasyāpatyaṃ mohanaḥ. mohanasyāpatyam aṅgārakaḥ. aṅgārakasyāpatyaṃ raviḥ. raver apatyaṃ cakrāraḥ. cakrārasyāpatyaṃ vajrodaraḥ. vajrodarasyāpatyaṃ pramodaḥ. pramodasyāpatyaṃ siṃhavikramaḥ. siṃhavikramasyāpatyaṃ  cāmuṇḍaḥ. cāmuṇḍasyāpatyaṃ ghātakaḥ. ghātakasyāpatyaṃ bhīṣmaḥ. bhīṣmasyāpatyaṃ dvipabāhuḥ. dvipabāhor apatyam arimardanaḥ. arimardanasyāpatyaṃ nirvāṇabhaktiḥ. nirvāṇabhakter apatyam ugraśrīḥ. ugraśriyo 'patyaṃ arhadbhaktiḥ. arhadbhakter apatyaṃ anuttaraḥ. anuttarasyāpatyaṃ gatyuttamaḥ. gatyuttamasyāpatyam anilaḥ. anilasyāpatyaṃ caṇḍaḥ. caṇḍasyāpatyaṃ laṅkāśokaḥ. laṅkāśokasyāpatyaṃ mayūraḥ. mayūrasyāpatyaṃ mahābāhuḥ. mahābāhor apatyaṃ manoramaḥ. manoramasyāpatyaṃ bhāskaraḥ. bhāskarasyāpatyaṃ bṛhadgatiḥ. bṛhadgater apatyaṃ bṛhatkāntaḥ. bṛhatkāntasyāpatyam arisaṃtrāsaḥ. arisaṃtrāsasyāpatyaṃ candrāvartaḥ. candrāvartasyāpatyaṃ mahāravaḥ. mahāravasyāpatyaṃ meghadhvaniḥ. meghadhvaner apatyaṃ grahakṣobhaḥ. grahakṣobhasyāpatyaṃ nakṣatradamanaḥ. nakṣatradamanasyāpatyaṃ tārakaḥ. tārakasyāpatyaṃ meghanādaḥ. meghanādasyāpatyaṃ kīrtidhavalaḥ. ityetāni
text.1241: ekkahĩ diṇĕ vijjāhara-pavaru  $  lacchī-mahaevihĕ bhāi ṇaru
text.1243: sa-kalattu sa-manti-samanta-valu  $  tahŏ ahimuhu āu kittidhavalu
text.1244: sa-paṇāmu samāicchiu karĕvi  $  puṇu thiu ekkāsaṇĕ vaïsarĕvi
text.1246: cāẏāra vi vāraĩ ruddhāĩ  $  diṭṭhaĩ chatta-ddhaẏa-cindhāĩ
text.1250: taṃ pekkheviṇu vaïri-valu  $  kittidhavalu sirikaṇṭheṃ dhīriu
text.1251: "tāva ṇa jiṇavaru jaẏa bhaṇami  $  jāva ṇa raṇĕ vivakkhu sara-sīriu"
text.1255: sirikaṇṭhahŏ joĕvi muha-kamalu  $  kamalāĕ pavuttu kittidhavalu
text.1257: tahĩ pupphottara-vijjāhivaï  $  tahŏ taṇiẏa duhiẏa haũ kamalamaï
text.1258: chuḍu chuḍu uvvellĕvi ṇīsariẏa  $  camaraharihĩ ṇārihĩ pariẏariẏa
text.1260: sa-vimāṇu entu ṇahĕ ṇiẏavi saĩ  $  ghattiẏa ṇaẏaṇuppala-māla maĩ
text.1261: taïẏahũ jĕ jāu pāṇiggahaṇu  $  evahĩ ṇikkāraṇĕ kāĩ raṇu
text.1262: mā ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-seṇṇaĩ ṇiṭṭhavahŏ  $  tahŏ pāsu mahantā paṭṭhavahŏ"
text.1264: ṇisuṇĕvi taṃ tehaü vaẏaṇu  $  pesiẏa dūẏa parāiẏa tettahĕ
text.1270: "paramesara etthu a-khanti kaü  $  savvaü kaṇṇaü para-bhāẏaṇaü
text.1271: sariẏaü ṇīsarĕvi mahīharahŏ  $  ḍhoẏanti salilu raẏaṇāẏarahŏ
text.1272: mottiẏa-mālaü sirĕ kuñjarahŏ  $  uvasoha denti aṇṇahŏ ṇarahŏ
text.1273: dhārāu levi jalu jalaharahŏ  $  siñcanti aṅgu ṇava-taruvarahŏ
text.1274: uppajjĕvi majjhĕ mahā-sarahŏ  $  ṇaliṇiu viẏasanti divāẏarahŏ
text.1275: sirikaṇṭha-kumārahŏ dosu kaü  $  taü duhiẏaĕ laïu saẏamvaraü
text.1276: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaravaï lajjiẏaü  $  thiu māṇa-maḍapphara-vajjiẏaü
text.1278: "kaṇṇā dāṇu kahiṃ (?) taṇaü  $  jaï ṇa diṇṇu to tuḍihĩ caḍāvaï
text.1279: hoi sahāveṃ maïlaṇiẏa  $  cheẏa-kālĕ dīvaẏa-siha ṇāvaï"
text.1283: gaü ema bhaṇevi ṇarāhivaï  $  sirikaṇṭheṃ pariṇiẏa paümavaï
text.1285: sabbhāveṃ bhaṇaï kittidhavalu  $  "jiha dūrīhoi ṇa muha-kamalu
text.1286: tiha acchahũ sajjaṇa-pāṇa-piẏa  $  kiṃ vihĩ ṇa pahuccaï eha siẏa
text.1287: mahu atthi aṇeẏa dīva pavara  $  hari-haṇuruha-haṃsa-suvela-dhara
text.1293: ṇivvāḍeppiṇu dhammu jiha  $  jaṃ bhāvaï taṃ geṇhahi mittā"
text.1297: sirikaṇṭhahŏ tāma manti kahaï  $  "kiṃ vahaveṃ vāṇara-dīu laï
text.1300: muttāhala-jala-tusāra-darisu  $  jahĩ desu vi tāsu jĕ aṇusarisu
text.1301: ahiṇava-kusumaĩ pakkaĩ phalaĩ  $  kara-gejjhaĩ paṇṇaĩ phopphalaĩ
text.1302: jahĩ dakkha rasālaü dīhiẏaü  $  guliẏaü amarehi mi īhiẏaü
text.1304: jahĩ dhaṇṇaĩ phala-saṃdarisiẏaĩ  $  dharaṇihĕ aṅgāĩ va harisiẏaĩ"
text.1307: māhava-māsahŏ paḍhama-diṇĕ  $  tahĩ sirikaṇṭheṃ diṇṇu paẏāṇaü
text.1311: laṅgheppiṇu lavaṇa-samudda-jalu  $  taṃ vāṇara-dīu païṭṭhu valu
text.1312: jahĩ kuhiṇiu ravikanta-ppahaü  $  sihi-saṅkaĕ uvari ṇa dei paü
text.1313: jahĩ vāviu vaülāmoiẏaü  $  sura-saṅkaĕ ṇarĕṇa ṇa joiẏaü
text.1314: jahĩ jalaĩ ṇāhĩ viṇu paṅkaĕhĩ  $  paṅkaẏaĩ ṇāhĩ viṇu chappaĕhĩ
text.1315: jahĩ vaṇaĩ ṇāhĩ viṇu amvaĕhĩ  $  amvā vi ṇāhĩ viṇu gocchaĕhĩ
text.1316: gocchā vi ṇāhĩ viṇu koilĕhĩ  $  koilaü ṇāhĩ viṇu kalaẏalĕhĩ
text.1317: jahĩ phalaĩ ṇāhĩ viṇu taruvarĕhĩ  $  taruvara vi ṇāhĩ viṇu laẏaharĕhĩ
text.1318: laẏaharaĩ ṇāhĩ ṇikkusumiẏaĩ  $  jahĩ mahuẏara-vindaĩ ṇa bhamiẏaĩ
text.1320: sāhaü ṇaü viṇu vāṇarĕhĩ  $  ṇaü vāṇara jāhã ṇa vukkāro
text.1321: tāĩ ṇiẏantaü tahĩ jĕ thiu  $  vijjālaü sirikaṇṭha-kumāro
text.1325: pahu tehĩ samāṇu kheḍu karĕvi  $  avarehi dharāvĕvi saĩ dharĕvi
text.1327: kiu sahasā savvu suvaṇṇamaü  $  ṇāmeṇa kikkupuru aṇṇamaü
text.1328: jahĩ candakanti-maṇi candiẏaü  $  sasi bhaṇĕvi a-diẏahĕ jĕ vandiẏaü
text.1329: jahĩ sūrakanti-maṇi vipphuriẏa  $  ravi bhaṇĕvi jalāĩ muanti diẏa
text.1332: uppaṇṇu tāma koḍḍāvaṇaü  $  sirikaṇṭhahŏ vajjakaṇṭhu taṇaü
text.1335: vandaṇa-hattiĕ so vi gaü  $  parama-jiṇahŏ taïlokka-paīvahŏ
text.1339: sa-pasāhaṇu sa-parivāru sa-dhaü  $  maṇusuttara-mahiharu jāma gaü
text.1340: paḍikūliu tāma gamaṇu ṇarahŏ  $  siddhālaü ṇāĩ ku-muṇivarahŏ
text.1341: "maĩ aṇṇa-bhavantarĕ kāĩ kiu  $  jeṃ sura gaẏa mahu ji vimāṇu thiu
text.1342: vari ghora-vīra-taü haũ karami  $  ṇandīsarakkhu jeṃ païsarami"
text.1343: gaü ema bhaṇĕvi ṇiẏa-paṭṭaṇahŏ  $  saṃtāṇu samappĕvi ṇandaṇahŏ
text.1344: ṇīsaṅgu jāu ṇivisantarĕṇa  $  jiha vajjakaṇṭhu kālantarĕṇa
text.1345: tiha indāuhu tiha indamaï  $  tiha meru sa-mandaru pavaṇagaï
text.1346: tiha ravipahu ema suhāsaṇaĩ  $  vavagaẏaĩ aṭṭha sīhāsaṇaĩ
text.1349: antarĕ vihi mi pariṭṭhiẏaü  $  chaṇa-puvvaṇhu jema ravi-candahũ
text.1353: pariṇantahŏ laṅkāhiva-duhiẏa  $  tahŏ paṅgaṇĕ keṇa vi kaï lihiẏa
text.1354: dīhara-laṅgūlāratta-muha  $  kamu dinti va dhāvanti va samuha
text.1355: taṃ pekkhĕvi sāhāmaẏa-ṇivahu  $  bhaïẏaĕ mucchāviẏa rāẏa-vahu
text.1356: etthantarĕ kuviu ṇarāhivaï  $  "taṃ mārahu lihiẏā jeṇa kaï"
text.1357: paṇaveppiṇu mantihĩ uvasamiu  $  "kaï-ṇivahu ṇa keṇa vi aïkamiu
text.1358: eẏahũ ji pasāeṃ rāẏa-siẏa  $  taü pesaṇaẏārī jema tiẏa
text.1359: eẏahũ jĕ pasāeṃ raṇĕ ajaü  $  jagĕ vāṇara-vaṃsu pasiddhi-gaü
text.1360: sirikaṇṭhahŏ laggĕvi kaï-saẏaĩ  $  eẏaĩ jĕ tumha kula-devaẏaĩ
text.1362: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi parituṭṭhaĕṇa  $  aïkamiẏa (?) ṇamiẏa marisāviẏa
text.1363: ṇimmala-kulahŏ kalaṅku jiha  $  maüḍĕ cindhĕ dhaĕ chattĕ lihāviẏa
text.1367: teṃ vāṇara-vaṃsu pasiddhi-gaü  $  viṇṇi vi seḍiu vasikarĕvi thiu
text.1368: uppaṇṇu kaïddhaü tāsu suu  $  kaïdhaẏahŏ vi paḍivalu pavara-bhuu
text.1369: paḍivalahŏ vi ṇaẏaṇāṇandu puṇu  $  puṇu khaẏarāṇandu visāla-guṇu
text.1370: puṇu giriṇandaṇu puṇu uvahiraü  $  tahŏ parama-mittu paḍipakkha-khaü
text.1372: ekkahĩ diṇĕ uvavaṇu ṇīsariu  $  puṇu vuḍḍaṇa-vāvihĕ païsariu
text.1373: mahaevi tāma tahŏ takkhaṇĕṇa  $  thaṇa-siharahĩ phāḍiẏa makkaḍĕṇa
text.1374: teṇa vi ṇārāẏahĩ viddhu kaï  $  gaü taü jaü taruvara-mūlĕ jaï
text.1377: ṇiẏaẏa-bhavantaru saṃbharĕvi  $  vijjukesu jaü taü avaïṇṇaü
text.1381: taḍikesu ṇievi vihāiẏaü  $  "haũ eṇa haẏāseṃ ghāiẏaü
text.1382: ajju vi maṇĕ sallu samuvvahaï  $  jaü pekkhaï taü kaïvara vahaï
text.1383: kettaḍaü vahesaï khuddu khalu  $  uppāẏami māẏā-pamaẏa-valu"
text.1384: to ema bhaṇĕvi sāhāmiẏaĩ  $  girivara-saṃkāsaĩ ṇimmiẏaĩ
text.1386: āṇattaĩ uppari dhāiẏaĩ  $  jalĕ thalĕ āẏāsĕ ṇa māiẏaĩ
text.1390: aṇṇaĩ huẏavaha-hatthāĩ  $  aṇṇaĩ puṇu aṇṇĕhĩ uppāĕhĩ
text.1391: rūvaĩ kālahŏ kerāĩ  $  āvĕvi thiẏaĩ ṇāĩ vahu-bhāĕhĩ
text.1395: aṇṇahĩ kokkiu laṅkāhivaï  $  "tiha paharu pāu jiha ṇihaü kaï"
text.1396: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaravaï kampiẏaü  $  "kiṃ kahi mi pavaṅgamu jampiẏaü
text.1397: kiṃ kahi mi kaïndahŏ paharaṇaĩ  $  āẏaĩ lahuāĩ ṇa kāraṇaĩ
text.1399: "ke tumhaĩ kāĩ a-khanti kiẏa  $  kajjeṇa keṇa saṇṇahĕvi thiẏa"
text.1400: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi caviu pamaẏa-ṇivahu  $  "kiṃ puvva-vaïru vīsariu pahu
text.1401: jaïẏahũ jala-kīlaĕ āiẏaü  $  mahaevi-kajjĕ kaï ghāiẏaü
text.1402: risi-pañcaṇamokkārahũ valĕṇa  $  suravaru uppaṇṇu teṇa phalĕṇa
text.1404: vaïru tuhāraü saṃbharĕvi  $  so haũ ekku vi thiu vahu-bhāĕhĩ
text.1405: seraü acchahi kāĩ raṇĕ  $  jima abbhiḍu jima paḍu mahu pāĕhĩ"
text.1409: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇamiu ṇarāhivaï  $  amareṇa vi darisiẏa amara-gaï
text.1410: ṇiu vijjukesu karĕ dharĕvi tahĩ  $  ṇivasaï maharisi caü-ṇāṇi jahĩ
text.1411: paẏāhiṇa karĕvi guru-bhatti kiẏa  $  vandeppiṇu viṇṇi mi puraü thiẏa
text.1412: savvaṅgiu suravaru harisiẏaü  $  "ĕhu jammu eṇa mahu darisiẏaü
text.1413: ajju vi lakkhijjaï pāẏaḍaü  $  mahu keraü eu sarīraḍaü"
text.1414: taṃ pekkhĕvi taḍikesu vi ḍariu  $  ṇaṃ pavaṇa-chittu taru tharahariu
text.1415: puṇu pucchiu maharisi "dhammu kahĕ  $  paribhamahũ jeṇa ṇaü ṇaraẏa-pahĕ"
text.1416: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi cavaï cāru-cariu  $  "mahu atthi aṇṇu paramāẏariu
text.1417: so kahaï dhammu savvattiharu  $  païsahũ ji jiṇālaü santiharu
text.1418: parioseṃ tiṇṇi vi uccaliẏa  $  vāhuvali-bharaha-risaha va miliẏa
text.1434: ekkeṃ dhammeṃ hontaĕṇa  $  indā deva vi seva karanti
text.1435: dhamma-vihūṇahŏ māṇusahŏ  $  caṇḍāla vi paṅgaṇaĕ ṇa ṭhanti"
text.1439: taḍikeseṃ pucchiu puṇu vi guru  $  "aṇṇahĩ bhavĕ ko haũ ko va suru"
text.1441: tuhũ sāhu ehu dhāṇukku tahĩ  $  āiu taru-mūlĕ vi thiŏ 'si jahĩ
text.1442: ṇigganthu ṇiĕvi uvahāsu kaü  $  īsīsuppaṇṇu kasāu taü
text.1444: tatthahŏ vi caveppiṇu suddhamaï  $  hūo 'si ettha laṅkāhivaï
text.1445: dhāṇukkiu hiṇḍĕvi bhava-gahaṇĕ  $  uppaṇṇu pavaṅgamu pamaẏa-vaṇĕ
text.1446: paĩ haü samāhi-maraṇeṇa muu  $  puṇu gampiṇu uvahi-kumāru huu"
text.1448: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi laṅkesarĕṇa  $  rajjĕ sukesu thavĕvi paramattheṃ
text.1449: muĕvi ku-vesa va rāẏa-siẏa  $  tava-siẏa-vahuẏa laïẏa saĩ hattheṃ
text.1453: jaṃ vijjukesu ṇigganthu thiu  $  pañcĕhĩ muṭṭhihĩ sirĕ lou kiu
text.1454: taṃ kaḍaẏa-maüḍa-kuṇḍala-dharĕṇa  $  sammattu laïu diḍhu suravarĕṇa
text.1456: mahi-maṇḍalĕ ghattiu diṭṭhu kiha  $  ṇāvālaü gaṅgā-vāhu jiha
text.1457: vandhaṇa-vimukku ṇaṃ ṇiraẏaülu  $  vaṅkuḍaü sahāveṃ jema khalu
text.1458: juvaī jaṇu vaṇṇu samuvvahaï  $  āẏariu va cariu kahaü kahaï
text.1459: ṇaṃ akkhara-pantihĩ pahu bhaṇiu  $  "tumhahũ sukesu paripālaṇiu
text.1460: taḍikeseṃ tava-siẏa laïẏa karĕ  $  jaṃ jāṇahi taṃ pahu tuhu mi karĕ
text.1462: lehu ghiveppiṇu uvahiraü  $  puttahŏ rajju devi ṇikkhantaü
text.1463: purĕ paḍicandu pariṭṭhiẏaü  $  vāṇaradīu sa ïṃ bhu ñjantaü
text.1466: ṇaṃ risaha-jiṇāsu  $  bharaha-vāhuvali ve vi suva
text.1470: chuḍu chuḍu sarīra-saṃpatti patta  $  tahĩ avasarĕ keṇa vi kahiẏa vatta
text.1473: sirimāla-ṇāma tahŏ taṇiẏa duhiẏa  $  indīvaracchi chaṇa-canda-muhiẏa
text.1474: kaẏalī-kandala-somāla vāla  $  sā paraĕ ghivesaï kahŏ vi māla"
text.1475: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pavara-kaïddhaehĩ  $  gamu sajjiu kikkindhandhaehĩ
text.1476: ḍhoiẏaĩ vimāṇaĩ caḍiẏa joha  $  saṃcalla ṇahaṅgaṇĕ diṇṇa-soha
text.1477: ṇivisaddheṃ dāhiṇa-seḍhi patta  $  jahĩ miliẏā vijjāhara samatta
text.1484: ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-thāṇehĩ ṇivaddha mañca  $  mahakavi-kavvālāva va su-sañca
text.1488: mañcesu tesu thiẏa pahu caḍevi  $  vammaha-ṇaḍa ṇāḍijjanti(?) ke vi
text.1489: bhūsanti sarīraĩ vāravāra  $  kaṇṭhāĩ muanti laẏanti hāra
text.1490: sundara sacchāẏa vi kaṇaẏa-ḍora  $  aliẏaṃ ji ghivanti bhaṇevi thora
text.1491: gāẏanti hasanti puṇāsaṇattha  $  aṅgaĩ moḍanti valanti hattha
text.1493: sa-pasāhaṇa savva  $  thiẏa sammuha varaïtta kiha
text.1494: "kira hosaï siddhi"  $  āẏaĕ āsaĕ samaẏa jiha
text.1498: sirimāla tāma kariṇihĕ valagga  $  ṇaṃ vijju mahā-ghaṇa-koḍi-lagga
text.1500: aggima-gaṇiẏārihĕ caḍiẏa dhāi  $  ṇisi-puraü pariṭṭhiẏa sañjha ṇāi
text.1501: darisāviu ṇara-ṇiurumvu tīĕ  $  ṇaṃ vaṇa-siri taruvara mahuẏarīĕ
text.1502: "uhu sundari candāṇaṇa-kumāru  $  ugghāu ūhu raṇĕ duṇṇivāru
text.1504: saẏala vi ṇaravara vañcanti jāi  $  avarāgama sammādiṭṭhi ṇāĩ
text.1505: pura ujjovantiẏa dīvi jema  $  pacchaï andhāru karanti tema
text.1506: ṇaṃ siddhi ku-muṇivara pariharanti  $  duggandha rukkha ṇaṃ bhamara-panti
text.1508: gaṇiẏāriĕ vāla  $  ṇiẏa kikkindhahŏ pāsu kiha
text.1513: kikkindhahŏ ghalliẏa māla tāĕ  $  ṇaṃ mehesarahŏ suloẏaṇāĕ
text.1514: āsaṇṇa pariṭṭhiẏa vimala-deha  $  ṇaṃ kaṇaẏagirihĕ ṇava-candaleha
text.1515: vicchāẏa jāẏa saẏala vi ṇarinda  $  sasi-joṇhaĕ viṇu ṇaṃ mahiharinda
text.1516: ṇaṃ ku-tavasi parama-gaīhĕ cukka  $  ṇaṃ paṅkaẏa-sara ravi-kanti-mukka
text.1518: abbhantarĕ vijjāhara-varāhũ  $  païsāru diṇṇu kiṃ vaṇṇarāhũ
text.1519: uddālahŏ vahu varaïttu haṇahŏ  $  vāṇara-vaṃsa-ẏaruhĕ kandu khaṇahŏ"
text.1520: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu andhaeṇa  $  hakkāriu amarisa-kuddhaeṇa
text.1523: laï paharaṇu pāva  $  jāma ṇa pāḍami sira-kamalu"
text.1527: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu vijaẏasīhu  $  utthariu pavara-bhuva-phaliha-dīhu
text.1529: sāhaṇaï mi avaropparu bhiḍanti  $  ṇaṃ sukaï-kavva-vaẏaṇaĩ ghaḍanti
text.1530: bhañjanti khambha vihaḍanti mañca  $  dukkavi-kavvālāva va ku-sañca
text.1531: haẏa gaẏa suṇṇāsaṇa saṃcaranti  $  ṇaṃ paṃsuli-loẏaṇa paribhamanti
text.1532: raṇu vijjāhara-vāṇarahũ jāma  $  laṅkāhiu pattu sukesu tāma
text.1533: ālaggu so vi vaṇĕ jiha huāsu  $  jasu ḍhukkaï so so lei ṇāsu
text.1534: tahĩ avasarĕ vehāviddhaeṇa  $  raṇĕ vijaẏasīhu haü andhaeṇa
text.1541: viṇivāiĕ vijaẏamaïndĕ khuddĕ  $  kiĕ pārāuṭṭhaĕ vala-samuddĕ
text.1542: tuṭṭhāṇaṇu bhaṇaï sukesu ema  $  "sirimāla laeppiṇu jāhũ deva"
text.1543: teṃ vaẏaṇeṃ gaẏa kaṇṭaïẏa-gatta  $  ṇivisaddheṃ kikku-purakkhu patta
text.1544: ettahĕ vi duṭṭha-ṇiṭṭhavaṇa-heu  $  keṇa vi ṇisuṇāviu asaṇiveu
text.1546: paḍicandahŏ suĕṇa kaïddhaeṇa  $  āvaṭṭiu jama-muhĕ andhaeṇa"
text.1547: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi ṇa karantu kheu  $  saṇṇahĕvi padhāiu asaṇiveu
text.1548: caüraṅgeṃ vijjāhara-valeṇa  $  pariveḍhiu paṭṭaṇu teṃ chaleṇa
text.1556: "arĕ bhāi mahāraü ṇihaü jema  $  duddhara-sara-dhoraṇi dharahŏ tema"
text.1558: ṇiggantahĩ jaṇa-ṇiggaẏa-paẏāvu  $  kiu pārāuṭṭhaü seṇṇu sāvu
text.1559: so asaṇiveu andhaẏahŏ valiu  $  taḍivāhaṇeṇa kikkindhu khaliu
text.1560: paharaṇaĩ muẏanti su-dāruṇāĩ  $  khaṇĕ aggeẏaĩ khaṇĕ vāruṇāĩ
text.1561: khaṇĕ pavaṇatthaĩ khaṇĕ thambhaṇāĩ  $  khaṇĕ vāmohaṇa-ummohaṇāĩ
text.1562: khaṇĕ mahiẏalĕ khaṇĕ ṇahaẏalĕ bhamanti  $  khaṇĕ sandaṇĕ khaṇĕ jĕ vimāṇĕ thanti
text.1564: āẏāmĕvi dukkhu  $  andhaü khaggeṃ kaṇṭhĕ haü
text.1565: ṇiu pantheṃ teṇa  $  jeṃ so vijaẏamaïndu gaü
text.1569: ettahĕ vi bhiṇḍivāleṇa pahaü  $  kikkindha-ṇarāhiu muccha-gaü
text.1571: tahĩ avasarĕ ḍhukku sukesu pāsu  $  rahavarĕ chuhevi ṇiu ṇiẏa-ṇivāsu
text.1572: paḍivāiu ceẏaṇa-bhāu laddhu  $  uṭṭhanteṃ pucchiu parama-vandhu
text.1573: "kahĩ andhaü "pesaṇa-cukku deva"  $  ṇivaḍiu puṇo vi taḍi-rukkhu jema
text.1574: puṇu paḍivāiu puṇu āu jīu  $  "hā paĩ viṇu suṇṇaü pamaẏa-dīu
text.1575: hā bhāẏa sahoẏara dehi vāẏa  $  hā paĩ viṇu meiṇi vihava jāẏa"
text.1578: sirĕ ṇikkhaĕ khaggĕ  $  avasaru kavaṇu ruevāhŏ
text.1582: viṇu kajjeṃ vaïrihĩ aṅgu dehi  $  pāẏālalaṅka païsarahũ ehi
text.1583: jīvantahũ sijjhaï savvu kajju  $  ettiu ṇa vi haũ ṇa vi tuhũ ṇa rajju"
text.1584: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vāṇara-vaṃsa-sāru  $  ṇīsariu sa-sāhaṇu sa-parivāru
text.1585: ṇāsantu ṇiĕvi harisiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  rahu vāhiu vijjulavāhaṇeṇa
text.1586: karĕ dhariu asaṇiveeṇa puttu  $  "kiṃ uttima-purisahã eu juttu
text.1587: ṇāsantu ṇavantu suvantu sattu  $  bhuñjantu ṇa hammaï jalu piẏantu
text.1588: jeṃ vijaẏasīhu haü bhuẏa-visālu  $  so ṇiu kiẏanta-dantantarālu"
text.1589: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi taḍivāhaṇu ṇiẏattu  $  lahu desu pasāhiu ekka-chattu
text.1596: kikkindha-sukesahã pura harevi  $  avara vi vijjāhara vasikarevi
text.1597: vahu-divasĕhĩ ghaṇa-paḍalaĩ ṇievi  $  taṃ vijaẏasīha-duhu saṃbharevi
text.1598: sahasāra-kumārahŏ devi rajju  $  appuṇu sāhiu para-loẏa-kajju
text.1599: vahu-kāleṃ kikkindhāhivo vi  $  gaü vandaṇa-hattiĕ meru so vi
text.1600: palluṭṭu paḍīvaü ṇara-variṭṭhu  $  mahu pavara-mahīharu tāma diṭṭhu
text.1601: jovaï va paīhiẏa-loẏaṇehĩ  $  hasaï va kamalāẏara-āṇaṇehĩ
text.1602: gāẏaï va bhamara-mahuari-sarehĩ  $  ṇhāi va ṇimmala-jala-ṇijjharehĩ
text.1603: vīsamaï va laliẏa-laẏāharehĩ  $  paṇavaï va phulla-phala-gurubharehĩ
text.1605: taṃ selu ṇievi  $  kokkāvĕvi ṇiẏa paẏa paüru
text.1610: mahu-mahiharo vi kikkindhu vuttu  $  ucchuraü tāma uppaṇṇu puttu
text.1611: aṇṇu vi sūraraü kaṇiṭṭhu tāsu  $  vāhuvali jema bharahesarāsu
text.1612: ettahĕ vi sukesahŏ tiṇṇi putta  $  sirimāli-sumāli-sumallavanta
text.1613: poḍhattaṇĕ vuccaï tehĩ tāu  $  "ki ṇa jāhũ jetthu kikkindharāu"
text.1614: taṃ suṇĕvi jaṇereṃ vuttu ema  $  "thiẏa dāḍhuppāḍiẏa sappu jema
text.1615: kahĩ jāhũ muĕvi pāẏālalaṅka  $  caüpāsiu vaïrihũ taṇiẏa saṅka
text.1617: aṇuhūẏa laṅka kāmiṇi va pavara  $  mahu taṇaĕ sīsĕ avahariẏa ṇavara"
text.1619: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi  $  māli palittu davaggi jiha
text.1620: "uddhaddhaĕ rajjĕ  $  ṇivisu vi jijjaï tāẏa kiha
text.1624: mahu kahiẏa bhaḍārā paĩ ji ṇitti  $  tiha jīvahi jiha paribhamaï kitti
text.1625: tiha hasu jiha ṇa hasijjaï jaṇeṇa  $  tiha bhuñju jiha ṇa muccahi dhaṇeṇa
text.1626: tiha jujjhu jiha ṇivvui jaṇaï aṅgu  $  tiha taju jiha puṇu vi ṇa hoi saṅgu
text.1627: tiha caü jiha vuccaï sāhu sāhu  $  tiha saṃcaru jiha saẏaṇahã ṇa ḍāhu
text.1628: tiha suṇu jiha ṇivasahi guruhũ pāsĕ  $  tiha maru jiha ṇāvahi gabbhavāsĕ
text.1629: tiha taü karĕ jiha paritavaï gattu  $  tiha rajju pālĕ jiha ṇavaï sattu
text.1630: kiṃ jīeṃ riu-āsaṅkieṇa  $  kiṃ puriseṃ māṇa-kalaṅkieṇa
text.1631: kiṃ davveṃ dāṇa-vivajjieṇa  $  kiṃ putteṃ maïlaï vaṃsu jeṇa
text.1633: jaï kallaĕ tāẏa  $  laṅkāṇaẏari ṇa païsarami
text.1638: gaẏa raẏaṇi paẏāṇaü paraĕ diṇṇu  $  haü tūru rasāẏalu ṇāĩ bhiṇṇu
text.1639: saṃcalliu sāhaṇu ṇiravasesu  $  ārūḍha ke vi ṇara gaẏavaresu
text.1640: turaesu ke vi kĕ vi sandaṇesu  $  siviesu ke vi pañcāṇaṇesu
text.1641: pariveḍhiẏa laṅkā-ṇaẏari tehĩ  $  ṇaṃ mahihara-koḍi mahā-ghaṇehĩ
text.1642: ṇaṃ poḍha-vilāsiṇi kāmuehĩ  $  ṇaṃ saẏavattiṇi phullandhuehĩ
text.1643: kiu kalaẏalu rahasāūriehĩ  $  paḍipahaẏaĩ tūraĩ tūriehĩ
text.1644: saṅkhiĕhĩ saṅkha tāliĕhĩ tāla  $  caü-pāsiu uṭṭhiẏa bhaḍa-vamāla
text.1645: dhāiu laṅkāhiu vipphurantu  $  raṇĕ pārāuṭṭhaü valu karantu
text.1652: paharanti paropparu taruvarehĩ  $  puṇu pāhāṇĕhĩ puṇu girivarehĩ
text.1657: saẏavāraü pariañcevi gaẏaṇĕ  $  haü khaggeṃ chuddhu kiẏanta-vaẏaṇĕ
text.1658: ṇigghāu paḍiu ṇigghāu jema  $  mahiẏalĕ ṇara ṇahĕ parituṭṭha deva
text.1659: cattāri vi dhuva-parihava-kalaṅka  $  jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṇa païṭṭha laṅka
text.1662: suvilāsiṇi jema  $  laṅka sa iṃ bhu ñjanta thiẏa
text.1665: sahasā ahimuhihūāĩ  $  sāẏarahŏ jema savvaĩ jalaĩ
text.1671: tāhĕ puttu sura-siri-saṃpaṇṇaü  $  indu cavevi indu uppaṇṇaü
text.1672: bhesaï manti danti aïrāvaṇu  $  seṇāvaï harikesi bhaẏāvaṇu
text.1673: vijjāhara ji savva kiẏa suravara  $  pavaṇa-kuvera-varuṇa-jama-sasahara
text.1674: chavvīsa vi sahasaĩ pekkhaṇaẏahũ  $  ṇāhĩ pamāṇu khujja-vāmaṇaẏahũ
text.1675: gāẏaṇa jāĩ surindattaṇaẏahũ  $  ṇāmaĩ tāĩ kiẏaĩ appaṇaẏahũ
text.1679: tāĩ tāĩ mahu cindhāĩ  $  laï haũ ji indu mahi-maṇḍalahŏ"
text.1683: juĕ khaẏa-kālĕ ṇiḍḍa (?)-ṇiḍḍālihĕ  $  je je seva karantā mālihĕ
text.1684: te te miliẏa ṇarāhiva indahŏ  $  avara jaloha va avara-samuddahŏ
text.1685: kappu ṇa dinti janti sirigārahĩ (?)  $  āṇa karanti vi ṇāhaṅkārahĩ
text.1686: keṇa vi kahiu gampi tahŏ mālihĕ  $  "pahu saṃkanti (?) ṇa tumha ṇiḍḍālihĕ (?)
text.1687: indu ko vi sahasārahŏ ṇandaṇu  $  tāsu karanti savva bhiccattaṇu"
text.1689: devāviẏa raṇa-bheri bhaẏaṅkara  $  gharu (?) saṇṇahĕvi parāiẏa kiṅkara
text.1690: kikkindhahŏ kikkindhahŏ ṇandaṇa  $  diṇṇu paẏāṇaü vāhiẏa sandaṇa
text.1692: "gamaṇu ṇa sujjhaï mahu maṇahŏ"  $  taṃ māli sumāli karĕhĩ dharaï
text.1693: "pekkhu deva duṇimittāĩ  $  siva kandaï vāẏasu karagaraï
text.1697: pekkhu kuhiṇi visahara-chijjantī  $  mokkala-kesa ṇāri rovantī
text.1698: pekkhu phurantaü vāmaü loẏaṇu  $  pekkhahi ruhira-ṇhāṇu vasa-bhoẏaṇu
text.1700: pekkhu akālĕ mahā-ghaṇu gajjiu  $  ṇahĕ ṇaccantu kavandhu alajjiu"
text.1701: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu tahŏ valiẏaü  $  "vaccha vaccha jaï saüṇu ji valiẏaü
text.1702: to kiṃ maraï savvu ĕu aliẏaü  $  daïu muevi aṇṇu ko valiẏaü
text.1703: chuḍu dhīrattaṇu hoi maṇūsahŏ  $  lacchi kitti osaraï ṇa pāsahŏ"
text.1704: ema bhaṇeppiṇu diṇṇu paẏāṇaü  $  caliu seṇṇu sarahasu sa-vimāṇaü
text.1711: taṃ jamakaraṇahŏ aṇuharamāṇaü  $  ṇisuṇĕvi rakkhahŏ taṇaü paẏāṇaü
text.1712: ubhaẏa-seḍhi-sāmanta paṇaṭṭhā  $  gampiṇu indahŏ saraṇĕ païṭṭhā
text.1713: tahĩ avasarĕ valavanta mahāiẏa  $  mālihĕ kerā dūa parāiẏa
text.1714: "ahŏ ahŏ rahaṇeura-pura-rāṇā  $  kappu devi karĕ sandhi aẏāṇā
text.1715: dujjaü laṅkāhiu samaraṅgaṇĕ  $  chuddhu jeṇa ṇigghāu jamāṇaṇĕ
text.1716: rāẏa-lacchi taïlokka-piẏārī  $  dāsi jema jasu pesaṇagārī
text.1717: teṇa samāṇu virohu asundaru"  $  āĕhĩ vaẏaṇĕhĩ kuviu purandaru
text.1718: "dūu bhaṇevi teṇa tuhũ cukkaü  $  ṇaṃ to jama-dantantaru ḍhukkaü
text.1720: ko so laṅka-purāhivaï  $  ko tuhũ kira sandhi kaho ttaṇiẏa
text.1721: jo jīvesaï vihi mi raṇĕ  $  mahi ṇīsāvaṇṇa tahŏ ttaṇiẏa
text.1727: saṇṇajjhaï taṇu-hei huāsaṇu  $  dhūmaddhaü kuẏāri mesāsaṇu
text.1729: saṇṇajjhaï ṇaïriu moggara-dharu  $  ricchārūḍhu raṇaṅgaṇĕ duddharu
text.1730: saṇṇajjhaï varuṇu vi duddaṃsaṇu  $  ṇāgavāsa-karu karimaẏarāsaṇu
text.1736: jāĩ vi ḍhillīhontāĩ  $  tāi mi raṇa-rasa-pulaüggaẏaĩ
text.1737: ṇiĕvi paropparu cindhāĩ  $  suhaḍahũ kavaẏaĩ phuṭṭĕvi gaẏaĩ
text.1741: tāma paropparu vehāviddhaĩ  $  paḍhama bhiḍantaĩ aggima-khandhaĩ
text.1743: pucchuggīriẏa paḍipaharanti va  $  "kahĩ gaẏa aggima-bhāẏa" bhaṇanti va
text.1744: joha vi amuṇiẏa-jaḍhara-uratthala  $  "kahĩ gaẏa riu" paharanti va karaẏala
text.1745: saṃcūriẏa turaṅga-dhaẏa-sārahi  $  cakka-sesa thiẏa ṇavara mahārahi
text.1746: tahĩ avasarĕ rahaṇeura-sārahŏ  $  dhāiu mallavantu sahasārahŏ
text.1747: sūraraeṇa somu raṇĕ khāriu  $  ucchuraeṇa varuṇu hakkāriu
text.1748: jamu kikkindheṃ dhaṇaü sumāliṃ  $  pavaṇu sukeseṃ suravaï māliṃ
text.1750: "ettiu kālu ṇa vujjhiẏaü  $  tuhũ kavaṇahũ indahũ indu kahĕ
text.1751: raṇḍĕhĩ muṇḍĕhĩ jibbhiĕhĩ  $  kiṃ jo so rammahi indavahĕ"
text.1755: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi coiu aïrāvaü  $  ṇāvaï ṇijjharantu kula-pāvaü
text.1756: māli-purandara bhiḍiẏa paropparu  $  vihi mi mahāhaü jāu bhaẏaṅkaru
text.1757: jujjhaĩ sesa-ṇarĕhĩ paricattaĩ  $  thiẏa paḍithiraĩ kareppiṇu ṇettaĩ
text.1758: indaẏālu jiha tiha joijjaï  $  rakkheṃ rakkha-vijja cintijjaï
text.1760: sā vikarāla-vaẏaṇa uddhāiẏa  $  parivaḍḍhiẏa gaẏaṇaẏalĕ ṇa māiẏa
text.1762: dūeṃ vuttu āsi rāẏaṅgaṇĕ  $  dujjaü māli hoi samaraṅgaṇĕ"
text.1764: tahĩ patthāvĕ purandarĕṇa  $  māhinda-vijja lahu saṃbhariẏa
text.1765: vaḍḍhiẏa tahĕ vi caügguṇiẏa  $  ravi-kantiĕ sasi-kanti va hariẏa
text.1769: taṃ māhinda-vijja avaloĕvi  $  bhaṇaï sumāli māli-muhu joĕvi
text.1770: "taïẏahũ ṇa kiu mahāraü vuttaü  $  evahĩ āẏaü kālu ṇiruttaü"
text.1771: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi palamva-bhuẏa-ḍāleṃ  $  amarisa-kuddhaeṇa raṇĕ māleṃ
text.1772: vāẏava-vāruṇa-aggeẏatthaĩ  $  mukkaĩ tiṇṇi mi gaẏaĩ ṇiratthaĩ
text.1773: jiha aṇṇāṇa-kaṇṇĕ jiṇa-vaẏaṇaĩ  $  jiha goṭṭhaṅgaṇĕ vara-maṇi-raẏaṇaĩ
text.1774: jiha uvaẏāra-saẏaĩ akulīṇaĕ  $  vaẏaĩ jema cāritta-vihīṇaĕ
text.1775: gampi pahañjaṇu miliu pahañjaṇĕ  $  varuṇahŏ varuṇu huvāsu huāsaṇĕ
text.1776: hasiu purandareṇa "arĕ māṇava  $  deva-samāṇa honti kiṃ dāṇava"
text.1778: bhaṇaï māli "ko deu tuhũ  $  valu paüru su saẏalu ṇirikkhiẏaü
text.1779: jaṃ vandhahi ohaṭṭahi vi  $  indaẏālu para sikkhiẏaü"
text.1783: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu surarāeṃ  $  viddhu ṇiḍālĕ māli ṇārāeṃ
text.1784: lahu uppāḍĕvi ghittu ṇarindeṃ  $  ṇāĩ varaṅkusu matta-gaïndeṃ
text.1785: sahasā ruhirāẏamviru dīsiu  $  ṇaṃ maẏagalu sindūra-vihūsiu
text.1786: vāma-pāṇi vaṇĕ devi akhantiĕ  $  bhiṇṇu ṇiḍālĕ surāhiu sattiĕ
text.1787: vihalaṅghalu oṇallu mahīẏalĕ  $  kalaẏalu ghuṭṭhu rakkha-vāṇara-valĕ
text.1789: uṭṭhĕvi mukku cakku sahasakkheṃ  $  entaü dharĕvi ṇa sakkiu rakkheṃ
text.1790: siru pāḍevi rasāẏalĕ paḍiẏaü  $  kaha vi ṇa kumma-vīḍhĕ abbhiḍiẏaü
text.1792: vaẏaṇu maḍakka ṇa vīsariu  $  dhāviu kavandhu rosāviẏaü
text.1797: jaṃ viṇivāiu rakkhu raṇaṅgaṇĕ  $  vijaü ghuṭṭhu amarāhiva-sāhaṇĕ
text.1799: keṇa vi tāma kahiu sahasakkhahŏ  $  "pacchalĕ laggu deva paḍivakkhahŏ
text.1801: eẏa ji vijaẏasīha-khaẏa-gārā  $  tiha karĕ jema ṇa janti bhaḍārā"
text.1802: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi gaü coiu jāvĕhĩ  $  sasaharu puraü pariṭṭhiu tāvĕhĩ
text.1803: "mahu ādesu dehi paramesara  $  mārami haũ ji ṇisāẏara vāṇara
text.1806: indeṃ hatthutthalliẏaü  $  dhāiu sasi sara varisantu kiha
text.1807: pacchalĕ pavaṇāhaĕ dhaṇahŏ  $  dhārāharu vāsārattu jiha
text.1811: "maru maru valahŏ valahŏ kiṃ ṇāsahŏ  $  dhārāhara-makkaḍahŏ haẏāsahŏ
text.1813: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi dūrujjhiẏa-saṅkaü  $  ahimuhu mallavantu para thakkaü
text.1814: gahakallolu ṇāĩ chaṇa-candahŏ  $  ṇāĩ maïndu mahaggaẏa-vindahŏ
text.1816: candu bhaṇĕvi jeṃ hāsaü dijjaï  $  paĩ vi ko vi kiṃ raṇĕ ghāijjaï"
text.1818: muccha parāiẏa pasariẏa-veẏaṇu  $  dukkhu dukkhu kira hoi sa-ceẏaṇu
text.1820: dūrīhūẏā tāma riu  $  maẏalañchaṇu maṇĕ avatasaï kiha
text.1821: siru saṃcālaï karu dhuṇaï  $  saṃkantihĕ cukkaü vippu jiha
text.1829: calaṇĕhĩ gampi paḍiu sahasārahŏ  $  ṇaṃ bharahesaru tihuaṇa-sārahŏ
text.1830: sasipuri sasihĕ diṇṇa vikkhāẏahŏ  $  dhaṇaẏahŏ laṅka kikku jamarāẏahŏ
text.1831: meha-ṇaẏarĕ varuṇāhiu ṭhaviẏaü  $  kañcaṇapurĕ kuveru paṭṭhaviẏaü
text.1833: aṇṇu vi ko vi purandarĕṇa  $  tahĩ avasarĕ jo saṃbhāviẏaü
text.1834: maṇḍalu ekkekkaü pavaru  $  so savvu sa iṃ bhu ñjāviẏaü
text.1837: uppaṇṇu sumālihĕ puttu kiha  $  raẏaṇāsaü risahahŏ bharahu jiha
text.1841: solaha-āharaṇālaṅkariu  $  saẏam eva maẏaṇu ṇaṃ avaẏariu
text.1842: vahu-divasĕhĩ āucchĕvi jaṇaṇu  $  gaü vijjā-kāraṇĕ pupphavaṇu
text.1843: thiu akkhasuttu karaẏalĕ karĕvi  $  jiha maha-risi parama-jhāṇu dharĕvi
text.1844: tahĩ avasarĕ guṇa-aṇurāiẏaü  $  so pomavindu saṃpāiẏaü
text.1845: raẏaṇāsaü lakkhiu teṇa tahĩ  $  "imu purisa-raẏaṇu uppaṇṇu kahĩ
text.1846: laï saccaü hūẏaü guru-vaẏaṇu  $  ĕhu so ṇaru ĕu taṃ pupphavaṇu
text.1848: "ĕhu putti tuhāraü bhattāru  $  māṇasa-sundarihĕ va sahasāru"
text.1850: gaü dhīẏa thavevi ṇiẏāsavahŏ  $  uppaṇṇa vijja raẏaṇāsavahŏ
text.1851: thiu vihi mi majjhĕ paramesarihĩ  $  ṇaṃ viñjhu tāvi-ṇammaẏa-sarihĩ
text.1855: avaloiẏa vahu raẏaṇāsavĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ agga-mahisi saĩ vāsavĕṇa
text.1857: "kasu kerī kahĩ avaïṇṇa tuhũ  $  taü dūreṃ diṭṭhi jĕ jaṇaï suhu"
text.1858: taṃ suṇĕvi sa-saṅka kaṇṇa cavaï  $  "jaï jāṇahŏ vomavindu ṇivaï
text.1859: haũ tāsu dhīẏa keṇa ṇa variẏa  $  kaïkasi ṇāmeṃ vijjāhariẏa
text.1860: guru-vaẏaṇĕhĩ āṇiẏa eu vaṇu  $  taü diṇṇī karĕ pāṇiggahaṇu
text.1862: kokkāviu saẏalu vi vandhujaṇu  $  sahũ kaṇṇaĕ kiu pāṇiggahaṇu
text.1864: vahu-kāleṃ suviṇaü lakkhiẏaü  $  atthāṇĕ ṇarindahŏ akkhiẏaü
text.1865: "phāḍeppiṇu kumbhaĩ kuñjarahũ  $  pañcāṇaṇu uvarĕ païṭṭhu mahu
text.1869: uccolihĕ candāicca thiẏa"  $  taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi daïeṃ vihasikiẏa
text.1871: "hosanti putta taü tiṇṇi dhaṇĕ  $  pahilāraü tāhã raüddu raṇĕ
text.1873: parioseṃ kahi mi ṇa mantāhũ  $  ṇava-suraẏa-sokkhu māṇantāhũ
text.1875: pakkala-ṇiẏamvu vitthiṇṇa-uru  $  ṇaṃ saggahŏ pacaviu ko vi suru
text.1876: puṇu bhāṇukaṇṇu puṇu candaṇahi  $  puṇu jāu vihīsaṇu guṇa-uvahi
text.1878: to uppāḍantu danta gaẏahũ  $  karaẏalu chuhantu muhĕ paṇṇaẏahũ
text.1879: āẏaĕ līlaĕ rāmaṇu ramaï  $  ṇaṃ kālu vālu hoĕvi bhamaï
text.1883: khelantu paīsaï bhaṇḍāru  $  jahĩ tŏẏadavāhaṇa-taṇaü hāru
text.1884: ṇava-muhaĩ jāsu maṇi-jaḍiẏāĩ  $  ṇava gaha pariẏappĕvi ghaḍiẏāĩ
text.1886: sāmaṇṇahŏ aṇṇahŏ karaï vahu  $  so kaṇṭhaü duṭṭhaü duvvisahu
text.1887: sahasatti laggu karĕ dahamuhahŏ  $  ṇaṃ mittu sumittahŏ ahimuhahŏ
text.1888: parihiu ṇava-muhaĩ samuṭṭhiẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ gaha-vimvaĩ su-pariṭṭhiẏaĩ
text.1889: ṇaṃ saẏavattaĩ saṃcārimaĩ  $  ṇaṃ kāmiṇi-vaẏaṇaĩ kārimaĩ
text.1890: vollanti samaü vollantaĕṇa  $  sa-viẏāru hasanti hasantaĕṇa
text.1892: pekkheppiṇu tāĩ dahāṇaṇaĩ  $  thira-tāraĩ taralaĩ loẏaṇaĩ
text.1893: teṃ dahamuhu dahasiru jaṇĕṇa kiu  $  pañcāṇaṇu jema pasiddhi gaü
text.1897: jaṃ parihiu kaṇṭhaü rāvaṇĕṇa  $  kiu vaddhāvaṇaü su-pariẏaṇĕṇa
text.1898: raẏaṇāsaü kaïkasi dhāiẏaĩ  $  āṇandeṃ kahi mi ṇa māiẏaĩ
text.1899: ṇisuṇeppiṇu āiu ucchuraü  $  kikkindhu sa-kantaü sūraraü
text.1901: paricintiu "ṇaü sāmaṇṇu ṇaru  $  ĕhu hoi ṇiruttaü cakkaharu
text.1902: eẏahŏ pāsiu rajju vi viulu  $  kaï-jāuhāṇa-valu raṇĕ atulu
text.1903: eẏahŏ pāsiu suravaïhĕ khaü  $  jama-varuṇa-kuverahã ṇāhĩ jaü"
text.1905: aṇṇekka-divasĕ gajjantu kiha  $  ṇava-pāusĕ jalahara-vindu jiha
text.1906: ṇahĕ jantaü pekkhĕvi vaïsavaṇu  $  puṇu pucchiẏa jaṇaṇi "ehu kavaṇu"
text.1911: "kaüsiki jaṇeri eẏahŏ taṇiẏa  $  pahilārī vahiṇi mahu ttaṇiẏa
text.1912: vīsāvasu vijjāharu jaṇaṇu  $  ĕhu bhāi tuhāraü vaïsavaṇu
text.1913: vaïrihĩ milevi muha maliṇa kiẏa  $  māẏari va kamāgaẏa laṅka hiẏa
text.1914: eẏahŏ uddālĕvi jema tiẏa  $  kaïẏahũ māṇesahũ rāẏa-siẏa"
text.1916: "vaïsavaṇahŏ kerī kavaṇa siẏa  $  dahavaẏaṇahŏ ṇokkhī kā vi kiẏa
text.1920: aṇudiṇu daṇuvaï-kandāvaṇahŏ  $  gharĕ seva karevī rāvaṇahŏ"
text.1924: ekkahĩ diṇĕ āucchĕvi jaṇaṇu  $  gaẏa tiṇṇi vi bhīsaṇu bhīma-vaṇu
text.1925: jahĩ jakkha-sahāsaĩ dāruṇaĩ  $  jahĩ sīha-paẏaĩ ruhirāruṇaĩ
text.1926: jahĩ ṇīsāsantĕhĩ ajaẏarĕhĩ  $  ḍollanti ḍāla sahũ taruvarĕhĩ
text.1928: tahĩ tehaĕ bhīsaṇĕ bhīma-vaṇĕ  $  thiẏa vijjahĕ jhāṇu dharevi maṇĕ
text.1929: jā aṭṭhakkharĕhĩ pasiddhi gaẏa  $  ṇāmeṇa savva-kāmaṇṇa-rūẏa
text.1930: sā vihĩ paharĕhĩ jĕ pāsu aïẏa  $  ṇaṃ gāḍhāliṅgaṇa-gaẏa daïẏa
text.1934: vaṇĕ diṭṭha jakkha-sundariĕ kiha  $  jiṇa-vāṇiĕ tiṇṇi vi loẏa jiha
text.1938: jaṃ jakkhiĕ rāvaṇu diṭṭhu vaṇĕ  $  taṃ vammaha-vāṇa païṭṭha maṇĕ
text.1939: "vollāviu vollaï kiṃ ṇa tuhũ  $  kiṃ vahiraü kiṃ tuha ṇāhĩ muhu
text.1940: kiṃ jhāẏahi akkhasuttu ghivahi  $  mahu keraü rūva-salilu pivahi"
text.1944: "tuhũ jāṇahi ĕhu ṇaru saccamaü  $  uppāiu keṇa vi kaṭṭhamaü
text.1945: puṇu gampiṇu raṇa-rasa-aḍḍhiẏahŏ  $  jakkhahŏ vajjariu aṇiḍḍhiẏahŏ
text.1948: vaṇĕ vijjaü ārāhanta thiẏa  $  ṇāvaï jaga-bhavaṇahŏ khambha kiẏa"
text.1952: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jamvūdīva-pahu  $  ṇaṃ jaliu jalaṇa-jālā-ṇivahu
text.1953: "so kavaṇu etthu ṇikkampiraü  $  jagĕ jīvaï jo mahu vāhiraü"
text.1954: ahimuhu paẏaṭṭu tahŏ āsavahŏ  $  suẏa diṭṭha tāma raẏaṇāsavahŏ
text.1955: "ahŏ ahŏ pavvaïẏahŏ ahiṇavahŏ  $  kaṃ jhāẏahŏ kavaṇu deu thuṇahŏ"
text.1956: jaṃ ekku vi uttaru diṇṇu ṇa vi  $  taṃ puṇu vi samuṭṭhiu kova-havi
text.1957: uvasaggu ghoru pārambhiẏaü  $  vahurūvĕhĩ jakkhu viẏambhiẏaü
text.1961: dasa-disi-vahu andhāraü karĕvi  $  orumbhĕvi gajjĕvi uttharĕvi
text.1962: gaü ṇipphalu so uvasaggu kiha  $  giri-mattaĕ vāsārattu jiha
text.1966: jaṃ cittu ṇa sakkiu avaharĕvi  $  thiu takkhaṇĕ aṇṇa māẏa dharĕvi
text.1967: darisāviu saẏalu vi vandhujaṇu  $  kaluṇaü kandantu visaṇṇa-maṇu
text.1968: kasa-ghāĕhĩ ghāijjantu vaṇĕ  $  "ṇivaḍantuṭṭhantaĩ khaṇĕ jĕ khaṇĕ
text.1969: raẏaṇāsavu kaïkasi candaṇahi  $  hammantaĩ jaï ṇa amhe gaṇahi
text.1970: to saraṇu bhaṇĕvi paḍiva(?ra)kkha karĕ  $  riu māraï laggaï putta dharĕ
text.1971: taṃ purisaẏāru kiṃ vīsariu  $  ṇava-vaẏaṇu jeṇa kaṇṭhaü dhariu
text.1972: ahŏ bhāṇukaṇṇa karĕ cārahaḍi  $  siri bhañjahi laggaü chāra-haḍi
text.1973: ahŏ dharahi vihīsaṇa jattāĩ  $  vaṇĕ mecchahĩ piṭṭijjantāĩ
text.1975: arĕ puttahŏ ṇaü paḍirakkha kiẏa  $  jaṃ lāliẏa pāliẏa vaḍḍhaviẏa
text.1976: so ṇipphalu saẏalu kilesu gaü  $  jiha pāvahŏ dhammu viakkhiẏaü"
text.1980: jaṃ keṇa vi ṇaü sāhāriẏaü  $  taṃ tiṇṇi vi jakkheṃ māriẏaü
text.1981: puṇu tihi mi jaṇahũ darisāviẏaü  $  siva-sāṇa-sivālĕhĩ khāviẏaü
text.1982: ṇavi caliu to vi tahŏ jhāṇu thiru  $  māẏā-rāvaṇaü karevi siru
text.1984: taṃ ṇiĕvi sīsu ruhirāruṇaü  $  te jhāṇahŏ caliẏa maṇāmaṇaü
text.1985: ṇiddhaĩ suddhaĩ thira-joẏaṇaĩ  $  īsīsi pagaliẏaĩ loẏaṇaĩ
text.1986: sira-kamalaĩ tāha mi kerāĩ  $  uvaṇāĕvi dukkha-jaṇerāĩ
text.1987: rāvaṇahŏ gampi darisāviẏaĩ  $  paümaĩ va ṇāla-mellāviẏaĩ
text.1989: jaṃ ema vi rāvaṇu acalu thiu  $  taṃ devahĩ sāhukkāru kiu
text.1990: vijjahũ sahāsu uppaṇṇu kiha  $  titthaẏarahŏ kevala-ṇāṇu jiha
text.1995: kāli komāri vārāhi māhesarī  $  ghora-vīrāsaṇī jogajogesarī
text.1996: somaṇī raẏaṇa vambhāṇi indāiṇī  $  aṇima lahimatti paṇṇatti kañcāiṇī
text.1997: ḍahaṇi uccāṭiṇī thambhaṇī mohaṇī  $  vaïri-viddhaṃsaṇī bhuvaṇa-saṃkhohaṇī
text.1999: savva-pacchāẏaṇī savva-ākarisiṇī  $  vijaẏa jaẏa jimbhiṇī savva-maẏa-ṇāsaṇī
text.2000: satti-saṃvāhiṇī kuḍila avaloẏaṇī  $  aggi-jala-thambhaṇī chindaṇī bhindhaṇī
text.2001: āsurī rakkhasī vāruṇī varisaṇī  $  dāruṇī duṇṇivārā ẏa duddarisaṇī
text.2004: caüdisi parivāriu sahaï kiha  $  maẏalañchaṇu chaṇĕ tārāhũ jiha
text.2009: āẏaü pañca vi vavagaẏaü tahĩ  $  thiu kumbhaẏaṇṇu cala-jhāṇu jahĩ
text.2011: āẏaü caẏāri puṇu cala-maṇahŏ  $  āsaṇṇaü thiẏaü vihīsaṇahŏ
text.2013: ṇāmeṇa saẏaṃpahu ṇaẏaru kiu  $  ṇaṃ sagga-khaṇḍu avaẏarĕvi thiu
text.2014: aṇṇu vi uppāiu ceiharu  $  maṇaharu ṇāmeṇa sahasasiharu
text.2015: uttuṅgu siṅgu uṇṇaï karĕvi  $  ṇaṃ vañchaï sūra-vimvu dharĕvi
text.2017: taṃ riddhi suṇevi dasāṇaṇahŏ  $  pariosu pavaḍḍhiu pariẏaṇahŏ
text.2018: āẏaĩ kaï-jāuhāṇa-valaĩ  $  ṇaṃ milĕvi paropparu jala-thalaĩ
text.2022: jaṃ diṭṭha seṇṇa saẏaṇahũ taṇiẏa  $  paripucchiẏa puṇu avaloẏaṇiẏa
text.2023: tāĕ vi saṃvohiu dahavaẏaṇu  $  "ĕhu deva tuhāraü vandhu-jaṇu"
text.2024: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaravaï ṇīsariu  $  ṇiẏa-vijja-sahāseṃ pariẏariu
text.2025: ṇaṃ kamaliṇi-saṇḍeṃ pavaru saru  $  ṇaṃ rāsi-sahāseṃ divasaẏaru
text.2026: sa-vihīsaṇu kumbhaẏaṇṇu caliu  $  ṇaṃ divasa-teu sūrahŏ miliu
text.2027: tiṇṇi mi kumāra saṃcalla kira  $  ucchaliẏa tāma phamphāva-gira
text.2028: raẏaṇāsavu pattu sa-vandhujaṇu  $  taṃ paṭṭaṇu taṃ rāvaṇa-bhavaṇu
text.2029: taṃ saha-maṇḍaü maṇi-veẏaḍiu  $  taṃ vijja-sahāsu samāvaḍiu
text.2031: pekkheppiṇu pariosiẏa-maṇĕṇa  $  ṇiẏa taṇaẏa sumālihĕ ṇandaṇĕṇa
text.2032: romañcāṇanda-ṇeha-juĕhĩ  $  cumvĕvi avagūḍha sa iṃ bhu vĕhĩ
text.2035: sundaru su-vaṃsu su-kalattu jiha  $  candahāsu dahavaẏaṇĕṇa
text.2040: gaü vandaṇa-hattiĕ meru jāma  $  saṃpāiẏa maẏa-māricca tāma
text.2041: mandovari pavara-kumāri levi  $  rāvaṇahŏ jĕ bhavaṇu païṭṭha ve vi
text.2042: candaṇahi ṇihāliẏa tehĩ tetthu  $  "paramesari gaü dahavaẏaṇu ketthu"
text.2044: "chuḍu chuḍu sāheppiṇu candahāsu  $  gaü ahimuhu meru-mahīharāsu
text.2045: ettiĕ āvaï vaïsarahu tāma"  $  taṃ levi ṇimittu ṇiviṭṭha jāma
text.2046: vettālaĕ mahi kampaṇahã lagga  $  saṃcaliẏa asesa vi kaüha-magga
text.2048: khaṇĕ andhāraü khaṇĕ candiṇaü  $  khaṇĕ dhārāharu varisaï
text.2049: vijjaü jokkhantaü dahavaẏaṇu  $  ṇaṃ māhendu padarisaï
text.2053: mambhīsĕvi mandovari maeṇa  $  candaṇahi papucchiẏa bhaẏa-gaeṇa
text.2054: "ĕu kāĩ bhaḍāriĕ kouhallu  $  paviẏambhaï raĕ pemmu va ṇavallu
text.2055: sa vi pacaviẏa "kiṃ ṇa muṇiu paẏāu  $  dahagīva-kumārahŏ ĕhu pahāu
text.2056: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi saẏala vi pulaïẏaṅga  $  avaropparu muhaĩ ṇiehũ lagga
text.2058: "ĕu ko āvāsiu samabhareṇa  $  paṇavevi kahiu keṇa vi ṇareṇa
text.2059: vijjāhara maẏa-māricca ke vi  $  tumhahã muhavekkhā āẏa ve vi"
text.2060: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jiṇavara-bhavaṇu ḍhukku  $  pariẏañcĕvi vandĕvi tāṇa-mukku
text.2063: dūrahŏ jĕ samāhaü vacchaẏalĕ  $  ṇaṃ ṇīluppala-mālaĕ
text.2067: dīsaï teṇa vi sahasatti vāla  $  ṇaṃ bhasaleṃ ahiṇava-kusuma-māla
text.2068: dīsanti calaṇa-ṇeura rasanta  $  ṇaṃ mahura-rāva vandiṇa paḍhanta
text.2070: dīsaï romāvali chuḍu caḍanti  $  ṇaṃ kasaṇa-vāla-sappiṇi lalanti
text.2071: dīsanti sihiṇa uvasoha denta  $  ṇaṃ uraẏalu bhindĕvi hatthi-danta
text.2073: dīsaï suṇāsu aṇuhua-suandhu  $  ṇaṃ ṇaẏaṇa-jalahŏ kiu seu-vandhu
text.2074: dīsaï ṇiḍālu sira-cihura-chaṇṇu  $  sasi-vimvu va ṇava-jalahara-ṇimaṇṇu
text.2076: paribhamaï diṭṭhi tahŏ tahĩ jĕ tahĩ  $  aṇṇahĩ kahi mi ṇa thakkaï
text.2077: rasa-lampaḍa mahuẏara-panti jima  $  keẏaï muĕvi ṇa sakkaï
text.2081: dahagīva-kumārahŏ lahĕvi cittu  $  etthantarĕ māricceṇa vuttu
text.2083: tahĩ amhaĩ maẏa-māricca bhāẏa  $  rāvaṇa vivāha-kajjeṇa āẏa
text.2084: laï tujjhu jĕ joggaü ṇāri-raẏaṇu  $  uṭṭhuṭṭhu deva karĕ pāṇi-gahaṇu
text.2085: eu jĕ muhuttu ṇakkhattu vāru  $  jaṃ jiṇu paccakkhu tiloẏa-sāru
text.2087: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi tuṭṭheṃ dahamuheṇa  $  kiu takkhaṇĕ pāṇiggahaṇu teṇa
text.2090: taṃ vahu-varu ṇaẏaṇāṇandaẏaru  $  visaï saẏaṃpahu paṭṭaṇu
text.2096: gaü tetthu jetthu māṇusa-vamālu  $  jalaharadharu ṇāmeṃ giri visālu
text.2097: gandhavva-vāvi jahĩ jagĕ paẏāsa  $  gandhavva-kumārihĩ chaha sahāsa
text.2098: divĕ-divĕ jala-kīla karantu jetthu  $  raẏaṇāsava-ṇandaṇu ḍhukku tetthu
text.2099: sahasatti diṭṭhu paramesarīhĩ  $  ṇaṃ sāẏaru saẏala-mahā-sarīhĩ
text.2100: ṇaṃ ṇava-maẏalañchaṇu kumuiṇīhĩ  $  ṇaṃ vāla-divāẏaru kamaliṇīhĩ
text.2104: "paĩ mellĕvi aṇṇu ṇa bhattāru  $  pariṇi ṇāha saĩ variẏaü"
text.2110: karĕ laggaü teṇa vi icchiẏāu  $  paccelliu susamāicchiẏāu"
text.2111: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi sura-sundaru viruddhu  $  uddhāiu ṇāĩ kiẏantu kuddhu
text.2112: aṇṇu vi kaṇaẏāhiu vuha-samāṇu  $  taṃ pekkhĕvi sāhaṇu appamāṇu
text.2113: viṭṭiĕhĩ vuttu "ṇaü ko vi saraṇu  $  taü amhahã kāraṇĕ ḍhukku maraṇu"
text.2114: rāvaṇĕṇa hasiu "kiṃ āẏaehĩ  $  kira kāĩ siẏālahĩ ghāiehĩ"
text.2121: āmellĕvi pujjĕvi karĕvi dāsa  $  pariṇeppiṇu kaṇṇahã cha vi sahāsa
text.2122: gaü rāvaṇu ṇiẏa-paṭṭaṇu paviṭṭhu  $  sa-kiẏatthu saẏala-pariẏaṇĕṇa diṭṭhu
text.2123: vahu-kāleṃ mandovarihĕ jāẏa  $  indaï-ghaṇavāhaṇa ve vi bhāẏa
text.2124: ettahĕ vi kumbhapurĕ kumbhaẏaṇṇu  $  pariṇāviu siẏa-saṃpaẏa pavaṇṇu
text.2125: rattindiu laṅkāuri-paesu  $  jagaḍaï vaïsavaṇahŏ taṇaü desu
text.2126: gaẏa paẏa kūvāreṃ kou hūu  $  pesiu vaẏaṇālaṅkāra-dūu
text.2127: dahavaẏaṇaṭṭhāṇu païṭṭhu gampi  $  tehi mi kiu abbhutthāṇu kiṃ pi
text.2128: pabhaṇiu "sumāli-pahu dehi kaṇṇu  $  pottaü ṇivāri iu kumbhaẏaṇṇu
text.2130: avarāha-saehi mi vaïsavaṇu  $  tumhahĩ samaü ṇa jujjhaï
text.2131: ḍajjhantu vi savara-pulindaĕhĩ  $  viñjhu jema ṇa virujjhaï
text.2135: para āeṃ pekkhami vipaḍivaṇṇu  $  jeṃ ṇāhĩ ṇivārahŏ kumbhaẏaṇṇu
text.2136: eẏahŏ pāsiu tumhahã viṇāsu  $  eẏahŏ pāsiu āgamaṇu tāsu
text.2137: eẏahŏ pāsiu pāẏāla-laṅka  $  païsevaü puṇu vi karevi saṅka
text.2138: māli vi jagaḍantaü āsi ema  $  muu paḍĕvi paīvĕ paẏaṅgu jema
text.2139: taïẏahũ tumhahũ vittantu jo jjĕ  $  evahĩ dīsaï paḍivaü vi so jjĕ
text.2140: vari ĕhu jĕ samappiu kula-kaẏantu  $  acchaü tahŏ gharĕ ṇiẏalaĩ vahantu"
text.2141: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi rosiu ṇisiẏarindu  $  "kahŏ taṇaü dhaṇaü kahŏ taṇaü indu"
text.2143: "paĩ paḍhamu kareppiṇu vali-vihāṇu  $  puṇu pacchaĕ dhaṇaẏahŏ malami māṇu"
text.2144: siru ṇāvĕvi vuttu vihīsaṇeṇa  $  "viṇivāieṇa dūveṇa eṇa
text.2146: paribhamaï aẏasu para-maṇḍalĕhĩ  $  tumhahã eu ṇa chajjaï
text.2147: jujjhantaü hariṇa-ulehĩ sahũ  $  kiṃ pañcamuhu ṇa lajjaï"
text.2151: ṇīsāriu dūu paṇaṭṭhu kema  $  kesari-kama-cukku kuraṅgu jema
text.2152: ettahĕ vi dasāṇaṇu vipphurantu  $  saṇṇahĕvi viṇiggaü jiha kaẏantu
text.2153: ṇīsariu vihīsaṇu bhāṇukaṇṇu  $  raẏaṇāsaü maü māriccu aṇṇu
text.2154: ṇīsariu sahovaru mallavantu  $  indaï-ghaṇavāhaṇu sisu vi hontu
text.2155: haü tūru paẏāṇaü diṇṇu jāma  $  dūeṇa vi dhaṇaẏahŏ kahiu tāma
text.2156: "mālihĕ pāsiu eẏahŏ maraṭṭu  $  ukkhandhu devi aṇṇu vi paẏaṭṭu
text.2157: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi saṇṇahĕvi jakkhu  $  ṇīsariu ṇāĩ saĩ dasasaẏakkhu
text.2158: thiu uḍḍĕvi giri-guñjakkhĕ jāma  $  taṃ jāuhāṇa-valu ḍhukku tāma
