text.2165: keṇa vi sundara su-ramaṇa su-seva  $  āliṅgiẏa gaẏa-ghaḍa vesa jeva
text.2166: sa vi kāsu vi uraẏalĕ vejjhu dei  $  ṇaṃ vivariẏa-suraeṃ hiẏaü lei
text.2167: keṇa vi āvāhiu maṇḍalaggu  $  kari-siru ṇivvaṭṭĕvi mahihĩ laggu
text.2168: keṇa vi kāsu vi gaẏa-ghāu diṇṇu  $  kiu sa-rahu sa-sārahi cuṇṇu cuṇṇu
text.2169: keṇa vi kāsu vi uru sarahĩ bhariu  $  lakkhijjaï ṇaṃ romañcu dhariu
text.2170: keṇa vi kāsu vi raṇĕ mukku cakku  $  thiu hiẏaĕ dharĕvi ṇaṃ pisuṇa-vakku
text.2171: etthantarĕ dhaṇaeṃ ṇa kiu kheu  $  hakkāriu āhavĕ kaïkaseu
text.2172: "laï tujjhu jujjhu ettaḍaü kālu  $  ḍhukko 'si sīha-dantantarālu"
text.2174: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi rāvaṇu kuiẏa-maṇu  $  vaïsavaṇahŏ ālaggaü
text.2175: karu ubbhĕvi gajjĕvi gulagulĕvi  $  ṇaṃ gaẏavarahŏ mahaggaü
text.2180: viṇivāriu diṇaẏara-kara-ṇihāu  $  ṇisi divasu kiṃ ti sandehu jāu
text.2181: sandaṇĕ haĕ gaĕ dhaẏa-cindhĕ chattĕ  $  jampāṇĕ vimāṇĕ ṇarinda-gattĕ
text.2182: tharatharaharanta sara lagga kema  $  dhaṇavantaĕ māṇusĕ pisuṇa jema
text.2183: jakkheṇa vi haẏa vāṇehĩ vāṇa  $  muṇivarĕṇa kasāẏa va ḍhukkamāṇa
text.2184: dhaṇu pāḍiu pāḍiu chatta-daṇḍu  $  dahamuha-rahu kiu saẏa-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍu
text.2185: aṇṇeṇa caḍeppiṇu bhiḍiu rāu  $  ṇaṃ giri-saṃghāẏahŏ kulisa-ghāu
text.2186: haü dhaṇaü bhiṇḍivāleṇa urasĕ  $  oṇallu bhāṇu lhasiĕ va divasĕ
text.2188: ṇiu ṇiẏa-sāmantĕhĩ vaïsavaṇu  $  vijaü dasāṇaṇĕ ghuṭṭhaü
text.2189: "kahĩ jāhi pāva jīvantu mahu"  $  kumbhaẏaṇṇu āruṭṭhaü
text.2193: "āeṃ samāṇu kira kavaṇu khattu  $  ghāijjaï ṇāsanto vi sattu
text.2194: jaṃ phiṭṭaï jamma-saẏāhã kāṇi"  $  kira jāma padhāvaï sūla-pāṇi
text.2196: so hammaï jo pahaṇaï puṇo vi  $  kiṃ uraü ma jīvaü ṇivviso vi
text.2197: ṇāsaü varāu ṇiẏa-pāṇa levi"  $  thiu bhāṇukaṇṇu maccharu muevi
text.2198: etthantarĕ vaïsavaṇahŏ maṇiṭṭhu  $  su-kalattu va puppha-vimāṇu diṭṭhu
text.2199: tahĩ caḍiu ṇarāhiu muĕvi saṅka  $  paṭṭhaviẏa pasāhā ke vi laṅka
text.2200: appuṇu puṇu jo jo ko vi caṇḍu  $  tahŏ tahŏ ḍhukkaï jiha kāla-daṇḍu
text.2203: āhiṇḍaï līlaĕ indu jiha  $  desa-sa ẏaṃ bhu ñjantaü
text.2211: "ahŏ ahŏ tāẏa tāẏa sasi-dhavalaĩ  $  eẏaĩ kiṃ ṇa jaluggaẏa-kamalaĩ
text.2212: kiṃ hima-siharaĩ sāḍĕvi mukkaĩ  $  kiṃ ṇakkhattaĩ thāṇahŏ cukkaĩ
text.2213: daṇḍuddaṇḍa-dhavala-puṇḍariẏaĩ  $  kiṃ kāha mi sīsuppari dhariẏaĩ
text.2216: jasu savvaṅgaĩ khaṇḍĕvi khaṇḍĕvi  $  kiẏa gaü ko vi paḍīvaü chaṇḍĕvi
text.2225: pahilaĕ divasĕ mahāraha-kāraṇĕ  $  jāṇĕvi jaṇaṇi-dukkhu gaü takkhaṇĕ
text.2226: vīẏaĕ tāvasa-bhavaṇu parāiu  $  maẏaṇāvalihĕ maẏaṇa-jaru lāiu
text.2227: taïẏaĕ sindhuṇaẏarĕ supasaṇṇaü  $  hatthi jiṇeppiṇu laïẏaü kaṇṇaü
text.2228: veẏamaīĕ caütthaĕ hāriu  $  jaẏacandahĕ hiẏavaĕ païsāriu
text.2229: pañcamĕ gaṅgāhara-mahihara-raṇu  $  tahĩ uppaṇṇu cakku tahŏ sa-raẏaṇu
text.2230: chaṭṭhaĕ pihimi hūa āvaggī  $  aṇṇu vi maẏaṇāvali karĕ laggī
text.2231: sattamĕ gampi jaṇaṇi jokkāriẏa  $  aṭṭhamĕ divasĕ pujja ṇīsāriẏa
text.2234: āharaṇaĩ va vasundharihĕ  $  siva-sāsaẏa-suhaĩ va avicalaĩ"
text.2238: gaü suṇantu hariseṇa-kahāṇaü  $  sammeẏa-irihĩ mukku paẏāṇaü
text.2240: pesiẏa hattha-pahattha padhāiẏa  $  vaṇa-kari ṇiĕvi paḍīvā āiẏa
text.2241: "deva deva kiu jeṇa mahāraü  $  acchaï matta-hatthi aïrāvaü
text.2242: gajjaṇāĕ aṇuharaï samuddahŏ  $  sīẏareṇa jalaharahŏ raüddahŏ
text.2247: indu vi caḍĕvi ṇa sakkiẏaü  $  khandhāsaṇĕ eẏahŏ vāraṇahŏ
text.2248: gaü caüpāsiu paribhamĕvi  $  jima attha-hīṇu kāmiṇi-jaṇahŏ
text.2254: satta samuttuṅgaü ṇava dīharu  $  daha pariṇāhu tiṇṇi kara vittharu
text.2261: ema aṇeẏaĩ lakkhaṇaĩ  $  kiṃ gaṇiẏaĩ ṇāma-vihūṇāĩ
text.2266: taṃ ṇisuṇevi dasāṇaṇu harisiu  $  urĕ ṇa mantu romañcu va darisiu
text.2267: "jaï taṃ bhadda-hatthi ṇaü sāhami  $  to jaṇaṇovari asivaru vāhami"
text.2268: eu bhaṇevi sa-seṇṇu padhāiu  $  taṃ paesu sahasatti parāiu
text.2269: gaẏavaï ṇiĕvi virelliẏa-ṇaẏaṇeṃ  $  hasiu pahatthu ṇavara daha-vaẏaṇeṃ
text.2270: "haũ jāṇami pacaṇḍu tamveramu  $  ṇavara vilāsiṇi-rūu va maṇŏramu
text.2273: haũ jāṇami bhamanti bhamara-ulaĩ  $  ṇavara ṇirantara-pelliẏa-kurulaĩ
text.2276: ṇavara pahattha majjhu maṇahŏ  $  uvvahaï ṇavallu ṇāĩ suraü"
text.2280: puppha-vimāṇahŏ līṇu dasāṇaṇu  $  diḍhu ṇiẏatthu kiu kesa-ṇivandhaṇu
text.2281: laïẏa laṭṭhi ugghosiu kalaẏalu  $  tūraĩ haẏaĩ padhāiu maẏagalu
text.2283: pukkharĕ tāḍiu lakkuḍi-ghāeṃ  $  ṇāvaï kāla-mehu duvvāeṃ
text.2284: dei ṇa dei vejjhu urĕ jāvĕhĩ  $  vijjula-vilasiẏa-karaṇeṃ tāvĕhĩ
text.2285: pacchalĕ caḍiu dhuṇĕvi bhuva-ḍāliu  $  "vudavuda" bhaṇĕvi khandhĕ apphāliu
text.2286: jaṅghiu puṇu vi kareṇāliṅgĕvi  $  suviṇā(?)daïu jema gaü laṅghĕvi
text.2287: khaṇĕ gaṇḍaẏalĕ ṭhāi khaṇĕ kandharĕ  $  khaṇĕ caühu mi calaṇahũ abbhantarĕ
text.2289: dīsaï ṇāsaï vipphuraï  $  paribhamaï caüddisu kuñjarahŏ
text.2290: calu lakkhijjaï gaẏaṇa-ẏalĕ  $  ṇaṃ vijju-puñju ṇava-jalaharahŏ
text.2294: hatthi-viẏāraṇāu eẏāraha  $  aṇṇaü kiriẏaü vīsa duvāraha
text.2295: darisĕvi kiu ṇipphandu mahā-gaü  $  dhutteṃ vesa-maraṭṭu va bhaggaü
text.2296: sāhiu mokkhu va parama-jiṇindeṃ  $  "hou hou ṇaṃ raḍiu gaïndeṃ
text.2297: "bhalĕ bhalĕ" pabhaṇiu calaṇu samappiu  $  teṇa vi vāmaṅguṭṭheṃ cappiu
text.2298: kaṇṇĕ dharĕvi ārūḍhu mahāiu  $  karĕvi viẏāraṇa aṅkusu lāiu
text.2300: ṇacciu kumbhaẏaṇṇu sa-vihīsaṇu  $  hatthu pahatthu vi maü suẏasāraṇu
text.2301: mallavantu māriccu mahoẏaru  $  raẏaṇāsaü sumāli vajjoẏaru
text.2303: harisa-raseṇa karamviẏaü  $  vīra-rasu jeṇa maṇĕ bhāviẏaü
text.2304: tahĩ rāvaṇa-ṇaṭṭāvaĕṇa  $  so ṇāhĩ jo ṇa ṇaccāviẏaü
text.2308: tijagavihūsaṇu ṇāmu pagāsiu  $  ṇiu tahĩ simiru jetthu āvāsiu
text.2309: thiu sahasā kari-kaha-aṇurāiu  $  tahĩ avasarĕ bhaḍu ekku parāiu
text.2310: pahara-vihuru ruhirolliẏa-gattaü  $  ṇaravaï teṇa ṇavĕvi viṇṇattaü
text.2313: jamu āroḍiu bhaggā teṇa vi  $  dharĕvi ṇa sakkiu vihi ekkeṇa vi
text.2314: paccelliu ṇillūriẏa vāṇĕhĩ  $  kaha vi kaha vi ṇaü melliu pāṇĕhĩ"
text.2315: taṃ ṇisuṇevi kuiu rakkhaddhaü  $  haẏa saṃgāma-bheri saṇṇaddhaü
text.2317: candahāsu karaẏalĕ karĕvi  $  sa-vimāṇu sa-valu saṃcalliẏaü
text.2318: mahi laṅgheppiṇu maẏaraharu  $  āẏāsahŏ ṇaṃ utthalliẏaü
text.2322: kova-davaggi-palittu padhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ taṃ jama-ṇaẏaru parāiu
text.2324: pekkhaï ṇaï vaïtaraṇi vahantī  $  rasa-vasa-soṇiẏa-salilu vahantī
text.2328: kumbhīpākĕ ke vi paccantā  $  eva viviha-dukkhaĩ pāvantā
text.2329: saẏala vi mambhīsĕvi mellāviẏa  $  jamaüri-rakkhavāla ghallāviẏa
text.2331: kahiu kiẏantahŏ kiṅkarĕhĩ  $  "vaïtaraṇi bhagga ṇāsiẏa ṇaraẏa
text.2336: acchaï eu deva pārakkaü  $  matta-gaïnda-vindu ṇaṃ thakkaü"
text.2337: taṃ ṇisuṇevi kuviu jamarāṇaü  $  "keṇa jiẏantu cattu appāṇaü
text.2338: kāsu kiẏanta-mittu saṇi ruṭṭhiu  $  kāsu kālu āsaṇṇu pariṭṭhiu
text.2339: jeṃ ṇara-vandi-vindu choḍāviu  $  asipatta-vaṇu aṇṇu moḍāviu
text.2340: satta vi ṇaraẏa jeṇa viddhaṃsiẏa  $  jeṃ vaïtaraṇi vahaṃti viṇāsiẏa
text.2341: tahŏ darisāvami ajju jamattaṇu"  $  ema bhaṇĕvi ṇīsariu sa-sāhaṇu
text.2343: kettiu bhīsaṇattu vaṇṇijjaï  $  miccu vuttu puṇu kahŏ uvamijjaï
text.2345: jamu jama-sāsaṇu jama-karaṇu  $  jama-uri jama-daṇḍu samuttharaï
text.2346: ekku ji tihuaṇĕ palaẏa-karu  $  puṇu pañca vi raṇamuhĕ ko dharaï
text.2350: jaṃ jama-karaṇu diṭṭhu bhaẏa-bhīsaṇu  $  dhāiu taṃ asahantu vihīsaṇu
text.2351: ṇavara dasāṇaṇeṇa osāriu  $  appuṇu puṇu kiẏantu hakkāriu
text.2352: "arĕ māṇava valu valu viṇṇāsahi  $  muhiẏaĕ jaṃ jamu ṇāmu paẏāsahi
text.2353: indahŏ pāva tujjhu ṇikkaruṇahŏ  $  sasihĕ paẏaṅgahŏ dhaṇaẏahŏ varuṇahŏ
text.2354: savvahã kula-kiẏantu haũ āiu  $  thāhi thāhi kahĩ jāhi aghāiu
text.2355: taṃ ṇisuṇeviṇu vaïri-khaẏaṃkaru  $  jamĕṇa mukku raṇĕ daṇḍu bhaẏaṃkaru
text.2356: dhāiu dhagdhagantu āẏāseṃ  $  entu khurappeṃ chiṇṇu dasāseṃ
text.2357: . saẏa-saẏa-khaṇḍu kareppiṇu pāḍiu  $  ṇāĩ kiẏanta-maḍappharu sāḍiu
text.2359: dhaṇuharu levi turantaĕṇa  $  sara-jālu visajjiu bhāsuraü
text.2360: taṃ pi ṇivāriu rāvaṇĕṇa  $  jāmāeṃ jima khalu sāsuraü
text.2364: puṇu vi puṇu vi viṇivāriẏa-dhaṇaẏahŏ  $  viddhantahŏ raẏaṇāsava-taṇaẏahŏ
text.2365: diṭṭhi-muṭṭhi-saṃdhāṇu ṇa ṇāvaï  $  ṇavara silīmuha-dhoraṇi dhāvaï
text.2366: jāṇĕ jāṇĕ haĕ haĕ gaẏa-gaẏavarĕ  $  chattĕ chattĕ dhaĕ dhaĕ rahĕ rahavarĕ
text.2367: bhaḍĕ bhaḍĕ maüḍĕ maüḍĕ karĕ karaẏalĕ  $  calaṇĕ calaṇĕ sirĕ sirĕ urĕ uraẏalĕ
text.2368: bhariẏa vāṇa kaḍuāviẏa-sāhaṇu  $  ṇaṭṭhu jamo vi vihuru ṇippaharaṇu
text.2369: sarahahŏ hariṇu jema uddhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ dāhiṇa-seḍḍhi parāiu
text.2370: tahĩ rahaṇeura-puravara-sārahŏ  $  indahŏ kahiu aṇṇu sahasārahŏ
text.2371: "suravaï laï appaṇaü pahuttaṇu  $  aṇṇahŏ kahŏ vi samappi jamattaṇu
text.2373: māli-sumālihĩ pottaĕhĩ  $  darisāviu kaha vi ṇa mahu maraṇu
text.2374: lajjaĕ tujjhu surāhivaï  $  dhaṇaeṇa vi laïẏaü tava-caraṇu"
text.2378: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jama-vaẏaṇu asundaru  $  kira ṇiggaï saṇṇahĕvi purandaru
text.2379: aggaĕ tāma manti thiu bhesaï  $  "jo pahu so saẏalāĩ gavesaï
text.2380: tuhũ puṇu dhāvaï ṇāĩ aẏāṇaü  $  so jĕ kamāgaü laṅkahĕ rāṇaü
text.2381: tumhĕhĩ mālihĕ kāleṃ bhuttī  $  maṇḍu maṇḍu jiha para-kulaüttī
text.2382: tāhã jĕ paḍhamu juttu paharevaü  $  ṇaü ukkhandheṃ paĩ jāevaü
text.2384: bhuttu āsi taṃ maẏa-māriccĕhĩ"  $  ema bhaṇevi ṇiẏattiu bhiccĕhĩ
text.2385: dahamuho vi jamaüri ucchuraẏahŏ  $  kikkindhaüri devi sūraraẏahŏ
text.2387: gaü laṅkahĕ savaḍaṃmuhaü  $  ṇahĕ laggu vimāṇu maṇoharaü
text.2393: paripucchiu sumāli diṇṇuttaru  $  "kiṃ ṇahaẏalu" "ṇaṃ ṇaṃ raẏaṇāẏaru"
text.2398: "sa-vvavasāẏa jāẏa kiṃ mahihara"  $  "ṇaṃ ṇaṃ paribhamanti jalĕ jalaẏara"
text.2399: ema cavanta patta laṅkāuri  $  jā tikūḍa-mahihara-siharovari
text.2403: laṅkāhivaï païṭṭhu purĕ  $  parivaddhu paṭṭu ahiseu kiu
text.2404: jiha suravaï suravara-purihĩ  $  tiha rajju sa iṃ bhu ñjantu thiu
text.2407: "kahahŏ kahahŏ ṇarahŏ  $  vijjāharahŏ  $  ajja vi kavaṇu aṇiṭṭhaü"
text.2411: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jampaï ko vi ṇaru  $  sira-sihara-caḍāviẏa-ubhaẏa-karu
text.2412: "paramesara dujjaü duṭṭhu khalu  $  candovaru ṇāmeṃ atula-valu
text.2413: so indahŏ taṇiẏa kera karĕvi  $  pāẏāla-laṅka thiu païsarĕvi"
text.2414: avarekkeṃ docchiu ṇaravarĕṇa  $  "kiṃ sakkeṃ kiṃ candoẏarĕṇa
text.2415: suvvanti kumāra aṇṇa pavala  $  ucchuraẏahŏ ṇandaṇa ṇīla-ṇala"
text.2416: aṇṇekkeṃ vuccaï "haũ kahami  $  do-pāsiu jaï ṇa ghāẏa lahami
text.2418: jā pārihacchi maĩ diṭṭha tahŏ  $  sā tihuẏaṇĕ ṇaü aṇṇahŏ ṇarahŏ
text.2420: rahu vāhĕvi aruṇu  $  haẏa haṇĕvi puṇu  $  jā joẏaṇu viṇa pāvaï
text.2421: tā meruhĕ bhamĕvi  $  jiṇavaru ṇavĕvi  $  tahĩ jĕ paḍīvaü āvaï
text.2425: tahŏ jaṃ valu taṃ ṇa purandarahŏ  $  ṇa kuverahŏ varuṇahŏ sasaharahŏ
text.2426: meru vi ṭālaï vaddhāmarisu  $  tahŏ aṇṇu ṇarāhiu tiṇa-sarisu
text.2427: kaïlāsa-mahīharu kahi mi gaü  $  tahĩ sammaü ṇāmeṃ laïu vaü
text.2428: ṇigganthu muevi visuddha-maï  $  aṇṇahŏ indahŏ vi ṇāhĩ ṇamaï
text.2429: taṃ tehaü pekkhĕvi gīḍha-bhaü  $  pavvajja levi gaü sūraraü
text.2430: "mahu hosaï keṇa vi kāraṇĕṇa  $  samaraṅgaṇu samaü dasāṇaṇĕṇa
text.2431: avarekkeṃ vuttu "ṇa imu ghaḍaï  $  kaïvaṃsiu kiṃ amhahũ bhiḍaï
text.2432: sirikaṇṭhahŏ laggĕvi mittaïẏa  $  aṇṇu vi uvaẏāra-saĕhĩ laïẏa
text.2434: ahavaï vāṇara vi  $  suravara-ṇara vi  $  rattuppala-dala-ṇaẏaṇahŏ
text.2435: tā saẏala vi suhaḍa  $  jā samara-jhaḍa  $  ṇaü ṇienti dahavaẏaṇahŏ
text.2439: taṃ vāli-sallu hiẏavaĕ dharĕvi  $  to rāvaṇu aṇṇa volla karĕvi
text.2440: gaü ekka-divasĕ sura-sundarihĕ  $  jā avaharaṇeṇa taṇūẏarihĕ
text.2441: tā harĕvi ṇīẏa kula-bhūṣaṇĕhĩ  $  candaṇahi ha(va?)riẏa khara-dūsaṇĕhĩ
text.2443: ṇaṃ uvarĕ chuhĕvi rakkhiẏa-saraṇu  $  kiẏa (?) tehi mi candovara-maraṇu
text.2444: viṇivāiu atthāṇĕ jjĕ thiu  $  jo ḍhukkiu so tamvāru ṇiu
text.2446: alahantu vāru taṃ ṇippasaru  $  gaü valĕvi paḍīvaü ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaru
text.2448: chuḍu chuḍu dahavaẏaṇu  $  parituṭṭha-maṇu  $  kira sa-kalattaü āvaï
text.2454: atthakkaĕ āẏamvira-ṇaẏaṇu  $  kuḍhĕ laggaï sa-rahasu dahavaẏaṇu
text.2455: karĕ dhariu tāma mandovariĕ  $  ṇaṃ gaṅgā-vāhu jaüṇa-sariĕ
text.2456: "paramesara kahŏ vi ṇa appaṇiẏa  $  jiha kaṇṇa tema para-bhāẏaṇiẏa
text.2457: ekka i karavāla-bhaẏaṅkarahũ  $  caüdaha sahāsa vijjāharahũ
text.2458: jaï āṇa-vaḍīvā honti puṇu  $  to gharĕ acchantiĕ kavaṇu guṇu
text.2459: paṭṭhavahi mahantā muĕvi raṇu  $  kaṇṇahĕ karantu pāṇiggahaṇu"
text.2460: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi māricca-maẏa  $  pesiẏa dahavatteṃ turia gaẏa
text.2462: tehĩ vivāhu kiu  $  kharu rajjĕ thiu  $  aṇurāhahĕ vijja-sahiu
text.2463: vaṇĕ ṇivasantiẏahĕ  $  vaẏa-vantiẏahĕ  $  suu uppaṇṇu virāhiu
text.2467: etthantarĕ jama-jūrāvaṇĕṇa  $  taṃ sallu dhareppiṇu rāvaṇĕṇa
text.2468: paṭṭhaviu mahāmaï dūu tahĩ  $  suggīva-sahoẏaru vāli jahĩ
text.2469: vollāviu thāĕvi ahimuhĕṇa  $  "haũ ema visajjiu dahamuhĕṇa
text.2471: kŏ vi kittidhavalu ṇāmeṇa ciru  $  sirikaṇṭha-kajjĕ thiu devi siru
text.2472: ṇavamaü pariṇāviu amarapahu  $  jeṃ dhaĕhĩ lihāviu kaï-ṇivahu
text.2473: dahamaü kaï-keẏaṇu siri-sahiu  $  eẏārahamaü paḍivalu kahiu
text.2476: solahamaü puṇu kŏ vi uvahiraü  $  taḍikesa-vigamĕ kiu teṇa taü
text.2477: sattārahamaü kikkindhu puṇu  $  tahŏ kavaṇu sukeseṃ ṇa kiu guṇu
text.2478: aṭṭhārahamaü puṇu sūraraü  $  jamu bhañjĕvi tahŏ païsāru kaü
text.2479: tuhũ evahĩ ekkuṇavīsamaü  $  aṇuhuñjĕ rajju maṇĕ muĕvi maü
text.2481: āu ṇihālĕ muhu  $  taṃ ṇamahi tuhũ  $  gampi dasāṇaṇa-rāṇaü
text.2482: jeṇa dei pavalu  $  caüraṅga-valu  $  indahŏ uvari paẏāṇaü"
text.2486: jaṃ kiu jaẏakāru ṇāma-gahaṇu  $  taṃ ṇavara valĕvi thiu aṇṇa-maṇu
text.2487: ṇa karei kaṇṇĕ vaẏaṇāĩ pahu  $  jiha para-purisahŏ su-kulīṇa-vahu
text.2489: ṇibbhacchiu mellĕvi saẏaṇa-kiẏa  $  "jo ko vi ṇamesaï tāsu siẏa
text.2490: ṇīsaru tuhũ āẏahŏ paṭṭaṇahŏ  $  ṇaṃ to bhiḍu paraĕ dasāṇaṇahŏ"
text.2492: "arĕ vāli deu kiṃ paĩ ṇa suu  $  mahu-mahiharu jeṇa bhuahĩ vihuu
text.2493: jo ṇivisaddheṇa pihimi kamaï  $  cattāri vi sāẏara paribhamaï
text.2495: jāsu mahājasĕṇa  $  raṇĕ aṇavasĕṇa  $  dhavalīhūaü tihuvaṇu
text.2496: tāsu viẏaṭṭāhŏ  $  abbhiṭṭāhŏ  $  kavaṇu gahaṇu kira rāvaṇu"
text.2500: so dūu kaḍuẏa-vaẏaṇāsi-haü  $  sāmarisu dasāsahŏ pāsu gaü
text.2501: "kiṃ vahueṃ ettiu kahiu maĩ  $  tiṇa-samaü vi ṇa gaṇaï vāli paĩ"
text.2502: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu dasasirĕṇa  $  vuccaï raẏaṇāẏara-rava-girĕṇa
text.2503: "jaï raṇa-muhĕ māṇu ṇa malami tahŏ  $  to chitta pāẏa raẏaṇāsavahŏ"
text.2504: āruhĕvi païjja paẏaṭṭu pahu  $  ṇaṃ kahŏ vi viruddhaü kūra-gahu
text.2505: thiu pupphavimāṇĕ maṇoharaĕ  $  ṇaṃ siddhu sivālaĕ sundaraĕ
text.2506: karĕ ṇimmalu candahāsu dhariu  $  ṇaṃ ghaṇa-ṇisaṇṇu taḍi-vipphuriu
text.2509: "amhahũ paẏa-bharĕṇa  $  ṇiru ṇiṭṭhurĕṇa  $  ma maraü dharaṇi varāiẏa"
text.2515: saṇṇahĕvi vāli ṇīsariu kiha  $  majjāẏa-vivajjiu jalahi jiha
text.2516: paṇaveppiṇu viṇṇi vi atula-vala  $  thiẏa aggima-khandhĕhĩ ṇīla-ṇala
text.2517: viraïu ārāẏaṇu raṇĕ acalu  $  pahilaü jĕ ṇiviḍu pāẏāla-valu
text.2518: puṇu pacchaĕ hilihilanta sa-bhaẏa  $  khara-khurĕhĩ khaṇanta khoṇi turaẏa
text.2519: puṇu saïla-sihara-saṇṇiha saẏaḍa  $  puṇu maẏa-vihalaṅghala hatthi-haḍa
text.2520: puṇu ṇaravaï vara-karavāla-dhara  $  āsaṇṇa ḍhukka to raẏaṇiẏara
text.2521: kira samarĕ bhiḍanti bhiḍanti ṇaï  $  thiẏa antarĕ manti su-viula-maï
text.2524: kiĕ khaĕ vandhavahũ  $  puṇu keṇa sahũ  $  pacchaĕ rajju karesahŏ
text.2529: taṃ khaẏahŏ ṇehu mā ṇeha-taru  $  jaï dharĕvi ṇa sakkahŏ rosa-bharu
text.2530: to ve vi paropparu uttharahŏ  $  jo ko vi jiṇaï jaẏakāru tahŏ"
text.2531: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vāli-deu cavaï  $  "sundaru bhaṇanti laṅkāhivaï
text.2532: khaü tujjhu va majjhu va ṇivvaḍaü  $  jima dhuva jima mandovari raḍaü
text.2533: kiṃ vahavĕhĩ jīvĕhĩ ghāiĕhĩ  $  vandhava-saẏaṇĕhĩ viṇivāiĕhĩ
text.2534: laï paharu paharu jaï atthi chalu  $  pekkhahũ tuha vijjahũ taṇaü valu"
text.2535: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi samara-saehĩ thiru  $  vāvarĕvi laggu vīsaddha-siru
text.2536: āmelliẏa vijja mahoẏariẏa (?)  $  phaṇi-phaṇa-phukkāra dinti gaïẏa
text.2545: sūraraẏa-sueṇa vi saṃbhariẏa  $  ṇāmeṇa vijja māhesariẏa
text.2547: kira avara visajjaï dahavaẏaṇu  $  saẏa-vāraü pariañcevi raṇu
text.2549: ṇaṃ kuñjara-karĕṇa kavalu pavaru  $  ṇaṃ vāhuvalīseṃ cakkaharu
text.2550: ṇahĕ dunduhi tāḍiẏa suraẏaṇĕṇa  $  kiu kalaẏalu kaïdhaẏa-sāhaṇĕṇa
text.2552: māṇu malevi tahŏ  $  laṅkāhivahŏ  $  vaddhu paṭṭu suggīvahŏ
text.2553: "kari jaẏakāru tuhũ  $  aṇubhuñjĕ suhu  $  bhiccu hohi dahagīvahŏ
text.2557: mahu taṇaü sīsu puṇu duṇṇamaü  $  jiha mokkha-siharu savvuttamaü
text.2558: paṇaveppiṇu tillokkāhivaï  $  sāmaṇṇahŏ aṇṇahŏ ṇaü ṇavaï
text.2559: mahu taṇiẏa pihivi tuhũ bhuñji pahu  $  rijjhaü kaï-jāuhāṇa-ṇivahu
text.2560: aṇṇu mi jo paĩ uvaẏāru kiu  $  tāẏahŏ kāraṇĕ jamarāu jiu
text.2561: tahŏ maĩ kiẏa paḍiuvaẏāra-kiẏa  $  āvaggī bhuñjahi rāẏa-siẏa"
text.2562: gaü ema bhaṇeppiṇu turiu tahĩ  $  guru gaẏaṇacandu ṇāmeṇa jahĩ
text.2563: tavacaraṇu laïu taggaẏa-maṇĕṇa  $  uppaṇṇaü riddhiu takkhaṇĕṇa
text.2564: aṇudiṇu jiṇantu indiẏa-vaïri  $  gaü titthu jetthu kaïlāsa-giri
text.2567: attāvaṇa-silahã  $  sāsaẏa-ilahã  $  ṇaṃ thiu vāli bhaḍāraü
text.2571: ettahĕ vi sirippaha bhaïṇi tahŏ  $  suggīveṃ diṇṇa dasāṇaṇahŏ
text.2572: volāviu gaü laṅkā-ṇaẏarĕ  $  ṇala-ṇīla visajjiẏa kikka-purĕ
text.2573: suu dhuva-mahaevihĕ saṃthaviu  $  sasikiraṇu ṇiẏaddha-rajjĕ thaviu
text.2574: tahĩ avasarĕ uttara-seḍhi-vihu  $  vijjāharu ṇāmeṃ jalaṇasihu
text.2575: tahŏ dhīẏa sutāra-ṇāma ṇarĕṇa  $  maggijjaï dasasaẏagaï-varĕṇa
text.2576: guru-vaẏaṇeṃ tāsu ṇa paṭṭhaviẏa  $  suggīvahŏ ṇavara pariṭṭhaviẏa
text.2577: pariṇevi kaṇṇa ṇiẏa ṇiẏaẏa-puru  $  dasasaẏagaïhĕ vi virahaggi guru
text.2578: pajalaï uppāẏaï kalamalaü  $  uṇhaü ṇa suhāi ṇa sīẏalaü
text.2579: ubbhantaü kahi mi païṭṭhu vaṇu  $  sāhantu vijja thiu ekka-maṇu
text.2581: tāi mi dhaṇa-paürĕ  $  kikkindha-purĕ  $  aṅgaṅgaẏa vaḍḍhantaĩ
text.2582: thiẏaĩ raẏaṇa[ĩ] ṇaĩ  $  veṇṇi vi jaṇaĩ  $  rajju sa iṃ bhu ñjantaĩ
text.2585: pabhaṇaï "kiṃ maĩ jīvantĕṇa  $  jāma ṇa riu musumūriẏaü"
text.2591: pariṇĕvi valaï jāma tā thambhiu  $  pupphavimāṇu amvare
text.2592: maharisi-tava-teeṃ thiu vimāṇu  $  ṇaṃ dukkiẏa-kamma-vaseṇa dāṇu
text.2593: ṇaṃ sukkeṃ khīliu meha-jālu  $  ṇaṃ pāuseṇa koila-vamālu
text.2594: ṇaṃ dūsāmiĕṇa kuḍumva-vittu  $  ṇaṃ maccheṃ dhariu mahāẏavattu (?)
text.2595: ṇaṃ kañcaṇa-seleṃ pavaṇa-gamaṇu  $  ṇaṃ dāṇa-pahāveṃ ṇīẏa-bhavaṇu
text.2596: ṇīsaddaü hūẏaü kiṅkiṇīu  $  ṇaṃ suraĕ samattaĕ kāmiṇīu
text.2597: ghaggharĕhi mi ghavaghava-ghosu cattu  $  ṇaṃ gimbhaẏālu daddurahũ pattu
text.2598: ṇaravarahũ paropparu hūu cappu  $  "ahŏ dharaṇi ĕjeviṇu dharaṇi-kampu"
text.2599: paḍipelliẏaü vi ṇa vahaï vimāṇu  $  ṇaṃ maharisi-bhaïẏaĕ muaï pāṇu
text.2601: vihaḍaï tharaharaï ṇa ḍhukkaï  $  uppari vāli-bhaḍārāhŏ
text.2602: chuḍu chuḍu pariṇiẏaü kalattu va  $  raï-daïẏahŏ vaḍḍārāhŏ
text.2609: "maru kahŏ athakka[ĕ] kālu kuddhu  $  karu keṇa bhuẏaṅgama-vaẏaṇĕ chuddhu
text.2610: keṃ sirĕṇa paḍicchiu kulisa-ghāu  $  ko ṇiggaü pañcāṇaṇa-muhāu
text.2611: kŏ païṭṭhu jalantaĕ jalaṇa-jālĕ  $  ko ṭhiu kiẏanta-dantantarālĕ
text.2612: māricceṃ vuccaï "deva deva  $  sa-bhuaṅgamu candaṇa-rukkhu jema
text.2614: meru va akampu uvahi va akhohu  $  mahiẏalu va vahu-kkhamu catta-mohu
text.2615: majjhaṇha-paẏaṅgu va ugga-teu  $  tahŏ tava-sattiĕ paḍikhaliu veu
text.2616: osāri vimāṇu davatti deva  $  phuṭṭaï ṇa jāma khalu hiẏaü jema"
text.2618: taṃ māma-vaẏaṇu ṇisuṇeppiṇu  $  dahamuhu heṭṭhāmuhu valiu
text.2630: so tehaü giri-kaïlāsu diṭṭhu  $  aṇṇu vi muṇivaru muṇivara-variṭṭhu
text.2632: ajju vi raṇu icchahi maĩ samāṇu  $  jaï risi to kiṃ thambhiu vimāṇu
text.2634: jaṃ paĩ parihava-riṇu diṇṇaü  $  taṃ sa-kalantaru allavami
text.2635: pāhāṇu jema ummūlĕvi  $  kaïlāsu jĕ sāẏarĕ ghivami"
text.2640: ema bhaṇevi jhatti paḍiu iva vālihĕ taṇeṇa sāvĕṇaṃ  $  talu bhindĕvi païṭṭhu mahidāraṇiẏahĕ vijjahĕ pahāvĕṇaṃ
text.2641: cinteppiṇu vijja-sahāsu teṇa  $  ummūliu mahiharu dahamuheṇa
text.2642: su-pasiddhaü siddhaü laddha-saṃsu  $  ṇāvaï dupputteṃ ṇiẏaẏa-vaṃsu
text.2643: ahavaï ṇavantu dukkiẏa-bhareṇa  $  taïlokku vakhittu (?) va jiṇavareṇa
text.2644: ahavaï bhuvaïnda-lalanta-ṇālu  $  ṇīsāriu mahi-uvarahŏ va vālu
text.2645: ahavaï ṇaṃ vasuha mahīharāhã  $  choḍāviẏa vālāluñcirāhã
text.2646: ahavaï calavalaï bhuaṅga-thaṭṭu  $  ṇaṃ dharaṇi-anta-poṭṭalu visaṭṭu
text.2647: kholukkhaü khoṇi-khaẏālu bhāi  $  pāẏālahŏ phāḍiu uaru ṇāĩ
text.2648: girivarĕṇa calanteṃ caü-samudda  $  ahimuha utthallāviẏa raüdda
text.2650: jaṃ gaẏaü āsi ṇāseppiṇu  $  sāẏara-jāreṃ māṇiẏaü
text.2651: taṃ maṇḍa harevi paḍīvaü  $  jalu ku-kalattu va āṇiẏaü
text.2657: katthaï vihaḍiẏaĩ silāẏalāĩ  $  saïlaggaĩ kiẏaĩ va khalahalāĩ
text.2658: katthaï gaẏa ṇiggaẏa uddha-suṇḍa  $  ṇaṃ dharaĕ pasāriẏa vāhu-daṇḍa
text.2659: katthaï sua-pantiu uṭṭhiẏāu  $  ṇaṃ tuṭṭaü maragaẏa-kaṇṭhiẏāu
text.2660: katthaï bhamaroliu dhāvaḍāu  $  uḍḍanti va kaïlāsahŏ jaḍāu
text.2661: katthaï vaṇaẏara ṇiggaẏa guhehĩ  $  ṇaṃ vamaï mahāgiri vahu-muhehĩ
text.2662: ucchaliu kahi mi jalu dhavala-dhāru  $  ṇaṃ tuṭṭĕvi gaü girivarahŏ hāru
text.2663: katthaï uṭṭhiẏaĩ valāẏa-saẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ tuṭṭĕvi giri-aṭṭhiẏaĩ gaẏaĩ
text.2664: katthaï ucchaliẏaĩ vidummāĩ  $  ṇaṃ ruhira-phuliṅgaĩ ahiṇavāĩ
text.2666: aṇṇu vi jo aṇṇahŏ hatthĕṇa  $  ṇiẏa-thāṇahŏ mellāviẏaü
text.2667: ṇiccalu vavasāẏa-vihūṇaü  $  kavaṇu ṇa āvaï pāviẏaü
text.2673: ahi avahi paüñjĕvi āu tetthu  $  rāvaṇu kelāsuddharaṇu jetthu
text.2674: jahĩ maṇi-silāẏaluppīlu phuṭṭu  $  giri-ḍimbhahŏ ṇaṃ kaḍisaraü tuṭṭu
text.2675: jahĩ vaṇaẏara-thaṭṭa-maraṭṭu bhaggu  $  jahĩ vāli mahārisi sovasaggu
text.2678: so jaïvaru kuñciẏa-kara-kameṇa  $  pariañciu ṇamiu bhuaṅgameṇa
text.2680: rehaï phaṇāli maṇi-vipphuranti  $  ṇaṃ vohiẏa puraü paīva-panti
text.2683: soṇiu daha-muhĕhĩ vahantaü  $  dahamuhu kummāgāru kiu
text.2688: jaṃ ahipavara-rāẏa-gurubhārakkanta-dhareṇa pellio  $  dasa-disivaha-bharantu dahavaẏaṇeṃ ghorārāu mellio
text.2693: "hā hā dahamuha jaẏa-siri-ṇivāsa  $  dahavaẏaṇa dasāṇaṇa hā dasāsa
text.2695: mandovari pabhaṇaï "cāru-citta  $  ahŏ vāli-bhaḍārā karĕ paritta
text.2696: laṅkesahŏ jāi ṇa jīu jāma  $  bhattāra-bhikkha mahu dehi tāma
text.2698: taṃ kaluṇa-vaẏaṇu ṇisuṇeppiṇu  $  dharaṇindeṃ uddhariu dharu
text.2705: lua-kesara-ukkhaẏa-ṇaha-ṇihāu  $  ṇaṃ giri-guha muĕvi maïndu āu
text.2708: maẏalañchaṇu dūsiu teẏa-mandu  $  ṇaṃ rāhu-muhahŏ ṇīsariu candu
text.2709: gaü tettahĕ jettahĕ guṇa-gaṇāli  $  acchaï attāvaṇa-silahĩ vāli
text.2710: pariañcĕvi vandiu dasasireṇa  $  puṇu kiẏa garahaṇa gaggara-gireṇa
text.2711: "maĩ sarisaü aṇṇu ṇa jagĕ aẏāṇu  $  jo karami keli sīheṃ samāṇu
text.2712: maĩ sarisaü aṇṇu ṇa manda-bhaggu  $  jo guruhu mi karami mahovasaggu
text.2714: jaṃ tihuvaṇa-ṇāhu mueppiṇu  $  aṇṇahŏ ṇamiu ṇa sira-kamalu
text.2715: taṃ sammatta-mahaddumahŏ  $  laddhu deva paĩ parama-phalu"
text.2720: puṇar avi vāravāra pomāĕvi dasaviha-dhammavālaẏaṃ  $  gaü tettahĕ turantu taṃ jettahĕ bharahāhiva-jiṇālaẏaṃ
text.2723: ahiṇava-ullāva vilāsiṇi vva  $  ṇara-daḍḍha-dhūva khala-kuṭṭaṇi vva
text.2724: vahu-dīva samuddantara-mahi vva  $  pelliẏa-vali ṇārāẏaṇa-maï vva
text.2725: ghaṇṭārava-muhaliẏa gaẏa-ghaḍa vva  $  maṇi-raẏaṇa-samujjala ahi-phaḍa vva
text.2726: ṇhāṇaḍḍha vesa-kesāvali vva  $  gandhukkaḍa kusumiẏa pāḍali vva
text.2727: taṃ pujja karĕvi āḍhattu geu  $  mucchaṇa-kama-kampa-tigāma-bheu
text.2736: sālaṅkāru su-saru su-viẏaḍḍhu suhāvaü piẏa-kalattu vaṃ  $  ārohi-adha(va?)rohi-thāiẏa-saṃcārihĩ suraẏa-tattu vaṃ
text.2737: ṇava-vahua-ṇiḍālu va tilaẏa-cāru  $  ṇigghaṇa-gaẏaṇaẏalu va manda-tāru
text.2738: saṇṇaddha-valaṃ piva laïẏa-tāṇu  $  dhaṇur iva sajjīu pasaṇṇa-vāṇu
text.2739: taṃ geu suṇeppiṇu diṇṇa ṇiẏaẏa  $  dharaṇindeṃ satti amohavijaẏa
text.2740: tiẏasāha ṇaveppiṇu risaha-deu  $  puṇu gaü ṇiẏa-ṇaẏarahŏ kaïkaseu
text.2741: etthantarĕ suggīuttamāsu  $  uppaṇṇaü kevalu ṇāṇu tāsu
text.2742: vāhuvali jema thiu suddha-gattu  $  uppaṇṇu aṇṇu dhavalāẏavattu
text.2752: ema bhaṇevi devi raṇa-bheri paẏaṭṭu turantu rāvaṇo  $  jo jama-dhaṇaẏa-kaṇaẏa-vuha-aṭṭhāvaẏa-dhara-tharaharāvaṇo
text.2753: ṇīsariĕ dasāṇaṇĕ ṇisiẏarinda  $  ṇaṃ mukkaṅkusa ṇiggaẏa gaïnda
text.2755: samuha vaḍa-ṇiviḍa gaẏa-ghaḍa-gharaṭṭa (?)  $  ṇandīsara-dīvu va sura paẏaṭṭa
text.2758: vuccaï "khara-dūsaṇa lehu tāva  $  khala khudda pisuṇa paridhiṭṭha pāva"
text.2759: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu māmaeṇa  $  laṅkāhiu vujjhāviu maeṇa
text.2760: "sahũ sālaehĩ kira kavaṇa kāṇi  $  jaï ghāiẏa to tumhahũ ji hāṇi
text.2761: lahu vahiṇi-sahovara-ṇilaĕ jāhũ  $  ārūsĕvi kijjaï kāĩ tāhũ"
text.2763: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi dahavaẏaṇĕṇa  $  maccharu maṇĕ parisesiẏaü
text.2769: āiẏa tetthu te vi piẏa-vaẏaṇĕhĩ jokkāriu dasāṇaṇo  $  gaü kikkindha-ṇaẏaru suggīu vi miliu sa-manti-sāhaṇo
text.2771: raha-turaẏa-gaïndahũ ṇāhĩ cheu  $  uvvahaï paẏāṇaü pavaṇa-veu
text.2773: atthavaṇahŏ ḍhukku paẏaṅgu tāma  $  allīṇa pāsu ṇisi aḍaẏaṇā va
text.2777: ṇaṃ vañcĕvi diṭṭhi divāẏarāsu  $  ṇisi-vahu allīṇa ṇisāẏarāsu
text.2779: viṇṇi vi dussīla-sahāvaĩ  $  suraü sa iṃ bhu ñjantāĩ
text.2780: "mā diṇaẏaru kahi mi ṇiesaü"  $  ṇāĩ sa-saṅkaĩ suttāĩ
text.2781: iẏa ittha pa ü ma ca ri e  $  dhaṇañjaẏāsiẏa-sa ẏa mbhu e va-kae
text.2782: ka ï lā su ddha ra ṇa m iṇaṃ  $  terasamaṃ sāhiẏaṃ pavvaṃ
text.2784: vimalĕ vihāṇaĕ kiẏaĕ paẏāṇaĕ uẏaẏaïri-siharĕ ravi dīsaï
text.2785: "maĩ melleppiṇu ṇisiẏaru leppiṇu kahĩ gaẏa ṇisi" ṇāĩ gavesaï
text.2790: jaẏa-harĕ païsāriu païsanteṃ  $  ṇāvaï maṅgala-kalasu vasanteṃ
text.2791: phagguṇa-khalahŏ dūu ṇīsāriu  $  jeṇa virahi-jaṇu kaha va ṇa māriu
text.2793: girivara gāma jeṇa dhūmāviẏa  $  vaṇa-paṭṭaṇa-ṇihāẏa saṃtāviẏa
text.2795: jeṇa ucchu-viḍa jantĕhĩ pīliẏa  $  pava-maṇḍava-ṇirikka āvīliẏa
text.2796: jāsu rajjĕ para riddhi palāsahŏ  $  tahŏ muhu maïlĕvi phagguṇa-māsahŏ
text.2810: ema païṭṭhu virahi viddhantaü  $  gaẏavaï-vammĕhĩ andolantaü
text.2813: ṇammaẏa-vālī  $  bhumbhala-bholī  $  ṇaṃ bhamaï saloṇahŏ rattī
text.2817: ṇammaẏāĕ maẏaraharahŏ jantiĕ  $  ṇāĩ pasāhaṇu laïu turantiĕ
text.2818: ghavaghavanti je jala-pabbhārā  $  te ji ṇāĩ ṇeura-jhaṅkārā
text.2819: puliṇaĩ jāĩ ve vi sacchāẏaĩ  $  tāĩ jĕ uḍḍhaṇāĩ ṇaṃ jāẏaĩ
text.2820: jaṃ jalu khalaï valaï ullolaï  $  rasaṇā-dāmu taṃ ji ṇaṃ gholaï
text.2821: je āvatta samuṭṭhiẏa caṅgā  $  te ji ṇāĩ taṇu-tivali-taraṅgā
text.2822: je jala-hatthi-kumbha sohillā  $  te ji ṇāĩ thaṇa addhummillā
text.2823: jo ḍiṇḍīra-ṇiẏaru andolaï  $  ṇāvaï so jĕ hāru raṅkholaï
text.2824: jaṃ jalaẏara-raṇa-raṅgiu pāṇiu  $  taṃ ji ṇāĩ tamvolu samāṇiu
text.2825: matta-hatthi-maẏa-maïliu jaṃ jalu  $  taṃ ji ṇāĩ kiu akkhihĩ kajjalu
text.2826: jāu taraṅgiṇiu avara-ohaü  $  tāu ji bhaṅgurāu ṇaṃ bhaühaü
text.2827: jāu bhamara-pantiu allīṇaü  $  kesāvaliu tāu ṇaṃ diṇṇaü
text.2830: mohuppāiu  $  ṇaṃ jaru lāiu  $  tahũ sahasakiraṇa-dahagīvahũ
text.2834: so vasantu sā revā taṃ jalu  $  so dāhiṇa-māruu miẏa-sīẏalu
text.2836: te dhuẏagāẏa tāu kīroliu  $  tāu kusuma-mañjari-riñcholiu
text.2837: te pallava so koila-kalaẏalu  $  so keẏaï-kesara-raẏa-parimalu
text.2839: te andolā taṃ juvaīẏaṇu  $  pekkhĕvi sahasakiraṇu harisiẏa-maṇu
text.2840: sahũ anteureṇa gaü tettahĕ  $  ṇammaẏa pavara mahāṇaï jettahĕ
text.2841: dūreṃ thiu ārakkhiẏa-ṇiẏa-valu  $  jalu jantiĕhĩ ṇiruddhaü ṇimmalu
text.2844: salilabbhantarĕ  $  māṇasa-saravarĕ  $  ṇaṃ païṭhu surindu sa-accharu
text.2848: sahasakiraṇu sahasatti ṇiuḍḍĕvi  $  āu ṇāĩ mahi-vahu avaruṇḍĕvi
text.2849: diṭṭhu maüḍu chuḍu addhummillaü  $  ravi va daruggamantu sohillaü
text.2850: diṭṭhu ṇiḍālu vaẏaṇu vacchatthalu  $  ṇaṃ candaddhu kamalu ṇaha-maṇḍalu
text.2851: pabhaṇaï sahasarāsi "laï ḍhukkahŏ  $  jujjhahŏ ramahŏ ṇhāhŏ ullukkahŏ"
text.2852: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi kaḍakkha-vikkheviu  $  vuḍḍaü ukkarāu mahaeviu
text.2853: uppari karaẏala-ṇiẏaru pariṭṭhiu  $  ṇaṃ rattuppala-saṇḍu samuṭṭhiu
text.2855: mahuẏara sara-bhareṇa allīṇā  $  kāmiṇi bhisiṇi bhaṇĕvi ṇaṃ līṇā
text.2858: āẏaĩ sarasaĩ  $  kiẏa(ra?) tāmarasaĩ  $  ṇaravaïhĕ bhanti uppāiẏa
text.2863: kahi mi canda-kundujjala-tārĕhĩ  $  dhavaliu jalu tuṭṭantĕhĩ hārĕhĩ
text.2864: kahi mi rasiu ṇeurĕhĩ rasantĕhĩ  $  kahi mi phuriu kuṇḍalĕhĩ phurantĕhĩ
text.2865: kahi mi sarasa-tamvolārattaü  $  kahi mi vaüla-kāẏamvari-mattaü
text.2866: kahi mi phaliha-kappūrĕhĩ vāsiu  $  kahi mi surahi-migamaẏa-vāmīsiu
text.2867: kahi mi viviha-maṇi-raẏaṇujjaliẏaü  $  kahi mi dhoa-kajjala-saṃvaliẏaü
text.2868: kahi mi vahala-kuṅkuma-piñjariẏaü  $  kahi mi malaẏa-candaṇa-rasa-bhariẏaü
text.2869: kahi mi jakkhakaddamĕṇa karamviu  $  kahi mi bhamara-riñcholihĩ cumviu
text.2876: kā vi karanti keli sahũ rāeṃ  $  pahaṇaï komala-kuvalaẏa-ghāeṃ
text.2877: kā vi muddha diṭṭhiĕ suvisālaĕ  $  kā vi ṇavallaĕ malliẏa-mālaĕ
text.2878: kā vi suẏandhĕhĩ pāḍali-hullĕhĩ  $  kā vi su-pūẏaphalehĩ vaüllĕhĩ
text.2879: kā vi juṇṇa-paṇṇĕhĩ paṭṭaṇiĕhĩ  $  kā vi raẏaṇa-maṇi-avalamvaṇiĕhĩ
text.2880: kā vi vilevaṇehĩ uvvariẏahĩ  $  kā vi surahi-davaṇā-mañjariẏahĩ
text.2881: kahĕ vi gujjhu jalĕ addhummillaü  $  ṇaṃ maẏarahara-siharu sohillaü
text.2882: kahĕ vi kasaṇa romāvali diṭṭhī  $  kāma-veṇi ṇaṃ galĕvi païṭṭhī
text.2883: kahĕ vi thaṇovari lalaï ahoraṇu  $  ṇāĩ aṇaṅgahŏ keraü toraṇu
text.2885: kahĕ vi sa-ruhiraĩ  $  diṭṭhaĩ ṇaharaĩ  $  thaṇa-siharovari su-pahuttaĩ
text.2886: vĕgĕṇa valaggahŏ  $  maẏaṇa-turaṅgahŏ  $  ṇaṃ pāẏaĩ chuḍu chuḍu khuttaĩ
text.2890: taṃ jala-kīla ṇievi pahāṇahũ  $  jāẏa volla ṇahaẏalĕ givvāṇahũ
text.2891: pabhaṇaï ekku harisa-saṃpaṇṇaü  $  "tihuaṇĕ sahasakiraṇu para dhaṇṇaü
text.2893: ṇaliṇi-vaṇu va diṇaẏara-kara-icchaü  $  kumuẏa-vaṇu va sasahara-tallicchaü
text.2895: acchaü suraü jeṇa jagu mattaü  $  jala-kīlaĕ ji kiṇṇa pajjattaü"
text.2896: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi avarekku pavolliu  $  "sahasakiraṇu kevala salilolliu
text.2897: itthu pavāhu maṇohara-vantaü  $  jo juvaïhĩ gujjhantu vi pattaü
text.2900: sarahasu ḍhukkaü  $  māṇĕvi mukkaü  $  anteuru ekkaĕ vāraĕ
text.2904: rāvaṇo vi jala-kīla kareppiṇu  $  sundara siẏaẏa-vei viraeppiṇu
text.2908: pujja karĕvi kira gāẏaï jāvĕhĩ  $  jantiehĩ jalu melliu tāvĕhĩ
text.2909: para-kalattu saṃkeẏahŏ ḍhukkaü  $  ṇāĩ viẏaḍḍhahĩ māṇĕvi mukkaü
text.2911: dahamuhu paḍima levi vihaḍapphaḍu  $  kaha vi kaha vi ṇīsariu viẏāvaḍu
text.2913: bhaṇaï "ṇaresahŏ  $  turiu gavesahŏ  $  kiu jeṇa eu pisuṇattaṇu
text.2914: kiṃ vahu-vuttĕṇa  $  tāsu ṇiruttĕṇa  $  dakkhavami ajju jama-sāsaṇu"
text.2918: to etthantarĕ laddhāesā  $  gaẏa maṇa-gamaṇā 'ṇeẏa gavesā
text.2919: rāvaṇeṇa sari diṭṭha vahantī  $  muẏa-mahuẏara-dukkheṇa va jantī (?)
text.2920: candaṇa-rasĕṇa va vahala-vilittī  $  jala-riddhiĕ ṇaṃ jovvaṇaïttī
text.2921: manthara-vāheṇa va vīsatthī  $  jacca-paṭṭavatthaĩ va ṇiẏatthī
text.2922: vīṇāhoraṇaĩ va paṅguttī  $  vālāhiẏa-ṇiddāĕ va suttī
text.2923: malliva-dantehĩ va vihasantī  $  ṇīluppala-ṇaẏaṇĕhĩ va ṇientī
text.2924: vaüla-surā-gandheṇa va mattī  $  keẏaï-hatthehĩ va ṇaccantī
text.2925: mahuari-mahura-saru va gāẏantī  $  ujjhara-muravāĩ va vāẏantī
text.2928: pujja hareppiṇu  $  pāhuḍu leppiṇu  $  gaẏa ṇāvaï pāsu samuddahŏ
text.2932: tahĩ avasarĕ je kiṅkara dhāiẏa  $  te paḍivatta laeppiṇu āiẏa
text.2933: kahiẏa suṇantahŏ khandhāvārahŏ  $  "laï ettaḍaü sāru saṃsārahŏ
text.2935: jā jala-kīla teṇa uppāiẏa  $  sā amarehi mi ramĕvi ṇa ṇāiẏa
text.2936: suvvaï kāmu ko vi kira sundaru  $  suravaï bharahu saẏara-cakkesaru
text.2937: mahavā saṇakumāru te saẏala vi  $  ṇaü pāvanti tāsu ekka-ẏala vi
text.2938: kā vi aüvva līla vimmāṇiẏa  $  dhammu atthu viṇṇi vi pariẏāṇiẏa
text.2939: kāma-tattu puṇu teṇa jĕ ṇimmiu  $  aṇṇa ramanti pasava-kodūmiu
text.2941: maĩ pahavantĕṇa  $  bhuẏaṇĕ tavantĕṇa  $  gaẏaṇatthu paẏaṅgu ṇa ṇā(bhā?)vaï
text.2942: eṇa paẏārĕṇa  $  piẏa-vāvārĕṇa  $  thiu salilĕ paīsĕvi ṇāvaï"
text.2946: avarekkeṇa vuttu "maĩ lakkhiu  $  saccaü savvu eṇa jaṃ akkhiu
text.2947: jaṃ puṇu tahŏ keraü anteuru  $  ṇaṃ paccakkhu jĕ maẏaraddhaẏa-puru
text.2956: ṇarahũ aṇantahũ  $  maṇa-dhaṇa-vantahũ  $  dhuu coru caṇḍu uppaṇṇaü"
text.2960: avarekkeṇa vuttu "maĩ jantaĩ  $  diṭṭhaĩ ṇimmalĕ salilĕ tarantaĩ
text.2961: aï-sundaraĩ sukiẏa-kammāĩ va  $  sughaḍiẏāĩ ahiṇava-pemmāĩ va
text.2962: ṇiggalāĩ su-kiviṇa-hiẏaẏāĩ va  $  ṇiuṇa-samāsiẏa sukaï-paẏāĩ va
text.2963: saṃcārimaĩ ku-purisa-dhaṇāĩ va  $  kārimāĩ kuṭṭaṇi-vaẏaṇāĩ va
text.2964: païrikkaĩ sajjaṇa-cittāĩ va  $  vaddhaĩ atthaïtta-vittāĩ va
text.2965: dullaṅghaṇiẏaĩ sukalattāĩ va  $  ceṭṭha-vihūṇaĩ vuḍḍhantāĩ va
text.2967: tehĩ eu jalu thambhĕvi mukkaü  $  teṇa pujja rellantu paḍhukkaü"
text.2969: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu  $  "lehu" bhaṇeppiṇu  $  asivaru sa ĩ bhu vĕṇa pakaḍḍhiu
text.2970: sahaï samujjalu  $  sasi-kara-ṇimmalu  $  ṇaṃ patta-dāṇa-phalu vaḍḍhiu
text.2972: bhaddaṃ(ṭṭaṃ) ca macchavehe  $  ajja vi kaïṇo ṇa pāvanti
text.2984: sahasaẏaru vi juvaïhĩ pariẏariu  $  chuḍu je chuḍu salilahŏ ṇīsariu
text.2985: tāṇantarĕ tūraĩ ṇisuṇiẏaĩ  $  paṇaveppiṇu bhiccahĩ pisuṇiẏaĩ
text.2986: "paramesara pārakkaü paḍiu  $  laï paharaṇu samaru samāvaḍiu"
text.2988: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu  $  dhaṇu karĕ leppiṇu  $  ṇisiẏara-pavara-samūhahŏ
text.2989: thiu samuhāṇaṇu  $  ṇaṃ pañcāṇaṇu  $  ṇāĩ mahā-gaẏa-jūhahŏ
text.2993: jaṃ jujjha-sajju thiu levi dhaṇu  $  taṃ ḍariu asesu vi juvaïẏaṇu
text.2994: mambhīsiu rāeṃ vuṇṇa-maṇu  $  "kiṃ aṇṇahŏ ṇāũ sahasakiraṇu
text.2995: ekkekkahŏ ekkekkaü jĕ karu  $  parirakkhaï jaï to kavaṇu ḍaru
text.2996: acchahŏ bhuva-maṇḍavĕ vaïsarĕvi  $  jiha kariṇiu giri-guha païsarĕvi
text.2997: jā dalami kumbhi-kumbhatthalaĩ  $  hosanti kuḍumvihĩ ukkhalaĩ
text.2998: jā khaṇami visāṇaĩ pavarāĩ  $  hosanti paẏahŏ paccavarāĩ
text.2999: jā kaḍḍhami kari-sira-mottiẏaĩ  $  hosanti tumha hārattiẏaĩ
text.3002: ema bhaṇeppiṇu  $  taṃ dhīreppiṇu  $  ṇaravaï rahavarĕ caḍiẏaü
text.3003: juvaïhũ karuṇĕṇa (?)  $  XXviṇu aruṇĕṇa  $  ṇāĩ divāẏaru paḍiẏaü
text.3007: etthantarĕ āroḍiu bhaḍĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ kesari matta-hatthi-haḍĕhĩ
text.3008: so ekku aṇantaü jaï vi valu  $  papphullu to vi tahŏ muha-kamalu
text.3009: jaṃ laïu akhatteṃ sahasaẏaru  $  taṃ caviu paropparu sura-pavaru
text.3010: "ahŏ ahŏ aṇīi rakkhehĩ kiẏa  $  ekku ĕ vahu aṇṇu vi gaẏaṇĕ thiẏa
text.3011: paharaṇaĩ pavaṇa-giri-vāri-havi  $  āehĩ sarisa jaṇĕ bhīru ṇa vi"
text.3012: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇisiẏara lajjiẏaĩ  $  thiẏa mahiẏalĕ vijja-vivajjiẏaĩ
text.3013: to sahasakiraṇu sahasahĩ karĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ viddhaï sahasa-sahasa-sarĕhĩ
text.3014: dūrahŏ ji ṇiruddhaü vaïri-valu  $  ṇaṃ jamvūdīveṃ uvahi-jalu
text.3017: pāsu ṇa ḍhukkaï  $  te ullukkaï  $  timiru jema divasaẏarahŏ
text.3022: "paramesara ekkeṃ hontaĕṇa  $  valu saẏalu dhariu paharantaĕṇa
text.3023: raṇĕ rahavaru ekku jĕ paribhamaï  $  sandaṇa-sahāsu ṇaṃ paribhamaï
text.3024: dhaṇu ekku ekku ṇaru dui jĕ kara  $  caüdisahĩ ṇavara ṇivaḍanti sara
text.3025: karu kahŏ vi kahŏ vi uru kappariu  $  kari kahŏ vi kahŏ vi rahu jajjariu"
text.3026: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi uvahi jema khuhiu  $  lahu tijagavihūsaṇĕ āruhiu
text.3027: gaü tettahĕ jettahĕ sahasakaru  $  kokkiu "maru pāva paharu paharu
text.3028: haũ rāvaṇu dujjaü keṇa jiu  $  jeṃ pārāutṭhaü dhaṇaü kiu"
text.3030: ema bhaṇantĕṇa  $  viddhantĕṇa  $  sa-rahi mahārahu chiṇṇaü
text.3035: māhesarapura-vaï virahu kiu  $  ṇivisaddheṃ matta-gaïndĕ thiu
text.3036: ṇaṃ añjaṇa-mahiharĕ saraẏa-ghaṇu  $  utthariu sa-maccharu gīḍha-dhaṇu
text.3037: saṇṇāhu khuruppeṃ kappariu  $  laṅkāhiu kaha va samuvvariu
text.3038: jeṃ savvāẏāmeṃ muaï sara  $  lua-pakkha pakkhi ṇaṃ janti dhara
text.3040: jajjāhi tāma abbhāsu karĕ  $  pacchalĕ jujjhejjahi puṇu samarĕ"
text.3041: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jamĕṇa va joiẏaü  $  kuñjaru kuñjarahŏ pacoiẏaü
text.3042: āsaṇṇeṃ coĕvi vigaẏa-bhaü  $  ṇaravaï ṇiḍālĕ konteṇa haü
text.3045: tāma dasāsĕṇa  $  āẏāsĕṇa  $  uppaevi pahu dhariẏaü
text.3049: ṇiu ṇiẏa-ṇilaẏahŏ maẏa-viẏaliẏaü  $  ṇaṃ matta-mahāgaü ṇiẏaliẏaü
text.3050: "mā maï mi dharesaï dahavaẏaṇu"  $  ṇaṃ bhaïẏaĕ ravi gaü atthavaṇu
text.3051: pasariu andhāru pamokkalaü  $  ṇaṃ ṇisiĕ ghittu masi-poṭṭalaü
text.3052: sasi uggaü suṭṭhu susohiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ jaga-harĕ dīvaü vohiẏaü
text.3053: suvihāṇẽ divāẏaru uggamiu  $  ṇaṃ raẏaṇihĩ maïẏavaṭṭu bhamiu
text.3058: diṭṭhu dasāsĕṇa  $  seẏaṃsĕṇa  $  ṇāvaï risahu bhaḍāraü
text.3062: guru vandiẏa diṇṇaĩ āsaṇaĩ  $  maṇi-veẏaḍiẏaĩ suha-daṃsaṇaĩ
text.3064: ĕhu carimadehu sāmaṇṇu ṇa vi  $  mahu taṇaü bhavva-rāīva-ravi"
text.3065: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jama-kampāvaṇĕṇa  $  paṇaveppiṇu vuccaï rāvaṇĕṇa
text.3066: "mahu eṇa samāṇu kou kavaṇu  $  para pujjahĕ kāraṇĕ jāu raṇu
text.3067: ajju vi ehu jĕ pahu sā ji siẏa  $  aṇuhuñjaü meiṇi jema tiẏa"
text.3068: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi sahasakiraṇu cavaï  $  "uttamahŏ eu kiṃ saṃbhavaï
text.3069: taṃ maṇahara salila-kīla karĕvi  $  paĩ samaü mahāhavĕ uttharĕvi
text.3071: evahĩ āẏaĕ  $  vicchāẏaĕ  $  rāẏa-siẏaĕ kiṃ kijjaï
text.3077: ṇiẏa-ṇandaṇu ṇiẏaẏa-thāṇĕ thavĕvi  $  pariẏaṇu paṭṭaṇu paẏa saṃthavĕvi
text.3078: ṇikkhantu khaṇaddheṃ vigaẏa-bhaü  $  rāvaṇu vi paẏāṇaü devi gaü
text.3079: paripesiu lehu pahāṇāhŏ  $  aṇaraṇṇahŏ ujjhahĕ rāṇāhŏ
text.3080: muha-vatta kahiẏa "dahamuhĕṇa jiu  $  laï sahasakiraṇu tava-caraṇĕ thiu"
text.3081: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaravaï harisiẏaü  $  īsīsi visāu padarisiẏaü
text.3082: saṃgāma-sahāsĕhĩ dūsahahŏ  $  siẏa saẏala samappĕvi dasarahahŏ
text.3083: sahasatti so vi ṇikkhantu pahu  $  aṇṇu vi tahŏ taṇaü aṇantarahu
text.3086: jāgu paṇāsĕvi  $  riu tāsĕvi  $  magahahã mukku paẏāṇaü
text.3090: ṇāraü dhīrĕvi maru vasikarĕvi  $  tahŏ taṇiẏa taṇaẏa karaẏalĕ dharĕvi
text.3091: ṇava-ṇava saṃvacchara tetthu thiu  $  puṇu diṇṇu paẏāṇaü magahu gaü
text.3092: pekkhĕvi rāvaṇu āsaṅkiẏaü  $  mahu mahurapurāhiu vasikiẏaü
text.3093: jasu camareṃ amareṃ diṇṇu varu  $  sūlāuhu saẏalāuha-pavaru
text.3094: ṇiẏa taṇaẏa tāsu lāevi karĕ  $  thiu ṇavara gampi kaïlāsa-dharĕ
text.3101: jasu paẏa-bhārĕṇa  $  garuẏārĕṇa  $  haũ kiu kummāẏāraü"
text.3108: etthu vi amarāhivĕ raṇĕ ajaĕ  $  jiṇa-vandaṇahattiĕ meru gaĕ
text.3109: ehaĕ avasarĕ uvāu kavaṇu"  $  to manti pavolliu haridavaṇu
text.3111: jaṃ hoi acheu abheu puru  $  tā rakkhahũ pāvaï jā ṇa suru"
text.3112: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi tehi mi tema kiu  $  saï-cittu va ṇaẏaru dulaṅghu thiu
text.3119: jantahã bhaïẏaĕ vihaḍapphaḍĕhĩ  $  dahamuhahŏ kahiu kehi mi bhaḍĕhĩ
text.3120: "duggejjhu bhaḍārā taṃ ṇaẏaru  $  dūsiddhahũ jiha tihuaṇa-siharu
text.3121: tahĩ janta-saẏāĩ samuḍḍiẏaĩ  $  jama-karaĩ jameṇa va chaḍḍiẏaĩ
text.3122: joẏaṇahŏ majjhĕ jo saṃcaraï  $  so paḍijīvantu ṇa ṇīsaraï"
text.3123: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi cintāvaṇṇu pahu  $  thiu tāma jāma uvarambha vahu
text.3124: aṇuratta parokkhae jĕ jasĕṇa  $  jiha mahuari kusuma-gandha-vasĕṇa
text.3125: ṇa gaṇaï kappūru ṇa candamasu  $  ṇa jaladdu ṇa candaṇu tāmarasu
text.3126: tahĕ dasamī kāmāvattha huẏa  $  virahaggi-daḍḍha ṇaü kaha mi muẏa
text.3128: "imu mahu jovvaṇu  $  ĕhu (so) rāvaṇu  $  eha riddhi parivārahŏ
text.3129: jaï melāvahi  $  to halĕ sahi  $  ettiu phalu saṃsārahŏ"
text.3133: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi cittamāla cavaï  $  "maĩ hontiĕ kāĩ ṇa saṃbhavaï
text.3134: āesu dehi chuḍu ettaḍaü  $  ĕu sundari kāraṇu kettaḍaü
text.3135: tuha rūvahŏ rāvaṇu hoi jaï  $  laï vaṭṭaï to ettaḍiẏa gaï"
text.3136: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi maṇahara-aharaẏalu  $  uvarambhahĕ vihasiu muha-kamalu
text.3137: "halĕ halĕ sahi sasimuhi haṃsa-gaï  $  so suhaü ṇa icchaï kaha vi jaï
text.3138: āsāla-vijja to dehi tahŏ  $  aṇṇu vi vajjarahi dasāṇaṇahŏ
text.3139: vuccaï rahaṅgu bhaḍa-liha-luhaṇu  $  indāuhu acchaï suarisaṇu"
text.3140: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi dūī ṇiggaïẏa  $  laṅkesāvāsu ṇavara gaïẏa
text.3142: kahiu dasāsahŏ  $  sura-tāsahŏ  $  jaṃ uvarambhaĕ vuttaü
text.3143: ettiu "dāheṇa  $  tuha virahĕṇa  $  sāmiṇi maraï" ṇiruttaü
text.3147: uvarambha samicchahi ajju jaï  $  to jaṃ cintahi taṃ saṃbhavaï
text.3148: āsālī sijjhaï puravaru vi  $  suarisaṇu cakku ṇalakuvvaru vi"
text.3149: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi suṭṭhu viẏakkhaṇahŏ  $  avaloiu vaẏaṇu vihīsaṇahŏ
text.3150: païsāriẏa dūī majjaṇaĕ  $  thiẏa ve vi sahoẏara mantaṇaĕ
text.3151: "ahŏ sāhasu pabhaṇaï pahu muẏavi  $  jaṃ mahila karaï taṃ purisu ṇa vi
text.3152: dummahila ji bhīsaṇa jama-ṇaẏari  $  dummahila ji asaṇi jaganta-ẏari
text.3153: dummahila ji sa-visa bhuẏaṅga-phaḍa  $  dummahila ji vaïvasa-mahisa-jhaḍa
text.3154: dummahila ji garuẏa vāhi ṇarahŏ  $  dummahila ji vagghi majjhĕ gharahŏ"
text.3156: bhaṇaï vihīsaṇu  $  suha-daṃsaṇu  $  "etthu eu ṇaü ghaṭṭaï
text.3157: sāmi ṇisaṇṇahŏ  $  ṇaü aṇṇahŏ  $  bheẏahŏ avasaru vaṭṭaï
text.3161: jaï kāraṇu vaïriṃ siddhaĕṇa  $  ṇaẏareṃ dhaṇa-kaṇaẏa-samiddhaĕṇa
text.3162: to kavaḍeṇa vi "icchāmi" bhaṇu  $  puṇṇāli asacci dosu kavaṇu
text.3163: chuḍu kema vi vijja samāvaḍaü  $  uvarambha tujjhu puṇu mā ''vaḍaü"
text.3164: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi gaü dahagīu tahĩ  $  majjaṇaẏahŏ ṇiggaẏa dūi jahĩ
text.3167: avaraï mi devi tosiẏa-maṇĕṇa  $  āsāla-vijja maggiẏa khaṇĕṇa
text.3168: tāĕ vi diṇṇa parituṭṭhiẏāĕ  $  ṇiẏa hāṇi ṇa jāṇiẏa muṭṭhiẏāĕ
text.3170: tāva visāliẏa  $  āsāliẏa  $  ṇahĕ gajjanti parāiẏa
text.3171: taṃ vijjāharu  $  ṇalakuvvaru  $  muĕvi ṇāĩ siẏa āiẏa
text.3175: gaẏa dūī kiu kalaẏalu bhaḍĕhĩ  $  pariveḍhiu puravaru gaẏa-ghaḍĕhĩ
text.3176: saṇṇahĕvi samarĕ ṇicchiẏa-maṇahŏ  $  ṇalakuvvaru bhiḍiu vihīsaṇahŏ
text.3177: valu valahŏ mahāhavĕ dujjaẏahŏ  $  rahu rahahŏ gaïndu mahāgaẏahŏ
text.3178: haü haẏahŏ ṇarāhivu ṇaravarahŏ  $  paharaṇa-dharu vara-paharaṇa-dharahŏ
text.3179: cindhiu cindhiẏahŏ samāvaḍiu  $  vaïmāṇiu vaïmāṇihĕ bhiḍiu
text.3180: tahĩ tumulĕ jujjhĕ bhīsāvaṇĕṇa  $  jiha sahasakiraṇu raṇĕ rāvaṇĕṇa
text.3181: tiha virahu kareviṇu takkhaṇĕṇa  $  ṇalakuvvaru dhariu vihīsaṇĕṇa
text.3182: sahũ purĕṇa siddhu taṃ suarisaṇu  $  uvarambha ṇa icchaï dahavaẏaṇu
text.3184: so jjĕ puresaru  $  ṇalakuvvaru  $  ṇiẏaẏa kera levāviu
text.3185: samaü sarambhaĕ  $  uvarambhaĕ  $  rajju sa iṃ bhu ñjāviu
text.3187: ṇalakuvvare dhariẏaĕ  $  vijaĕ ghuṭṭhĕ vaïrihĕ taṇaĕ
text.3192: je gūḍhapurisa paṭṭhaviẏa teṇa  $  te āẏa paḍīvā takkhaṇeṇa
text.3193: paripucchiẏa "laï akkhahŏ davatti  $  kehaü pahu kehiẏa tāsu satti
text.3194: kiṃ valu kehaü pāikka-lou  $  kiṃ vasaṇu kavaṇu guṇu ko viṇou
text.3195: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi daṇu-guṇa-periehĩ  $  sahasakkhahŏ akkhiu heriehĩ
text.3202: ṇaü kuddhaü luddhaü  $  ko vi bhīru avamāṇiẏaü
text.3203: kā tisraḥ śaktayaḥ prabhūśaktiḥ utsāhaśaktiḥ mantraśaktiś ceti.
text.3204: kā catasro vidyāḥ ānvīkṣikī trayī vārttā daṇḍanītiś ceti. sāṅkhyo yogo lokāyataṃ cānvīkṣikī sāmargyajurvedāstrayī kṛṣiḥ pāśupālyaṃ vāṇijyaṃ vārtā ca ānvīkṣikī-trayī-vārtānāṃ yogakṣemasādhano daṇḍas tasya nītir iti.
text.3206: kiṃ tad ṣaḍvidhaṃ balam mūlabalam bhṛtyabalam śreṇībalam mitrabalam amitrabalam āṭavikabalaṃ ceti.
text.3208: kāni sapta vyasanāni pānam dyūtam strī mṛgayā pāruṣyam daṇḍapāruṣyam arthadūṣaṇaṃ ceti. tatrādau catvāri kāmajāni trīṇi kopajāni.
text.3215: viṇu ṇittiĕ ekku vi paü ṇa dei  $  aṭṭhaviha-viṇoeṃ divasu ṇei
text.3229: jiha divasu tema givvāṇa-rāẏa  $  ṇisi ṇei kareppiṇu aṭṭha bhāẏa
text.3230: pahilaĕ paharaddhĕ vicintamāṇu  $  acchaï ṇigūḍhu purisĕhĩ samāṇu
text.3231: vīẏaĕ puṇo vi ṇhāṇāsaṇeṇa  $  ahavaï ṇaravaï-suha-daṃsaṇeṇa
text.3233: caütthaĕ pañcamĕ sovaṇa-khaṇĕṇa  $  caüdisu diḍheṇa parirakkhaṇeṇa
text.3239: iẏa solaha-bhāĕhĩ  $  divasu vi raẏaṇi vi ṇivvahaï
text.3240: maṇu jujjhahŏ uppari  $  tāsu ṇirāriu ucchahaï
text.3244: tumhahũ ghaĩ ekka vi ṇāhĩ tatti  $  suviṇaĕ vi ṇa huẏa ucchāha-satti
text.3245: vālattaṇĕ jeṃ ṇaü ṇihaü sattu  $  ṇaha-mettu ji kiẏaü kuḍhāra-mettu
text.3246: jaïẏahũ ṇāmaü chuḍu chuḍu dasāsu  $  jaïẏahũ sāhiu vijjā-sahāsu
text.3247: jaïẏahũ karĕ laggaü candahāsu  $  jaïẏahũ mandovari diṇṇa tāsu
text.3248: jaïẏahũ surasundaru vaddhu kaṇaü  $  jaïẏahũ osāriu samarĕ dhaṇaü
text.3249: jaïẏahũ jagabhūsaṇu dhariu ṇāu  $  jaïẏahũ parihaviu kiẏanta-rāu
text.3250: jaïẏahũ su-taṇūẏari gaü harevi  $  aṇṇu vi raẏaṇāvali karĕ dharevi
text.3251: taïẏahũ jĕ ṇāhĩ jaṃ ṇihaü sattu  $  taṃ evahĩ vaḍḍāraü paẏattu"
text.3254: paccelliu huavahu  $  sukkaü pāẏaü suhu ḍahaï"
text.3258: paccuttaru devi gaïnda-gamaṇu  $  puṇu ḍhukku sakku ekkanta-bhavaṇu
text.3259: jahĩ bheu ṇa bhindaï ko vi lou  $  jahĩ sua-sāriẏahũ vi ṇāhĩ ḍhou
text.3260: tahĩ païsĕvi pabhaṇaï amara-rāu  $  "riu dujjaü evahĩ ko uvāu
text.3261: kiṃ sāmu bheu kiṃ uvavaẏāṇu  $  kiṃ daṇḍu avujjhiẏa-paripamāṇu
text.3264: kiṃ kajja-siddhi pañcamaü mantu  $  ko sundaru saccu vi sāravantu"
text.3265: to bhāraduvāeṃ vuttu ema  $  "jaṃ paĩ pāraddhaü taṃ ji deva
text.3266: kajjantĕ ṇavara ṇivvaḍaï cheu  $  para mantihĩ kevalu manta-bheu"
text.3267: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi bhaṇaï visālacakkhu  $  "ĕhu paĩ uggāhiu kavaṇu pakkhu
text.3269: tā acchaü suravaï  $  jo ṇīsesu rajju karaï
text.3270: pahu manti-vihūṇaü  $  caüraṅgihi mi ṇa saṃcaraï
text.3274: pārāsaru pabhaṇaï "vihĩ maṇojju  $  ṇaü ekkeṃ mantiĕ rajja-kajju"
text.3275: pisuṇeṇa vuttu "veṇṇi vi ṇa honti  $  avaropparu ghaḍĕvi ku-mantu denti"
text.3276: kaüṭilleṃ vuccaï "kavaṇa bhanti  $  tiṇṇi vi ceẏāri vi cāru manti"
text.3277: maṇu cavaï "garua vārahahũ vuddhi  $  ṇaü ekkeṃ vihĩ tihĩ kajja-siddhi"
text.3278: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pabhaṇaï amaramanti  $  "aïsundaru jaï solaha havanti"
text.3279: bhiguṇandaṇu vollaï "vuddhivantu  $  akileseṃ vīsahĩ hoi mantu"
text.3280: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi cavaï sahāsaṇaẏaṇu  $  viṇu manti-sahāseṃ mantu kavaṇu
text.3281: aṇṇahŏ aṇṇārisa hoi vuddhi  $  akileseṃ sijjhaï kajja-siddhi"
text.3284: to samaü dasāseṃ  $  sundara sandhi surāhivaï
text.3288: vuha atthasattha pabhaṇanti eva  $  kahĩ labbhaï uttama sandhi deva
text.3289: ekku vi mālihĕ siru khuḍĕvi ghittu  $  aṇṇu vi jaï rāvaṇu hoi mittu
text.3290: to taü paramesara kavaṇa hāṇi  $  ahi asaï to vi sihi mahura-vāṇi
text.3291: jaï sāma-bheẏa-dāṇĕhĩ ji siddhi  $  to daṇḍĕ paüñjiĕ kavaṇa viddhi
text.3292: acchanti vāli-raṇu saṃbharevi  $  suggīva-candakara kuddha ve vi
text.3293: ṇala-ṇīla te vi hiẏavaĕ asuddha  $  suvvanti ṇirāriu attha-luddha
text.3294: khara-dūsaṇā vi ṇiẏa-pāṇa-bhīẏa  $  kajjeṇa jeṇa candaṇahi ṇīẏa
text.3295: māhesarapuravaï-maru ṇarinda  $  avamāṇĕvi vasikiẏa jiha gaïnda
text.3302: taṃ manti-vaẏaṇu paḍivaṇṇu teṇa  $  cittaṅgaü kokkiu takkhaṇeṇa
text.3303: sikkhavaï purandaru kiṃ pi jāma  $  gaü ṇāraü rāvaṇa-bhavaṇu tāma
text.3307: sahũ teṇa mahura-vaẏaṇehĩ teva  $  vollijjaï sandhi ṇa hoi jeva
text.3308: so thovaü tuhũ puṇu pavalu ajju  $  āvaggaü jĕ laï harevi rajju
text.3309: etthu jĕ avasarĕ saṃgāmĕ sakku  $  saṅkijjaï ṇaṃto puṇu asakku
text.3311: maru-jaggĕ dasāṇaṇa  $  jaṃ paĩ vigghahã rakkhiẏaü
text.3312: uvaẏārahŏ tahŏ maĩ  $  parama-bheu ĕhu akkhiẏaü"
text.3316: gaü ṇāraü kahi mi ṇahaṅgaṇeṇa  $  seṇāvaï vuttu dasāṇaṇeṇa
text.3317: "para-gūḍhapurisa ṇa visanti jema  $  parirakkhahi khandhāvāru tema
text.3318: ettaḍiẏa paropparu volla jāva  $  cittaṅgu sa-sandaṇu āu tāva
text.3322: sa-saṇehu samāicchiu karevi  $  ṇiu pāsu ṇarindahŏ karĕ dharevi
text.3323: vaïsaṇaü diṇṇu saṃvāhu thoru  $  cūḍāmaṇi kaṇṭhaü kaḍaü doru
text.3324: pujjeppiṇu kappiṇu guṇa-saẏāĩ  $  puṇu pucchiu "valahũ pamāṇu kāĩ"
text.3327: taṃ kavaṇu dulaṅghaü  $  jaṃ ṇa vi diṭṭhu divāẏarĕṇa
text.3331: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi parituṭṭhu rāu  $  "maĩ cintiu ko vi ku-dūu āu
text.3332: jima sāsaṇaharu jima parimiẏatthu  $  evahĩ muṇio 'si ṇisiddha-atthu
text.3333: dhaṇṇaü suravaï tuhũ jāsu attu  $  vara-pañcavīsa-guṇa-riddhi pattu
text.3334: bhaṇu bhaṇu pesiu kajjeṇa keṇa"  $  vihasevi vuttu cittaṃgaeṇa
text.3335: "pahu sundara amhahũ taṇiẏa vuddhi  $  suhu jīvahũ ve vi karevi sandhi
text.3336: rūvavaï-ṇāma rūveṃ pasaṇṇa  $  pariṇeppiṇu indahŏ taṇiẏa kaṇṇa
text.3337: kari laṅkā-ṇaẏarihĕ vijaẏa-jatta  $  cala lacchi maṇūsahŏ kavaṇa matta
text.3339: imu vaẏaṇu mahāraü  $  tumhahã savvahã thāu maṇĕ
text.3340: jiha mokkhu ku-siddhahŏ  $  tema ṇa sijjhaï indu raṇĕ"
text.3344: taṃ suṇĕvi sattu-saṃtāvaṇeṇa  $  cittaṅgaü pabhaṇiu rāvaṇeṇa
text.3345: "veẏaḍḍhahŏ seḍhihĩ jāĩ tāĩ  $  paṇṇāsa va saṭṭhi vi puravarāĩ
text.3346: savvaĩ mahu appĕvi sandhi karahŏ  $  ṇaṃ to kallaĕ saṃgāmĕ marahŏ"
text.3347: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi paharisiẏaṅgaeṇa  $  dahavaẏaṇu vuttu cittaṅgaeṇa
text.3348: "ekku vi suravaï saẏam eva uggu  $  aṇṇu vi rahaṇeura-ṇaẏaru duggu
text.3349: paribhamiẏaü parihaü tiṇṇi tāsu  $  sarisāu jāu raẏaṇāẏarāsu
text.3350: saṃkama vi caẏāri caüddisāsu  $  caü-vāraĩ ekkekkaĕ sahāsu
text.3351: valavantahũ jantahũ bhīsaṇāhã  $  akkhohaṇi akkhohaṇi ghaṇāhã
text.3353: joẏaṇa-parimāṇeṃ  $  jo ḍhukkaü so ṇaü jiẏaï
text.3354: jiha dujjaṇa-vaẏaṇahũ  $  ko vi ṇa pāsu samilliẏaï
text.3358: jasu ehaü atthi sahāu duggu  $  aṇṇu vi sāhaṇu accanta-uggu
text.3359: jasu aṭṭha lakkha bhaḍḍahũ gaẏāhũ  $  vāraha mandahũ solaha maẏāhũ
text.3360: saṃkiṇṇa-gaïndahũ vīsa lakkha  $  raha-turaẏa-bhaḍahã puṇu ṇatthi saṅkha
text.3361: ehaü pahilāraü mūla-seṇṇu  $  valu vīẏaü bhiccahã taṇaü aṇṇu
text.3362: taïẏaü seṇī-valu duṇṇivāru  $  caüthaü mitta-valu aṇāẏa-pāru
text.3363: dujjaü pañcamaü amitta-seṇṇu  $  chaṭṭhaü āḍaviu aṇāẏa-gaṇṇu
text.3364: rāvaṇa puṇu vūhahã ṇāhĩ cheu  $  amarā vi valahã ṇa muṇanti bheu"
text.3365: haẏa-gaẏa-raha-ṇara-jujjhahũ taheva  $  so suravaï jijjaï samarĕ keva"
text.3367: vuccaï dahavaẏaṇeṃ  $  "jaï taṃ jiṇami ṇa āhaẏaṇĕ
text.3372: indaï pabhaṇaï "sura-sāra-bhūa  $  kiṃ jampieṇa vahaveṇa dūa
text.3373: jaṃ kiu jama-dhaṇaẏahũ vihi mi tāhã  $  jaṃ sahasakiraṇa-ṇalakuvvarāhã
text.3374: taṃ tuha vi karesaï tāu ajju  $  lahu ṭhāu purandaru jujjha-sajju"
text.3375: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi uṭṭhantaeṇa  $  cittaṅgeṃ vuccaï jantaeṇa
text.3376: "ṇimmantio 'si indeṇa deva  $  vijaẏanteṃ indaï tuhu mi teva
text.3377: sirimāli kumārĕhĩ sasidhaehĩ  $  suggīva tuhu mi sīhaddhaehĩ
text.3379: someṇa vihīsaṇa kumbhaẏaṇṇa  $  avarehi mi kehi mi ke vi aṇṇa
text.3386: gaü ema bhaṇĕvi cittaṅgu tetthu  $  sura-parimiu suravara-rāu jetthu
text.3387: "paramesara dujjaü jāuhāṇu  $  ṇa karei sandhi tumhĕhĩ samāṇu"
text.3388: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pavalu arāi-pakkhu  $  saṇṇajjhaï sarahasu dasasaẏakkhu
text.3389: haẏa bheri-tūra paḍu paḍaha vajja  $  kiẏa matta mahāgaẏa sāri-sajja
text.3390: pakkhariẏa turaṅgama jutta saẏaḍa  $  jasa-luddha kuddha saṇṇaddha suhaḍa
text.3392: kiṃpurisa garuḍa gandhavva jakkha  $  kiṇṇara ṇara amara viralliẏakkha
text.3393: jaṃ ṇaẏara-paolihĩ valu ṇa māi  $  taṃ ṇahaẏaleṇa uppaĕvi jāi
text.3401: thiu aggaĕ pacchaĕ bhaḍa-samūhu  $  seṇāvaï-mantihĩ raïu vūhu
text.3402: suravara sa-pavara-paharaṇa karāla  $  ghaṇa-kakkhahĩ pakkhahĩ loẏavāla
text.3403: ḍasiẏāhara rattuppala-dalakkha  $  gaĕ gaĕ paṇṇāraha gatta-rakkha
text.3404: haẏa pañca pañca cañcala valagga  $  bhaḍa tiṇṇi tiṇṇi haĕ haĕ sa-khagga
text.3405: ĕu jettiu rakkhaṇu gaẏavarāsu  $  tettiu jĕ puṇu vi thiu rahavarāsu
text.3406: caüdaha aṅgulihĩ ṇaro ṇarāsu  $  raẏaṇihĩ tihĩ tihĩ haü haẏavarāsu
text.3407: pañcahĩ pañcahĩ gaü gaẏavarāsu  $  dhāṇukkiu chahĩ dhāṇukkiẏāsu
text.3409: taṃ vūhu raeppiṇu  $  bhīsaṇu tūra-vamālu kiu
text.3410: samaraṅgaṇĕ meiṇi  $  sakku sa iṃ bhū sevi thiu
text.3412: mantaṇaĕ samattaĕ  $  dūĕ ṇiẏattaĕ  $  ubhaẏa-valahã amarisu caḍaï
text.3417: kiẏa kari sāri-sajja pakkhariẏa turaẏa-thaṭṭā  $  ubbhiẏa dhaẏa-ṇihāẏa sa-vimāṇa raha paẏaṭṭā
text.3419: hattha-pahattha karĕvi seṇāvaï  $  diṇṇu paẏāṇaü pacaliu ṇaravaï
text.3422: raṇa-raseṇa bhijjanta padhāiẏa  $  ṇiviseṃ samara-bhūmi saṃpāviẏa
text.3423: pañcahĩ dhaṇu-saehĩ pahu deppiṇu  $  riu-vūhahŏ paḍivūhu raeppiṇu
text.3425: jāu mahāhaü bhuvaṇa-bhaẏaṅkaru  $  uṭṭhiu raü maïlantu diẏantaru
text.3428: jiha kulaĩ duputteṃ  $  tiha vaḍḍhanteṃ  $  veṇṇi vi seṇṇaĩ maïliẏaĩ
text.3436: tāhĩ asesu disāmuhu sittaü  $  thiu ṇahu ṇāĩ kusumbhaĕ ghittaü
text.3437: aṇṇaü pariẏattaü gaẏaṇaṅgahŏ  $  ṇaṃ ghusiṇoliu ṇaha-siri-aṅgahŏ
text.3439: kari-sira-muttāhalĕhĩ vimīsiẏa  $  sañjha va tārāiṇṇa padīsiẏa
text.3440: raha khuppanti vahanti ṇa cakkaĩ  $  vāhaṇa-jāṇa-vimāṇaĩ thakkaĩ
text.3442: tehaĕ vi mahāraṇĕ  $  meiṇi-kāraṇĕ  $  rattĕ tarantĕ taranti ṇara
text.3443: jujjhanti sa-macchara  $  tosiẏa-acchara  $  ṇāĩ mahaṇṇavĕ vāriẏara
text.3448: jāuhāṇa-sāhaṇu paḍipelliu  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-sāẏareṇa jagu relliu
text.3449: ṇisiẏara paribhamanti paharaṇa-bhua  $  ṇaṃ āvatta-chuddha jala-vuvvuva
text.3451: pekkhĕvi utthallantaĩ chattaĩ  $  matta-gaẏahũ bhijjantaĩ gattaĩ
text.3457: ṇara-haẏa-gaẏa tajjĕvi  $  raha-dhaẏa bhañjĕvi  $  vūhahŏ majjhĕ païṭṭhu kiha
text.3458: vammĕhĩ vindhantaü  $  jīviu lintaü  $  kāmiṇi-hiẏaü viẏaḍḍhu jiha
text.3462: suravara-kiṅkarehĩ uttharĕvi ahimuhehiṃ  $  laïu pasaṇṇakitti tikkhehĩ silimuhehiṃ
text.3464: rahavaru vāhiu suravara-vandahŏ  $  paḍhamaü bhiṭṭu mahāhavĕ candahŏ
text.3466: "arĕ sa-kalaṅka vaṅka mahilāṇaṇa  $  puraü ma thāhi jāhi maẏalañchaṇa"
text.3467: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi okhaṇḍiẏa-māṇaü  $  lhasiu miẏaṅku thakku jamarāṇaü
text.3469: so vi samuttharantu daṇu-duṭṭhaü  $  kiu ṇivisaddheṃ pārāuṭṭhaü
text.3470: tāma kuveru thakku savaḍammuhu  $  kiu ṇārāĕhĩ so vi parammuhu
text.3472: sirimāli dhaṇuddharu  $  raṇamuhĕ duddharu  $  dharĕvi ṇa sakkiu suravarĕhĩ
text.3473: saṃtāu karantaü  $  pāṇa harantaü  $  vammahu jema ku-muṇivarĕhĩ
text.3477: bhaggĕ kiẏantĕ samarĕ to sasi-kuvera-rāe  $  kesari-kaṇaẏa-huavahā mallavanta-jāe
text.3478: tiṇṇi vi bhiḍiẏa khattu āmellĕvi  $  dhaẏa-dhūvanta mahāraha pellĕvi
text.3479: tīhi mi samakaṇḍiu raẏaṇīẏaru  $  ṇaṃ dhārāhara-ghaṇĕhĩ mahīharu
text.3480: saravara-saravarehĩ viṇivāriẏa  $  tiṇṇi vi puṭṭhi denta osāriẏa
text.3481: amara-kumāra ṇavara uddhāiẏa  $  riu jiha ekkahĩ milĕvi parāiẏa
text.3483: addhasasīhĩ sīsa ucchiṇṇaĩ  $  ṇaṃ ṇīluppalāĩ vikkhiṇṇaĩ
text.3484: jaü jaü jāuhāṇu parisakkaï  $  taü taü ahimuhu ko vi ṇa thakkaï
text.3485: ṇiĕvi kumāra-siraĩ chijjantaĩ  $  raṇa-devaẏahĕ vali va dijjantaĩ
text.3487: sahasakkhu virujjhaï  $  kira saṇṇajjhaï  $  tāva jaẏanteṃ diṇṇu rahu
text.3488: "maĩ tāẏa jiẏanteṃ  $  suhaḍa-kaẏanteṃ  $  appuṇu paharaṇu dharahi kahu"
text.3492: jaẏakārevi suravaïṃ dhāio jaẏanto  $  "ṇisiẏara thāhi thāhi kahĩ jāhi mahu jiẏanto
text.3493: vāhi vāhi savaḍammuhu sandaṇu  $  haũ dhava demi purandara-ṇandaṇu
text.3499: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi sirimāli paharisiu  $  suravaï-suahŏ mahārahu darisiu
text.3500: "paĩ melleppiṇu jaẏa-siri-lāhavĕ  $  ko mahu aṇṇu dei dhava āhavĕ"
text.3502: to eva visesĕvi  $  sara saṃpesĕvi  $  chiṇṇu jaẏantahŏ taṇaü dhaü
text.3503: gaẏaṇaṅgaṇa-lacchihĕ  $  kamala-dalacchihĕ  $  hāru ṇāĩ ucchalĕvi gaü
text.3508: eu ṇa jāṇahũ kahĩ gaü sandaṇu  $  cukkaü kaha vi kaha vi sura-ṇandaṇu
text.3509: dukkhu dukkhu mucchā-vihalaṅghalu  $  uṭṭhiu uddha-suṇḍu ṇaṃ maẏagalu
text.3511: so vi pahāra-vihuru ṇicceẏaṇu  $  muccha parāiu pasariẏa-ceẏaṇu
text.3512: dhāiu dhuṇĕvi sarīru raṇaṅgaṇĕ  $  kūra-mahāgahu ṇāĩ ṇahaṅgaṇĕ
text.3513: viṇṇi mi dujjaẏa duddhara pavaẏala  $  viṇṇi mi bhīma-gaẏāsaṇi-karaẏala
text.3514: veṇṇi mi paribhamanti ṇaha-maṇḍalĕ  $  līha dinti rāvaṇĕ ākhaṇḍalĕ
text.3517: āhaü vacchatthalĕ  $  paḍiu rasāẏalĕ  $  pāṇa-vivajjiu raẏaṇiẏaru
text.3518: jaü jāu jaẏantahŏ  $  ṇisiẏara-tantahŏ  $  ghittu ṇāĩ sirĕ raẏa-ṇiẏaru
text.3522: jaṃ sirimāli pāḍio amara-ṇandaṇeṇaṃ  $  tā indaï padhāvio samaü sandaṇeṇaṃ
text.3523: "arĕ duvviẏaḍḍha  $  mama tāu vahĕvi kahĩ jāhi saṇḍha
text.3524: valu valu haẏāsa  $  maĩ jīvamāṇĕ kahĩ jīviẏāsa"
text.3525: vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa  $  karĕ dhaṇuharu kiu sura-ṇandaṇeṇa
text.3526: utthariẏa ve vi  $  samaraṅgaṇĕ sara-maṇḍavu karevi
text.3529: rakkhiu sarīru  $  kaha kaha vi ṇāhĩ kappariu vīru
text.3530: uppaĕvi jāma  $  kira dharaï purandaru pattu tāma
text.3533: "arĕ arivara-maddaṇa  $  rāvaṇa-ṇandaṇa  $  uvariṃ vali cārahaḍi jaï"
text.3537: khattu muevi savvĕhiṃ bhiuḍi-bhāsurehiṃ  $  laṅkāhivahŏ ṇandaṇo veḍhio surehiṃ
text.3538: veḍhiu ekku aṇantĕhĩ rāvaṇi  $  to vi ṇa gaṇaï suhaḍa-cūḍāmaṇi
text.3539: rokkaï valaï dhāi abbhiṭṭaï  $  riu paṇṇāsa-saṭṭhi dalavaṭṭaï
text.3540: sandaṇa sandaṇeṇa saṃcūraï  $  gaẏavara gaẏavareṇa musumūraï
text.3541: turaü turaṅgameṇa viṇivāẏaï  $  ṇaravara ṇaravara-ghāeṃ ghāẏaï
text.3542: jāma viẏambhaï savvāẏāmeṃ  $  tāva su-sārahi sammaï-ṇāmeṃ
text.3544: aṇṇu vi rāvaṇi laïu akhatteṃ  $  veḍhiu suravara-valĕṇa samatteṃ
text.3545: dujjaü jaï vi mahāhavĕ sakkaï  $  ekku aṇeẏa jiṇĕvi kiṃ sakkaï"
text.3547: teṃ vaẏaṇeṃ rāvaṇu  $  jaṇa-jūrāvaṇu  $  caḍiu mahārahĕ khagga-karu
text.3548: lakkhijjaï devĕhĩ  $  vahu-avalevĕhĩ  $  ṇāĩ kiẏantu jagantaẏaru
text.3552: dūrattheṇa ṇisiẏarindeṇa suravarindo  $  sīheṇa viruddheṇaṃ joio gaïndo
text.3553: "sārahi vāhi vāhi rahu tettahĕ  $  āẏavattu āpaṇḍuru jettahĕ
text.3554: jettahĕ aïrāvaṇu galagajjaï  $  jettahĕ bhīsaṇa dunduhi vajjaï
text.3555: jettahĕ suravaï sura-pariẏariẏaü  $  jettahĕ vajja-daṇḍu karĕ dhariẏaü
text.3556: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi sammaï ucchāhiu  $  pūriu saṅkhu mahārahu vāhiu
text.3557: kiu kalaẏalu diṇṇaĩ raṇa-tūraĩ  $  hasiẏaĩ saṇi-jama-muhaĩ va kūraĩ
text.3558: samaru ghuṭṭhu valaï mi abbhiṭṭaĩ  $  raṇa-rasiẏaĩ saṇṇāha-visaṭṭaĩ
text.3560: raha rahavarahũ paropparu dhāiẏa  $  pāẏālahũ pāẏāla parāiẏa
text.3563: bhiḍiẏaĩ a-ṇiviṇṇaĩ  $  veṇṇi vi seṇṇaĩ  $  mihuṇaĩ jĕma aṇurattāĩ
text.3567: jāu mahantu āhavo vihĩ vihĩ jaṇāhũ  $  indaï-indataṇaẏahũ inda-rāvaṇāhũ
text.3577: kari-kumbha-vikattaṇu  $  gañjolliẏa-taṇu  $  jo raṇĕ jāsu samāvaḍiu
text.3578: so tāsu samaccharu  $  tosiẏa-accharu  $  girihĕ davaggi va abbhiḍiu
text.3582: ko vi kivāṇa-pāṇie suravahū ṇievi  $  ṇa muaï maṇḍalaggu paharaṃ samallievi
text.3583: ko vi ṇīsarantanta-cubbhalo  $  bhamaï matta-hatthi va sa-saṅkhalo
text.3586: ko vi khuḍiẏa-sīso dhaṇuddharo  $  valaï dhāi vindhaï sa-maccharo
text.3588: soṇiẏāruṇo sahaï ṇaravaro  $  ratta-kamala-puñjo vva sa-bhamaro
text.3589: ko vi ekka-calaṇe turaṅgame  $  hari va viṭṭhio ṇa bharie kame
text.3590: ko vi siraüḍe karĕvi karaẏale  $  jujjha-bhikkha maggei para-vale
text.3592: bhaḍu ko vi paḍitthiru  $  ṇivvaṭṭiẏa-siru  $  soṇiẏa-dhārucchaliẏa-taṇu
text.3593: lakkhijjaï dāruṇu  $  sindūrāruṇu  $  phagguṇĕ ṇāĩ sahasakiraṇu
text.3597: kattha i matta-kuñjarā jīvieṇa cattā  $  kasaṇa-mahāghaṇa vva dīsanti dharaṇi-pattā
text.3598: kattha i sa-visāṇaĩ kumbhaẏalaĩ  $  ṇaṃ raṇavahu-ukkhalaĩ sa-musalaĩ
text.3599: kattha i haẏa karavālahĩ khaṇḍiẏa  $  anta-lalanta khalanta pahiṇḍiẏa
text.3600: kattha i chattaĩ haẏaĩ visālaĩ  $  ṇaṃ jama-bhoẏaṇĕ diṇṇaĩ thālaĩ
text.3601: kattha i suhaḍa-sirāĩ paloṭṭaĩ  $  ṇāĩ a-ṇālaĩ ṇava-kandoṭṭaĩ
text.3602: kattha i raha-cakkaĩ vicchiṇṇaĩ  $  kali-kālahŏ āsaṇaĩ va diṇṇaĩ
text.3603: kattha vi bhaḍahŏ sivaṅgaṇa ḍhukkiẏa  $  "hiẏavaü ṇāhĩ" bhaṇevi uḍhukkiẏa
text.3604: kattha vi giddhu kavandhĕ pariṭṭhiu  $  ṇaṃ ahiṇava-siru suhaḍu samuṭṭhiu
text.3605: kattha i giddheṃ maṇusu ṇa khaddhaü  $  vāṇĕhĩ cañcuhĩ bheu ṇa laddhaü
text.3607: kattha i ṇara-ruṇḍĕhĩ  $  kara-kama-tuṇḍĕhĩ  $  samara-vasundhari bhīsaṇiẏa
text.3608: vahu-khaṇḍa-paẏārĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ sūārĕhĩ  $  raïẏa rasoi jamahŏ taṇiẏa
text.3612: tahĩ tehaĕ mahāhavĕ kiẏa-mahocchavehiṃ  $  kokkiu ekkamekku laṅkesa-vāsavehiṃ
text.3613: "urĕ urĕ sakka sakka parisakkahi  $  jiha ṇiṭṭhaviu māli tiha thakkahi
text.3614: haũ so rāvaṇu bhuvaṇa-bhaẏaṅkaru  $  suravara-kula-kiẏantu raṇĕ duddharu"
text.3615: taṃ ṇisuṇevi valiu ākhaṇḍalu  $  pacchāẏantu sarĕhĩ ṇaha-maṇḍalu
text.3616: dahamuho vi utthariu sa-maccharu  $  kiu sara-jālu sarĕhĩ saẏa-sakkaru
text.3617: to etthantarĕ haẏa-paḍivakkheṃ  $  saru aggeu mukku sahasakkheṃ
text.3618: dhāiu dhagadhagantu dhūmantaü  $  cindhĕhĩ chatta-dhaĕhĩ laggantaü
text.3626: uvasamie huāsaṇe vaẏaṇa-bhāsureṇaṃ  $  vahala-tamoha-paharaṇaṃ pesiẏaṃ sureṇaṃ
text.3627: kiu andhāraü teṇa raṇaṅgaṇu  $  kiṃ pi ṇa dekkhaï ṇisiẏara-sāhaṇu
text.3628: jimbhaï aṅgu valaï ṇiddāẏaï  $  suaï aceẏaṇu osuviṇāẏaï
text.3629: pekkhĕvi ṇiẏa-valu oṇallantaü  $  melliu diṇaẏaratthu pajalantaü
text.3630: amarāhivĕṇa rāhu-vara-paharaṇu  $  ṇāga-pāsa sara muaï dasāṇaṇu
text.3631: pavara-bhuaṅga-sahāsĕhĩ daṭṭhaü  $  sura-valu pāṇa laevi paṇaṭṭhaü
text.3636: mellĕvi riu-ghāẏaṇu  $  saru ṇārāẏaṇu  $  tijagavihūsaṇĕ gaĕ caḍiu
text.3637: jettahĕ aïrāvaṇu  $  tettahĕ rāvaṇu  $  jāĕvi indahŏ abbhiḍiu
text.3641: matta gaïnda dovi ubbhiṇṇa-kasaṇa-dehā  $  ṇaṃ gajjanta dhanta sama-uttharanta mehā
text.3650: maẏagalĕhĩ mahantĕhĩ  $  vihi mi bhamantĕhĩ  $  suravaï-laṅkāhivĕ pavara
text.3651: bhava-bhavaṇĕhĩ chūḍhī  $  ṇaṃ mahi mūḍhī  $  bhamaï sa-sāẏara sa-dharadhara
text.3655: tijagavihūsaṇeṇa kiu sura-karī ṇirattho  $  pariosiẏa ṇisāẏarā lhasiu vaïri-sattho
text.3657: bhamĕvi ṇa sakkiu karivaru khañciu  $  rakkheṃ saẏavāraü pariẏañciu
text.3658: gaü gaeṇa pahu pahuṇoṭṭhaddhaü  $  jhampa devi aṃsuĕṇa ṇivaddhaü
text.3659: vijaü ghuṭṭhu raẏaṇīẏara-sāhaṇĕ  $  devĕhĩ dunduhi diṇṇa divaṅgaṇĕ
text.3660: tāva jaẏantu dasāṇaṇa-jāeṃ  $  āṇiu vandhĕvi vāhu-sahāeṃ
text.3661: jamu suggīveṃ dūsama-sīleṃ  $  aṇalu ṇaleṇa aṇilu raṇĕ ṇīleṃ
text.3662: khara-dūsaṇĕhĩ citta-cittaṅgaẏa  $  ravi sasi levi āẏa aṅgaṅgaẏa
text.3663: suravara-guru maeṇa ṇibbhicceṃ  $  laïu kuveru samarĕ māricceṃ
text.3665: jo jasu utthariẏaü  $  so teṃ dhariẏaü  $  geṇhĕvi pavara-vandi-saẏaĩ
text.3666: gaü suravara-ḍāmaru  $  puru ajarāmaru  $  jiṇu jiha jiṇĕvi mahābhaẏaĩ
text.3670: laṅka purandare ṇie jaẏa-sirī-ṇivāso  $  sahasāreṇa patthio patthivo dasāso
text.3672: taṃ ṇisuṇevi bhaṇaï sura-vandhaṇu  $  "tumha vi amha vi eu ṇivandhaṇu
text.3673: jamu talavaru paripālaü paṭṭaṇu  $  paṅgaṇu ṇikkiu karaü pahañjaṇu
text.3674: puppha-paẏaru gharĕ deu vaṇāsaï  $  sahũ gandhavvĕhĩ gāẏaü sarasaï
text.3675: vattha-sahāsaĩ havi pakkhālaü  $  kosu asesu kuveru ṇihālaü
text.3676: joṇha kareu miẏaṅku ṇirantaru  $  sīẏalu ṇahaẏalĕ tavaü divāẏaru
text.3677: amararāu majjaṇaü bharāvaü  $  aṇṇu vi ghaṇĕhĩ chaḍaü devāvaü"
text.3678: taṃ paḍivaṇṇu savvu sahasāreṃ  $  mukku sakku laṅkālaṅkāreṃ
text.3680: ṇiẏa-rajju vivajjĕvi  $  gaü pavvajjĕvi  $  sāsaẏapurahŏ sahasaṇaẏaṇu
text.3681: jaẏa-siri-vahu maṇḍĕvi  $  thiu avaruṇḍĕvi  $  sa ĩ bhu ẏa-phalihĕhĩ dahavaẏaṇu
text.3683: jāṇaha "rā va ṇa vi ja ẏaṃ" sattārahaṃ imaṃ pavvaṃ
text.3685: raṇĕ māṇu malevi purandarahŏ  $  pariẏañcĕvi siharaĩ mandarahŏ
text.3686: āvaï vi paḍīvaü jāma pahu  $  tāṇantarĕ diṭṭhu aṇantarahu
text.3692: "bhaḍa-bhañjaṇa bhuvaṇucchaliẏa-ṇāma  $  uhu kalaẏalu summaï kāĩ māma"
text.3693: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pabhaṇaï samara-dhīru  $  "ĕhu jaï ṇāmeṇa aṇantavīru
text.3695: uppaṇṇaü eẏahŏ etthu ṇāṇu  $  uhu dīsaï devāgamu sa-jāṇu"
text.3696: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu ṇisiẏarindu  $  gaü tettahĕ jettahĕ muṇivarindu
text.3697: pariẏañcĕvi ṇavĕvi thuṇĕvi ṇiviṭṭhu  $  saẏalu vi jaṇu vaẏaĩ laẏantu diṭṭhu
text.3699: mahavaẏaĩ ko vi kŏ vi aṇuvaẏaĩ  $  kŏ vi sikkhāvaẏaĩ guṇavvaẏaĩ
text.3700: kŏ vi diḍhu sammattu laevi thiu  $  para rāvaṇu ekku ṇa uvasamiu
text.3704: dhammarahu mahārisi bhaṇaï tetthu  $  "maṇuẏattu lahĕvi vaïsarĕvi etthu
text.3705: ahŏ dahamuha mohandhārĕ chūḍha  $  raẏaṇāẏarĕ raẏaṇu ṇa lehi mūḍha
text.3706: amiẏālaĕ amiu ṇa lehi kema  $  acchahi ṇihuaü kaṭṭhamaü jema"
text.3707: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu dasasireṇa  $  vuccaï thottuggīriẏa-gireṇa
text.3708: "sakkami dhūmaddhaĕ jhampa devi  $  sakkami phaṇa-phaṇimaṇi-raẏaṇu levi
text.3709: sakkami giri-mandaru ṇiddalevi  $  sakkami dasa disi-vaha daramalevi
text.3710: sakkami māruu poṭṭalĕ chuhevi  $  sakkami jama-mahisĕ samāruhevi
text.3711: sakkami raẏaṇāẏara-jalu pievi  $  sakkami āsīvisu ahi ṇievi
text.3713: sakkami sakkahŏ raṇĕ uttharĕvi  $  sakkami sasi-sūrahã paha harĕvi
text.3714: sakkami mahi gaẏaṇu ekku karĕvi  $  duddharu ṇaü sakkami vaü dharĕvi
text.3718: paricintĕvi suiru ṇarāhiveṇa  $  "laï lemi ekku vaü" vuttu teṇa
text.3719: "jaṃ maĩ ṇa samicchaï cāru-gattu  $  taṃ maṇḍa laemi ṇa para-kalattu"
text.3720: gaü ema bhaṇeppiṇu ṇiẏaẏa-ṇaẏaru  $  thiu acalu rajju bhuñjantu khaẏaru
text.3721: ettahĕ vi mahindu mahinda-ṇāmĕ  $  puravarĕ icchiẏa-aṇuhūa-kāmĕ
text.3722: tahŏ hiẏaẏaveẏa ṇāmeṇa bhajja  $  tahĕ duhiẏañjaṇasundari maṇojja
text.3723: jhinduĕṇa ramantihĕ thaṇa ṇievi  $  thiu ṇaravaï muhĕ kara-kamalu devi
text.3724: uppaṇṇa cinta "kahŏ kaṇṇa demi  $  laï vaṭṭaï giri-kaïlāsu ṇemi
text.3725: vijjāhara-saẏaĩ milanti jetthu  $  varu avaseṃ hosaï ko vi tetthu"
text.3727: gaü ema bhaṇĕvi pahu pavvaẏahŏ  $  jiṇa-aṭṭhāhiĕ aṭṭhāvaẏahŏ
text.3728: āvāsiu pāsĕhĩ ṇīẏaḍĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ tārāẏaṇu mandara-taḍĕhĩ
text.3732: ettahĕ vi tāva palhāẏa-rāu  $  sahũ keumaïĕ ravipurahŏ āu
text.3733: sa-vimāṇu sa-sāhaṇu sa-parivāru  $  aṇṇu vi tahĩ pavaṇañjaẏa-kumāru
text.3734: ekkattahĕ dūsāvāsu laïu  $  ṇaṃ vandaṇahattiĕ indu aïu
text.3735: avara vi je je āsaṇṇa-bhavva  $  te te vijjāhara miliẏa savva
text.3737: diṇĕ vīẏaĕ vihi mi ṇarāhivāhã  $  mittaïẏa paropparu hūa tāhã
text.3738: palhāeṃ kheḍu karevi vuttu  $  "taü taṇiẏa kaṇṇa mahu taṇaü puttu
text.3739: ki ṇa kīraï pāṇiggahaṇu rāẏa"  $  taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi teṇa vi diṇṇa vāẏa
text.3740: pariosu pavaḍḍhiu sajjaṇāhã  $  maïliẏaĩ muhaĩ khala-dujjaṇāhã
text.3743: taïẏaĕ vāsarĕ pāṇiggahaṇu"  $  gaẏa ṇaravaï ṇiẏaẏa-ṇiẏaẏa-bhavaṇu
text.3748: ṇaü visahaï taïẏaü divasu entu  $  acchaï virahāṇalĕ jhampa dentu
text.3749: dhūmāi valaï dhagadhagaï cittu  $  ṇaṃ mandiru abbhantarĕ palittu
text.3752: ṇiḍḍahaï aṅguvaṅgaĩ aṇaṅgu  $  sajjaṇa-hiẏaẏāĩ va pisuṇa-saṅgu
text.3753: ṇīsasaï sasaï vevaï tameṇa  $  dhāhāvaï dhāhā pañcameṇa
text.3756: pāseu valaggaï lhasaï taṇu  $  taṃ iṅgiu pekkhavi aṇṇa-maṇu
text.3757: pabhaṇiu pahasiĕṇa ṇievi muhu  $  "kiṃ duvvalihuẏaü kumāra tuhũ"
text.3762: "bho ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇa cāru-citta  $  ṇaü visahaũ taïẏaü divasu mitta
text.3763: jaï ajju ṇa lakkhiu piẏahĕ vaẏaṇu  $  to kallaĕ mahu ṇittulaü maraṇu"
text.3764: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vuccaï pahasieṇa  $  kamaleṇa va vaẏaṇeṃ pahasieṇa
text.3765: "phaṇi-sira-raẏaṇeṇa vi ṇāhĩ gaṇṇu  $  ĕu kāraṇu kettiu jeṃ visaṇṇu
text.3766: kiṃ pavaṇahŏ kavaṇu vi duppavesu"  $  gaẏa veṇṇi vi raẏaṇihĩ tappa-vesu
text.3767: thiẏa jāla-gavakkhaĕ diṭṭha vāla  $  ṇaṃ maẏaṇa-vāṇa-dhaṇu-toṇa-sāla
text.3768: māro vi maraï viraheṇa jāhĕ  $  ko vaṇṇĕvi sakkaï rūvu tāhĕ
text.3770: taṃ vahu pekkhĕvi paritosiĕṇa  $  varaïttu pasaṃsiu pahasiĕṇa
text.3771: "taü jīviu sahalu aṇanta siẏa  $  jasu karĕ laggesaï eha tiẏa"
text.3775: etthantarĕ aṭṭhami-canda-bhāla  $  muhu joĕvi cavaï vasantamāla
text.3776: "sahalaü taü māṇusa-jammu māĕ  $  bhattāru pahañjaṇu laddhu jāĕ"
text.3777: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi dummuha duṭṭha-vesa  $  siru vihuṇĕvi bhaṇaï vi mīsakesa
text.3778: "sodāmaṇipahu pahu pariharevi  $  thiu pavaṇu kavaṇu guṇu saṃbharevi
text.3779: jaṃ antaru gopaẏa-sāẏarāhũ  $  jaṃ joiṅgaṇahã divāẏarāhũ
text.3784: āĕhĩ ālāvĕhĩ kuviu ṇaru  $  thiu bhīsaṇu ukkhaẏa-khagga-karu
text.3785: "kiṃ vaẏaṇĕhĩ vahuĕhĩ vāhirĕhĩ  $  riu rakkhaü vihi mi lemi siraĩ"
text.3789: kaḍuakkhareṇa paribhāsireṇa  $  karĕ dhariu pahañjaṇu pahasieṇa
text.3790: "jaṃ kari-sira-raẏaṇujjaliẏa(?) deva  $  taṃ asivaru maïlahi etthu kema
text.3791: lajjijjahi vollahi ṇāĩ mukkhu"  $  ṇiu ṇiẏa-āvāsahŏ dukkhu dukkhu
text.3792: dasa-varisa-sarisa gaẏa raẏaṇi tāsu  $  ravi uggaü pasariẏa-kara-sahāsu
text.3793: kokkāvevi ṇaravaï pavara vara (?)  $  haẏa bheri paẏāṇaü diṇṇu ṇavara
text.3795: saṃcallaï paü paü jema jema  $  kappijjaï hiẏavaü tema tema
text.3796: tehaĕ avasarĕ vahu-jāṇaehĩ  $  kara-caraṇa dhareppiṇu rāṇaehĩ
text.3798: vali-vaṇḍa maṇḍa pariẏattiẏaü  $  teṇa vi uvāu paricintiẏaü
text.3799: "laï ekkavāra karaẏalĕ dharĕvĩ  $  puṇu vāraha varisaĩ pariharĕvĩ"
text.3803: to dukkhu dukkhu dummiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  kiu pāṇiggahaṇu pahañjaṇeṇa
text.3804: thiu vāraha varisaĩ pariharevi  $  ṇavi suaï ālavaï suiṇave(?) vi
text.3805: vāre vi ṇa jāi ṇa (?) jema jema  $  khijjaï jhijjaï puṇu tema tema
text.3806: ḍajjhantaü uru virahāṇaleṇa  $  ṇaṃ vujjhāvaï aṃsua-jaleṇa
text.3808: ḍhillaĩ āharaṇaĩ pariẏalanti  $  ṇaṃ ṇeha-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍaĩ paḍanti
text.3809: gaü ruhiru ṇavara thiu aïṇu atthi  $  ṇaü ṇāvaï jīviu atthi ṇatthi
text.3812: jo dummuhu dūu visajjiẏaü  $  so āẏaü kappa-vivajjiẏaü
text.3813: haẏa samara-bheri rahavarĕ caḍiu  $  raṇĕ rāvaṇu varuṇahŏ abbhiḍiu
text.3818: rājīva-puṇḍarīehĩ pavara  $  khara-dūsaṇa pāḍĕvi dhariẏa ṇavara
text.3819: gaẏa pavaṇa-gamaṇa keṇa vi ṇa diṭṭha  $  sahũ varuṇeṃ jala-duggamĕ païṭṭha
text.3820: "sālaẏahũ ma hosaï kahi mi ghāu"  $  uvveḍhĕvi gaü raẏaṇiẏara-rāu
text.3822: avarekku raṇaṅgaṇĕ dujjaẏāsu  $  paṭṭhaviu lehu pavaṇañjaẏāsu
text.3823: taṃ pekkhĕvi teṇa vi ṇa kiu kheu  $  ṇīsariu sa-sāhaṇu vāu-veu
text.3824: thiẏa añjaṇa kalasu laevi vārĕ  $  ṇibbhacchiẏa "osaru duṭṭha dārĕ"
text.3826: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi aṃsu phusantiẏaĕ  $  vuccaï līhaü kaḍḍhantiẏaĕ
text.3827: "acchanteṃ acchiu jīu mahu  $  janteṃ jāesaï paĩ ji sahũ"
text.3831: taṃ vaẏaṇu paḍiu ṇaṃ asi-pahāru  $  avaheri kareppiṇu gaü kumāru
text.3832: māṇasa-saravarĕ āvāsu mukku  $  atthavaṇahŏ tāma paẏaṅgu ḍhukku
text.3834: cakkī vi diṭṭha viṇu cakkaeṇa  $  vāhijjamāṇa maẏaraddhaeṇa
text.3835: vihuṇanti cañcu paṅkhāhaṇanti  $  virahāura pakkandanti dhanti
text.3836: taṃ ṇiĕvi jāu tahŏ kaluṇa-bhāu  $  "maĩ sarisaü aṇṇu ṇa ko vi pāu
text.3837: ṇa kaẏāi vi joiu ṇiẏa-kalattu  $  acchaï maẏaṇaggi-palitta-gattu
text.3838: pariattĕvi saṃmāṇiu ṇa jāma  $  raṇĕ varuṇahŏ jujjhu ṇa demi tāma"
text.3840: sabbhāu sahāẏahŏ kahiu puṇu  $  pahasiĕṇa vuttu "ĕhu parama-guṇu"
text.3841: uppaĕvi ṇahaṅgaṇĕ ve vi gaẏa  $  ṇaṃ siẏa-ahisiñcaṇĕ matta gaẏa
text.3845: ṇiviseṇa patta añjaṇahĕ bhavaṇu  $  pacchaṇṇu hovi thiu kahi mi pavaṇu
text.3846: gaü pahasiu abbhantarĕ païṭṭhu  $  paṇaveppiṇu puṇu āgamaṇu siṭṭhu
text.3847: "paripuṇṇa maṇoraha ajju devi  $  haũ āẏaü vāukumāru levi"
text.3850: to kiṃ veẏārahi" ruaï jāva  $  saẏam eva kumāru païṭṭhu tāva
text.3851: mahurakkhara viṇaẏālāva lintu  $  āṇandu sokkhu sohaggu dintu
text.3852: pallaṅkĕ caḍiu karĕ levi devi  $  vihasanta-ramantaĩ thiẏaĩ ve vi
text.3854: sa ĩ bhu vahĩ paropparu lintāĩ  $  sarahasu āliṅgaṇu dintāĩ
text.3855: ṇīsandhi-guṇeṇa ṇa ṇāẏāĩ  $  doṇṇi vi ekkaṃ piva jāẏāĩ
text.3857: "pa va ṇa ñja ṇā vi vā ho"  $  aṭṭhārahaṃ imaṃ pavvaṃ
text.3860: "taṃ marusejjahi migaṇaẏaṇi  $  jaṃ maĩ avahatthiẏa bhantaĕṇa"
text.3866: kara maülikareppiṇu viṇṇavaï  $  "raẏasalahĕ gabbhu jaï saṃbhavaï
text.3867: to uttaru kāĩ demi jaṇahŏ  $  ṇa vi sujjhaï eu majjhu maṇahŏ"
text.3868: citteṇa teṇa supariṭṭhavĕvi  $  kaṅkaṇu ahiṇāṇu samallavĕvi
text.3869: gaü ṇaravaï sahũ mitteṇa tahĩ  $  māṇasasarĕ dūsāvāsu jahĩ
text.3870: guruhāra hūa ettahĕ vi saï  $  kokkāvĕvi pabhaṇaï keumaï
text.3871: "ĕu kāĩ kammu paĩ āẏariu  $  ṇimmalu mahinda-kulu dhūsariu
text.3873: taṃ suṇĕvi vasaṃtamāla cavaï  $  "suviṇe vi kalaṅku ṇa saṃbhavaï
text.3875: imu kaṅkaṇu imu parihaṇaü  $  imu kañcīdāmu pahañjaṇahŏ
text.3876: ṇaṃ to kā vi parikkha karĕ  $  parisujjhahũ jeṇa majjhĕ jaṇahŏ"
text.3880: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vevanti samuṭṭhiẏa appuṇu  $  ve vi tāu kasaghāĕhĩ haẏaü puṇuppuṇu
text.3881: "kiṃ jārahŏ ṇāhĩ suvaṇṇu gharĕ  $  jeṃ kaḍaü ghaḍāvĕvi chuhaï karĕ
text.3882: aṇṇu vi ettiu sohaggu kaü  $  jeṃ kaṅkaṇu dei kumāru taü"
text.3884: hakkārĕvi pabhaṇiu kūra-bhaḍu  $  "haẏa jottĕ mahāraha-vīḍhĕ caḍu
text.3886: māhindapurahŏ dūrantarĕṇa  $  parighivavi āu sahũ rahavarĕṇa
text.3887: jiha muahũ ṇa āvaï vatta mahu"  $  taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi sandaṇu juttu lahu
text.3888: gaü ve vi caḍāvĕvi ṇavara tahĩ  $  sāmiṇi-keraü āesu jahĩ
text.3890: ṇaẏarahŏ dūrĕ varantarĕṇa  $  añjaṇa ruvanti oāriẏā
text.3891: "māĕ khamejjahi jāmi haũ"  $  sahũ dhāhaĕ puṇu jokkāriẏā
text.3895: kūra-vīrĕ pariattaĕ ravi atthantao  $  añjaṇāĕ keraü dukkhu va asahantao
text.3896: bhīsaṇa-raẏaṇihĩ bhīsaṇa aḍaï  $  khāi va gilaï va uvari va paḍaï
text.3897: bhibbhiẏaï va bhiṅgārī-ravĕhĩ  $  ruvaï va siva-saddĕhĩ raüravĕhĩ
text.3898: pupphavaï va phaṇi-phukkāraĕhĩ  $  vukkaï va pamaẏa-vukkāraĕhĩ
text.3899: sā dukkhu dukkhu pariẏaliẏa ṇisi  $  diṇaẏarĕṇa pasāhiẏa puvva-disi
text.3900: gaïẏaü ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaru parāiẏaü  $  aggaĕ paḍihāru padhāiẏaü
text.3902: taṃ suṇĕvi jāẏa dihi ṇaravarahŏ  $  "lahu paṭṭaṇĕ haṭṭa-soha karahŏ
text.3905: savva pasāhahŏ matta gaẏa  $  pallāṇahŏ pavara turaṅga-thaḍa
text.3910: bhaṇĕvi ema paḍipucchiu puṇu vaddhāvao  $  "kaï turaṅga kaï rahavara ko volāvao"
text.3911: paḍihāru pavolliu atula-valu  $  "ṇaü ko vi sahāu ṇa kiṃ pi valu
text.3912: añjaṇa vasantamālāĕ sahũ  $  āiẏa para ettiu kahiu mahu
text.3914: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi thiu heṭṭhāmuhaü  $  ṇaṃ ṇaravaï sirĕ vajjeṇa haü
text.3915: "dussīla duṭṭha maṃ païsaraü  $  viṇu kheveṃ ṇaẏarahŏ ṇīsaraü"
text.3916: pabhaṇaï āṇandu manti sucavi  $  "aparikkhiu kijjaï kajju ṇa vi
text.3917: sāsuaü honti viruāriẏaü  $  mahasaïhĕ vi avaguṇa-gāriẏaü
text.3919: sukaï-kahahŏ jiha khala-maïu  $  hima-vaddaliẏaü kamaliṇihĩ jiha
text.3920: honti sahāveṃ vaïriṇiu  $  ṇiẏa-suṇhahã khala-sāsuaü tiha
text.3924: sāsuāṇa suṇhāṇa jaṇe supasiddhaïṃ  $  ekkamekka-vaïrāĩ aṇāi-ṇivaddhaïṃ
text.3925: bhattāru bhaṇesaï jaṃ divasu  $  viruārī hosaï taṃ divasu"
text.3926: vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa mantihĕ taṇĕṇa  $  āruṭṭhu pasaṇṇakitti maṇĕṇa
text.3927: "kiṃ kantaĕ ṇeha-vihūṇiẏaĕ  $  kiṃ kittiĕ vaïrihĩ jāṇiẏaĕ
text.3928: kiṃ su-kahaĕ ṇiralaṅkāriẏaĕ  $  kiṃ dhīẏaĕ lañchaṇa-gāriẏaĕ
text.3929: gharĕ añjaṇa samaraṅgaṇĕ pavaṇu  $  gabbhahŏ saṃvandhu etthu kavaṇu"
text.3930: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇarĕṇa ṇivāriẏaü  $  paḍahaü deppiṇu ṇīsāriẏaü
text.3931: vaṇu gampi païṭṭhaü bhīsaṇaü  $  dhāhāviu pahaṇĕvi appaṇaü
text.3932: "hā vihi hā kāĩ kiẏanta kiu  $  ṇihi darisĕvi loẏaṇa-juẏalu hiu"
text.3934: vihi mi kaluṇu kandantiẏahĩ  $  vaṇĕ dukkheṃ ko va ṇa pelliẏaü
text.3935: sacchandehĩ carantaĕhĩ  $  hariṇehĩ vi dovaü melliẏaü
text.3939: vāravāra soāura rovaï añjaṇā  $  "kā vi ṇāhĩ maĩ jehī dukkhahã bhāẏaṇā
text.3940: sāsuaĕ haẏāsaĕ parihaviẏa  $  hā māĕ paĩ vi ṇaü saṃthaviẏa
text.3941: hā bhāi-jaṇerahŏ ṇiṭṭhurahŏ  $  ṇīsāriẏa kaha ruẏanti purahŏ
text.3942: kulahara-païharahi mi daïẏahu mi  $  pūrantu maṇoraha savvahu mi"
text.3943: gabbhesari jaü jaü saṃcaraï  $  taü taü ruhirahŏ chillaru bharaï
text.3944: tisa-bhukkha-kilāmiẏa catta-suha  $  gaẏa tetthu jetthu paliẏaṅka-guha
text.3945: tahĩ diṭṭhu mahārisi suddhamaï  $  ṇāmeṇa bhaḍāraü amiẏagaï
text.3946: attāvaṇa-tāveṃ tāviẏaü  $  chuḍu jĕ chuḍu joggu khammāviẏaü
text.3947: tahĩ avasarĕ ve vi paḍhukkiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ dukkha-kilesahĩ mukkiẏaü
text.3949: calaṇa ṇaveppiṇu muṇivarahŏ  $  añjaṇa viṇṇavaï luhanti muhu
text.3950: "aṇṇa-bhavantarĕ kāĩ maĩ  $  kiu dukkiu jeṃ aṇuhavami duhu"
text.3954: puṇu vasantamālāĕ vuttu "ṇaü teraü  $  eu savvu phalu eẏahŏ gabbhahŏ keraü"
text.3955: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vigaẏa-rāu bhaṇaï  $  "ĕu gabbhahŏ dosu ṇa saṃbhavaï
text.3956: jaï ghosaï "hosaï taṇaü taü  $  ĕhu carima-dehu raṇĕ laddha-jaü
text.3957: paĩ puvva-bhavantarĕ saĩ karĕṇa  $  jiṇa-paḍima savattihĕ maccharĕṇa
text.3958: parighitta patta taṃ ehu duhu  $  evahĩ pāvesahi saẏala-suhu"
text.3959: gaü ema bhaṇeppiṇu amiẏagaï  $  tāṇantarĕ ḍhukku maẏāhivaï
text.3960: vihuṇiẏa-taṇu dūruggiṇṇa-kamu  $  saṇi asaṇi ṇāĩ jamu kāla-samu
text.3965: taṃ pekkhĕvi hariṇāhivaï  $  añjaṇa sa-muccha mahiẏalĕ paḍaï
text.3970: hā samīra pavaṇañjaẏa aṇila pahañjaṇā  $  hari-kiẏanta-dantantarĕ vaṭṭaï añjaṇā
text.3971: hā kammu kāĩ kiu keumaï  $  khalĕ muiẏa lahesahi kavaṇa gaï
text.3972: hā tāẏa mahinda maïndu dharĕ  $  su-pasaṇṇakitti paḍirakkha karĕ
text.3973: hā māẏari tuhu mi ṇa saṃthavahi  $  mucchāviẏa duhiẏa samutthavahi
text.3975: jakkhahŏ rakkhahŏ rakkhahŏ sahiẏa  $  ṇaṃ to pañcāṇaṇeṇa gahiẏa"
text.3976: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi gandhavvāhivaï  $  raṇĕ dujjaü para-uvaẏāra-maï
text.3977: maṇicūḍu raẏaṇacūḍahĕ daïu  $  pañcāṇaṇu jetthu tetthu aïu
text.3978: aṭṭhāvaü sāvaü hovi thiu  $  hari pārāuṭṭhaü teṇa kiu
text.3980: tāvĕhĩ gaẏaṇahŏ oarĕvi  $  añjaṇahĕ vasantamāla miliẏa
text.3981: "ihu aṭṭhāvaü hontu ṇa vi  $  tā vaṭṭaï āsi māĕ giliẏa"
text.3985: ema volla kira vihi mi paropparu jāvĕhĩ  $  gīu geu gandhavveṃ maṇaharu tāvĕhĩ
text.3986: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pariŏsiẏa ṇiẏa-maṇĕ (?)  $  "pacchaṇṇu ko vi suhi vasaï vaṇĕ
text.3987: asamāhi-maraṇu jeṃ ṇāsiẏaü  $  aṇṇu vi gandhavvu paẏāsiẏaü"
text.3993: ṇahĕ janteṃ ve vi ṇiẏacchiẏaü  $  oarĕvi vimāṇahŏ pucchiẏaü
text.3995: "kahĩ jāẏaü kahĩ vaddhiẏaü  $  kahŏ dhīẏaü kahŏ kulaüttiẏaü
text.3996: kasu keraü evaḍḍu duhu  $  vaṇĕ acchahŏ jeṇa ruantiẏaü"
text.4000: puṇu vasantamālāĕ paḍuttaru dijjaï  $  ṇiravasesu tahŏ ṇiẏa-vittantu kahijjaï
text.4001: "añjaṇasundari ṇāmeṇa ima  $  saï suddha muddha jiha jiṇa-paḍima
text.4002: maṇaveẏa-mahāevihĕ taṇaẏa  $  jaï muṇahŏ mahindu teṇa jaṇiẏa
text.4003: pāẏaḍa pasaṇṇakittihĕ bhaïṇi  $  maṇahara pavaṇañjaẏāhŏ ghariṇi"
text.4004: vijjāharu taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vaẏaṇu  $  pabhaṇaï vāhambha-bhariẏa-ṇaẏaṇu
text.4005: "haũ māĕ mahindahŏ mehuṇaü  $  su-pasaṇṇakitti mahu bhāẏaṇaü
text.4006: taü homi sahoẏaru māulaü  $  paḍisūru haṇūruha-rāulaü
text.4007: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jāṇĕvi sarĕvi guṇu  $  attillu tehĩ tā ruṇṇu puṇu
text.4008: jaṃ laïu āsi puṇṇehĩ viṇu  $  taṃ diṇṇu vihihĕ ṇaṃ soẏa-riṇu
text.4010: sarahasu sāiu dentaĕhĩ  $  jaṃ ekkamekku āvīliẏaü
text.4011: aṃsu paṇāleṃ ṇīsaraï  $  ṇaṃ kaluṇu mahārasu pīliẏaü
text.4015: dukkhu dukkhu sāhārĕvi ṇaẏaṇa luhāvĕvi  $  māuleṇa ṇiẏa ṇiẏaẏa-vimāṇĕ caḍāvĕvi
text.4017: ṇīsariu vālu aï-dullaliu  $  ṇaṃ ṇahaẏala-sirihĕ gabbhu galiu
text.4018: mārui davatti ṇivaḍiu ilahĕ  $  ṇaṃ vijju-puñju uppari silahĕ
text.4019: uccāĕvi ṇiu vijjāharĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ jammaṇĕ jiṇavaru suravarĕhĩ
text.4020: añjaṇahĕ samappiu jāẏa dihi  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṭṭhu paḍīvaü laddhu ṇihi
text.4021: ṇiẏa-puru païsārĕvi ṇaravarĕṇa  $  jammocchaü kiu paḍidiṇaẏarĕṇa
text.4023: "sundaru" jagĕ sundaru bhaṇĕvi  $  "sirisaïlu" silāẏalu cuṇṇu ṇiu
text.4024: haṇuruha-dīvĕ pavaḍḍhiẏaü  $  "haṇuvantu" ṇāmu teṃ tāsu kiu
text.4028: ettahĕ vi khara-dūsaṇa mellāveppiṇu  $  varuṇahŏ rāvaṇaho vi sandhi kareppiṇu
text.4029: ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaru paīsaï jāva maru  $  ṇīsuṇṇu tāma ṇiẏa-ghariṇi-gharu
text.4030: pekkheppiṇu pucchiẏa kā vi tiẏa  $  "kahĩ añjaṇasundari pāṇa-piẏa"
text.4032: "kira gabbhu bhaṇĕvi para-ṇaravarahŏ  $  keumaïĕ ghalliẏa kulaharahŏ"
text.4033: taṃ suṇĕvi samīraṇu ṇīsariu  $  aṇusarisĕhĩ vaẏasĕhĩ pariẏariu
text.4034: gaü tetthu jetthu taṃ sāsuraü  $  kira darisāvesaï sā suraü
text.4035: piẏa iṭṭha ṇa diṭṭha ṇavara tahi mi  $  asahantu pahañjaṇu gaü kahi mi
text.4038: "ema bhaṇejjahu keumaï  $  pūrantu maṇoraha māĕ taü
text.4043: dukkhu dukkhu pariẏattiẏa saẏala vi sajjaṇā  $  gaẏa ruẏanta ṇiẏa-ṇilaẏahŏ ummaṇa-dummaṇā
text.4044: pavaṇañjao vi paḍivakkha-khaü  $  kāṇaṇu païsaraï pisāẏaraü
text.4046: ahŏ rāẏahaṃsa haṃsāhivaï  $  kahĕ kahi mi diṭṭha jaï haṃsa-gaï
text.4047: ahŏ dīhara-ṇahara maẏāhivaï  $  kahĕ kahi mi ṇiẏamviṇi diṭṭha jaï
text.4048: ahŏ kumbhi kumbha-sāriccha-thaṇa  $  kettahĕ vi diṭṭha saï suddha-maṇa
text.4049: ahŏ ahŏ asoẏa pallaviẏa-pāṇi  $  kahĩ gaẏa parahuĕ parahūẏa-vāṇi
text.4050: ahŏ runda canda candāṇaṇiẏa  $  miga kahi mi diṭṭha miga-loẏaṇiẏa
text.4051: ahŏ sihi kalāva-saṇṇiha-cihura  $  ṇa ṇihāliẏa kahi mi viraha-vihura"
text.4053: ema bhavanteṃ viulĕ vaṇĕ  $  ṇaggoha-mahādumu diṭṭhu kiha
text.4058: taṃ ṇievi vaḍa-pāẏavu aṇṇu vi saravaru  $  kālamehu ṇāmeṇa khamāviu gaẏavaru
text.4060: ālāṇa-khambhĕ jaṃ āliẏaü  $  jaṃ saṅkhala-ṇiẏalahĩ ṇiẏaliẏaü
text.4061: taṃ saẏalu khamejjahi kumbhi mahu"  $  tahĩ paccakkhāṇaü laïu lahu
text.4062: "jaï patta vatta kantahĕ taṇiẏa  $  to ṇaü ṇivitti gaï ettaḍiẏa
text.4063: jaï ghaĩ puṇu eha ṇa hūẏa dihi  $  to etthu majjhu saṇṇāsa-vihi"
text.4064: thiu maüṇu laevi ṇarāhivaï  $  jhāẏantu siddhi jiha parama-jaï
text.4065: sacchandu gaïndu vi saṃcaraï  $  sāmiẏa-sammāṇu ṇa vīsaraï
text.4066: paḍirakkhaï pāsu ṇa muaï kiha  $  bhava-bhava-kiu sukkiẏa-kammu jiha
text.4068: tāma ruanteṃ pahasiĕṇa  $  akkhiu jaṇaṇihĕ vuṇṇāṇaṇahĕ
text.4069: "eu ṇa jāṇahũ kahi mi gaü  $  marueu vioeṃ añjaṇahĕ"
text.4073: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi savvaṅgiẏa-pasariẏa-veẏaṇā  $  pavaṇa-jaṇaṇi mucchāviẏa thiẏa acceẏaṇā
text.4074: pavvāliẏa hariẏandaṇa-rasĕṇa  $  ujjīviẏa kaha vi puṇṇa-vasĕṇa
text.4075: "hā putta putta dakkhavahi muhu  $  hā putta putta kahĩ gaẏaü tuhũ
text.4076: hā putta āu mahu kamĕhĩ paḍu  $  hā putta putta rahagaĕhĩ caḍu
text.4077: hā putta putta uvavaṇĕhĩ bhamu  $  hā putta putta jhenduĕhĩ ramu
text.4078: hā putta putta atthāṇu karĕ  $  hā putta mahāhavĕ varuṇu dharĕ
text.4079: hā vahuĕ vahuĕ maĩ bhantiẏaĕ  $  tuhũ ghalliẏa aparikkhantiẏaĕ
text.4080: palhāeṃ dhīriẏa "luhahi muhu  $  ṇikkāraṇĕ rovahi kāĩ tuhũ
text.4081: haũ kantĕ gavesami tuva taṇaü  $  imu meiṇi-maṇḍalu kettaḍaü"
text.4083: ema bhaṇevi ṇarāhivĕṇa  $  uvaẏāru karĕvi sāsaṇaharahũ
text.4088: ekku johu saṃpesiu pāsu dasāsaho  $  akka-sakka-taïlokka-cakka-saṃtāsaho
text.4094: dūvattaĕ pattaĕ gīḍha-bhaẏa  $  haṇuvantahŏ māẏari muccha gaẏa
text.4096: āsāsiẏa sundari pavaṇa-piẏa  $  ṇaṃ thiẏa tuhiṇāhaẏa kamala-siẏa
text.4098: tāma vidhīriẏa māulĕṇa  $  "mā māĕ visūraü kari maṇahŏ
text.4099: siddhahŏ sāsaẏa-siddhi jiha  $  tiha paĩ dakkhavami samīraṇahŏ"
text.4103: puṇu puṇo vi dhīreppiṇu añjaṇasundari  $  ṇiẏa-vimāṇĕ ārūḍhu ṇarāhiva-kesari
text.4104: gaü tettahĕ jettahĕ keumaï  $  aṇṇu vi palhāẏa-ṇarāhivaï
text.4106: taṃ bhūaravāḍaï ḍhukkāĩ  $  ghaṇa-ulaĩ va thāṇahŏ cukkāĩ
text.4107: pavaṇañjaü jahĩ āruhĕvi gaü  $  so kālamehu vaṇĕ diṭṭhu gaü
text.4109: taṃ pārāuṭṭhaü karĕvi valu  $  gaü tahĩ jĕ paḍīvaü atula-valu
text.4110: gaṇiẏāriu ḍhoiẏa vasikiẏaü  $  ṇava-ṇaliṇi-saṇḍĕ bhamaru va thiẏaü
text.4111: kiṅkarĕhĩ gavesantehĩ vaṇĕ  $  lakkhiu vellahalĕ laẏā-bhavaṇĕ
text.4112: jokkāriu vijjāhara-saĕhĩ  $  jiha jiṇavaru surĕhĩ samāgaĕhĩ
text.4114: maüṇu laevi pariṭṭhiẏaü  $  ṇaü cavaï ṇa callaï jhāṇa-paru
text.4115: jāẏa bhanti maṇĕ savvahu mi  $  "kaṭṭhamaü kiṇṇa ṇimmaviu ṇaru"
text.4119: puṇu silou avaṇīẏalĕ lihiu sa-hatthĕṇa  $  "añjaṇāĕ muiẏāĕ marami paramatthĕṇa
text.4120: jīvantihĕ ṇisuṇami vatti jaï  $  to vollami laï ettaḍiẏa gaï"
text.4121: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi haṇuruha-rāṇaĕṇa  $  vajjariẏa vatta parijāṇaĕṇa
