text.4123: jiha ubhaẏa-purahũ parighalliẏaü  $  jiha vaṇĕ bhamiẏaü ekkalliẏaü
text.4124: jiha harivareṇa uvasaggu kiu  $  aṭṭhāvaeṇa jiha uvasamiu
text.4125: jiha laddhu puttu bhūsaṇu ilahĕ  $  jiha ṇahĕ ṇijjantu paḍiu silahĕ
text.4126: sirisaïlu ṇāũ haṇuvantu jiha  $  vittantu asesu vi kahiu tiha
text.4127: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi samuṭṭhiẏaü  $  paḍisūreṃ ṇiẏa-ṇaẏarahŏ ṇiẏaü
text.4129: miliu pahañjaṇu añjaṇahŏ  $  veṇṇi mi ṇiẏa-kahaü kahantāĩ
text.4130: haṇuruha-dīvĕ pariṭṭhiẏaĩ  $  thiru rajju sa iṃ bhu ñjantāĩ
text.4132: vaddhantaü pāvaṇi  $  bhaḍa-cūḍāmaṇi  $  jāva juvāṇa-bhāvĕ caḍaï
text.4133: tahĩ avasarĕ rāvaṇu  $  sura-saṃtāvaṇu  $  raṇaühĕ varuṇahŏ abbhidaï
text.4137: dūāgamaṇĕ kou saṃvajjhaï  $  saĩ sarahasu dasāsu saṇṇajjhaï
text.4142: "vaccha vaccha paripālahi meiṇi  $  māṇahi rāẏa-lacchi jiha kāmiṇi
text.4144: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ari-giri-sodāmaṇi  $  calaṇa ṇaveppiṇu pabhaṇaï pāvaṇi
text.4146: "kiṃ tumhĕ virujjhahŏ  $  appuṇu jujjhahŏ  $  maĩ haṇuvanteṃ huntaĕṇa
text.4147: pāvanti vasundhara  $  canda-divāẏara  $  kiṃ kiraṇoheṃ santaĕṇa
text.4151: bhaṇaï samīraṇu "jaẏasiri-lāhaü  $  ajju vi putta ṇa pekkhiu āhaü
text.4152: ajju vi vālu kema tuhũ jujjhahi  $  ajju vi vūha-bheu ṇaü vujjhahi"
text.4153: taṃ ṇisuṇevi kuviu pavaṇañjaï  $  "vālu kumbhi kiṃ viḍavi ṇa bhañjaï
text.4154: vālu sīhu kiṃ kari ṇa vihāḍaï  $  kiṃ vālaggi ṇa ḍahaï mahāḍaï
text.4155: vālaẏandu kiṃ jaṇĕ ṇa muṇijjaï  $  vālu bhaḍāraü kiṃ ṇa thuṇijjaï
text.4156: vālu bhuvaṅgamu kāĩ ṇa ḍaṅkaï  $  vāla-ravihĕ tamohu kiṃ thakkaï"
text.4157: ema bhaṇevi pahañjaṇi-rāṇaü  $  laṅkāṇaẏarihĕ diṇṇu paẏāṇaü
text.4160: haṇuvantu sa-sāhaṇu  $  pariosiẏa-maṇu  $  entu diṭṭhu laṅkesarĕṇa
text.4161: chaṇa-divasĕ valantaü  $  kiraṇa-phurantaü  $  taruṇa-taraṇi ṇaṃ sasaharĕṇa
text.4165: dūrahŏ jjĕ taïlokka-bhaẏāvaṇu  $  siru ṇāvĕvi jokkāriu rāvaṇu
text.4166: teṇa vi sarahaseṇa savvaṅgiu  $  entaü sāmīraṇi āliṅgiu
text.4167: cumvĕvi uccolihĩ vaïsāriu  $  vāravāra puṇu sāhukkāriu
text.4168: "dhaṇṇaü pavaṇu jāsu tuhũ ṇandaṇu  $  bharahu jema puraevahŏ ṇandaṇu"
text.4170: taṃ haṇuvanta-kumāru papujjĕvi  $  varuṇahŏ uppari gaü galagajjĕvi
text.4172: kahi mi samvu-khara-dūsaṇa-rāṇā  $  kahi mi haṇuva-ṇala-ṇīla-pahāṇā
text.4173: kahi mi kumua-suggīvaṅgaṅgaẏa  $  ṇaṃ thiẏa thaṭṭĕhĩ matta mahāgaẏa
text.4175: rehaï ṇisiẏara-valu  $  vaḍḍhiẏa-kalaẏalu  $  thaḍĕhĩ thaḍĕhĩ āvāsiẏaü
text.4176: ṇaṃ dahamuha-keraü  $  vijaẏa-jaṇeraü  $  puṇṇa-puñju puñjĕhĩ thiẏaü
text.4180: to etthantarĕ raṇĕ ṇikkaruṇahŏ  $  cara-purisĕhĩ jāṇāviu varuṇahŏ
text.4181: "deva deva kiṃ acchahi avicalu  $  velandharĕ āvāsiu para-valu"
text.4182: cārahũ taṇaü vaẏaṇu ṇisuṇeppiṇu  $  varuṇu ṇarāhiu osāreppiṇu
text.4183: mantihĩ kaṇṇa-jāu tahŏ dijjaï  $  "kera dasāṇaṇa-kerī kijjaï
text.4184: jeṇa dhaṇaü samaraṅgaṇĕ vaṅkiu  $  tijagavihūsaṇu vāraṇu vasikiu
text.4185: jeṃ aṭṭhāvaü giri uddhariẏaü  $  māhesara-vaï ṇaravaï dhariẏaü
text.4186: jeṇa ṇiratthīkiu ṇala-kuvvaru  $  sasaharu sūru kuveru purandaru
text.4187: teṇa samāṇu kavaṇu kira āhaü  $  kera karantahũ kavaṇu parāhaü
text.4189: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi duddharu  $  varuṇu dhaṇuddharu  $  pajaliu kova-huvāsaṇĕṇa
text.4190: "jaïẏahũ khara-dūsaṇa  $  jiẏa veṇṇi mi jaṇa  $  taïu kāĩ kiu rāvaṇĕṇa"
text.4194: eva bhaṇevi bhuvaṇĕ jasa-luddhaü  $  sarahasu varuṇu rāu saṇṇaddhaü
text.4196: tāḍiẏa samara-bheri ubbhiẏa dhaẏa  $  sāri-sajja kiẏa matta mahāgaẏa
text.4197: haẏa pakkhariẏa pajottiẏa sandaṇa  $  ṇiggaẏa varuṇahŏ kerā ṇandaṇa
text.4201: jalakantāi aṇeẏa padhāiẏa  $  sarahasa āhava-bhūmi parāiẏa
text.4202: viraĕvi garuḍa-vūhu thiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  vaïrihĩ cāva-vūhu kiu tāvĕhĩ
text.4205: romañca-visaṭṭaĩ  $  raṇĕ abbhiṭṭaĩ  $  ve vi varuṇa-rāvaṇa-valaĩ
text.4215: tāva dasāṇaṇu varuṇahŏ puttĕhĩ  $  veḍhiu candu jema jīmuttĕhĩ
text.4216: kesari jema mahāgaẏa-jūhahĩ  $  jīu jema dukkamma-samūhahĩ
text.4218: ekkallaü rāvaṇu  $  bhuvaṇa-bhaẏāvaṇu  $  bhamaï aṇantaĕ vaïri-valĕ
text.4219: sa-ṇiẏamvu sa-kandaru  $  ṇāĩ mahīharu  $  matthijjantaĕ uvahi-jalĕ
text.4223: tāma varuṇu rāvaṇahŏ vi bhiccĕhĩ  $  vihi-sua-sāraṇa-maẏa-māriccĕhĩ
text.4227: veḍhiu khatta-dhammu parisesĕvi  $  teṇa vi saravara-dhoraṇi pesĕvi
text.4228: kheḍiẏa aṇaḍuha vva jaladhārĕhĩ  $  tāma dasāṇaṇu varuṇa-kumārĕhĩ
text.4229: āẏāmĕvi savvahĩ samakaṇḍiu  $  rahu saṇṇāhu mahādhaü khaṇḍiu
text.4232: raṇaühĕ païsanteṃ  $  vaïri vahanteṃ  $  rāvaṇu uvveḍhāviẏaü
text.4233: aviẏāṇiẏa-kāeṃ  $  ṇaṃ duvvāeṃ  $  ravi mehahã mellāviẏaü
text.4237: saẏala vi sattu sattu-paḍikūleṃ  $  saṃveḍhĕvi vijjā-laṅgūleṃ
text.4238: lei ṇa lei jāma maru-ṇandaṇu  $  tāma padhāiu varuṇu sa-sandaṇu
text.4239: "arĕ khala khudda pāva valu vāṇara  $  kahĩ saṃcarahi saṇḍha ahavā ṇara"
text.4240: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu valiu kaïddhaü  $  sīhu va sīhahŏ vehāviddhaü
text.4241: viṇṇi vi kira bhiḍanti daṇu-dāraṇa  $  ṇāgapāsa-laṅgūla-ppaharaṇa
text.4242: tāma dasāṇaṇu rahavaru vāhĕvi  $  antarĕ thiu raṇa-bhūmi pasāhĕvi
text.4243: "ŏrĕ valu valu haẏāsa arĕ māṇava  $  maĩ kuvieṇa ṇa deva ṇa dāṇava
text.4246: avarahu mi surindahũ  $  ṇaravara-vindahũ  $  diṇṇaĩ āsi jāĩ jāĩ
text.4247: parihava-dumaïttaĩ  $  phalaĩ vicittaĩ  $  tujjhu vi demi tāĩ tāĩ"
text.4251: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi atuliẏa-māhappeṃ  $  ṇibbhacchiu jalakantahŏ vappeṃ
text.4253: haũ puṇu varuṇu varuṇu phalu dāvami  $  paĩ dahamuha-davaggi ulhāvami"
text.4255: ahimuhu thakku ḍhukku valu vujjhahi  $  sāmaṇṇāuhĕhiṃ laï jujjhahi
text.4256: mohaṇa-thambhaṇa-ḍahaṇa-samatthĕhĩ  $  ko vi ṇa paharaï divvahĩ atthĕhĩ"
text.4257: ema bhaṇevi mahāhavĕ varuṇahŏ  $  gahakallolu bhiḍiu ṇaṃ aruṇahŏ
text.4260: ṇaravara-sira-sūleṃ  $  ṇiẏa-laṅgūleṃ  $  veḍhĕvi dhariẏa kumāra kiha
text.4265: ṇiẏa-ṇandaṇa-vandhaṇĕṇa sa-karuṇahŏ  $  paharaṇu hatthĕ ṇa laggaï varuṇahŏ
text.4266: rāvaṇeṇa uppaĕvi ṇahaṅgaṇĕ  $  indu jema tiha dhariu raṇaṅgaṇĕ
text.4268: tāva bhāṇukaṇṇeṇa sa-ṇeuru  $  āṇiu ṇiravasesu anteuru
text.4271: aṃsu-jaleṇa dhariṇi siñcantaü  $  kajjala-malĕṇa vaẏaĩ maïlantaü
text.4272: taṃ pekkhĕvi gañjolliẏa-gatteṃ  $  garahiu kumbhaẏaṇṇu dahavatteṃ
text.4279: taṃ ṇisuṇevi sa-ḍoru sa-ṇeuru  $  ravikaṇṇeṇa mukku anteuru
text.4280: gaü ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaru maḍapphara-mukkaü  $  kariṇi-jūhu ṇaṃ vārihĕ cukkaü
text.4282: "avaluẏa maṃ tuhũ karahi sarīrahŏ  $  maraṇu gahaṇu jaü savvahŏ vīrahŏ
text.4283: ṇavara palāẏaṇeṇa lajjijjaï  $  jeṃ muhu ṇāmu gottu maïlijjaï"
text.4284: dahavaẏaṇahŏ vaẏaṇehĩ sa-karuṇeṃ  $  calaṇa ṇaveppiṇu vuccaï varuṇeṃ
text.4286: tāsu bhiḍaï jo so jji aẏāṇaü  $  ajjahŏ laggĕvi tuhũ mahu rāṇaü
text.4288: aṇṇu vi sasi-vaẏaṇī  $  kuvalaẏa-ṇaẏaṇī  $  mahu suẏa ṇāmeṃ saccavaï
text.4294: puppha-vimāṇĕ caḍiu āṇandeṃ  $  diṇṇu paẏāṇaü jaẏajaẏa-saddeṃ
text.4300: pujjiu pavaṇa-puttu dahagīveṃ  $  dijjaï paümarāẏa suggīveṃ
text.4301: kharĕṇa aṇaṅgakusuma vaẏa-pāliṇi  $  ṇala-ṇīlehĩ dhīẏa sirimāliṇi
text.4302: aṭṭha sahāsa ema pariṇeppiṇu  $  gaü ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaru pasāu bhaṇeppiṇu
text.4303: samvu kumāru vi gaü vaṇavāsahŏ  $  khaggahŏ kāraṇĕ diṇaẏarahāsahŏ
text.4305: suggīvaṅgaṅgaẏa  $  ṇala-ṇīla vi gaẏa  $  khara-dūsaṇa vi kiẏattha-kiẏa
text.4306: vijjāhara-kīlaĕ  $  ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-līlaĕ  $  puraĩ sa iṃ bhu ñjanta thiẏa
text.4307: iẏa "vi jjā ha ra ka ṇḍaṃ"  $  vīsahĩ āsāsaehĩ me siṭṭhaṃ
text.4308: eṇhĩ "u jjhā ka ṇḍaṃ"  $  sāhijjantaṃ ṇisāmeha
text.4309: dhuvarāẏadhova taïẏalua  $  paṇatti ṇattī suẏāṇu pāḍheṇa (?)
text.4311: tīe lihāviẏam iṇaṃ  $  vīsahĩ āsāsaehĩ paḍivaddhaṃ
text.4319: kahĕ kettaḍaü  kālu acalu  $  jaü jīviu rajju dasāṇaṇahŏ"
text.4324: "suṇu akkhami rahuvaṃsu pahāṇaü  $  dasarahu atthi aüjjhahĕ rāṇaü
text.4325: tāsu putta hosanti dhurandhara  $  vāsueva-valaeva dhaṇuddhara
text.4326: tehĩ haṇevaü rakkhu mahāraṇĕ  $  jaṇaẏa-ṇarāhiva-taṇaẏahĕ kāraṇĕ"
text.4327: to sahasatti palittu vihīsaṇu  $  ṇaṃ ghaẏa-ghaḍaĕhĩ sittu huāsaṇu
text.4328: "jāma ṇa laṅkā-vallari sukkaï  $  jāma ṇa maraṇu dasāsaṇĕ ḍhukkaï
text.4330: to taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi kaliẏāraü  $  vaddhāvaṇahã padhāiu ṇāraü
text.4331: "ajju vihīsaṇu uppari esaï  $  tumhahã vihi mi siraĩ toḍesaï"
text.4334: ṇiẏaĩ siraĩ vijjāharĕhĩ  $  pariẏaṇahŏ kareppiṇu cappaṇaü
text.4338: dasaraha-jaṇaẏa ve vi gaẏa tettahĕ  $  puravaru kaütukamaṅgalu jettahĕ
text.4342: jahĩ pāsāẏa-siharĕ ṇihasijjaï  $  teṇa miẏaṅku vaṅku kisu kijjaï
text.4343: tahĩ suhamaï-ṇāmeṇa pahāṇaü  $  ṇaṃ surapurahŏ purandaru rāṇaü
text.4344: pihusiri tahŏ mahaevi maṇohara  $  surakari-kara kumbhaẏala-paohara
text.4345: ṇandaṇu tāhĕ doṇu uppajjaï  $  kekkaẏa taṇaẏa kāĩ vaṇṇijjaï
text.4353: to kareṇu āruhĕvi viṇiggaẏa  $  ṇaṃ paccakkha mahāsiri-devaẏa
text.4355: ghitta māla dasasandaṇa-ṇāmahŏ  $  maṇahara-gaïĕ raïĕ ṇaṃ kāmahŏ
text.4356: tahĩ avasarĕ viruddhu harivāhaṇu  $  dhāiu "lehu" bhaṇantu sa-sāhaṇu
text.4357: "varu āhaṇahŏ kaṇṇa uddālahŏ  $  raẏaṇaĩ jema tema mahipālahŏ"
text.4358: suhamaï rahu-sueṇa viṇṇappaï  $  "dhīraü hohi māma ko cappaï
text.4359: maĩ jiẏantĕ aṇaraṇṇahŏ ṇandaṇĕ"  $  eu bhaṇevi pariṭṭhiu sandaṇĕ
text.4360: kekkaï dhurahĩ kareppiṇu sārahi  $  tahĩ paẏaṭṭu jahĩ saẏala mahārahi
text.4363: rahu vāhĕvi tahĩ ṇehi piĕ  $  dhaẏa-chattaĩ jetthu ṇirantaraĩ"
text.4367: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pariosiẏa-jaṇaeṃ  $  vāhiu rahavaru pihusiri-taṇaeṃ
text.4368: teṇa vi sarahĩ parajjiu sāhaṇu  $  bhaggu sa-hemappahu harivāhaṇu
text.4369: pariṇiẏa kekkaï diṇṇu mahā-varu  $  cavaï aüjjhāpura-paramesaru
text.4370: "sundari maggu maggu jaṃ ruccaï"  $  suhamaï-suẏaĕ ṇaveppiṇu vuccaï
text.4371: "diṇṇu deva paĩ maggami jaïẏahũ  $  ṇiẏaẏa-saccu pālijjaï taïẏahũ"
text.4372: ema cavantaĩ dhaṇa-kaṇa-saṃkulĕ  $  thiẏaĩ ve vi purĕ kaütukamaṅgalĕ
text.4373: vahu-vāsarĕhĩ aüjjha païṭṭhaĩ  $  saï-vāsava iva rajjĕ vaïṭṭhaĩ
text.4376: rāmacandu aparajjiẏahĕ  $  somitti sumittihĕ ekku jaṇu
text.4377: bharahu dhurandharu kekkaïhĕ  $  suppahahĕ puttu puṇu sattuhaṇu
text.4381: eẏa caẏāri putta tahŏ rāẏahŏ  $  ṇāĩ mahā-samudda mahi-bhāẏahŏ
text.4382: ṇāĩ danta givvāṇa-gaïndahŏ  $  ṇāĩ maṇoraha sajjaṇa-vindahŏ
text.4383: jaṇaü vi mihilā-ṇaẏarĕ païṭṭhaü  $  samaü videhaĕ rajjĕ ṇiviṭṭhaü
text.4384: tāhã vihi mi vara-vikkama-vīẏaü  $  bhāmaṇḍalu uppaṇṇu sa-sīẏaü
text.4385: puvva-vaïru saṃbharĕvi a-kheveṃ  $  dāhiṇa seḍhi harĕvi ṇiu deveṃ
text.4388: ghattiu piṅgaleṇa amarindeṃ  $  pupphavaïhĕ allaviu ṇarindeṃ
text.4390: tāva rajju jaṇaẏahŏ taṇaü  $  uṭṭhaddhu mahāḍaï-vāsiĕhĩ
text.4397: tūraĩ devi so vi saṇṇajjhaï  $  rāmu sa-lakkhaṇu tāva virujjhaï
text.4398: "maĩ jīẏantĕ tāẏa tuhũ callahi  $  haṇami vaïri chuḍu hatthutthallahi"
text.4400: kiha ālaggahi ṇaravara-vindahũ  $  kiha ghaḍa bhañjahi matta-gaïndahũ
text.4401: kiha riu-rahahã mahārahu coẏahi  $  kiha vara-turaẏa turaṅgahũ ḍhoẏahi"
text.4402: pabhaṇaï rāmu "tāẏa pallaṭṭahi  $  haũ jĕ pahuccami kāĩ paẏaṭṭahi
text.4404: kiṃ tamu haṇaï ṇa vālu ravi  $  kiṃ vālu davaggi ṇa ḍahaï vaṇu
text.4405: kiṃ kari dalaï ṇa vālu hari  $  kiṃ vālu ṇa ḍaṅkaï uragamaṇu
text.4410: dūsahu so ji aṇṇu puṇu lakkhaṇu  $  ekku pavaṇu aṇṇekku huāsaṇu
text.4411: viṇṇi mi bhiḍiẏa pulindahŏ sāhaṇĕ  $  rahavara-turaẏa-joha-gaẏa-vāhaṇĕ
text.4412: dīhara-sarĕhĩ vaïri saṃtāviẏa  $  jaṇaẏa-kaṇaẏa raṇĕ uvveḍhāviẏa
text.4414: teṇa kumārahŏ cūriu rahavaru  $  chiṇṇu chattu dohāiu dhaṇuharu
text.4416: sāhaṇu bhaggaü laggu umaggĕhĩ  $  karaẏalehĩ olamviẏa-khaggĕhĩ
text.4418: dasahĩ turaṅgahĩ ṇīsariu  $  bhillāhiu bhajjĕvi āhavahŏ
text.4419: jāṇaï jaṇaẏa-ṇarāhivĕṇa  $  tahĩ kālĕ vi appiẏa rāhavahŏ
text.4423: vavvara-savara-varūhiṇi bhaggī  $  jaṇaẏahŏ jāẏa pihivi āvaggī
text.4425: sīẏahĕ deha-riddhi pāvantihĕ  $  ekku divasu dappaṇu joẏantihĕ
text.4427: jaṇaẏa-taṇaẏa sahasatti paṇaṭṭhī  $  sīhāgamaṇĕ kuraṅgi va taṭṭhī
text.4428: "hā hā māĕ" bhaṇantihĩ sahiẏahĩ  $  kalaẏalu kiu sajjhasa-gaha-gahiẏahĩ
text.4430: milĕvi tehĩ kaha kaha vi ṇa māriu  $  levi addhacandĕhĩ ṇīsāriu
text.4432: gaü sa-parāhaü devarisi  $  paḍĕ paḍima lihĕvi sīẏahĕ taṇiẏa
text.4437: diṭṭha jaṃ jĕ paḍĕ paḍima kumāreṃ  $  pañcahĩ sarahĩ viddhu ṇaṃ māreṃ
text.4440: cinta paḍhama-thāṇantarĕ laggaï  $  vīẏaĕ piẏa-muha-daṃsaṇu maggaï
text.4441: taïẏaĕ sasaï dīha-ṇīsāseṃ  $  kaṇaï caütthaĕ jara-viṇṇāseṃ
text.4442: pañcamĕ ḍāheṃ aṅgu ṇa muccaï  $  chaṭṭhaĕ muhahŏ ṇa kāi mi ruccaï
text.4443: sattamĕ thāṇĕ ṇa gāsu laïjjaï  $  aṭṭhamĕ gamaṇummāĕhĩ bhijjaï
text.4444: ṇavamĕ pāṇa-saṃdehahŏ ḍhukkaï  $  dasamaĕ maraï ṇa kema vi cukkaï
text.4446: kahiu ṇarindahŏ kiṅkarĕhĩ  $  "pahu dukkaru jīvaï puttu taü
text.4447: kāhĕ vi kaṇṇahĕ kāraṇĕṇa  $  so dasamī kāmāvattha gaü
text.4452: "kahi kahŏ taṇiẏa kaṇṇa kahĩ diṭṭhī  $  jā mahu puttahŏ hiẏaĕ païṭṭhī"
text.4454: tahŏ suu jaṇaü tetthu maĩ diṭṭhaü  $  kaṇṇā-raẏaṇu tiloẏa-variṭṭhaü
text.4455: taṃ jaï hoi kumārahŏ āẏahŏ  $  to siẏa haraï purandara-rāẏahŏ"
text.4456: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vijjāhara-ṇāheṃ  $  pesiu cavalaveu asagāheṃ
text.4458: gaü so candagaïhĕ muhu joĕvi  $  mandura ḍhukku turaṅgamu hoĕvi
text.4459: koḍḍeṃ caḍiu ṇarāhiu jāvĕhĩ  $  dāhiṇa seḍhi parāiu tāvĕhĩ
text.4460: mihilā-ṇāhu mueppiṇu jiṇa-harĕ  $  cavalaveu païsaï purĕ maṇaharĕ
text.4463: vandaṇahattiĕ so vi gaü  $  sahũ putteṃ viraha-paravvasĕṇa
text.4467: vijjāhara-ṇara-ṇaẏaṇāṇandĕhĩ  $  kiu saṃbhāsaṇu vihi mi ṇarindĕhĩ
text.4468: pabhaṇaï candagamaṇu tosiẏa-maṇu  $  "viṇṇi vi kiṇṇa karahũ saẏaṇattaṇu
text.4469: duhiẏa tuhārī puttu mahāraü  $  hou vivāhu maṇoraha-gāraü"
text.4470: amarisu ṇavara pavaddhiu jaṇaẏahŏ  $  "diṇṇa kaṇṇa maĩ dasaraha-taṇaẏahŏ
text.4472: tahĩ avasarĕ vaddhiẏa-ahimāṇeṃ  $  vuttu ṇarindu candapatthāṇeṃ
text.4473: "kahĩ vijjāharu kahĩ bhūgoẏaru  $  gaẏa-masaẏahũ vaḍḍāraü antaru
text.4474: māṇusa-khettu jĕ tāma kaṇiṭṭhaü  $  jīviu tahĩ kahĩ taṇaü visiṭṭhaü"
text.4476: bhaṇaï ṇarāhiu "kettiĕṇa  $  jagĕ māṇusa-khettu jĕ aggalaü
text.4477: jasu pāsiu titthaṅkarĕhĩ  $  siddhattaṇu laddhaü kevalaü"
text.4482: "paguṇa-guṇaĩ aï-dujjaẏa-bhāvaĩ  $  purĕ acchanti etthu ve cāvaĩ
text.4484: kiṃ bhāmaṇḍaleṇa kiṃ rāmeṃ  $  tāĩ caḍāvaï jo āẏāmeṃ
text.4485: pariṇaü so jjĕ kaṇṇa ĕu pabhaṇiu"  $  taṃ ji pamāṇu karĕvi pahu bhaṇiẏaü
text.4486: gaẏa sa-sarāsaṇa mihilā-puravaru  $  vaddha mañca āḍhattu saẏamvaru
text.4487: miliẏa ṇarāhiva je jagĕ jāṇiẏa  $  saẏala vi dhaṇu-paẏāva-avamāṇiẏa
text.4488: ko vi ṇāhĩ jo tāĩ caḍāvaï  $  jakkha-sahāsahũ muhu darisāvaï
text.4490: jāma ṇa guṇahĩ caḍantāĩ  $  ahijāẏaĩ kaü suha-daṃsaṇaĩ
text.4491: avaseṃ jaṇahŏ aṇiṭṭhāĩ  $  kukalattaĩ jema sarāsaṇaĩ
text.4495: jaṃ ṇaravaï asesa avamāṇiẏa  $  dasaraha-taṇaẏa caẏāri vi āṇiẏa
text.4499: laïẏaĩ sāẏara-vajjāvattaĩ  $  gāmahaṇā iva guṇĕhĩ caḍantaĩ
text.4500: melliu kusuma-vāsu sura-sattheṃ  $  pariṇiẏa jaṇaẏa-taṇaẏa kākuttheṃ
text.4501: je je miliẏa saẏamvarĕ rāṇā  $  ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-ṇaẏarahŏ gaẏa viddāṇā
text.4502: divasu vāru ṇakkhattu gaṇeppiṇu  $  laggu joggu gaha-dutthu ṇieppiṇu
text.4505: āẏahĕ kaṇṇahĕ kāraṇĕṇa  $  hosaï viṇāsu vahu-rakkhasahũ"
text.4511: dasa lahu-bhāẏarahũ samappiẏaü  $  lakkhaṇahŏ aṭṭha parikappiẏaü
text.4513: vaïdehi aüjjhā-ṇaẏari ṇiẏa  $  dasarahĕṇa mahocchava-soha kiẏa
text.4520: thiẏaĩ aüjjhahĕ avicalaĩ  $  raï-sokkha sa ẏaṃ bhu ñjantāĩ
text.4527: sura-samara-sahāsĕhĩ dummaheṇa  $  kiu ṇhavaṇu jiṇindahŏ dasaraheṇa
text.4529: suppahahĕ ṇavara kañcui ṇa pattu  $  pahu pabhaṇaï rahasucchaliẏa-gattu
text.4530: "kahĕ kāĩ ṇiẏamviṇi maṇĕ visaṇṇa  $  cira-cittiẏa bhitti va thiẏa vivaṇṇa"
text.4531: paṇaveppiṇu vuccaï suppahāĕ  $  "kira kāĩ mahu ttaṇiẏaĕ kahāĕ
text.4532: jaï haũ jĕ pāṇavallahiẏa deva  $  to gandha-salilu pāvaï ṇa kema"
text.4533: tahĩ avasarĕ kañcui ḍhukku pāsu  $  chaṇa-sasi va ṇirantara-dhavaliẏāsu
text.4537: jalu jiṇa-vaẏaṇu jiha  $  suppahahĕ davatti ṇa pāviu"
text.4541: paṇaveppiṇu teṇa vi vuttu ema  $  "gaẏa diẏahā jovvaṇu lhasiu deva
text.4542: paḍhamāusu jara dhavalanti āẏa  $  puṇu asaï va sīsa-valagga jāẏa
text.4543: gaï tuṭṭiẏa vihaḍiẏa sandhi-vandha  $  ṇa suṇanti kaṇṇa loẏaṇa ṇirandha
text.4544: siru kampaï muhĕ pakkhalaï vāẏa  $  gaẏa danta sarīrahŏ ṇaṭṭha chāẏa
text.4545: parigaliu ruhiru thiu ṇavara cammu  $  mahu etthu jĕ huu ṇaṃ avaru jammu
text.4546: giri-ṇaï-pavāha ṇa vahanti pāẏa  $  gandhovaü pāvaü kema rāẏa"
text.4547: vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa kiu pahu-viẏappu  $  gaü parama-visāẏahŏ rāma-vappu
text.4548: "saccaü calu jīviu kavaṇu sokkhu  $  taṃ kijjaï sijjhaï jeṇa mokkhu
text.4551: vari taṃ kammu kiu  $  jaṃ paü ajarāmaru labbhaï
text.4555: kaṃ divasu vi hosaï ārisāhũ  $  kañcui-avattha amhārisāhũ
text.4556: ko haũ kā mahi kahŏ taṇaü davvu  $  siṃhāsaṇu chattaĩ athiru savvu
text.4557: jovvaṇu sarīru jīviu dhigatthu  $  saṃsāru asāru aṇatthu atthu
text.4558: visu visaẏa vandhu diḍha-vandhaṇāĩ  $  ghara-dāraĩ parihava-kāraṇāĩ
text.4559: suẏa sattu viḍhattaü avaharanti  $  jara-maraṇahã kiṅkara kiṃ karanti
text.4560: jīvāu vāu haẏa haẏa varāẏa  $  sandaṇa sandaṇa gaẏa gaẏa jĕ ṇāẏa
text.4561: taṇu taṇu jĕ khaṇaddheṃ khaẏahŏ jāi  $  dhaṇu dhaṇu ji guṇeṇa vi vaṅku thāi
text.4562: duhiẏā vi duhiẏa māẏā vi māẏa  $  sama-bhāu lenti kira teṇa bhāẏa
text.4564: āẏaĩ avaraï mi  $  savvaĩ rāhavahŏ samappĕvi
text.4565: appuṇu taü karami"  $  thiu dasarahu ema viẏappĕvi
text.4583: paḍivaṇṇaĕ tahĩ tettaḍaĕ kālĕ  $  to purĕ rahaṇeuracakkavālĕ
text.4584: bhāmaṇḍalu maṇḍalu pariharantu  $  acchaï risi siddhi va saṃbharantu
text.4587: ṇa jaladda ṇa candaṇa kamala-sejja  $  ḍhukkanti janti aṇṇoṇṇa vejja
text.4588: vāhijjaï viraheṃ dūsaheṇa  $  ṇaü phiṭṭaï keṇa vi osaheṇa
text.4589: ṇīsāsu mueppiṇu dīhu dīhu  $  puṇaravi thiu thakkĕvi jema sīhu
text.4590: "bhūgoẏari bhuñjami maṇḍa levi"  $  ṇīsariu sa-sāhaṇu saṇṇahevi
text.4592: pattu viẏaḍḍha-puru  $  taṃ ṇiĕvi jāu jāīsaru
text.4597: mucchāviu taṃ pekkhĕvi paesu  $  saṃbharĕvi bhavantaru ṇiravasesu
text.4598: sabbhāveṃ pabhaṇiu teṇa tāu  $  "kuṇḍalamaṇḍiu ṇāmeṇa rāu
text.4599: haũ hontu etthu akhaliẏa-maraṭṭu  $  piṅgalu ṇāmeṇa kuvera-bhaṭṭu
text.4600: sasikeu-duhiẏa avaharĕvi āu  $  parivasaï kuḍīraĕ kira varāu
text.4601: uddāliu maĩ tahŏ taṃ kalattu  $  sŏ vi marĕvi surattaṇu kahi mi pattu
text.4602: muu haü mi videhahĕ dehĕ āu  $  ṇiu deveṃ jāṇaï-jamala-jāu
text.4603: vaṇĕ ghattiu kaṇṭeṇa vi ṇa bhiṇṇu  $  pupphavaïhĕ paĩ sāẏarĕṇa diṇṇu
text.4605: vaddhiu tumha gharĕ  $  jaṇu saẏalu vi ĕu pariẏāṇaï
text.4606: jaṇaü jaṇeru mahu  $  māẏari videha sasa jāṇaï"
text.4610: vittantu kaheppiṇu ṇiravasesu  $  gaü vandaṇahattiĕ taṃ paesu
text.4611: jahĩ vasaï mahārisi saccabhūi  $  jahĩ jiṇavara-ṇhavaṇa-mahāvibhūi
text.4613: sattuhaṇa-bharaha jahĩ miliẏa ve vi  $  gaü tahĩ bhāmaṇḍalu jaṇaṇu levi
text.4614: jiṇu vandiu mokkha-valagga-jaṅghu  $  puṇu guru-parivāḍiĕ savaṇa-saṅghu
text.4615: puṇu kiu saṃbhāsaṇu samaü tehĩ  $  sattuhaṇa-bharaha-vala-lakkhaṇehĩ
text.4616: jāṇāviu sīẏahĕ bhāi jema  $  jiha hari-vala-sālā sāvaleva
text.4617: suu parama-dhammu suha-bhāẏaṇeṇa  $  tavacaraṇu laẏaü candāẏaṇeṇa
text.4619: dasarahu aṇṇa-diṇĕ  $  kira rāmahŏ rajju samappaï
text.4620: kekkaẏa tāva maṇĕ  $  uṇhālaĕ dharaṇi va tappaï
text.4624: ṇarindassa soūṇa pavvajja-ẏajjaṃ  $  sa-rāmāhirāmassa rāmassa rajjaṃ
text.4629: gaẏā kekkaẏā jattha atthāṇa-maggo  $  ṇarindo surindo va pīḍhaṃ valaggo
text.4630: varo maggio "ṇāha so esa kālo  $  mahaṃ ṇandaṇo ṭhāu rajjāṇupālo"
text.4631: "pie hou evaṃ" tao sāvalevo  $  samāẏārio lakkhaṇo rāmaevo
text.4633: "jaï tuhũ puttu mahu  $  to ettiu pesaṇu kijjaï
text.4638: ahavaï bharahu vi āsaṇṇa-bhavvu  $  so cintaï athiru asāru savvu
text.4639: gharu pariẏaṇu jīviu sarīru vittu  $  acchaï tavacaraṇa-ṇihitta-cittu
text.4640: paĩ muĕvi tāsu jaï diṇṇu rajju  $  to lakkhaṇu lakkhaĩ haṇaï ajju
text.4641: ṇa vi haũ ṇa vi bharahu ṇa kekkaẏā vi  $  sattuhaṇu kumāru ṇa suppahā vi"
text.4643: "puttahŏ puttattaṇu ettiuṃ jĕ  $  jaṃ kulu ṇa caḍāvaï vasaṇa-puñjĕ
text.4644: jaṃ ṇiẏa-jaṇaṇahŏ āṇā-viheu  $  jaṃ karaï vivakkhahŏ pāṇa-cheu
text.4645: kiṃ putteṃ puṇu paẏapūraṇeṇa  $  guṇa-hīṇeṃ hiẏaẏa-visūraṇeṇa
text.4647: lakkhaṇu ṇa vi haṇaï  $  tavu bhāvahŏ saccu paẏāsahŏ
text.4648: bhuñjaü bharahu mahi  $  haũ jāmi tāẏa vaṇa-vāsahŏ
text.4652: hakkāriu bharahu ṇaresareṇa  $  puṇu vuccaï ṇeha-mahābhareṇa
text.4653: "taü chattaĩ taü vaïsaṇaü rajju  $  sāhevaü maĩ appaṇaü kajju"
text.4654: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi dummiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  dhikkāriu kekkaẏa-ṇandaṇeṇa
text.4655: "tuhũ tāẏa dhigatthu dhigatthu rajju  $  māẏari dhigatthu sirĕ paḍaü vajju
text.4656: ṇaü jāṇahũ mahilahã ko sahāu  $  jovvaṇa-maeṇa ṇa gaṇanti pāu
text.4657: ṇaü vujjhahi tuhu mi mahā-maẏandhu  $  kiṃ rāmu muĕvi mahu paṭṭa-vandhu
text.4658: sappurisa vi cañcala-citta honti  $  maṇĕ juttājuttu ṇa cintavanti
text.4659: māṇikku muĕvi ko lei kaccu  $  kāmandhahŏ kira kahĩ taṇaü saccu
text.4661: acchahũ puṇu vi gharĕ  $  sattuhaṇu rāmu haũ lakkhaṇu
text.4662: aliu ma hohi tuhũ  $  mahi bhuñjĕ bhaḍārā appuṇu"
text.4667: "kekkaẏahĕ rajju rāmahŏ pavāsu  $  pavvajja majjhu eu jagĕ pagāsu
text.4668: tuhũ pālĕ gharāsaü parama-rammu  $  ṇaü āẏahŏ pāsiu ko vi dhammu
text.4670: rakkhijjaï sīlu kusīla-ṇāsu  $  kijjaï jiṇa-pujja mahovavāsu
text.4672: ehu savvahũ dhammahũ parama-dhammu  $  jo pālaï tahŏ sura-maṇuẏa-jammu"
text.4673: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi saïttaṇeṇa  $  vuccaï suhamaï-dohittaeṇa
text.4675: "jaï ghara-vāsĕ suhu  $  euṃ jĕ tāẏa paḍivajjahi
text.4676: to tiṇa-samu gaṇĕvi  $  kajjeṇa keṇa pavvajjahi"
text.4680: to kheḍu muĕvi dasarahĕṇa vuttu  $  "jaï saccaü tuhũ mahu taṇaü puttu
text.4681: to kiṃ pavvajjahĕ karahi vigghu  $  kulavaṃsa-dhurandharu hohi sigghu
text.4682: kekkaẏahĕ saccu jaṃ diṇṇu āsi  $  taṃ ṇiriṇu karahi guṇa-raẏaṇa-rāsi"
text.4684: "guṇu kevalu vasuhaĕ bhuttiẏāĕ  $  kiṃ khaṇĕ khaṇĕ utta-paüttiẏāĕ
text.4685: pālijjaü tāẏahŏ taṇiẏa vāẏa  $  laï mahu uvaroheṃ pihivi bhāẏa"
text.4690: paṭṭu ṇivaddhu sirĕ  $  rahu-suĕṇa sa ẏaṃ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ
text.4697: ṇamiūṇa bhaḍāraü risaha-jiṇu  $  puṇu kavvahŏ uppari karami maṇu
text.4699: kiṃ cittaĩ geṇhĕvi sakkiẏaĩ  $  vāseṇa vi jāĩ ṇa rañjiẏaĩ
text.4700: to kavaṇu gahaṇu amhārisĕhĩ  $  vāẏaraṇa-vihūṇĕhĩ ārisĕhĩ
text.4701: kaï atthi aṇeẏa bheẏa-bhariẏa  $  je suẏaṇa-sahāsĕhĩ āẏariẏa
text.4704: haũ kiṃ pi ṇa jāṇami mukkhu maṇĕ  $  ṇiẏa vuddhi paẏāsami to vi jaṇĕ
text.4705: jaṃ saẏalĕ vi tihuvaṇĕ vitthariu  $  ārambhiu puṇu rāhavacariu
text.4708: paṭṭaṇu ujjha muevi  $  gaü vaṇa-vāsahŏ rāhaü
text.4714: sampaẏa riddhi viddhi avagaṇṇĕvi  $  tāẏahŏ taṇaü saccu parimaṇṇĕvi
text.4715: ṇiggaü valu valu ṇāĩ hareppiṇu  $  lakkhaṇo vi lakkhaṇaĩ laeppiṇu
text.4716: saṃcallehĩ tehĩ viddāṇaü  $  ṭhiu heṭṭhāmuhu dasarahu rāṇaü
text.4717: hiẏavaĕ ṇāĩ tisūleṃ salliu  $  "rāhaü kiha vaṇa-vāsahŏ ghalliu
text.4718: dhigadhigatthu" jaṇaeṇa pavolliu  $  "laṅghiu kula-kamu vi sumahallaü
text.4719: ahavaï jaï maĩ saccu ṇa pāliu  $  to ṇiẏa-ṇāmu gottu maĩ maïliu
text.4720: vari gaü rāmu ṇa saccu viṇāsiu  $  saccu mahantaü savvahŏ pāsiu
text.4721: sacceṃ amvarĕ tavaï divāẏaru  $  sacceṃ samaü ṇa cukkaï sāẏaru
text.4722: sacceṃ vāu vāi mahi paccaï  $  sacceṃ osahi khaẏahŏ ṇa vaccaï
text.4724: jo ṇa vi pālaï saccu  $  muhĕ dāḍhiẏaü vahantaü
text.4725: ṇivaḍaï ṇaraẏa-samuddĕ  $  vasu jĕma aliu cavantaü
text.4729: cintāvaṇṇu ṇarāhiu jāvĕhĩ  $  valu ṇiẏa-ṇilaü parāiu tāvĕhĩ
text.4730: dummaṇu entu ṇihāliu māẏaĕ  $  puṇu ṇihasevi vuttu piẏa-vāẏaĕ
text.4731: "divĕ divĕ caḍahi turaṅgama-ṇāĕhĩ  $  ajju kāĩ aṇuvāhaṇu pāĕhĩ
text.4732: divĕ divĕ vandiṇa-vindĕhĩ thuvvahi  $  ajju kāĩ thuvvantu ṇa suvvahi
text.4733: divĕ divĕ dhuvvahi camara-sahāsĕhĩ  $  ajju kāĩ taü ko vi ṇa pāsĕhĩ
text.4734: divĕ divĕ loẏahĩ vuccahi rāṇaü  $  ajju kāĩ dīsahi viddāṇaü"
text.4735: taṃ ṇisuṇevi valeṇa pajampiu  $  "bharahahŏ saẏalu vi rajju samappiu
text.4736: jāmi māĕ diḍha hiẏavaĕ hojjahi  $  jaṃ dummiẏa taṃ savvu khamejjahi"
text.4738: jeṃ āucchiẏa māẏa  $  "hā hā putta" bhaṇantī
text.4743: rāmeṃ jaṇaṇi jaṃ jĕ āucchiẏa  $  ṇiru ṇicceẏaṇa takkhaṇĕ mucchiẏa
text.4744: lañjiẏāhĩ "hā māĕ" bhaṇantihĩ  $  hariẏandaṇĕṇa sitta rovantihĩ
text.4745: camarukkhevĕhĩ kiẏa paḍivāẏaṇa  $  dukkhu dukkhu puṇu jāẏa sa-ceẏaṇa
text.4746: aṅgu valanti samuṭṭhiẏa rāṇī  $  sappi va daṇḍāhaẏa viddāṇī
text.4747: ṇīlakkhaṇa ṇīrāmummāhiẏa  $  puṇu vi sadukkhaü melliẏa dhāhiẏa
text.4748: "hā hā kāĩ vuttu paĩ halahara  $  dasaraha-vaṃsa-dīva jaga-sundara
text.4749: paĩ viṇu ko pallaṅkĕ suvesaï  $  paĩ viṇu ko atthāṇĕ vaīsaï
text.4750: paĩ viṇu ko haẏa-gaẏahũ caḍesaï  $  paĩ viṇu ko jhinduĕṇa ramesaï
text.4751: paĩ viṇu rāẏalacchi ko māṇaï  $  paĩ viṇu ko tamvolu samāṇaï
text.4752: paĩ viṇu ko para-valu bhañjesaï  $  paĩ viṇu ko maĩ sāhāresaï"
text.4759: tā etthantarĕ asura-vimaddeṃ  $  dhīriẏa ṇiẏa-jaṇeri valahaddeṃ
text.4760: "dhīriẏa hohi māĕ kiṃ rovahi  $  luhi loẏaṇa appāṇu ma soẏahi
text.4761: jiha ravi-kiraṇĕhĩ sasi ṇa pahāvaï  $  tiha maĩ honteṃ bharahu ṇa bhāvaï
text.4762: teṃ kajjeṃ vaṇa-vāsĕ vasevaü  $  tāẏahŏ taṇaü saccu pālevaü
text.4763: dāhiṇa-desĕ kareviṇu thatti  $  tumhahã pāsĕ ei somitti
text.4764: ema bhaṇeppiṇu caliu turantaü  $  saẏalu vi pariẏaṇu āucchantaü
text.4766: soha ṇa dei ṇa cittahŏ bhāvaï  $  ṇahu ṇiccandāiccaü ṇāvaï
text.4767: ṇaṃ kiẏa-uddha-hatthu dhāhāvaï  $  valahŏ kalatta-hāṇi ṇaṃ dāvaï
text.4768: bharaha-ṇarindahŏ ṇaṃ jāṇāvaï  $  "hari-vala janta ṇivārahi ṇaravaï"
text.4769: puṇu pāāra-bhuẏaü pasareppiṇu  $  ṇāĩ ṇivāraï āliṅgeppiṇu
text.4772: tahŏ mandirahŏ ruẏantahŏ  $  ṇāĩ viṇiggaẏa pāṇā
text.4777: sīẏāevihĕ vaẏaṇu ṇihāliu  $  ṇaṃ citteṇa cittu saṃcāliu
text.4778: ṇiẏa-mandirahŏ viṇiggaẏa jāṇaï  $  ṇaṃ himavantahŏ gaṅga mahā-ṇaï
text.4779: ṇaṃ chandahŏ ṇiggaẏa gāẏattī  $  ṇaṃ saddahŏ ṇīsariẏa vihattī
text.4780: ṇāĩ kitti sappurisa-vimukkī  $  ṇāĩ rambha ṇiẏa-thāṇahŏ cukkī
text.4790: rāẏa-vāru valu voliu jāvĕhĩ  $  lakkhaṇu maṇĕ ārosiu tāvĕhĩ
text.4791: uṭṭhiu dhagadhagantu jasa-luddhaü  $  ṇāĩ ghieṇa sittu dhūmaddhaü
text.4792: ṇāĩ maïndu mahā-ghaṇa-gajjiĕ  $  tiha somitti kuviu gamĕ sajjiĕ
text.4793: "keṃ dharaṇinda-phaṇā-maṇi toḍiu  $  keṃ sura-kulisa-daṇḍu bhuĕ moḍiu
text.4794: keṃ palaẏāṇalĕ appaü ḍhoiu  $  keṃ āruṭṭhaü saṇi avaloiu
text.4795: keṃ raẏaṇāẏaru sosĕvi sakkiu  $  keṃ āiccahŏ teu kalaṅkiu
text.4796: keṃ mahi-maṇḍalu vāhahĩ ṭāliu  $  keṃ taïlokka-cakku saṃcāliu
text.4797: keṃ jiu kālu kiẏantu mahāhavĕ  $  ko pahu aṇṇu jiẏantaĕ rāhavĕ
text.4799: ahavaï kiṃ vahueṇa  $  bharahu dhareppiṇu ajju
text.4805: duṇṇivāru duvvāra-vāraṇo  $  suu cavantu jaṃ ema lakkhaṇo
text.4806: bhaṇaï rāmu taïlokka-sundaro  $  "paĩ viruddhĕ kiṃ ko vi duddharo
text.4807: jasu paḍanti giri siṃha-ṇāĕṇaṃ  $  kavaṇu gahaṇu to bharaha-rāĕṇaṃ
text.4808: kavaṇu cojju jaṃ divi divāẏare  $  amiu candĕ jala-ṇivahu sāẏare
text.4809: sokkhu mokkhĕ daẏa-dhammu jiṇavare  $  visu bhuẏaṅgĕ vara līla gaẏavare
text.4810: dhaṇaĕ riddhi sohaggu vammahe  $  gaï marālĕ jaẏa-lacchi mahumahe
text.4811: paürusaṃ ca paĩ kuviĕ lakkhaṇe"  $  bhaṇĕvi ema karĕ dhariu takkhaṇe
text.4814: solaha varisaĩ jāma  $  ve vi  vasahũ vaṇa-vāseṃ"
text.4818: eha volla ṇimmāiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  ḍhukku bhāṇu atthavaṇahŏ tāvĕhĩ
text.4819: jāẏa sañjha āratta padīsiẏa  $  ṇaṃ gaẏa-ghaḍa sindūra-vihūsiẏa
text.4821: galiẏa sañjha puṇu raẏaṇi parāiẏa  $  jagu gilei ṇaṃ suttu mahāiẏa
text.4822: kahi mi divva dīvaẏa-saẏa vohiẏa  $  phaṇi-maṇi vva pajalanta su-sohiẏa
text.4823: titthu kālĕ ṇiru ṇiccaṃ duggamĕ  $  ṇīsaranti raẏaṇihĕ canduggamĕ
text.4826: vigaẏapaoli pavolĕvi khāiẏa  $  siddhakūḍu jiṇa-bhavaṇu parāiẏa
text.4830: tahŏ bhavaṇahŏ pāsehĩ  $  viviha mahā-duma diṭṭhā
text.4835: taṃ ṇiĕvi bhuvaṇu bhuvaṇesarahŏ  $  puṇu kiu paṇivāu jiṇesarahŏ
text.4839: jaẏa jaẏa tava-sūra tiloẏa-hiẏa  $  jaẏa maṇa-vicitta-aruṇeṃ sahiẏa
text.4846: jaẏa jaẏa bhuvaṇekka-cakka-bhamiẏa  $  jaẏa mokkha-mahīharĕ atthamiẏa
text.4848: bhāveṃ tihi mi jaṇehĩ  $  vandaṇa karĕvi jiṇesahŏ
text.4849: paẏahiṇa devi tivāra  $  puṇu caliẏaĩ vaṇa-vāsahŏ
text.4853: raẏaṇihĕ majjhĕ paẏaṭṭaï rāhavu  $  tāma ṇiẏacchiu paramu mahāhavu
text.4854: kuddhaĩ viddhaĩ pulaẏa-visaṭṭaĩ  $  mihuṇaĩ valaĩ jema abbhiṭṭaĩ
text.4855: "valu valu" ekkamekka kokkantaĩ  $  "maru maru paharu paharu" jampantaĩ
text.4857: khaṇĕ ovaḍiẏaĩ ahara ḍasantaĩ  $  khaṇĕ kiliviṇḍi-hiṇḍiṃ darisantaĩ
text.4858: khaṇĕ vahu vālāluñci karantaĩ  $  khaṇĕ ṇipphandaĩ seu phusantaĩ
text.4859: taṃ pekkheppiṇu suraẏa-mahāhaü  $  sīẏahĕ vaẏaṇu pajoẏaï rāhaü
text.4860: puṇu vi hasantaĩ keli karantaĩ  $  caliẏaĩ haṭṭa-maggu joẏantaĩ
text.4862: je vi ramantā āsi  $  lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ saṅkĕvi
text.4863: ṇāvaï suraẏāsatta  $  āvaṇa thiẏa muhu ḍhaṅkĕvi
text.4867: ujjhahĕ dāhiṇa-disaĕ viṇiggaẏa  $  ṇāĩ ṇiraṅkusa matta mahā-gaẏa
text.4868: ṇa sahaï puri vala-lakkhaṇa-mukkī  $  mukka ku-ṇāri va pesaṇa-cukkī
text.4869: puṇu thovantarĕ vitthaẏa-ṇāmahŏ  $  taruvara ṇamiẏa subhicca va rāmahŏ
text.4870: uṭṭhiẏa vihaẏa vamālu karantā  $  ṇaṃ vandiṇa maṅgalaĩ paḍhantā
text.4871: addha-kosu saṃpāiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  vimalu vihāṇu caüddisu tāvĕhĩ
text.4872: ṇisi-ṇisiẏariĕ āsi jaṃ giliẏaü  $  ṇāĩ paḍīvaü jaü uggiliẏaü
text.4873: rehaï sūra-vimvu uggantaü  $  ṇāvaï sukaï-kavvu paha-vantaü
text.4874: pacchaĕ sāhaṇu tāma padhāiu  $  lahu halaheihĕ pāsu parāiu
text.4877: ṇaṃ vandiu ahiseĕ  $  jiṇu vattīsahĩ indĕhĩ
text.4882: ṇaṃ disa-gaü līlaĕ paẏaĩ dentu  $  taṃ desu parāiu pāriẏattu
text.4883: aṇṇu vi thovantaru jāi jāma  $  gambhīra mahāṇaï diṭṭha tāma
text.4888: ucchalaï valaï paḍikhalaï dhāi  $  malhanti mahāgaẏa-līla ṇāĩ
text.4895: sari gambhīra ṇiẏacchiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  saẏalu vi seṇṇu ṇiẏattiu tāvĕhĩ
text.4896: "tumhĕhĩ evahĩ āṇavaḍicchā  $  bharahahŏ bhicca hoha hiẏaïcchā
text.4897: ujjha mueppiṇu dāhiṇaesahŏ  $  amhĕhĩ jāevaü vaṇa-vāsahŏ"
text.4899: païsaranti tahĩ salilĕ bhaẏaṅkarĕ  $  rāmahŏ caḍiẏa sīẏa vāmaĕ karĕ
text.4900: siẏa aravindahŏ uppari ṇāvaï  $  ṇāvaï ṇiẏaẏa-kitti darisāvaï
text.4901: ṇaṃ ujjou karāvaï gaẏaṇahŏ  $  ṇāĩ padarisaï dhaṇa dahavaẏaṇahŏ
text.4902: lahu jalavāhiṇi-puliṇu pavaṇṇaĩ  $  ṇaṃ bhaviẏaĩ ṇaraẏahŏ uttiṇṇaĩ
text.4904: valiẏa paḍīvā joha  $  je pahu-pacchalĕ laggā
text.4905: ku-muṇi ku-vuddhi ku-sīla  $  ṇaṃ pavvajjahĕ bhaggā
text.4909: valu volāvĕvi rāẏa ṇiẏattā  $  ṇāvaï siddhi ku-siddha ṇa pattā
text.4910: valiẏa ke vi ṇīsāsu muantā  $  khaṇĕ khaṇĕ "hā hā rāma" bhaṇantā
text.4911: ke vi mahanteṃ dukkheṃ laïẏā  $  lou karevi ke vi pavvaïẏā
text.4912: ke vi timuṇḍa-dhāri vambhāriẏa  $  ke vi tikāla-joi vaẏa-dhāriẏa
text.4913: ke vi pavaṇa-dhuẏa-dhavala-visālaĕ  $  gampiṇu tahĩ hariseṇa-jiṇālaĕ
text.4919: saṃjama-ṇiẏama-guṇehĩ  $  appaü thiẏa sa iṃ bhū sĕvi
text.4921: gaĕ vaṇa-vāsahŏ rāmĕ  $  ujjha ṇa cittahŏ bhāvaï
text.4922: thiẏa ṇīsāsa muanti  $  mahi uṇhālaĕ ṇāvaï
text.4926: saẏalu vi jaṇu ummāhijjantaü  $  khaṇu vi ṇa thakkaï ṇāmu laẏantaü
text.4927: uvvellijjaï gijjaï lakkhaṇu  $  murava-vajjĕ vāijjaï lakkhaṇu
text.4929: aṇṇu vi jaṃ jaṃ kiṃ pi sa-lakkhaṇu  $  lakkhaṇa-ṇāmeṃ vuccaï lakkhaṇu
text.4930: kā vi ṇāri sāraṅgi va vuṇṇī  $  vaḍḍī dhāha muevi paruṇṇī
text.4931: kā vi ṇāri jaṃ lei pasāhaṇu  $  taṃ ulhāvaï jāṇaï lakkhaṇu
text.4932: kā vi ṇāri jaṃ parihaï kaṅkaṇu  $  dharaï su-gāḍhaü jāṇaï lakkhaṇu
text.4933: kā vi ṇāri jaṃ joẏaï dappaṇu  $  aṇṇu ṇa pekkhaï mellĕvi lakkhaṇu
text.4934: to etthantarĕ pāṇiẏa-hāriu  $  purĕ vollanti paropparu ṇāriu
text.4935: "so pallaṅku taṃ jĕ uvahāṇaü  $  sejja vi sa jjĕ taṃ jĕ pacchāṇaü
text.4937: taṃ gharu raẏaṇaĩ tāĩ  $  taṃ cittaẏammu sa-lakkhaṇu
text.4938: ṇavara ṇa dīsaï māĕ  $  rāmu sasīẏa-salakkhaṇu"
text.4942: tāma paḍu paḍaha paḍipahaẏa pahu-paṅgaṇe  $  ṇāĩ sura-dunduhī diṇṇa gaẏaṇaṅgaṇe
text.4943: rasiẏa saẏa saṅkha jāẏaṃ mahā-gondalaṃ  $  ṭivila-ṭaṇṭanta-ghummanta-varamandalaṃ
text.4948: suhaḍa-saṃghāẏa savvā ẏa thiẏa paṅgaṇe  $  meru-siharesu ṇaṃ amara jiṇa-jammaṇe
text.4949: paṇaï-phamphāva-ṇaḍa-chatta-kaï-vandaṇaṃ  $  "ṇanda jaẏa bhadda jaẏa jaẏahi" vara-saddaṇaṃ
text.4956: jaṃ ṇīsariu rāu āṇandeṃ  $  vuttu ṇaveppiṇu bharaha-ṇarindeṃ
text.4957: "haü mi deva paĩ sahũ pavvajjami  $  duggaï-gāmiu rajju ṇa bhuñjami
text.4958: rajju asāru vāru saṃsārahŏ  $  rajju khaṇeṇa ṇei tamvārahŏ
text.4959: rajju bhaẏaṅkaru iha-para-loẏahŏ  $  rajjeṃ gammaï ṇicca-ṇigoẏahŏ
text.4960: rajjeṃ hou hou mahu sariẏaü  $  sundaru to kiṃ paĩ parihariẏaü
text.4961: rajju akajju kahiu muṇi-cheẏahĩ  $  duṭṭha-kalattu va bhuttu aṇeẏahĩ
text.4962: dosavantu maẏalañchaṇa-vimvu va  $  vahu-dukkhāuru dugga-kuḍumvu va
text.4963: to vi jīu puṇu rajjahŏ kaṅkhaï  $  aṇudiṇu āu galantu ṇa lakkhaï
text.4965: jiha mahu-vinduhĕ kajjĕ  $  karahu ṇa pekkhaï kakkaru
text.4966: tiha jiu visaẏāsattu  $  rajjeṃ gaü saẏa-sakkaru"
text.4970: bharahu cavantu ṇivāriu rāeṃ  $  "ajja vi tujjhu kāĩ tava-vāeṃ
text.4971: ajja vi rajju karahi suhu bhuñjahi  $  ajja vi visaẏa-sukkhu aṇuhuñjahi
text.4972: ajja vi tuhũ tamvolu samāṇahi  $  ajja vi vara-ujjāṇaĩ māṇahi
text.4973: ajju vi aṅgu sa-icchaĕ maṇḍahi  $  ajja vi vara-vilaẏaü avaruṇḍahi
text.4974: ajja vi joggaü savvāharaṇahŏ  $  ajja vi kavaṇu kālu tava-caraṇahŏ
text.4975: jiṇa-pavvajja hoi aï-dusahiẏa  $  keṃ vāvīsa parīsaha visahiẏa
text.4976: keṃ jiẏa caü-kasāẏa-riu dujjaẏa  $  keṃ āẏāmiẏa pañca mahavvaẏa
text.4977: keṃ kiu pañcahũ visaẏahũ ṇiggahu  $  keṃ parisesiu saẏalu pariggahu
text.4978: ko duma-mūlĕ vasiu varisālaĕ  $  ko ekkaṅgeṃ thiu sīẏālaĕ
text.4979: keṃ uṇhālaĕ kiu attāvaṇu  $  ĕu tava-caraṇu hoi bhīsāvaṇu
text.4981: bharaha ma vaḍḍhiu volli  $  tuhũ so ajja vi vālu
text.4986: taṃ ṇisuṇevi bharahu āruṭṭhaü  $  matta-gaïndu va citteṃ duṭṭhaü
text.4987: "viruẏaü tāva vaẏaṇu paĩ vuttaü  $  kiṃ vālahŏ tava-caraṇu ṇa juttaü
text.4988: kiṃ vālattaṇu suhĕhĩ ṇa muccaï  $  kiṃ vālahŏ daẏa-dhammu ṇa ruccaï
text.4989: kiṃ vālahŏ pavvajja ma hoo  $  kiṃ vālahŏ dūsiu para-loo
text.4990: kiṃ vālahŏ sammattu ma hoo  $  kiṃ vālahŏ ṇaü iṭṭha-vioo
text.4991: kiṃ vālahŏ jara-maraṇu ṇa ḍhukkaï  $  kiṃ vālahŏ jamu divasu vi cukkaï"
text.4992: taṃ ṇisuṇevi bharahu ṇibbhacchiu  $  "to kiṃ pahilaü paṭṭu paḍicchiu
text.4993: evahĩ saẏalu vi rajju karevaü  $  pacchalĕ puṇu tava-caraṇu carevaü"
text.4995: ema bhaṇeppiṇu rāu  $  saccu samappĕvi bhajjahĕ
text.4996: bharahahŏ vandhĕvi paṭṭu  $  dasarahu gaü pavvajjahĕ
text.5001: dasarahu thiu pavvajja laeppiṇu  $  pañca muṭṭhi sirĕ lou kareppiṇu
text.5002: teṇa samāṇu saṇeheṃ laïẏaü  $  cālīsottaru saü pavvaïẏaü
text.5003: kaṇṭhā-kaḍaẏa-maüḍa avaẏārĕvi  $  duddhara pañca mahavvaẏa dhārĕvi
text.5004: thiẏa ṇīsaṅga ṇāga ṇaṃ visahara  $  ahavaï samaẏa-vāla ṇaṃ visahara
text.5005: ṇaṃ kesari gaẏa-māsāhāriẏa  $  ṇaṃ paradāra-gamaṇa paradāriẏa
text.5006: keṇa vi kahiu tāma bharahesahŏ  $  "gaẏa somitti-rāma vaṇa-vāsahŏ"
text.5007: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu dhuẏa-vāhaü  $  paḍiu mahīharo vva vajjāhaü
text.5009: jaṃ mucchāviu rāu  $  saẏalu vi jaṇu muha-kāẏaru
text.5015: dukkhu dukkhu āsāsiu rāṇaü  $  jaraḍha-miẏaṅku va thiu viddāṇaü
text.5017: "ṇivaḍiẏa ajju asaṇi āẏāsahŏ  $  ajju amaṅgalu dasaraha-vaṃsahŏ
text.5018: ajju jāu haũ sūḍiẏa-pakkhaü  $  duha-bhāẏaṇu para-muhahã uvekkhaü
text.5019: ajju ṇaẏaru siẏa-sampaẏa-melliu  $  ajju rajju para-cakkeṃ pelliu"
text.5020: ema palāu karevi sahaggaĕ  $  rāhava-jaṇaṇihĕ gaü olaggaĕ
text.5021: kesa-visaṇṭhula diṭṭha ruantī  $  aṃsu-pavāha dhāha mellantī
text.5028: ema bhaṇevi bharahu saṃcalliu  $  "turiu gavesahŏ" hatthutthalliu
text.5029: diṇṇu saṅkhu jaẏa-paḍahu pavajjiu  $  ṇaṃ canduggamĕ uvahi pagajjiu
text.5030: pahu-maggeṇa ṇarāhiu laggaü  $  jīvahŏ kammu jema aṇulaggaü
text.5031: chaṭṭhaĕ divasĕ parāiu tettahĕ  $  sīẏa sa-lakkhaṇu rāhaü jettahĕ
text.5032: chuḍu chuḍu salilu pievi ṇiviṭṭhaĩ  $  saravara-tīrĕ laẏāharĕ diṭṭhaĩ
text.5033: calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu bharahu taggaẏa-maṇu  $  ṇāĩ jiṇindahŏ dasasaẏa-loẏaṇu
text.5034: "thakku deva maṃ jāhi pavāsahŏ  $  hohi taraṇḍaü dasaraha-vaṃsahŏ
text.5035: haũ sattuhaṇu bhicca taü ve vi  $  lakkhaṇu manti sīẏa mahaevi
text.5037: jiha ṇakkhattĕhĩ candu  $  indu jema sura-loeṃ
text.5038: tiha tuhũ bhuñjahi rajju  $  parimiu vandhava-loeṃ"
text.5042: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi dasaraha-sueṇa  $  avagūḍhu bharahu harisiẏa-bhueṇa
text.5043: "saccaü māẏā-piẏa-parama-dāsu  $  paĩ mellĕvi aṇṇahŏ viṇaü kāsu"
text.5044: avaropparu e ālāva jāma  $  tahĩ juvaï-saẏahĩ pariẏariẏa tāma
text.5045: lakkhijjaï bharahahŏ taṇiẏa māẏa  $  ṇaṃ gaẏa-ghaḍa bhaḍa bhañjanti āẏa
text.5046: ṇaṃ tilaẏa-vihūsiẏa vaccharāi  $  sa-paohara amvara-soha ṇāĩ
text.5047: ṇaṃ bharahahŏ sampaẏa-riddhi-viddhi  $  ṇaṃ rāmahŏ gamaṇahŏ taṇiẏa siddhi
text.5048: ṇaṃ bharahahŏ sundara-sokkha-khāṇi  $  ṇaṃ rāmahŏ iṭṭha-kalatta-hāṇi
text.5049: ṇaṃ bhaṇaï bharahu "tuhũ āu āu  $  vaṇa-vāsahŏ rāhaü jāu jāu"
text.5052: kaha vāẏaraṇahŏ jema  $  kekkaẏa enti padīsiẏa
text.5057: puṇu vuccaï sīra-ppaharaṇeṇa  $  "kiṃ āṇiu bharahu akāraṇeṇa
text.5058: suṇu māĕ mahāraü parama-taccu  $  pālevaü tāẏahŏ taṇaü saccu
text.5059: ṇaü turaĕhĩ ṇaü rahavarĕhĩ kajju  $  ṇaü solaha varisaĩ karami rajju
text.5060: jaṃ diṇṇu saccu tāeṃ ti-vāra  $  taṃ maï mi diṇṇu tumha saẏa-vāra"
text.5061: ĕu vaẏaṇu bhaṇeppiṇu suha-samiddhu  $  saĩ hattheṃ bharahahŏ paṭṭu vaddhu
text.5062: āucchĕvi para-vala-maïẏavaṭṭu  $  vaṇa-vāsahŏ rāhaü puṇu paẏaṭṭu
text.5063: gaü bharahu ṇiẏattu su-pujjamāṇu  $  jiṇa-bhavaṇu pattu bhiccĕhĩ samāṇu
text.5065: vihũ muṇi-dhavalahũ pāsĕ  $  bharaheṃ laïu avaggahu
text.5070: ema cavĕvi uccaliu mahāiu  $  rāhava-jaṇaṇihĕ bhavaṇu parāiu
text.5071: viṇaü kareppiṇu pāsu paḍhukkiu  $  "rāmu māĕ maĩ dharĕvi ṇa sakkiu
text.5073: dhīrĕvi ema jaṇaṇi daṇu-damaṇahŏ  $  bharahu ṇarāhiu gaü ṇiẏa-bhavaṇahŏ
text.5074: jāṇaï hari halaharu viharantaĩ  $  tiṇṇi mi tāvasa-vaṇu saṃpattaĩ
text.5075: tāvasa ke vi diṭṭha jaḍa-hāriẏa  $  ku-jaṇa ku-gāma jema jaḍa-hāriẏa
text.5076: ke vi tidaṇḍi ke vi dhāḍīsara  $  kuviẏa ṇarinda jema dhāḍīsara
text.5077: ke vi rudda ruddaṅkusa-hatthā  $  meṭṭhu jema ruddaṅkusa-hatthā
text.5080: vihĩ pakkhehĩ samāṇa  $  puṇṇima ṇāĩ padīsiẏa
text.5084: aṇṇu vi thovantaru viharantaĩ  $  vaṇu dhāṇukkahã puṇu saṃpattaĩ
text.5086: kanda-mūla-vahu-vaṇaphala-bhuñjaü  $  sirĕ vaḍa-māla vaddha galĕ guñjaü
text.5088: maẏakari-kumbhu kareppiṇu ukkhalu  $  levi visāṇa-musalu dhavalujjalu
text.5090: taṃ tehaü vaṇu bhillahũ keraü  $  hari-valaevĕhĩ kiu vivareraü
text.5097: sa-hari sa-bhajjaü rāmu dhaṇuddharu  $  aṇṇu vi jāma jāi thovantaru
text.5098: diṭṭhaĩ goṭṭhaẏa ṇāĩ su-vesaĩ  $  ṇaṃ ṇaravaï-mandiraĩ su-vesaĩ
text.5100: katthaï vaccha-haṇaĩ ṇīsaṅgaĩ  $  pavvaïẏāĩ va ṇiru ṇīsaṅgaĩ
text.5101: katthaï jaṇavaü sisireṃ cacciu  $  paḍhama-sūi sirĕ dharĕvi paṇacciu
text.5102: katthaï manthā-manthiẏa-manthaṇi  $  kuṇaï saddu surae va vilāsiṇi
text.5103: katthaï ṇāri-ṇiẏamvĕ suhāsiu  $  ṇāvaï kuḍaü kuṇaï muhavāsiu
text.5104: katthaï ḍimbhaü pariẏandijjaï  $  ammāhīraü geu jhuṇijjaï
text.5107: ṇāvaï tihi mi jaṇehĩ  $  vālattaṇu saṃbhariẏaü
text.5111: taṃ melleppiṇu goṭṭhu ravaṇṇaü  $  puṇu vaṇu païsaranti āraṇṇaü
text.5113: vaṇaṃ jiṇālaẏaṃ jahā sa-candaṇaṃ  $  jiṇinda-sāsaṇaṃ jahā sa-sāvaẏaṃ
text.5114: mahā-raṇaṅgaṇaṃ jahā savāsaṇaṃ  $  maïnda-kandharaṃ jahā sa-kesaraṃ
text.5115: ṇarinda-mandiraṃ jahā sa-māuẏaṃ  $  susañca-ṇacciẏaṃ jahā sa-tālaẏaṃ
text.5116: jiṇesa-ṇhāṇaẏaṃ jahā mahāsaraṃ  $  ku-tāvase tavaṃ jahā maẏāsavaṃ
text.5117: muṇinda-jīviẏaṃ jahā sa-mokkhaẏaṃ  $  mahā-ṇahaṅgaṇaṃ jahā sa-somaẏaṃ
text.5118: miẏaṅka-vimvaẏaṃ jahā maẏāsaẏaṃ  $  vilāsiṇī-muhaṃ jahā mahārasaṃ
text.5120: taṃ vaṇu mellĕvi tāĩ  $  inda-disaĕ āsaṇṇaĩ
text.5125: taṃ cittaüḍu muevi turantaĩ  $  dasaürapura-sīmantaru pattaĩ
text.5127: ujjāṇaĩ sohanti su-pattaĩ  $  muṇivara iva su-halāĩ su-pattaĩ
text.5128: sālivaṇaĩ paṇamanti su-bhattaĩ  $  ṇaṃ sāvaẏaĩ jiṇesara-bhattaĩ
text.5131: sīrakuḍumviu maṇusu padīsiu  $  vuṇṇu kuraṅgu va vāhuttāsiu
text.5135: āṇiu rāmahŏ pāsu  $  dharĕvi sa iṃ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ
text.5144: taṃ ṇisuṇevi pajampiu gahavaï  $  "vajjaẏaṇṇu ṇāmeṇa su-ṇaravaï
text.5145: sīhoẏarahŏ bhiccu hiẏaïcchiu  $  bharahu va risahahŏ āṇavaḍicchiu
text.5147: jiṇavara-paḍimaṅguṭṭhaĕ leppiṇu  $  aṇṇahŏ ṇavaï ṇa ṇāhu mueppiṇu
text.5148: tāma ku-mantihĩ kahiu ṇarindahŏ  $  "paĩ avagaṇṇĕvi ṇavaï jiṇindahŏ"
text.5149: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu pahu kuddhaü  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālĕ kiẏantu viruddhaü
text.5151: "jo maĩ muĕvi aṇṇu jaẏakāraï  $  so kiṃ haẏa gaẏa rajju ṇa hāraï
text.5153: aha kiṃ vahuĕṇa  $  kallaĕ diṇaẏarĕ atthantaĕ
text.5154: jaï ṇa vi mārami  $  to païsami jalaṇĕ jalantaĕ"
text.5158: païja karevi jāma pahu āhave abhaṅgo
text.5161: teṃ diṭṭhu ṇarāhiu vipphurantu  $  palaẏāṇalo vva dhagadhagadhagantu
text.5165: "mārevaü riu" jampantu ema  $  khaẏa-kālĕ saṇiccharu kuviu jema
text.5166: taṃ pekkhĕvi cintaï bhua-visālu  $  "kiṃ mārami ṇaṃ ṇaṃ sāmisālu
text.5167: sāhammiẏa-vacchalu kiṃ karemi  $  savvāẏareṇa gampiṇu kahemi"
text.5168: gaü ema bhaṇĕvi kaṇṭaïẏa-gattu  $  ṇivisaddheṃ dasaüra-ṇaẏaru pattu
text.5177: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu vaẏaṇa-visāleṃ  $  vuccaï vajjaẏaṇṇu kusumāleṃ
text.5179: tahĕ āsattaü attha-vivajjiu  $  kāraṇĕ maṇi-kuṇḍalahã visajjiu
text.5180: puṇu vijjāhara-karaṇu kareppiṇu  $  gaü satta vi pāẏāra kameppiṇu
text.5181: kira vara-bhavaṇu paīsami jāvĕhĩ  $  païja karantu rāu suu tāvĕhĩ
text.5182: haũ vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa ādaṇṇaü  $  "vaṭṭaï vajjaẏaṇṇu ucchaṇṇaü
text.5183: sāhammiu jiṇa-sāsaṇa-dīvaü"  $  ema bhaṇeppiṇu valiu paḍīvaü
text.5184: puṇu vi viẏaḍa-paẏa-chohĕhĩ dhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ tumhahũ pāsu parāiu
text.5186: kiṃ olaggaĕ  $  jāṇantu vi rāẏa ma mujjhahi
text.5187: pāṇa laeppiṇu  $  jĕma ṇāsahi jĕma raṇĕ jujjhahi
text.5193: pekkhu pekkhu āvantaü sāhaṇu  $  galagajjantu mahāgaẏa-vāhaṇu
text.5194: pekkhu pekkhu hiṃsanti turaṅgama  $  ṇahaẏalĕ viulĕ bhamanti vihaṅgama
text.5195: pekkhu pekkhu cindhaĩ dhuvvantaĩ  $  raha-cakkaĩ mahiẏalĕ khuppantaĩ
text.5197: pekkhu pekkhu saẏa saṅkha rasantā  $  ṇāĩ sadukkhaü saẏaṇa ruantā
text.5198: pekkhu pekkhu pacalantaü ṇaravaï  $  gaha-ṇakkhatta-majjhĕ saṇi ṇāvaï"
text.5199: dasaüra-ṇāhu ṇihālaï jāvĕhĩ  $  para-valu saẏalu vihāvaï tāvĕhĩ
text.5200: "sāhu sāhu" to ema bhaṇeppiṇu  $  vijjulaṅgu ṇiu āliṅgeppiṇu
text.5201: thiu raṇa-bhūmi pasāhĕvi jāvĕhĩ  $  saẏalu vi seṇṇu parāiu tāvĕhĩ
text.5204: veḍḍhiu paṭṭaṇu  $  jima mahiẏalu caühĩ samuddahĩ
text.5210: abbhiṭṭu jujjhu viṇha vi valāhã  $  avaropparu vaḍḍhiẏa-kalaẏalāhã
text.5219: vihi mi bhiḍantahĩ  $  samaraṅgaṇĕ dunduhi vajjaï
text.5220: vihi mi ṇarindahã  $  raṇĕ ekku vi jiṇaï ṇa jijjaï
text.5225: paü vi ṇa osaranti māranti raṇĕ maranti
text.5227: uhaẏa-valĕhĩ musumūriẏa dhaẏavaḍa  $  uhaẏa-valĕhĩ loṭṭāviẏa bhaḍa-thaḍa
text.5228: uhaẏa-valĕhĩ haẏa gaẏa viṇivāiẏa  $  uhaẏa-valĕhĩ ruhiroha padhāiẏa
text.5229: uhaẏa-valĕhĩ ṇittaṃsiẏa khaggaĩ  $  uhaẏa-valĕhĩ ḍevanti vihaṅgaĩ
text.5233: ema pakkhu vaṭṭaï saṅgāmahŏ  $  akkhaï sīrakuḍumviu rāmahŏ
text.5242: cāva-vihattha mahattha mahāiẏa  $  sahasakūḍu jiṇabhavaṇu parāiẏa
text.5245: taṃ jiṇabhavaṇu ṇiẏavi parituṭṭhaĩ  $  paẏahiṇa devi ti-vāra vaïṭṭhaĩ
text.5248: diṭṭhu su-sohiu sommu su-daṃsaṇu  $  aṇṇu mi seẏa-camaru siṃhāsaṇu
text.5251: kiṃ vahu(eṃ)-caviĕṇa  $  jagĕ ko paḍivimvu ṭhavijjaï
text.5252: puṇu vi paḍīvaü  $  jaï ṇāheṃ ṇāhuvamijjaï
text.5259: jaẏa saṃbhava saṃbhava-ṇiddalaṇa  $  jaẏa ahiṇandaṇa ṇandiẏa-calaṇa
text.5261: jaẏa sāmi supāsa su-pāsa-haṇa  $  candappaha puṇṇa-canda-vaẏaṇa
text.5262: jaẏa jaẏa pupphaẏanta pupphacciẏa  $  jaẏa sīẏala sīẏala-suha-saṃciẏa
text.5263: jaẏa seẏaṅkara seẏaṃsa-jiṇa  $  jaẏa vāsupujja pujjiẏa-calaṇa
text.5264: jaẏa vimala-bhaḍārā vimala-muha  $  jaẏa sāmi aṇanta aṇanta-suha
text.5265: jaẏa dhamma-jiṇesara dhamma-dhara  $  jaẏa santi-bhaḍārā santi-kara
text.5266: jaẏa kunthu mahatthui-thua-calaṇa  $  jaẏa ara-arahanta mahanta-guṇa
text.5267: jaẏa malli mahalla-malla-malaṇa  $  muṇi suvvaẏa su-vvaẏa suddha-maṇa"
text.5269: vīsa vi jiṇavara  $  vandeppiṇu rāmu vaīsaï
text.5270: jahĩ sīhoẏaru  $  taṃ ṇilaü kumāru paīsaï
text.5276: païsantu suhaḍu teṃ dhariu kema  $  ṇiẏa-samaeṃ lavaṇasamuddu jema
text.5277: taṃ kuviu vīru vipphuriẏa-vaẏaṇu  $  vihuṇantu hattha ṇiḍḍariẏa-ṇaẏaṇu
text.5278: maṇĕ cintaï vaïri-samudda-mahaṇu  $  "kiṃ mārami ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kavaṇu gahaṇu"
text.5279: gaü ema bhaṇĕvi bhua-daṇḍa-caṇḍu  $  ṇaṃ matta-mahāgaü gilla-gaṇḍu
text.5280: taṃ dasaüra-ṇaẏaru païṭṭhu kema  $  jaṇa-maṇa-mohantu aṇaṅgu jema
text.5282: jaṃ lakkhaṇu lakkhiu rāẏa-vārĕ  $  paḍihāru vuttu "maṃ maṃ ṇivārĕ"
text.5283: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi païṭṭhu vīru  $  cakkavaï-lacchi-lañchiẏa-sarīru
text.5293: kiṃ vatthĕhĩ kiṃ raẏaṇehĩ kajju  $  kiṃ ṇaravara-parimiu demi rajju
text.5294: kiṃ demi sa-vibbhamu piṇḍavāsu  $  kiṃ sa-suu sa-kantaü homi dāsu"
text.5295: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi harisiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  paḍivuttu ṇarāhiu lakkhaṇeṇa
text.5296: "kahĩ muṇivaru kahĩ saṃsāra-sokkhu  $  kahĩ pāva-piṇḍu kahĩ parama-mokkhu
text.5297: kahĩ pāẏaü ketthu kuḍukka-vaẏaṇu  $  kahĩ kamala-saṇḍu kahĩ viulu gaẏaṇu
text.5298: kahĩ maẏagalĕ halu kahĩ uṭṭĕ ghaṇṭa  $  kahĩ panthiu kahĩ raha-turaẏa-thaṭṭa
text.5299: taṃ vollahi jaṃ ṇa ghaḍaï kalāĕ  $  amhaĩ vāhiẏa bhukkhaĕ khalāĕ
text.5301: tuhũ sāhammiu  $  daẏa-dhammu karantu ṇa thakkahi
text.5302: bhoẏaṇu maggiu  $  tihũ jaṇahũ dehi jaï sakkahi"
text.5308: ema bhaṇeppiṇu aṇṇuccāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ rāmahŏ pāsu parāiu
text.5309: khaṇĕ kaccola thāla oẏāriẏa  $  pariẏala-sippi-saṅkha vitthāriẏa
text.5311: ujjāṇaṃ piva suṭṭhu suandhaü  $  siddhahŏ siddhi-suhaṃ piva siddhaü
text.5312: rehaï asaṇa-vela valahaddahŏ  $  ṇāĩ viṇiggaẏa amaẏa-samuddahŏ
text.5318: iṭṭha-kalattu va  $  taṃ bhuttu jahicchaĕ bhoẏaṇu
text.5324: paḍiuvaẏāru kiṃ pi viṇṇāsahi  $  ubhaẏa-valĕhĩ appāṇu pagāsahi
text.5325: taṃ sīhoẏaru gampi ṇivārahi  $  addheṃ rajjahŏ sandhi samārahi
text.5326: vuccaï "bharaheṃ dūu visajjiu  $  dujjaü vajjaẏaṇṇu aparajjiu
text.5327: teṇa samāṇu kavaṇu kira viggahu  $  jeṃ āẏāmiu samarĕ pariggahu""
text.5328: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu riu-maddaṇu  $  rāmahŏ calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu jaṇaddaṇu
text.5329: "ajju kiẏatthu ajju haũ dhaṇṇaü  $  jaṃ āesu deva paĩ diṇṇaü"
text.5330: ema bhaṇevi paẏaṭṭu mahāiu  $  gaü sīhoẏara-bhavaṇu parāiu
text.5331: matta-gaïndu jema galagajjĕvi  $  taṃ paḍihāru karaggeṃ tajjĕvi
text.5340: kovāṇala-saẏa-jāla-jalanteṃ  $  puṇu puṇu joiu ṇāĩ kaẏanteṃ
text.5341: jaü jaü lakkhaṇu lakkhaï saṃmuhu  $  taü taü simiru thāi heṭṭhā-muhu
text.5342: cintiu "ko vi mahā-valu dīsaï  $  ṇaü paṇivāu karaï ṇaü vaïsaï"
text.5343: taṃ ji ṇimittu laevi kumāreṃ  $  vuttu rāu "kiṃ vahu-vitthāreṃ
text.5344: ema visajjiu bharaha-ṇarindeṃ  $  karaï keli ko samaü maïndeṃ
text.5345: ko sura-kari-visāṇa uppāḍaï  $  mandarasela-siṅgu ko pāḍaï
text.5346: ko 'maẏavāhu karaggeṃ ḍhaṅkaï  $  vajjaẏaṇṇu ko mārĕvi sakkaï
text.5347: sandhi karahŏ paribhuñjahŏ meiṇi  $  hiẏaẏa-suhaṅkari jiha vara-kāmiṇi
text.5349: ahavaï ṇaravaï  $  jaï rajjahŏ addhu ṇa icchahi
text.5355: "maru maru māri māri haṇu haṇu" bhaṇanto
text.5356: uṭṭhiu pahu karavāla-vihatthaü  $  "acchaü tāma bharahu vīsatthaü
text.5357: dūvahŏ dūvattaṇu darisāvahŏ  $  chindahŏ ṇāsu sīsu muṇḍāvahŏ
text.5358: luṇahŏ hattha vicchārĕvi dhāḍahŏ  $  gaddahĕ caḍiẏaü ṇaẏarĕ bhamāḍahŏ"
text.5359: taṃ ṇisuṇevi samuṭṭhiẏa ṇaravara  $  galagajjanta ṇāĩ ṇava jalahara
text.5360: "haṇu haṇu haṇu" bhaṇanta vahu-macchara  $  ṇaṃ kali-kāla-kiẏanta-saṇicchara
text.5361: ṇaṃ ṇiẏa-samaẏa-cukka raẏaṇāẏara  $  ṇaṃ ummeṭṭha padhāiẏa kuñjara
text.5362: karĕ karavālu ko vi uggāmaï  $  bhīsaṇa ko vi gaẏāsaṇi bhāmaï
text.5363: ko vi bhaẏaṅkaru cāu caḍāvaï  $  sāmihĕ bhiccattaṇu darisāvaï
text.5370: sūru va jalaharehĩ jaṃ veḍhio kumāro
text.5372: rokkaï valaï dhāi riu rumbhaï  $  ṇaṃ kesari-kisoru paviẏambhaï
text.5373: ṇaṃ suravara-gaïndu maẏa-vimbhalu  $  sira-kamalaĩ toḍantu mahā-valu
text.5374: daramalantu maṇi-maüḍa ṇarindahũ  $  sīhu paḍhukkiu jema gaïndahũ
text.5375: kŏ vi musumūriu cūriu pāĕhĩ  $  ko vi ṇisumbhiu ṭakkara-ghāĕhĩ
text.5376: ko vi karaggĕhĩ gaẏaṇĕ bhamāḍiu  $  ko vi rasantu mahīẏalĕ pāḍiu
text.5377: ko vi jujjhaviu mesa-jhaḍakkaĕ  $  kŏ vi kaḍuvāviu hakka-daḍakkaĕ
text.5379: ṇāĩ jameṇa daṇḍu pammukkaü  $  vaïrihĩ ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālu paḍhukkaü
text.5382: teṇa paḍantĕṇa  $  dasa sahasa ṇarindahũ pāḍiẏa
text.5388: ahimuhu sīhoẏaru saṃcalliu  $  palaẏa-samuddu ṇāĩ utthalliu
text.5392: riu-samuddu jaṃ diṭṭhu bhaẏaṅkaru  $  lakkhaṇu ḍhukku ṇāĩ giri mandaru
text.5393: calaï valaï paribhamaï su-paccalu  $  ṇāĩ vilāsiṇi-gaṇu calu cañcalu
text.5394: geṇhĕvi pahaü ṇarindu ṇarindeṃ  $  turaeṃ turaü gaïndu gaïndeṃ
text.5395: rahieṃ rahiu rahaṅgu rahaṅgeṃ  $  chatteṃ chattu dhaẏaggu dhaẏaggeṃ
text.5404: abbhiṭṭu jujjhu viṇṇi vi jaṇāhã  $  ujjeṇi-ṇarāhiva-lakkhaṇāhã
text.5409: etthantarĕ sīhoẏara-dhareṇa  $  urĕ pelliu lakkhaṇu gaẏavareṇa
text.5410: rahasubbhaḍu pulaẏa-visaṭṭa-dehu  $  ṇaṃ sukkeṃ khīliu sa-jalu mehu
text.5411: teṃ levi bhuaggeṃ tharaharanta  $  uppāḍiẏa dantihĕ ve vi danta
text.5412: kaḍuāviu maẏagalu maṇĕṇa taṭṭhu  $  vivarammuhu pāṇa laevi ṇaṭṭhu
text.5421: "he ṇaraṇāha-ṇāha acchariẏaü  $  para-valu pekkhu kema jajjariẏaü
text.5423: ko vi paẏaṇḍa-vīru valavantaü  $  bhamaï kiẏantu va riu-jagaḍantaü
text.5424: gaẏa-ghaḍa bhaḍa-thaḍa suhaḍa vahantaü  $  kari-sira-kamala-saṇḍa toḍantaü
text.5425: rokkaï kokkaï ḍhukkaï thakkaï  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālu samarĕ parisakkaï
text.5426: bhiuḍi-bhaẏaṅkaru kuruḍu samaccharu  $  thiu avaloẏaṇĕ ṇāĩ saṇiccharu
text.5427: ṇaü jāṇahũ kiṃ gaṇu kiṃ gandhavu  $  kiṃ pacchaṇṇu ko vi taü vandhavu
text.5428: kiṇṇaru kiṃ māruvu vijjāharu  $  kiṃ vambhāṇu bhāṇu hari halaharu
text.5429: teṇa mahāhavĕ māṇa-maïndahã  $  viṇivāiẏa dasa sahasa ṇarindahã
text.5430: aṇṇu vi dujjaü macchara-bhariẏaü  $  jīva-gāhi sīhoẏaru dhariẏaü
text.5432: ekkeṃ hontĕṇa  $  valu saẏalu vi āhindoliu
text.5437: taṃ ṇisuṇevi ko vi paritosio maṇeṇaṃ
text.5438: ko vi ṇiehũ laggu uddheṇa jampaṇeṇaṃ
text.5439: ko vi pajampiu macchara-bhariẏaü  $  "caṅgaü jaṃ sīhoẏaru dhariẏaü
text.5440: jo mārevaü vaïri sa-hattheṃ  $  so parivaddhu pāu para-hattheṃ
text.5441: vandhava-saẏaṇahĩ parimiu ajju  $  vajjaẏaṇṇu aṇuhuñjaü rajju"
text.5442: ko vi viruddhu puṇu puṇu ṇindaï  $  "dhammu muevi pāu kiṃ ṇandaï"
text.5443: ko vi bhaṇaï "jeṃ maggiu bhoẏaṇu  $  dīsaï so jjĕ ṇāĩ ĕhu vambhaṇu"
text.5444: tāma kumāreṃ riu ukkhandhĕvi  $  coru va rāuleṇa ṇiu vandhĕvi
text.5445: sālaṅkāru sa-doru sa-ṇeuru  $  dummaṇu dīṇa-vaẏaṇu anteuru
text.5455: "pekkhu pekkhu valu valu āvantaü  $  sāẏara-salilu jema gajjantaü
text.5456: laï dhaṇuharu ma acchi ṇiccintaü  $  mañchuḍu lakkhaṇu raṇĕ atthantaü"
text.5457: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇivvūḍha-mahāhavu  $  jāma cāu kira giṇhaï rāhavu
text.5458: tāma kumāru diṭṭhu sahũ ṇārihĩ  $  parimiu hatthi jema gaṇiẏārihĩ
text.5459: taṃ pekkheppiṇu suhaḍa-ṇisāmeṃ  $  bhīẏa sīẏa mambhīsiẏa rāmeṃ
text.5460: "pekkhu kema sīhoẏaru vaddhaü  $  sīheṇa va siẏālu uṭṭhaddhaü
text.5461: eva volla kira vaṭṭaï jāvĕhĩ  $  lakkhaṇu pāsu parāiu tāvĕhĩ
text.5462: calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu viẏāvaḍa-matthaü  $  bhaviu va jiṇahŏ kiẏañjali-hatthaü
text.5465: sa iṃ bhu a-phalihĕhĩ  $  avaruṇḍiu lakkhaṇu rāmeṃ
text.5472: avaropparu gañjolliẏa-gattĕhĩ  $  sarahasu sāiu devi turantĕhĩ
text.5473: sīhoẏaru ṇamantu vaïsāriu  $  takkhaṇĕ vajjaẏaṇṇu hakkāriu
text.5474: sahũ ṇaravara-jaṇeṇa ṇīsariẏaü  $  ṇāĩ purandaru sura-pariẏariẏaü
text.5475: rehaï vijjulaṅgu aṇupacchaĕ  $  paḍivā-indu va sūrahŏ pacchaĕ
text.5476: taṃ iṭṭāla-dhūli-dhua-dhavalaü  $  sahasakūḍu gaẏa patta jiṇālaü
text.5477: caüdisu paẏahiṇa devi tivāraĕ  $  puṇu ahivandaṇa karaï bhaḍāraĕ
text.5478: taṃ piẏavaddhaṇa-muṇi paṇaveppiṇu  $  valahŏ pāsĕ thiu kusalu bhaṇeppiṇu
text.5482: diḍha-sammattĕṇa  $  para tujjhu jĕ tuhũ uvamijjahi"
text.5486: taṃ ṇisuṇevi paẏampiu rāeṃ  $  "eu savvu mahu tumha pasāeṃ"
text.5487: puṇu vi tiloẏa-viṇiggaẏa-ṇāmeṃ  $  vijjulaṅgu pomāiu rāmeṃ
text.5489: sundaru kiu jaṃ ṇaravaï rakkhiu  $  raṇĕ acchantu ṇa paĩ uvvekkhiu"
text.5490: to etthantarĕ vuttu kumāreṃ  $  "jampieṇa kiṃ vahu-vitthāreṃ
text.5492: jo khalu khuddu pisuṇu macchariẏaü  $  acchaï ĕhu sīhoẏaru dhariẏaü
text.5493: kiṃ mārami kiṃ appuṇu mārahi  $  ṇaṃ to daẏa kari sandhi samārahi
text.5500: pabhaṇaï vajjaẏaṇṇu vahu-jāṇaü  $  "haũ pāikku puṇu vi ĕhu rāṇaü
text.5501: ṇavara ekku vaü maĩ pālevaü  $  jiṇu mellevi aṇṇu ṇa ṇamevaü"
text.5504: veṇṇi vi hattheṃ hatthu dharāviẏa  $  sarahasu kaṇṭhaggahaṇu karāviẏa
text.5505: addhoaddhiĕ mahi bhuñjāviẏa  $  aṇṇu vi jiṇavara-dhammu suṇāviẏa
text.5506: kāmiṇi kāmaleha kokkāviẏa  $  vijjulaṅgahŏ karaẏalĕ lāviẏa
text.5507: diṇṇaĩ maṇi-kuṇḍalaĩ phurantaĩ  $  candāiccahũ teu harantaĩ
text.5514: laï bho lakkhaṇa  $  vara tiṇṇi saẏaĩ tuhũ kaṇṇahũ"
text.5518: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu dasaraha-ṇandaṇu  $  ema pajampiu hasĕvi jaṇaddaṇu
text.5519: "acchaü ti-ẏaṇu tāma vilavantaü  $  bhisiṇi-ṇihāu va raviẏara-chittaü
text.5521: tahĩ valahaddahŏ ṇilaü gavesami  $  pacchaĕ pāṇiggahaṇu karesamiḥ
text.5522: ema kumāru pajampiu jaṃ je  $  maṇĕ visaṇṇu kaṇṇāẏaṇu taṃ je
text.5523: daḍḍhu himeṇa va ṇaliṇi-samuccaü  $  muhĕ muhĕ ṇāĩ diṇṇu masi-kuñcaü
text.5524: jāma tāma tūrĕhĩ vajjantĕhĩ  $  vivihĕhĩ maṅgalehĩ gijjantĕhĩ
text.5526: sīẏa sa-lakkhaṇu valu païsāriu  $  vīẏā-indu va jaẏajaẏakāriu
text.5527: tahĩ ṇivaseppiṇu ṇaẏarĕ ravaṇṇaĕ  $  addharatti-avasarĕ paḍivaṇṇaĕ
text.5534: kuvvara-ṇaẏaru parāiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  phagguṇa-māsu pavoliu tāvĕhĩ
text.5539: katthaï giri-siharaĩ vicchāẏaĩ  $  khala-muhaĩ va masi-vaṇṇaĩ ṇāẏaĩ
text.5540: katthaï māhava-māsahŏ meiṇi  $  piẏa-viraheṇa va sūsaï kāmiṇi
text.5541: katthaï gijjaï vajjaï mandalu  $  ṇara-mihuṇehĩ paṇacciu gondalu
text.5542: taṃ tahŏ ṇaẏarahŏ uttara-pāsĕhĩ  $  jaṇa-maṇaharu joẏaṇa-uddesĕhĩ
text.5543: diṭṭhu vasantatilaü ujjāṇaü  $  sajjaṇa-hiẏaü jema a-pamāṇaü
text.5550: tahĩ uvavaṇĕ païsĕvi viṇu kheveṃ  $  pabhaṇiu vāsuevu valaeveṃ
text.5552: lakkhaṇa kahi mi gavesahi taṃ jalu  $  sajjaṇa-hiẏaü jema jaṃ ṇimmalu
text.5553: dūrāgamaṇeṃ sīẏa tisāiẏa  $  hima-haẏa-ṇava-ṇaliṇi va vicchāiẏa"
text.5554: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vaḍa-duma-sovāṇĕhĩ  $  caḍiu mahārisi vva guṇathāṇĕhĩ
text.5557: taṃ pekkhevi kumāru padhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ taṃ sara-tīru parāiu
text.5564: lakkhaṇu jalu āḍohaï jāvĕhĩ  $  kuvvara-ṇaẏara-ṇarāhiu tāvĕhĩ
text.5565: chuḍu chuḍu vaṇa-kīlaĕ ṇīsariẏaü  $  maẏaṇa-divasĕ ṇaravara-pariẏariẏaü
text.5566: taruvarĕ taruvarĕ mañcu ṇivaddhaü  $  mañcĕ mañcĕ thiu jaṇu samaladdhaü
text.5567: mañcĕ mañcĕ ārūḍha ṇaresara  $  meru-ṇiẏamvĕ ṇāĩ vijjāhara
text.5568: mañcĕ mañcĕ ālāvaṇi vajjaï  $  mahu pijjaï hindolaü gijjaï
text.5569: mañcĕ mañcĕ jaṇu rasaẏa-vihatthaü  $  ghummaï ghulaï viẏāvaḍa-matthaü
text.5570: mañcĕ mañcĕ kīlanti su-mihuṇaĩ  $  ṇava-mihuṇaĩ kahĩ ṇeha-vihūṇaĩ
text.5571: mañcĕ mañcĕ andolaï jaṇavaü  $  koila vāsaï bhajjaï damaṇaü
text.5574: sūru va candĕṇa  $  lakkhijjaï lakkhaṇu tāvĕhĩ
text.5578: lakkhiu lakkhaṇu lakkhaṇa-bhariẏaü  $  ṇaṃ paccakkhu maẏaṇu avaẏariu
text.5579: rūu ṇiĕvi sura-bhavaṇāṇandahŏ  $  maṇu ullolĕhĩ jāi ṇarindahŏ
text.5580: maẏaṇa-sarāsaṇi dharĕvi ṇa sakkiu  $  vammahu dasa-thāṇehĩ paḍhukkiu
text.5581: pahilaĕ kahŏ vi samāṇu ṇa vollaï  $  vīẏaĕ guru ṇīsāsu pamellaï
text.5582: taïẏaĕ saẏalu aṅgu paritappaï  $  caüthaĕ ṇaṃ karavattĕhĩ kappaï
text.5583: pañcamĕ puṇu puṇu pāseijjaï  $  chaṭṭhaĕ vāravāra mucchijjaï
text.5584: sattamĕ jalu vi jaladda ṇa bhāvaï  $  aṭṭhamĕ maraṇa-līla darisāvaï
text.5585: ṇavamaĕ pāṇa paḍanta ṇa veẏaï  $  dasamaĕ siru chijjantu ṇa ceẏaï
text.5587: ema viẏambhiu  $  kusumāuhu dasahi mi thāṇĕhĩ
text.5588: taṃ acchariẏaü  $  jaṃ mukku kumāru ṇa pāṇĕhĩ
text.5592: jaṃ kaṇṭha-ṭṭhiu jīvu kumārahŏ  $  saṇṇaĕ vuttu "pahiu hakkārahŏ"
text.5593: pahu-āṇaĕ pāikka padhāiẏa  $  ṇivisaddheṃ tahŏ pāsu parāiẏa
text.5594: paṇavĕvi vuttu ti-khaṇḍa-pahāṇaü  $  "tumhahã kāi mi kokkaï rāṇaü"
text.5596: viẏaḍa paoha dentu ṇaṃ kesari  $  kandaï bhārakkanta vasundhari
text.5597: diṭṭhu kumāru kumāreṃ entaü  $  maẏaṇu jema jaṇa-maṇa-mohantaü
text.5598: khaṇĕ kallāṇamālu romañciu  $  ṇaḍu jiha harisa-visāĕhĩ ṇacciu
text.5599: puṇu vaïsāriu hari addhāsaṇĕ  $  bhaviu jema thiu diḍhu jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ
text.5602: ṇava-varaïttu va  $  pacchaṇṇu miliu sahũ kaṇṇaĕ
text.5606: ve vi vaïṭṭha vīra ekkāsaṇĕ  $  candāicca jema gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ
text.5607: ekku pacaṇḍu tikhaṇḍa-pahāṇaü  $  aṇṇekku vi kuvvara-pura-rāṇaü
text.5609: ekkahŏ ūrū (?)-jualu su-vittharu  $  aṇṇekkahŏ sukumāru su-maccharu
text.5611: ekkahŏ sulaliu sundaru aṅgaü  $  aṇṇekkahŏ taṇu-tivali-taraṅgaü
text.5612: ekkahŏ sohaï viẏaḍu uratthalu  $  aṇṇekkahŏ jovvaṇu thaṇa-cakkalu
text.5613: ekkahŏ vāhaü dīha-visālaü  $  aṇṇekkahŏ ṇaṃ mālaï-mālaü
text.5616: ekkahŏ siru vara-kusumĕhĩ vāsiu  $  aṇṇekkahŏ vara-maüḍa-vihūsiu
text.5619: aṇṇekku vi puṇu  $  pacchaṇṇa ṇāri ṇara-veseṃ
text.5625: jo katthūriẏa-paṅkuppaṅkiu  $  jo ari-karihĩ ṇa ḍohĕvi sakkiu
text.5626: jo sura-saüṇa-sahāsĕhĩ maṇḍiu  $  jo kāmiṇi-thaṇa-cakkĕhĩ caḍḍiu
text.5627: tahĩ tehaĕ sarĕ seẏa-jalolliu  $  lakkhaṇa-vaẏaṇa-kamalu papphulliu
text.5637: jaṃ muha-kamalu diṭṭhu ohulliu  $  vālikhilla-taṇaeṇa pavolliu
text.5638: "he ṇaraṇāha-ṇāha bhuvaṇāhiva  $  bhoẏaṇu bhuñjahu su-kalattaṃ piva
text.5639: sa-gulu sa-loṇaü sarasu sa-icchaü  $  mahuru suandhu sa-ṇehu su-pacchaü
text.5640: taṃ bhuñjĕppiṇu paḍhama-piẏāsaṇu  $  pacchalĕ kiṃ pi karahu saṃbhāsaṇu"
text.5643: āẏahŏ viulĕ mūlĕ daṇu-dāraü  $  acchaï sāmisālu amhāraü"
text.5655: sara-sikkāra karantu mahāvalu  $  tisa-bhukkhaĕ khalantu vihalaṅghalu
text.5656: chāhihĕ vejjhaĩ dentu viruddhaü  $  jiṇavara-vaẏaṇaṅkusĕṇa ṇiruddhaü
text.5664: hari-kallāṇamāla daṇu-dalaṇĕhĩ  $  paḍiẏa ve vi valaevahŏ calaṇĕhĩ
text.5665: "acchahũ tāva deva jala-kīlaĕ  $  pacchaĕ bhoẏaṇu bhuñjahũ līlaĕ"
text.5673: tahĩ sara-ṇahaẏalĕ  $  sa-kalatta ve vi hari-halahara
text.5678: tahĩ tehaĕ sarĕ salilĕ tarantaĩ  $  saṃcaranti cāmīẏara-jantaĩ
text.5680: ṇatthi raẏaṇu jahĩ jantu ṇa ghaḍiẏaü  $  ṇatthi jantu jahĩ mihuṇu ṇa caḍiẏaü
text.5681: ṇatthi mihuṇu jahĩ ṇehu ṇa vaḍḍhiu  $  ṇatthi ṇehu jo ṇaü suraẏaḍḍhiu
text.5682: tahĩ ṇara-ṇāri-juvaï jala-kīlaĕ  $  kīlantāĩ ṇhanti sura-līlaĕ
text.5692: jalĕ jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṃ ṇhāẏa ṇara  $  puṇu ṇiggaẏa hala-sāraṅga-dhara
text.5694: taṇu-luhaṇaĩ devi pahāṇaĕṇa  $  puṇu tiṇṇi vi kuvvara-rāṇaĕṇa
text.5696: vitthāriu vittharu bhoẏaṇaü  $  sukalattu va iccha ṇa bhañjaṇaü
text.5697: rajjaṃ piva paṭṭa-vihūsiẏaü  $  tūraṃ piva thālālaṅkiẏaü
text.5698: suraẏaṃ piva sa-rasu sa-timmaṇaü  $  vāẏaraṇu va sahaï sa-viñjaṇaü
text.5699: taṃ bhuttu saïcchaĕ bhoẏaṇaü  $  ṇaṃ kiu jaga-ṇāheṃ pāraṇaü
text.5706: tīhi mi parihiẏāĩ devaṅgaĩ  $  uvahi-jalāĩ va vahala-taraṅgaĩ
text.5707: dullaha-lambhaĩ jiṇa-vaẏaṇāĩ va  $  pasariẏa-paṭṭaĩ uccha-vaṇāĩ va
text.5708: dīhara-cheẏaĩ atthāṇāĩ va  $  phulliẏa-ḍālaĩ ujjāṇāĩ va
text.5710: laṇhaĩ kāmiṇi-muha-kamalāĩ va  $  vaḍḍaĩ jiṇavara-dhamma-phalāĩ va
text.5711: samasuttaĩ kiṇṇara-mihuṇāĩ va  $  aha saṃmattaĩ vāẏaraṇāĩ va
text.5712: to etthantarĕ kuvvara-sāreṃ  $  oẏāriu saṇṇāhu kumāreṃ
text.5716: mokkhahŏ kāraṇĕ  $  saṃsāru va mukku jiṇindeṃ
text.5720: tahĩ ekkanta-bhavaṇĕ pacchaṇṇaĕ  $  jaṃ appāṇu pagāsiu kaṇṇaĕ
text.5721: pucchiẏa rāhaveṇa parioseṃ  $  "akkhu kāĩ tuhũ thiẏa ṇara-veseṃ"
text.5722: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu pagaliẏa-ṇaẏaṇī  $  ema pajampiẏa gaggira-vaẏaṇī
text.5724: teṇa dhareppiṇu kuvvara-sāraü  $  vālikhillu ṇiu jaṇaṇu mahāraü
text.5725: teṃ kajjeṃ thiẏa haũ ṇara-veseṃ  $  jiha ṇa muṇijjami jaṇĕṇa aseseṃ"
text.5726: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu hari kuddhaü  $  ṇaṃ pañcāṇaṇu āmisa-luddhaü
text.5727: accantanta-ṇettu phuriẏāharu  $  ema pajampiu kuruḍu samaccharu
text.5730: to sahũ sīẏaĕ  $  sīrāuhu ṇaü jaẏakārami"
text.5734: jaṃ kallāṇamāla mambhīsiẏa  $  lahu ṇara-vesu laïu āsāsiẏa
text.5735: tāva divāẏaru gaü atthavaṇahŏ  $  lou paḍhukkaü ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-bhavaṇahŏ
text.5736: ṇisi-ṇisiẏari dasa-disahĩ padhāiẏa  $  mahi-gaẏaṇoṭṭha ḍasĕvi saṃpāiẏa
text.5739: tihuẏaṇa-vaẏaṇa-kamalu dariseppiṇu  $  sutta ṇāĩ ravi-maḍaü gileppiṇu
text.5740: tāva mahāvala-valu viṇṇāsĕvi  $  tālavatte ṇiẏa-ṇāmu pagāsĕvi
text.5741: sīẏaĕ sahũ vala-kaṇha viṇiggaẏa  $  ṇitturaṅga ṇīsandaṇa ṇiggaẏa
text.5744: gaẏa acchanti va  $  ṇaṃ diṇaẏaru āu gavesaü
text.5748: uṭṭhĕvi kuvvarapura-paramesaru  $  jāva sa-hattheṃ vāẏaï akkharu
text.5751: khaṇĕ kallāṇamāla mucchaṃgaẏa  $  ṇivaḍiẏa keli va khara-pavaṇāhaẏa
text.5752: dukkhu dukkhu āsāsiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  hāhākāru pamelliu tāvĕhĩ
text.5753: "hā hā rāma rāma jaga-sundara  $  lakkhaṇa lakkhaṇalakkha-suhaṅkara
text.5754: ha ha sīĕ sīĕ uppekkhami  $  tihi mi jaṇahũ ekkaṃ pi ṇa pekkhami"
text.5755: ema palāu karanti ṇa thakkaï  $  khaṇĕ ṇīsasaï sasaï khaṇĕ kokkaï
text.5757: khaṇĕ khaṇĕ joẏaï  $  caüdisu loẏaṇĕhĩ visālĕhĩ
text.5758: khaṇĕ khaṇĕ pahaṇaï  $  sira-kamalu sa iṃ bhu va-ḍālĕhĩ
text.5761: ṇārāẏaṇa-rāhava raṇĕ ajaẏa  $  ṇaṃ matta mahāgaẏa viñjhu gaẏa
text.5765: tāṇantarĕ ṇammaẏa diṭṭha sari  $  sari jaṇa-maṇa-ṇaẏaṇāṇanda-kari
text.5769: maẏa-mukka-karamviẏa vahaï mahu  $  mahuẏara ruṇṭanti milanti tahu
text.5771: maṇahara ḍhekkāra muanti vala  $  vala-kamala-karamviẏa saṅga-dala
text.5772: dalĕ bhamara pariṭṭhiẏa kesarahŏ  $  kesaru ṇiu ṇavara jiṇesarahŏ
text.5774: to sīrāuha-sāraṅgadhara  $  sahũ sīẏaĕ salilĕ païṭṭha ṇara
text.5775: uvaẏāru kareppiṇu revaẏaĕ  $  ṇaṃ tāriẏa sāsaṇa-devaẏaĕ
text.5779: thovantarĕ mahihara bhuaṇa-siri  $  sirivaccheṃ dīsaï viñjhaïri
text.5780: iriṇappahu sasipahu kaṇhapahu  $  pihulappahu ṇippahu jhīṇapahu
text.5781: muravo vva sa-tālu sa-vaṃsaharu  $  visaho vva sa-siṅgu mahanta-ḍaru
text.5782: maẏaṇo vva mahāṇala-daddha-taṇu  $  jalaü vva sa-vāri bhaḍu vva sa-vaṇu
text.5783: tahĩ tehaĕ selĕ ahiṭṭhiẏaĩ  $  duṇimittaĩ tāva samuṭṭhiẏaĩ
text.5784: phekkāraï siva vāẏasu rasaï  $  bhīsāvaṇu bhaṇḍaṇu ahilasaï
text.5785: saru suṇĕvi pakampiẏa jaṇaẏa-sua  $  thiẏa vihi mi dhareppiṇu bhuĕhĩ bhua
text.5786: "kiṃ ṇa suu cavantu vi ko vi ṇaru  $  jiha saüṇaü māṇiu dei varu"
text.5788: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi asura-vimaddaṇĕṇa  $  mambhīsiẏa sīẏa jaṇaddaṇĕṇa
text.5789: "siẏa lakkhaṇu valu paccakkhu jahĩ  $  kaü saüṇa-visaüṇĕhĩ gaṇṇu tahĩ"
text.5797: taṇu majjhĕ ṇiẏamvĕ vacchĕ garua  $  jaṃ ṇaẏaṇa-kaḍakkhiẏa jaṇaẏa-sua
text.5799: āẏalliu salliu mucchiẏaü  $  puṇu dukkhu dukkhu omucchiẏaü
text.5800: kara moḍaï aṅgu valaï hasaï  $  ūsasaï sasaï puṇu ṇīsasaï
text.5803: "valimaṇḍaĕ vaṇavasi vaṇavasahũ  $  uddālĕvi āṇahŏ pāsu mahu"
text.5807: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu ṇara-ṇiẏaru  $  utthariu ṇāĩ ṇava-amvuharu
text.5814: āvaddha-toṇu dhaṇuharu abhaü  $  dhāiu lakkhaṇu lahu laddha-jaü
text.5821: apphāliu mahumahaṇeṇa dhaṇu  $  dhaṇu-saddĕ samuṭṭhiu khara-pavaṇu
text.5822: khara-pavaṇa-pahaẏa jalaẏara raḍiẏa  $  raḍiẏāgame vajjāsaṇi paḍiẏa
text.5823: paḍiẏā giri sihara samucchaliẏa  $  ucchaliẏa caliẏa mahi ṇiddaliẏa
text.5824: ṇiddaliẏa bhuaṅga visaggi mukka  $  mukkanta ṇavara sāẏarahã ḍhukka
text.5825: ḍhukkantĕhĩ vahala phuliṅga ghitta  $  ghaṇa sippi-saṅkha-saṃpuḍa palitta
text.5828: teṃ dhaṇuhara-saddeṃ ṇiṭṭhureṇa  $  riu mukka paẏāva-maḍapphareṇa
text.5830: bhaẏa-bhīẏa visaṇṭhula ṇara pavara  $  loṭṭāviẏa haẏa gaẏa dhaẏa camara
text.5835: etthantarĕ to viñjhāhivaï  $  sahũ mantihĩ ruddabhutti cavaï
text.5836: "imu kāĩ hojja taïlokka-bhaü  $  kiṃ meru-siharu saẏa-khaṇḍa gaü
text.5837: kiṃ dunduhi haẏa suravara-jaṇĕṇa  $  kiṃ gajjiu palaẏa-mahāghaṇĕṇa
text.5838: kiṃ gaẏaṇa-maggĕ taḍi taḍaẏaḍiẏa  $  kiṃ mahiharĕ vajjāsaṇi paḍiẏa
text.5839: kiṃ kālu kaẏanta-mittu hasiu  $  kiṃ valaẏāmuhu samuddu rasiu
text.5840: kiṃ indahŏ indattaṇu ṭaliu  $  khaẏa-rakkhaseṇa kiṃ jagu giliu
text.5841: kiṃ gaü pāẏālahŏ bhuvaṇaẏalu  $  vambhaṇḍu phuṭṭu kiṃ gaẏaṇaẏalu
text.5842: kiṃ khaẏa-māruu ṭhāṇahŏ caliu  $  kiṃ asaṇi-ṇihāu samucchaliu
text.5844: kiṃ saẏala sa-sāẏara caliẏa mahi  $  kiṃ disi-gaẏa kiṃ gajjiẏa uvahi
text.5845: ĕu akkhu mahantaü acchariu  $  kahŏ saddeṃ tihuaṇu tharahariu"
text.5849: jaṃ ṇaravaï eva cavantu suu  $  pabhaṇaï subhutti kaṇṭaïẏa-bhuu
text.5850: "suṇi akkhami jaṃ taïlokka-bhaü  $  ṇaü meru-siharu saẏa-khaṇḍa gaü
text.5851: ṇaü dunduhi haẏa suravara-jaṇĕṇa  $  ṇaü gajjiu palaẏa-mahāghaṇĕṇa
text.5852: ṇaü gaẏaṇa-maggĕ taḍi taḍaẏaḍiẏa  $  ṇaü mahiharĕ vajjāsaṇi paḍiẏa
text.5853: ṇaü kālu kiẏanta-mittu hasiu  $  ṇaü valaẏāmuhu samuddu rasiu
text.5854: ṇaü indahŏ indattaṇu ṭaliu  $  khaẏa-rakkhaseṇa ṇaü jagu giliu
text.5855: ṇaü gaü pāẏālahŏ bhuvaṇaẏalu  $  vambhaṇḍu phuṭṭu ṇaü gaẏaṇaẏalu
text.5856: ṇaü khaẏa-māruu thāṇahŏ caliu  $  ṇaü asaṇi-ṇihāu samucchaliu
text.5857: ṇaü saẏala sa-sāẏara caliẏa mahi  $  ṇaü disi-gaẏa ṇaü gajjiẏa uvahi
text.5860: su-kalatteṃ jima jaṇa-maṇaharĕṇa  $  ĕu gajjiu lakkhaṇa-dhaṇuharĕṇa
text.5864: suṇĕ ṇaravaï asura-parāẏaṇahũ  $  jaṃ ciṇhaĩ vala-ṇārāẏaṇahũ
text.5865: taṃ atthi asesu vi vaṇavasahũ  $  surabhuvaṇucchaliẏa-mahājasahũ
text.5868: ekkahŏ taṇu majjhu padīsiẏaü  $  aṇṇekkahŏ kamala-vihūsiẏaü
text.5870: ekkahŏ bhīsāvaṇu hei halu  $  aṇṇekkahŏ dhaṇuharu atula-valu
text.5873: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu vigaẏa-maü  $  ṇīsandaṇu ṇiggaü ṇitturaü
text.5874: valaevahŏ calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu kiha  $  ahiseĕ jiṇindahŏ indu jiha
text.5878: jaṃ ruddabhutti calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu  $  taṃ lakkhaṇu kovāṇalĕ caḍiu
text.5887: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu atula-valu  $  "suṇu lakkhaṇa" pacaviu eva valu
text.5888: "mukkāuhu jo calaṇĕhĩ paḍaï  $  teṃ ṇihaeṃ ko jasu ṇivvaḍaï"
text.5892: thiu lakkhaṇu valĕṇa ṇivāriẏaü  $  ṇaṃ vara-gaïndu kaṇṇāriẏaü
text.5893: ṇaṃ sāẏaru majjāẏaĕ dhariu  $  puṇu puṇu vi caviu macchara-bhariu
text.5894: "khala khudda pisuṇa taü sira-kamalu  $  ettaḍĕṇa cukku jaṃ ṇaviu valu
text.5895: vari vālikhillu muĕ vandi lahu  $  ṇaṃ to jīvantu ṇa jāhi mahu"
text.5896: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇiviseṃ mukku pahu  $  ṇaṃ jiṇavareṇa saṃsāra-pahu
text.5897: ṇaṃ gaha-kalloleṃ amiẏa-taṇu  $  ṇaṃ garuḍa-vihaṅgeṃ uragamaṇu
text.5898: ṇaṃ mukku suaṇu dujjaṇa-jaṇahŏ  $  ṇaṃ vāraṇu vāri-ṇivandhaṇahŏ
text.5899: ṇaṃ mukku bhaviu bhava-sāẏarahŏ  $  tiha vālikhillu dukkhoẏarahŏ
text.5901: te ruddabhutti-vala-mahumahaṇa  $  sahũ kuvvara-ṇivĕṇa caẏāri jaṇa
text.5902: thiẏa jāṇaï tehĩ samāṇu kiha  $  caü-sāẏara-parimiẏa puhaï jiha
text.5907: kama-kamalĕhĩ ṇivaḍiẏa halaharahŏ  $  ṇami-viṇami jema ciru jiṇavarahŏ
text.5908: saĩ hattheṃ valĕṇa samuṭṭhaviẏa  $  uvahi va samaehĩ pariṭṭhaviẏa
text.5909: bharahahŏ pāikka ve vi thaviẏa  $  lahu ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-ṇilaẏahũ paṭṭhaviẏa
text.5910: uttiṇṇaĩ tiṇṇi vi mahiharahŏ  $  ṇaṃ bhaviẏaĩ bhava-dukkhoẏarahŏ
text.5911: ṇaṃ meru-ṇiẏamvahŏ kiṇṇaraĩ  $  ṇaṃ saggahŏ caviẏaĩ suravaraĩ
text.5912: viṇu kheveṃ tāvi parāiẏaĩ  $  kira salilu piẏanti tisāiẏaĩ
text.5916: païsantu ṇa bhāvaï muhahŏ kiha  $  aṇṇāṇahŏ jiṇavara-vaẏaṇu jiha
text.5920: puṇu tāvi tareppiṇu ṇiggaẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ tiṇṇi mi viñjha-mahāgaẏaĩ
text.5922: "jalu kahi mi gavesahŏ ṇimmalaü  $  jaṃ tisa-haru hima-sasi-sīẏalaü
text.5923: taṃ icchami bhaviu va jiṇa-vaẏaṇu  $  ṇihi ṇiddhaṇu jaccandhu va ṇaẏaṇu"
text.5924: valu dhīraï "dhīrī hohi dhaṇĕ  $  maṃ kāẏaru muhu kari migaṇaẏaṇĕ"
text.5925: thovantaru puṇu viharantaĕhĩ  $  malhantĕhĩ paü paü dentaĕhĩ
text.5926: lakkhijjaï aruṇagāmu puraü  $  vaẏa-vandha-vihūsiu jiha muraü
text.5927: kappadumo vva caüddisu suhalu  $  ṇaṭṭāvaü vva ṇāḍaẏa-kusalu
text.5929: taṃ aruṇagāmu saṃpāiẏaĩ  $  muṇivara iva mokkha-tisāiẏaĩ
text.5930: so ṇaü jaṇu jeṇa ṇa diṭṭhāĩ  $  gharu kavilahŏ gampi païṭṭhāĩ
text.5934: ṇijjhāiu taṃ gharu diẏavarahŏ  $  ṇaṃ parama-thāṇu thiru jiṇavarahŏ
text.5935: ṇiravekkhu ṇirakkharu kevalaü  $  ṇimmāṇu ṇirañjaṇu ṇimmalaü
text.5936: ṇivvatthu ṇiratthu ṇirāharaṇu  $  ṇiddhaṇu ṇibbhattaü ṇimmahaṇu
text.5937: tahĩ tehaĕ bhavaṇĕ païṭṭhāĩ  $  chuḍu chuḍu jalu piĕvi ṇiviṭṭhāĩ
text.5938: kuñjara iva guhĕ āvāsiẏaĩ  $  hariṇā iva vāhuttāsiẏaĩ
text.5939: acchanti jāva tahĩ ekku khaṇu  $  diu tāva parāiu kuiẏa-maṇu
text.5940: "maru maru ṇīsaru ṇīsaru" bhaṇantu  $  dhūmaddhaü vva dhagadhagadhagantu
text.5941: bhaẏa-bhīsaṇu kuruḍu saṇiccharu vva  $  vahu-uvavisa-viṇṇaü visaharu vva
text.5943: "kiṃ kālu kiẏantu mittu variu  $  kiṃ kesari kesaraggeṃ dhariu
text.5944: ko jama-muha-kuharahŏ ṇīsariu  $  jo bhavaṇĕ mahāraĕ païsariu"
text.5948: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu mahumahaṇu  $  āruṭṭhu samara-bhara-uvvahaṇu
text.5949: ṇaṃ dhāiu kari thira-thora-karu  $  ummūliu diẏavaru jema taru
text.5950: uggāmĕvi bhāmĕvi gaẏaṇaẏalĕ  $  kira ghivaï paḍīvaü dharaṇiẏalĕ
text.5951: karĕ dhariu tāva halapaharaṇĕṇa  $  "muĕ muĕ mā haṇahi akāraṇĕṇa
text.5952: diẏa-vāla-gola-pasu-tavasi-tiẏa  $  cha vi pariharu mellĕvi māṇa-kiẏa"
text.5953: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi diẏavaru lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ mukku alakkhaṇu lakkhaṇĕṇa
text.5954: osariu vīru pacchāmuhaü  $  aṅkusa-ṇiruddhu ṇaṃ matta-gaü
text.5955: puṇu hiẏaĕ visūraï khaṇĕ jĕ khaṇĕ  $  "saẏa-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍu vari hūu raṇĕ
text.5957: vari pahariu vari kiu tavacaraṇu  $  vari visu hālāhalu vari maraṇu
text.5958: vari acchiu gampiṇu guhila-vaṇĕ  $  ṇavi ṇivisu vi ṇivasiu avuhaẏaṇĕ"
text.5962: to tiṇṇi vi ema cavantāĩ  $  ummāhaü jaṇahŏ jaṇantāĩ
text.5963: diṇa-pacchima-paharĕ viṇiggaẏāĩ  $  kuñjara iva viula-vaṇahŏ gaẏāĩ
text.5964: vitthiṇṇu raṇṇu païsanti jāva  $  ṇaggohu mahādumu diṭṭhu tāva
text.5965: guru-vesu karĕvi sundara-sarāĩ  $  ṇaṃ vihaẏa paḍhāvaï akkharāĩ
text.5966: vukkaṇa-kisalaẏa ka-kkā ravanti  $  vāuli-vihaṅga ki-kkī bhaṇanti
text.5967: vaṇa-kukkuḍa ku-kkū āẏaranti  $  aṇṇu vi kalāva ke-kkaï cavanti
text.5968: piẏamāhaviẏaü ko-kkaü lavanti  $  kaṃ-kā vappīha samullavanti
text.5972: pariañcĕvi dumu dasaraha-suĕhĩ  $  ahiṇandiu muṇi va sa iṃ bhu ĕhĩ
text.5974: sīẏa sa-lakkhaṇu dāsarahi  $  taruvara-mūlĕ pariṭṭhiẏa jāvĕhĩ
text.5975: pasaraï su-kaïhĕ kavvu jiha  $  meha-jālu gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ tāvĕhĩ
text.5979: pasaraï meha-vindu gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ  $  pasaraï jema seṇṇu samaraṅgaṇĕ
text.5980: pasaraï jema timiru aṇṇāṇahŏ  $  pasaraï jema vuddhi vahu-jāṇahŏ
text.5981: pasaraï jema pāu pāviṭṭhahŏ  $  pasaraï jema dhammu dhammiṭṭhahŏ
text.5982: pasaraï jema joṇha maẏavāhahŏ  $  pasaraï jema kitti jagaṇāhahŏ
text.5983: pasaraï jema cinta dhaṇa-hīṇahŏ  $  pasaraï jema kitti sukulīṇahŏ
text.5984: pasaraï jema saddu sura-tūrahŏ  $  pasaraï jema rāsi ṇahĕ sūrahŏ
text.5985: pasaraï jema davaggi vaṇantarĕ  $  pasaraï meha-jālu tiha amvarĕ
text.5986: taḍi taḍaẏaḍaï paḍaï ghaṇu gajjaï  $  jāṇaï rāmahŏ saraṇu pavajjaï
text.5993: jaṃ pāusa-ṇarindu galagajjiu  $  dhūlī-raü gimbheṇa visajjiu
text.5995: jaṃ vivarammuhu caliu visālaü  $  uṭṭhiu "haṇu" bhaṇantu uṇhālaü
text.6000: meha-mahāgaẏa-ghaḍa vihaḍantaü  $  jaṃ uṇhālaü diṭṭhu bhiḍantaü
text.6008: daddura raḍĕvi lagga ṇaṃ sajjaṇa  $  ṇaṃ ṇaccanti mora khala dujjaṇa
text.6009: ṇaṃ pūranti sariu akkandeṃ  $  ṇaṃ kaï kilikilanti āṇandeṃ
text.6010: ṇaṃ parahuẏa vimukka ugghoseṃ  $  ṇaṃ varahiṇa lavanti parioseṃ
text.6011: ṇaṃ saravara vahu-aṃsu-jalolliẏa  $  ṇaṃ girivara hariseṃ gañjolliẏa
text.6012: ṇaṃ uṇhavia davaggi vioeṃ  $  ṇaṃ ṇacciẏa mahi viviha-viṇoeṃ
text.6013: ṇaṃ atthamiu divāẏaru dukkheṃ  $  ṇaṃ païsaraï raẏaṇi saĩ sukkheṃ
text.6014: ratta-patta taru pavaṇākampiẏa  $  "keṇa vi vahiu gimbhu" ṇaṃ jampiẏa
text.6016: tehaĕ kālĕ bhaẏāuraĕ  $  veṇṇi mi vāsueva-valaeva
text.6017: taruvara-mūlĕ sa-sīẏa thiẏa  $  jogu laeviṇu muṇivara jema
text.6021: hari-vala rukkha-mūlĕ thiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  gaẏamuhu jakkhu paṇāsĕvi tāvĕhĩ
text.6022: gaü ṇiẏa-ṇivahŏ pāsu vevantaü  $  "deva deva paritāhi" bhaṇantaü
text.6023: "ṇaü jāṇahũ kiṃ suravara kiṃ ṇara  $  kiṃ vijjāhara-gaṇa kiṃ kiṇṇara
text.6024: dhaṇudhara dhīra paḍāẏaü ubbhĕvi  $  sutta mahāraü ṇilaü ṇirumbhĕvi"
text.6025: taṃ ṇisuṇeviṇu vaẏaṇu mahāiu  $  pūvaṇu mambhīsantu padhāiu
text.6026: viñjha-mahīhara-siharahŏ āiu  $  takkhaṇĕ taṃ uddesu parāiu
text.6027: tāma ṇihāliẏa veṇṇi vi duddhara  $  sāẏara-vajjāvatta-dhaṇuddhara
text.6028: avahī-ṇāṇu paüñjaï jāvĕhĩ  $  lakkhaṇa-rāma muṇiẏa maṇĕ tāvĕhĩ
text.6030: pekkhĕvi hari-vala ve vi jaṇa  $  pūvaṇa-jakkheṃ jaẏa-jasa-luddheṃ
text.6035: puṇu rāmaüri paghosiẏa loeṃ  $  ṇaṃ ṇārihĕ aṇuhariẏa ṇioeṃ
text.6042: ṇāĩ ṇihālaï diṇaẏara-dappaṇu  $  ema viṇimmiu saẏalu vi paṭṭaṇu
text.6043: vaïsĕvi valahŏ pāsĕ vīsatthaü  $  ālāvaï ālāvaṇi-hatthaü
text.6045: ekkavīsa-vara-mucchaṇaü  $  satta vi sara ti-gāma darisantaü
text.6046: "vujjhi bhaḍārā dāsarahi  $  suppahāu taü" eva bhaṇantaü
text.6050: suppahāu uccāriu jāvĕhĩ  $  rāmeṃ valĕvi paloiu tāvĕhĩ
text.6051: diṭṭhu ṇaẏaru jaṃ jakkha-samāriu  $  ṇāĩ ṇahaṅgaṇu sūra-vihūsiu
text.6052: sa-ghaṇu sa-kumbhu sa-savaṇu sa-saṅkaü  $  sa-vuhu sa-tāraü sa-guru-sasaṅkaü
text.6053: puṇu vi paḍīvaü ṇaẏaru ṇihāliu  $  ṇāĩ mahāvaṇu kusumomāliu
text.6054: ṇāĩ sukaïhĕ kavvu paẏaïttiu  $  ṇāĩ ṇarinda-cittu vahu-cittaü
text.6055: ṇāĩ seṇṇu rahavarahã amukkaü  $  ṇāĩ vivāha-gehu sa-caükkaü
text.6056: ṇāĩ suraü caccari-cariẏālaü  $  ṇāvaï ḍimbhaü ahiẏa-chuhālaü
text.6057: aha kiṃ vaṇṇieṇa khaṇĕ je khaṇĕ  $  tihuaṇĕ ṇatthi jaṃ pi taṃ paṭṭaṇĕ
text.6060: mañchuḍu ujjhāuri-ṇaẏaru  $  jāẏa mahanta bhanti maṇĕ rāmahŏ
text.6064: jaṃ kiu vimbhaü sāsaẏa-lakkheṃ  $  vuttu ṇaveppiṇu pūaṇa-jakkheṃ
text.6065: "tumhāraü vaṇa-vasaṇu ṇieppiṇu  $  kiu maĩ paṭṭaṇu bhāu dhareppiṇu
text.6066: ema bhaṇevi suvitthaẏa-ṇāmahŏ  $  diṇṇa sughosa vīṇa teṃ rāmahŏ
text.6067: diṇṇu maüḍu sāharaṇu vilevaṇu  $  maṇi-kuṇḍala kaḍisuttaü kaṅkaṇu
text.6068: puṇu vi pajampiu jakkha-pahāṇaü  $  "haũ taü bhiccu deva tuhũ rāṇaü"
text.6069: eva volla ṇimmāiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  kavileṃ ṇaẏaru ṇihāliu tāvĕhĩ
text.6070: jaṇa-maṇaharu sura-sagga-samāṇaü  $  vāsavapurahŏ vi khaṇḍaï māṇaü
text.6071: taṃ pekkhĕvi āsaṅkiu vambhaṇu  $  "kahĩ vitthiṇṇu raṇṇu kahĩ paṭṭaṇu"
text.6073: tharaharantu bhaẏa-māruĕṇa  $  samihaü ghivĕvi paṇāsaï jāvĕhĩ
text.6074: mambhīsanti miẏaṅkamuhi  $  puraü sa-māẏa jakkhi thiẏa tāvĕhĩ
text.6078: "he diẏavara caüveẏa-pahāṇā  $  kiṇṇa muṇahi rāmaüri aẏāṇā
text.6080: takkuva-bhamara-saehĩ ṇa muccaï  $  dei asesu vi jaṃ jasu ruccaï
text.6081: jo ghaĩ jiṇavara-ṇāmu laei  $  tahŏ kaḍḍheppiṇu pāṇaĩ dei
text.6082: ĕu jaṃ vāsava-disaĕ visālaü  $  dīsaï tihuaṇatilaü jiṇālaü
text.6083: tahĩ jo gampi karaï jaẏakāru  $  paṭṭaṇĕ ṇavari tāsu païsāru"
text.6084: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu diẏavaru dhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ jiṇavara-bhavaṇu parāiu
text.6085: taṃ cārittasūru muṇi vandĕvi  $  viṇaü karĕvi appāṇaü ṇindĕvi
text.6087: pucchiu muṇivaru diẏavarĕṇa  $  "dāṇahŏ kāraṇĕ viṇu sammatteṃ
text.6088: dhammeṃ laïeṃ kavaṇu phalu  $  eu deva mahu akkhi paẏatteṃ"
text.6092: muṇivaru kahĕvi laggu "viulāĩ  $  kiṃ jaṇĕ ṇa ṇiẏahi dhammaphalāĩ
text.6093: dhammeṃ bhaḍa-thaḍa haẏa gaẏa sandaṇa  $  pāveṃ maraṇa-vioẏakkandaṇa
text.6094: dhammeṃ saggu bhoggu sohaggu  $  pāveṃ roggu sogu dohaggu
text.6095: dhammeṃ riddhi viddhi siẏa saṃpaẏa  $  pāveṃ attha-hīṇa ṇara viddaẏa
text.6096: dhammeṃ kaḍaẏa-maüḍa-kaḍisuttā  $  pāveṃ ṇara dāliddeṃ bhuttā
text.6097: dhammeṃ rajju karanti ṇiruttā  $  pāveṃ para-pesaṇa-saṃjuttā
text.6098: dhammeṃ vara-pallaṅkeṃ suttā  $  pāveṃ tiṇa-saṃthārĕ vibhuttā
text.6099: dhammeṃ ṇara devattaṇu pattā  $  pāveṃ ṇaraẏa-ghorĕ saṃkantā
text.6100: dhammeṃ ṇara ramanti vara-vilaẏaü  $  pāveṃ dūhaviu duha-ṇilaẏaü
text.6101: dhammeṃ sundaru aṅgu ṇivaddhaü  $  pāveṃ paṅgulaü vi vahirandhaü
text.6104: veṇṇi mi asuha-suhaṅkaraĩ  $  jāĩ piẏaĩ laï tāĩ phalāiṃ"
text.6108: muṇivara-vaẏaṇĕhĩ diẏavaru vāsiu  $  laïu dhammu jo jiṇavarĕ bhāsiu
text.6109: pañcāṇuvvaẏa levi padhāiu  $  ṇiẏa-mandiru ṇiviseṇa parāiu
text.6110: gampiṇu puṇu sommahĕ vajjariẏaü  $  "ajju mahantu diṭṭhu accariẏaü
text.6111: kahĩ vaṇu kahĩ paṭṭaṇu kahĩ rāṇaü  $  kahĩ muṇi diṭṭhu aṇeẏaĩ jāṇaü
text.6112: kahĩ maï kahĩ laddhaĩ jiṇa-vaẏaṇaĩ  $  vahireṃ kaṇṇa 'ndheṇa va ṇaẏaṇaĩ"
text.6113: taṃ ṇisuṇevi somma gañjolliẏa  $  "jāhũ ṇāha tahĩ ema pavolliẏa
text.6114: puṇu saṃcallaĩ ve vi turantaĩ  $  tihuẏaṇatilaü jiṇālaü pattaĩ
text.6115: sāhu ṇaveppiṇu pāsĕ ṇiviṭṭhaĩ  $  dhammu suṇeppiṇu ṇaẏarĕ païṭṭhaĩ
text.6122: hari atthāṇa-maggĕ jaṃ diṭṭhaü  $  diẏavaru pāṇa laevi paṇaṭṭhaü
text.6123: ṇaṭṭhu kuraṅgu va vāraṇavārahŏ  $  ṇaṭṭhu jiṇindu va bhava-saṃsārahŏ
text.6124: ṇaṭṭhu miẏaṅku va abbhapisāẏahŏ  $  ṇaṭṭhu davaggi va ṇīra-ṇihāẏahŏ
text.6125: ṇaṭṭhu bhuaṅgu va garuḍa-vihaṅgahŏ  $  ṇaṭṭhu kharo vva matta-māẏaṅgahŏ
text.6126: ṇaṭṭhu aṇaṅgu va sāsaẏa-gamaṇahŏ  $  ṇaṭṭhu mahāghaṇo vva khara-pavaṇahŏ
text.6127: ṇaṭṭhu mahīharo vva sura-kulisahŏ  $  ṇaṭṭhu turaṅgamo vva jama-mahisahŏ
text.6128: tiha ṇāsantu padīsiu diẏavaru  $  mambhīsantu padhāiu siriharu
text.6129: maṇḍa dharevi kareṇa karaggaĕ  $  gampi ghittu valaevahŏ aggaĕ
text.6130: dukkhu dukkhu appāṇaü dhīrĕvi  $  saẏalu mahabbhaü maṇĕ avaherĕvi
text.6134: canda-kunda-jasa-ṇimmalĕṇa  $  tiha tuhũ vaddhu ṇarāhiva dhammeṃ"
text.6138: to etthantarĕ para-vala-maddaṇu  $  kahakaha-saddeṃ hasiu jaṇaddaṇu
text.6139: "bhavaṇĕ païṭṭha tuhāraĕ jaïẏahũ  $  paĩ avagaṇṇĕvi ghalliẏa taïẏahũ
text.6140: etthu kālĕ puṇu diẏavaru kīsā  $  viṇaü karĕvi puṇu diṇṇa asīsā"
text.6141: taṃ ṇisuṇevi bhaṇaï veẏāẏaru  $  "atthahŏ ko ṇa vi karaï mahāẏaru
text.6142: jiha āṇandu jaṇaï sīẏālaĕ  $  tiha ki ṇa ruccaï ravi uṇhālaĕ
text.6143: kāla-vaseṇa kālu vi sahevaü  $  etthu ṇa harisu visāu karevaü
text.6145: atthu viẏaḍḍhu atthu guṇavantaü  $  attha-vihūṇu bhamaï maggantaü
text.6146: atthu aṇaṅgu atthu jagĕ sūhaü  $  attha-vihūṇu dīṇu ṇaru dūhaü
text.6147: atthu saïcchiu bhuñjaï rajju  $  attha-vihūṇeṃ kiṃ pi ṇa kajju"
text.6150: kaḍaẏa-maüḍa-kaḍisuttaẏahĩ  $  pujjiu kavilu sa iṃ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ
text.6152: suraḍāmara-riu-ḍamarakara  $  kovaṇḍa-dhara  $  sahũ sīẏaĕ caliẏa mahāiẏa
text.6153: vala-ṇārāẏaṇa ve vi jaṇa  $  parituṭṭha-maṇa  $  jīvanta-ṇaẏaru saṃpāiẏa
text.6157: paṭṭaṇu tihi mi tehĩ āvajjiu  $  diṇaẏara-vimvu va dosa-vivajjiu
text.6158: ṇavara hoi jaï kampu dhaesu  $  haü turaesu jujjhu suraesu
text.6168: ahavaï kittiu ṇiva vaṇṇijjaï  $  jaï para taṃ ji tāsu uvamijjaï
text.6170: tahŏ ṇaẏarahŏ avaruttarĕṇa  $  kosantarĕṇa  $  uvavaṇu ṇāmeṇa pasatthaü
text.6171: ṇāĩ kumārahŏ entāhŏ  $  païsantāhŏ  $  thiu ṇava-kusumañjali-hatthaü
text.6175: tahĩ uvavaṇĕ thiẏa hari-vala jāvĕhĩ  $  bharaheṃ lehu visajjiu tāvĕhĩ
text.6176: aggaĕ ghittu ṇareṇa ṇarindahŏ  $  bhaviu va calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu jiṇindahŏ
text.6177: laïu mahīhareṇa saĩ hattheṃ  $  jiṇavara-dhammu va muṇivara-sattheṃ
text.6178: vāri-ṇivandhahŏ mukku gaïndu va  $  diṭṭhu aṅku tahĩ ṇahaẏalĕ candu va
text.6179: "rajju muevi ve vi riu-maddaṇa  $  gaẏa vaṇa-vāsahŏ rāma-jaṇaddaṇa
text.6180: ko jāṇaï hari kaddiu āvaï  $  tahŏ vaṇamāla dejja jasu bhāvaï"
text.6181: lehu ghiveppiṇu ṇaravaï mahiharu  $  ṇāĩ daveṇa daḍḍhu thiu mahiharu
text.6182: ṇāĩ miẏaṅko kamiu viḍappeṃ  $  tiha mahiharu ṇarindu māhappeṃ
text.6184: jāẏa cinta maṇĕ duddharahŏ  $  dharaṇīdharahŏ  $  sihi-gala-tamāla-ghaṇa-vaṇṇahŏ
text.6185: "lakkhaṇu lakkhaṇa-lakkha-dharu  $  taṃ muĕvi varu  $  maĩ diṇṇa kaṇṇa kiṃ aṇṇahŏ
text.6189: to etthantarĕ ṇaẏaṇa-visālaĕ  $  eha vatta jaṃ suẏa vaṇamālaĕ
text.6190: āulihuẏa hiẏaeṇa visūraï  $  dukkheṃ mahaṇaï vva āūraï
text.6191: sirĕ pāseu caḍaï muhu sūsaï  $  kara vihuṇaï puṇu daïvahŏ rūsaï
text.6192: maṇu dhugudhugaï dehu paritappaï  $  vammahŏ ṇaṃ karavatteṃ kappaï
text.6193: tāva ṇahaṅgaṇeṇa ghaṇu gajjiu  $  ṇāĩ kumāreṃ dūu visajjiu
text.6194: "dhīrī hohi māĕ" ṇaṃ bhāsiu  $  "uhu lakkhaṇu uvavaṇĕ āvāsiu"
text.6195: garahiu mehu to vi taṇu-aṅgiĕ  $  dosa vi guṇa havanti saṃsaggiĕ
text.6196: "tuhũ kira jaṇa-maṇa-ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇu  $  mahu puṇu jalahara ṇāĩ huāsaṇu
text.6198: tujjhu ṇa dosu dosu kulahŏ  $  haẏa-duha-kulahŏ jalĕ  $  jalaṇĕ pavaṇĕ jaṃ jāẏaü
text.6199: taṃ pāseu dāhu karahu  $  ṇīsāsu mahu tiṇṇi  $  vi dakkhavaṇahŏ āẏaü
text.6203: docchiu mehu paṇaṭṭhu ṇahaṅgaṇĕ  $  puṇu vaṇamālaĕ cintiu ṇiẏa-maṇĕ
text.6204: "kiṃ païsarami valantĕ huāsaṇĕ  $  kiṃ samuddĕ kiṃ raṇṇĕ su-bhīsaṇĕ
text.6205: kiṃ visu bhuñjami kiṃ ahi cappami  $  kiṃ appaü karavatteṃ kappami
text.6206: kiṃ karivara-dantahĩ uru bhindami  $  kiṃ karavālĕhĩ tilu tilu chindami
text.6207: kiṃ disa laṅghami kiṃ pavvajjami  $  kahŏ akkhami kahŏ saraṇu pavajjami
text.6208: ahavaï eṇa kāĩ gamu sajjami  $  taruvara-ḍālaĕ pāṇa visajjami"
text.6209: ema bhaṇeppiṇu caliẏa turantī  $  kaṅkellī-thaḍa ugghosantī
text.6212: caüviha-seṇṇeṃ pariẏariẏa  $  dhaṇa ṇīsariẏa  $  "ko vihĩ āliṅgaṇu desaï"
text.6213: ema cavanti païṭṭha vaṇĕ  $  ravi-atthavaṇĕ  $  "kahĩ lakkhaṇu" ṇāĩ gavesaï
text.6217: diṭṭhu asoẏavacchu pariañciu  $  jiṇavaro vva sabbhāveṃ añciu
text.6218: puṇu parivāẏaṇu kiẏaü asoẏahŏ  $  "aṇṇu ṇa iha-loẏahŏ para-loẏahŏ
text.6219: jammĕ jammĕ mua-muahĕ sa-lakkhaṇu  $  piẏa-bhattāru hojja mahu lakkhaṇu"
text.6220: puṇu puṇu ema ṇamaṃsaï jāvĕhĩ  $  raẏaṇihĕ ve paharā huẏa tāvĕhĩ
text.6221: saẏalu vi sāhaṇu ṇiddoṇallaü  $  ṇāvaï mohaṇa-jāleṃ pelliu
text.6222: ṇiggaẏa puṇu vaṇamāla turantī  $  hāra-ḍora-ṇeurĕhĩ khalantī
text.6224: ṇivisaddheṃ ṇaggohĕ valaggī  $  ramaṇa-cavala ṇaṃ goha-valaggī
text.6226: rehaï dumĕ vaṇamāla kiha  $  ghaṇĕ vijju jiha  $  pahavantī lakkhaṇa-kaṅkhiṇi
text.6227: kilikilanti koḍḍāvaṇiẏa  $  bhīsāvaṇiẏa  $  paccakkha ṇāĩ vaḍa-jakkhiṇi
text.6231: tahĩ vālaĕ kaluṇu pakandiẏaü  $  vaṇa-ḍimbhaü ṇaṃ pariandiẏaü
text.6240: vuccaï dhīẏa mahīharahŏ  $  dīhara-karahŏ  $  vaṇamāla-ṇāma bhaẏa-vajjiẏa
text.6241: lakkhaṇa-paï sumarantiẏaĕ  $  kandantiẏaĕ  $  vaḍa-pāẏavĕ pāṇa visajjiẏa"
text.6245: ema bhaṇeppiṇu ṇaẏaṇa-visālaĕ  $  aṃsua-pāsaü kiu vaṇamālaĕ
text.6246: so jjĕ ṇāĩ saĩ mambhīsāvaï  $  ṇāĩ vivāha-līla darisāvaï
text.6247: ṇaṃ diẏavaru dāṇahŏ hakkāriu  $  ṇāĩ kumāreṃ hatthu pasāriu
text.6248: galĕ lāĕvi hallāvaï jāvĕhĩ  $  kaṇṭheṃ dhariẏāliṅgĕvi tāvĕhĩ
text.6249: ema pajampiu mambhīsantaü  $  "haũ so lakkhaṇu lakkhaṇavantaü
text.6250: dasaraha-taṇaü sumittiĕ jāẏaü  $  rāmeṃ sahũ vaṇavāsahŏ āẏaü"
