text.6251: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vimbhāviẏa ṇiẏa-maṇĕ  $  "kahĩ lakkhaṇu kahĩ acchiu uvavaṇĕ"
text.6252: tāma halāuhu kokkaï laggaü  $  "bho bho lakkhaṇa āu kahĩ gaü"
text.6254: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi mahihara-suaĕ  $  pulaïẏa-bhuaĕ  $  ṇaḍu jiha ṇaccāviu ṇiẏa-maṇu
text.6255: "sahala maṇoraha ajju mahu  $  parihūu suhu (?)  $  bhattāru laddhu jaṃ lakkhaṇu"
text.6259: to etthantarĕ bhuvaṇāṇandeṃ  $  diṭṭhu jaṇaddaṇu rāhavacandeṃ
text.6260: ṇāvaï tamu dīvaẏa-siha-sahiẏaü  $  ṇāvaï jalaharu vijju-pagahiẏaü
text.6261: ṇāvaï kari kariṇihĕ āsattaü  $  calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu valahŏ sa-kalattaü
text.6262: "cāru cāru bho ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇa  $  kahĩ paĩ kaṇṇa laddha riumaddaṇa"
text.6263: vuttu kumāreṃ "vijja va saguṇiẏa  $  dharaṇīdharahŏ dhīẏa kiṃ ṇa muṇiẏa
text.6264: jā mahu puvvaẏaṇṇa-uvadiṭṭhī  $  sā vaṇamāla eha vaṇĕ diṭṭhī"
text.6265: hari apphālaï jāva kahāṇaü  $  tāma ratti gaẏa vimalu vihāṇaü
text.6266: suhaḍa viuddha kuddha jasa-luddhā  $  "keṇa vi laïẏa kaṇṇa" saṇṇaddhā
text.6268: tāva ṇihāliẏa dujjaĕhĩ  $  puṇu raha-gaĕhĩ  $  cāuddisu cavala-turaṅgĕhĩ
text.6269: veḍhiẏa raṇaühĕ ve vi jaṇa  $  vala-mahumahaṇa  $  pañcāṇaṇa jema kuraṅgĕhĩ
text.6273: abbhiṭṭu seṇṇu kalaẏalu karantu  $  "jiha laïẏa kaṇṇa tiha haṇu" bhaṇantu
text.6274: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu hari palittu  $  uddhāiu sihi ṇaṃ ghiĕṇa sittu
text.6275: ekkallaü lakkhaṇu valu aṇantu  $  ālaggu to vi tiṇa-samu gaṇantu
text.6276: parisakkaï thakkaï calaï valaï  $  taruvara ummūlĕvi seṇṇu dalaï
text.6277: uvvaḍaï bhiḍaï pāḍaï turaṅga  $  mahi kamaï bhamaï bhāmaï rahaṅga
text.6278: avagāhaï sāhaï dharaï joha  $  dalavaṭṭaï loṭṭaï gaẏavaroha
text.6279: viṇivāiẏa dhāiẏa suhaḍa-thaṭṭa  $  kaḍuāviẏa vivarāmuha paẏaṭṭa
text.6280: ṇāsanti ke vi je samarĕ cukka  $  kāẏara-ṇara-kara-paharaṇaĩ mukka
text.6282: gampiṇu kahiu mahīharahŏ  $  "ekkahŏ ṇarahŏ  $  āvaṭṭu seṇṇu bhuva-daṇḍaĕ
text.6283: jiha ṇāsahi jima bhiḍu samarĕ  $  vihĩ ekku karĕ  $  vaṇamāla laïẏa valimaṇḍaĕ"
text.6287: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu tharaharantu  $  dharaṇīdharu dhāiu vipphurantu
text.6288: ārūḍhu mahārahĕ diṇṇu saṅkhu  $  saṇṇaddhu kuddhu jaẏa-lacchi-kaṅkhu
text.6289: to dujjaẏa duddhara duṇṇivāra  $  "haṇu haṇu" bhaṇanta ṇiggaẏa kumāra
text.6291: gopāla-pāla iẏa aṭṭha bhāi  $  sahũ rāeṃ ṇava gaha kuiẏa ṇāĩ
text.6292: etthantarĕ raṇĕ vahu-macchareṇa  $  hakkāriu lakkhaṇu mahihareṇa
text.6293: "valu valu samaraṅgaṇĕ dehi jujjhu  $  ṇiẏa-ṇāmu gottu kahĕ kavaṇu tujjhu"
text.6294: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi volliu lacchi-gehu  $  "kula-ṇāmahŏ avasaru kavaṇu ehu
text.6296: paharu paharu jaṃ paĩ guṇiu  $  kiṇṇa vi muṇiu  $  jasu bhāi mahantaü rāmu
text.6297: rahukula-ṇandaṇu lacchi-haru  $  taü jīvaharu  $  ṇaravaï mahu lakkhaṇu ṇāmu
text.6301: kulu ṇāmu kahiu jaṃ sirihareṇa  $  dhaṇu ghattĕvi mahihĕ mahīhareṇa
text.6303: havi sakkhikarĕvi aparāẏaṇāsu  $  saĩ diṇṇa kaṇṇa ṇārāẏaṇāsu
text.6304: ārūḍhu mahīharu ekka-rahĕ  $  aṭṭha vi kumāra aṇṇekka-rahĕ
text.6305: vaṇamāla sa-lakkhaṇa ekka-rahĕ  $  thiẏa sa-vala sīẏa aṇṇekka-rahĕ
text.6307: ucchāhĕhĩ dhavalĕhĩ maṅgalehĩ  $  kaṃsālĕhĩ tālĕhĩ maddalehĩ
text.6308: āṇandeṃ ṇaẏarĕ païṭṭhāĩ  $  līlaĕ atthāṇĕ vaïṭṭhāĩ
text.6310: sahũ vaṇamālaĕ mahumahaṇu  $  parituṭṭha-maṇu  $  jaṃ veihĕ jantu padīsiu
text.6311: loĕhĩ maṅgalu gantaĕhĩ  $  ṇaccantaĕhĩ  $  jiṇu jammaṇĕ jiha sa iṃ bhū siu
text.6313: tahĩ avasarĕ āṇanda-bharĕ  $  ucchāha-karĕ  $  jaẏakārahŏ kāraṇĕ ṇikkiu
text.6314: bharahahŏ uppari uccaliu  $  rahasucchaliu  $  ṇaru ṇandāvatta-ṇarāhiu
text.6318: jo bharahahŏ dūu visajjiẏaü  $  āiu sammāṇa-vivajjiẏaü
text.6320: "haũ pekkhu kema vicchāriẏaü  $  siru muṇḍĕvi kaha vi ṇa māriẏaü
text.6321: so bharahu ṇa icchaï sandhi raṇĕ  $  jaṃ jāṇahŏ taṃ cintavahŏ maṇĕ
text.6322: aṇṇu vi ukkhandheṃ āiẏaü  $  sahũ seṇṇeṃ viñjhu parāiẏaü
text.6323: tahĩ ṇaravaï vālikhillu valiu  $  sīhoẏaru vajjaẏaṇṇu miliu
text.6324: tahĩ ruddabhutti sirivaccha-dharu  $  marubhutti subhutti vibhutti-karu
text.6325: avarehi mi samaü samāvaḍiu  $  pekkhesahi kallaĕ abbhiḍiu
text.6327: tāma aṇantavīru khuhiu  $  païjāruhiu  $  "jaï kallaĕ bharahu ṇa mārami
text.6328: to arahanta-bhaḍārāhŏ  $  sura-sārāhŏ  $  ṇaü calaṇa-jualu jaẏakārami"
text.6332: païjārūḍhu ṇarāhiu jāvĕhĩ  $  sāhaṇu miliu asesu vi tāvĕhĩ
text.6333: lehu liheppiṇu jaga-vikkhāẏahŏ  $  turiu visajjiu mahihara-rāẏahŏ
text.6334: aggaĕ ghittu vaddhu lampikku va  $  hariṇakkharahĩ līṇu ṇaṇḍikku va
text.6335: sundaru pattavantu vara-sāhu va  $  ṇāva-vahulu sari-gaṅga-pavāhu va
text.6336: diṭṭha rāẏa tahĩ āẏa aṇanta vi  $  salla-visalla-sīhavikkanta vi
text.6343: avara vi je ekkekka-pahāṇā  $  keṇa gaṇeppiṇu sakkiẏa rāṇā
text.6345: tāma ṇarāhiu kasaṇa-taṇu  $  thiu vimaṇa-maṇu  $  ṇaṃ paḍiu siratthalĕ vajju
text.6346: "kiha sāmiẏa-sammāṇa-bharu  $  visahiu duddharu  $  kiha bharahahŏ pahariu ajju"
text.6350: jaṃ ṇaravaï maṇĕ cintāviẏaü  $  halaharu ekkanta-pakkhĕ thiẏaü
text.6351: aṭṭha vi kumāra kokkiẏa khaṇĕṇa  $  vaïdehi āẏa sahũ lakkhaṇĕṇa
text.6352: melleppiṇu mantiu mantaṇaü  $  valu bhaṇaï "ma darisahŏ appaṇaü
text.6354: taṃ riu-atthāṇu paīsarahŏ  $  ṇaccanta aṇantavīru dharahŏ"
text.6355: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi parituṭṭha-maṇa  $  thiẏa kāmiṇi-vesa kiẏāharaṇa
text.6356: valaeveṃ joiu piẏa-vaẏaṇu  $  kiṃ hoi ṇa hoi vesa-gahaṇu
text.6357: "laï sundari tāva tiṭṭha ṇaẏarĕ  $  amhĕhĩ puṇu jujjhevaü samarĕ"
text.6359: lagga kaḍacchaĕ jaṇaẏa-suẏa  $  kaṇṭaïẏa-bhuẏa  $  "lahu ṇaravara-ṇāha ṇa esahi
text.6360: maĩ mellĕvi bhāsuraĕ  $  raṇa-sāsuraĕ  $  mā kitti-vahua pariṇesahi
text.6364: kheḍḍu karĕvi saṃcalla mahāiẏa  $  ṇiviseṃ ṇandāvattu parāiẏa
text.6365: diṭṭhu jiṇālaü khaṇĕ pariañcĕvi  $  aggaĕ gāĕvi vāĕvi ṇaccĕvi
text.6371: tahĩ tehaĕ pura-saravarĕ dujjaẏa  $  līlaĕ ṇāĩ païṭṭha disāgaẏa
text.6373: kāmiṇi-vesa kiẏāharaṇa  $  vihasiẏa-vaẏaṇa  $  gaẏa patta tetthu paḍihāru
text.6374: vuccaï "āẏaĩ cāraṇaĩ  $  bharahahŏ taṇaĩ  $  jiva kahĕ jiva dei païsāru"
text.6378: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi paḍihāru gaü  $  viṇṇattu ṇarāhiu raṇĕ ajaü
text.6379: "pahu ettaĩ gāẏaṇa āẏāĩ  $  phuḍu māṇusa-mettĕṇa jāẏāĩ
text.6380: ṇaü jāṇahũ kiṃ vijjāharaĩ  $  kiṃ gandhavvaĩ kiṃ kiṇṇaraĩ
text.6382: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi ṇarāhivĕṇa  $  "de de païsāru" vuttu ṇivĕṇa
text.6384: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi samuccaliẏa  $  ṇaṃ dasa disi-vaha ekkahĩ miliẏa
text.6391: tahĩ tehaĕ riu-atthāṇa-vaṇĕ  $  pañcāṇaṇa jema païṭṭha khaṇĕ
text.6392: ṇandiẏaḍa-ṇarāhiu diṭṭhu kiha  $  ṇakkhattahã majjhĕ miẏaṅku jiha
text.6393: ārambhiu aggaĕ pekkhaṇaü  $  sukalattu va savalu salakkhaṇaü
text.6394: suraẏaṃ piva vandha-karaṇa-pavaru  $  kavvaṃ piva chanda-sadda-gahiru
text.6395: raṇṇaṃ piva vaṃsa-tāla-sahiu  $  jujjhaṃ piva rāẏa-seẏa-sahiu
text.6396: jiha jiha uvvellaï hala-vahaṇu  $  tiha tiha appāṇu ṇavei jaṇu
text.6398: valu paḍhaï aṇantavīru suṇaï  $  "ko sīheṃ samaü keli kuṇaï
text.6400: jāma ṇa raṇamuhĕ uttharaï  $  paharaṇu dharaï  $  paĩ jīvagāhu sahũ rāĕhĩ
text.6401: tāma aẏāṇa muevi chalu  $  pariharĕvi valu  $  paḍu bharaha-ṇarindahŏ pāĕhĩ
text.6405: rāhavacandu maṇeṇa ṇa kampiu  $  puṇu puṇaruttĕhĩ eva pajampiu
text.6406: "bho bho ṇaravaï bharahu ṇamantahũ  $  kavaṇu parāhaü kira aṇuṇantahũ
text.6407: jo para-vala-samuddĕ mahaṇāẏaï  $  jo para-vala-miẏaṅkĕ gahaṇāẏaï
text.6408: jo para-vala-gaẏaṇĕhĩ candāẏaï  $  jo para-vala-gaïndĕ sīhāẏaï
text.6409: jo para-vala-raẏaṇihĩ haṃsāẏaï  $  jo para-vala-turaṅgĕ mahisāẏaï
text.6410: jo para-vala-bhuẏaṅgĕ garuḍāẏaï  $  jo para-vala-vaṇohĕ jalaṇāẏaï
text.6411: jo para-vala-ghaṇohĕ pavaṇāẏaï  $  jo para-vala-pavaṇohĕ dharāẏaï
text.6414: taṃ ṇisuṇevi viruddhaĕṇa  $  maṇĕ kuddhaĕṇa  $  aïvīreṃ ahara-phuranteṃ
text.6415: rattuppala-dala-loẏaṇĕṇa  $  jaga-bhoẏaṇĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ kiu avalou kiẏanteṃ
text.6419: bhaẏa-bhīsaṇu amarisa-kuiẏa-dehu  $  gajjantu samuṭṭhiu jema mehu
text.6420: karĕ asivaru lei ṇa lei jāma  $  ṇahĕ uḍḍĕvi rāmeṃ dhariu tāma
text.6421: sirĕ pāu devi coru va ṇivaddhu  $  ṇaṃ vāraṇu vāri-ṇivandhĕ chuddhu
text.6422: riu campĕvi para-vala-maïẏavaṭṭu  $  jiṇa-bhavaṇahŏ sammuhu valu paẏaṭṭu
text.6423: etthantarĕ mahumahaṇeṇa vuttu  $  "jo ḍhukkaï taṃ mārami ṇiruttu"
text.6424: taṃ suṇĕvi paropparu riu cavanti  $  "kiṃ eẏa parakkama tiẏahã honti"
text.6425: ettaḍiẏa volla paḍivakkhĕ  jāma  $  ṇara dasa vi jiṇālaü patta tāma
text.6426: je giliẏa āsi pura-rakkhaseṇa  $  ṇaṃ mukka paḍīvā bhaẏa-vaseṇa
text.6429: āẏaü pāsu jiẏāhavahŏ  $  tahŏ rāhavahŏ  $  "de daïẏa-bhikkha" maggantaü
text.6433: jaṃ eva vuttu vaṇiẏāẏaṇeṇa  $  pahu pabhaṇiu dasaraha-ṇandaṇeṇa
text.6434: "jaï bharahahŏ hohi subhiccu ajju  $  to ajju vi laï appaṇaü rajju"
text.6435: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi paraloẏa-bhīru  $  vihaseppiṇu bhaṇaï aṇantavīru
text.6436: "pāḍevaü jo calaṇehĩ ṇiccu  $  tahŏ kema paḍīvaü homi bhiccu
text.6437: valimaṇḍaĕ tava-caraṇeṇa jo vi  $  pāḍevaü pāẏahĩ bharahu to vi"
text.6438: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu tuṭṭhu rāmu  $  "saccaü jĕ tujjhu aïvīru ṇāmu"
text.6439: puṇaruttĕhĩ vuccaï "sāhu sāhu"  $  hakkāriu tahŏ suu sahasavāhu
text.6440: so ṇiẏa-saṃtāṇahŏ raïu rāu  $  aṇṇu vi bharahahŏ pāikku jāu
text.6442: riu melleppiṇu dasa vi jaṇa  $  gaẏa tuṭṭha-maṇa  $  ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaru parāiẏa jāvĕhĩ
text.6443: ṇandāvatta-ṇarāhivaï  $  jiṇĕ karĕvi maï  $  dikkhahã samuṭṭhiu tāvĕhĩ
text.6447: etthantarĕ pura-paramesarāhã  $  dikkhāĕ samuṭṭhiu saü ṇarāhã
text.6451: iẏa ettiẏa pahu pavvaïẏa tetthu  $  lāhaṇa-pavvaĕ jaẏa-ṇandi jetthu
text.6452: thiẏa pañca muṭṭhi sirĕ lou devi  $  saĩ vāhahĩ āharaṇaĩ muevi
text.6453: ṇīsaṅga vi thiẏa risi-saṅgha-sahiẏa  $  saṃsāra vi bhava-saṃsāra-rahiẏa
text.6454: ṇimmāṇa vi jīva-saẏahũ samāṇa  $  ṇiggantha vi gantha-paẏattha-jāṇa
text.6456: iẏa ekkekka-pahāṇa risi  $  bhava-timira-sasi  $  tava-sūra mahāvaẏa-dhārā
text.6461: tava-caraṇĕ pariṭṭhiu jaṃ ji rāu  $  tahŏ vandaṇa-hattiĕ bharahu āu
text.6462: teṃ diṭṭhu bhaḍāraü teẏa-piṇḍu  $  jo moha-mahīharĕ vajja-daṇḍu
text.6463: jo koha-huvāsaṇĕ jala-ṇihāu  $  jo maẏaṇa-mahāghaṇĕ palaẏa-vāu
text.6464: jo dappa-gaïndĕ mahā-maïndu  $  jo māṇa-bhuaṅgamĕ vara-khagindu
text.6466: "bho sāhu sāhu gambhīra dhīra  $  paĩ pūriẏa païjā 'ṇantavīra
text.6467: jaṃ pāḍiu haũ calaṇehĩ deva  $  taṃ tihuaṇu kārāviẏaü seva
text.6468: gaü ema pasaṃsĕvi bharahu rāu  $  ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaru pattu sāhaṇa-sahāu
text.6471: lakkhaṇu lakkhaṇavantiẏaĕ  $  ṇiẏa-pattiẏaĕ  $  avagūḍhu sa iṃ bhu va-ḍālĕhĩ
text.6474: vaṇa-vāsahŏ jantĕhĩ  $  rāmāṇantĕhĩ  $  kiu ummāhaü paṭṭaṇahŏ
text.6478: chuḍu chuḍu uhaẏa samāgama-luddhaĩ  $  risi-kulaĩ va paramāgama-luddhaĩ
text.6479: chuḍu chuḍu avaropparu aṇurattaĩ  $  sañjha-divāẏaraĩ va aṇurattaĩ
text.6480: chuḍu chuḍu ahiṇava-vahu-varaïttaĩ  $  soma-pahā iva sundara-cittaĩ
text.6481: chuḍu chuḍu cumviẏa-tāmarasāĩ  $  phullandhaẏa iva luddha-rasāĩ
text.6482: tāma kumāreṃ ṇaẏaṇa-visālā  $  janteṃ āucchiẏa vaṇamālā
text.6487: suravara-varaïtteṃ  $  ṇava-varaïtteṃ  $  jaṃ āucchiẏa ṇiẏaẏa dhaṇa
text.6494: dhīriẏa lakkhaṇeṇa etthantarĕ  $  "rāmahŏ ṇilaü karevi vaṇantarĕ
text.6495: kaïhi mi diṇĕhĩ paḍīvaü āvami  $  saẏala sa-sāẏara mahi bhuñjāvami
text.6496: jaï puṇu kahavi tula-laggĕ ṇāẏaü  $  haũ ṇa homi somittiĕ jāẏaü
text.6497: aṇṇu vi raẏaṇihĕ jo bhuñjantaü  $  maṃsa-bhakkhi mahu majju piẏantaü
text.6498: jīva vahantaü aliu cavantaü  $  para-dhaṇĕ para-kalatteṃ aṇurattaü
text.6499: jo ṇaru āĕhĩ vasaṇĕhĩ bhuttaü  $  haũ pāveṇa teṇa saṃjuttaü
text.6501: jaï ema vi ṇāvami  $  vaẏaṇu ṇa dāvami  $  to ṇivvūḍha-mahāhavahŏ
text.6502: ṇava-kamala-sukomala  $  ṇaha-paha-ujjala  $  chitta pāẏa maĩ rāhavahŏ"
text.6506: vaṇamāla ṇiẏattĕvi bhaggamāṇa  $  gaẏa lakkhaṇa-rāma supujjamāṇa
text.6507: thovantarĕ macchutthalla denti  $  golā-ṇaï diṭṭha samuvvahanti
text.6520: aridamaṇu ṇarāhiu vasaï jetthu  $  aïcaṇḍu paẏaṇḍu ṇa ko vi tetthu
text.6521: rajjesaru jo savvahã variṭṭhu  $  so pahu pahiẏāha mi mūlĕ diṭṭhu
text.6522: ṇaha-bhāsuru jo laṅgūla-dīhu  $  so māẏaṅgehi mi laïu sīhu
text.6523: jo duddama-dāṇava-simira-cūru  $  so tiẏa-muhaẏandahŏ tasaï sūru
text.6524: jaṃ rāẏahã taṃ chattaha mi chittu  $  jaṃ suhaḍahã taṃ kuḍḍaha mi cittu
text.6525: tahŏ ṇaẏarahŏ thiu avaruttareṇa  $  ujjāṇu addha-kosantareṇa
text.6526: suraseharu ṇāmeṃ jagĕ paẏāsu  $  ṇaṃ aggha-vihatthaü thiu valāsu
text.6528: tahĩ tehaĕ uvavaṇĕ  $  ṇava-taruvara-ghaṇĕ  $  jahĩ amarindu raï karaï
text.6529: tahĩ ṇilaü kareppiṇu  $  ve vi thaveppiṇu  $  lakkhaṇu ṇaẏarĕ paīsaraï
text.6533: païsanteṃ pura-vāhirĕ karālu  $  bhaḍa-maḍaẏa-puñju dīsaï visālu
text.6535: taṃ pekkhĕvi lahu harisiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  govāla papucchiẏa lakkhaṇeṇa
text.6536: "iu dīsaï kāĩ mahā-paẏaṇḍu  $  ṇaṃ ṇimmalu himagiri-sihara-khaṇḍu"
text.6537: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi govahĩ vuttu ema  $  "kiṃ eha vatta paĩ ṇa sua deva
text.6539: sā ajja vi acchaï vara-kumāri  $  paccakkha ṇāĩ āiẏa ku-māri
text.6540: tahĕ kāraṇĕ jo jo maraï johu  $  so ghippaï taṃ haḍḍa ïri ehu
text.6542: jo ghaĩ avagaṇṇĕvi  $  tiṇa-samu maṇṇĕvi  $  pañca vi sattiu dharaï ṇaru
text.6543: paḍivakkha-vimaddaṇu  $  ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇu  $  so para hosaï tāhĕ varu"
text.6547: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu duṇṇivāru  $  romañciu khaṇĕ lakkhaṇa-kumāru
text.6548: viẏaḍa-ppaẏa-chohĕhĩ puṇu paẏaṭṭu  $  ṇaṃ kesari maẏagala-maïẏavaṭṭu
text.6549: katthaï kappadduma diṭṭha teṇa  $  ṇaṃ panthiẏa thiẏa ṇaẏarāsaeṇa
text.6550: katthaï mālaï-kusumaĩ khivanti  $  sīsa va sukaïhĕ jasu vikkhiranti
text.6551: katthaï lakkhaï saravara vicitta  $  avagāhiẏa sīẏala jiha sumitta
text.6552: katthaï gorasu savvahã rasāhũ  $  ṇaṃ ṇiggaü māṇu harevi tāhũ
text.6553: katthaï āvāha ḍajjhanti kema  $  dujjaṇa-duvvaẏaṇĕhĩ suẏaṇa jema
text.6554: katthaï arahaṭṭa bhamanti kema  $  saṃsāriẏa bhava-saṃsārĕ jema
text.6555: ṇaṃ dhaü hakkāraï "ehi ehi  $  bho lakkhaṇa lahu jiẏapaüma lehi"
text.6558: ṇaṃ giliu jaṇaddaṇu  $  asura-vimaddaṇu  $  entaü ṇaẏara-ṇisāẏarĕṇa
text.6562: pāẏāra-bhuĕhĩ puraṇāĩteṇa  $  avaruṇḍiu lakkhaṇu ṇāĩ teṇa
text.6563: katthaï kumbhā sahu ṇāḍaehĩ  $  ṇa ṇaḍa ṇāṇāviha-ṇāḍaehĩ
text.6564: katthaï vaṃsāri samuddha-vaṃsa  $  ṇāvaï su-kulīṇa visuddha-vaṃsa
text.6565: katthaï dhaẏa-vaḍa ṇaccanti ema  $  vari amhi surāẏara saggĕ jema
text.6566: katthaï lohārĕhĩ lohakhaṇḍu  $  piṭṭijjaï ṇaraĕ va pāvapiṇḍu
text.6567: taṃ haṭṭamaggu mellĕvi kumāru  $  ṇiviseṇa parāiu rāẏavāru
text.6568: paḍihāru vuttu "kahi gampi ema  $  varu vuccaï āiu ekku deva
text.6570: riu-saṃghāẏahŏ saṃghāẏa-karaṇu  $  sahũ sattihĩ tujjhu vi satti-haraṇu
text.6572: (aha) kiṃ vahueṃ jampiĕṇa  $  ṇipphala-caviĕṇa  $  ema bhaṇahi taṃ aridamaṇu
text.6573: dasa-vīsa ṇa pucchaï  $  saü vi paḍicchaï  $  pañcahã sattihĩ ko gahaṇu"
text.6577: taṃ ṇisuṇevi gaü paḍihāru tetthu  $  saha-maṇḍavĕ so aridamaṇu jetthu
text.6578: paṇaveppiṇu vuccaï teṇa rāu  $  "paramesara viṇṇattiĕ pasāu
text.6579: bhaḍu kāleṃ coiu āu ikku  $  ṇa muṇahũ kiṃ akku miẏaṅku sakku
text.6580: kiṃ kusumāuhu atuliẏa-paẏāu  $  para pañca vāṇa ṇaü ekku cāu
text.6581: tahŏ ṇarahŏ ṇavallī bhaṅgi kā vi  $  phiṭṭaï ṇa lacchi aṅgahŏ kaẏāvi
text.6582: so cavaï ema jiẏapaüma lemi  $  kiṃ pañcahĩ dasa sattiu dharemi"
text.6583: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pabhaṇaï sattudamaṇu  $  "pekkhami kokkahi varaïttu kavaṇu"
text.6584: paḍihāreṃ saddiu āu kaṇhu  $  jaẏalacchi-pasāhiu jujjha-taṇhu
text.6587: lakkhijjaï lakkhaṇu  $  entu sa-lakkhaṇu  $  jema maïndu mahāgaĕhĩ
text.6591: lakkhaṇu pāsu parāiu jaṃ je  $  vuttu ṇiveṇa haseppiṇu taṃ je
text.6592: "ko jiẏapaüma laevi samatthu  $  keṇa huvāsaṇĕ ḍhoiu hatthu
text.6593: keṇa sireṇa paḍicchiu vajju  $  keṇa kiẏantu vi ghāiu ajju
text.6594: keṇa ṇahaṅgaṇu chittu karaggeṃ  $  keṇa surindu parajjiu bhoggeṃ
text.6595: keṇa vasundhari dāriẏa pāeṃ  $  keṇa paloṭṭiu diggaü ghāeṃ
text.6596: keṇa surehahŏ bhaggu visāṇu  $  keṇa talappaĕ pāḍiu bhāṇu
text.6597: laṅghiu keṇa samuddu asesu  $  keṃ phaṇa-maṇḍavĕ cūriu sesu
text.6598: keṇa pahañjaṇu vaddhu paḍeṇa  $  meru-mahāgiri ṭāliu keṇa
text.6600: jiha tuhũ tiha aṇṇa vi  $  ṇīsāvaṇṇa vi  $  garuẏaĩ gajjiẏa vahuẏa ṇara
text.6601: mahu satti-pahārĕhĩ  $  raṇĕ duvvārĕhĩ  $  kiẏa saẏa-sakkara diṭṭha para"
text.6605: aridamaṇeṃ bhaḍu jaṃ ahikhittu  $  mahumahu jema davaggi palittu
text.6606: "haũ jiẏapaüma laevi samatthu  $  maĩ ji huāsaṇĕ ḍhoiu hatthu
text.6607: maĩ ji sireṇa paḍicchiu vajju  $  maĩ ji kiẏantu vi ghāiu ajju
text.6608: maĩ ji ṇahaṅgaṇu chittu karaggeṃ  $  maĩ ji surindu parajjiu bhoggeṃ
text.6609: maĩ ji vasundhari dāriẏa pāeṃ  $  maĩ ji paloṭṭiu diggaü ghāeṃ
text.6610: maĩ ji surehahŏ bhaggu visāṇu  $  maĩ ji talappaĕ pāḍiu bhāṇu
text.6611: laṅghiu maĩ ji samuddu asesu  $  maĩ phaṇa-maṇḍavĕ cūriu sesu
text.6612: maĩ ji pahañjaṇu vaddhu paḍeṇa  $  meru-mahāgiri ṭāliu jeṇa
text.6614: haũ tihuaṇa-ḍāmaru  $  haũ ajarāmaru  $  haũ tettīsahũ raṇĕ ajaü
text.6615: khemañjali-rāṇā  $  avuha aẏāṇā  $  melli satti jaï satti taü"
text.6619: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi khemañjali-rāṇaü  $  uṭṭhiu galagajjantu pahāṇaü
text.6621: amvarĕ teẏa-piṇḍu ṇaü diṇaẏaru  $  ṇiẏa-majjāẏa-cattu ṇaü sāẏaru
text.6622: jaṇĕ aṇavaraẏa-dāṇu ṇaü maẏagalu  $  paramaṇḍala-viṇāsu ṇaü maṇḍalu
text.6623: rāmāẏaṇahŏ majjhĕ ṇaü rāmaṇu  $  bhīma-sarīru ṇa bhīmu bhaẏāvaṇu
text.6624: teṇa vimukka satti govindahŏ  $  ṇaṃ himavanteṃ gaṅga samuddahŏ
text.6625: dhāiẏa dhagadhaganti samaraṅgaṇĕ  $  ṇaṃ taḍi taḍaẏaḍanti ṇaha-aṅgaṇĕ
text.6626: suravara ṇahĕ vollanti paropparu  $  "eṇa pahāreṃ jīvaï dukkaru"
text.6628: etthantarĕ kaṇheṃ  $  jaẏa-jasa-taṇheṃ  $  dhariẏa satti dāhiṇa-kareṇa
text.6629: saṃkeẏahŏ ḍhukkī  $  thāṇahŏ cukkī  $  ṇāvaï para-tiẏa para-ṇareṇa
text.6633: dhariẏa satti jaṃ samarĕ samattheṃ  $  melliu kusuma-vāsu sura-sattheṃ
text.6634: puṇṇima-indu-runda-muha-somahĕ  $  keṇa vi kahiu gampi jiẏapomahĕ
text.6635: "sundari pekkhu pekkhu jujjhantahŏ  $  ṇokhī kā vi bhaṅgi varaïttahŏ
text.6636: jā taü tāeṃ satti visajjiẏa  $  lagga hatthĕ asaï vvālajjiẏa
text.6637: ṇara-bhamareṇa eṇa akalaṅkaü  $  para cumvevaü tuha muha-paṅkaü"
text.6639: jāla-gavakkhaĕ jo antara-paḍu  $  ṇāĩ sahattheṃ pheḍiu muha-vaḍu
text.6640: lakkhaṇu ṇaẏaṇa-kaḍakkhiu kaṇṇaĕ  $  ṇaṃ jujjhantu ṇivāriu saṇṇaĕ
text.6641: tāma kumāreṃ diṭṭhu sudaṃsaṇu  $  dhavalaharamvarĕ muha-maẏalañchaṇu
text.6642: suha-ṇakkhattĕ sujoggĕ suhaṅkaru  $  ṇaẏaṇāmelaü jāu paropparu
text.6644: etthantarĕ duṭṭheṃ  $  mukkāruṭṭheṃ  $  lahu aṇṇekka satti ṇarĕṇa
text.6645: sa vi dhariẏa saraggeṃ  $  vāma-karaggeṃ  $  ṇāvaï ṇava-vahu ṇava-varĕṇa
text.6649: aṇṇekka mukka vahu-macchareṇa  $  vajjāsaṇi ṇāĩ purandareṇa
text.6650: sa hi dāhiṇa-kakkhahĩ chuddha teṇa  $  avaruṇḍiẏa vesa va kāmueṇa
text.6651: aṇṇekka visajjiẏa dhagadhaganti  $  ṇaṃ sihi-siha jālā-saẏa muanti
text.6652: sa vi dhariẏa enti ṇārāẏaṇeṇa  $  vāmaddheṃ gori va tiṇaẏaṇeṇa
text.6653: ṇaṃ mahiharu devaïṇandaṇeṇa  $  pañcamiẏa mukka vahu-macchareṇa
text.6654: pammukka padhāiẏa ṇaravarāsu  $  ṇaṃ kanta sukantahŏ suhaẏarāsu
text.6655: sa visāṇĕhĩ enti ṇiruddha kema  $  ṇava-suraẏa-samāgamĕ juvaï jema
text.6656: etthantarĕ devahĩ lakkhaṇāsu  $  sirĕ mukka paḍīvaü kusuma-vāsu
text.6657: aridamaṇu ṇa sohaï satti-hīṇu  $  khala-kupurisu vva thiu satti-hīṇu
text.6659: hari romañciẏa-taṇu  $  sahaï sa-paharaṇu  $  raṇa-muhĕ parisakkantu kiha
text.6665: "khala khudda pisuṇa macchariẏa rāẏa  $  maĩ jema paḍicchiẏa pañca ghāẏa
text.6666: tiha tuhu mi paḍicchahi ekka satti  $  jaï atthi kā vi maṇĕ maṇusa-satti"
text.6667: kira ema bhaṇeppiṇu haṇaï jāma  $  jiẏapaümaĕ ghattiẏa māla tāma
text.6668: "bho sāhu sāhu raṇĕ duṇṇirikkha  $  maṃ paharu deva dei jaṇaṇa-bhikkha
text.6669: jeṃ samarĕ parajjiu sattudamaṇu  $  paĩ muĕvi aṇṇu varaïttu kavaṇu"
text.6670: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu lakkhaṇeṇa  $  āuddhaĩ ghittaĩ takkhaṇeṇa
text.6671: mukkāuhu gaü aridamaṇa-pāsu  $  sahasakkhu va paṇaviu jiṇavarāsu
text.6673: "jaṃ amarisa-kuddheṃ  $  jaẏa-jasa-luddheṃ  $  vippiu kiu tumhehĩ sahũ
text.6674: aṇṇu vi rekāriu  $  kaha vi ṇa māriu  $  taṃ marusejjahi māma mahu"
text.6679: "kiṃ jampieṇa vahu-amariseṇa  $  laï laïẏa kaṇṇa paĩ paüriseṇa
text.6680: tuhũ dīsahi daṇu-māhappa-cappu  $  kahĕ kavaṇu gottu kā māẏa vappu"
text.6681: mahumahaṇu pavolliu "ṇisuṇi rāẏa  $  mahu dasarahu tāu sumitti māẏa
text.6682: aṇṇu vi paẏaḍaü ikkhakku-vaṃsu  $  vaḍḍāraü jiha taruvarahŏ vaṃsu
text.6683: ve amhaĩ lakkhaṇa-rāma bhāẏa  $  vaṇavāsahŏ rajju muevi āẏa
text.6684: ujjāṇĕ tuhāraĕ asura-maddu  $  sahũ sīẏaĕ acchaï rāmabhaddu"
text.6685: vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa kaṇṭaïu rāu  $  saṃcallu ṇavara sāhaṇa-sahāu
text.6687: jaṇa-maṇa-parioseṃ  $  tūra-ṇighoseṃ  $  ṇaravaï kahi mi ṇa māiẏaü
text.6688: jahĩ rāmu sa-bhajjaü  $  vāhu-sahejjaü  $  taṃ uddesu parāiẏaü
text.6692: etthantarĕ para-vala-bhaḍa-ṇisāmu  $  uṭṭhiu jaṇa-ṇivahu ṇievi rāmu
text.6693: karĕ dhaṇuharu lei ṇa lei jāma  $  sakalattaü lakkhaṇu diṭṭhu tāma
text.6694: suravaï va sa-bhajjaü rahĕ ṇiviṭṭhu  $  aṇṇekku pāsĕ aridamaṇu diṭṭhu
text.6695: sandaṇahŏ tareppiṇu duṇṇivāru  $  rāmahŏ calaṇĕhĩ ṇivaḍiu kumāru
text.6697: paümahŏ paẏa-paümĕhĩ paḍiẏa kaṇṇa  $  teṇa vi su-pasatthāsīsa diṇṇa
text.6698: etthantarĕ māmeṃ ṇa kiu kheu  $  kaṇaẏa-rahĕ caḍāviu rāmaeu
text.6699: paḍu paḍaha pahaẏa kiẏa-kalaẏalehĩ  $  ucchāhĕhĩ dhavalĕhĩ maṅgalĕhĩ
text.6701: rahĕ ekkĕ ṇiviṭṭhaĩ  $  ṇaẏarĕ païṭṭhaĩ  $  sīẏa-valaĩ valavantāĩ
text.6702: ṇārāẏaṇu ṇāri vi  $  thiẏaĩ caẏāri vi  $  rajju sa iṃ bhu ñja nta ĩ
text.6705: muṇi-uvasaggu jahĩ  $  viharanta tahĩ  $  vaṃsatthalu ṇaẏaru parāiẏa
text.6709: tāma visanthulu pāṇakkantaü  $  diṭṭhu asesu vi jaṇu ṇāsantaü
text.6710: dummaṇu dīṇa-vaẏaṇu viddāṇaü  $  gaü vicchatta va galiẏa-visāṇaü
text.6711: paṇṇaẏa-ṇivahu va phaṇimaṇi-toḍiu  $  giri-ṇivahu va vajjāsaṇi-phoḍiu
text.6713: jaṇavaü jaṃ ṇāsantu padīsiu  $  rāhavacandeṃ puṇu mambhīsiu
text.6714: "thakkahŏ maṃ bhajjahŏ maṃ bhajjahŏ  $  abhaü abhaü bhaü saẏalu vivajjahŏ"
text.6716: teṇa vuttu "maṃ ṇaẏarĕ paīsahŏ  $  tiṇṇi mi pāṇa laeppiṇu ṇāsahŏ
text.6718: ettiu etthu purĕ  $  girivara-siharĕ  $  jo uṭṭhaï ṇāu bhaẏaṅkaru
text.6719: teṇa mahantu ḍaru  $  ṇivaḍanti taru  $  mandiraĩ janti saẏa-sakkaru
text.6723: ĕu dīsaï girivara-siharu jetthu  $  uvasaggu bhaẏaṅkaru hoi tetthu
text.6724: vāoli dhūli duvvāi ei  $  pāhaṇa paḍanti mahi tharaharei
text.6725: dhara bhamaï samuṭṭhaï sīha-ṇāu  $  varisanti meha ṇivaḍaï ṇihāu
text.6726: teṃ kajjeṃ ṇāsaï saẏalu lou  $  maṃ tumha vi uhu uvasaggu hou"
text.6727: taṃ ṇisuṇevi sīẏa maṇĕ kampiẏa  $  bhīẏa-visanthula eva pajampiẏa
text.6728: "amhahũ deseṃ desu bhamantahũ  $  kavaṇu parāhaü kira ṇāsantahũ"
text.6729: taṃ ṇisuṇevi bhaṇaï dāmoẏaru  $  "volliu kāĩ māĕ paĩ kāẏaru
text.6730: vihi mi jāma karĕ atula-paẏāvaĩ  $  sāẏara-vajjāvattaïṃ cāvaĩ
text.6731: jāma vihi mi jaẏa-lacchi pariṭṭhiẏa  $  toṇīrahĩ ṇārāẏa ahiṭṭhiẏa
text.6732: tāma māĕ tuhũ kahŏ āsaṅkahi  $  viharu viharu mā muhu ovaṅkahi
text.6734: dhīrĕvi jaṇaẏa-suẏa  $  kovaṇḍa-bhuẏa  $  saṃcalla ve vi vala-kesava
text.6743: kahĩ ji diṭṭha chāraẏā  $  lavanta matta-moraẏā
text.6752: tahĩ tehaĕ saïlĕ  $  taruvara-vahalĕ  $  ārūḍha ve vi hari-halahara
text.6753: jāṇaï-vijjulaĕ  $  dhavalujjalaĕ  $  ciñcaïẏa ṇāĩ ṇava jalahara
text.6758: ĕhu so dhaṇĕ ṇaggoha-pahāṇu  $  jahĩ risahahŏ uppaṇṇaü ṇāṇu
text.6759: ĕhu so sattavantu kiṃ ṇa muṇiu  $  ajiu sa-ṇāṇa-dehu jahĩ pathuṇiu
text.6760: ĕhu so indavacchu supasiddhaü  $  jahĩ saṃbhava-jiṇu ṇāṇa-samiddhaü
text.6761: ĕhu so saralu sahalu saṃbhūaü  $  ahiṇandaṇu sa-ṇāṇu jahĩ hūaü
text.6762: ĕhu pīẏaṅgu sīĕ sacchāẏaü  $  sumaï sa-ṇāṇapiṇḍu jahĩ jāẏaü
text.6763: ĕhu so sālu sīĕ ṇiẏacchiu  $  paümappahu sa-ṇāṇu jahĩ acchiu
text.6764: ĕhu so sirisu mahaddumu jāṇaï  $  ṇāṇu supāsĕ bhaṇĕvi jagu jāṇaï
text.6765: ĕhu so ṇāgarukkhu candappahĕ  $  ṇāṇuppatti jetthu candappahĕ
text.6766: ĕhu so mālaïrukkhu padīsiu  $  pupphaẏantu jahĩ ṇāṇa-vihūsiu
text.6768: ĕhu so pakkhataru  $  phala-phulla-bharu  $  tendui-samāṇu duha-ṇāsahũ
text.6773: ĕha sā pāḍali suhala supattī  $  vāsupujjĕ jahĩ ṇāṇuppattī
text.6774: ĕsu so jamvū ehu asatthu  $  vimalāṇantahũ ṇāṇa-samatthu
text.6775: uhu dahivaṇṇa-ṇandi supasiddhā  $  dhamma-santi jahĩ ṇāṇa-samiddhā
text.6776: uhu sāhāra-tilaü dīsanti  $  kunthu-arahũ jahĩ ṇāṇuppatti
text.6777: ĕhu so taru kaṅkelli-pahāṇu  $  mallijiṇahŏ jahĩ kevala-ṇāṇu
text.6778: ĕhu so campaü kiṇṇa ṇiẏacchiu  $  muṇi suvvaü sa-ṇāṇu jahĩ acchiu
text.6779: iẏa uttima-taru indu vi vandaï  $  jaṇu kajjeṇa teṇa ahiṇandaï"
text.6780: ema cavanta patta vala-lakkhaṇa  $  jahĩ kulabhūsaṇa-desavihūsaṇa
text.6781: divasa caẏāri aṇaṅga-viẏārā  $  paḍimā-jogeṃ thakka bhaḍārā
text.6784: veḍhiẏa ve vi jaṇa  $  suha-luddha-maṇa  $  pāsaṇḍiẏa jiha pasu-pāsĕhĩ
text.6788: jaṃ diṭṭhu asesu vi ahi-ṇihāu  $  valaeu bhaẏaṅkaru garuḍu jāu
text.6791: doṇṇi vi kovaṇḍaĩ kaṇṇa do vi  $  thiu rāhaü bhīsaṇu garuḍu hovi
text.6792: taṃ ṇaẏaṇa-kaḍakkhĕvi duggammehĩ  $  paricintiu kajju bhuaṅgamehĩ
text.6794: etthantarĕ vihaḍiẏa ahi maẏandha  $  gaẏa khaẏahŏ ṇāĩ muṇi-kammavandha
text.6795: bhaẏa-bhīẏa visanthula maṇĕṇa taṭṭha  $  khara-pavaṇa-pahaẏa ghaṇa jiha paṇaṭṭha
text.6798: jāẏa pagāsa risi  $  ṇahĕ sūra-sasi  $  ummilla ṇāĩ ghaṇa-jālahŏ
text.6802: ahi-ṇivahu jaṃ jĕ gaü osarĕvi  $  muṇi vandiẏa joga-bhatti karĕvi
text.6804: vihĩ dosahĩ je ṇa pariggahiẏa  $  vihĩ vajjiẏa vihĩ jhāṇahĩ sahiẏa
text.6809: jiẏa jehĩ sabhaẏa satta vi ṇaraẏa  $  je satta-sivaṅkara aṇavaraẏa
text.6812: ekkekkottariẏa  $  iẏa guṇa-bhariẏa  $  puṇu vandiẏa vala-govindĕhĩ
text.6817: bhāveṃ tihi mi jaṇĕhĩ dhammajjaṇu  $  kiu candaṇa-raseṇa sammajjaṇu
text.6818: pupphaccaṇiẏa chuddha-saẏavattĕhĩ  $  puṇu āḍhattu geu muṇi-bhattĕhĩ
text.6819: rāmu sughosa vīṇa apphālaï  $  jā muṇivarahu mi cittaĩ cālaï
text.6820: jā rāmaürihĩ āsi ravaṇṇī  $  tūsĕvi pūẏaṇa-jakkheṃ diṇṇī
text.6821: lakkhaṇu gāi salakkhaṇu geu  $  satta vi sara ti-gāma-sara-bheu
text.6823: tāla-vitāla paṇaccaï jāṇaï  $  ṇava rasa aṭṭha bhāva jā jāṇaï
text.6824: dasa diṭṭhiu vāvīsa laẏāĩ  $  bharaheṃ bharaha-gaviṭṭhaĩ jāĩ
text.6826: bhāveṃ jaṇaẏa-suẏa  $  caüsaṭṭhi bhuẏa  $  darisanti paṇaccaï jāvĕhĩ
text.6833: aṇṇaĩ piṅgaṅgaĩ piṅgakkhaĩ  $  aṇṇaĩ ṇimmasaĩ duppekkhaĩ
text.6834: aṇṇaĩ ṇahĕ ṇaccanti vivatthaĩ  $  aṇṇaĩ tahĩ cāmuṇḍa-vihatthaĩ
text.6838: aṇṇaĩ kilakilanti caü-pāsĕhĩ  $  aṇṇaĩ kahakahanti uvahāsĕhĩ
text.6840: aṇṇaĩ bhīsaṇaĩ  $  duddarisaṇaĩ  $  "maru māri māri" jampantaĩ
text.6851: aṇṇaĩ daha-vaẏaṇaĩ saẏa-vaẏaṇaĩ  $  aṇṇaĩ sahasa-muhaĩ vahu-ṇaẏaṇaĩ
text.6852: tahĩ tehaĕ vi kālĕ maï-vimalahũ  $  to vi ṇa caliu jhāṇu muṇi-dhavalahũ
text.6855: kāleṃ appaṇaü  $  bhīsāvaṇaü  $  darisāviu ṇaṃ vahu-bhaṅgĕhĩ
text.6860: mambhīsĕvi sīẏa mahāvalĕhĩ  $  muṇi-calaṇa dharāviẏa karaẏalĕhĩ
text.6861: dhaṇuharaĩ vihi mi apphāliẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ sura-bhavaṇaĩ saṃcāliẏaĩ
text.6863: taṃ saddu suṇĕvi āsaṅkiẏaĩ  $  riu-cittaĩ māṇa-kalaṅkiẏaĩ
text.6865: ṇaṃ aṭṭha vi kammaĩ ṇijjiẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ pañcendiẏaĩ parajjiẏaĩ
text.6866: ṇaṃ ṇāsĕvi gaẏaĩ parīsahaĩ  $  tiha asura-sahāsaĩ dūsahaĩ
text.6868: chuḍu chuḍu ṇaṭṭhāĩ  $  bhaẏa-taṭṭhāĩ  $  melleppiṇu maccharu māṇu
text.6873: tāva muṇindahã ṇāṇuppattiĕ  $  āẏa surāsura vandaṇahattiĕ
text.6874: jehĩ kitti taïlokkĕ pagāsiẏa  $  joisa ventara bhavaṇa-ṇivāsiẏa
text.6877: saṃcalieṃ caü-devaṇikāeṃ  $  chāiu ṇahu ṇaṃ ghaṇa-saṃghāeṃ
text.6878: vahaï vimāṇu vimāṇeṃ cappiu  $  vāḥaṇu vāhaṇa-ṇivaha-jhaḍappiu
text.6879: turaü turaṅgameṇa omāṇiu  $  sandaṇu sandaṇeṇa saṃdāṇiu
text.6880: gaẏavaru gaẏavareṇa paḍikhaliẏaü  $  laggĕvi maüḍĕ maüḍu ucchaliẏaü
text.6882: bhāveṃ pelliẏaü  $  bhaẏa-melliẏaü  $  sura-sāhaṇu līlaĕ āvaï
text.6883: loẏahũ mūḍhāhũ  $  tamĕ chūḍhāhũ  $  ṇaṃ dhamma-riddhi darisāvaï
text.6888: soha dintu caüsaṭṭhī-ṇaẏaṇĕhĩ  $  gulugulantu vattīsahĩ vaẏaṇĕhĩ
text.6889: vaẏaṇĕ vaẏaṇĕ aṭṭhaṭṭha visāṇaĩ  $  ṇāĩ suvaṇṇa-ṇivaddha-ṇihāṇaĩ
text.6890: ekkekkaĕ visāṇĕ jaṇa-maṇaharu  $  ekkekkaü jĕ pariṭṭhaü saravaru
text.6891: sarĕ sarĕ sara-parimāṇuppaṇṇī  $  kamaliṇi ekka-ekka ṇippaṇṇī
text.6892: ekkekkahĕ paümiṇihĕ visālaĩ  $  paṅkaẏāĩ vattīsa sa-ṇālaĩ
text.6893: kamalĕ kamalĕ vattīsa ji pattaĩ  $  pattĕ pattĕ ṇaṭṭāi mi tettaĩ
text.6894: vaddhiu jamvūdīva-pamāṇeṃ  $  puṇu ji pariṭṭhiu teṇa ji thāṇeṃ
text.6895: tahĩ dugghoṭṭĕ caḍĕvi sura-sundaru  $  vandaṇahattiĕ āu purandaru
text.6896: puraü surindahŏ ṇaẏaṇāṇandĕhĩ  $  guru pomāiu vandiṇa-vandĕhĩ
text.6898: "devahŏ dāṇavahŏ  $  khala-māṇavahŏ  $  risi-calaṇĕhĩ keva ṇa laggahŏ
text.6899: jehĩ tavantaĕhĩ  $  acalantaĕhĩ  $  indu vi avaẏāriu saggahŏ"
text.6904: bhaṇaï purandaru "ahŏ ahŏ loẏahŏ  $  jaï saṅkiẏa jara-maraṇa-vioẏahŏ
text.6905: jaï ṇivviṇṇā caü-gaï-gamaṇahŏ  $  to ki ṇa ḍhukkahŏ jiṇavara-bhavaṇahŏ
text.6906: puttu kalattu jāva maṇĕ cintahŏ  $  jiṇavara-vimvu tāva ki ṇa cintahŏ
text.6907: cintahŏ jāva māsu maẏarāsaṇu  $  ki ṇa cintavahŏ tāva jiṇasāsaṇu
text.6908: cintahŏ jāva riddhi siẏa sampaẏa  $  ki ṇa cintavahŏ tāva jiṇavara-paẏa
text.6909: cintahŏ jāva rūu dhaṇu jovvaṇu  $  dhaṇṇu suvaṇṇu aṇṇu gharu pariẏaṇu
text.6910: cintahŏ jāva valiu bhuva-pañjaru  $  ki ṇa cintavahŏ tāva paramakkharu
text.6912: pekkhahu dhamma-phalu  $  caüraṅga-valu  $  paẏahiṇa ti-vāra devāviu
text.6913: sa iṃ bhu vaṇesarahŏ  $  paramesarahŏ  $  atthakkaĕ seva karāviu"
text.6920: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pabhaṇaï parama-guru  $  "suṇu jakkhathāṇu ṇāmeṇa puru
text.6922: ekkovara kiṅkara puravaïhĕ  $  ṇaṃ tumvuru-ṇāraẏa suravaïhĕ
text.6923: hammantu vihaṅgamu luddhaĕhĩ  $  parirakkhiu tehĩ pavuddhaĕhĩ
text.6924: khagavaï puṇu vahukāleṇa muu  $  viñjhācalĕ bhillāhivaï huu
text.6925: to kāsava-surava ve vi marĕvi  $  thiẏa amiẏasarahŏ gharĕ oarĕvi
text.6927: vaddhāvaü āẏaü vandhujaṇu  $  kiu uiẏa-muiẏa ṇāmaggahaṇu
text.6935: teṇa vi ṇiẏa-suahŏ jaẏandharahŏ  $  kiẏa kiṅkara vaḍḍhiẏa-raṇabharahŏ
text.6936: acchanti jāma bhuñjanti siẏa  $  to tāma jaṇerahŏ gamaṇa-kiẏa
text.6938: vasubhūi sahejjaü tāsu gaü  $  teṃ ṇavara pāṇa-vicchou kaü
text.6939: pallaṭṭaï pallaṭṭiu bhaṇĕvi  $  te uiẏa-muiẏa tiṇa-samu gaṇĕvi
text.6940: so uvaüvāeviĕ sahũ jiẏaï  $  amiovamu ahara-pāṇu piẏaï
text.6941: pariẏāṇĕvi jeṭṭheṃ duccariu  $  vasubhūihĕ jīviu avahariu
text.6948: jaẏa-pavvaẏa-pavarujjāṇu jahĩ  $  risi-saṅghu parāiu tāva tahĩ
text.6949: kiẏa rukkhĕ rukkhĕ āvāsa-kiẏa  $  ṇaṃ rukkhĕ rukkhĕ avaïṇṇa siẏa
text.6950: saṃjāẏaĩ aṅgaĩ komalaĩ  $  ahiẏaĩ paṇṇaĩ phullaĩ phalaĩ
text.6951: risi rukkha va avicala hovi thiẏa  $  kisalaĕ pariveḍhāveḍhi kiẏa
text.6952: risi rukkha va tavaṇa-tāva taviẏa  $  risi rukkha va mūla-guṇagghaviẏa
text.6953: risi rukkha va ālavāla-rahiẏa  $  risi rukkha va mokkha-phalabbhahiẏa
text.6954: gaü ṇandaṇavaṇiu turantu tahĩ  $  so vijaẏa-mahīhara-rāu jahĩ
text.6962: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaravaï gaẏaü tahĩ  $  āvāsiu maharisi-satthu jahĩ
text.6964: paramappaü appaü hovi thiu  $  kajjeṇa keṇa risi-vesu kiu
text.6965: aïdullahu lahĕvi maṇuattaṇaü  $  keṃ kajjeṃ viṇaḍahŏ appaṇaü
text.6966: kahŏ keraü parama-mokkha-gamaṇu  $  vari māṇiu maṇaharu taruṇiẏaṇu
text.6969: lāẏaṇṇaĩ rūvaïṃ jovvaṇaĩ  $  ṇipphalaĩ gaẏaĩ tumhahã taṇaĩ
text.6971: supasiddhaü loĕ  $  ekku vi taü ṇa kaü
text.6978: kahŏ gharu kahŏ putta-kalattāĩ  $  dhaẏa-cindhaĩ cāmara-chattāĩ
text.6981: vaïsaṇaü vasundhari vajjāĩ  $  ṇaü kāsu vi honti sahejjāĩ
text.6982: āẏahĩ vahuẏahĩ veẏāriẏaĩ  $  vambhāṇahã lakkhaĩ māriẏaĩ
text.6985: eẏa vi avare vi  $  kāleṃ kavalu kiẏa
text.6986: siẏa kahŏ samāṇu  $  ekku vi paü ṇa gaẏa"
text.6990: paramesaru puṇu vi puṇu vi kahaï  $  "jiu tiṇṇi avatthaü uvvahaï
text.6992: puggala-parimāṇa-suttu dharĕvi  $  kara-calaṇa caẏāri khambha karĕvi
text.6995: taruṇattaṇu jāma tāma vahaï  $  puṇu pacchaĕ juṇṇa-bhāu lahaï
text.6996: siru kampaï jampaï ṇa vi vaẏaṇu  $  ṇa suṇanti kaṇṇa ṇa ṇiẏaï ṇaẏaṇu
text.6997: ṇa calanti calaṇa ṇa karanti kara  $  jara-jajjarihoi sarīru para
text.7000: jiu jema vihaṅgu  $  uḍḍaï muĕvi taru"
text.7004: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaravaï uvasamiu  $  ṇiẏa-ṇandaṇu ṇiẏa-paĕ saṇṇimiu
text.7006: tahĩ uiẏa-muiẏa ṇiggantha thiẏa  $  kara-kamalĕhĩ kesuppāḍa kiẏa
text.7007: puṇu savaṇa-saṅghu tahŏ puravarahŏ  $  gaü vandaṇahattiĕ jiṇavarahŏ
text.7008: sammeẏahŏ janta janta valiẏa  $  pahu chaḍḍĕvi uppaheṇa caliẏa
text.7009: te uiẏa-muiẏa dui ṇivvaḍiẏa  $  vasubhūi-bhilla-pallihĕ paḍiẏa
text.7013: vaïraĩ ṇa kuhanti  $  honti ṇa jajjaraĩ
text.7019: "ahŏ saṃcārima-ṇara-vaṇaẏarahŏ  $  kahĩ gammaï evahĩ mahu marahŏ"
text.7020: taṃ suṇĕvi mahāvaẏa-dhāraĕṇa  $  dhīriu lahuvaü vaḍḍāraĕṇa
text.7021: "maṃ bhīhi thāhi aṇṇahŏ bhavahŏ  $  uvasagga-sahaṇu bhūsaṇu tavahŏ"
text.7022: tahĩ tehaĕ vihurĕ samāvaḍiĕ  $  adhurandharĕ garua-bhārĕ paḍiĕ
text.7023: thiu khandhu samaḍḍĕvi ekku jaṇu  $  bhillāhiu abbhuddharaṇa-maṇu
text.7024: jo puvva-bhavantarĕ pakkhiẏaü  $  purĕ jakkhathāṇĕ parirakkhiẏaü
text.7025: teṃ vuccaï "loddhā osarahi  $  ko māraï risi tuhũ mahu marahi"
text.7028: daẏa caḍĕvi ṇiseṇi  $  līlaĕ saggu gaẏa
text.7032: pāvāsaü paüru pāu karĕvi  $  vahu-kālu ṇaraẏa-tiriẏahĩ phirĕvi
text.7036: te uiẏa-muiẏa tāsu ji taṇaẏa  $  viṇṇāṇa-kalā-para-pāra-gaẏa
text.7039: chaddivasaĩ sallehaṇu karĕvi  $  gaü saggu piẏavvaü tahĩ marĕvi
text.7040: jagaḍantu aṇuddharu ḍāmariu  $  raṇĕ raẏaṇa-vicittaraheṃ dhariu
text.7047: vahu-kāleṃ raẏaṇa-vicittaraha  $  taü karĕvi marĕvi paribhamĕvi paha
text.7050: kulabhūsaṇu paḍhamu puttu pavaru  $  lahu desavihūsaṇu ekku avaru
text.7051: aṇṇu vi uppaṇṇa ekka duhiẏa  $  kamalocchava runda-canda-muhiẏa
text.7052: veṇṇi mi kumāra sālahĩ ṇimiẏa  $  āẏariẏahŏ kahŏ vi samullaviẏa
text.7053: paḍhamāṇa juvāṇa-bhāvĕ caḍiẏa  $  ṇaṃ daïveṃ ve aṇaṅga ghaḍiẏa
text.7054: vitthaẏa-vacchaẏala palamva-bhua  $  ṇaṃ saggahŏ inda-paḍinda cua
text.7062: paḍihāi ṇa candaṇa-leva-chavi  $  dhavalāmala-komala-kamalu ṇa vi
text.7063: ṇa vi jalu jaladda dāhiṇa-pavaṇu  $  kusumāuheṇa ṇa ṇaḍiu kavaṇu
text.7064: pekkheppiṇu paẏaĩ su-komalaĩ  $  ṇa sahanti rūi-rattuppalaĩ
text.7066: pekkheppiṇu muhu vālahĕ taṇaü  $  paḍihāi ṇa candaṇu candiṇaü
text.7067: loẏaṇaĩ rūvĕ paṅguttāĩ  $  ḍhorā iva kaddamĕ khuttāĩ
text.7068: pekkheppiṇu kesa-kalāu maṇĕ  $  ṇa suhanti mora ṇaccanta vaṇĕ
text.7071: jo joaï ko vi  $  so saẏalu vi maraï
text.7075: tahĩ avasarĕ paṇaïhĩ pahu bhaṇiu  $  "khemaṅkara tuhũ jaṇaṇiĕ jaṇiu
text.7076: tuhũ mahiẏalĕ dhaṇṇaü ekku para  $  kamalocchava duhiẏa jāsu pavara
text.7077: kula-desavihūsaṇa jamala suẏa  $  taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇāĩ kumāra muẏa
text.7078: haẏa-hiẏaẏa kāĩ cintavasi tuhũ  $  pāvijjaï jehĩ mahantu duhu
text.7081: titthaṅkara-gaṇahara-ṇindiẏaĩ  $  ṇaü khañcahi pañca vi indiẏaĩ
text.7082: rūveṇa paẏaṅgu mīṇu rasĕṇa  $  migu savaṇeṃ bhasalu gandhavasĕṇa
text.7085: jo sevaï pañca  $  tahŏ uttāru kaü"
text.7089: to kiẏa ṇivitti pariṇevāhŏ  $  sāvajju rajju bhuñjevāhŏ
text.7095: thiẏa paḍimā-joggeṃ giri-siharĕ  $  so aggikeu tehaĕ 'vasarĕ
text.7096: saṃcaliu ṇahaṅgaṇĕ kahĩ vi jāma  $  gaü amhahã uppari khaliu tāma
text.7097: puvvabhaü sarĕvi koheṃ jaliu  $  thiu rundhĕvi ṇahaẏalĕ kilikiliu
text.7098: uvasaggu jāma pārambhiẏaü  $  vahu-rūvĕhĩ gaẏaṇĕ viẏambhiẏaü
text.7100: tumhahã jĕ pahāveṃ taṭṭhāĩ  $  asuraĩ dhaṇu-ravĕṇa paṇaṭṭhāĩ
text.7103: so dīsaï etthu  $  gāruḍu deu huu
text.7107: to garuḍeṃ pariosiẏa-maṇĕṇa  $  ve vijjaü diṇṇaü takkhaṇĕṇa
text.7108: rāhavahŏ sīhavāhaṇi pavara  $  lakkhaṇahŏ garuḍavāhaṇi avara
text.7109: pahilārī satta-saĕhĩ sahiẏa  $  aṇupacchima tihĩ saĕhĩ ahiẏa
text.7111: "achantu tāva tumhahũ jĕ gharĕ  $  avasarĕ paḍivaṇṇĕ pasāu karĕ"
text.7112: sahũ garuḍeṃ saṃbhāsaṇu karĕvi  $  guru pucchiu puṇu calaṇĕhĩ dharĕvi
text.7113: "amhahũ hiṇḍantahũ dharaṇi-vahĕ  $  jaṃ jima hosaï taṃ tema kahĕ"
text.7117: mahi-khaṇḍaĩ tiṇṇi  $  sa iṃ bhu ñjevāĩ"
text.7125: kāĩ phalu laïĕ aṇatthamiĕ  $  uvavāsa-posahaĕ saṃthaviĕ
text.7126: phalu kāĩ jīva-mambhīsiẏaĕ  $  parahaṇĕ paradārĕ ahiṃsiẏaĕ
text.7127: kāĩ phalu sacceṃ volliĕṇa  $  aliakkhareṇa āmelliĕṇa
text.7128: kāĩ phalu jiṇavara-añciẏaĕ  $  vara-viulĕ gharāsamĕ vañciẏaĕ
text.7129: kāĩ phalu māseṃ chaṇḍiĕṇa  $  rattiddiu deheṃ daṇḍiĕṇa
text.7132: kiṃ cārittĕ ṇāṇĕ vaĕ daṃsaṇĕ  $  aṇṇu pasaṃsiĕ jiṇavara-sāsaṇĕ
text.7133: jaṃ phalu hoi aṇaṅga-viẏārā  $  taṃ viṇṇāsĕvi kahahi bhaḍārā"
text.7137: puṇu puṇu vi paḍīvaü bhaṇaï valu  $  "kahĕ sukkiẏa-dukkiẏa-kamma-phalu
text.7138: kammeṇa keṇa riu-ḍamara-kara  $  saẏarāẏara mahi bhuñjanti ṇara
text.7139: kammeṇa keṇa para-cakka-dhara  $  raha-turaẏa-gaĕhĩ vujjhanti ṇara
text.7141: sundara sacchanda maïnda jiha  $  johĕhĩ joha vujjhanti kiha
text.7142: kammeṇa keṇa kiẏa paṅgulaẏa  $  ṇara kuṇṭa muṇṭa vahirandhalaẏa
text.7143: kāṇīṇa dīṇa-muha-kāẏa-sara  $  vāhilla bhilla ṇāhala savara
text.7144: dāliddiẏa para-pesaṇaĩ kara  $  keṃ kammeṃ uppajjanti ṇara
text.7146: dhīra-sarīra vīra tava-sūrā  $  savvahũ jīvahũ āsāūrā
text.7147: indiẏa-pasavaṇa para-uvaẏārā  $  te kahĩ ṇara pāvanti bhaḍārā
text.7151: ke vi aṇṇa ṇara duha-paricattā  $  devaloĕ devattaṇu pattā
text.7154: jaï devahũ jĕ majjhĕ saṃbhūā  $  to kiṃ kajjeṃ vāhaṇa hūā
text.7155: ĕhu jo dīsaï kulisa-ppaharaṇu  $  sahasaṇaẏaṇu aïrāvaẏa-vāhaṇu
text.7156: gijjaï kiṇṇara-mihuṇa-sahāsĕhĩ  $  suravara jaẏa bhaṇanti caüpāsĕhĩ
text.7158: cittaṅgo vi murava paḍipellaï  $  rambha tilottima saï uvvellaï
text.7160: appaṇu asura-surahũ abbhantarĕ  $  mokkhu jema thiu savvahũ upparĕ
text.7161: dīsaï jasu evaḍḍu pahuttaṇu  $  pattu phaleṇa keṇa indattaṇu"
text.7166: "suṇu akkhami" vuccaï teṇa valu  $  āẏaṇṇahi dhammahŏ taṇaü phalu
text.7167: mahu majju maṃsu jo pariharaï  $  chajjīva-ṇikāẏahŏ daẏa karaï
text.7168: puṇu pacchaï sallehaṇĕ maraï  $  so mokkha-mahā-purĕ païsaraï
text.7169: jo ghaĩ darisāvaï pāṇivaha  $  aṇṇu vi mahu-maṃsahŏ taṇiẏa kaha
text.7170: so joṇī-joṇi paribbhamaï  $  caürāsī lakkha jāma kamaï
text.7171: ĕu sukkiẏa-dukkiẏa-kamma-phalu  $  suṇu evahĩ saccahŏ taṇaü phalu
text.7172: tula-toliẏa mahi sa-mahīhariẏa  $  sa-surāsura sa-ghaṇa sa-sāẏariẏa
text.7174: varuṇu kuveru meru kaïlāsu vi  $  tula-toliu taïlokku asesu vi
text.7175: to vi ṇa garuvattaṇaü pagāsiu  $  saccu saüttaru savvahũ pāsiu
text.7179: jo saccaü ṇa cavaï kāpurisu  $  so jīvaï jaṇavaĕ tiṇa-sarisu
text.7180: jo ṇaru para-davvu ṇa ahilasaï  $  so uttima-sagga-loĕ vasaï
text.7181: jo ghaĩ rattiddiṇu mūḍha-maṇu  $  corantu ṇa thakkaï ekku khaṇu
text.7182: so hammaï chijjaï bhijjaï vi  $  kappijjaï sūlĕ bharijjaï vi
text.7183: jo duddharu vambhaceru dharaï  $  tahŏ jamu āruṭṭhaü kiṃ karaï
text.7184: jo ghaĩ taṃ joṇi cāru ramaï  $  so paṅkaĕ bhamaru jema maraï
text.7185: jo karaï ṇivitti pariggahahŏ  $  so mokkhahŏ jāi suhāvahahŏ
text.7186: jo ghaĩ aviaṇhu pariggahahŏ  $  so jāi purahŏ tamatamapahahŏ
text.7188: ahavaï ṇivvaṇṇijjaï kettiu  $  ekkekkahŏ vaẏahŏ phalu ettiu
text.7189: jo ghaĩ pañca vi dharaï vaẏāĩ  $  tāsu mokkhu pucchijjaï kāĩ
text.7193: phalu ettiu pañca-mahavvaẏahŏ  $  suṇu evahĩ pañcāṇuvvaẏahŏ
text.7194: jo karaï ṇirantara jīva-daẏā  $  paviralu asaccu saccaü mi saẏā
text.7195: kisa hiṃsa ahiṃsa saüttariẏa  $  te ṇaraẏa-mahāṇaï-uttariẏa
text.7198: phalu ettiu pañcāṇuvvaẏahũ  $  suṇu evahĩ tihi mi guṇavvaẏahũ
text.7199: disa-paccakkhāṇu pamāṇa-vaü  $  khala-saṃgahu jāsu ṇa vaḍḍhiẏaü
text.7201: iẏa tihĩ guṇavaehĩ guṇavantaü  $  acchaï saggĕ suhaĩ bhuñjantaü
text.7202: jāsu ṇa tihi mi majjhĕ ekku vi  $  guṇu tahŏ saṃsārahŏ cheu kahĩ puṇu
text.7206: phalu ettiu tihi mi guṇavvaẏahũ  $  suṇu evahĩ caü-sikkhāvaẏahũ
text.7207: jo pahilaü sikkhāvaü dharaï  $  jiṇavarĕ tikāla-vandaṇa karaï
text.7208: so ṇaru uppajjaï jahĩ jĕ jahĩ  $  vandijjaï loĕhĩ tahĩ jĕ tahĩ
text.7209: jo ghaĩ puṇu visaẏāsatta-maṇu  $  varisahŏ vi ṇa pecchaï jiṇa-bhavaṇu
text.7210: so sāvaü majjhĕ ṇa sāvaẏahũ  $  aṇuharaï ṇavara vaṇa-sāvaẏahũ
text.7211: jo vīẏaü sikkhāvaü dharaï  $  posaha-uvavāsa-saẏaĩ karaï
text.7212: so ṇaru devattaṇu ahilasaï  $  sohammĕ vahuva-majjhĕ ramaï
text.7213: jo taïẏaü sikkhāvaü dharaï  $  tavasihĩ āhāra-dāṇu karaï
text.7214: aṇṇu vi sammatta-bhāru vahaï  $  devattaṇu devaloĕ lahaï
text.7215: jo caüthaü sikkhāvaü dharaï  $  saṇṇāsu kareppiṇu puṇu maraï
text.7216: so hoi tiloẏahŏ vaḍḍhiẏaü  $  ṇaü jammaṇa-maraṇa-vioa-bhaü
text.7218: sāmāiu uvavāsu sa-bhoẏaṇu  $  pacchima-kālĕ aṇṇu sallehaṇu
text.7219: caü sikkhāvaẏāĩ jo pālaï  $  so indahŏ indattaṇu ṭālaï
text.7223: ĕu phalu sikkhāvaĕ saṃthaviĕ  $  suṇu evahĩ kahami aṇatthamiĕ
text.7224: vari khaddhu maṃsu vari majju mahu  $  vari aliu vaẏaṇu hiṃsāĕ sahũ
text.7225: vari jīviu gaü sarīru lhasiu  $  ṇaü raẏaṇihĩ bhoẏaṇu ahilasiu
text.7228: ṇisi-bhoẏaṇu jeṇa ṇa parihariu  $  bhaṇu teṇa kāĩ ṇa samāẏariu
text.7230: jo ghaĩ ṇisi-bhoẏaṇu ummahaï  $  vimalattaṇu vimala-gottu lahaï"
text.7232: suaü ṇa suṇaï ṇa diṭṭhaü dekkhaï  $  keṇa vi volliu kahŏ vi ṇa akkhaï
text.7233: bhoaṇĕ maüṇu caütthaü pālaï  $  so siva-sāsaẏa-gamaṇu ṇihālaï"
text.7237: paramesaru suṭṭhu ema kahaï  $  jo jaṃ maggaï so taṃ lahaï
text.7238: sammattaĩ ko vi ko vi vaẏaĩ  $  kŏ vi guṇa-gaṇa-vaẏaṇa-raẏaṇa-saẏaĩ
text.7240: gaẏa vandaṇahatti karevi sura  $  jāṇaïĕ dharijjaï dhamma-dhura
text.7241: rāhavĕṇa vi vaẏaĩ samicchiẏaĩ  $  guru-diṇṇaĩ sirĕṇa paḍicchiẏaĩ
text.7242: vaü ṇavara ṇa thakkaï lakkhaṇahŏ  $  vāluapaha-ṇaraẏa-ṇirikkhaṇahŏ
text.7243: tahĩ tiṇṇi vi kaï vi divasa thiẏaĩ  $  jiṇa-pujjaü jiṇa-ṇhavaṇaĩ kiẏaĩ
text.7247: jāṇaï-hari-halaharaĩ pahiṭṭhaĩ  $  tiṇṇi vi daṇḍāraṇṇu païṭṭhaĩ
text.7255: ahavaï kiṃ vahuṇā vitthāreṃ  $  ṇaṃ ṇaccaï gaẏa-paẏa-saṃcāreṃ
text.7260: tahŏ abbhantarĕ amara-maṇoharu  $  ṇaẏaṇa-kaḍakkhiu ekku laẏāharu
text.7261: tahĩ raï karĕvi thiẏaĩ sacchandaĩ  $  jogu laeviṇu jema muṇindaĩ
text.7265: tahĩ tehaĕ vaṇĕ riu-ḍamara-karu  $  paribhamaï samuddāvatta-dharu
text.7267: taṃ khīru vi ciriḍihillu mahiu  $  jāṇaïhĕ samappaï ghiẏa-sahiu
text.7268: sa vi pakkāvaï ghaṇa-haṇḍiẏahĩ  $  vaṇa-dhaṇṇandulĕhĩ sukaṇḍiĕhĩ
text.7270: iẏa viviha-bhakkha bhuñjantāhũ  $  vaṇa-vāsĕ tihi mi acchantāhũ
text.7271: muṇi gutta-sugutta tāva aïẏa  $  asudāṇiẏa doḍḍa-mahavvaïẏa
text.7272: kālāmuha-kāvāliẏa bhagava  $  muṇi saṃkara tavaṇa tavasi gurava
text.7274: vandāiriẏa bhoẏa pavvaïẏā  $  havi jiha bhūi-puñja-pacchaviẏā
text.7279: jaṃ païsanta padīsiẏa muṇivara  $  sāvaẏa jiha tiha paṇaviẏa taruvara
text.7280: ali-muhaliẏa khara-pavaṇāẏampiẏa  $  "thāhu thāhu" ṇaṃ ema pajampiẏa
text.7281: ke vi kusuma-pabbhāru muanti  $  pāẏa-pujja ṇaṃ vihi mi karanti
text.7282: to vi ṇa thakka mahavvaẏa-dhārā  $  rāmāsamĕ païsanti bhaḍārā
text.7283: risi pekkheppiṇu sīẏa viṇiggaẏa  $  ṇaṃ paccakkha mahā-vaṇadevaẏa
text.7284: "rāhava pekkhu pekkhu acchariẏaü  $  sāhu-jualu cariẏaĕ ṇīsariẏaü"
text.7285: valu vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa gañjolliu  $  "thāhu thāhu" siru ṇavĕvi pavolliu
text.7286: viṇaẏaṅkusĕṇa sāhu-gaẏa vāliẏa  $  kiu sammajjaṇu pāẏa pakhāliẏa
text.7287: diṇṇa ti-vāra dhāra salileṇa vi  $  kama cacciẏa gosīra-raseṇa vi
text.7290: vandiẏa guru guru-bhatti karevi  $  lagga parīsavi sīẏāevi
text.7291: muha-piẏa accha paccha maṇa-bhāviṇi  $  bhutta pejja kāmuĕhĩ va kāmiṇi
text.7295: diṇṇu pāṇu puṇu muhahŏ piẏāraü  $  cāraṇa-bhoggu jema haluvāraü
text.7296: siddhaü siddhu jema siddhīhaü  $  jiṇavara-āu jema aïdīhaü
text.7297: puṇu aggimaü diṇṇu hiẏaïcchiu  $  jiha su-kalattu su-ṇehu sa-icchaü
text.7298: suddhaĩ puṇu sālaṇaĩ vicittaĩ  $  tikkhaĩ ṇāĩ vilāsiṇi-cittaĩ
text.7299: diṇṇaĩ puṇu timmaṇaĩ maṇiṭṭhaĩ  $  ahiṇava-kaï-vaẏaṇā iva miṭṭhaĩ
text.7300: pacchaï sisiru sa-maccharu suddhaü  $  duṭṭha-kalattu jema aï-thaddhaü
text.7301: puṇu maẏa-salilu diṇṇu sīẏālaü  $  ṇaṃ jiṇa-vaẏaṇu pāva-pakkhālaü
text.7302: līlaĕ jimiẏa bhaḍārā jāvĕhĩ  $  pañcacchariu padarisiu tāvĕhĩ
text.7304: dunduhi gandhavāu raẏaṇāvali  $  sāhukkāru aṇṇu kusumañjali
text.7305: puṇṇa-pavittaĩ sāsaẏa-dūaĩ  $  pañca vi acchariẏaĩ sa ïṃ bhū aĩ
text.7307: gutta-suguttahã taṇĕṇa pahāveṃ rāmu sa-sīẏa parama-sabbhāveṃ
text.7308: devĕhĩ dāṇa-riddhi khaṇĕ darisiẏa vala-mandirĕ vasuhāra pavarisiẏa
text.7312: jāẏa mahaggha raẏaṇa su-pagāsaĩ  $  lakkhahã tiṇṇi saẏaĩ pañcāsaĩ
text.7313: varisĕvi raẏaṇa-varisu saĩ hattheṃ  $  rāmu pasaṃsiu suravara-sattheṃ
text.7314: "tihuvaṇĕ ṇavara ekku valu dhaṇṇaü  $  divvāhāru jeṇa vaṇĕ diṇṇaü"
text.7315: maṇĕ parituṭṭhaĩ amara-saẏāĩ  $  "aṇṇeṃ dāṇeṃ kijjaï kāĩ
text.7316: aṇṇeṃ dhariu bhuvaṇu saẏarāẏaru  $  aṇṇeṃ dhammu kammu purisāẏaru
text.7317: aṇṇeṃ riddhi-viddhi vaṃsubbhaü  $  aṇṇeṃ pemmu vilāsu sa-vibbhamu
text.7318: aṇṇeṃ geu veu siddhakkharu  $  aṇṇeṃ jāṇu jhāṇu paramakkharu
text.7319: aṇṇu muevi aṇṇu kiṃ dijjaï  $  jeṇa mahantu bhogu pāvijjaï
text.7322: savvahũ aṇṇa-dāṇu uccāsaṇu  $  para-sāsaṇahũ jema jiṇa-sāsaṇu"
text.7326: dāṇa-riddhi pekkhevi khagesaru  $  ṇavara jaḍāi jāu jāīsaru
text.7327: gaggara-vaẏaṇaü muṇi-aṇurāeṃ  $  pahaü ṇāĩ sirĕ moggara-ghāeṃ
text.7328: jiha jiha sumaraï ṇiẏaẏa-bhavantaru  $  tiha tiha mellei aṃsu ṇirantaru
text.7330: ema palāu karantu vihaṅgaü  $  guru-calaṇehĩ paḍiu mucchaṃgaü
text.7332: sīẏaĕ vuttu "puttu mahu evahĩ  $  chuḍu vaddhaü chuḍu dharaü sukhevĕhĩ"
text.7333: tāva raẏaṇa-ujjoveṃ bhiṇṇā  $  jāẏa pakkha cāmīẏara-vaṇṇā
text.7336: takkhaṇĕ pañca-vaṇṇu ṇivvaḍiẏaü  $  vīẏaü raẏaṇa-puñju ṇaṃ paḍiẏaü
text.7340: bhāveṃ vihi mi paẏāhiṇa dentaü  $  ṇaḍu jiha harisa-visāĕhĩ jantaü
text.7341: diṭṭhu pakkhi jaṃ ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇu  $  bhaṇaï ṇaveppiṇu dasaraha-ṇandaṇu
text.7343: kahi kajjeṇa keṇa sacchāẏaü  $  pakkhi suvaṇṇa-vaṇṇu jaṃ jāẏaü"
text.7344: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vuttu ṇīsaṅgeṃ  $  "saẏalu vi uttima-purisa-pasaṅgeṃ
text.7345: ṇaru haluvo vi hoi garuāraü  $  rukkhu vi sela-siharĕ vaḍḍāraü
text.7346: meru-ṇiẏamvĕ tiṇu vi hemujjalu  $  sippiuḍesu jalu vi muttāhalu
text.7347: tiha vihaṅgu maṇi-raẏaṇujjoeṃ  $  jāu suvaṇṇa-vaṇṇu muṇi-toeṃ"
text.7349: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu asagāheṃ  $  pucchiu puṇu vi ṇāhu ṇaraṇāheṃ
text.7355: paṭṭaṇu daṇḍāuru bhuñjantaü  $  daṇḍaü ṇāmu vaüddhahã bhattaü
text.7356: ekka-divasĕ pāraddhiĕ caliẏaü  $  tāva tikāla-jogi muṇi miliẏaü
text.7357: thiu attāvaṇĕ lamviẏa-vāhaü  $  avicalu meru jema duggāhaü
text.7358: taṃ pekkhĕvi āruṭṭhu mahavvalu  $  "avasu ajju avasavaṇu amaṅgalu"
text.7359: ema cavanteṃ visaharu ghāĕvi  $  roseṃ muṇivara kaṇṭheṃ lāĕvi
text.7360: gaü ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaru ṇarāhiu jāvĕhĩ  $  thiu ṇīsaṅgu ṇiroheṃ tāvĕhĩ
text.7361: "eu ko vi pheḍesaï jaïẏahũ  $  lamviẏa hatthuccāẏami taïẏahũ"
text.7363: jāvaṇṇekka-divasĕ pahu āvaï  $  taṃ jĕ bhaḍāraü tahĩ jĕ vihāvaï
text.7364: galaĕ bhuaṅgama-maḍaü ṇivaddhaü  $  kaṇṭhāharaṇu ṇāĩ āiddhaü
text.7368: jaṃ avicalu vi diṭṭhu muṇi-kesari  $  pheḍĕvi visahara-kaṇṭhā-mañjari
text.7370: khaṇiu sarīru jīu khaṇa-mettaü  $  jo jhāẏahi so gaẏaü atītaü
text.7371: tuhu mi khaṇiu ṇa 'jja vi siddhattaṇu  $  āẏahŏ kiṃ pamāṇu kiṃ lakkhaṇu"
text.7372: saẏalu ṇiratthu vuttu jaṃ rāeṃ  $  muṇivaru cavĕvi laggu ṇaẏavāeṃ
text.7373: "jaï puṇu so jjĕ pakkhu vollevaü  $  tā khaṇa-saddu ṇa uccārevaü
text.7374: khaṇiu khaẏāru ṇaẏāru vi hosaï  $  khaṇa-saddahŏ uccāru ṇa dīsaï
text.7376: aghaḍiu aghaḍamāṇu aghaḍantaü  $  khaṇieṃ khaṇiu khaṇantara-mettaü
text.7377: suṇṇeṃ suṇṇa-vaẏaṇu suṇṇāsaṇu  $  savvu ṇiratthu vaüddhahũ sāsaṇu"
text.7381: khaṇa-saddeṇa ṇiruttaru jāẏaü  $  puṇu vi pavolliu daṇḍaẏa-rāẏaü
text.7382: "to ghaĩ savvu atthi jaṃ dīsaï  $  puṇu tavacaraṇu kāsu kijjesaï"
text.7383: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu bhaṇaï muṇīsaru  $  jo kaï-gavaẏa vāi vāīsaru
text.7384: "amhaĩ rāẏa ṇa vollahũ evaṃ  $  ṇeāiĕhĩ hasijjahũ jevaṃ
text.7385: atthi ṇatthi doṇṇi vi paḍivajjahũ  $  tuhũ jiha ṇaü khaṇavāeṃ bhajjahũ"
text.7386: taṃ ṇisuṇevi bhaṇaï daṇudāraü  $  "jāṇiu parama-pakkhu tumhāraü
text.7387: atthi ṇa atthi ṇicca-saṃdeho  $  puṇu dhavalaü puṇu sāmala-deho
text.7388: puṇu vi matta-kari puṇu pañcāṇaṇu  $  khattiu vaïsu suddu puṇu vambhaṇu"
text.7390: bhaṇiu bhaḍāraü "kiṃ vitthāreṃ  $  ekku coru ciru dhariu talāreṃ
text.7391: gīvā-muha-ṇāsacchi gaviṭṭhaü  $  sīsu laentahũ kahi mi ṇa diṭṭhaü
text.7395: ahavaï eṇa kāĩ saṃdeheṃ  $  atthi vi ṇatthi vi ṇīsaṃdeheṃ
text.7396: jetthu atthi tahĩ atthi bhaṇevaü  $  jahĩ ṇa atthi tahĩ ṇatthi bhaṇevaü"
text.7397: sacchandeṇa ṇarāhiu bhāviu  $  laïu dhammu puṇu muṇi pārāviu
text.7398: sāhuhũ pañca-saẏaĩ dhariẏāĩ  $  ṇisuaĩ tesaṭṭhi vi cariẏāĩ
text.7399: to etthantarĕ jaṇa-maṇa-bhāviṇi  $  kuiẏa khaṇaddheṃ duṇṇaẏa-sāmiṇi
text.7400: puṇu maẏavaddhaṇu puttu mahantaü  $  "ṇaravaï jāu jiṇesara-bhattaü
text.7402: to vari mantu kiṃ pi mantijjaï  $  jiṇaharĕ savvu davvu puñjijjaï
text.7403: jeṇa gavesaṇa pahu kārāvaï  $  sāhuhũ pañca-saẏaĩ mārāvaï"
text.7407: ekka-divasĕ taṃ tema karāviu  $  jiṇaharĕ savvu davvu puñjāviu
text.7408: maẏavaddhaṇĕṇa ṇivahŏ vajjariẏaü  $  "tuha bhaṇḍāru muṇindĕhĩ hariẏaü"
text.7409: teṃ ālāveṃ daṇḍaẏarāeṃ  $  hasiẏaü puṇu puṇu sīha-ṇiṇāeṃ
text.7411: pattiẏa vivariẏa canda-divāẏara  $  pattiẏa paribhamanti raẏaṇāẏara
text.7412: pattiẏa ṇahĕ havanti kulapavvaẏa  $  pattiẏa ekkahĩ miliẏa disā-gaẏa
text.7413: pattiẏa ṇaü caüvīsa vi jiṇavara  $  pattiẏa ṇaü cakkavaï ṇa kulaẏara
text.7414: pattiẏa ṇaü tesaṭṭhi purāṇaïm  $  pañcendiẏaĩ ṇa pañca vi ṇāṇaïṃ
text.7415: solaha sagga bhaggaĩ uppattiẏa  $  muṇi coranti manti maṃ pattiẏa"
text.7417: jaṃ ṇaravaï volliu kaïvāreṃ  $  mantiu mantu puṇu vi parivāreṃ
text.7418: "lahu risi-rūu ekku darisāvahũ  $  puṇu mahaevi-pāsu vaïsārahũ
text.7422: avaseṃ roseṃ pura-paramesaru  $  muṇivara ghallesaï rajjesaru
text.7423: ema bhaṇevi puṇu vi kokkāviu  $  takkhaṇĕ muṇivara-vesu dharāviu
text.7424: teṇa samāṇaü jaṇa-maṇa-bhāviṇi  $  lagga viẏārĕhĩ duṇṇaẏa-sāmiṇi
text.7425: to etthantarĕ gañjoliẏa-taṇu  $  gaü ṇiẏa-ṇivahŏ pāsu maẏavaddhaṇu
text.7426: "ṇaravaï pekkhu pekkhu muṇi-kammaĩ  $  ḍhukku pamāṇahŏ volliu jaṃ maĩ
text.7427: mūḍha avuha ṇa vujjhahi ajja vi  $  hiu bhaṇḍāru jāva hiẏa bhajja vi"
text.7429: jāṇanto vi to vi maṇĕ mūḍhaü  $  ṇaravaï kova-gaïndārūḍhaü
text.7430: diṇṇāṇattī ṇaravara-vindahũ  $  dhariẏaĩ pañca vi saẏaĩ muṇindahũ
text.7441: teṃ tehā risi jantĕ chuhāviẏa  $  rasamasakasamasanta pīlāviẏa
text.7443: pañca vi saẏa pīlāviẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  muṇivara veṇṇi parāviẏa tāvĕhĩ
text.7448: keṇa vi tāma vuttu "maṃ païsahŏ  $  veṇṇi vi pāṇa laeppiṇu ṇāsahŏ
text.7449: guru tumhārā āvaï pāviẏa  $  rāeṃ jantĕ chuhĕvi pīlāviẏa"
text.7450: taṃ ṇisuṇevi ekku muṇi kuddhaü  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālĕ kiẏantu viruddhaü
text.7451: ghoru raüddu jhāṇu āūriu  $  vaü sammattu saẏalu saṃcūriu
text.7453: jo kovāṇalu teṇa vimukkaü  $  gaü ṇaẏarahŏ savaḍammuhu ḍhukkaü
text.7455: paṭṭaṇu cāuddisu saṃdīviu  $  sa-dharu sa-rāulu jālālīviu
text.7456: jaṃ jaṃ kumbha-sahāsĕhĩ ghippaï  $  vihi-pariṇāmeṃ jalu vi palippaï
text.7460: paṭṭaṇu daḍḍhu asesu vi jāvĕhĩ  $  khala jama-joha parāviẏa tāvĕhĩ
text.7461: je taïlokku vi jiṇĕvi samatthā  $  asi-ghaṇa-saṅkhala-ṇiẏala-vihatthā
text.7465: jama-dūehĩ tehĩ kandantaü  $  ṇaravaï ṇiu sa-manti sa-kalattaü
text.7467: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu kuiu paẏāvaï  $  "tīhi mi darisāvahŏ garuẏāvaï"
text.7469: pahu-āeseṃ duṇṇaẏa-sāmiṇi  $  ghattiẏa chaṭṭhihĩ puḍhavihĩ pāviṇi
text.7475: aṇṇoṇṇeṇa dalĕvi dalavaṭṭiu  $  aṇṇoṇṇeṇa haṇĕvi ṇivvaṭṭiu
text.7476: aṇṇoṇṇeṇa tisūleṃ bhiṇṇaü  $  aṇṇoṇṇeṇa disā-vali diṇṇaü
text.7477: aṇṇoṇṇeṇa kaḍāhĕ pamelliu  $  aṇṇoṇṇeṇa huāsaṇĕ pelliu
text.7478: aṇṇoṇṇĕṇa vaïtaraṇihĕ ghattiu  $  aṇṇoṇṇeṇa dharĕvi ṇijjantiu
text.7479: aṇṇoṇṇeṇa silahu apphāliu  $  aṇṇoṇṇeṇa duhāĕhĩ phāliu
text.7480: aṇṇoṇṇeṇa dharĕvi āvīliu  $  aṇṇoṇṇeṇa vatthu jiha pīliu
text.7481: aṇṇoṇṇeṇa gharaṭṭaĕ daliẏaü  $  aṇṇoṇṇeṇa paẏaru jiha miliẏaü
text.7482: aṇṇoṇṇeṇa vi kūvĕ pamukkaü  $  aṇṇoṇṇeṇa dhareppiṇu rukkaü
text.7484: aṇṇoṇṇeṇa paloiu rāgeṃ  $  aṇṇoṇṇeṇa viẏāriu khaggeṃ
text.7485: aṇṇoṇṇeṇa gilijjaï jetthu  $  duṇṇaẏa-sāmiṇi pattiẏa tetthu
text.7489: aṇṇu vi kiẏaü jeṇa mantittaṇu  $  ghattiu asipattavaṇĕ alakkhaṇu
text.7490: jahĩ taṃ tiṇu mi silīmuha-sarisaü  $  aṇṇu vi aggi-vaṇṇu ṇippharisaü
text.7491: jahĩ te loha-rukkha kaṇṭālā  $  asi-pattala asarāla visālā
text.7493: jahĩ ṇivaḍanti tāhã phala-pattaĩ  $  tahĩ chindanti ṇirantara gattaĩ
text.7494: taṃ tehaü vaṇu muĕvi paṇaṭṭhaü  $  puṇu vaïtaraṇihĕ gampi païṭṭhaü
text.7495: jahĩ taṃ salilu vahaï duggandhaü  $  rasa-vasa-soṇiẏa-maṃsa-samiddhaü
text.7496: uṇhaü khāru toru aï-virasaü  $  maṇḍa piẏāviu pūẏa-vimissaü
text.7498: iẏa saṃtāva-dukkha-saṃtattaü  $  khaṇĕ khaṇĕ uppajjantu marantaü
text.7499: thiu sattaṃaĕ ṇaraĕ maẏavaddhaṇu  $  meiṇi jāma meru gaẏaṇaṅgaṇu
text.7503: tāva viruddhaehĩ hakkāriu  $  ṇaravaï ṇāraehĩ paccāriu
text.7504: "maru maru saṃbharu duccariẏāĩ  $  jāĩ āsi paĩ saṃcariẏāĩ
text.7505: pañca-saẏaĩ muṇivarahũ haẏāĩ  $  laï aṇuhuñjahi tāĩ duhāĩ"
text.7506: ema bhaṇeppiṇu khaggĕhĩ chiṇṇaü  $  puṇu vāṇĕhĩ bhallehĩ bhiṇṇaü
text.7507: puṇu tilu tilu karavattĕhĩ kappiu  $  puṇu giddhahũ siva-sāṇahũ appiu
text.7508: puṇu pellāviu magga-gaïndĕhĩ  $  puṇu veḍhāviu paṇṇaẏa-vindĕhĩ
text.7509: puṇu khaṇḍiu puṇu jantĕ chuhāviu  $  addhu sahāsu vāra pīlāviu
text.7510: dukkhu dukkhu puṇu kaha vi kilesĕhĩ  $  paribhamantu bhava-joṇi-sahāsĕhĩ
text.7511: etthu vihaṅgu jāu ṇiẏa-kāṇaṇĕ  $  evahĩ acchaï tumha-gharaṅgaṇĕ"
text.7513: tāva pakkhi maṇĕ pacchuttāviu  $  "kiha maĩ savaṇa-saṅghu saṃtāviu
text.7514: ettiẏa-matteṃ abbhuddharaṇaü  $  mahu muẏahŏ vi jiṇavaru saraṇaü"
text.7518: jaṃ āẏaṇṇiu pakkhi-bhavantaru  $  jāṇaï-kanteṃ pabhaṇiu muṇivaru
text.7519: "to vari amhahũ vaẏaĩ caḍāvahu  $  pakkhihĕ suhaẏa-panthu darisāvahu"
text.7520: taṃ valaevahŏ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu  $  pañcāṇuvvaẏa uccāreppiṇu
text.7521: diṇṇa paḍicchiẏa tihi mi jaṇehĩ  $  puṇu ahiṇandiẏa ekka-maṇehĩ
text.7522: muṇivara gaẏa āẏāsahŏ jāvĕhĩ  $  lakkhaṇu bhavaṇu parāiu tāvĕhĩ
text.7523: "rāhava eu kāĩ acchariẏaü  $  jaṃ mandiru ṇiẏa-raẏaṇĕhĩ bhariẏaü"
text.7524: teṇa vi kahiu savvu jaṃ vittaü  $  "maĩ āhāra-dāṇa-phalu pattaü
text.7525: takkhaṇĕ pañcacchariu padarisiu  $  mehĕhĩ jiha aṇavaraü pavarisiu"
text.7527: rāmahŏ vaẏaṇu suṇevi aṇanteṃ  $  geṇhavi maṇi-raẏaṇaĩ valavanteṃ
text.7528: vaḍa-pāroha-samehĩ pacaṇḍĕhĩ  $  rahavaru ghaḍiu sa ẏaṃ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ
text.7536: dhurĕ lakkhaṇu rahavarĕ dāsarahi  $  sura-līlaĕ puṇu viharanti mahi
text.7537: taṃ kaṇhavaṇṇa-ṇaï muĕvi gaẏa  $  vaṇĕ kahi mi ṇihāliẏa matta gaẏa
text.7538: kattha vi pañcāṇaṇa giri-guhĕhĩ  $  muttāvali vikkhiranti ṇahĕhĩ
text.7539: kattha vi uḍḍāviẏa saüṇa-saẏa  $  ṇaṃ aḍavihĕ uḍḍĕvi pāṇa gaẏa
text.7540: kattha vi kalāva ṇaccanti vaṇĕ  $  ṇāvaï ṇaṭṭāvā juvaï-jaṇĕ
text.7541: kattha i hariṇaĩ bhaẏa-bhīẏāĩ  $  saṃsārahŏ jiha pavvaïẏāĩ
text.7542: kattha vi ṇāṇāviha-rukkha-rāi  $  ṇaṃ mahi-kulavahuahĕ roma-rāi
text.7549: koñcaṇaïhĕ tīrĕṇa saṃṭhiẏaĩ  $  laẏa-maṇḍavĕ gampi pariṭṭhiẏaĩ
text.7550: chuḍu jĕ chuḍu jĕ saraẏahŏ āgamaṇĕ  $  sacchāẏa mahāduma jāẏa vaṇĕ
text.7551: ṇava-ṇaliṇihĕ kamalaĩ vihasiẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ kāmiṇi-vaẏaṇaĩ pahasiẏaïṃ
text.7553: ahisiñcĕvi takkhaṇĕ vasuha-siri  $  ṇaṃ thaviẏa avāhiṇi kumbhaïri
text.7554: tahĩ tehaĕ saraĕ suhāvaṇaĕ  $  paribhamaï jaṇaddaṇu kāṇaṇaĕ
text.7556: vaṇĕ tāma suandhu vāu aïu  $  jo pāriẏāẏa-kusumabbhahiu
text.7558: kaḍḍhiu bhamaru jiha  $  teṃ vāeṃ suṭṭhu suandheṃ
text.7559: dhāiu mahumahaṇu  $  jiha gaü gaṇiẏārihĕ gandheṃ
text.7564: ṇaṃ saẏaṇa-vindu āvāsiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ maẏaülu vāheṃ tāsiẏaü
text.7567: lakkhaṇahŏ ṇāĩ abbhuddharaṇu  $  ṇaṃ samvukumārahŏ jamakaraṇu
text.7568: taṃ sūrahāsu ṇāmeṇa asi  $  jasu teeṃ ṇiẏa paha muaï sasi
text.7569: jasu dhārahŏ kāla-diṭṭhi vasaï  $  jasu kālu kiẏantu vi jamu tasaï
text.7570: teṃ hatthu pasārĕvi laïu kiha  $  para-ṇara-ṇippasaru kalattu jiha
text.7573: tāva samucchalĕvi  $  siru paḍiu sa-maüḍu sa-kuṇḍalu
text.7577: jaṃ diṭṭhu vivāiu sira-kamalu  $  sirivaccheṃ vihuṇiu bhuẏa-jualu
text.7578: "dhimmaĩ ṇikkāraṇu vahiu ṇaru  $  vattīsa vi lakkhaṇa-lakkha-dharu"
text.7579: puṇu jāma ṇihālaï vaṃsa-vaṇu  $  ṇara-ruṇḍu diṭṭhu phandanta-taṇu
text.7580: taṃ pekkhĕvi cintaï khaggadharu  $  "thiu māẏā-rūveṃ ko vi ṇaru"
text.7581: gaü ema bhaṇeppiṇu mahumahaṇu  $  ṇiviseṇa parāẏaü ṇiẏa-bhavaṇu
text.7582: rāhaveṇa vuttu "bho suhaḍa-sasi  $  kahĩ laddhu khaggu kahĩ gaẏaü asi
text.7583: teṇa vi taṃ saẏalu vi akkhiẏaü  $  vaṃsatthalu jiha vaṇĕ lakkhiẏaü
text.7584: jiha laddhu khaggu taṃ atula-valu  $  jiha khuḍiu kumārahŏ sira-kamalu
text.7587: asi sāvaṇṇu ṇavi  $  paĩ jamahŏ jīha uppāḍiẏa"
text.7591: jaṃ ehiẏa bhīsaṇa vatta suẏa  $  vevanti pajampiẏa jaṇaẏa-suẏa
text.7592: "laẏa-maṇḍavĕ viulĕ ṇiviṭṭhāhũ  $  suhu ṇāhi vaṇĕ vi païṭṭhāhũ
text.7593: paribhamaï jaṇaddaṇu jahĩ jĕ jahĩ  $  divĕdivĕ kaḍamaddaṇu tahĩ jĕ tahĩ
text.7595: haũ tāeṃ diṇṇī kehāhũ  $  kali-kāla-kiẏantahũ jehāhũ"
text.7596: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu bhaṇaï hari  $  "jaï rāju ṇa porisu hoi vari
text.7597: jima dāṇeṃ jĕma sukaïttaṇĕṇa  $  jima āuheṇa jima kittaṇĕṇa
text.7598: paribhamaï kitti savvahŏ ṇarahŏ  $  dhavalanti bhuvaṇu jiha jiṇavarahŏ
text.7600: āẏahũ ettiẏahũ  $  jasu ekku vi cittĕ ṇa bhāvaï
text.7601: so jāu jji muu  $  parimisu jaṃ jamu ṇevāvaï"
text.7605: etthantarĕ sura-saṃtāvaṇahŏ  $  lahu vahiṇi sahoẏara rāvaṇahŏ
text.7607: candaṇahi ṇāma rahasucchaliẏa  $  ṇiẏa-puttahŏ pāsu samuccaliẏa
text.7609: aṇṇahĩ tahĩ divasahĩ karĕ caḍaï  $  taṃ khaggu ajju ṇahĕ ṇivvaḍaï"
text.7619: sira-kamalu ṇieppiṇu gīḍha-bhaẏa  $  romantī mahiẏalĕ muccha-gaẏa
text.7620: kandanti ruvanti sa-veẏaṇiẏa  $  ṇijjīva jāẏa ṇicceẏaṇiẏa
text.7621: puṇu dukkhu dukkhu saṃvariẏa-maṇa  $  muha-kāẏara dara-maüliẏa-ṇaẏaṇa
text.7622: ṇaṃ mucchaĕ kiu sahiẏattaṇaü  $  jaṃ rakkhiu jīvu gavaṇa-maṇaü
text.7623: puṇu uṭṭhĕvi vihuṇaï bhuajualu  $  puṇu siru puṇu pahaṇaï vacchaẏalu
text.7624: puṇu kokkaï puṇu dhāhahĩ raḍaï  $  puṇu dīsaü ṇihālaï puṇu paḍaï
text.7625: puṇu uṭṭhaï puṇu kandaï kaṇaï  $  puṇuruttĕhĩ appaü āhaṇaï
text.7626: puṇu siru apphālaï dharaṇivahĕ  $  rovantihĕ sura rovanti ṇahĕ
text.7628: je caüdisĕhĩ thiẏa  $  ṇiẏa ḍāla pasārĕvi taruvara
text.7633: appāṇaü to vi ṇa saṃthavaï  $  rovanti puṇu vi puṇu uṭṭhavaï
text.7634: "hā putta viujjhahi luhahi muhu  $  hā viruaĕ ṇiddaĕ suttu tuhũ
text.7635: hā kiṇṇālāvahi putta maĩ  $  hā kiṃ darisāviẏa māẏa paĩ
text.7636: hā uvasaṃhārahi rūvu lahu  $  hā putta dehi piẏa-vaẏaṇu mahu
text.7637: hā putta kāĩ kiu ruhira-vaḍu  $  hā putta ehi ucchaṅgĕ caḍu
text.7638: hā putta lāi muhĕ muha-kamalu  $  hā putta ehi piu thaṇa-jualu
text.7639: hā putta dehi āliṅgaṇaü  $  jeṃ ṇaccami vaṇĕ vaddhāvaṇaü
text.7640: ṇava-māsu chuddhu jeṃ maĩ uarĕ  $  taṃ sahala maṇoraha ajju jaṇĕ
text.7642: hā hā daḍḍha vihi  $  kahĩ ṇiẏaü puttu kahŏ saṅghami
text.7643: kāĩ kiẏanta kiu  $  hā daïva kavaṇa disa laṅghami
text.7647: hā ajju amaṅgalu vihĩ purahã  $  pāẏālalaṅka-laṅkāurahã
text.7648: hā ajju dukkhu vandhava-jaṇahŏ  $  hā ajju paḍiẏa bhua rāvaṇahŏ
text.7649: hā ajju kharahŏ rovāvaṇaü  $  hā ajju riuhũ vaddhāvaṇaü
text.7650: hā ajju phuṭṭu ki ṇa jamahŏ siru  $  hā putta ṇivāriu maï mi ciru
text.7651: taṃ khaggu ṇa sāvaṇṇahŏ ṇarahŏ  $  para hoi addha-cakkesarahŏ
text.7652: kiṃ teṇa ji pāḍiu sira-kamalu  $  maṇi-kuṇḍala-maṇḍiẏa-gaṇḍaẏalu"
text.7653: puṇu puṇu darisāvaï sura ẏaṇahŏ  $  ravi-huavaha-varuṇa-pahañjaṇahŏ
text.7654: "ahŏ devahŏ vālu ṇa rakkhiẏaü  $  savvĕhĩ milevi upekkhiẏaü
text.7656: tumhahã dosu ṇavi  $  mahu dosu jāhĕ maṇu tāviu
text.7662: etthantarĕ soeṃ pariẏariẏa  $  ṇaḍi jiha tiha puṇu macchara-bhariẏa
text.7664: parivaddhiẏa ravi-maṇḍalĕ miliẏa  $  jama-jīha jema ṇahĕ kiligiliẏa
text.7665: "jeṃ ghāiu puttu mahu ttaṇaü  $  khara-ṇandaṇu rāvaṇa-bhāẏaṇaü
text.7666: tahŏ jīviu jaï ṇa ajju harami  $  to huẏavaha-puñjĕ paīsarami"
text.7667: iẏa païja kareppiṇu candaṇahi  $  kira valĕvi palovaï jāma mahi
text.7668: laẏa-maṇḍavĕ lakkhiẏa ve vi ṇara  $  ṇaṃ dharaṇihĕ ubbhiẏa ubhaẏa kara
text.7669: tahĩ ekku diṭṭhu karavāla-bhuu  $  "laï eṇa ji haü mahu taṇaü suu
text.7676: jaṃ diṭṭha vaṇantarĕ ve vi ṇara  $  gaü putta-viou kou ṇavara
text.7678: pulaïjjaï pāseijjaï vi  $  paritappaï jara-kheijjaï vi
text.7679: mucchijjaï ummucchijjaï vi  $  ruṇuruṇaï viẏārahĩ bhajjaï vi
text.7680: "vari eu rūu uvasaṃgharami  $  sura-sundaru kaṇṇa-vesu karami
text.7681: puṇu jāmi umvara-bhavaṇu  $  pariṇesaï avaseṃ ekku jaṇu"
text.7682: hiẏaïcchiu takkhaṇĕ rūu kiu  $  ṇaṃ kāmahŏ koḍu jĕ tiṃ vihiu
text.7683: gaẏa tahĩ jahĩ tiṇṇi vi jaṇaĩ vaṇĕ  $  puṇu dhāhahĩ ruaṇahĩ lagga khaṇĕ
text.7685: pabhaṇaï jaṇaẏa-suẏa  $  "vala pekkhu kaṇṇa kiha rovaï
text.7686: jaṃ kālantariu  $  taṃ dukkhu ṇāĩ ukkovaï"
text.7690: rovantī vaḍḍeṃ malaharĕṇa  $  hakkārĕvi pucchiẏa halaharĕṇa
text.7691: "kahi sundari rovahi kāĩ tuhũ  $  kiṃ paḍiu kiṃ pi ṇiẏa-saẏaṇa-duhu
text.7692: kiṃ keṇa vi kahĩ vi paribbhaviẏa"  $  taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi vāla caviẏa
text.7693: "haũ pāviṇi dīṇa daẏāvaṇiẏa  $  ṇivvandhava ruvami varāẏa ṇiẏa
text.7694: vaṇĕ bhullī ṇaü jāṇami disaü  $  ṇaü jāṇami kavaṇu desu visaü
text.7695: kahĩ gacchami cakkavūhĕ paḍiẏa  $  mahu puṇṇĕhĩ tumha samāvaḍiẏa
text.7696: jaï amhahũ uppari atthi maṇu  $  to pariṇaü viṇha vi ekku jaṇu"
text.7697: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi halāuhĕṇa  $  kiẏa ṇakkhacchoḍī rāhavĕṇa
text.7699: karaẏalu diṇṇu muhĕ  $  kiẏa vaṅka bhaũha siru cāliu
text.7700: "sundara ṇa hoi vahu"  $  somittihĕ vaẏaṇu ṇihāliu
text.7704: jo ṇaravaï aï-sammāṇa-karu  $  so pattiẏa attha-samattha-haru
text.7705: jo hoi uvāẏaṇĕ vacchalaü  $  so pattiẏa visaharu kevalaü
text.7706: jo mittu akāraṇĕ ei gharu  $  so pattiẏa duṭṭhu kalatta-haru
text.7707: jo panthiu aliẏa-saṇehiẏaü  $  so pattiẏa coru aṇehiẏaü
text.7708: jo ṇaru atthakkaĕ lalli-karu  $  so sattu ṇiruttaü jīva-haru
text.7709: jā kāmiṇi kavaḍa-cāḍu kuṇaï  $  sā pattiẏa sira-kamalu vi luṇaï
text.7710: jā kulavahu savahĕhĩ vavaharaï  $  sā pattiẏa viruẏa-saẏaĩ karaï
text.7711: jā kaṇṇa hovi para-ṇaru varaï  $  sā kiṃ vaḍḍhantī pariharaï
text.7713: āẏahũ aṭṭhahu mi  $  jo ṇaru mūḍhaü vīsambhaï
text.7714: loiu dhammu jiha  $  chuḍu vippaü paĕ paĕ labbhaï
text.7719: "mahu atthi bhajja sumaṇohariẏa  $  laï lakkhaṇa vahu lakkhaṇa-bhariẏa"
text.7720: jaṃ eva samāsaĕ akkhiẏaü  $  kaṇheṇa vi maṇĕ uvalakkhiẏaü
text.7721: "haũ lemi kumāri sa-lakkhaṇiẏa  $  jā āgamĕ sāmuddaĕ bhaṇiẏa
text.7724: jā uṇṇaẏa ṇāsĕ ṇilāḍĕ tiẏa  $  sā hoi ti-puttahũ māẏariẏa
text.7728: jahĕ vāmaĕ karaẏalĕ honti saẏa  $  mīṇāravinda-visa-dāma-dhaẏa
text.7729: gouru gharu girivaru ahava sila  $  su-pasattha sa-lakkhaṇa sā mahila
text.7738: vahu rāhava eha alakkhaṇiẏa  $  haũ bhaṇami ṇa lakkhaṇeṇa bhaṇiẏa
text.7741: savvaṅga-samuṭṭhiẏa-roma-raï  $  tahĕ puttu vi bhattāru vi maraï
text.7742: kaḍi-lañchaṇa bhaũhāvali-miliẏa  $  sā deva ṇiruttaü jhenduliẏa
text.7744: virasaüha-diṭṭhi virasaüha-sara  $  sā dukkhahũ bhāẏaṇa hoi para
text.7745: ṇāsaggeṃ thoreṃ mantharĕṇa  $  sā lañjiẏa kiṃ vahu-vitthareṇa
text.7747: kaḍu-aṅgiẏa matta-gaïnda-chavi  $  haũ ehiẏa pariṇami kaṇṇa ṇavi"
text.7750: jaï haũ ṇisiẏariẏa  $  to paï mi ajju sa ïṃ bhu ñjami"
text.7752: candaṇahi alajjiẏa ema pagajjiẏa "maru maru bhūẏahũ demi vali"
text.7753: ṇiẏa-rūveṃ vaḍḍhiẏa raṇa-rasĕ aḍḍhiẏa rāvaṇa-rāmahũ ṇāĩ kali
text.7757: puṇu puṇu vi pavaḍḍhiẏa kilikilanti  $  jālāvali-jālā-saẏa muanti
text.7758: bhaẏa-bhīsaṇa kovāṇala-saṇāha  $  ṇaṃ dharaĕ samubbhiẏa pavara vāha
text.7761: sasi-loṇiẏa-piṇḍaü levi dhāi  $  gaha-ḍimbhahŏ pīhaü dei ṇāĩ
text.7762: ahavaï kiṃ vahuṇā vitthareṇa  $  ṇaṃ ṇahaẏala-sila geṇhaï sireṇa
text.7764: valaeveṃ vuccaï "vaccha vaccha  $  tuhũ vahuẏahĕ cariẏaĩ peccha peccha"
text.7766: candaṇahi pajampiẏa  $  tiṇu vi ṇa kampiẏa  $  "laïu khaggu haü puttu jiha
text.7767: tiṇṇi vi khajjantaĩ  $  mārijjantaĩ  $  rakkhejjahŏ appāṇu tiha"
text.7771: vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa asuhāvaṇeṇa  $  karavālu padarisiu mahumaheṇa
text.7773: taṃ maṇḍalaggu tharaharaï kema  $  bhattāra-bhaeṃ sukalattu jema
text.7775: jo dhārahĩ mottiẏa-ṇiẏaru laggu  $  pāseva-phuliṅgu vahu va valaggu
text.7776: taṃ tehaü khaggu laevi teṇa  $  vijjāhari pabhaṇiẏa lakkhaṇeṇa
text.7777: "jeṃ laïu sīsu tuha ṇandaṇāsu  $  karavālu eu taṃ sūrahāsu
text.7778: jaï atthi ko vi raṇa-bhara-samatthu  $  tahŏ savvahŏ ubbhiu dhamma-hatthu"
text.7779: khara-gharaṇiĕ vuttu "ṇa hoi kajju  $  ko vāraï māraï maï mi ajju"
text.7781: sā eva bhaṇeppiṇu  $  galagajjeppiṇu  $  calaṇĕhĩ apphālevi mahi
text.7786: rovanti padhāiẏa dīṇa-vaẏaṇa  $  jalahara jiha jiha varisanti ṇaẏaṇa
text.7787: lamvanti lamva-kaḍiẏala-samagga  $  ṇaṃ candaṇa-laẏahĕ bhuaṅga lagga
text.7791: ṇaṃ ṇisiẏara-loẏahŏ dukkha-khāṇi  $  ṇaṃ mandoẏarihĕ supurisa-hāṇi
text.7792: ṇaṃ laṅkahĕ païsāranti saṅka  $  ṇiviseṇa patta pāẏālalaṅka
text.7793: ṇiẏa-mandirĕ dhāhāvanti ṇāri  $  ṇaṃ kharadūsaṇahŏ païṭṭha māri
text.7795: kūvāru suṇeppiṇu  $  dhaṇa pekkheppiṇu  $  rāeṃ valĕvi paloiẏaü
text.7796: tihuẏaṇu saṃghārĕvi  $  palaü samārĕvi  $  ṇāĩ kiẏanteṃ joiẏaü
text.7800: kūvāru suṇĕvi kula-bhūsaṇeṇa  $  candaṇahi papucchiẏa dūsaṇeṇa
text.7801: "kahĕ keṇuppāḍiu jamahŏ ṇaẏaṇu  $  kahĕ keṇa pajoiu kāla-vaẏaṇu
text.7802: kahi keṇa kiẏantahŏ kiẏaü maraṇu  $  kahi keṇa kiẏaü visa-kanda-caraṇu
text.7803: kahi keṇa vaddhu pavaṇeṇa pavaṇu  $  kahi keṇa daḍḍhu jalaṇeṇa jalaṇu
text.7804: kahi keṇa bhiṇṇu vajjeṇa vajju  $  kahi keṇa dhariu jalu jalĕṇa ajju
text.7805: kahi keṇa bhāṇu uṇheṇa taviu  $  kahi keṇa samuddu tisāĕ khaviu
text.7806: kahi keṇa khuḍiu phaṇi-maṇi-ṇihāu  $  kahĕ keṇa sahiu sura-kulisa-ghāu
text.7807: kahĕ keṇa huāsaṇĕ jhampa diṇṇa  $  kahĕ keṇa dasāṇaṇa-pāẏa chiṇṇa"
text.7809: candaṇahi pavolliẏa  $  aṃsujalolliẏa  $  "jaṇa-vallahu mahu taṇaü suu
text.7810: olaggaï pāṇĕhĩ  $  viṇaẏa-samāṇĕhĩ  $  ṇaravaï samvukumāru muu"
text.7816: kharu ruẏaï sa-dukkhaü "atula-piṇḍu  $  hā ajju paḍiu mahu vāhu-daṇḍu
text.7817: hā ajju jāẏa maṇĕ garua saṅka  $  hā ajju suṇṇa pāẏālalaṅka
text.7818: hā ṇandaṇa sura-pañcāṇaṇāsu  $  kavaṇuttaru demi dasāṇaṇāsu"
text.7819: etthantarĕ tāma timuṇḍa-dhāri  $  vahu-vuddhi pajampiu vambhaẏāri
text.7820: "he ṇaravaï mūḍhā ruahi kāĩ  $  saṃsārĕ bhamantahũ sua-saẏāĩ
text.7821: āẏāĩ muāĩ gaẏāĩ jāĩ  $  ko sakkaï rāẏa gaṇevi tāĩ
text.7823: kahŏ gharu kahŏ pariẏaṇu  $  kahŏ sampaẏa-dhaṇu  $  māẏa vappu kahŏ puttu tiẏa
text.7824: keṃ kajjeṃ rovahi  $  appaü soẏahi  $  bhava-saṃsārahŏ eha kiẏa"
text.7828: jaṃ dukkhu dukkhu saṃthaviu rāu  $  paḍivolliu ṇiẏa-ghariṇiĕ sahāu
text.7829: "kahĕ keṇa vahiu mahu taṇaü puttu"  $  taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi dhaṇiaĕ vuttu
text.7832: ve maṇusa diṭṭha soṇḍīra vīra  $  mehāravinda-saṇṇiha-sarīra
text.7834: tahĩ ekku diṭṭhu tiẏasahũ asajjhu  $  teṃ laïu khaggu haü puttu majjhu
text.7835: aṇṇu vi avalovahi deva deva  $  kakkhoru viẏāriu pekkhu keva
text.7837: vaṇĕ dharĕvi ruẏantī  $  dhāha muantī  $  kaha vi ṇa bhutta teṇa ṇarĕṇa
text.7838: ṇiẏa-puṇṇĕhĩ cukkī  $  ṇaha-muha-lukkī  $  ṇaliṇi jema sarĕ kuñjarĕṇa"
text.7842: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi vahu-jāṇaehĩ  $  uvalakkhiẏa aṇṇĕhĩ rāṇaehĩ
text.7844: mañchuḍu ṇa samicchiẏa supuriseṇa  $  appaü viddhaṃsĕvi  āẏa teṇa"
text.7845: etthantarĕ ṇivaï ṇiei jāva  $  ṇaha-ṇiẏara-viẏāriẏa diṭṭha tāva
text.7846: kiṃsuẏa-laẏa vva āratta-vaṇṇa  $  rattuppala-māla va bhamara-chaṇṇa
text.7847: tahĩ aharu diṭṭhu dasaṇagga-bhiṇṇu  $  ṇaṃ vāla-tavaṇu phagguṇĕ uiṇṇu
text.7848: taṃ ṇaẏaṇa-kaḍakkhĕvi kharu viruddhu  $  ṇaṃ  kesari maẏagala-gandha-luddhu
text.7849: bhaḍu bhiuḍi-bhaẏaṅkaru muha-karālu  $  ṇaṃ jagahŏ samuṭṭhiu palaẏa-kālu
text.7851: amara vi ākampiẏa  $  ema pajampiẏa  $  "kahŏ uppari āruṭṭhu kharu"
text.7852: rahu khañciu aruṇeṃ  $  sahũ sasi-varuṇeṃ  $  "maĩ vi gilesaï ṇavara ṇaru"
text.7856: uṭṭhanteṃ uṭṭhiu bhaḍa-ṇihāu  $  aṭṭhāṇa-khohu ṇiviseṇa jāu
text.7857: cūranta paropparu suhaḍa ḍhukka  $  ṇaṃ jalaṇihi ṇiẏa-majjāẏa-cukka
text.7858: sīseṇa sīsu paṭṭeṇa paṭṭu  $  calaṇeṇa calaṇu karu kara-ṇihaṭṭhu
text.7859: maüḍeṇa maüḍu tuṭṭevi laggu  $  mehalu mehala-ṇivaheṇa bhaggu
text.7860: uṭṭhanti ke vi tiṇa-samu gaṇanti  $  ohāvaṇa-māṇeṃ ṇa vi ṇamanti
text.7861: aha ṇamaï ko vi kivaṇattaṇeṇa  $  paḍio vi ṇa uṭṭhaï bhaḍu bhareṇa
text.7862: dūsaṇeṇa ṇivāriẏa vaddha-koha  $  vihaḍapphaḍa saṇṇajjhanti joha
text.7863: "jaï paü vi dehu ārūsamāṇa  $  to hosaï rāẏahŏ taṇiẏa āṇa
text.7865: maṃ kajju viṇāsahŏ  $  tāma vaīsahŏ  $  jo asi-raẏaṇu maṇḍa haraï
text.7866: siru khuḍaï kumārahŏ  $  vijjā-pārahŏ  $  so kiṃ tumhahĩ osaraï
text.7870: to vari kijjaü mahu taṇiẏa vuddhi  $  ṇaravaï asahāẏahŏ ṇatthi siddhi
text.7871: ṇāva vi ṇa vahaï viṇu tāraeṇa  $  jalaṇu vi ṇa jalaï viṇu mārueṇa
text.7872: ekkallaü gampiṇu kāĩ karahi  $  raẏaṇāẏarĕ santĕ tisāĕ marahi
text.7873: sante vi mahaggaĕ visahĕ caḍahi  $  jiṇĕ accie vi saṃsārĕ paḍahi
text.7880: gaü samvu suhaggaï  $  paĩ olaggaï  $  gampi kahijjaï rāvaṇahŏ
text.7884: āẏaṇṇĕvi taṃ dūsaṇahŏ vaẏaṇu  $  kharu kharaü pavolliu guñja-ṇaẏaṇu
text.7885: "dhiddhĩ lajjijjaï supurisāhũ  $  para eẏaĩ kammaĩ kupurisāhũ
text.7886: sāhīṇu jīu dehatthu jāva  $  kiha gammaï aṇṇahŏ pāsu tāva
text.7887: jāeṃ jīveṃ marievaüṃ jĕ  $  to vari pahariu vara-vaïri-puñjĕ
text.7888: jeṃ labbhaï sāhukkāru loĕ  $  ajarāmaru ko vi ṇa macca-loĕ
text.7889: jima bhiḍiu ajju ari-vara-samuddĕ  $  jima jaṇiẏa maṇoraha saẏaṇa-vindĕ
text.7890: jima asi-savvala-kontehĩ bhiṇṇu  $  jima jasa-paḍahaü taïlokkĕ diṇṇu
text.7891: jima ṇahĕ tosāviu sura-ṇihāu  $  jima mahu mi ajju khaẏa-kālu āu
text.7893: jima sattu-silāẏalĕ  $  vahu-soṇiẏa-jalĕ  $  dhuu parihava-paḍu appaṇaü
text.7894: jima sa-dhaü sa-sāhaṇu  $  sa-bhaḍu sa-paharaṇu  $  gaü ṇiẏa-puttahŏ pāhuṇaü"
text.7898: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇiẏa-kula-bhūsaṇeṇa  $  lahu lehu visajjiu dūsaṇeṇa
text.7899: saṇṇaddhu kharu vi vahu-samara-sūru  $  apphālĕvi valĕ saṃgāma-tūru
text.7900: vihaḍapphaḍa bhaḍa saṇṇaddha ke vi  $  sammāṇa-dāṇu riṇu saṃbharevi
text.7901: keṇa vi kareṇa karavālu gahiu  $  keṇa vi dhaṇuharu toṇīra-sahiu
text.7902: keṇa vi musaṇḍhi moggaru pacaṇḍu  $  keṇa vi huli keṇa vi cittadaṇḍu
text.7904: ṇīsariu seṇṇu pariharĕvi saṅku  $  ṇaṃ vamĕvi lagga pāẏāla-laṅka
text.7908: gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ līẏaü  $  ṇāvaï vīẏaü  $  joisa-cakku parāiẏaü
text.7912: jaṃ diṭṭhu ṇahaṅgaṇĕ daṇu-ṇihāu  $  valaeveṃ vuttu sumitti-jāu
text.7913: "ĕu dīsaï kāĩ ṇahagga-maggĕ  $  kiṃ kiṇṇara-ṇivahu va caliu saggĕ
text.7914: kiṃ pavara pakkhi kiṃ ghaṇa visaṭṭa  $  kiṃ vandaṇa-hattiĕ sura paẏaṭṭa"
text.7915: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu bhaṇaï viṇhu  $  "vala dīsaï vaïrihĩ taṇaü ciṇhu
text.7916: khaggeṇa vivāiu sīsu jāsu  $  kuḍhĕ laggaü mañchuḍu ko vi tāsu"
text.7917: avaropparu e ālāva jāva  $  hakkāriu lakkhaṇu kharĕṇa tāva
text.7918: "jiha samvukumārahŏ laïẏa pāṇa  $  tiha pāva paḍicchahi enta vāṇa
text.7919: jiha laïu khaggu para-ṇāri bhutta  $  tiha paharu paharu puṇṇāli-putta"
text.7921: ekkekka-pahāṇahũ  $  kharĕṇa samāṇahũ  $  caüdaha sahasa samāvaḍiẏa
text.7922: gaẏa jema maïndahŏ  $  riu govindahŏ  $  hakkāreppiṇu abbhiḍiẏa
text.7927: "tuhũ sīẏa paẏatteṃ rakkhu deva  $  haũ dharami seṇṇu miga-jūhu jema
text.7928: javvela karesami sīha-ṇāu  $  tavvela ejja dhaṇuhara-sahāu
text.7929: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi vihasiẏa-muheṇa  $  āsīsa diṇṇa sīrāuheṇa
text.7930: "jasavantu cirāusu hohi vaccha  $  karĕ laggaü jaẏa-siri-vahua saccha"
text.7931: taṃ levi ṇimittu jaṇaddaṇeṇa  $  vaïdehi ṇamiẏa riu-maddaṇeṇa
text.7932: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi sīẏaĕ vuttu ema  $  "pañcindiẏa bhagga jiṇeṇa jema
text.7933: vāvīsa parīsaha caü kasāẏa  $  jara-jamma-maraṇa maṇa-kāẏa-vāẏa
text.7935: jiha bhaggu parammuhu  $  raṇĕ kusumāuhu  $  lohu mohu maü māṇu khalu
text.7936: tiha tuhũ bhañjejjahi  $  samarĕ jiṇejjahi  $  saẏalu vi vaïrihĩ taṇaü valu"
text.7940: āsīsa-vaẏaṇu taṃ levi teṇa  $  apphāliu dhaṇuharu mahumaheṇa
text.7941: teṃ saddeṃ vahiriu jagu asesu  $  tharahariẏa vasundharī ḍariu sesu
text.7942: kharalakkhaṇa ve vi bhiḍanti jāva  $  hakkāriu hari tisireṇa tāva
text.7943: te bhiḍiẏa paroppara haṇu bhaṇanta  $  ṇaṃ matta mahāgaẏa gulugulanta
text.7944: ṇaṃ kesari ghororāli denta  $  vāṇehĩ vāṇa chindanti enta
text.7945: moggara-khuruppa-kaṇṇiẏa paḍanti  $  jīvehĩ jīva ṇaṃ khaẏahŏ janti
text.7947: tahŏ tisiraü cukku ṇa kaha vi bhiṇṇu  $  dhaṇuharu pāḍiu dhaẏa-daṇḍu chiṇṇu
text.7949: aṇṇuṇṇa puṇuppuṇu  $  samarĕ vahugguṇu  $  jaṃ jaṃ tisiraü levi dhaṇu
text.7950: taṃ taṃ ukkaṇṭhaï  $  khaṇu vi ṇa saṃthaï  $  daïva-vihūṇahŏ jema dhaṇu
text.7954: dhaṇuharu saru sārahi chatta-daṇḍu  $  jaṃ vāṇahĩ kiu saẏa-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍu
text.7955: taṃ amarisa-kuddheṃ duddhareṇa  $  saṃbhariẏa vijja vijjāhareṇa
text.7956: appāṇu padarisiu vaddhamāṇu  $  tihĩ vaẏaṇĕhĩ tihĩ sīsĕhĩ samāṇu
text.7958: vīẏaü siru vaẏaṇu vi ṇava-juvāṇu  $  ubbhiṇṇa-viẏaḍa-māsuri-samāṇu
text.7959: taïẏaü siru dhavalaü dhavala-vaẏaṇu  $  phuriāharu dara-ṇiḍḍariẏa-ṇaẏaṇu
text.7963: ṇārāĕhĩ bhindĕvi  $  sīsaĩ chindĕvi  $  riu mahi-maṇḍalĕ pāḍiẏaü
text.7964: suravarĕhĩ pacaṇḍĕhĩ  $  sa iṃ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ  $  kusuma-vāsu sirĕ pāḍiẏaü
text.7971: lehu visajjiu jo sura-sīhahŏ  $  aggaĕ paḍiu gampi dasagīvahŏ
text.7972: paḍiu ṇāĩ vahu-dukkhahã bhāru  $  ṇāĩ ṇisāẏara-kula-saṃghāru
text.7973: ṇāĩ bhaẏaṅkaru kalahahŏ mūlu  $  ṇāĩ dasāṇaṇa-matthā-sūlu
text.7974: leheṃ kahiu savvu ahiṇāṇĕhĩ  $  "samvukumāru ulaggaï pāṇĕhĩ
text.7975: aṇṇu vi khagga-raẏaṇu uddāliu  $  khara-ghariṇihĕ hiẏavaü viddāriu
text.7976: taṃ ṇisuṇevi ve vi jasabhūsaṇa  $  para-valĕ bhiḍiẏa gampi khara-dūsaṇa
text.7977: ṇāri-raẏaṇu ṇiruvamu sohaggaü  $  acchaï rāvaṇa tujjhu jĕ joggaü"
text.7978: lehu ṇiĕvi atthāṇu visajjĕvi  $  pupphavimāṇĕ caḍiu galagajjĕvi
text.7979: karĕ karavālu kareppiṇu dhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ daṇḍāraṇṇu parāiu
text.7982: thiu caüraṅgu valu  $  ṇahĕ ṇiccalu saṃsaĕ chuddhaü
text.7986: to etthantarĕ dīhara-ṇaẏaṇeṃ  $  lakkhaṇu pomāiu dahavaẏaṇeṃ
text.7987: "vari ekkallao vi pañcāṇaṇu  $  ṇaü sāraṅga-ṇivahu vuṇṇāṇaṇu
text.7988: vari ekkallao vi maẏalañchaṇu  $  ṇa ẏa ṇakkhatta-ṇivahu ṇillañchaṇu
text.7989: vari ekkallao vi raẏaṇāẏaru  $  ṇaü jalavāhiṇi-ṇiẏaru sa-vittharu
text.7990: vari ekkallao vi vaïsāṇaru  $  ṇaü vaṇa-ṇivahu sa-rukkhu sa-girivaru
text.7991: caüdaha sahasa ekku jo rumbhaï  $  so samaraṅgaṇĕ maï mi ṇisumbhaï
text.7992: pekkhu kema paharantu paīsaï  $  dhaṇudharu saru saṃdhāṇu ṇa dīsaï
text.7994: ṇahi gaẏa ṇahi turaẏa  $  ṇahi rahavara ṇahi dhaẏa-daṇḍaĩ
text.7999: hari paharantu pasaṃsiu jāvĕhĩ  $  jāṇaï ṇaẏaṇakaḍakkhiẏa tāvĕhĩ
text.8000: sukaï-kaha vva su-sandhi su-sandhiẏa  $  su-paẏa su-vaẏaṇa su-sadda su-vaddhiẏa
text.8001: thira-kalahaṃsa-gamaṇa gaï-manthara  $  kisa majjhārĕ ṇiẏamvĕ su-vitthara
text.8004: rehaï vaẏaṇa-kamalu akalaṅkaü  $  ṇaṃ māṇasa-sarĕ viẏasiu paṅkaü
text.8006: gholaï puṭṭhihĩ veṇi mahāiṇi  $  candaṇa-laẏahĩ lalaï ṇaṃ ṇāiṇi
text.8008: kiṃ vahu-jampiĕṇa  $  tihĩ bhuvaṇĕhĩ jaṃ jaṃ caṅgaü
text.8009: taṃ taṃ melavĕvi  $  ṇaṃ daïveṃ ṇimmiu aṅgaü
text.8013: to etthantarĕ ṇiẏa-kula-dīveṃ  $  rāmu pasaṃsiu puṇu dahagīveṃ
text.8014: "jīviu ekku sahalu para eẏahŏ  $  jasu suhavattaṇu gaü paricheẏahŏ
text.8015: jeṇa samāṇu eha dhaṇa jampaï  $  muha-muheṇa tamvolu samappaï
text.8016: hattheṃ hattha dharĕvi ālāvaï  $  calaṇa-jualu ucchaṅgĕ caḍāvaï
text.8018: jaṃ pellāvaï thaṇa-māẏaṅgĕhĩ  $  muhu paricumvaï ṇāṇā-bhaṅgĕhĩ
text.8020: jaṃ aṇuhuñjaï icchĕvi ṇiẏa-maṇĕ  $  tāsu mallu ko saẏalĕ vi tihuaṇĕ
text.8022: dhaṇṇaü ehu ṇaru  $  jasu eha ṇāri hiẏaïcchiẏa
text.8023: jāva ṇa laïẏa maĩ  $  kaü aṅgahŏ tāva suhacchiẏa"
text.8027: sīẏa ṇievi jāu ummāhaü  $  dahamuhu vammaha-sara-paharāhaü
text.8028: pahilaĕ vaẏaṇu viẏārĕhĩ bhajjaï  $  pemma-paravvasu kahŏ vi ṇa lajjaï
text.8029: vīẏaĕ muha-pāseu valaggaï  $  sarahasu gāḍhāliṅgaṇu maggaï
text.8030: taïẏaĕ aï virahāṇalu tappaï  $  kāma-gahillaü puṇu puṇu jampaï
text.8031: caüthaĕ ṇīsasantu ṇaü thakkaï  $  siru saṃcālaï bhaũhaü vaṅkaï
text.8032: pañcamĕ pañcama-jhuṇi ālāvaï  $  vihasĕvi danta-panti darisāvaï
text.8033: chaṭṭhaĕ aṅgu valaï karu moḍaï  $  puṇu dāḍhiẏaü laeppiṇu toḍaï
text.8034: vaṭṭaï tallavella sattamaẏahŏ  $  mucchaü enti janti aṭṭhamaẏahŏ
text.8035: ṇavamaü vaṭṭaï maraṇahŏ ḍhukkaü  $  dasamaĕ pāṇahĩ kaha vi ṇa mukkaü
text.8042: to etthantarĕ sura-saṃtāseṃ  $  cintiu ekku uvāu dasāseṃ
text.8043: avaloẏaṇiẏa vijja maṇĕ jhāiẏa  $  "de āesu" bhaṇanti parāiẏa
text.8044: "kiṃ ghoṭṭeṇa mahovahi ghoṭṭami  $  kiṃ pāẏālu ṇahaṅgaṇĕ loṭṭami
text.8045: kiṃ sahũ surĕhĩ surendu parajjami  $  kiṃ maẏaraddhaẏa-puri-gaü bhañjami
text.8046: kiṃ jama-mahisa-siṅgu musumūrami  $  kiṃ sesahŏ phaṇimaṇi saṃcūrami
text.8047: kiṃ takkhaẏahŏ dāḍha uppāḍami  $  kāla-kiẏanta-vaẏaṇu kiṃ phāḍami
text.8048: kiṃ ravi-raha-turaṅga uddālami  $  kiṃ giri meru karaggeṃ ṭālami
text.8049: kiṃ taïlokka-cakku saṃghārami  $  kiṃ atthakkaĕ palaü samārami"
text.8051: vuttu dasāṇaṇĕṇa  $  "ekkeṇa vi ṇa vi mahu kajju
text.8052: taṃ saṅkeu kahĕ  $  jeṃ harami eha tiẏa ajju"
text.8056: dahavaẏaṇahŏ vaẏaṇeṇa su-pujjaĕ  $  pabhaṇiu puṇu avaloẏaṇi-vijjaĕ
text.8058: jāvaggeu vāṇu karĕ ekkahŏ  $  vāẏavu vāruṇatthu aṇṇekkahŏ
text.8059: jāma sīru gambhīru karekkahŏ  $  karaẏalĕ cakkāuhu aṇṇekkahŏ
text.8060: tāva ṇāri ko haraï disevahũ  $  maṇḍaĕ vāsueva-valaevahũ
text.8061: iẏa pacchaṇṇa vasanti vaṇantarĕ  $  tesaṭṭhī-purisahũ abbhantarĕ
text.8062: jiṇa caüvīsa addha govaddhaṇa  $  ṇava kesava rāma ṇava rāvaṇa
text.8065: jāva ṇa vahiẏa raṇĕ  $  tiẏa tāma laïjjaï keva
text.8069: ahavaï eṇa kāĩ suṇĕ rāvaṇa  $  eha ṇāri tihuaṇa-saṃtāvaṇa
text.8070: laï laï jaï ajarāmaru vaṭṭahi  $  laï laï jaï uppahĕṇa paẏaṭṭahi
text.8071: laï laï jaï vaḍḍattaṇu khaṇḍahi  $  laï laï jaï jiṇa-sāsaṇu chaṇḍahi
text.8072: laï laï jaï suravarahũ ṇa lajjahi  $  laï laï jaï ṇaraẏahŏ gamu sajjahi
text.8073: laï laï jaï paralou ṇa jāṇahi  $  laï laï jaï ṇiẏa-āu ṇa māṇahi
text.8074: laï laï jaï ṇiẏa-rajju ṇa icchahi  $  laï laï jaï jama-sāsaṇu pecchahi
text.8075: laï laï jaï ṇivviṇṇaü pāṇahũ  $  laï laï jaï uru-uḍḍahi vāṇahũ"
text.8076: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu asuhāvaṇu  $  aï-maẏaṇāuru pabhaṇaï rāvaṇu
text.8078: "māṇavi eha tiẏa  $  jaṃ jijjaï ekku muhuttaü
text.8083: visaẏāsatta-cittu pariẏāṇĕvi  $  vijjaĕ vuttu ṇiruttaü jāṇĕvi
text.8084: "ṇisuṇu dasāṇaṇa pisuṇami bheu  $  veṇha vi atthi ekku saṅkeu
text.8085: ehu jo dīsaï suhaḍu raṇaṅgaṇĕ  $  vāvarantu khara-dūsaṇa-sāhaṇĕ
text.8086: eẏahŏ sīhaṇāu āẏaṇṇĕvi  $  iṭṭha-kalattu va tiṇa-samu maṇṇĕvi
text.8087: dhāvaï sīhu jema orālĕvi  $  vajjāvattu cāu apphālĕvi
text.8088: tuhũ puṇu pacchaĕ dhaṇa uddālahi  $  puppha-vimāṇĕ chuhĕvi saṃcālahi"
text.8089: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu pabhaṇiu rāu  $  "to ghaĩ paĩ jĕ karevaü ṇāu"
text.8090: pahu-āeseṃ vijja padhāiẏa  $  ṇiviseṃ taṃ saṃgāmu parāiẏa
text.8092: lakkhaṇu gahiẏa-saru  $  jaṃ ṇisuṇiu ṇāu bhaẏaṅkaru
text.8093: dhāiu dāsarahi  $  ṇahĕ sa-dhaṇu ṇāĩ ṇava-jalaharu
text.8097: bhīsaṇu sīha-ṇāu ṇisuṇeppiṇu  $  dhaṇuharu karĕ sajjīu kareppiṇu
text.8098: toṇā-juvalu laevi padhāiu  $  "mañchuḍu lakkhaṇu raṇĕ viṇivāiu"
text.8099: kuḍhĕ laggantĕ rāmĕ suṇimittaĩ  $  saüṇu ṇa denti honti du-ṇimittaĩ
text.8100: phuraï sa-vāhaü vāmaü loẏaṇu  $  pavahaï dāhiṇa-pavaṇu alakkhaṇu
text.8101: vāẏasu virasu rasaï siva kandaï  $  aggaĕ kuhiṇi bhuaṅgamu chindaï
text.8102: jamvū paṅguranta uddhāiẏa  $  ṇāĩ ṇivārā saẏaṇa parāiẏa
text.8103: dāhiṇeṇa piṅgalaẏa samuṭṭhiẏa  $  ṇahĕ ṇava gaha vivarīẏa pariṭṭhiẏa
text.8104: to vi vīru avagaṇṇĕvi dhāiu  $  takkhaṇĕ taṃ saṅgāmu parāiu
text.8111: diṭṭhu raṇaṅgaṇu rāhavacandeṃ  $  ramiu vasantu ṇāĩ govindeṃ
text.8114: raṇĕ khellanti paropparu caccari  $  puṇu piẏanti soṇiẏa-kāẏamvari
text.8115: tehaü samara-vasantu ramantaü  $  lakkhaṇu pomāiu paharantaü
text.8116: "sāhu vaccha para tujjhu ji chajjaï  $  aṇṇahŏ kāsu eu paḍivajjaï
text.8117: paĩ ikkhāu-vaṃsu ujjāliu  $  jasa-paḍahaü tihuaṇĕ apphāliu"
text.8118: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu bhaṇaï mahāiu  $  "viruaü kiẏaü deva jaṃ āiu
text.8120: mellĕvi jaṇaẏa-suẏa  $  kiṃ rāhava thāṇahŏ caliẏaü
text.8121: akkhaï majjhu maṇu  $  hiẏa jāṇaï keṇa vi chaliẏaü"
text.8125: puṇaravi vuccaï maragaẏa-vaṇṇeṃ  $  "haũ ṇa karemi ṇāu kiu aṇṇeṃ"
text.8126: taṃ ṇisuṇevi ṇiẏattaï jāvĕhĩ  $  sīẏā-haraṇu paḍhukkiu tāvĕhĩ
text.8127: āu dasāṇaṇu puppha-vimāṇeṃ  $  ṇāĩ purandaru siviẏā-jāṇeṃ
text.8128: pāsu paḍhukkiu rāhava-ghariṇihĕ  $  matta-gaïndu jema para-kariṇihĕ
text.8129: ubhaẏa-karĕhĩ saṃcāliẏa thāṇahŏ  $  ṇāĩ sarīra-hāṇi appāṇahŏ
text.8130: ṇāĩ kulahŏ bhavitti hakkāriẏa  $  laṅkahĕ saṅka ṇāĩ païsāriẏa
text.8132: ṇaṃ jasa-hāṇi khāṇi vahu-dukkhahũ  $  ṇaṃ paraloẏa-kuhiṇi kiẏa mukkhahũ
text.8135: kāleṃ kuddhaĕṇa  $  hiu jīviu ṇaṃ vaṇa-vāsahŏ
text.8139: caliu vimāṇu jaṃ jĕ gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ  $  sīẏaĕ kaluṇu pakandiu takkhaṇĕ
text.8140: taṃ kūvāru suṇevi mahāiu  $  dhuṇĕvi sarīru jaḍāi padhāiu
text.8142: ekka-vāra osasaï ṇa jāvĕhĩ  $  saẏasaẏa-vāra jhaḍappaï tāvĕhĩ
text.8143: jāu visaṇṭhulu vaïri-viẏāraṇu  $  candahāsu maṇĕ sumaraï paharaṇu
text.8144: sīẏa vi dharaï ṇiẏaṅgu vi rakkhaï  $  lajjaï caüdisu ṇaẏaṇakaḍakkhaï
text.8145: dukkhu dukkhu teṃ dhīrĕvi appaü  $  kara-ṇiṭṭhura-daḍha-kaḍhiṇa-talappaü
text.8146: pahaü vihaṅgu paḍiu samaraṅgaṇĕ  $  devĕhĩ kalaẏalu kiẏaü ṇahaṅgaṇĕ
text.8153: paḍiu jaḍāi jaṃ jĕ phandantaü  $  sīẏaĕ kiu akkandu mahantaü
text.8154: "ahŏ ahŏ devahŏ raṇĕ duviẏaḍḍhahŏ  $  ṇiẏa parihāsa ṇa pāliẏa saṇḍhahŏ
text.8155: vari suhaḍattaṇu cañcū-jīvahŏ  $  jo abbhiṭṭu samarĕ dasagīvahŏ
text.8156: ṇaü tumhĕhĩ rakkhiu vaḍḍattaṇu  $  sūrahŏ taṇaü diṭṭhu sūrattaṇu
text.8157: saccaü candu vi canda-gahillaü  $  vambhu vi sottiu haru dummahilaü
text.8158: vāu vi cavalattaṇĕṇa damijjaï  $  dhammu vi raṇḍa-saehĩ laïjjaï
text.8159: varuṇu vi hoi sahāveṃ sīẏalu  $  tāsu kahi mi kiṃ saṅkaï para-valu
text.8160: indu vi indavaheṇa ramijjaï  $  ko suravara-saṇḍĕhĩ rakkhijjaï
text.8162: jāu kiṃ jampiĕṇa  $  jagĕ aṇṇu ṇa abbhuddharaṇaü
text.8167: puṇu vi palāu karanti ṇa thakkaï  $  "kuḍhĕ laggaü laggaü jo sakkaï
text.8168: haũ pāveṇa eṇa avagaṇṇĕvi  $  ṇiẏa tihuaṇu a-maṇūsaü maṇṇĕvi"
text.8169: puṇu vi kaluṇu kandanti paẏaṭṭaï  $  "ĕu avasaru sappurisahŏ vaṭṭaï
