text.8170: aha maĩ kavaṇu ṇei kandantī  $  lakkhaṇa-rāma ve vi jaï huntī
text.8171: hā hā dasaraha māma guṇovahi  $  hā hā jaṇaẏa jaṇaẏa avaloẏahi
text.8172: hā aparāiĕ hā hā kekkaï  $  hā suppahĕ sumittĕ sundara-maï
text.8173: hā sattuhaṇa bharaha bharahesara  $  hā bhāmaṇḍala bhāi sahoẏara
text.8174: hā hā puṇu vi rāma hā lakkhaṇa  $  ko sumarami kahŏ kahami a-lakkhaṇa
text.8176: ko saṃthavaï maĩ  $  ko suhi kahŏ dukkhu mahantaü
text.8177: jahĩ jahĩ jāmi haũ  $  taṃ taṃ ji paesu palittaü"
text.8181: tahĩ avasarĕ vaṭṭantĕ su-viulaĕ  $  dāhiṇa-lavaṇa-samuddahŏ kūlaĕ
text.8182: atthi pacaṇḍu ekku vijjāharu  $  vara-karavāla-hatthu raṇĕ duddharu
text.8183: bhāmaṇḍalahŏ caliu olaggaĕ  $  sua kandanti sīẏa tāmaggaĕ
text.8184: valiu vimāṇu teṇa paḍivakkhahŏ  $  "ṇaṃ tiẏa kā vi bhaṇaï maĩ rakkhahŏ
text.8185: lakkhaṇa-rāma ve vi hakkāraï  $  bhāmaṇḍalahŏ ṇāmu uccāraï
text.8186: mañchuḍu eha sīẏa ĕhu rāvaṇu  $  aṇṇu ṇa para-kalatta-saṃtāvaṇu
text.8187: acchaü ṇivahŏ pāsu jāevaü  $  eṇa samāṇu ajju jujjhevaü"
text.8188: ema bhaṇevi teṇa hakkāriu  $  "kahĩ tiẏa levi jāhi" paccāriu
text.8190: "vihi mi bhiḍantāhũ  $  jiha haṇaï ekku jiha hammaï
text.8191: geṇhĕvi jaṇaẏa-suẏa  $  valu valu kahĩ rāvaṇa gammaï"
text.8195: valiu dasāṇaṇu tihuaṇa-kaṇṭaü  $  sīhahŏ sīhu jema abbhiṭṭaü
text.8196: jema gaïndu gaïndahŏ dhāiu  $  mehahŏ mehu jema uddhāiu
text.8197: bhiḍiẏa mahāvala vijjā-pāṇĕhĩ  $  ve vi pariṭṭhiẏa siviẏā-jāṇĕhĩ
text.8198: ve vi pasāhiẏa ṇāṇāharaṇĕhĩ  $  veṇṇi vi vāvaranti ṇiẏa-karaṇĕhĩ
text.8199: veṇṇi vi ghāẏa denti avaropparu  $  maṇĕ viruddhu bhāmaṇḍala-kiṅkaru
text.8200: vara-karavālu kareppiṇu karaẏalĕ  $  pahaü dasāṇaṇu viẏaḍa-uratthalĕ
text.8201: paḍiu ghuleppiṇu jaṇhuva-jottĕhĩ  $  ruhiru padarisiu dasahi mi sottĕhĩ
text.8203: tuhũ so rāvaṇu tihuvaṇa-kaṇṭaü  $  ekkeṃ ghāeṃ ṇavara paloṭṭiu"
text.8205: ceẏaṇu lahĕvi raṇĕ  $  bhaḍu uṭṭhiu kuruḍu sa-maccharu
text.8206: tahŏ vijjāharahŏ  $  thiu rāsihĩ ṇāĩ saṇiccharu
text.8210: uṭṭhiu vīsapāṇi asi lentaü  $  ṇāĩ sa-vijju mehu gajjantaü
text.8212: puṇu dasasiru saṃcallu sa-sīẏaü  $  ṇahaẏalĕ ṇāĩ divāẏaru vīẏaü
text.8213: majjhĕ samuddahŏ jaẏasiri-māṇaṇu  $  puṇu vollevaĕ laggu dasāṇaṇu
text.8214: "kāĩ gahilliĕ maĩ ṇa samicchahi  $  kiṃ mahaevi-paṭṭu ṇa samicchahi
text.8215: kiṃ ṇikkaṇṭaü rajju ṇa bhuñjahi  $  kiṃ ṇa vi suraẏa-sokkhu aṇuhujjahi
text.8216: kiṃ mahu keṇa vi bhaggu maḍappharu  $  kiṃ dūhaü kiṃ kahi mi asundaru"
text.8217: ema bhaṇĕvi āliṅgaï jāvĕhĩ  $  jaṇaẏa-suẏaĕ ṇibbhacchiu tāvĕhĩ
text.8224: ṇiṭṭhura-vaẏaṇĕhĩ docchiu jāvĕhĩ  $  dahamuhu huaü vilakkhaü tāvĕhĩ
text.8225: "jaï mārami to eha ṇa pecchami  $  vollaü savvu haseppiṇu acchami
text.8226: avaseṃ kaṃ divasu i icchesaï  $  sarahasu kaṇṭha-ggahaṇu karesaï
text.8227: "aṇṇu vi maĩ ṇiẏa-vaü pālevvaü  $  maṇḍaĕ para-kalattu ṇa laevvaü"
text.8228: ema bhaṇevi caliu sura-ḍāmaru  $  laṅka parāiu laddha-mahāvaru
text.8229: sīẏaĕ vuttu "ṇa païsami paṭṭaṇĕ  $  acchami etthu viulĕ ṇandaṇavaṇĕ
text.8230: jāva ṇa suṇami vatta bhattārahŏ  $  tāva ṇivitti majjhu āhārahŏ"
text.8231: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi uvavaṇĕ païsāriẏa  $  sīsava-rukkha-mūlĕ vaïsāriẏa
text.8233: mellĕvi sīẏa vaṇĕ  $  gaü rāvaṇu gharahŏ turantaü
text.8234: dhavalĕhĩ maṅgalĕhĩ  $  thiu rajju sa ïṃ bhu ñjantaü
text.8236: kuḍhĕ laggeppiṇu lakkhaṇahŏ valu jāma paḍīvaü āvaï
text.8237: taṃ ji laẏāharu taṃ ji taru para sīẏa ṇa appaü dāvaï
text.8241: ṇīsīẏaü vaṇu avaẏajjiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ sararuhu lacchi-visajjiẏaü
text.8242: ṇaṃ meha-vindu ṇivvijjulaü  $  ṇaṃ muṇivara-vaẏaṇu a-vacchalaü
text.8243: ṇaṃ bhoẏaṇu lavaṇa-jutti-rahiu  $  arahanta-vimvu ṇaṃ a-vasahiu
text.8244: ṇaṃ datti-vivajjiu kiviṇa-dhaṇu  $  tiha sīẏa-vihūṇaü diṭṭhu vaṇu
text.8245: puṇu joaï guhilĕhĩ païsarĕvi  $  thiẏa jāṇaï jāṇaï osarĕvi
text.8246: puṇu jovaï giri-vivarantarĕhĩ  $  thiẏa jāṇaï lhikkĕvi kandarĕhĩ
text.8247: tāṇantarĕ diṭṭhu jaḍāi vaṇĕ  $  saṃsūḍiẏa-gattaü paḍiu raṇĕ
text.8250: tāvĕhĩ vujjhiu rāhavĕṇa  $  hiẏa jāṇaï keṇa vi chaliẏaü
text.8254: puṇu diṇṇa teṇa suha vasu-hārā  $  uccārĕvi pañca ṇamokkārā
text.8255: je sārabhūẏa jiṇa-sāsaṇahŏ  $  je maraṇa-sahāẏa bhavva-jaṇahŏ
text.8256: laddhehĩ jehĩ diḍha hoi maï  $  laddhehĩ jehĩ paraloẏa-gaï
text.8257: laddhehĩ jehĩ saṃbhavaï suhu  $  laddhehĩ jehĩ ṇijjaraï duhu
text.8260: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi savvāẏarĕṇa  $  lahu pāṇa visajjiẏa ṇahaẏarĕṇa
text.8261: jaṃ muu jaḍāi hiẏa jaṇaẏa-sua  $  dhāhāviu ubbhā karĕvi bhua
text.8263: "kahĩ haũ kahĩ hari kahĩ ghariṇi  $  kahĩ gharu kahĩ pariẏaṇu chiṇṇaü
text.8264: bhūẏa-vali vva kuḍumvu jagĕ  $  haẏa-daïveṃ kaha vikkhiṇṇaü"
text.8268: valu ema bhaṇevi pamucchiẏaü  $  puṇu cāraṇa-risihĩ ṇiẏacchiẏaü
text.8269: cāraṇa vi honti aṭṭhaviha-guṇa  $  je ṇāṇa-piṇḍa sīlāharaṇa
text.8271: tahĩ vīra sudhīra visuddha-maṇa  $  ṇaha-cāraṇa āiẏa veṇṇi jaṇa
text.8272: teṃ avahī-ṇāṇeṃ joiẏaü  $  rāmahŏ kalattu vicchoiẏaü
text.8273: āūrĕvi gala-gambhīra-jhuṇi  $  puṇu laggu cavevaĕ jeṭṭha-muṇi
text.8274: "bho carama-deha sāsaẏa-gamaṇa  $  keṃ kajjeṃ rovahi mūḍha-maṇa
text.8275: tiẏa dukkhahũ khāṇi vioẏa-ṇihi  $  tahĕ kāraṇĕ rovahi kāĩ vihi
text.8277: kiṃ paĩ ṇa suiẏa eha kaha  $  chajjīva-ṇikāẏa-daẏāvaru
text.8278: jiha guṇavaï-aṇuattaṇĕṇa  $  jiṇaẏāsu jāu vaṇĕ vāṇaru"
text.8282: jaṃ ṇisuṇiu ko vi cavantu ṇahĕ  $  mucchā-vihalaṅghalu dharaṇi-vahĕ
text.8283: "hā sīẏa" bhaṇantu samuṭṭhiẏaü  $  caü-disaü ṇiẏantu  pariṭṭhiẏaü
text.8284: ṇaṃ kari kariṇihĕ vicchoiẏaü  $  puṇu gaẏaṇa-maggu avaloiẏaü
text.8285: tahĩ tāva ṇihāliẏa viṇṇi risi  $  saṃgahiẏa jehĩ paraloẏa-kisi
text.8286: te guru guru-bhatti karevi thuẏa  $  "ho dhamma-viddhi siri-ṇamiẏa-bhuẏa
text.8287: giri-meru-samāṇaü jetthu duhu  $  tahĕ kāraṇĕ rovahi kāĩ tuhũ
text.8288: khala tiẏamaï jeṇa ṇa parihariẏa  $  tahŏ ṇaraẏa-mahāṇaï duttariẏa
text.8289: rovanti ema para kappurisa  $  tiṇa-samu gaṇanti je sappurisa
text.8291: tiẏamaï vāhihĕ aṇuharaï  $  khaṇĕ khaṇĕ dukkhanti ṇa thakkaï
text.8292: hammaï jiṇa-vaẏaṇosahĕṇa  $  jeṃ jamma-sae vi ṇa ḍhukkaï"
text.8296: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu bhaṇaï valu  $  mellantu ṇirantaru aṃsu-jalu
text.8298: labbhanti turaṅgama matta gaẏa  $  raha kaṇaẏa-daṇḍa-dhuvvanta-dhaẏa
text.8299: labbhanti bhiccavara āṇa-kara  $  labbhaï aṇuhuñjĕvi sa-dhara dhara
text.8300: labbhaï gharu pariẏaṇu vandhu-jaṇu  $  labbhaï siẏa saṃpaẏa davvu dhaṇu
text.8301: labbhaï tamvolu vilevaṇaü  $  labbhaï hiẏaïcchiu bhoẏaṇaü
text.8303: hiẏaïcchiu maṇaharu piẏavaẏaṇu  $  para ehu ṇa labbhaï tiẏa-raẏaṇu
text.8305: taṃ jovvaṇu taṃ muha-kamalu  $  taṃ suraü savaṭṭaṇa-hatthaü
text.8306: jeṇa ṇa māṇiu etthu jagĕ  $  tahŏ jīviu savvu ṇiratthu"
text.8310: paramesaru pabhaṇaï valĕvi muhu  $  "tiẏa-raẏaṇu pasaṃsahi kāĩ tuhũ
text.8312: duggandha-dehu ghiṇi-viṭṭalaü  $  para cammeṃ haḍḍahũ poṭṭalaü
text.8313: māẏāmeṃ janteṃ paribhamaï  $  bhiṇṇaü ṇava-ṇāḍihĩ parisavaï
text.8315: vahu-maṃsa-rāsi kimi-kīḍa-haru  $  khaṭṭahĕ vaïriu bhūmīhĕ bharu
text.8316: āhārahŏ pisivaü sīviẏaü  $  ṇisi maḍaü divasĕ saṃjīviẏaü
text.8319: maraṇa-kālĕ kimi-kappariu  $  jeṃ pekkhĕvi muhu vaṅkijjaï
text.8320: ghiṇihiṇantu makkhiẏa-saĕhĩ  $  taṃ tehaü kema ramijjaï
text.8324: taṃ calaṇa-jualu gaï-mantharaü  $  saüṇahĩ khajjantu bhaẏaṅkaraü
text.8326: taṃ ṇāhi-paesu kisoẏaraü  $  khajjanta-māṇu thiu bhāsuraü
text.8327: taṃ jovvaṇu avaruṇḍaṇa-maṇaü  $  sujjantu ṇavara bhīsāvaṇaü
text.8328: taṃ sundaru vaẏaṇu jiẏantāhũ  $  kimi-kappiu ṇavara marantāhũ
text.8329: taṃ ahara-vimvu vaṇṇujjalaü  $  luñcantu sivahĩ ghiṇi-viṭṭalaü
text.8330: taṃ ṇaẏaṇa-jualu vibbhama-bhariu  $  vicchāẏaü kāĕhĩ kappariu
text.8331: so cihura-bhāru koḍḍāvaṇaü  $  uḍḍantu ṇavara bhīsāvaṇaü
text.8333: taṃ māṇusu taṃ muha-kamalu  $  te thaṇa taṃ gāḍhāliṅgaṇu
text.8338: tahĩ tehaĕ rasa-vasa-pūẏa-bharĕ  $  ṇava māsa vasevaü deha-gharĕ
text.8339: ṇava-ṇāhi-kamalu utthallu jahĩ  $  pahilaü jĕ piṇḍa-saṃvandhu tahĩ
text.8340: dasa-divasu pariṭṭhiu ruhira-jalĕ  $  kaṇu jema païṇṇaü dharaṇiẏalĕ
text.8341: vihĩ dasarattehĩ samuṭṭhiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ jalĕ ḍiṇḍīru pariṭṭhiẏaü
text.8342: tihĩ dasarattĕhĩ vuvvuu ghaḍiu  $  ṇaṃ sisira-vindu kuṅkumĕ paḍiu
text.8343: dasarattĕ caütthaĕ vitthariu  $  ṇāvaï pavalaṅkuru ṇīsariu
text.8344: pañcamĕ dasarattĕ jāu valiu  $  ṇaṃ sūraṇa-kandu caüpphaliu
text.8345: dasa-dasarattĕhĩ kara-caraṇa-siru  $  vīsahĩ ṇippaṇṇu sarīru thiru
text.8346: ṇavamāsiu dehahŏ ṇīsariu  $  vaḍḍhantu paḍīvaü vīsariu
text.8348: jeṇa duvāreṃ āiẏaü  $  jo taṃ pariharĕvi ṇa sakkaï
text.8349: pantihĩ juttu vaïllu jiha  $  bhava-saṃsārĕ bhamantu ṇa thakkaï
text.8353: ĕu jāṇĕvi dhīrahi appaṇaü  $  karĕ kaṅkaṇu jovahi dappaṇaü
text.8355: jagĕ jīveṃ ko ṇa ruvāviẏaü  $  ko garua dhāha ṇa muāviẏaü
text.8356: ko kahi mi ṇāhĩ saṃtāviẏaü  $  ko kahi mi ṇa āvaï pāviẏaü
text.8357: ko kahi ṇa daḍḍhu ko kahĩ ṇa muu  $  ko kahĩ ṇa bhamiu ko kahĩ ṇa gaü
text.8358: kahĩ ṇa vi bhoẏaṇu kahĩ ṇa vi suraü  $  jagĕ jīvahŏ kiṃ pi ṇa vāhiraü
text.8359: taïlokku vi asiu asantaĕṇa  $  mahi saẏala daḍḍha ḍajjhantaĕṇa
text.8361: sāẏaru pīu piẏantaĕṇa  $  aṃsuĕhĩ ruanteṃ bhariẏaü
text.8362: haḍḍa-kalevara-saṃcaĕṇa  $  giri meru so vi antariẏaü
text.8366: ahavaï kiṃ vahu-cavieṇa rāma  $  bhave bhamiu bhaẏaṅkarĕ tuhu mi tāma
text.8368: sā sīẏa vi joṇi-saehĩ āẏa  $  tuhũ kahi mi vappu sā kahi mi māẏa
text.8369: tuhũ kahi mi bhāu sā kahi mi vahiṇi  $  tuhũ kahi mi daïu sā kahi mi ghariṇi
text.8370: tuhũ kahi mi ṇaraĕ sā kahi mi saggĕ  $  tuhũ kahi mi mahihĩ sā gaẏaṇa-maggĕ
text.8371: tuhũ kahi mi ṇāri sā kahi mi johu  $  kiṃ siviṇā-riddhihĕ karahi mohu
text.8372: ummeṭṭhu vioa-gaïndaesu  $  jagaḍantu bhamaï jagu ṇiravasesu
text.8373: jaï ṇa dhariu jiṇa-vaẏaṇaṅkuseṇa  $  to khajjaï māṇusu māṇuseṇa"
text.8375: ema bhaṇeppiṇu ve vi muṇi  $  gaẏa kahi mi ṇahaṅgaṇa-pantheṃ
text.8376: rāmu pariṭṭhiu kiviṇu jiha  $  dhaṇu ekku laevi sa-hattheṃ
text.8381: "saccaü saṃsārĕ ṇa atthi suhu  $  saccaü giri-meru-samāṇu duhu
text.8383: kahŏ gharu kahŏ pariẏaṇu vandhu-jaṇu  $  kahŏ māẏa-vappu kahŏ suhi-saẏaṇu
text.8384: kahŏ puttu mittu kahŏ kira ghariṇi  $  kahŏ bhāẏa sahoẏara kahŏ vahiṇi
text.8385: phalu jāva tāva vandhava saẏaṇa  $  āvāsiẏa pāẏavĕ jiha saüṇa"
text.8386: valu ema bhaṇeppiṇu ṇīsariu  $  rovantu paḍīvaü vīsariu
text.8388: ṇiddhaṇu lakkhaṇa-vajjiẏaü  $  aṇṇu vi vahu-vasaṇĕhĩ bhuttaü
text.8389: rāhaü bhamaï bhuaṅgu jiha  $  vaṇĕ "hā hā sīẏa" bhaṇantaü
text.8394: "khaṇĕ khaṇĕ veẏārahi kāĩ maĩ  $  kahĕ kahi mi diṭṭha jaï kanta paĩ"
text.8395: valu ema bhaṇeppiṇu saṃcaliu  $  tāvaggaĕ vaṇa-gaïndu miliu
text.8396: "he kuñjara kāmiṇi-gaï-gamaṇa  $  kahĕ kahi mi diṭṭha jaï migaṇaẏaṇa"
text.8398: katthaï diṭṭhaĩ indīvaraĩ  $  jāṇaï dhaṇa-ṇaẏaṇaĩ dīharaĩ
text.8400: vaṇu saẏalu gavesĕvi saẏala mahi  $  pallaṭṭu paḍīvaü dāsarahi
text.8402: taṃ ji parāiu ṇiẏa-bhavaṇu  $  jahĩ acchiu āsi laẏatthale
text.8403: cāva-silimmuha-mukka-karu  $  valu paḍiu sa ïṃ bhu va-maṇḍalĕ
text.8424: puṇu kahami mahavvalu  $  khara-dūsaṇa-valu  $  jiha āẏāmiu lakkhaṇĕṇa
text.8429: hiẏa ettahĕ vi sīẏa ettahĕ vi viou mahantu rāhave  $  hari ettahĕ vi bhiḍiu ettahĕ vi virāhiu miliu āhave
text.8430: tāva tetthu bhīsāvaṇe vaṇe  $  ekkamekka-hakkāraṇe raṇe
text.8434: daliẏa-kumbha-viẏalaṅgae gae  $  siru dhuṇāvie āhae hae
text.8435: ruhira-vindu-caccikkie kie  $  sāẏare vva sura-manthie thie
text.8437: tahĩ mahāhave ghora-dāruṇe  $  diṭṭhu vīru paharantu sāhaṇe
text.8439: tilu tilu kappariẏaĩ  $  urĕ jajjariẏaĩ  $  rattacchaĩ phuriẏāṇaṇaĩ
text.8445: ko vi subhaḍu sa-turaṅgamu ko vi sajāṇu sallio  $  ko vi paḍantu diṭṭhu āẏāsahŏ lakkhaṇa-sara-virallio
text.8446: bhaḍo ko vi diṭṭho paricchinna-gatto  $  sa-dantī sa-mantī sa-cindho sa-chatto
text.8447: bhaḍo ko vi vāvalla-bhallehĩ bhiṇṇo  $  bhaḍo ko vi kappaddumo jema chiṇṇo
text.8448: bhaḍo ko vi tikkhagga-ṇārāẏa-viddho  $  mahā-satthavanto vva satthehĩ viddho
text.8449: bhaḍo ko vi kuddhāṇaṇo vipphuranto  $  maranto vi hakkāra-ḍakkāra dento
text.8450: bhaḍo ko vi bhiṇṇo sa-deho samattho  $  pamucchāvio ko vi kovaṇḍa-hattho
text.8451: muo ko vi kovubbhaḍo jīvamāṇo  $  calaccāmara-cchoha-vijjijjamāṇo
text.8452: vasā-kaddame maddave ko vi khutto  $  khalanto valanto ṇiẏantehĩ gutto
text.8453: bhaḍo ko vi bhiṇṇo khuruppehĩ ento  $  ṇiẏanto kusiddho vva siddhĩ ṇa patto
text.8456: sāhāru ṇa vandhaï  $  gamaṇu ṇa sandhaï  $  ṇavalaü kāmiṇi-pemmu jiha
text.8461: paradhaṇa-parakalatta-parisesahũ paravala-saṇṇivāẏahũ  $  ekkeṃ lakkhaṇeṇa viṇivāiẏa satta sahāsa rāẏahũ
text.8462: jīvantaĕ addhaĕ vaïri-seṇṇĕ  $  addhaĕ dalavaṭṭiĕ mahi-ṇisaṇṇĕ
text.8463: tahĩ avasarĕ pavara-jasāhieṇa  $  jokkāriu viṇhu virāhieṇa
text.8464: "pāikkahŏ vaṭṭaï ehu kālu  $  haũ bhiccu deva tuhũ sāmisālu
text.8465: kahio 'si āsi jo cāraṇehĩ  $  so lakkhio 'si saĩ loẏaṇehĩ
text.8466: taṃ sahala maṇoraha ajju jāẏa  $  jaṃ diṭṭha tuhārā ve vi pāẏa
text.8467: ṇiẏa-jaṇaṇihĕ haũ gabbhatthu jaïu  $  viṇivāiu piu mahu taṇaü taïu
text.8468: sahũ tāeṃ mahu pāikka-pavaru  $  uddāliu tamalaṅkāra-ṇaẏaru
text.8471: jaẏa-lacchi-pasāhiu  $  bhaṇaï virāhiu  $  "pahu pasāu mahu pesaṇahŏ
text.8472: tuhũ kharu āẏāmahi  $  raṇaühĕ ṇāmahi  $  haüm abbhiṭṭami dūsaṇahŏ"
text.8477: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu vijjāharu mambhīsiu kumārĕṇaṃ  $  "vaïsaru tāva jāva riu pāḍami ekkeṃ sara-pahārĕṇaṃ
text.8478: eu seṇṇu khara-dūsaṇa-keraü  $  vāṇĕhĩ karami ajju vivareraü
text.8479: sa-dhaü sa-vāhaṇu sa-pahu sa-hattheṃ  $  lāẏami samvu-kumārahŏ pantheṃ
text.8480: tujjhu vi jamma-bhūmi darisāvami  $  tamalaṅkāra-ṇaẏaru bhuñjāvami"
text.8481: hari-vaẏaṇĕhĩ harisiu vijjāharu  $  calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu sīsĕ lāĕvi karu
text.8482: tāva khareṇa samarĕ ṇivvūḍheṃ  $  pucchiu manti vimāṇārūḍheṃ
text.8483: "dīsaï kavaṇu ehu vīsatthaü  $  ṇaru paṇamantu kiẏañjali-hatthaü
text.8484: vāhuvaleṇa valeṇa vivaliẏaü  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālu kiẏantahŏ miliẏaü"
text.8485: pabhaṇaï manti vimāṇĕ païṭṭhaü  $  "kiṃ paĩ vaïri kaẏāvi ṇa diṭṭhaü
text.8488: aṇurāhā-ṇandaṇu  $  sa-valu sa-sandaṇu  $  ĕhu so candoarahŏ suu"
text.8493: manti-ṇivāṇa vihi mi avaropparu e ālāva jāvĕhĩ  $  viṇhu-virāhiehĩ āẏāmiu para-valu saẏalu tāvĕhĩ
text.8500: ehu ve (?) hao haẏassa  $  coio gao gaẏassa
text.8501: vāhiu raho rahassa  $  dhāio ṇaro ṇarassa
text.8504: ṇiẏa-vaïru sareppiṇu  $  hakkāreppiṇu  $  bhiḍiẏaĩ veṇṇi mi sāhaṇaĩ
text.8509: seṇṇahŏ bhiḍiu seṇṇu dūsaṇahŏ virāhiu kharahŏ lakkhaṇo  $  haẏa paḍu paḍaha tūra kiu kalaẏalu gala-gambhīra-bhīṣaṇo
text.8517: ve vi samacchara  $  ve vi bhaẏaṅkara
text.8518: ve vi akāẏara  $  ve vi jasāẏara
text.8519: ve vi mahabbhaḍa  $  ve vi aṇubbhaḍa
text.8520: ve vi dhaṇuddhara  $  veṇṇi vi duddhara
text.8522: veṇṇi vi jasa-luddhā  $  amarisa-kuddhā  $  tihuẏaṇa-malla samāvaḍiẏa
text.8528: tāma jaṇaddaṇeṇa addhendu visajjiu raṇĕ bhaẏaṅkaro  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālĕ kālu uddhāiu tihuaṇa-jaṇa-khaẏaṅkaro
text.8530: riu-rahahŏ ḍhukku  $  kharu kaha vi cukku
text.8532: dhaṇuharu vi bhaggu  $  kattha vi ṇa laggu
text.8541: kasaṇaṅgaẏa dīsiẏa  $  vijju-vihūsiẏa  $  ṇaṃ ṇava-pāusĕ amvuhara
text.8546: hatthi va uddha-soṇḍa sīha va laṅgūla-valagga-kandharā  $  ṇiṭṭhura mahihara vva aï-khāra samudda va ahi va duddharā
text.8547: abbhiṭṭa ve vi soṇḍīra vīra  $  saṃgāma-dhīra
text.8552: "kharu muĕvi aṇṇu kiṃ ko vi sūru  $  para-simira-cūru"
text.8554: kharu gaddahu kiha kijjaï samāṇu  $  jo aghaḍamāṇu"
text.8563: ettahĕ lakkhaṇeṇa viṇivāiu ṇisiẏara-seṇṇa-sārao  $  ettahĕ dūsaṇeṇa kiu virahu virāhiu viṇṇi vārao
text.8564: chuḍu chuḍu samarĕ parajjiu sāhaṇu  $  raha-gaẏa-vāhaṇu
text.8566: chuḍu chuḍu cihurahã hatthu pasāriu  $  kaha vi ṇa māriu
text.8567: tāva kharahŏ siru khuḍĕvi mahāiu  $  lakkhaṇu dhāiu
text.8569: "dūsaṇa paharu paharu jaï sakkahi  $  ahimuhu thakkahi"
text.8570: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu āruṭṭhaü  $  citteṃ duṭṭhaü
text.8571: valiu ṇisindu gaïndu va sīhahŏ  $  raṇa-saẏa-līhahŏ
text.8580: pāḍieṃ atula-mallĕ kharĕ dūsaṇĕ paḍiẏam asesa-sāhaṇaṃ
text.8581: satta sahāsa bhiḍanteṃ māriẏa  $  dūsaṇeṇa sahũ satta viẏāriẏa
text.8582: caüdaha sahasa ṇarindahũ ghāiẏa  $  ṇaṃ kappadduma vva viṇivāiẏa
text.8583: maṇḍiẏa meiṇi ṇaravara-chattĕhĩ  $  ṇāvaï saraẏa-lacchi saẏavattĕhĩ
text.8584: katthaï rattāratta padīsiẏa  $  ṇāĩ vilāsiṇi ghusiṇa-vihūsiẏa
text.8585: to etthantarĕ raha-gaẏa-vāhaṇĕ  $  kalaẏalu ghuṭṭhu virāhiẏa-sāhaṇĕ
text.8587: "candoara-sua mahu karĕ vuttaü  $  tāma mahāhavĕ acchu muhuttaü
text.8588: jāva gavesami bhāi mahāraü  $  sahũ vaïdehiĕ pāṇa-piẏāraü"
text.8590: khara-dūsaṇa mārĕvi  $  jiṇu jaẏakārĕvi  $  lakkhaṇu rāmahŏ pāsu gaü
text.8591: ṇaṃ tihuaṇu ghāĕvi  $  jama-pahĕ lāĕvi  $  kālu kiẏantahŏ sammuhaü
text.8596: halaharu lakkhaṇeṇa lakkhijjaï sīẏā-soẏa-ṇibbharo  $  ghattiẏa toṇa-vāṇa mahi-maṇḍalĕ kara-paricatta-dhaṇuharo
text.8598: taru vva chiṇṇa-ḍālao  $  phaṇi vva ṇipphaṇālao
text.8599: giri vva vajja-sūḍio  $  sasi vva rāhu-pīḍio
text.8603: suṇevi tassa jampiẏaṃ  $  tam akkhiẏaṃ ṇa jaṃ piẏaṃ
text.8604: "vaṇe viṇaṭṭha jāṇaī  $  ṇa ko vi vatta jāṇaī
text.8606: jo pakkhi raṇe 'jjaü  $  diṇṇu sahejjaü  $  so vi samarĕ saṃghāriẏaü
text.8607: keṇāvi pacaṇḍeṃ  $  diḍha-bhua-daṇḍeṃ  $  ṇevi talappaĕ māriẏaü"
text.8612: e ālāva jāva vaṭṭanti paropparu rāma-lakkhaṇe  $  tāva virāhio vi vala-parimiu pattu tahĩ ji takkhaṇe
text.8614: valaeu ṇamiu vijjāhareṇa  $  jiṇu jammaṇĕ jema purandarĕṇa
text.8615: āsīsa devi guru-malahareṇa  $  somitti papucchiu halahareṇa
text.8616: "sahũ seṇṇeṃ paṇamiu kavaṇu ehu  $  ṇaṃ tārā-parimmiu hariṇadehu"
text.8618: sabbhāveṃ rāmahŏ kahaï ema  $  "candoẏara-ṇandaṇu ehu deva
text.8619: khara-dūsaṇāri mahu parama-mittu  $  giri meru jema thira-thora-cittu"
text.8620: to ema pasaṃsĕvi takkhaṇeṇa  $  "hiẏa jāṇaï" akkhiu lakkhaṇeṇa
text.8622: "kahĩ kuḍĕ laggesami  $  kahi mi gavesami  $  daïvĕ parammuhĕ kiṃ karami
text.8623: valu sīẏā-soeṃ  $  maraï vioeṃ  $  eṇa maranteṃ haũ marami"
text.8628: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu cintāviu candoẏarahŏ ṇandaṇo  $  vimaṇu visaṇṇa-dehu gaha-pīḍiu ṇaṃ sāraṅga-lañchaṇo
text.8629: "jaṃ jaṃ kiṃ pi vatthu āsaṅghami  $  taṃ taṃ ṇipphalu kahĩ avaṭhambhami
text.8630: eẏa muevi kālu kiha kheviu  $  ṇiddhaṇo vi vari vaḍḍaü seviu
text.8631: hou ma hou to vi olaggami  $  muṇi jiha jiṇa diḍhu calaṇehĩ laggami
text.8632: vihi kettaḍaü kālu viṇaḍesaï  $  avaseṃ kaṃ divasu vi siẏa hosaï"
text.8633: ema bhaṇevi vuttu ṇārāẏaṇu  $  "kuḍhĕ laggevaü kettiu kāraṇu
text.8634: tāva gavesahũ jāma ṇihāliẏa"  $  lahu saṇṇāha-bheri apphāliẏa
text.8635: sāhaṇu dasa-disehĩ saṃcalliu  $  āu paḍivaü jaẏa-siri-melliu
text.8636: joisa-cakku ṇāĩ pariẏattaü  $  ṇaṃ siddhattaṇu siddhi ṇa pattaü
text.8638: vijjāhara-sāhaṇu  $  sa-dhaü sa-vāhaṇu  $  thiu heṭṭhāmuhu vimaṇa-maṇu
text.8639: hima-vāeṃ daḍḍhaü  $  maẏarandaḍḍhaü  $  ṇaṃ komāṇaü kamala-vaṇu
text.8644: vuttu virāhieṇa "sura-ḍāmarĕ tihuaṇa-jaṇa-bhaẏāvaṇe  $  vaṇĕ ṇivasahũ ṇa hoi khara-dūsaṇĕ muĕ jīvantĕ rāvaṇe
text.8645: samvukku vahĕvi asi-raẏaṇu levi  $  ko jīvaï jama-muhĕ païsarevi
text.8646: jahĩ acchaï indaï bhāṇukaṇṇu  $  pañcāmuhu maü māricci aṇṇu
text.8647: ghaṇavāhaṇu jahĩ akkhaẏa-kumāru  $  sahasamaï vihīsaṇu duṇṇivāru
text.8648: haṇuvantu ṇīlu ṇalu jamvavantu  $  suggīu samara-bhara-uvvahantu
text.8649: aṅgaṅgaẏa-gavaẏa-gavakkha jetthu  $  tahŏ vandhu vahĕvi ko vasaï etthu"
text.8650: vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa lakkhaṇu viruddhu  $  gaẏa-gandheṃ ṇāĩ maïndu kuddhu
text.8651: "suṭṭhu vi ruṭṭhehĩ maẏaṅgamehĩ  $  kiṃ rumbhaï sīhu kuraṅgamehĩ
text.8652: romaggu vi vaṅku ṇa hoi jehĩ  $  kiṃ ṇisiẏara-saṇḍhĕhĩ gahaṇu tehĩ
text.8654: je ṇaravaï akkhiẏa  $  rāvaṇa-pakkhiẏa  $  te vi raṇaṅgaṇĕ ṇiṭṭhavami
text.8655: chuḍu dintu ṇiruttaü  $  jujjhu mahantaü  $  dūsaṇa-pantheṃ paṭṭhavami"
text.8660: bhaṇaï puṇo vi ema vijjāharu "acchĕvi kiṃ karesahũ  $  tamalaṅkāra-ṇaẏaru païseppiṇu jāṇaï tahĩ gavesahũ"
text.8661: valu vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa, sahũ sāhaṇeṇa, saṃcalliu  $  ṇāĩ mahāsamuddu, jalaẏara-raüddu, utthalliu
text.8662: diṇṇāṇanda-bheri, paḍivakkha-kheri, khara-vajjiẏa  $  ṇaṃ maẏarahara-vela, kallolavola, galagajjiẏa
text.8663: ubbhiẏa kaṇaẏa-daṇḍa, dhuvvanta dhavala, dhua-dhaẏavaḍa  $  rasamasakasamasanta-, taḍataḍaẏaḍanta-, kara gaẏa-ghaḍa
text.8664: katthaï khilihilanta, haẏa hilihilanta, ṇīsariẏā  $  cañcala-caḍula-cavala, calavalaẏa pavala, pakkhariẏā
text.8665: katthaï pahĕ paẏaṭṭa, dugghoṭṭa-thaṭṭa, maẏa-bhariẏā  $  sirĕ gumugumugumanta, -cumucumucumanta, -cañcariẏā
text.8667: ema paẏaṭṭu simiru, ṇaṃ vahala-timiru, uddhāiu  $  tamalaṅkāra-ṇaẏaru ṇimisantareṇa saṃpāiu
text.8668: piẏa-viraheṇa rāmu, aï-khāma-khāmu, jhīṇaṅgaü  $  paẏa-maggeṇa teṇa, kantahĕ taṇeṇa, ṇaṃ laggaü
text.8670: dahavaẏaṇu sa-sīẏaü  $  pāṇahã bhīẏaü  $  mañchuḍu ettahĕ ṇaṭṭhu khalu
text.8671: meiṇi viddārĕvi  $  maggu samārĕvi  $  ṇaṃ pāẏālĕ païṭṭhu valu
text.8677: so saṇṇahĕvi suṇḍu pura-vārĕ pariṭṭhiu gahiẏa-paharaṇo
text.8678: jaṃ thakku suṇḍu raṇamuhĕ raüddu  $  uddhāiu rāhava-vala-samuddu
text.8679: ṇavara kalaẏalārāvu uṭṭhiu dohĩ mi seṇṇehĩ abbhiṭṭamāṇehĩ  $  jāẏaṃ ca jujjhaṃ mahā-gondaluddāma-ghorāruṇaṃ mukka-hāhāravaṃ
text.8683: hilihiliẏa-turaṅgam uvvuṇṇa-kaṇṇaṃ calaṃ cañcalaṅgaṃ mahā-dujjaẏaṃ duddharaṃ  $  duṇṇirikkhaṃ mahī-maṇḍalāvatta-dentaṃ haẏāṇaṃ valaṃ
text.8684: huli-hala-musalagga-kontehĩ addhendu-sūlehĩ vāvalla-bhallehĩ ṇārāẏa-sallehĩ  $  bhiṇṇaṃ karālaṃ lalantanta-mālaṃ a-sīsaṃ kavandhaṃ paṇaccāviẏaṃ
text.8692: candaṇahāĕ tāva jujjhantu ṇivāriu ṇiẏaẏa-ṇandaṇo  $  "dīsaï ohu johu khara-dūsaṇa-samvukumāra-maddaṇo
text.8693: jujjhevaü sunda ṇa hoi kajju  $  jīvantahã hosaï aṇṇu rajju
text.8694: vari gampiṇu sura-pañcāṇaṇāsu  $  kūvāraü karahu dasāṇaṇāsu
text.8695: osariu suṇḍu vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa  $  gaü laṅka parāiu takkhaṇeṇa
text.8696: etthu sa-virāhiu païṭṭhu rāmu  $  ṇaṃ kāmiṇi jaṇu mohantu kāmu
text.8698: sāhāru ṇa vandhaï kahi mi rāmu  $  vaïdehi-vioeṃ khāmu khāmu
text.8700: gaü tāma jāma jiṇa-bhavaṇu diṭṭhu  $  pariañcĕvi abbhantarĕ païṭṭhu
text.8702: jiṇavaru ṇijjhāĕvi  $  citteṃ jhāĕvi  $  jāi ṇirāriu viulamaï
text.8703: āhuṭṭhĕhĩ bhāsĕhĩ  $  thotta-sahāsĕhĩ  $  thuaü sa ẏaṃ bhu vaṇāhivaï
text.8705: khara-dūsaṇa gilĕvi candaṇahihĕ titti ṇa jāiẏa
text.8712: ettha ĕ asura-mallĕ sura-ḍāmarĕ  $  laṅkāhivĕ vahu-laddha-mahāvarĕ
text.8716: sīẏaĕ sahu suravara-saṃtāvaṇĕ  $  chuḍu chuḍu laṅka païṭṭhaĕ rāvaṇĕ
text.8717: tahĩ avasarĕ candaṇahi parāiẏa  $  ṇivaḍiẏa kama-kamalĕhĩ duha-ghāiẏa
text.8720: paĩ jīvantaĕṇa  $  ehī avattha haũ pāiẏa"
text.8724: taṃ candaṇahihĕ vaẏaṇu daẏāvaṇu  $  ṇisuṇĕvi thiu heṭṭhāmuhu rāvaṇu
text.8725: ṇaṃ maẏalañchaṇu ṇippahu jāiẏaü  $  giri va davaggi-daḍḍhu vicchāẏaü
text.8726: ṇaṃ muṇivaru cāritta-vibhaṭṭhaü  $  bhaviu va bhava-saṃsārahŏ taṭṭhaü
text.8727: vāha-bharanta-ṇaẏaṇu muha-kāẏaru  $  gahĕṇa gahiu ṇaṃ hūu divāẏaru
text.8728: dukkhu dukkhu dukkheṇāmelliu  $  saẏaṇa-saṇehu sarantu pavolliu
text.8729: "ghāiu jeṇa samvu kharu dūsaṇu  $  taṃ païṭṭhavami ajju jamasāsaṇu
text.8730: ahavaï eṇa kāĩ māhappeṃ  $  ko ṇa maraï apūreṃ mappeṃ
text.8731: dhīrī hohi pamāẏahi soo  $  kāsu ṇa jammaṇa-maraṇa-vioo
text.8733: ko vi ṇa vajjamaü  $  jāeṃ jīveṃ marievaü
text.8738: dhīrĕvi ṇiẏaẏa vahiṇi siẏa-māṇaṇu  $  raẏaṇihĩ gaü sovaṇaĕ dasāṇaṇu
text.8739: vara-pallaṅkĕ caḍiu laṅkesaru  $  ṇaṃ giri-siharĕ maïndu sa-kesaru
text.8740: ṇaṃ visaharu ṇīsāsu muantaü  $  ṇaṃ sajjaṇu khala-kheijjantaü
text.8741: sīẏā-moheṃ mohiu rāvaṇu  $  gāẏaï vāẏaï paḍhaï suhāvaṇu
text.8742: ṇaccaï hasaï viẏārĕhĩ bhajjaï  $  ṇiẏa-bhūahũ ji paḍīvaü lajjaï
text.8744: maẏaṇa-paravvasu eu ṇa jāṇaï  $  jiha saṃgharu karesaï jāṇaï
text.8745: acchaï maẏaṇa-sarĕhĩ jajjariẏaü  $  khara-dūsaṇa-ṇāu mi vīsariẏaü
text.8748: rajju vi jīviu vi  $  viṇu sīẏaĕ savvu ṇiratthaü"
text.8752: tahĩ avasarĕ āiẏa mandovari  $  sīhahŏ pāsu va sīha-kisoẏari
text.8753: vara-gaṇiẏāri va līlā-gāmiṇi  $  piẏamāhaviẏa va mahurālāviṇi
text.8755: kalahaṃsi va thira-manthara-gamaṇī  $  lacchi va tiẏa-rūveṃ jūravaṇī
text.8756: aha pomāṇihĕ aṇuharamāṇī  $  jiha sā tiha eha vi paürāṇī
text.8757: jiha sā tiha eha vi vahu-jāṇī  $  jiha sā tiha eha vi vahu-māṇī
text.8758: jiha sā tiha eha vi sumaṇohara  $  jiha sā tiha eha vi piẏa-sundara
text.8759: jiha sā tiha eha vi jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ  $  jiha sā tiha eha vi ṇa ku-sāsaṇĕ
text.8762: ṇiẏa-paḍichandaĕṇa  $  thiẏa saĩ jĕ ṇāĩ mandoẏari
text.8766: tahĩ pallaṅkĕ caḍĕvi rajjesari  $  pabhaṇiẏa laṅkāpura-paramesari
text.8767: "ahŏ dahamuha dahavaẏaṇa dasāṇaṇa  $  ahŏ dasasira dasāsa siẏa-māṇaṇa
text.8771: jaïẏahũ bhiḍiu raṇaṅgaṇĕ indahŏ  $  jāu kula-kkhaü sajjaṇa-vindahŏ
text.8772: tahĩ vi kālĕ paĩ dukkhu ṇa ṇāẏaü  $  jiha khara-dūsaṇa-maraṇeṃ jāẏaü"
text.8773: bhaṇaï paḍīvaü ṇisiẏara-ṇāho  $  "sundari jaï ṇa karaï avarāho
text.8775: to haũ kahami taü  $  ṇaü khara-dūsaṇa-dukkhu 'cchaï
text.8776: ettiu ḍāhu para  $  jaṃ maĩ vaïdehi ṇa icchaï"
text.8780: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu sasivaẏaṇaĕ  $  puṇu vi hasevi vuttu migaṇaẏaṇaĕ
text.8781: "ahŏ dahagīva jīva-saṃtāvaṇa  $  eu ajuttu vuttu paĩ rāvaṇa
text.8782: kiṃ jagĕ aẏasa-paḍahu apphālahi  $  ubhaẏa visuddha vaṃsa kiṃ maïlahi
text.8783: kiṃ ṇāraïẏahŏ ṇaraĕ ṇa vīhahi  $  para-dhaṇu para-kalattu jaṃ īhahi
text.8784: jiṇavara-sāsaṇĕ pañca viruddhaĩ  $  duggaï jāi ṇinti avisuddhaĩ
text.8785: pahilaü vahu chajjīva-ṇikāẏahũ  $  vīẏaü gammaï micchāvāẏahũ
text.8786: taïẏaü jaṃ para-davvu laïjjaï  $  caütthaü para-kalattu sevijjaï
text.8787: pañcamu ṇaü pamāṇu gharavārahŏ  $  āẏahĩ gammaï bhava-saṃsārahŏ
text.8789: para-loĕ vi ṇa suhu  $  iha-loĕ vi aẏasa-paḍāiẏa
text.8790: sundara hoi ṇa tiẏa  $  ĕẏa-veseṃ jamaüri āiẏa"
text.8794: puṇu puṇu pihula-ṇiẏamva kisoẏari  $  bhaṇaï hiẏattaṇeṇa mandoẏari
text.8795: "jaṃ suhu kālakūḍu visu khantahũ  $  jaṃ suhu palaẏāṇalu païsantahũ
text.8796: jaṃ suhu bhava-saṃsārĕ bhamantahũ  $  jaṃ suhu ṇāraïẏahũ ṇivasantahũ
text.8797: jaṃ suhu jama-sāsaṇu pecchantahũ  $  jaṃ suhu asi-pañjarĕ acchantahũ
text.8798: jaṃ suhu palaẏāṇala-muha-kandarĕ  $  jaṃ suhu pañcāṇaṇa-dāḍhantarĕ
text.8799: jaṃ suhu phaṇi-māṇikku khuḍantahũ  $  taṃ suhu eha ṇāri bhuñjantahũ
text.8800: jāṇanto vi to vi jaï vañchahi  $  to kajjeṇa keṇa maĩ pucchahi
text.8801: taü pāsiu kiṃ koi vi valiẏaü  $  jeṇa purandaro vi paḍikhaliẏaü
text.8803: jaṃ jasu āvaḍaï  $  tahŏ taṃ aṇurāu ṇa bhajjaï
text.8804: jaï vi asundaraü  $  jaṃ pahu karei taṃ chajjaï"
text.8808: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu dahavaẏaṇeṃ  $  pabhaṇiẏa ṇāri virilliẏa-ṇaẏaṇeṃ
text.8810: taïẏahũ diṭṭhu ekku maĩ muṇivaru  $  ṇāuṃ aṇantavīru paramesaru
text.8811: tāsu pāsĕ vaü laïu ṇa bhañjami  $  maṇḍaĕ para-kalattu ṇaü bhuñjami
text.8812: ahavaï eṇa kāĩ mandoari  $  jaï ṇandanti ṇiẏahi laṅkāuri
text.8813: jaï maggahi dhaṇu dhaṇṇu suvaṇṇaü  $  rāulu riddhi-viddhi-saṃpaṇṇaü
text.8814: jaï āruhahi turaṅga-gaïndĕhĩ  $  jaï vandijjaï vandiṇa-vandĕhĩ
text.8815: jaï maggahi ṇikkaṇṭaü rajju  $  jaï kira vi maĩ jiẏantĕṇa kajju
text.8818: to vari jāṇaïhĕ  $  mandoẏari karĕ dūattaṇu"
text.8822: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vaẏaṇu dahavaẏaṇahŏ  $  pabhaṇiẏa mandoẏari puri maẏaṇahŏ
text.8823: "ho ho savvu lou jagĕ dūhaü  $  paĩ melleviṇu aṇṇu ṇa sūhaü
text.8825: eva vi karami tuhāraü vuttaü  $  pahu-chandeṇa ajuttu vi juttaü"
text.8826: e ālāva paropparu jāvĕhĩ  $  raẏaṇihĕ caü paharā haẏa tāvĕhĩ
text.8827: aruṇuggamĕ accanta-kisoẏari  $  sīẏahĕ dūī gaẏa mandoẏari
text.8828: sahũ anteureṇa uddhūsiẏa  $  gaṇiẏāri va gaṇiẏāri-vihūsiẏa
text.8829: vaṇu givvāṇaravaṇu saṃpāiẏa  $  rāhava-ghariṇi tetthu ṇijjhāiẏa
text.8836: rāma-ghariṇi jaṃ diṭṭha kisoẏari  $  harisiẏa ṇiẏa-maṇeṇa mandoẏari
text.8837: "ahiṇava-ṇāri-raẏaṇu avaïṇṇaü  $  eu ṇa jāṇahũ kahĩ uppaṇṇaü
text.8839: sāhu sāhu ṇiuṇo 'si paẏāvaï  $  tuha viṇṇāṇa-satti ko pāvaï
text.8840: aha kiṃ vitthareṇa vahu-vollaĕ  $  saïm kāmo vi paḍaï kāmillaĕ
text.8841: kavaṇu gahaṇu to laṅkā-rāeṃ"  $  ema pasaṃsĕvi maṇĕ aṇurāeṃ
text.8843: "kiṃ vahu-jampieṇa paramesari  $  jīviu ekku sahalu taü sundari
text.8846: kāĩ ṇa atthi taü  $  jahĕ āṇavaḍicchaü rāvaṇu"
text.8851: jaṃ calaṇehĩ ghivahi ārūsĕvi  $  taṃ sīseṇa laẏanti asesa vi
text.8852: aṇṇu vi saẏalu eu anteuru  $  sālaṅkāru sa-doru sa-ṇeuru
text.8854: āẏahũ savvahũ tuhũ paramesari  $  ṇīsāvaṇṇu rajju kari sundari
text.8855: rāvaṇu muĕvi aṇṇu ko caṅgaü  $  rāvaṇu muĕvi kavaṇu taṇu-aṅgaü
text.8856: rāvaṇu muĕvi aṇṇu ko sūraü  $  para-vala-mahaṇu kulāsā-pūraü
text.8857: rāvaṇu muĕvi aṇṇu ko valiẏaü  $  suravara-ṇiẏaru jeṇa paḍikhaliẏaü
text.8858: rāvaṇu muĕvi aṇṇu ko bhallaü  $  jo tihuẏaṇahŏ mallu ekkallaü
text.8859: rāvaṇu muĕvi aṇṇu ko sūhaü  $  jaṃ āpekkhĕvi maẏaṇu vi dūhaü
text.8862: bhuñjahi saẏala mahi  $  mahaevi hohi dahavaẏaṇahŏ"
text.8866: taṃ tahĕ kaḍua-vaẏaṇu āẏaṇṇĕvi  $  rāvaṇu jīviu tiṇa-samu maṇṇĕvi
text.8867: sīla-valeṇa valiẏa ṇaü kampiẏa  $  rūsĕvi ṇiṭṭhura vaẏaṇa pajampiẏa
text.8868: "halĕ halĕ kāĩ kāĩ paĩ vuttaü  $  uttima-ṇārihĕ eu ṇa juttaü
text.8869: kiha daïẏahŏ dūattaṇu kijjaï  $  eṇa ṇāĩ mahu hāsaü dijjaï
text.8870: mañchuḍu tuhũ para-purisa-païddhī  $  teṃ kajjeṃ mahu dehi duvuddhi
text.8871: matthaĕ paḍaü vajju tahŏ jārahŏ  $  haũ puṇu bhattivanta bhattārahŏ"
text.8872: sīẏaĕ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi maṇĕ ḍolliẏa  $  ṇisiẏara-ṇāha-ṇāri paḍivolliẏa
text.8873: "jaï mahaevi-paṭṭu ṇa paḍicchahi  $  jaï laṅkāhiu kaha vi ṇa icchahi
text.8875: to kandanti paĩ  $  tilu tilu karavattĕhĩ kappaï
text.8880: puṇupuṇuruttĕhĩ jaṇaẏahŏ dhīẏaĕ  $  ṇibbhacchiẏa mandoẏari sīẏaĕ
text.8881: "kettiu vāravāra vollijjaï  $  jaṃ cintiu maṇeṇa taṃ kijjaï
text.8882: jaï vi ajju karavattĕhĩ kappahŏ  $  jaï vi dharĕvi siva-sāṇahŏ appahŏ
text.8883: jaï vi valantĕ huāsaṇĕ mellahŏ  $  jaï vi mahaggaẏa-dantĕhĩ pellahŏ
text.8884: to vi khalahŏ tahŏ dukkiẏa-kammahŏ  $  para-purisahŏ ṇivitti iha jammahŏ
text.8885: ekku ji ṇiẏa-bhattāru pahuccaï  $  jo jaẏa-lacchiĕ khaṇu vi ṇa muccaï
text.8895: tāva dasāṇaṇu saẏam evāiu  $  hatthi va gaṅgā-veṇi parāiu
text.8897: karaẏala dhuṇaï jhuṇaï vukkāraï  $  kheḍḍu karevi devi paccāraï
text.8898: "viṇṇattiĕ pasāu paramesari  $  haũ kavaṇeṇa hīṇu sura-sundari
text.8899: kiṃ sohaggeṃ bhoggeṃ ūṇaü  $  kiṃ viruẏaü kiṃ attha-vihūṇaü
text.8900: kiṃ lāvaṇṇeṃ vaṇṇeṃ hīṇaü  $  kiṃ saṃmāṇĕ dāṇĕ raṇĕ dīṇaü
text.8901: kahĕ kajjeṇa keṇa ṇa samicchahi  $  jeṃ mahaevi-paṭṭu ṇa paḍicchahi"
text.8908: jāṇanto vi to vi maṃ mujjhahi  $  geṇhĕvi para-kalattu kahĩ sujjhahi
text.8909: jāma ṇa aẏasa- paḍahu ubbhāsaï  $  jāma ṇa laṅkāṇaẏari viṇāsaï
text.8910: jāma ṇa lakkhaṇa-sīhu virujjhaï  $  jāma ṇa rāma-kiẏantu vivujjhaï
text.8911: jāma ṇa saravara-dhoraṇi sandhaï  $  jāma ṇa toṇā-jualu ṇivandhaï
text.8912: jāva ṇa viẏaḍa-uratthalu bhindaï  $  jāva ṇa vāhu-daṇḍa taü chindaï
text.8913: saravarĕ haṃsu jema dala-vimalaĩ  $  jāva ṇa toḍaï dasa-sira-kamalaïṃ
text.8914: jāma ṇa giddha-panti ṇivvaṭṭaï  $  jāma ṇa ṇisiẏara-valu āvaṭṭaï
text.8915: jāma ṇa darisāvaï dhaẏa-cindhaĩ  $  jāma ṇa raṇĕ ṇaccanti kavandhaĩ
text.8922: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi āruṭṭhu dasāṇaṇu  $  ṇaṃ ghaṇĕ gajjamāṇĕ pañcāṇaṇu
text.8924: "kiṃ jama-sāsaṇa-pantheṃ lāẏami  $  kiṃ uvasaggu kiṃ pi darisāvami
text.8925: avaseṃ bhaẏa-vaseṇa icchesaï  $  mahu maẏaṇaggi samulhāvesaï"
text.8926: tahĩ avasarĕ sa-turaṅgu sa-rahavaru  $  gaü atthavaṇahŏ tāma divāẏaru
text.8927: āẏa ratti ṇāṇāviha-rūvĕhĩ  $  aṭṭahāsa mellantĕhĩ bhūĕhĩ
text.8930: taṃ uvasaggu ṇievi bhaẏāvaṇu  $  to vi ṇa sīẏahĕ saraṇu dasāṇaṇu
text.8931: ghoru raüddu jhāṇu saṃcūrĕvi  $  thiẏa maṇĕ dhamma-jhāṇu āūrĕvi
text.8938: pahaẏa paosa paṇāsĕvi ṇiggaẏa  $  hatthi-haḍa vva sūra-paharāhaẏa
text.8939: ṇisiẏari vva gaẏa ghoṇāvaṅkiẏa  $  bhagga-maḍapphara māṇa-kalaṅkiẏa
text.8940: sūra-bhaeṇa ṇāĩ raṇu mellĕvi  $  païsaï ṇaẏaru kavāḍaĩ pellĕvi
text.8941: dīvā pajjalanti je saẏaṇĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ ṇisi valĕvi ṇihālaï ṇaẏaṇĕhĩ
text.8942: uṭṭhiu ravi aravindāṇandaü  $  ṇaṃ mahi-kāmiṇi-keraü andaü
text.8943: ṇaṃ sañjhāĕ tilaü darisāviu  $  ṇaṃ sukaïhĕ jasa-puñju pahāviu
text.8944: ṇaṃ mambhīsa dentu vala-pattihĕ  $  pacchalĕ ṇāĩ padhāiu rattihĕ
text.8945: ṇaṃ jaga-bhavaṇahŏ vohiu dīvaü  $  ṇāĩ puṇu vi puṇu so jjĕ paḍīvaü
text.8948: uvarĕ paīsarĕvi  $  ṇaṃ sīẏa gavesaï diṇaẏaru
text.8952: raẏaṇihĕ timira-ṇiẏara-raĕ bhaggaĕ  $  ṇiva rāvaṇahŏ āẏa olaggaĕ
text.8954: khara-dūsaṇa-soeṇa ṇaẏāṇaṇa  $  ṇaṃ ṇikkesara vara pañcāṇaṇa
text.8955: ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-āsaṇehĩ thiẏa avicala  $  bhagga-visāṇa ṇāĩ vara maẏagala
text.8956: manti-mahallaehĩ etthantarĕ  $  ṇisuṇiẏa sīẏa ruanti paḍantarĕ
text.8957: bhaṇaï vihīsaṇu "ĕhu ko rovaï  $  vāravāra appāṇaü soaï
text.8958: ṇāvaï para-kalattu vicchoiu"  $  puṇu dahavaẏaṇahŏ vaẏaṇu pajoiu
text.8959: "mañchuḍu eu kammu tuha keraü  $  aṇṇahŏ kāsu cittu vivareraü"
text.8960: taṃ ṇisuṇevi sīẏa āsāsiẏa  $  kalaẏaṇṭhi vi piẏa-vaẏaṇĕhĩ bhāsiẏa
text.8961: "ĕhu dujjaṇahŏ majjhĕ ko sajjaṇu  $  ṇimva-vaṇahŏ abbhantarĕ candaṇu
text.8964: jo maĩ dhīravaï  $  evaḍḍu kāsu sa ïṃ bhu va-valu"
text.8966: puṇu vi vihīsaṇĕṇa duvvaẏaṇĕhĩ rāvaṇu docchaï
text.8971: "akkhahi sundari vatta ṇibhantī  $  kahĩ āṇiẏa tuhũ etthu ruvantī
text.8972: kāsu dhīẏa kahi ko tumhahã paï"  $  avakha vahantu vihīsaṇu jampaï
text.8973: "kavaṇu sasuru kahi ko tuha devaru  $  atthi pasiddhaü ko tuha bhāẏaru
text.8974: sappariẏaṇa kahi tuhũ ekkallī  $  akkhahi kema vaṇantarĕ bhullī
text.8975: keṃ kajjĕṇa vaṇavāsu païṭṭhī  $  cakkesarĕṇa kema tuhũ diṭṭhī
text.8976: kiṃ māṇusi kiṃ kheẏara-ṇandiṇī  $  kiṃ kusīla kiṃ sīlahŏ bhāẏaṇi
text.8977: aṇṇu vi kavaṇu tumha desantaru  $  kahahi viẏārĕvi ṇiẏaẏa-kahantaru"
text.8978: ema vihīsaṇa-vaẏaṇu suṇeviṇu  $  lagga kahevvaĕ jima ṇisuṇaï jaṇu
text.8981: haũ sīẏāevi  $  jaṇaẏahŏ sua gehiṇi valahŏ
text.8985: vandhĕvi rāẏa-paṭṭu bharahesahŏ  $  tiṇṇi vi saṃcalliẏa vaṇavāsahŏ
text.8986: sīhoẏarahŏ maḍappharu bhañjĕvi  $  dasaüra-ṇāhahŏ ṇiẏa-maṇu rañjĕvi
text.8987: puṇu kallāṇamāla mambhīsĕvi  $  ṇammaẏa mellĕvi viñjhu paīsĕvi
text.8988: ruddabhutti ṇiẏa-calaṇĕhĩ pāḍĕvi  $  vālikhillu ṇiẏa-ṇaẏarahŏ dhāḍĕvi
text.8989: rāmaürihĩ caü māsa vaseppiṇu  $  dharaṇīdharahŏ dhīẏa pariṇeppiṇu
text.8991: tetthu vi pañca paḍicchĕvi sattiu  $  sattudavaṇu masi-vaṇṇu pavittiu
text.8992: puṇu tahŏ taṇiẏa dhīẏa pariṇeppiṇu  $  muṇi-jualahŏ uvasaggu hareppiṇu
text.9001: pakkhihĕ pakkha suvaṇṇa samārĕvi  $  samvukumāru vīru saṃghārĕvi
text.9002: acchahũ jāva tetthu vaṇa-kīlaĕ  $  ekka kumāri āẏa ṇīẏa-līlaĕ
text.9003: pāsu paḍhukkiẏa kariṇi va kariṇahŏ  $  puṇu ṇillajja bhaṇaï "maĩ pariṇahŏ"
text.9004: vala-ṇārāẏaṇehĩ uvalakkhiẏa  $  puṇu thovantarĕ jāẏa vilakkhiẏa
text.9005: gaẏa khara-dūsaṇāhũ kūvārĕhĩ  $  bhiḍiẏa te vi sahũ samarĕ kumārĕhĩ
text.9007: kiṃ mukku ṇa mukku  $  sīha-ṇāu raṇĕ lakkhaṇĕṇa
text.9008: taṃ saddu suṇevi  $  rāmu padhāiu takkhaṇĕṇa
text.9012: gaü lakkhaṇahŏ gavesaü jāvĕhĩ  $  haũ avahariẏa ṇisindeṃ tāvĕhĩ
text.9013: ajju vi jaṇa-maṇa-ṇaẏaṇāṇandahŏ  $  pāsu ṇehu maĩ rāhavacandahŏ"
text.9015: cittu vihīsaṇa-rāẏahŏ ḍolliu  $  "tumhĕhĩ suẏaü suẏaü jaṃ volliu
text.9016: te haũ āu āsi viṇivāĕvi  $  ṇavara jiẏanti bhanti uppāĕvi
text.9017: ḍhukku pamāṇahŏ muṇivara-bhāsiu  $  jiha "khaü lakkhaṇa-rāmahŏ pāsiu"
text.9018: eva vi karahi mahāraü vuttaü  $  uttima-purisahũ eu ṇa juttaü
text.9019: ekku viṇāsu aṇṇu lajjijjaï  $  dhiddhikkāru loĕ pāvijjaï
text.9026: rāvaṇā je ramanti paradāraĩ  $  dukkhaĩ te pāvanti apāraĩ
text.9027: jahĩ te satta ṇaraẏa bhaẏa-bhīsaṇa  $  hasahasahasahasanta sa-huvāsaṇa
text.9030: tahĩ asarālu kālu acchevaü  $  pahilaĕ uvahi-pamāṇu jivevaü
text.9031: tiṇṇi satta vīsaddha raüddaĩ  $  sattāraha vāvīsa samuddaĩ
text.9033: jo puṇu ṇaraü ṇigou suṇijjaï  $  meiṇi jāva tāva tahĩ chijjaï
text.9034: teṃ kajjeṃ para-dāru ṇa rammaï  $  taṃ kijjaï jaṃ sugaïhĩ gammaï"
text.9037: tihũ khaṇḍahũ majjhĕ  $  akkhu parāiẏa kavaṇa tiẏa"
text.9041: to avaheri karevi vihīsaṇĕ  $  caḍiu mahaggaĕ tijagavihūṣaṇĕ
text.9042: sīẏa vi puppha-vimāṇĕ caḍāviẏa  $  paṭṭaṇĕ haṭṭa-soha darisāviẏa
text.9045: sundari pekkhu pekkhu caü-vāraĩ  $  ṇaṃ kāmiṇi-vaẏaṇaĩ sa-viẏāraĩ
text.9046: sundari pekkhu pekkhu dhaẏa-chattaĩ  $  papphuliẏaĩ ṇāĩ saẏavattaĩ
text.9047: sundari pekkhu mahāraü rāulu  $  hīra-gahaṇu maṇi-khambha-ramāulu
text.9048: sundari karahi mahāraü vuttaü  $  laï cūḍaü kaṇṭhaü kaḍisuttaü
text.9049: sundari kari pasāu laï celiu  $  cīṇaü lāḍu ghoḍu harikeliu
text.9051: mahu jīviu dehi  $  vollahi vaẏaṇu suhāvaṇaü
text.9056: sampaï dakkhavantu iẏa sejjaĕ  $  docchiu rāvaṇu rāhava-bhajjaĕ
text.9057: "kettiu ṇiẏaẏa-riddhi mahu dāvahi  $  appaü jaṇahŏ majjhĕ darisāvahi
text.9058: eu jaṃ rāvaṇa rajju tuhāraü  $  taṃ mahu tiṇa-samāṇu haluāraü
text.9059: eu jaṃ paṭṭaṇu somu sudaṃsaṇu  $  taṃ mahu maṇahŏ ṇāĩ jamasāsaṇu
text.9060: eu jaṃ rāulu ṇaẏaṇa-suhaṅkaru  $  taṃ mahu ṇāĩ masāṇu bhaẏaṅkaru
text.9061: eu jaṃ dāvahi khaṇĕ khaṇĕ jovvaṇu  $  taṃ mahu maṇahŏ ṇāĩ visa-bhoẏaṇu
text.9062: eu jaṃ kaṇṭhaü kaḍaü sa-mehalu  $  sīla-vihūṇahã taṃ malu kevalu
text.9063: rahavara-turaẏa-gaïnda-saẏāi mi  $  āẏahĩ mahu puṇu gaṇṇu ṇa kāi mi
text.9065: saggeṇa vi kāĩ  $  jahĩ cārittahŏ khaṇḍaṇaü
text.9066: kiṃ samalahaṇeṇa  $  mahu puṇu sīlu jĕ maṇḍaṇaü"
text.9070: jiha jiha cintiẏa āsa ṇa pūraï  $  tiha tiha rāvaṇu hiẏaĕ visūraï
text.9071: "vihi tettaḍaü dei jaṃ vihiẏaü  $  kiṃ vaḍha jāi ṇilāḍaĕ lihiẏaü
text.9072: haũ kammeṇa keṇa saṃkhohiu  $  jāṇanto vi to vi jaṃ mohiu
text.9073: dhidhi ahilasiẏa kuṇāri vilīṇī  $  vuṇṇa-kuraṅgi jema muha-dīṇī
text.9074: āẏahĕ pāsiu jāu su-vesaü  $  mahu gharĕ atthi aṇeẏaü vesaü"
text.9075: eva vicittu cittu sāhārĕvi  $  dukkhu dukkhu maṇa-pasaru ṇivārĕvi
text.9076: sīẏaĕ samaü kheḍḍu āmellĕvi  $  taṃ givvāṇaramaṇu vaṇu mellĕvi
text.9077: ṇaravara-vindĕhĩ parimiu dahamuhu  $  saṃcalliu ṇiẏa-ṇaẏarihĕ ahimuhu
text.9084: ṇaṃ dharu dharahĕ gabbhu ṇīsariẏaü  $  sattahĩ uvavaṇehĩ pariẏariẏaü
text.9085: pahilaü vaṇu ṇāmeṇa païṇṇaü  $  sajjaṇa-hiẏaü jema vitthiṇṇaü
text.9087: taïẏaü vaṇu suhaseu suhāvaü  $  jiṇavara-sāsaṇu ṇāĩ sa-sāvaü
text.9090: chaṭṭhaü vaṇu ṇāmeṇa ṇivohaü  $  mahuara-ruṇuruṇṭantu susohaü
text.9091: sattamu vaṇu sīẏalu sacchāẏaü  $  pamaüjjāṇu ṇāma-vikkhāẏaü
text.9103: tahĩ paesĕ vaïdehi ṭhaveppiṇu gaü dasāṇaṇo
text.9108: chohĕ chohĕ ṇivaḍantaĕ jūāro vva jūrae
text.9109: siru dhuṇei kara moḍaï aṅgu valei kampae
text.9114: cāmarehĩ vijjijjaï to vi maṇeṇa jhijjae
text.9116: kiṃ rāvaṇu ekku  $  jo jo garuaĩ gajjiẏaü
text.9117: jiṇa-dhavalu muevi  $  kāmeṃ ko ṇa parajjiẏaü
text.9121: thiĕ dasāṇaṇe viraha-bhimbhalĕ  $  jāẏa cinta vara-manti-maṇḍalĕ
text.9122: "etthu mallu ko kuiĕ lakkhaṇe  $  siddhu jāsu asi-raẏaṇu takkhaṇe
text.9123: ṇihaü samvu jeṃ dūṣaṇo kharo  $  hoi ku-i ṇa sāvaṇṇu so ṇaro"
text.9124: bhaṇaï manti sahasamaï-ṇāmĕṇaṃ  $  "kavaṇu gahaṇu ekkeṇa rāmĕṇaṃ
text.9125: lakkhaṇeṇa saha sāhaṇeṇa vā  $  raha-turaṅga-gaẏavāhaṇeṇa vā
text.9127: rāvaṇassa pavalaṃ valaṃ mahā  $  atthi vīra ekkekka dūsahā
text.9128: kiṃ mueṇa dūsaṇĕṇa samvuṇā  $  sāẏaro kim ohaṭṭu vinduṇā"
text.9130: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi  $  vihasĕvi pañcāmuhu bhaṇaï
text.9131: "kiṃ vuccaï ekku  $  jo ekku jĕ sahasaĩ haṇaï
text.9135: aṇṇuĕ ṇisua vatta maĩ ehiẏa  $  rāvaṇa-mandirĕ ṇīsandehiẏa
text.9136: je je ṇaravaï ke-i kaïddhaẏa  $  jamvava-ṇala-suggīvaṅgaṅgaẏa
text.9138: taṃ ṇisuṇevi dasāṇaṇa-bhicceṃ  $  vuccaï pañcāmuhu māricceṃ
text.9139: "eha ajutta vatta paĩ akkhiẏa  $  rāvaṇu muĕvi ṇa aṇṇahŏ pakkhiẏa
text.9140: kā vi aṇaṅgakusuma valavantahŏ  $  diṇṇi khareṇa dhīẏa haṇuvantahŏ
text.9141: taṃ kiṃ māma-vaïru vīsariẏaü  $  jeṃ paḍivakkha milaï bhaẏa-ḍariẏaü"
text.9142: to etthantare bhaṇaï vihīsaṇu  $  "kettiu cavahu vaẏaṇu suṇṇāsaṇu
text.9143: evahĩ so uvāu cintijjaï  $  laṅkā-ṇāhu jeṇa rakkhijjaï"
text.9144: ema bhaṇevi caüddisu tāḍiẏa  $  purĕ āsāliẏa vijja bhamāḍiẏa
text.9146: tiẏasahu mi dulaṅghu  $  diḍhu māẏā-pāẏāru kiu
text.9147: ṇīsaṅku ṇisindu  $  rajju sa ẏaṃ bhu ñjantu thiu
text.9155: ehaĕ avasarĕ kikkindhapurĕ ṇaṃ gaü gaẏahŏ samāvaḍiu
text.9160: paḍivakkhu jiṇevi ṇa sakkiẏaü  $  viddāṇaü māṇa-kalaṅkiẏaü
text.9161: ṇaṃ hiẏavaĕ sūleṃ salliẏaü  $  māẏā-suggīveṃ ghalliẏaü
text.9162: suggīu bhamantu vaṇeṇa vaṇu  $  saṃpāiu khara-dūsaṇahã raṇu
text.9163: valu diṭṭhu saẏalu sara-jajjariu  $  tila-mettu khuruppĕhĩ kappariu
text.9164: katthaï sandaṇa saẏa-khaṇḍa kiẏa  $  katthaï turaṅga ṇijjīva thiẏa
text.9165: katthavi loṭṭāviẏa hatthi-haḍa  $  katthaï saüṇĕhĩ khajjanti bhaḍa
text.9166: katthaï chiṇṇaĩ dhaẏa-cindhāĩ  $  katthaï ṇaccanti kavandhāĩ
text.9169: taṃ tehaü kikkindhesarĕṇa  $  bhaẏa-bhīsāvaṇu diṭṭhu raṇu
text.9174: raṇu bhīsaṇu jaṃ jĕ ṇiẏacchiẏaü  $  khara-dūsaṇa-pariẏaṇu pucchiẏaü
text.9175: "imu kāĩ mahantaü accariu  $  valu saẏalu keṇa sara-jajjariu"
text.9176: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi dūmiẏa-maṇĕṇa  $  vuccaï khara-dūsaṇa-pariẏaṇeṇa
text.9177: "kŏ vi dasarahu tahŏ sua veṇṇi jaṇa  $  vaṇa-vāsĕ païṭṭha visaṇṇa-maṇa
text.9178: somitti ko vi citteṇa thiru  $  teṃ samvukumārahŏ khuḍiu siru
text.9179: asi-raẏaṇu laïu tiẏasahũ valiu  $  candaṇahihĕ jovvaṇu daramaliu
text.9181: abbhiṭṭa te vi sahũ lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  teṇa vi dohāviẏa takkhaṇĕṇa
text.9183: keṇa vi maṇĕ amarisa-kuddhaĕṇa  $  hiẏa gehiṇi vaṇĕ rāhavahŏ
text.9184: pāḍiu jaḍāi laggantu kuḍhĕ  $  ettiu kāraṇu āhavahŏ"
text.9189: "kira païsami gampi jāhũ saraṇu  $  kiu daïveṃ tahu mi ṇavara maraṇu
text.9190: ehaĕ avasarĕ ko saṃbharami  $  kiṃ haṇuahŏ saraṇu paīsarami
text.9191: teṇa vi riu jiṇĕvi ṇa sakkiẏaü  $  paccelliu haũ ṇiratthu kiẏaü
text.9192: kiṃ abbhatthijjaï dahavaẏaṇu  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ tiẏa-lampaḍu luddha-maṇu
text.9193: amhaĩ viṇivāĕvi ve vi jaṇa  $  sahũ rajjeṃ appuṇu lei dhaṇa
text.9196: "taṃ gampi virāhiu ema bhaṇu  $  vuccaï suggīu āu saraṇu"
text.9198: pāẏāla-laṅka-purĕ païsarĕvi  $  teṃ vuttu virāhiu jokkarĕvi
text.9201: kiṃ païsaraü kiṃ ma païsaraü  $  tumhahã saraṇu samalliẏaü"
text.9206: "haũ dhaṇṇaü jasu kikkindharāu  $  ahimāṇu mueppiṇu pāsu āu"
text.9207: saṃmāṇiu gaü pallaṭṭu dūu  $  païsāriu pahu āṇandu hūu
text.9208: taṃ tūrahã saddu suṇevi teṇa  $  so vuttu virāhiu rāhaveṇa
text.9209: "sahũ sāhaṇeṇa kaṇṭaïẏa-dehu  $  āvantaü dīsaï kavaṇu ehu"
text.9211: "suggīva-vāli iẏa bhāi ve vi  $  vaḍḍāraü gaü pavvajja levi
text.9212: ehu vi jiṇevi keṇa vi khaleṇa  $  vaṇa-vāsahŏ ghalliu bhua-valeṇa
text.9215: jo suvvaï kahi mi kahāṇaĕhĩ  $  ĕhu so kikkindhāhivaï"
text.9219: sa-virāhiẏa lakkhaṇa-rāmaeva  $  vollanti paropparu jāva eva
text.9220: tiṇṇi mi suggīveṃ diṭṭha kema  $  āgamĕṇa tiloa tivāẏa jema
text.9221: caü disa-gaẏa ekkahĩ miliẏa ṇāĩ  $  vaïsāriẏa ṇaravaï jamvavāi
text.9222: saṃmāṇĕvi pucchiẏa lakkhaṇeṇa  $  "tumhahã avahariu kalattu keṇa"
text.9223: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi savvahũ mahantu  $  ṇamiẏāṇaṇu pabhaṇaï jamvavantu
text.9224: "vaṇa-kīlaĕ gaü suggīu jāma  $  thiu païsĕvi viḍasuggīu tāma
text.9226: ṇaü jāṇiu viṇhi mi kavaṇu rāu  $  maṇĕ vimbhaü savvahŏ jaṇahŏ jāu
text.9229: valu addhaü suggīvahŏ taṇaü  $  māẏāsuggīvahŏ miliu
text.9233: ettahĕ vi satta akkhohaṇīu  $  ettahĕ vi satta akkhohaṇīu
text.9234: thiu sāhaṇu addhovaddhi hovi  $  aṅgaṅgaẏa vihaḍiẏa suhaḍa ve vi
text.9235: māẏāsuggīvahŏ miliu aṅgu  $  aṅgaü suggīvahŏ raṇĕ abhaṅgu
text.9236: vihĩ simirĕhĩ ve vi sahanti bhāi  $  ṇisi-divasĕhĩ candāicca ṇāĩ
text.9237: ettahĕ vi vīru vipphuriẏa-vaẏaṇu  $  suu vālihĕ ṇāmeṃ candakiraṇu
text.9238: thiu tārahĕ rakkhaṇu abhaü devi  $  "jaï ḍhukkahŏ to mahu marahŏ ve vi"
text.9239: jujjhantu jiṇesaï jo jji ajju  $  tahŏ saẏalu sa-tāraü demi rajju"
text.9240: vihĩ ekku vi ṇaü païsāru lahaï  $  ṇala-ṇīlahũ puṇu suggīu kahaï
text.9241: "saccaü āhāṇaü ehu āu  $  paraẏāriu jji ghara-sāmi jāu"
text.9242: asahanta paropparu ḍhukka ve vi  $  ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-karavālaĩ karĕhĩ levi
text.9244: kira jāma bhiḍanti bhiḍanti ṇa vi  $  tāva ṇivāriẏa vāraĕhĩ
text.9245: mukkaṅkusa matta gaïnda jiha  $  osāriẏa kaṇṇāraĕhĩ
text.9249: osāriẏa jaṃ puravara-jaṇeṇa  $  thiẏa ṇaẏarahŏ uttara-dāhiṇeṇa
text.9250: aṇṇekka-diẏahĕ jujjhanti jāma  $  pavaṇañjaẏa-ṇandaṇu kuviu tāma
text.9251: "maru maru suggīvahŏ maliu māṇu"  $  saṇṇaddhu suhaḍa-sāhaṇa-samāṇu
text.9252: "haṇu haṇu" bhaṇantu haṇuvantu pattu  $  pabhaṇaï ṇiru rahasucchaliẏa-gattu
text.9253: "suggīva māma mā maṇĕṇa mujjhu  $  viḍa-bhaḍahŏ padīvaü dehi jujjhu
text.9254: jaï ṇa vi bhañjami bhuja-daṇḍu tāsu  $  to ṇa homi puttu pavaṇañjaẏāsu"
text.9255: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi kikkindharāu  $  tahŏ uppari galagajjantu āu
text.9256: te bhiḍiẏa ve vi kaṇṭaïẏa-deha  $  ṇava-pāusĕ ṇaṃ jala-bhariẏa-meha
text.9259: haṇuvanteṃ aṇṇāṇeṇa jiha  $  appaü paru vi ṇa vujjhiẏaü
text.9263: jaṃ vihi mi majjhĕ ekku vi ṇa ṇāu  $  gaü valĕvi paḍīvaü pavaṇajāu
text.9264: suggīu vi pāṇa laevi ṇaṭṭhu  $  ṇaṃ maẏagalu kesari-ghāẏa-taṭṭhu
text.9265: kira païsaï khara-dūsaṇahã saraṇu  $  kiu ṇavara kiẏanteṃ tahu mi maraṇu
text.9266: tahĩ ṇisuṇiẏa tumhahã taṇiẏa vatta  $  jiha caüdaha sahasekkahŏ samatta
text.9267: to vari suggīvahŏ karĕ paritta  $  saraṇāiu rakkhahi parama-mitta"
text.9268: jaṃ hari abbhatthiu jamvaveṇa  $  suggīu vuttu puṇu rāhaveṇa
text.9269: "tuhũ maĩ āsaṅghĕvi āu pāsu  $  akkhahi haũ saraṇaü jāmi kāsu
text.9270: jiha tuhũ tiha haü mi kalatta-rahiu  $  vaṇĕ hiṇḍami kāma-gaheṇa gahiu"
text.9272: suggīveṃ vuccaï "deva suṇĕ  $  kusala-vatta sīẏahĕ taṇiẏa
text.9273: jaï ṇāṇami to sattamaĕ diṇĕ  $  païsami salahã huāsaṇiẏa"
text.9277: jaṃ jāṇaï-keraü laïu ṇāmu  $  taṃ viraha-visanthulu bhaṇaï rāmu
text.9278: "jaï āṇahi kantahĕ taṇiẏa vatta  $  to vaẏaṇu mahāraü ṇisuṇi mitta
text.9279: sattamĕ divasĕ ettaḍaü vujjhu  $  karĕ lāẏami tārāevi tujjhu
text.9281: aṇṇu mi tuha keraü haṇami sattu  $  parirakkhaï jaï vi kiẏanta-mittu
text.9282: vambhāṇu bhāṇu gaṅgāhiseu  $  aṅgāraü sasaharu rāhu keu
text.9283: vuhu vihaphaï sukku saṇiccharo vi  $  jamu varuṇu kuveru purandaro vi
text.9284: ettiẏa milevi rakkhanti jo vi  $  jīvantu ṇa chuṭṭaï vaïri to vi
text.9286: jaï païja ṇa pūrami ettaḍiẏa  $  jaï ṇa karami sajjaṇahã dihi
text.9287: sattamaĕ divasĕ suggīva mahu  $  pattiẏa to saṇṇāsa-vihi"
text.9291: sīrāuhu païjārūḍhu jaṃ jĕ  $  saṃcallu asesu vi simiru taṃ jĕ
text.9292: saṃcallu virāhiu duṇṇivāru  $  suggīu rāmu lakkhaṇa-kumāru
text.9293: te caliẏa cāẏari vi parama-mitta  $  ṇāvaï kali-kāla-kaẏanta-mitta
text.9294: ṇaṃ caliẏa cāẏari vi disa-gaïnda  $  ṇaṃ caliẏa cāẏari vi khaẏa-samudda
text.9295: ṇaṃ caliẏa cāẏari vi sura-ṇikāẏa  $  ṇaṃ caliẏa cavala caüviha kasāẏa
text.9296: ṇaṃ caliẏa cāẏari viriñca-veẏa  $  uvadāṇa-daṇḍa ṇaṃ sāma-bheẏa
text.9297: aha vaṇṇieṇa kiṃ ettaḍeṇa  $  ṇaṃ caliẏa cāẏari vi appaṇeṇa
text.9300: suggīveṃ rāmeṃ lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  giri kikkindhu vihāviẏaü
text.9301: pihimiĕ uccāĕvi sira-kamalu  $  maüḍu ṇāĩ darisāviẏaü
text.9306: ṇaṃ ṇahaẏalu tārā-maṇḍiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ kavvu kaïddhaẏa-caḍḍiẏaü
text.9307: ṇaṃ haṇua-vihūsiu muha-kamalu  $  vihasiu saẏavattu ṇāĩ sa-ṇalu
text.9308: ṇaṃ ṇīlālaṅkiu āharaṇu  $  ṇaṃ kunda-pasāhiu viula-vaṇu
text.9309: suggīva-vantu ṇaṃ haṃsa-siru  $  ṇaṃ jhāṇu muṇindahũ taṇaü thiru
text.9315: veḍhijjaï taṃ kikkindhapuru  $  ṇaṃ ravi-maṇḍalu ṇava-ghaṇĕhĩ
text.9319: veḍheppiṇu paṭṭaṇu ṇiravasesu  $  paṭṭhaviu dūu viḍa-bhaḍahŏ pāsu
text.9320: suggīveṃ rāmeṃ lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  sandesaü pesiu takkhaṇĕṇa
text.9321: "kiṃ vahuṇā kahĕ paramatthu tāsu  $  jima bhiḍu jima pāṇa laevi ṇāsu"
text.9322: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi kappūracandu  $  saṃcallu ṇāĩ khaẏakāla-daṇḍu
text.9323: dujjaü māẏā-suggīu jetthu  $  saha-maṇḍavĕ dūu païṭṭhu tetthu
text.9324: jo pesiu rāmeṃ lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  sandesaü akkhiu takkhaṇĕṇa
text.9325: "ṇaü ṇāsaï ajju vi eu kajju  $  kahŏ taṇiẏa tāra kahŏ taṇaü rajju
text.9326: pahu pāṇa laeppiṇu ṇāsu ṇāsu  $  jīvantu ṇa chuṭṭahi avasu tāsu
text.9328: sandesaü viḍa-suggīva suṇĕ  $  puṇaravi suggīvahŏ taṇaü
text.9329: sahũ sira-kamaleṇa tuhāraĕṇa  $  rajju laevvaü appaṇaü"
text.9333: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi vaẏaṇubbhaḍĕṇa  $  āruṭṭheṃ duṭṭheṃ viḍa-bhaḍĕṇa
text.9335: pāvahŏ muṇḍāvahŏ sira-kamalu  $  sahu ṇāseṃ chindahŏ bhua-jualu
text.9336: dūahŏ dūattaṇu dakkhavahŏ  $  pāhuṇaü kaẏantahŏ paṭṭhavahŏ"
text.9337: pahu mantihĩ dukkhu ṇivāriẏaü  $  suggīva-dūu gaü khāriẏaü
text.9338: ettahĕ vi ṇarindu ṇa saṃthiẏaü  $  ṇiẏa-sandaṇa-vīḍhĕ pariṭṭhiẏaü
text.9339: saṇṇahĕvi sa-sāhaṇu ṇīsariu  $  paccakkhu ṇāĩ jamu avaẏariu
text.9342: suggīvahŏ rāmahŏ lakkhaṇahŏ  $  viḍa-suggīu gampi bhiḍiu
text.9343: hemantahŏ gimbhahŏ pāusahŏ  $  ṇaṃ dukkālu samāvaḍiu
text.9347: abbhiṭṭaĩ veṇṇi mi sāhaṇāĩ  $  jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha harisiẏa-maṇāĩ
text.9348: jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha aṇurattāĩ  $  jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha para-tattāĩ
text.9349: jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha kalaẏala-karaĩ  $  jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha melliẏa-saraïṃ
text.9350: jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha ḍasiẏāharaĩ  $  jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha sara-jajjaraĩ
text.9351: jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha jujjhāuraĩ  $  6. jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha accubbhaḍaĩ  $  jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha vihaḍapphaḍaĩ
text.9352: jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha ṇiru veviẏaĩ  $  jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha pāseiẏaĩ
text.9353: jiha mihuṇaĩ tiha ṇicceṭṭhiẏaĩ  $  ṇipphandaĩ jujjhantaĩ thiẏaïm
text.9355: tehaĕ avasarĕ viṇṇi vi valaĩ  $  osāriẏaĩ mahallaĕhĩ
text.9360: etthantarĕ simiraĩ pariharevi  $  khattiẏa khatteṃ abbhiṭṭa ve vi
text.9361: suggīveṃ viḍasuggīu vuttu  $  "jiha māẏā-kavaḍeṃ rajju bhuttu
text.9362: khala khudda pisuṇa tiha thāhi thāhi  $  kahĩ gammaï rahavaru vāhi vāhi"
text.9364: "kiṃ uttima-purisahũ ehu maggu  $  maṇu asaïhĕ jiha saẏa-vāra bhaggu
text.9365: jujjhantu ṇa lajjahi to vi dhiṭṭha  $  raṇĕ pāḍiu pāḍiu lehi ceṭṭha"
text.9366: asahanta paropparu vāvaranti  $  ṇaṃ palaẏa-mahāghaṇa uttharanti
text.9367: puṇu vāṇĕhĩ puṇu taru-girivarehĩ  $  karavālĕhĩ sūlĕhĩ moggarehĩ
text.9369: māẏāsuggīveṃ kuddhaĕṇa  $  laüḍi bhamāḍĕvi mukka kiha
text.9370: suggīvahŏ gampiṇu sira-kamalĕ  $  mahiharĕ paḍiẏa caḍakka jiha
text.9374: pāḍiu suggīu gaẏāsaṇiĕ  $  kulapavvaü ṇaṃ vajjāsaṇiĕ
text.9375: viṇivāiu kira ṇijjīu thiu  $  riu-sāhaṇĕ tūra-vamālu kiu
text.9376: ettahĕ vi su-tārahĕ pāṇa-piu  $  uccāĕvi rāmahŏ rāmahŏ pāsu ṇiu
text.9377: vaïdehi-daïu viṇṇattu lahu  $  "paĩ honteṃ ehāvattha mahu"
text.9378: rāhavĕṇa vuttu "haũ kiṃ karami  $  ko mārami ko kira pariharami
text.9379: veṇṇi mi samaraṅgaṇĕ atula-vala  $  veṇṇi mi dujjaẏa vijjahĩ pavala
text.9380: veṇṇi mi viṇṇāṇa-karaṇa-kusala  $  viṇṇi vi thira-thora-vāhu-juala
text.9381: veṇṇi vi viẏaḍuṇṇaẏa-vacchaẏala  $  veṇṇi vi papphulliẏa-muha-kamala
text.9383: saẏalu vi sohaï suggīva taü  $  jaṃ vollahi avamāṇiẏaü
text.9384: mahu diṭṭhiĕ kula-vahuāĕ jiha  $  khalu para-purisu ṇa jāṇiẏaü"
text.9388: maṇu dhīrĕvi suggīvahŏ taṇaü  $  avaloiu dhaṇuharu appaṇaü
text.9389: sukalattu jema supaṇāmi[ẏa]ü  $  sukalattu jema āẏāmiẏaü
text.9390: sukalattu jema diḍha-guṇa-ghaṇaü  $  sukalattu jema koḍḍāvaṇaü
text.9391: sukalattu jema ṇivvūḍha-bharu  $  sukalattu jema para-ṇippasaru
text.9392: sukalattu jema saïvarĕ gahiu  $  gharĕ jaṇaẏahŏ jaṇaẏa-suaĕ sahiu
text.9393: taṃ vajjāvattu hatthĕ caḍiu  $  apphāliu disahĩ ṇāĩ raḍiu
text.9394: ṇaṃ kāleṃ palaẏa-kālĕ hasiu  $  ṇaṃ juẏa-khaĕ sāẏareṇa rasiu
text.9395: ṇaṃ paḍiẏa caḍakka khaḍakka-ẏalĕ  $  bhaḍa kampiẏa viḍasuggīva-valĕ
text.9397: taṃ bhīsaṇu cāva-saddu suṇĕvi  $  keli va vāeṃ tharahariẏa
text.9398: para-purisu rameppiṇu asaï jiha  $  vijja sarīrahŏ ṇīsariẏa
text.9403: ṇaṃ ṇiddhaṇu mukku vilāsiṇiĕ  $  ṇaṃ vara-maẏalañchaṇu rohiṇiĕ
text.9404: ṇaṃ suravaï parisesiu saïĕ  $  ṇaṃ rāhaü sīẏa-mahāsaïĕ
text.9405: ṇaṃ maẏaṇa-rāu melliu raïĕ  $  ṇaṃ pāva-piṇḍu sāsaẏa-gaïĕ
text.9406: ṇaṃ visamaṇaẏaṇu himapavvaïĕ  $  dharaṇendu ṇāĩ paümāvaïĕ
text.9407: ṇiẏa-vijjaĕ jaṃ avamāṇiẏaü  $  sahasagaï paẏaḍu jaṇĕ jāṇiẏaü
text.9408: jaṃ vihaḍiu suggīvahŏ taṇaü  $  valu miliu paḍīvaü appaṇaü
text.9409: ekkallaü pekkhĕvi vaïri thiu  $  valaeveṃ sara-sandhāṇu kiu
text.9412: viṇibhiṇṇu kavaḍasuggīu raṇĕ  $  paccāhāru jema vuhĕhĩ
text.9416: riu ṇivaḍiu sarĕhĩ viẏāriẏaü  $  suggīu vi purĕ païsāriẏaü
text.9417: jaẏa-maṅgala-tūra-ṇighosu kiu  $  sahũ tāraĕ rajju karantu thiu
text.9418: ettahĕ vi rāmu parituṭṭha-maṇu  $  ṇiviseṇa parāiu jiṇa-bhavaṇu
text.9420: "jaẏa tuhũ gaï tuhũ maï tuhũ saraṇu  $  tuhũ māẏa vappu tuhũ vandhu-jaṇu
text.9421: tuhũ parama-pakkhu paramatti-haru  $  tuhũ savvahũ parahũ parāhiparu
text.9422: tuhũ daṃsaṇĕ ṇāṇĕ carittĕ thiu  $  tuhũ saẏala-surāsurehĩ ṇamiu
text.9423: siddhantĕ mantĕ tuhũ vāẏaraṇĕ  $  sajjhāĕ jhāṇĕ tuhũ tava-caraṇĕ
text.9425: arahantu vuddhu tuhũ hari haru vi  $  tuhũ aṇṇāṇa-tamoha-riu
text.9426: tuhũ suhumu ṇirañjaṇu paramapaü  $  tuhũ ravi vambhu saẏa mbhu siu"
text.9428: maṇu jūraï āsa ṇa pūraï  $  khaṇu vi sahāraṇu ṇaü karaï
text.9429: so lakkhaṇu rāmāeseṃ  $  gharu suggīvahŏ païsaraï
text.9433: viḍasuggīvĕ samarĕ sara-bhiṇṇaĕ  $  gaĕ sattamaĕ divasĕ volīṇaĕ
text.9434: vuttu sumitti-puttu valaeveṃ  $  "bhaṇu suggīu gampi viṇu kheveṃ
text.9435: taṃ diṭṭhantu ṇiruttaü jāẏaü  $  savvahŏ sīẏalu kajju parāẏaü
text.9436: jaṃ bhuñjāviu rajju sa-tāraü  $  kālahŏ pheḍiu vaïri tuhāraü
text.9437: taṃ uvaẏāru kiṃ pi jaï jāṇahi  $  kantahĕ taṇiẏa vatta to āṇahi"
text.9438: gaü somitti visajjiu rāmeṃ  $  saru pañcamaü mukku ṇaṃ kāmeṃ
text.9440: jiha jiha gharu suggīvahŏ pāvaï  $  tiha tiha jaṇu vihaḍapphaḍu dhāvaï
text.9441: ṇa gaṇaï kaṇṭhaü kaḍaü galiṇṇaü  $  ṇāĩ kumāreṃ mohaṇu diṇṇaü
text.9444: thiu mokkha-vārĕ paḍikūlaü  $  jīvahŏ duppariṇāmu jiha
text.9448: "kahĕ paḍihāra gampi suggīvahŏ  $  jo paramesaru jamvū-dīvahŏ
text.9449: acchaï so vaṇa-vāsĕ bhavantaü  $  appuṇu rajju karahi ṇiccintaü
text.9450: jaṃ tuha keraü avasaru sāriu  $  caṅgaü paümaṇāu uvaẏāriu
text.9451: to vari haũ uvaẏāru samārami  $  viḍasuggīu jema tiha mārami"
text.9452: jaṃ saṃdesaü diṇṇu kumāreṃ  $  gampiṇu kahiẏa vatta paḍihāreṃ
text.9453: "deva deva jo samarĕ aṇiṭṭhiu  $  acchaï lakkhaṇu vārĕ pariṭṭhiu
text.9454: āu mahavvalu rāmāeseṃ  $  jamu pacchaṇṇu ṇāĩ ṇara-veseṃ
text.9455: kiṃ païsaraü kiṃ va maṃ païsaü  $  gampiṇu vatta kāĩ sīsaü"
text.9457: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi suggīvĕṇa  $  muhu paḍihārahŏ joiẏaü
text.9458: "kiṃ keṇa vi gāhā-lakkhaṇu  $  vārĕ mahāraĕ ḍhoiẏaü
text.9462: kiṃ lakkhaṇu jaṃ lakkha-visuddhaü  $  kiṃ lakkhaṇu jo geẏa-ṇivaddhaü
text.9463: kiṃ lakkhaṇu jaṃ pāiẏa-kavvahŏ  $  kiṃ lakkhaṇu vāẏaraṇahŏ savvahŏ
text.9464: kiṃ lakkhaṇu jaṃ chandĕ ṇidiṭṭhaü  $  kiṃ lakkhaṇu jaṃ bharahĕ gaviṭṭhaü
text.9465: kiṃ lakkhaṇu ṇara-ṇārī-aṅgahũ  $  kiṃ lakkhaṇu māẏaṅga-turaṅgahũ"
text.9466: pabhaṇaï puṇu paḍihāru viẏakkhaṇu  $  "eẏahũ majjhĕ ṇa ekku vi lakkhaṇu
text.9467: so lakkhaṇu jo dasaraha-ṇandaṇu  $  so lakkhaṇu jo para-vala-maddaṇu
text.9469: so lakkhaṇu jo rāma-sahoẏaru  $  so lakkhaṇu jo sīẏahĕ devaru
text.9470: so lakkhaṇu jo ṇaravara-kesari  $  so lakkhaṇu jo khara-dūsaṇa-ari
text.9471: dasaraha-taṇaü sumittihĕ jāẏaü  $  rāmeṃ sahũ vaṇa-vāsahŏ āẏaü
text.9473: aṇuṇijjaü deva paẏatteṃ  $  jāva ṇa kuppaï ṇiẏa-maṇĕṇa
text.9474: maṃ pantheṃ paĩ pesesaï  $  māẏāsuggīvahŏ taṇĕṇa"
text.9478: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu paḍihārahŏ  $  hiẏavaü bhiṇṇu kaïddhaẏa-sārahŏ
text.9479: "ĕhu so lakkhaṇu rāma-kaṇiṭṭhaü  $  jāsu āsi haũ saraṇu païṭṭhaü"
text.9480: sīsu va guru-vaẏaṇĕhĩ ummūḍhaü  $  ṇaravaï viṇaẏa-gaïndārūḍhaü
text.9481: sa-valu sa-piṇḍavāsu sa-kalattaü  $  calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu visanthula-gattaü
text.9482: pabhaṇiu kaluṇu kiẏañjali-hatthaü  $  "haũ pāviṭṭhu dhiṭṭhu akiẏatthaü
text.9483: tārā-ṇaẏaṇa-sarĕhĩ jajjariẏaü  $  tumhāraü ṇāu mi vīsariẏaü
text.9484: ahŏ paramesara para-uvaẏārā  $  ekka-vāra mahu khamahi bhaḍārā"
text.9485: jaṃ piẏa-vaẏaṇĕhĩ viṇaü paẏāsiu  $  ṇaravaï lakkhaṇĕṇa āsāsiu
text.9486: "abhaü vaccha chuḍu sīẏa gavesahi  $  lahu vijjāhara dasa-disi pesahi"
text.9489: ṇaṃ sāẏaru samaẏahŏ cukkaü  $  kikkindhāhiu ṇīsariu
text.9501: ṇa cheo ṇa mūlaṃ  $  ṇa cāvaṃ ṇa sūlaṃ
text.9503: ṇa gaürī ṇa gaṅgā  $  ṇa cando ṇa ṇāgā
text.9504: ṇa putto ṇa kantā  $  ṇa ḍāho ṇa cintā
text.9505: ṇa kāmo ṇa koho  $  ṇa loho ṇa moho
text.9506: ṇa māṇaṃ ṇa māẏā  $  ṇa sāmaṇṇa-chāẏā
text.9509: "jaï sīẏahĕ vatta ṇa-ẏāṇami  $  tumha parāṇami to vala mahu saṇṇāsa-gaï"
text.9514: "jāhũ gavesā jahĩ āsaṅghahŏ  $  jala-duggaĩ thala-duggaĩ laṅghahŏ
text.9515: païsĕvi dīveṃ dīu gavesahŏ"  $  gaẏa aṅgaṅgaẏa uttara-desahŏ
text.9516: gavaẏa-gavakkha ve vi puvvaddheṃ  $  ṇala-kundenda-ṇīla pacchaddheṃ
text.9517: dāhiṇeṇa suggīu sa-sāhaṇu  $  aṇṇu vi jamvavantu harisiẏa-maṇu
text.9518: caliẏa vimāṇārūḍha mahāiẏa  $  ṇiviseṃ kamvū-dīu parāiẏa
text.9519: tāva tetthu vijjāhara-keraü  $  kampaï calaï valaï vivareraü
text.9520: dīhara-daṇḍu pavaṇa-paḍipelliu  $  ṇaṃ jasa-puñju mahaṇṇave melliu
text.9522: so rāeṃ dhaü dhuvvantaü  $  dīsaï ṇaẏaṇa-suhāvaṇaü
text.9523: "lahu ehu ehu" hakkāraï  $  ṇāĩ hatthu sīẏahĕ taṇaü
text.9527: teṇa vi diṭṭhu cindhu suggīvahŏ  $  uppari entaü kamvū-dīvahŏ
text.9528: cintaï raẏaṇakesi "laï vujjhiu  $  jeṇa samāṇu āsi haũ jujjhiu
text.9529: so taïlokka-cakka-saṃtāvaṇu  $  mañchuḍu āu paḍīvaü rāvaṇu
text.9530: kahĩ ṇāsami kahŏ saraṇu paḍhukkami  $  eẏahŏ haũ jīvantu ṇa cukkami"
text.9531: dukkhu dukkhu sāhāriu ṇiẏa-maṇu  $  "jaï saẏam eva parāiu rāvaṇu
text.9532: to kiṃ tāsu mahaddhaĕ vāṇaru  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ dīsaï kikkindhesaru"
text.9533: tahĩ avasarĕ suggīu parāiu  $  ṇāĩ purandaru saggahŏ āiu
text.9534: "bho bho raẏaṇakesi kiṃ bhullaü  $  acchahi kāĩ etthu ekkallaü"
text.9536: suggīvahŏ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu  $  hiẏavaĕ harisu ṇa māiẏaü
text.9537: ṇava-pāusĕ salileṃ sittaü  $  viñjhu jema appāiẏaü
text.9541: ṇiẏa kaha kahahũ laggu vijjāharu  $  atula-mallu bhāmaṇḍala-kiṅkaru
text.9542: "sāmihĕ jāmi jāma olaggaĕ  $  diṭṭhu vimāṇu tāma gaẏaṇaggaĕ
text.9543: tahĩ kandanti sīẏa āẏaṇṇĕvi  $  dhāiu rāvaṇu tiṇa-samu maṇṇĕvi
text.9544: haü vacchatthalĕ asivara-ghāeṃ  $  giri va paloṭṭiu vajja-ṇihāeṃ
text.9545: dukkhu dukkhu ceẏaṇaü laheppiṇu  $  pāḍiu vijjā-cheu kareppiṇu
text.9546: jiha jaccandhu disāu vibhullaü  $  acchami teṇa etthu ekkallaü"
text.9547: ṇisuṇĕvi sīẏā-haraṇu mahāguṇu  $  ubhaẏa-karĕhĩ avagūḍhu puṇuppuṇu
text.9548: aṇṇu vi tuṭṭhaeṇa maṇa-bhāviṇi  $  diṇṇa vijja tahŏ ṇahaẏala-gāmiṇi
text.9550: ṇiu raẏaṇakesi suggīvĕṇa  $  jahĩ acchaï valu dummaṇaü
text.9551: jasu maṇḍaĕ ṇāĩ hareppiṇu  $  āṇiu dahavaẏaṇahŏ taṇaü
text.9556: "deva deva taru dukkha-mahāṇaï  $  sīẏahĕ taṇiẏa vatta ĕhu jāṇaï"
text.9557: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu valahaddeṃ  $  hasiu sa-vibbhamu kahakaha-saddeṃ
text.9558: "bho bho vaccha vaccha de sāiu  $  jīviu ṇavara ajju āsāiu"
text.9559: eva bhaṇevi teṇa savvaṅgiu  $  ṇeha-mahābhareṇa āliṅgiu
text.9560: "kahĕ kahĕ keṇa kanta uddāliẏa  $  kiṃ mua kiṃ jīvanti ṇihāliẏa"
text.9561: taṃ ṇisuṇevi caviu vijjāharu  $  ṇāĩ jiṇindahŏ aggaĕ gaṇaharu
text.9562: "deva deva kaluṇaĩ kandantī  $  hā lakkhaṇa hā rāma bhaṇantī
text.9564: ṇāgindi va garuḍa-vihaṅgamĕṇa  $  sāraṅgi va pañcāṇaṇĕṇa
text.9565: mahu vijjā-cheu kareppiṇu  $  ṇiẏa vaïdehi dasāṇaṇĕṇa
text.9569: tahĩ tehaĕ vi kālĕ bhaẏa-bhīẏahĕ  $  keṇa vi sīlu ṇa khaṇḍiu sīẏahĕ
text.9570: para-purisĕhĩ ṇaü cittu laïjjaï  $  vālĕhĩ jiha vāẏaraṇu ṇa bhijjaï"
text.9571: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vijjāhara-vuttaü  $  kaṇṭhaü diṇṇu kaḍaü kaḍisuttaü
text.9572: tahĩ avasarĕ je gaẏā gavesā  $  āẏa paḍīvā te vi asesā
text.9574: ahŏ ṇala-ṇīlahŏ gavaẏa-gavakkhahŏ  $  sā kiṃ dūrĕ laṅkā mahu akkhahŏ"
text.9576: joẏaṇa-saẏaĩ satta vihĩ antaru  $  tahi mi samuddu raüddu bhaẏaṅkaru
text.9577: laṅkā-dīu vi teṇa pamāṇeṃ  $  kahiu jiṇindeṃ kevala-ṇāṇeṃ
text.9578: tahĩ tikūḍu ṇāmeṇa mahīharu  $  joẏaṇāĩ pañcāsa sa-vittharu
text.9579: ṇava tuṅgattaṇeṇa tahŏ uppari  $  thiẏa joẏaṇa vattīsa laṅkāuri
text.9581: ekku vi ṇarindu ṇīsaṅkaü  $  aṇṇu samuddeṃ pariẏariu
text.9582: ekku vi kesari duppekkhaü  $  aṇṇu paḍīvaü pakkhariu
text.9586: jasu taïlokka-cakku āsaṅkaï  $  teṇa samāṇu bhiḍĕvi ko sakkaï
text.9587: rāhava eṇa kāĩ ālāveṃ  $  kāĩ va sīẏahĕ taṇĕṇa palāveṃ
text.9588: piṇḍatthaṇiu laḍaha-lāẏaṇṇaü  $  laï mahu taṇiẏaü teraha kaṇṇaü
text.9589: guṇavaï hiẏaẏavamma hiẏaẏāvali  $  suravaï paümāvaï raẏaṇāvali
text.9591: sahũ jiṇavaïĕ rūva-saṃpaṇṇaü  $  pariṇi bhaḍārā eẏaü kaṇṇaü"
text.9592: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi valaeveṃ vuccaï  $  "āẏahũ majjhĕ ṇa ekka vi ruccaï
text.9593: jaï vi rambha aha hoi tilottima  $  sīẏahĕ pāsiu aṇṇa ṇa uttima"
text.9596: "kiu rattahŏ taṇaü kahāṇaü  $  bhoẏaṇu muĕvi chāṇu asiu
text.9600: khaṇĕ khaṇĕ vollahi ṇāĩ aẏāṇaü  $  kiṃ paĩ ṇa suẏaü loẏāhāṇaü
text.9601: jaï vi kiṃ pi accharaĕ ṇa kijjaï  $  tā kiṃ māṇusa-metteṃ dijjaï
text.9602: pūsamāṇu jaï sīẏahĕ pāsiu  $  to karĕ vaẏaṇu mahāraü bhāsiu
text.9603: varisĕ varisĕ tihuvaṇa-saṃtāvaṇu  $  jaï vi ṇei ekkekkī rāvaṇu
text.9604: to vi janti taü teraha varisaĩ  $  jāĩ surinda-bhoga-aṇusarisaĩ
text.9605: upparantĕ puṇu kāi mi hosaï"  $  taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu valu ghosaï
text.9607: tiẏa-parihavu savvaha mi garūvaü  $  ṇaṃ to paï mi saĩ ji aṇuhūaü
text.9614: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vuttu suggīveṃ  $  "viggahu kavaṇu samaü dahagīveṃ
text.9615: ekku kuraṅgu ekku aïrāvaü  $  pāhaṇu ekku ekku kula-pāvaü
text.9616: ekku samuddu ekku kamalāẏaru  $  ekku bhuaṅgamu ekku khagesaru
text.9617: ekku maṇusu ekku vi vijjāharu  $  tahŏ tumhahũ vaḍḍāraü antaru
text.9618: jagĕ jasa-paḍahu jeṇa apphāliu  $  giri kaïlāsu karĕhĩ saṃcāliu
text.9619: jeṇa mahāhavĕ bhaggu purandaru  $  jamu vaïsavaṇu varuṇu vaïsāṇaru
text.9620: jeṇa samīraṇo vi jiu khatteṃ  $  kavaṇu gahaṇu tahŏ māṇusa-metteṃ"
text.9621: hari vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa āruṭṭhaü  $  ṇāĩ saṇiccharu citteṃ duṭṭhaü
text.9624: haũ lakkhaṇu ekku pahuccami  $  jo dahagīvahŏ jīva-khuḍu"
text.9628: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi vaẏaṇuṇṇaĕṇa  $  suggīu vuttu jamvuṇṇaĕṇa
text.9629: "ĕhu hoi ṇa kŏ vi sāvaṇṇu ṇaru  $  saccaü paḍivakkha-viṇāsaẏaru
text.9630: jaṃ cavaï savvu taṃ ṇivvahaï  $  ko asivaru sūrahāsu lahaï
text.9631: jo jīviu samvukkahŏ haraï  $  jo khara-dūsaṇa-kulakhaü karaï
text.9632: so raṇĕ paharantu keṇa dhariu  $  khaẏa-kālu dasāsahŏ avaẏariu
text.9633: paramāgamu ṇīsandehu thiu  $  kevalihĩ āsi āesu kiu
text.9634: āliṅgĕvi vāhahĩ jiha mahila  $  jo saṃcālesaï koḍi-sila
text.9635: so hosaï mallu dasāṇaṇahŏ  $  sāmiu vijjāhara-sāhaṇahŏ
text.9637: jamvavahŏ vaẏaṇu ṇisuṇeppiṇu  $  dhuṇiu kumāreṃ bhua-jualu
text.9642: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu parituṭṭheṃ  $  vuttu jaṇaddaṇu vāli-kaṇiṭṭheṃ
text.9643: "jaṃ jaṃ cavahi deva taṃ saccaü  $  aṇṇu vi eu karahi jaï paccaü
text.9644: to haũ bhiccu homi hiẏaïcchiu  $  sūrahŏ divasu va vela paḍicchiu
text.9645: taṃ ṇisuṇevi samara-dussīlĕhĩ  $  ṇaravaï vujjhāviu ṇala-ṇīlĕhĩ
text.9646: "jeṇa sarĕhĩ khara-dūsaṇa ghāiẏa  $  pattiẏa koḍi-sila vi uccāiẏa"
text.9647: ema cavevi caliẏa vijjāhara  $  ṇava-kaṅkālĕ ṇāĩ ṇava jalahara
text.9649: koḍi-silā-uddesu parāiẏa  $  siddhĕhĩ siddhi jema ṇijjhāiẏa
text.9651: jā saẏala-kāla hiṇḍantahũ  $  hua vaṇa-vāsĕ parammuhiẏa
text.9652: sā evahĩ lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ  $  ṇaṃ thiẏa siẏa savaḍammuhiẏa
text.9656: loẏaggahŏ siva-sāsaẏa-sokkhahŏ  $  jahĩ muṇivarahũ koḍi gaẏa mokkhahŏ
text.9657: sā koḍi-sila tehĩ pariañciẏa  $  gandha-dhūva-vali-pupphĕhĩ añciẏa
text.9658: diṇṇa sa-saṅkha paḍaha kiu kalaẏalu  $  ghosiu caü-paẏāru jiṇa-maṅgalu
text.9659: "jasu dunduhi asou bhāmaṇḍalu  $  so arahantu deu taü maṅgalu
text.9660: je gaẏa tihuẏaṇaggu taṃ ṇikkalu  $  te siddhavara dentu taü maṅgalu
text.9661: jehĩ aṇaṅgu bhaggu jiu kali-malu  $  te vara-sāhu dentu taü maṅgalu
text.9662: jo chajjīva-ṇikāẏahã vacchalu  $  so daẏa-dhammu deu taü maṅgalu"
text.9663: ema su-maṅgalu  uccāreppiṇu  $  siddhavarahũ ṇavakāru kareppiṇu
text.9664: jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṃ sila saṃcāliẏa  $  rāvaṇa-riddhi ṇāĩ uddāliẏa
text.9665: mukka paḍīvī karaẏala-tāḍiẏa  $  dahamuha-hiẏaẏa-gaṇṭhi ṇaṃ phāḍiẏa
text.9668: pammukku sa ïṃ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ  $  kusuma-vāsu sirĕ lakkhaṇahŏ
text.9671: ṇahĕ devĕhĩ mahiẏalĕ ṇarĕhĩ āṇanda-tūru apphāli(ẏa)ü
text.9675: raha-vimāṇa-māẏaṅga-turaṅgama-vāhaṇe  $  vijaü ghuṭṭhu suggīvahŏ keraĕ sāhaṇe
text.9676: etthantarĕ sirĕ lāiẏa karehĩ  $  jokkāriu valu vijjāharehĩ
text.9677: jagĕ jiṇavara-bhavaṇaïm jāĩ jāĩ  $  pariañcĕvi añcĕvi tāĩ tāĩ
text.9678: pallaṭṭu paḍīvaü suhaḍa-paẏaru  $  ṇiviseṇa pattu kikkindha-ṇaẏaru
text.9679: ettiẏaĩ kiẏaĩ sāhasaĩ jaï vi  $  suggīvahŏ maṇĕ saṃdehu to vi
text.9680: "ahŏ jamvava cariu mahantu kāsu  $  kiṃ dahavaẏaṇahŏ kiṃ lakkhaṇāsu
text.9681: kaïlāsu tuliu ekkeṃ pacaṇḍu  $  aṇṇekkeṃ puṇu pāhāṇa-khaṇḍu
text.9682: vaḍḍāraü sāhasu vihi mi kavaṇu  $  kiṃ suhagaï kiṃ saṃsāra-gamaṇu"
text.9683: jamvavĕṇa vuttu "mā maṇĕṇa mujjhu  $  kiṃ ajja vi pahu sandehu tujjhu
text.9686: jamma-sae vi ṇarāhivaï  $  kiṃ cukkaï muṇivara-bhāsiu"
text.9690: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi suggīvahŏ harisiẏa-gattaho  $  phiṭṭa bhanti jiṇā-vaẏaṇĕhĩ jiha micchattaho
text.9692: "kiṃ ko vi atthi ettiẏahã majjhĕ  $  jo khandhu samoḍḍaï garua-vojjhe
text.9693: jo ujjālaï mahu taṇaü vaẏaṇu  $  jo darisaï valahŏ kalatta-raẏaṇu
text.9694: jo tāraï dukkha-mahāṇaīhĕ  $  jo jāi gavesaü jāṇaīhĕ"
text.9695: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jamvaü caviu eva  $  "haṇuvantu muĕvi ko jāi deva
text.9696: ṇaü jāṇahũ kiṃ āruṭṭho so vi  $  jaṃ ṇihaü samvu kharu dūsaṇo vi
text.9697: taṃ rosu dharĕvi majjhāra-taṇua  $  rāvaṇahŏ milesaï ṇavara haṇua
text.9698: jaṃ jāṇahŏ cintahŏ taṃ paesu  $  teṃ milieṃ miliẏaü jagu asesu
text.9700: vihi mi rāma-rāmaṇa-valahũ  $  ekku vi vaḍḍhimaü ṇa dīsaï
text.9701: sahũ jaẏa-lacchiĕ vijaü tahĩ  $  para jahĩ haṇuvantu milesaï"
text.9705: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi kikkindha-ṇarāhiu rañjio  $  lacchibhutti haṇuvantahŏ pāsu visajjio
text.9706: "paĩ muĕvi aṇṇu ko vuddhivantu  $  jiha milaï tema kari kiṃ pi mantu
text.9707: guṇa-vaẏaṇĕhĩ gampiṇu pavaṇa-puttu  $  bhaṇu "etthu kālĕ rūsĕvi ṇa juttu
text.9708: khara-dūsaṇa-samvu pasāhiẏatta  $  appaṇu duccariĕhĩ maraṇu patta
text.9709: ṇaü rāmahŏ ṇaü lakkhaṇahŏ dosu  $  jiha tahŏ tiha savvahŏ hoi rosu"
text.9710: bhaṇu "ettieṇa kāleṇa kāĩ  $  candaṇahihĕ cariẏaĩ ṇa vi suẏāĩ
text.9712: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi āṇandu hūu  $  ārūḍhu vimāṇĕ turantu dūu
text.9715: paṭṭaṇu pavaṇa-suahŏ taṇaü  $  thiu haṇuruha-dīvĕ ravaṇṇaü
text.9716: mahiẏalĕ keṇa vi kāraṇĕṇa  $  ṇa sagga-khaṇḍu avaïṇṇaü
text.9720: lacchibhutti taṃ lacchīṇaẏaru paīsaī  $  vavaharantu jaṃ sundaru taṃ taṃ dīsaī
text.9721: deulavāḍaü paṇṇu pahillaü  $  phopphalu aṇṇu mūlu ceullaü
text.9722: jāihullu karahāḍaü cuṇṇaü  $  cittaüḍaü kañcuaü ravaṇṇaü
text.9723: rāmaüraü gulu saru païṭhāṇaü  $  aïvaḍḍaü bhujaṅgu vahu-jāṇaü
text.9724: addha-vesu piu avvua-keraü  $  jovvaṇu kaṇṇāḍaü saviẏāraü
text.9725: celaü harikelaü sacchāẏaü  $  vaḍḍāẏaraü loṇu vikkhāẏaü
text.9726: vaïrāẏaraü vajju maṇi siṅghalu  $  ṇevālaü katthūriẏa-parimalu
text.9727: mottiẏa-hāra-ṇiẏaru sañjāṇaü  $  kharu vajjaraü turaü kekkāṇaü
text.9728: vara kāviṭṭhi suṭṭhu paüṇārī  $  vāṇi suhāsiṇi ṇanduravārī
text.9729: kañcī-keraü ṇaẏaru visiṭṭhaü  $  cīṇaü ṇettu viẏaḍḍhĕhĩ diṭṭhaü
text.9730: aṇṇu inda-vāẏaraṇu guṇijjaï  $  bhūvāvallaü geu jhuṇijjaï
text.9731: ema ṇaẏaru gaü ṇivvaṇṇantaü  $  rāulu pavaṇa-suahŏ saṃpattaü
text.9733: so paḍihāriĕ ṇammaẏaĕ  $  suggīva-dūu ṇa ṇivāriu
text.9738: diṭṭhu teṇa dūrahŏ vi samīraṇa-ṇandaṇo  $  sisira-kālĕ divasaẏaru va ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇo
text.9739: sirisaïlu ṇareṇa ṇihāliẏaü  $  ṇaṃ kari kariṇihĩ parimāliẏaü
text.9740: ekkettahĕ ekka ṇiviṭṭha tiẏa  $  vara-vīṇa-vihatthī pāṇa-piẏa
text.9741: ṇāmeṇaṇaṅgakusuma subhua  $  sasa samvukumārahŏ kharahŏ sua
text.9742: aṇṇekkettahĕ aṇṇekka tiẏa  $  vara-kamala-vihatthī ṇāĩ siẏa
text.9743: sā paṅkaẏarāẏa abhaṅgaẏahŏ  $  suggīvahŏ sua sasa aṅgaẏahŏ
text.9744: vihĩ pāsĕhĩ ve vi varaṅgaṇaü  $  kuvalaẏa-dala-dīhara-loẏaṇaü
text.9745: rehaï sundaru majjhatthu kiha  $  vihĩ sañjhahĩ parimiu divasu jiha
text.9746: etthantarĕ guñjhu ṇa rakkhiẏaü  $  haṇuvantahŏ dūeṃ akkhiẏaü
text.9753: kahiu savvu taṃ lakkhaṇa-rāma-kahāṇaüṃ  $  daṇḍaẏāi muṇi-koḍi-silā-avasāṇaüṃ
text.9755: ekkahĕ ṇaṃ vajjāsaṇi paḍiẏa  $  aṇṇekkahĕ romāvali caḍiẏa
text.9756: ekkahĕ maṇĕ ṇāĩ palevaṇaü  $  aṇṇekkahĕ puṇu vaddhāvaṇaü
text.9758: ekkahĕ hiẏavaü palu palu lhasiu  $  aṇṇekkahĕ palu palu osasiu
text.9759: ekkahĕ ohulliu muha-kamalu  $  aṇṇekkahĕ viẏasiu ahara-dalu
text.9761: ekkahĕ saru vara-geẏahŏ taṇaü  $  aṇṇekkahĕ kaluṇu ruvāvaṇaü
text.9762: ekkahĕ thiu rāulu vimaṇa-maṇu  $  aṇṇekkahĕ vaḍḍhaï ṇāĩ chaṇu
text.9769: kharahŏ dhīẏa mucchaṅgaẏa puṇu vi paḍīviẏā  $  candaṇeṇa pavvāliẏa paccujjīviẏā
text.9770: uṭṭhiẏa rovanti aṇaṅgakusuma  $  ṇaṃ candaṇa-laẏa ubbhiṇṇa-kusuma
text.9771: "hā tāẏa keṇa viṇivāio 'si  $  vijjāharu hontaü ghāio 'si
text.9773: hā bhāi sahoẏara dehi vāẏa  $  vilavanti kāsu paĩ mukka māẏa"
text.9775: "kiṃ ṇa suu jiṇāgamu jagĕ pagāsu  $  jāẏahŏ jīvahŏ savvahŏ viṇāsu
text.9776: jala-vindu jema ghaṅghalĕ paḍantu  $  jaṃ dīsaï taṃ sāhasu mahantu
text.9777: sāhāru ṇa vandhaï ei jāi  $  arahaṭṭa-jantĕ ṇava ghaḍiẏa ṇāĩ
text.9779: rovahi kāĩ akaraṇĕṇa  $  dhīravahi māĕ appāṇaü
text.9780: amhahã tumhahũ avarahu mi  $  kaddivasu vi avasa-paẏāṇaü"
text.9784: kharahŏ dhīẏa paridhīraviẏā parivārĕṇaṃ  $  maẏa-jalaṃ ca devāviẏa loẏācārĕṇaṃ
text.9790: duvāraso vva bhakkharo  $  jamo vva diṭṭhi-ṇiṭṭhuro
text.9791: vihi vva kiñciduṭṭhio  $  sasi vva aṭṭhamo ṭhio
text.9792: vihapphaï vva jammaṇĕ  $  ahi vva kūra-kammaṇĕ
text.9799: lacchibhutti pabhaṇiu suhi-sumahura-vāẏae  $  "eu savvu kiu samvukumārahŏ māẏae
text.9806: kharo sa-dūsaṇo vi jetthu  $  gaẏa ruanti ḍhukka tetthu
text.9807: te vi takkhaṇammi kuiẏa  $  canda-bhakkhara vva uiẏa
text.9809: viṇhuṇā sarehĩ bhiṇṇa  $  paḍiẏa pāẏava vva chiṇṇa
text.9810: ettahĕ vi raṇĕ thireṇa  $  ṇīẏa sīẏa dasasireṇa
text.9811: hari valā vi ve vi tāsu  $  gaẏa puraṃ virāhiẏāsu
text.9812: etthu avasarammi rāu  $  miliu aṅgaẏassa tāu
text.9815: taṃ kiu koḍi-siluddharaṇu  $  kevalihĩ āsi jaṃ bhāsiu
text.9816: amhahũ jaü rāvaṇahŏ khaü  $  phuḍu lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ pāsiu"
text.9820: kahiu savvu jaṃ candaṇahihĕ guṇa-kittaṇu  $  aṇila-puttu lajjāviu thiu heṭṭhāṇaṇu
text.9821: jaṃ pisuṇiu koḍi-siluddharaṇu  $  aṇṇu vi viṣasuggīvahŏ maraṇu
text.9822: taṃ pavaṇa-puttu romañciẏaü  $  ṇaḍu jiha rasa-bhāva-paṇacciẏaü
text.9824: "saccaü ṇārāẏaṇu aṭṭhamaü  $  dahavaẏaṇahŏ candu va aṭṭhamaü
text.9825: māẏāsuggīu jeṇa vahiu  $  halaharu aṭṭhamaü so vi kahiu"
text.9826: maṇu jāṇĕvi haṇuvantahŏ taṇaü  $  dūahŏ hiẏavaĕ vaddhāvaṇaü
text.9827: siru ṇavĕvi ṇirāriu piu cavaï  $  "suggīu deva paĩ sambharaï
text.9828: acchaï guṇa-salila-tisāiẏaü  $  teṃ haũ hakkāraü āiẏaü
text.9830: paĩ virahiu chullucchulaü  $  puṇṇālihĕ cittu va ūṇaü
text.9831: ṇa vi sohaï suggīva-valu  $  jiha jovvaṇu dhamma-vihūṇaü"
text.9835: eha volla ṇisuṇevi samīraṇa-ṇandaṇu  $  sa-gaü sa-dhaü sa-turaṅgamu sa-bhaḍu sa-sandaṇu
text.9837: saṃcallĕ haṇuĕ saṃcallu valu  $  ṇaṃ pāusĕ meha-jālu sa-jalu
text.9839: ṇaṃ tārā-maṇḍalu uggamiu  $  ṇaṃ ṇahĕ māẏāmaü ṇimmaviu
text.9840: āṇanda-ghosu haṇuvahŏ taṇaü  $  ṇisuṇevi tūru koḍḍāvaṇaü
text.9841: pamaẏaddhaẏa-sāhaṇĕ jāẏa dihi  $  ghaṇĕ gajjiĕ ṇaṃ parituṭṭha sihi
text.9842: ṇaravaï suggīu karevi dhurĕ  $  kiẏa haṭṭa-soha kikkindha-purĕ
text.9843: kañcaṇa-toraṇaĩ ṇivaddhāĩ  $  gharĕ gharĕ mihuṇaĩ samaladdhāĩ
text.9844: gharĕ gharĕ parihiẏaĩ ravaṇṇāĩ  $  lāḍaï paḍipāṇiẏa-vaṇṇāĩ
text.9845: lahu gahiẏa-pasāhaṇa saẏala ṇara  $  ṇiggaẏa savaḍammuha aggha-kara
text.9848: ṇāṇa-carittĕhĩ daṃsaṇĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ siddhu mokkhĕ païsāriu
text.9852: païsarantu purĕ pekkhaï ṇimmala-tāraĩ  $  gharĕ gharĕ ji maṇi-kañcaṇa-toraṇa-vāraĩ
text.9855: katthaï kallūriẏahũ kaṇikkaü  $  ṇaṃ siñjhanti tiẏaü piẏa-mukkaü
text.9856: aï-vaṇṇujjalāu ṇaü miṭṭhaü  $  ṇaṃ vara-vesaü vāhira-miṭṭhaü
text.9857: katthaï puṇu tamvoliẏa-santhaü  $  ṇaṃ muṇivara-maīu majjhatthaü
text.9858: ahavaï sura-mahilaü vahulatthaü  $  jaṇa-muham ujjālevi samatthaü
text.9859: katthaï paḍiẏaĩ pāsā-jūaĩ  $  ṇaṭṭaharaĩ pekkhaṇaĩ va hūaĩ
text.9860: muṇivara iva jiṇa-ṇāmu laẏantaĩ  $  vandiṇa iva su-dāẏa maggantaĩ
text.9862: katthaï lavaṇaĩ ṇimmala-tāraĩ  $  khala-dujjaṇa-vaẏaṇaĩ va su-khāraĩ
text.9863: katthaï tuppaĩ tella-vimīsaĩ  $  ṇāĩ kumittattaṇaĩ asarisaĩ
text.9864: katthaï ummavanti ṇara māṇaĩ  $  ṇaṃ jama-dūā āu-pamāṇaĩ
text.9865: katthaï kāmiṇīu maẏa-mattaü  $  ṇaṃ riha-vahulaü adhiẏa-kaḍattaü
text.9866: ema asesu ṇaẏaru vaṇṇantaü  $  mottiẏa-raṅgāvali cūrantaü
text.9867: līlaĕ païṭhu samīraṇa-ṇandaṇu  $  jahĩ halaharu suggīu jaṇaddaṇu
text.9870: kālahŏ jamahŏ saṇiccharahŏ  $  ṇaṃ miliu kaẏantu caütthaü
text.9874: rāhaveṇa vaïsāriu ṇiẏa-addhāsaṇe  $  muṇivaro vva thiu ṇiccalu jiṇavara-sāsaṇe
text.9875: ekkahĩ ṇiviṭṭha haṇuvanta-rāma  $  maṇa-mohaṇa ṇāĩ vasanta-kāma
text.9876: jamvava-suggīva sahanti te vi  $  ṇaṃ inda-paḍinda vaïṭṭha ve vi
text.9877: somitti-virāhiẏa parama mitta  $  ṇami-viṇami ṇāĩ thira-thora-citta
text.9878: aṅgaṅgaẏa suhaḍa sahanti ve vi  $  ṇaṃ canda-sūra thiẏa avaẏarevi
text.9879: ṇala-ṇīla-ṇarinda ṇiviṭṭha kema  $  ekkāsaṇĕ jama-vaïsavaṇa jema
text.9880: gaẏa-gavaẏa-gavakkha vi raṇa-samattha  $  ṇaṃ vara-pañcāṇaṇa girivarattha
text.9881: avara vi ekekka pacaṇḍa vīra  $  thiẏa pāsĕhĩ pavara-sarīra dhīra
text.9884: "ajju maṇoraha ajju dihi  $  mahu sāhaṇu ajju pacaṇḍaü
text.9885: cintā-sāẏarĕ paḍiẏaĕṇa  $  jaṃ mārui laddhu taraṇḍaü
text.9889: pavaṇa-puttĕ miliĕ miliẏaü taïlokku vi  $  riuhĕ seṇṇĕ eẏahŏ dhura dharaï ṇa ekku vi"
text.9890: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jaẏakāru karanteṃ  $  jāṇaï-kantu vuttu haṇuvanteṃ
text.9891: "deva deva vahu-raẏaṇa vasundhari  $  atthi etthu kesarihi mi kesari
text.9892: jahĩ jamvava-ṇala-ṇīlaṅgaṅgaẏa  $  ṇaṃ mukkaṅkusa matta mahāgaẏa
text.9895: tahĩ haũ kavaṇu gahaṇu kira kehaü  $  sīhahũ majjhĕ kuraṅgamu jehaü
text.9896: to vi tuhāraü avasaru sārami  $  de āesu deva ko mārami
text.9897: māṇu maraṭṭu kāsu raṇĕ bhajjaü  $  jagĕ jasa-paḍahu tuhāraü vajjaü"
text.9899: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi parituṭṭhaĕṇa  $  jamvavĕṇa diṇṇu sandesaü
text.9904: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jaẏakāriu sīrappaharaṇu  $  "deva deva jāevaü kettiu kāraṇu
text.9905: aṇṇu vi vaḍḍāraü sa-visesaü  $  rāhava kiṃ pi dehi āesaü
text.9906: jeṇa dasāṇaṇu jama-uri pāvami  $  sīẏa tuhāraĕ karaẏalĕ lāvami"
text.9907: ṇisuṇĕvi galagajjiu haṇuvantahŏ  $  harisu pavaḍḍhiu jāṇaï-kantahŏ
text.9908: "bho bho sāhu sāhu pavañjaï  $  aṇṇahŏ kāsu viẏambhiu chajjaï
text.9909: to vi karevaü muṇivara-bhāsiu  $  tahŏ khaẏa-kālu kumārahŏ pāsiu
text.9910: ṇa vi paĩ ṇa maĩ ṇa vi suggīveṃ  $  jujjhevaü samāṇu dahagīveṃ
text.9911: ṇavari ekku sandesaü ṇejjahi  $  jaï jīvaï to ema kahejjahi
text.9912: vuccaï "sundari tujjha vioeṃ  $  jhīṇu karī va kariṇi-vicchoeṃ
text.9913: jhīṇu su-dhammu va kali-pariṇāmeṃ  $  jhīṇu su-purisu va pisuṇālāveṃ
text.9914: jhīṇu maẏaṅku va vara-pakkha-kkhaĕ  $  jhīṇu muṇindu va siddhihĕ kaṅkhaĕ
text.9915: jhīṇu du-rāuleṇa vara-desu va  $  avuha-majjhĕ kaï-kavva-visesu va
text.9916: jhīṇu su-panthu va jaṇa-paricattaü  $  rāmacandu tiha paĩ sumarantaü"
text.9918: aṇṇa vi laï aṅgutthalaü  $  ahiṇāṇu samappahi meraü
text.9919: āṇejjahi sa ïṃ bhū saṇaü  $  cūḍāmaṇi sīẏahĕ keraü
text.9935: tahĩ vimāṇĕ thiu pavaṇa-ṇandaṇo  $  caliu ṇāĩ ṇahĕ ravi sa-sandaṇo
text.9942: caü-duvāru caü-gouru caü-pāẏāru paṇḍuraṃ  $  gaẏaṇa-lagga-pavaṇāhaẏa-dhaẏa-mālāulaṃ puraṃ
text.9944: taṃ ṇievi haṇueṇa cintiẏaṃ  $  "surapuraṃ kim indeṇa ghattiẏaṃ"
text.9948: so mahindu ṇivvūḍha-sāhaso  $  vasaï etthu khalu khudda-māṇaso
text.9949: eha ṇaẏari māhinda-ṇāmĕṇaṃ  $  kāmapuri va ṇimmaviẏa kāmĕṇaṃ
text.9950: taṃ suṇevi vahu-bhariẏa-maccharo  $  mīṇa-rāsi ṇaṃ gaü saṇiccharo
text.9953: āẏahŏ āhaẏaṇĕ  $  laï tāma maḍappharu bhañjami"
text.9963: taṃ ṇievi para-vala-paloṭṭaṇe  $  khohu jāu māhinda-paṭṭaṇe
text.9978: tetthu vaṭṭantae dāruṇe bhaṇḍaṇe  $  haṇuva-māhindi abbhiṭṭa samaraṅgaṇe
text.9979: ve vi suṇḍīra-saṅghāẏa-saṅghāraṇā  $  ve vi māẏaṅga-kumbhatthaluddāraṇa
text.9980: ve vi ṇaha-gāmiṇo ve vi vijjāharā  $  ve vi jasa-kaṅkhiṇo ve vi phuriẏāharā
text.9987: tahĩ mahinda-ṇandaṇĕṇa viruddheṃ paḍhama-abbhiḍe  $  tharaharanti sara-dhoraṇi lāiẏa haṇuva-dhaẏavaḍe
text.9988: vāiṇā vi riu-vāṇa-jālaẏaṃ  $  ṇisi-khaĕ vva raviṇā tamālaẏaṃ
text.9990: jalaï ṇaha-ẏalaṃ jalaṇa-dīviẏaṃ  $  para-valaṃ asesaṃ palīviẏaṃ
text.9991: kahŏ vi chattu kāsu vi dhaẏaggaẏaṃ  $  kahŏ vi pajaliẏaṃ uttamaṅgaẏaṃ
text.9992: kahŏ vi kavaü kāsu kaḍillaẏaṃ  $  kahŏ vi kañcuẏaṃ saṃkaḍillaẏaṃ
text.9994: ṇavara ekku māhindi thakkao  $  kesari vva kesarihĕ ḍhukkao
text.9995: vāruṇatthu sandhaï ṇa jāvĕhĩ  $  rosieṇa haṇueṇa tāvĕhĩ
text.10002: avaru cāu kira geṇhaï jāma mahinda-ṇaṃdaṇo  $  maru-sueṇa viddhaṃsiu tāva sarehĩ sandaṇo
text.10004: moḍie chatta-daṇḍe dhae chiṇṇae  $  lahu vimāṇe samārūḍhu vitthiṇṇae
text.10005: taṃ pi haṇuveṇa vāṇehĩ ṇiṇṇāsiẏaṃ  $  ṇaraẏa-dukkhaṃ va siddhehĩ viddhaṃsiẏaṃ
text.10006: ṇiggao vipphuranto ṇirattho ṇaro  $  ṇāĩ ṇiggantha-rūvo thio muṇivaro
text.10007: pavaṇa-putteṇa ghettūṇa riu vaddhao  $  vara-bhuaṅgu vva garuḍeṇa uṭṭhaddhao
text.10008: puttĕ vehe sue savara-vāvārio  $  aṇila-putto mahindeṇa hakkārio
text.10017: chiṇṇu jaṃ jĕ sara-pañjaru raṇaühĕ pavaṇa-jāĕṇaṃ  $  dhagadhagantu aggeu vimukku mahinda-rāĕṇaṃ
text.10019: diṭṭhu vāṇu jaṃ pavaṇa-puttĕṇaṃ  $  vāruṇatthu melliu turantĕṇaṃ
text.10020: jiha ghaṇeṇa galagajjamāṇĕṇaṃ  $  pasamio vi gimbho vva ṇāĕṇaṃ
text.10021: vāẏavo mahindeṇa mellio  $  pavaṇa-puttu teṇa vi ṇa bhellio
text.10024: khaṇḍu khaṇḍu kiu pavaṇa-puttĕṇaṃ  $  kukaï-kavva-vandho vva dhuttĕṇaṃ
text.10025: ṇavara mukku mahiharu viruddhĕṇaṃ  $  so vi chiṇṇu ṇaraü vva siddhĕṇaṃ
text.10027: jaṃ jaṃ lei riu  $  taṃ taṃ haṇuvantu viṇāsaï
text.10028: jiha ṇillakkhaṇahŏ  $  karĕ ekku vi atthu ṇa dīsaï
text.10032: añjaṇāĕ jaṇaṇeṇa vilakkhīhūẏa-cittĕṇaṃ  $  gaẏa vimukka bhāmeppiṇu kovāṇala-palittĕṇaṃ
text.10033: teṇa laüḍi-daṇḍāhighāĕṇaṃ  $  taruvaro va pāḍiu duvāĕṇaṃ
text.10034: giri va vajjĕṇaṃ duṇṇivārĕṇaṃ  $  aṇila-puttu tiha gaẏa-pahārĕṇaṃ
text.10035: ṇivaḍie sirīselĕ vimbhalĕ  $  jāẏa volla suravarahã ṇahaẏale
text.10037: rāma-dūakajjaṃ ṇa sāhiẏaṃ  $  jāṇaīhĕ vaẏaṇaṃ ṇa cāhiẏaṃ
text.10038: rāvaṇassa ṇa vaṇaṃ viṇāsiẏaṃ  $  vihalu āsi kevalihĩ bhāsiẏaṃ"
text.10039: eva volla sura-satthĕ jāvĕhĩ  $  haṇua hūu sajjīu tāvĕhĩ
text.10040: uṭṭhio sarāsaṇa-vihatthao  $  saravarehĩ kiu riu ṇiratthao
text.10043: dhariu mahindu raṇĕ  $  ṇaṃ gaṅgā-vāhu samuddeṃ
text.10047: kuddhaeṇa samaraṅgaṇĕ māẏā-vaïra-heuṇā  $  dhariẏa ve vi māhindi-mahinda kaïddha-keuṇā
text.10048: māṇu malevi karĕvi kaḍamaddaṇu  $  calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu samīraṇa-ṇandaṇu
text.10049: "ahŏ māhinda māma marusejjahi  $  jaṃ vimuhiu taṃ saẏalu khamejjahi
text.10050: ahŏ ahŏ tāẏa tāẏa riu-bhañjaṇa  $  ṇiẏa-suẏa taṃ vīsariẏa kim añjaṇa
text.10051: haũ tahĕ taṇaü tujjhu dohittaü  $  ṇimmala-vaṃsu samujjala-gottaü
text.10052: bhaggu maraṭṭu jeṇa raṇĕ varuṇahŏ  $  haũ haṇuvantu puttu tahŏ pavaṇahŏ
text.10053: pesiu abbhatthĕvi suggīveṃ  $  rāmahŏ hiu kalattu dahagīveṃ
text.10054: dūa-kajjĕ saṃcalliu jāvĕhĩ  $  paṭṭaṇu diṭṭhu tuhāraü tāvĕhĩ
text.10055: māẏā-vaïru asesu vivujjhiu  $  teṃ tumhahĩ samāṇu maĩ jujjhiu
text.10062: "sāhu sāhu bho sundara suu saccaü jĕ pavaṇaho  $  paĩ muevi suhaḍattaṇu aṇṇahŏ hoi kavaṇaho
text.10063: jo sattu-saṅgāma-lakkhehĩ jasa-ṇilaü  $  jo ubhaẏa-kula-dīvao ubhaẏa-kula-tilaü
text.10064: jo ubhaẏa-vaṃsujjalo sasi va akalaṅku  $  jo sīhavara-vikkamo samarĕ ṇīsaṅku
text.10067: jo kitti-raẏaṇāẏaro jasa-jalāvattu  $  jo vīra-ṇārāẏaṇo jaẏasirī-kantu
text.10072: jo keṇa vi ṇa jiu  $  āsaṅka-kalaṅka-vivajjiu
text.10073: so haũ āhaẏaṇĕ  $  paĩ ekkeṃ ṇavari parajjiu"
text.10077: eu vaẏaṇu ṇisuṇeppiṇu duddama-daṇu-vimaddaṇo  $  "kavaṇu etthu kira parihavu" bhaṇaï ghaṇāri-ṇandaṇo
text.10078: tuhũ deva divāẏaru teẏa-piṇḍu  $  haũ kiṃ pi tuhāraü kiraṇa-saṇḍu
text.10079: tuhũ vara-maẏalañchaṇu bhuvaṇa-tilaü  $  haũ kiṃ pi tuhāraü joṇha-ṇilaü
text.10080: tuhũ pavara-samuddu samudda-sāru  $  haũ kiṃ pi tuhāraü jala-tusāru
text.10081: tuhũ meru-mahīharu mahiharesu  $  haũ kiṃ pi tuhāraü sila-ṇivesu
text.10082: tuhũ kesari ghora-raüdda-ṇāu  $  haũ kiṃ pi tuhāraü ṇaha-ṇihāu
text.10083: tuhũ matta-mahaggaü duṇṇivāru  $  haũ kiṃ pi tuhāraü maẏa-viẏāru
text.10084: tuhũ māṇasa-saravaru sāravindu  $  haũ kiṃ pi tuhāraü salila-vindu
text.10085: tuhũ vara-titthaẏaru mahāṇubhāu  $  haũ kiṃ pi tuhāraü vaẏa-sahāu
text.10088: ṇiẏa paha pariharaï  $  kiṃ maṇi cāmiẏara-ṇivaddhaü"
text.10092: kaha vi kaha vi maṇu dhīriu vijjāhara-ṇarindaho  $  "tāẏa tāẏa mili sāhaṇĕ gampiṇu rāmacandaho
text.10093: vaḍḍāraü kiu uvaẏāru teṇa  $  māriu māẏāsuggīu jeṇa
text.10094: ko sakkaï tahŏ pesaṇu karevi  $  milu rāmahŏ maccharu pariharevi
text.10095: uvaẏāru karevaü maï mi tāsu  $  jāevaü laṅkāhivahŏ pāsu"
text.10096: haṇuẏahŏ eẏaĩ vaẏaṇaĩ suṇevi  $  māhindi-mahinda paẏaṭṭa ve vi
text.10097: suggīva-ṇaẏaru ṇiviseṇa patta  $  valu pucchaï "ĕhu ko jamvavanta
text.10098: kiṃ valĕvi paḍīvaü pavaṇa-jāu  $  asamatta-kajju haṇuvantu āu"
text.10099: mantiṇa pavuttu "ṇaravara-maïndu  $  añjaṇahĕ vappu ĕhu so mahindu"
text.10100: vala-jamvava ve vi cavanti jāma  $  savaḍammuhu āu mahindu tāma
text.10103: agghuccāiẏaü  $  diḍha-kaḍhiṇa sa ĩ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ
text.10106: sāmi-kajjĕ saṃcallu mahāiu  $  līlaĕ dahimuha-dīu parāiu
text.10110: maṇa-gamaṇeṇa teṇa ṇahĕ janteṃ  $  dahimuha-ṇaẏaru diṭṭhu haṇuvanteṃ
text.10111: diṭṭhārāma-sīma caü-pāsĕhĩ  $  dhariu ṇāĩ puru riṇiẏa-sahāsĕhĩ
text.10112: jahĩ papphulliẏāĩ ujjāṇaĩ  $  vaḍḍaĩ ṇaṃ titthaẏara-purāṇaĩ
text.10113: jahĩ ṇa kaẏāvi talāẏaĩ sukkaĩ  $  ṇaṃ sīẏalaĩ suṭṭhu para-dukkhaĩ
text.10114: jahĩ vāviu vitthaẏa-sovāṇaü  $  ṇaṃ kugaïu heṭṭhāmuha-gamaṇaü
text.10115: jahĩ pāẏāra ṇa keṇa vi laṅghiẏa  $  jiṇa-uvaesa ṇāĩ guru-saṃghiẏa
text.10116: jahĩ deulaĩ dhavala-puṇḍariẏaĩ  $  potthā-vaẏaṇaĩ va vahu-cariẏaĩ
text.10117: jahĩ mandiraĩ sa-toraṇa-vāraĩ  $  ṇaṃ samasaraṇaĩ suppaḍihāraĩ
text.10122: tahĩ paṭṭaṇĕ vahu-uvamahã bhariẏaĕ  $  ṇaṃ jagĕ sukaï-kavvĕ vitthariẏaĕ
text.10123: sahaï sa-pariẏaṇu dahimuha-rāṇaü  $  ṇaṃ suravaï surapurahŏ pahāṇaü
