text.10127: tahŏ aggima mahisi taraṅgamaï  $  ṇaṃ kāmahŏ raï suravaïhĕ saï
text.10128: āvantaĕ jantaĕ diṇa-ṇivahĕ  $  uppaṇṇaü kaṇṇaü tiṇṇi tahĕ
text.10129: vijjuppaha candaleha vāla  $  aṇṇekka tahā taraṅgamāla
text.10130: tiṇṇi vi kaṇṇaü parivaḍḍhiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ sukaï-kahaü rasa-vaḍḍhiẏaü
text.10132: "jaï bhallaü dahimuha māma mahu  $  to tiṇṇi vi kaṇṇaü dehi lahu"
text.10133: teṇa vi vivāhu saṅgacchiẏaü  $  kallāṇabhutti muṇi pucchiẏaü
text.10134: "kahŏ dhīẏaü demi ṇa demi kahŏ"  $  muṇivarĕṇa vi takkhaṇĕ kahiu tahŏ
text.10137: jīviu tāsu samarĕ jo lesaï  $  tiṇṇi vi kaṇṇaü so pariṇesaï"
text.10141: guru-vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa aï bhāviu  $  maṇĕ gandhavva-rāu cintāviu
text.10143: ahavaï eu vi ṇaü vujjhijjaï  $  guru-bhāsiĕ sandehu ṇa kijjaï
text.10144: jamma-sae vi pamāṇahŏ ḍhukkaï  $  muṇivara-vaẏaṇu ṇa palaĕ vi cukkaï
text.10145: avaseṃ kan divasu vi so hosaï  $  sāhasagaïhĕ jujjhu jo desaï"
text.10146: taṃ ṇisuṇevi laḍaha-lāẏaṇṇĕhĩ  $  ṇiẏa-jaṇeru āucchiu kaṇṇĕhĩ
text.10147: "bho bho tāẏa tāẏa daṇu-dārā  $  laï vaṇa-vāsahŏ jāhũ bhaḍārā
text.10148: karahũ kiṃ pi vari mantārāhaṇu  $  joggabbhāseṃ vijjā-sāhaṇu"
text.10151: gampi païṭṭhaü viula-vaṇantarĕ    $  ṇāĩ ti-guttiu dehabbhantarĕ
text.10155: taṃ vaṇu tihi mi tāhĩ avaẏajjiu  $  ṇaṃ bhava-gahaṇu asoẏa-vivajjiu
text.10156: ṇaṃ ṇittilaü theri-muha-maṇḍalu  $  ṇaṃ ṇiccūẏaü kaṇṇa-uratthalu
text.10157: ṇaṃ ṇipphalu kusāmi olaggiu  $  ṇaṃ ṇittālu a-ṇaccaṇa-vaggiu
text.10158: ṇaṃ hari-gharu puṇṇāẏa-vivajjiu  $  ṇaṃ ṇisuṇṇu vaüddhahũ gajjiu
text.10159: jahĩ vorāhiu kāmiṇi-līlaü  $  maṇḍa maṇḍa uvvīraṇa-sīlaü
text.10160: jahĩ pāhaṇa valanti ravi-kiraṇĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ sajjaṇa dujjaṇa-duvvaẏaṇĕhĩ
text.10161: tahĩ acchanti jāva vaṇĕ vitthaĕ  $  tāva paḍhukkiẏa divasĕ caütthaĕ
text.10163: cāraṇa pavara-mahārisi āiẏa  $  bhadda-subhadda ve vi verāiẏa
text.10164: kosahŏ taṇĕṇa caüttheṃ bhāeṃ  $  aṭṭha divasa thiẏa kāosāeṃ
text.10170: thiẏa risi paḍimā-joeṃ jāvĕhĩ  $  aṭṭhamu divasu paḍhukkiu tāvĕhĩ
text.10171: tahĩ avasarĕ tiẏa-lolua-cittahŏ  $  keṇa vi gampi kahiu varaïttahŏ
text.10172: "deva deva taü jāu maṇiṭṭhaü  $  tiṇṇi vi kaṇṇaü raṇṇĕ païṭṭhaü
text.10173: aṇṇu tāhĩ varaïttu gaviṭṭhaü  $  tuhũ puṇu muhiẏaĕ jjĕ parituṭṭhaü"
text.10174: taṃ ṇisuṇevi kuviu aṅgāraü  $  ṇaṃ havi ghiĕṇa sittu saẏa-vāraü
text.10175: "bhañjami ajju maḍappharu kaṇṇahũ  $  jeṇa ṇa honti majjhu ṇa vi aṇṇahũ"
text.10177: amarisa-kuḍḍhaü kuruḍu padhāiu  $  gampiṇu vaṇĕ vaïsāṇaru lāiu
text.10178: dhagadhagamāṇu samuṭṭhiu vaṇa-daü  $  jhatti palittu ṇāĩ khala-jaṇa-vaü
text.10182: paḍhama-davaggi ḍhukku sippīrahŏ  $  ṇāĩ kilesu ṇihīṇa-sarīrahŏ
text.10183: saẏalu vi kāṇaṇu jālālīviu  $  rāmahŏ hiẏaü ṇāĩ saṃdīviu
text.10185: sukkehi mi asukka pajalāviẏa  $  ṇaṃ supurisa pisuṇĕhĩ saṃtāviẏa
text.10186: kahi mi paṇaṭṭhaĩ vaṇaẏara-mihuṇaĩ  $  kandantaĩ ṇiẏa-ḍimbha-vihūṇaĩ
text.10187: gampi muṇindahũ saraṇu païṭṭhaĩ  $  sāvaẏa iva saṃsārahŏ taṭṭhaĩ
text.10188: tahĩ avasarĕ gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ janteṃ  $  khañciu ṇiẏa-vimāṇu haṇuvanteṃ
text.10189: "maru maru lāiu keṇa huvāsaṇu  $  acchaü gamaṇu karami guru-pesaṇu
text.10191: aha saraṇāiĕ aha vandiggahĕ  $  sāmi-kajjĕ aha mitta-pariggahĕ
text.10192: āĕhĩ vihurĕhĩ jo ṇaü jujjhaï  $  so ṇaru maraṇa-sae vi ṇa sujjhaï"
text.10197: sāẏara-salilu savvu ākarisiu  $  musala-pamāṇĕhĩ dhārĕhĩ varisiu
text.10198: huavahu ulhāviu pajalantaü  $  khama-bhāveṇa kali va vaḍḍhantaü
text.10199: taṃ uvasaggu harĕvi riu-maddaṇu  $  gaü muṇivarahũ pāsu maru-ṇandaṇu
text.10200: kara-kamalehĩ pāẏa pujjeppiṇu  $  vandiẏa guru guru-bhatti kareppiṇu
text.10201: muṇi-puṅgavĕhĩ samuccāĕvi kara  $  haṇuvahŏ diṇṇāsīsa suhaṅkara
text.10202: tahĩ avasarĕ vijjaü sāheppiṇu  $  meruhĕ pāsĕhĩ bhāmari deppiṇu
text.10205: bhadda-subhaddahã calaṇa ṇamantiu  $  haṇuẏahŏ sāhukkāru karantiu
text.10206: aggaĕ thiẏaü hasanti su-sīlaü  $  ṇaṃ tihũ kālahũ tiṇṇi vi līlaü
text.10210: puṇu vi pasaṃsiu so pavaṇañjaï  $  "suhaḍa-līla aṇṇahŏ kahŏ chajjaï
text.10211: caṅgaü paĩ vacchallu pagāsiu  $  uvasaggahŏ ṇāu mi ṇiṇṇāsiu
text.10212: ettiu jaï ṇa pattu tuhũ sundara  $  to ṇa vi ajju amhĕ ṇa vi muṇivara"
text.10213: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi mārui gañjolliu  $  danta-panti darisantu pavolliu
text.10214: "tiṇṇi vi dīsahŏ suṭṭhu viṇīẏaü  $  kavaṇu thāṇu kahŏ tiṇṇi vi dhīẏaüü
text.10215: kiṃ kajjeṃ vaṇa-vāsĕ païṭṭhaü  $  keṇa vi kaü uvasaggu aṇiṭṭhaü"
text.10216: haṇuvahŏ keraü vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu  $  pabhaṇaï candaleha vihaseppiṇu
text.10217: "tiṇṇi vi dahimuha-rāẏahŏ dhīẏaü  $  chuḍu chuḍu aṅgāreṇa vi variẏaü
text.10219: tahĩ avasarĕ kevalihĩ pagāsiu  $  "dasasaẏagaïhĕ maraṇu jasu pāsiu
text.10220: koḍi-sila vi jo saṃcālesaï  $  so varaïttahŏ bhāiu hosaï"
text.10224: ema vatta gaẏa amhahũ kaṇṇeṃ  $  teṃ kajjeṇa païṭṭhaü raṇṇeṃ
text.10225: vāraha divasa etthu acchantihũ  $  tīhi mi pujjārambhu karantihũ
text.10226: tāma vareṇa teṇa āruṭṭheṃ  $  uvavaṇĕ diṇṇu huāsaṇu duṭṭheṃ
text.10227: to vi ṇa cittu jāu vivareraü  $  eu kahāṇaü amhahũ keraü"
text.10228: to etthantarĕ romañciẏa-bhuu  $  bhaṇaï haseppiṇu pavaṇañjaẏa-suu
text.10229: "tumhĕhĩ jaṃ cintiu taṃ hūaü  $  sāhasagaïhĕ maraṇu saṃbhūaü
text.10230: jasu pāsiu so amhahũ sāmiu  $  tihuaṇĕ keṇa vi ṇaü āẏāmiu
text.10231: jāhũ pāsu pujjantu maṇoraha"  $  vaṭṭaï jāma paropparu iẏa kaha
text.10234: guru paṇavevi karevi pasaṃsaṇu  $  haṇuveṃ samaü kiẏaü saṃbhāsaṇu
text.10238: saṃbhāsaṇu karevi taṇu-taṇuveṃ  $  dahimuha-rāu vuttu puṇu haṇuveṃ
text.10239: "bho bho ṇaravaï mahihara-cindhahŏ  $  kaṇṇaü levi jāhi kikkindhahŏ
text.10240: tahĩ acchaï ṇārāẏaṇa-jeṭṭhaü  $  jo varu ciru kevalihĩ gaviṭṭhaü
text.10241: ghāiu teṇa samarĕ sāhasagaï  $  veẏaḍḍhuttara-seḍhihĕ ṇaravaï
text.10242: tāu kumāriu ahiṇava-bhoggaü  $  tiṇṇi vi rāhavacandahŏ joggaü
text.10243: maĩ puṇu laṅkāuri jāevvaü  $  pesaṇu sāmihĕ taṇaü karevvaü
text.10244: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi saṃcalliu dahimuhu  $  jo saṃmāṇĕ dāṇĕ raṇĕ ahimuhu
text.10248: teṇa vi kāmiṇi-thaṇa-paricaḍḍaṇu  $  diṇṇu sa ĩ bhu ehĩ avaruṇḍaṇu
text.10250: sa-vimāṇahŏ ṇahaẏalĕ jantāhŏ chuḍu laṅkāuri païsantāhŏ
text.10251: ṇisi sūrahŏ ṇāĩ samāvaḍiẏa āsālī haṇuvahŏ abbhiḍiẏa
text.10256: jujjhu samoḍĕvi  $  thiẏa āsāliẏā. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10258: maĩ avagaṇṇĕvi  $  ĕhu ko païsaï. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10259: ko sakkaï huavahĕ jhampa devi  $  āsīvisu bhuahĩ bhuẏaṅga levi
text.10260: ko sakkaï mahi kakkhaĕ chuhevi  $  giri-mandara-garua-bharuvvahevi
text.10261: ko sakkaï jama-muhĕ païsarevi  $  bhua-valeṇa samuddu samuttarevi
text.10262: ko sakkaï asi-pañjarĕ caḍevi  $  dharaṇinda-phaṇālihĕ maṇi khuḍevi
text.10263: ko sakkaï sura-kari-kumbhu dalĕvi  $  gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ diṇaẏara-gamaṇu khalĕvi
text.10264: ko sakkaï suravaï samarĕ haṇĕvi  $  ko païsaï maĩ tiṇa-samu gaṇevi"
text.10266: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi jasa-luddhaĕṇa  $  haṇuvanteṃ amarisa-kuddhaĕṇa
text.10267: avaloiẏa vijja sa-maccharĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ meiṇi palaẏa-saṇiccharĕṇa
text.10272: "samara-mahābharu  $  keṇa paḍicchiu. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10274: jo mahu sammuhu  $  gamaṇu ṇivāraï". tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10275: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeviṇu bhaṇaï manti  $  kiṃ tujjhu vi maṇĕ evaḍḍa bhanti
text.10276: jaïẏahũ suravara-saṃtāvaṇeṇa  $  hiẏa rāmahŏ gehiṇi rāmaṇeṇa
text.10278: parirakkha diṇṇa jaṇa-pujjaṇijja  $  ṇāmeṇa eha āsāla-vijja"
text.10280: pacaviu "maru malami maraṭṭu tujjhu  $  valu valu āsāliĕ dehi jujjhu
text.10282: jaṃ saẏala-kāla galagajjiẏaü  $  maṃ jāu maḍapphara-vajjiẏaü
text.10283: sā tuhũ so haũ taṃ eu raṇu  $  laï khatteṃ jujjhahũ ekku khaṇu"
text.10288: kavaẏa-saṇāhaü  $  kaïdhaẏa-ṇāhaü. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10290: sīhu va rokkĕvi  $  dhāiu kokkĕvi. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10291: pariharĕvi seṇṇu khañcĕvi vimāṇu  $  ekkallaü para laüḍiĕ samāṇu
text.10292: "valu valu" bhaṇantu ahimuhu paẏaṭṭu  $  ṇaṃ vara-kariṇihĕ kesari visaṭṭu
text.10293: ṇaṃ mahihara-koḍihĕ kulisa-ghāu  $  ṇaṃ dava-jālolihĕ jala-ṇihāu
text.10295: rehaï muha-kandarĕ païsarantu  $  ṇaṃ ṇisi-sambhavĕ ravi atthavantu
text.10296: vaḍḍhevaĕ laggu pacaṇḍu vīru  $  saṃcūriu gaẏa-ghāĕhĩ sarīru
text.10298: peṭṭahŏ abbhantarĕ païsarĕvi  $  valu paürisu jīviu avaharĕvi
text.10299: ṇīsariu paḍīvaü pavaṇi kiha  $  mahi tāḍĕvi phāḍĕvi viñjhu jiha
text.10304: uṭṭhiu kalaẏalu  $  haṇuẏahŏ sāhaṇe. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10306: mārui līlaĕ  $  laṅka païṭṭhaü. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10307: jaṃ diṭṭhu pahañjaṇi païsarantu  $  vajjāuhu dhāiu "haṇu" bhaṇantu
text.10308: "āsālī vahĕvi mahāṇubhāva  $  maru paharu paharu kahĩ jāhi pāva"
text.10309: vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa haṇuvantu valiu  $  ṇaṃ sīhahŏ ahimuhu sīhu caliu
text.10311: valu valahŏ bhiḍiu gaü gaẏahŏ ḍhukku  $  turaẏahŏ turaṅgu rahu rahahŏ mukku
text.10312: dhaü dhaẏahŏ vimāṇahŏ vara-vimāṇu  $  raṇu jāu surāsura-raṇa-samāṇu
text.10315: abbhiṭṭaĩ ve vi sa-kalaẏalaĩ  $  ṇaṃ lakkhaṇa-khara-dūsaṇa-valaĩ
text.10320: ve vi raṇaṅgaṇĕ  $  jaẏa-siri-luddhaïṃ. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10322: dujjaṇa-muhaĩ va  $  aï duppecchaïṃ. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10323: tahĩ tehaĕ raṇĕ vaṭṭantĕ ghorĕ  $  vahu-paharaṇa-chohĕ paḍante thorĕ
text.10325: "maru thakku thakka bhiḍu maĩ samāṇu  $  avaropparu vujjhahũ vala-sa(pa)māṇu
text.10326: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pihumaï valiu kema  $  maẏagalahŏ matta-māẏaṅgu jema
text.10327: te bhiḍiẏa paropparu ghāẏa denta  $  raṇĕ rāmaṇa-rāmahũ ṇāmu lenta
text.10328: vijjāhara-karaṇĕhĩ vāvaranta  $  jiha vijju-puñja ṇahaẏalĕ bhamanta
text.10330: āẏāmĕvi bhiuḍi-bhaẏaṅkarĕṇa  $  haü haẏamuhu haṇuvahŏ kiṅkarĕṇa
text.10331: gaẏa-ghāĕhĩ pāḍiu dharaṇiẏalĕ  $  kiu kalaẏalu devĕhĩ gaẏaṇaẏalĕ
text.10336: kuiu khaṇaddhĕṇa  $  maṇĕ vajjāuhu. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10338: bhaggu asesu vi  $  valu vivareraü. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10339: bhajjantaĕ sāhaṇĕ ṇiravasesĕ  $  haṇuvantu thakku para tahĩ paesĕ
text.10340: pañcamuha-līla raṇĕ dakkhavantu  $  "maṃ bhajjahŏ" ṇiẏa-valu sikkhavantu
text.10344: pammukku cakku raṇĕ duṇṇivāru  $  duddarisaṇu bhīsaṇu ṇisiẏa-dhāru
text.10346: teṃ cakkeṃ raṇaühĕ atula-valu  $  ucchiṇṇĕvi pāḍiu sira-kamalu
text.10347: dhāiu kavandhu amarisĕ caḍiu  $  dasa-paẏaĩ gampi mahiẏalĕ paḍiu
text.10352: saẏalu vi sāhaṇu  $  bhaggu parammuho. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10354: acchaï līlaĕ  $  laṅkāsundarī. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10355: "kiṃ ajja vi ṇa muṇahi eva vatta  $  āsāla-vijja āhavĕ samatta
text.10356: abbhiṭṭu tuhāraü jaṇaṇu jo vi  $  raṇĕ cakka-pahārĕ ṇihaü so vi"
text.10358: "hā maĩ muevi kahĩ gaẏaü tāẏa  $  hā kaluṇu ruantihĕ dehi vāẏa
text.10360: hā tāẏa samarĕ bhaḍa-thaḍa-ṇisumbha  $  sappurisa-raẏaṇa ahimāṇa-khambha"
text.10362: aïrāĕ sa-hattheṃ luhiu muhu  $  "halĕ kāĩ gahilliĕ ruahi tuhũ
text.10363: laï dhaṇuharu rahavarĕ caḍahi tuhũ  $  valu vujjhahũ jujjhahũ teṇa sahũ"
text.10368: caḍiẏa mahārahe  $  laṅkāsundari. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10370: sahũ sura-cāvĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ pāusa-siri. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10371: dhurĕ aïra pariṭṭhiẏa rahu paẏaṭṭu  $  para-vala-viṇāsu akhaliẏa-maraṭṭu
text.10372: tahĩ caḍĕvi padhāiẏa raṇĕ pacaṇḍa  $  māẏaṅgahŏ kariṇi va uddha-soṇḍa
text.10373: sūrahŏ saṇṇaddha va kāla-ratti  $  saddahŏ thakka va paḍhamā vihatti
text.10374: hakkāriu raṇĕ haṇuvantu tīĕ  $  pañcāṇaṇu jiha pañcāṇaṇīĕ
text.10376: jaṃ haẏa āsāliẏa ṇihaü tāu  $  taṃ jujjhu ajju khaẏa-kālu āu"
text.10378: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi bhaḍa-kaḍamaddaṇĕṇa  $  ṇibbhacchiẏa pavaṇahŏ ṇandaṇĕṇa
text.10379: "osaru maṃ aggaĕ thāhi mahu  $  kahĕ kahi mi jujjhu kaṇṇāĕ sahũ"
text.10384: hasiẏa sa-vibbhamu  $  laṅkāsundari. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10386: eṇālāvĕṇa  $  ṇavari aẏāṇaü. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10387: "eu kāĩ caviu paĩ duvviẏaḍḍha  $  kiṃ jalaṇa-tiḍikkaĕ taru ṇa daḍḍha
text.10388: kiṃ ṇa maraï ṇaru visa-duma-laẏāĕ  $  kiṃ viñjhu ṇa khaṇḍiu ṇammaẏāe
text.10389: kiṃ giri ṇa phuṭṭu vajjāsaṇīĕ  $  kiṃ ṇa ṇihaü kari pañcāṇaṇīĕ
text.10390: raẏaṇīĕ pacchāĕvi gaẏaṇa-maggu  $  kiṃ sūrahŏ sūrattaṇu ṇa bhaggu
text.10391: jaï ettiu maṇĕ ahimāṇu tujjhu  $  to kiṃ āsālihĕ diṇṇu jujjhu"
text.10395: sara-jāleṃ chāiu gaẏaṇu kiha  $  jaṇavaü micchatta-valeṇa jiha
text.10399: to vi ṇa bhijjaï  $  mārui vāṇĕhĩ
text.10400: parama-jiṇāgamu  $  jiha aṇṇāṇĕhĩ. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10402: raïhĕ aṇaṅgeṃ  $  dūa va ghalliẏa. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10404: sara-jālu vihañjevi laïu tehĩ  $  kāveri-salilu jiha ṇaravarehĩ
text.10405: aṇṇekkeṃ vāṇeṃ chiṇṇu chattu  $  ṇaṃ khuḍiu marāleṃ sahasavattu
text.10406: ṇaṃ sūrahŏ jemantahŏ visālu  $  viẏaliu karāu kalahoẏa-thālu
text.10407: taṃ ṇiĕvi chattu mahiẏalĕ paḍantu  $  melliu khuruppu tharatharaharantu
text.10408: saṃthavĕvi ṇa sakkiu sundareṇa  $  tavasittaṇu ṇāĩ kumuṇivareṇa
text.10411: guṇu chiṇṇu viṇāsiu cāu kiha  $  micchattu jiṇindāgamĕṇa jiha
text.10416: enti paḍīviẏa  $  mukka sarāsaṇi. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10418: chāiẏa meiṇi  $  jiha dukkālĕṇa. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10419: taṃ haṇuẏahŏ keraü vāṇa-jālu  $  chāẏantu asesu diẏantarālu
text.10420: vīsahĩ sarĕhĩ parichiṇṇu saẏalu  $  ṇaṃ parama-jiṇindeṃ moha-paḍalu
text.10421: aṇṇekkeṃ vāṇeṃ kavaü chiṇṇu  $  uru rakkhiu kaha vi ṇa haṇuu bhiṇṇu
text.10422: chijjantĕ kavaĕ harisiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  kiu kalaẏalu ṇahĕ suravara-jaṇeṇa
text.10423: diṇaẏarĕṇa pahañjaṇu vuttu ema  $  "mahilāĕ ji jiu haṇuvantu kema"
text.10424: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi pulaïẏa-bhueṇa  $  samvaüri padocchiu maru-sueṇa
text.10426: "iu kāĩ vuttu paĩ divasaẏara  $  jiṇa-dhavalu mueppiṇu ekku para
text.10427: jagĕ jo jo garuẏaü gajjiẏaü  $  bhaṇu mahilaĕ ko ṇa parajjiẏaü
text.10432: tāma visajjiu  $  ukkā-paharaṇu. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10434: kiu saẏa-sakkaru  $  duriu va ṇāṇĕṇa. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10435: puṇu mukka gaẏāsaṇi ṇisiẏarīĕ  $  ṇaṃ uvahihĕ gaṅga vasundharīĕ
text.10436: sa khaṇḍa-khaṇḍu kiẏa tihĩ sarehĩ  $  ṇaṃ dummaï saṃvara-ṇijjarehĩ
text.10438: viddhaṃsiu taṃ pi silīmuhehĩ  $  ṇaṃ kukaï-kaïttaṇu vara-vuhehĩ
text.10439: sila mukka paḍīvī tāĕ tāsu  $  ṇaṃ ku-mahila gaẏa para-ṇarahŏ pāsu
text.10440: vañciẏa pavaṇañjaẏa-ṇandaṇeṇa  $  ṇaṃ asaï su-puriseṃ diḍha-maṇeṇa
text.10442: sara mukka gaẏāsaṇi cakku sila  $  aṇṇu vi jaṃ kiṃ pi muaï mahila
text.10443: taṃ saẏalu vi jāi ṇiratthu kiha  $  gharĕ kiviṇahŏ takkuva-vindu jiha
text.10447: jiha jiha mārui  $  samarĕ ṇa bhajjaï
text.10448: tiha tiha kaṇṇa  $  ṇirāriu rajjaï. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10450: kaha vi tulaggĕhĩ  $  paḍiẏa ṇa mahiẏale. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10452: bho sāhu sāhu akhaliẏa-maraṭṭa  $  bhaḍa-bhañjaṇa para-vala-maïẏavaṭṭa
text.10453: bho sāhu sāhu paccakkha-maẏaṇa  $  sohagga-rāsi sappurisa-raẏaṇa
text.10455: bho sāhu sāhu taṇu-teẏa-piṇḍa  $  diḍha-viẏaḍa-vaccha bhuva-daṇḍa-caṇḍa
text.10456: bho sāhu sāhu riu-gandhahatthi  $  uvamijjaï jaï uvamāṇu atthi
text.10458: paĩ ṇāha parajjiẏa haũ samarĕ  $  varĕ evahĩ pāṇiggahaṇu karĕ"
text.10459: ṇiẏa-ṇāmu liheppiṇu mukku saru  $  ṇaṃ dūu visajjiu piẏahŏ gharu
text.10464: tāma ṇirāriu  $  hiẏaĕ suhaṅkaru. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10466: vāṇu visajjiu  $  ṇāmu liheppiṇu. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10469: rehaï sundari sahũ sundareṇa  $  vara-kariṇi ṇāĩ sahũ kuñjareṇa
text.10470: ṇaṃ ratta sañjha sahũ diṇaẏareṇa  $  ṇaṃ surasari sahũ raẏaṇāẏareṇa
text.10471: ṇaṃ sīhiṇi sahũ pañcāṇaṇeṇa  $  jiẏapaüma ṇāĩ sahũ lakkhaṇeṇa
text.10472: aha khaṇĕ khaṇĕ vaṇṇijjanti kāĩ  $  ṇaṃ puṇu vi puṇu vi tāĩ jĕ tāĩ
text.10474: etthantarĕ haṇuveṃ turiu valu  $  ṇimmohĕvi thambhĕvi kiu acalu
text.10475: suravahu-jaṇa-maṇa-saṃtāvaṇahŏ  $  maṃ ko vi kahesaï rāvaṇahŏ
text.10480: uccāreppiṇu  $  jiṇavara-maṅgalu. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10482: laṅkāsundari-  $  keraĕ rāule. tena tena tena citteṃ
text.10483: raẏaṇihĩ māṇeppiṇu suraẏa-sokkhu  $  saṃcallu vihāṇaĕ dukkhu dukkhu
text.10484: āucchiẏa sundari sundareṇa  $  vaṇamāla ṇāĩ lacchīhareṇa
text.10485: "laï jāmi kantĕ rāvaṇahŏ pāsu  $  sahũ valĕṇa karevī sandhi tāsu
text.10486: kiṃ bhaṇaï vihīsaṇu bhāṇukaṇṇu  $  ghaṇavāhaṇu maü mārīci aṇṇu
text.10487: kiṃ indaï kiṃ akkhaẏakumāru  $  kiṃ pañcāmuha raṇĕ duṇṇivāru
text.10488: ettiẏahã majjhĕ kā vuddhi kāsu  $  ko valahŏ bhiccu ko rāvaṇāsu
text.10490: puṇu puṇu vi bhaṇevvaü dahavaẏaṇu  $  lahu appi parāẏaü tiẏa-raẏaṇu
text.10491: appaṇaü kareppiṇu dāsarahi  $  sa ĩ bhuñjahi ṇīsāvaṇṇa mahi"
text.10494: so mārui rāmāesĕṇa gharu païsaraï vihīsaṇahŏ
text.10504: teṇa vi abbhutthāṇu kareppiṇu  $  sarahasu gāḍhāliṅgaṇu deppiṇu
text.10505: mārui vaïsāriu uccāsaṇĕ  $  ṇaṃ su-pariṭṭhiu jiṇu jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ
text.10509: añjaṇa-pavaṇañjaẏahũ su-kheu"  $  puṇu vi puṇu vi jaṃ pucchiu eu
text.10511: vihasevi vuttu haṇuvantĕṇa  $  "khemu kusalu savvahŏ jaṇahŏ
text.10512: para kuddhĕhĩ lakkhaṇa-rāmĕhĩ  $  akusalu ekku dasāṇaṇahŏ"
text.10516: puṇu vi puṇu vi kaṇṭaïẏa-bhuu  $  bhaṇaï paḍīvaü pavaṇa-suu
text.10517: "eu vihīsaṇa thāu maṇĕ  $  dujjaẏa hari-vala honti raṇĕ
text.10518: sumaṇa-duaï sumarantiẏā  $  sahũ valĕṇa saharisa ṇacciẏā
text.10519: acchaï rāmacandu āruṭṭhaü  $  ṇaṃ pañcāṇaṇu citteṃ duṭṭhaü
text.10520: "acchaï ajju kallĕ saṃcallami  $  palaẏa-samuddu jema utthallami
text.10521: acchaï ajju kallĕ āsaṅghami  $  gopaü jiha raẏaṇāẏaru laṅghami
text.10522: acchaï ajju kallĕ valu vujjhami  $  vaïrihĩ samaü raṇaṅgaṇĕ jujjhami
text.10523: acchaï ajju kallĕ abbhiṭṭami  $  dahamuha-vala-samuddu ohaṭṭami
text.10524: acchaï ajju kallĕ purĕ païsami  $  rāvaṇa-siri-sīhāsaṇĕ vaïsami
text.10525: acchaï ajju kallĕ riu-keraü  $  vāṇĕhĩ karami seṇṇu vivareraü
text.10526: acchaï ajju kallĕ ṇīsesaĩ  $  lemi chatta-dhaẏa-cindha-sahāsaĩ"
text.10528: teṃ kajjeṃ āu gavesaü  $  haũ suggīvahŏ pesaṇĕṇa
text.10533: aṇṇu vihīsaṇa eu muṇĕ  $  jamvava-keraü vaẏaṇu suṇĕ
text.10534: "paĩ honteṇa vi cala-maṇahŏ  $  vuddhi ṇa hūa dasāṇaṇahŏ
text.10536: paĩ honteṇa vi ṇāri parāiẏa  $  vāheṃ hariṇi va ruddha varāiẏa
text.10537: paĩ honteṇa vi rāvaṇu mūḍhaü  $  acchaï māṇa-gaïndārūḍhaü
text.10538: paĩ honteṇa vi ghora-raüddahŏ  $  gamu sajjiu saṃsāra-samuddahŏ
text.10539: paĩ honteṇa vi dhammu ṇa jāṇiu  $  raẏaṇīẏara-vaṃsahŏ khaü āṇiu
text.10540: paĩ honteṇa vi ṇiẏa-kulu maïlaü  $  vaü cārittu sīlu ṇaü pāliu
text.10541: paĩ honteṇa vi laṅka viṇāsiẏa  $  sampaẏa riddhi viddhi viddhaṃsiẏa
text.10542: paĩ honteṇa vi laggummāĕhĩ  $  caüvihehĩ uddhaddha-kasāehĩ
text.10543: paĩ honteṇa vi ṇa kiu ṇivāriu  $  eu kammu lajjaṇaü ṇirāriu
text.10546: appijjaü gehiṇi rāmahŏ  $  kiṃ lajjāvahŏ appaṇaü"
text.10550: aṇṇu parajjiẏa-para-valahŏ  $  suṇi sandesaü tahŏ ṇalahŏ
text.10553: samvukumāru jehĩ viṇivāiu  $  tisiraü jehĩ raṇaṅgaṇĕ ghāiu
text.10557: tehaü riu-samuddu raṇĕ ghoṭṭiu  $  sāhasagaï-kappaẏaru paloṭṭiu
text.10558: koḍi-sila vi saṃcāliẏa jehĩ  $  kiha kijjaï viggahu sahũ tehĩ
text.10561: jāma ṇa pāvanti raṇaṅgaṇĕ  $  dujjaẏa duddhara rāma-sara"
text.10565: aṇṇu vihīsaṇa guṇa-ghaṇaü  $  sandesaü ṇīlahŏ taṇaü
text.10567: jo para-dāra ramaï ṇaru mūḍhaü  $  acchaï ṇaraẏa-mahaṇṇavĕ chūḍhaü
text.10568: para-dāreṇa ti-akkhu viṇaṭṭhaü  $  jaïẏahũ ciru dāru-vaṇĕ païṭṭhaü
text.10569: paradārahŏ phaleṇa kamalāsaṇu  $  takkhaṇeṇa thiu so caürāṇaṇu
text.10570: paradārahŏ phaleṇa sura-sundaru  $  sahasa-ṇaẏaṇu kiu ṇavara purandaru
text.10571: paradārahŏ phaleṇa ṇillañchaṇu  $  kiu sa-kalaṅku ṇavara maẏalañchaṇu
text.10572: paradārahŏ phaleṇa vaïsāṇaru  $  vara-vāhiĕ uṭṭhaddhu ṇirantaru
text.10573: paradārahŏ phaleṇa kula-dīvahŏ  $  jīviu hiu māẏāsuggīvahŏ
text.10574: aṇṇu vi kari jiha jo ummeṭṭhaü  $  bhaṇu paradāreṃ ko ṇa vi ṇaṭṭhaü
text.10577: pekkhesahi rāvaṇu paḍiẏaü  $  aṇṇĕhĩ divasĕhĩ thovaĕhĩ"
text.10581: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ḍolliẏa-maṇĕṇa  $  mārui vuttu vihīsaṇĕṇa
text.10582: "ṇa gavesaï jaṃ caviu paĩ  $  saẏavāraü sikkhaviu maĩ
text.10583: to vi mahāraü ṇa kiu ṇivāriu  $  pajjaliẏaü maẏaṇaggi ṇirāriu
text.10584: ṇa gaṇaï jiṇa-bhāsiẏa-guṇa-vaẏaṇaĩ  $  ṇa gaṇaï indaṇīla-maṇi-raẏaṇaĩ
text.10585: ṇa gaṇaï gharu pariẏaṇu ṇāsantaü  $  ṇa gaṇaï paṭṭaṇu palaẏahŏ jantaü
text.10586: ṇa gaṇaï riddhi viddhi siẏa sampaẏa  $  ṇa gaṇaï galagajjanta mahāgaẏa
text.10587: ṇa gaṇaï hilihilanta haẏa cañcala  $  ṇa gaṇaï rahavara kaṇaẏa-samujjala
text.10588: ṇa gaṇaï sālaṅkāru sa-ṇeuru  $  maṇaharu piṇḍavāsu anteuru
text.10589: ṇa gaṇaï jala-kīlaü ujjāṇaĩ  $  jāṇaĩ jampāṇaĩ sa-vimāṇaĩ
text.10590: sīẏahĕ vaẏaṇu ekku para maṇṇaï  $  bhaṇami paḍīvaü jaï āẏaṇṇaï
text.10592: jaï ema vi ṇa kiu ṇivāriu  $  to āẏāmiẏa-āhavahŏ
text.10593: raṇĕ haṇuva tujjhu pekkhantahŏ  $  homi sahejjaü rāhavahŏ"
text.10599: paṭṭaṇu ṇiravasesu parisesĕvi  $  avaloẏaṇiẏahĕ valĕṇa gavesĕvi
text.10608: tahŏ vaṇahŏ majjhĕ haṇuvantĕṇa  $  sīẏa ṇihāliẏa dummaṇiẏa
text.10609: ṇaṃ gaẏaṇa-maggĕ ummilliẏa  $  canda-leha vīẏahĕ taṇiẏa
text.10614: tila-mittu ṇa 'valakkhaṇu jahĕ  $  ṇivvaṇṇijjaï kāĩ tahĕ
text.10627: kāsiĕhĩ kavolĕhĩ pujjaehĩ  $  kaṇṇehi mi kaṇṇāujjaehĩ
text.10630: aha kiṃ vahuṇā vittharĕṇa  $  a-ṇiviṇṇĕṇa sundara-maïṇa
text.10631: ekkekkaü vatthu laeppiṇu  $  ṇāvaï ghaḍiẏa paẏāvaïṇa
text.10637: jāṇaï-vaẏaṇa-kamalu alahantiu  $  suhu ṇa denti phullandhuẏa-pantiu
text.10638: haṇaï to vi ṇa karanti ṇivāriu  $  kara-kamalahĩ lagganti ṇirāriu
text.10640: vaṇĕ acchanti diṭṭha paramesari  $  sesa-sarīhĩ majjhĕ ṇaṃ sura-sari
text.10641: harisiu añjaṇeu etthantarĕ  $  "dhaṇṇaü ekku rāmu bhuvaṇantarĕ
text.10642: jo tiẏa eha āsi māṇantaü  $  rāvaṇu saĩ jĕ maraï alahantaü
text.10643: ṇiralaṅkāra vi hontī sohaï  $  jaï maṇḍiẏa to tihuaṇu mohaï"
text.10644: sīẏahĕ taṇaü rūu vaṇṇeppiṇu  $  appaü ṇahĕ pacchaṇṇu kareppiṇu
text.10646: jo pesiu rāhavacandĕṇa  $  so ghattiu aṅgutthalaü
text.10647: ucchaṅgĕ paḍiu vaïdehihĕ  $  ṇāvaï harisahŏ poṭṭalaü
text.10652: dihi parivaddhiẏa sahi-jaṇahŏ  $  tiẏaḍaĕ kahiu dasāṇaṇahŏ
text.10653: "jīviu sahalu tuhāraü ajju  $  ajju ṇavara ṇikkaṇṭaü rajju
text.10654: joaï ajju deva daha vaẏaṇaĩ  $  laddhaĩ ajju caüddaha raẏaṇaĩ
text.10655: ubbhahi ajju chatta-dhaẏa-daṇḍaĩ  $  bhuñjahi ajju pihimi chakkhaṇḍa i
text.10656: ajju matta-gaẏa-ghaḍaü pasāhahi  $  ajjuttuṅga turaṅgama vāhahi
text.10657: pujjaü ajju païjja tuhārī  $  ettiẏa-kālahŏ hasiẏa bhaḍārī
text.10658: lahu devāvahi ṇivvui-gāraü  $  vajjaü maṅgalu tūru tuhāraü
text.10659: ettiu vujjhami ṇīsaṃdeheṃ  $  jaï āliṅgaṇu dei saṇeheṃ"
text.10660: taṃ ṇisuṇevi dasāṇaṇu harisiu  $  savvaṅgiu romañcu padarisiu
text.10663: so harisu dharanta-dharantahŏ  $  aṅgĕ ṇa māiu rāvaṇahŏ
text.10667: joiu mandoẏarihĕ muhu  $  "kantĕ paḍīvī jāhi tuhũ
text.10668: abbhatthahi dhaẏaraṭṭha-gaï  $  mahu āliṅgaṇu dei jaï"
text.10670: tāĕ samāṇu sa-doru sa-ṇeuru  $  saṃcalliu saẏalu vi anteuru
text.10684: lakkhiẏa sīẏāevi kiha  $  sariẏahĩ sāẏara-soha jiha
text.10685: ṇimmiẏalañchaṇa sasi-joṇhā iva  $  titti-virahiẏa amiẏa-taṇhā iva
text.10686: ṇivviẏāra jiṇavara-paḍimā iva  $  raï-vihi viṇṇāṇiẏa-ghaḍiẏā iva
text.10687: abhaẏaṅkara chajjīva-daẏā iva  $  ahiṇava-komala-vaṇṇa laẏā iva
text.10688: sa-paohara pāusa-sohā iva  $  avicala savvaṃsaha vasuhā iva
text.10689: kanti-samujjala taḍi-mālā iva  $  savva-saloṇa uvahi-velā iva
text.10690: ṇimmala kitti va rāmahŏ kerī  $  tihuaṇu bhamĕvi pariṭṭhiẏa serī
text.10693: ṇaṃ saravarĕ siẏahĕ ṇisaṇṇaĩ  $  saẏavattaĩ papphulliẏaĩ
text.10697: gampiṇu pāsĕ vaīsarĕvi  $  kavaḍeṃ cāḍu-saẏaĩ karĕvi
text.10699: "halĕ halĕ sīẏĕ sīẏĕ kiṃ mūḍhī  $  acchahi dukkha-mahaṇṇavĕ chūḍhī
text.10700: halĕ halĕ sīẏĕ sīẏĕ kari vuttaü  $  laï cūḍaü kaṇṭhaü kaḍisuttaü
text.10701: halĕ halĕ sīẏĕ sīẏĕ jaï jāṇahi  $  laï vatthaĩ tamvolu samāṇahi
text.10702: halĕ halĕ sīẏĕ sīẏĕ suṇu vaẏaṇaĩ  $  aṅgu pasāhahi añjahi ṇaẏaṇaĩ
text.10703: halĕ halĕ sīẏĕ sīẏĕ laï dappaṇu  $  cūḍi ṇivaddhahi joahi appaṇu
text.10704: halĕ halĕ sīẏĕ sīẏĕ aviolĕhĩ  $  caḍu gaẏavarĕhĩ gilla-gillolĕhĩ
text.10705: halĕ halĕ sīẏĕ sīẏĕ uttuṅgĕhĩ  $  caḍu caḍulĕhĩ hiṃsanta-turaṅgĕhĩ
text.10706: halĕ halĕ sīẏĕ sīẏĕ mahi bhuñjahi  $  māṇusa-jammahŏ phalu aṇuhuñjahi
text.10708: piu icchahi paṭṭu paḍicchahi  $  jaï sabbhāveṃ hasiu paĩ
text.10709: to laï mahaevi-pasāhaṇu  $  abbhatthiẏa ettaḍaü maĩ
text.10714: "saccaü icchami dahavaẏaṇu  $  jaï jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ karaï maṇu
text.10715: icchami jaï mahu muhu ṇa ṇihālaï  $  icchami aṇuvaẏāĩ jaï pālaï
text.10716: icchami jaï mahu māsu ṇa bhakkhaï  $  icchami ṇiẏaẏa-sīlu jaï rakkhaï
text.10717: icchami jaï bhīẏaü mambhīsaï  $  icchami jaï para-davvu ṇa hiṃsaï
text.10718: icchami para-kalattu jaï vañcaï  $  icchami jaï aṇudiṇu jiṇu añcaï
text.10719: icchami jaï kasāẏa parisesaï  $  icchami jaï paramatthu gavesaï
text.10720: icchami jaï paḍimāu samāraï  $  icchami jaï pujjaü ṇīsāraï
text.10721: icchami abhaẏa-dāṇu jaï desaï  $  icchami jaï tava-caraṇu laesaï
text.10722: icchami jaï ti-kālu jiṇu vandaï  $  icchami jaï maṇu garahaï ṇindaï
text.10725: sirasā calaṇĕhĩ ṇivaḍeppiṇu  $  jaï maĩ appaï rāhavahŏ
text.10729: jaï puṇu ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇahŏ  $  ṇa samappiẏa rahu-ṇandaṇahŏ
text.10730: to haũ icchami eu halĕ  $  puri khippantī uvahi-jalĕ
text.10731: icchami ṇandaṇavaṇu bhajjantaü  $  icchami paṭṭaṇu palaẏahŏ jantaü
text.10732: icchami ṇisiẏara-valu atthantaü  $  icchami gharu pāẏālahŏ jantaü
text.10733: icchami dahamuha-taru chijjantaü  $  tilu tilu rāma-sarĕhĩ bhijjantaü
text.10734: icchami dasa vi siraĩ ṇivaḍantaĩ  $  sarĕ haṃsāhaẏaĩ va saẏavattaĩ
text.10736: icchami chijjantaĩ dhaẏa-cindhaĩ  $  icchami ṇaccantāĩ kavandhaĩ
text.10738: jaṃ jaṃ icchami taṃ taṃ saccaü  $  ṇaṃ [to] karami ajju halĕ paccaü
text.10740: jo āiu rāhava-keraü  $  ehu acchaï aṅgutthalaü
text.10747: "maru kahĩ taṇaü rāmu kahĩ lakkhaṇu  $  ajju pāvĕ taü kuddhu dasāṇaṇu
text.10748: sambharu sambharu iṭṭhā-devaü  $  maṃsu vihañjĕvi bhūahã devaü
text.10749: līha luhami tuha taṇaẏahŏ ṇāmahŏ  $  jiha ṇa hohi rāmaṇahŏ ṇa rāmahŏ
text.10750: eu bhaṇeppiṇu riu-paḍikūleṃ  $  dhāiẏa mandoari sahũ sūleṃ
text.10753: haẏamuhi hilihilanti uddhāiẏa  $  gaẏamuhi gulugulanti saṃpāiẏa
text.10754: taṃ valu ṇiĕvi tiẏahũ bhīsāṇahũ  $  kālu kiẏantu vi muccaï pāṇahũ
text.10756: tehaĕ vi kālĕ paḍivaṇṇaĕ  $  viṇu rāmeṃ viṇu lakkhaṇĕṇa
text.10757: vaïdehihĕ cittu ṇa kampiu  $  diḍha-valeṇa sīlahŏ taṇĕṇa
text.10761: taṃ uvasaggu bhaẏāvaṇaü  $  aṇṇu vi sīẏa-diḍhattaṇaü
text.10763: "dhīru jĕ dhīriu hoi ṇiẏāṇĕ vi  $  ḍhukkantaĕ jīviẏa-avasāṇĕ vi
text.10764: tiẏahĕ hoi jaṃ sīẏahĕ sāhasu  $  taṃ tehaü purisahŏ vi ṇa ḍhaḍḍhasu
text.10765: ehaĕ vihura-kālĕ vaṭṭantaĕ  $  sāmihĕ taṇaĕ kalattĕ marantaĕ
text.10766: jaï maĩ appaü ṇāhĩ pagāsiu  $  to ahimāṇu maraṭṭu viṇāsiu"
text.10768: ṇaṃ kaṇiẏāri-ṇivahu papphulliu  $  ṇaṃ kalahoẏa-puñju saṃcalliu
text.10777: haũ so rāma-dūu saṃpāiu  $  aṅgutthalaü laeppiṇu āiu
text.10778: paharahŏ maĩ samāṇu jaï sakkahŏ  $  sīẏā-evihĕ pāsu ma ḍhukkahŏ
text.10779: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu ṇisigoari  $  caviẏa viruddha kuddha mandoari
text.10780: "caṅgaü purisa-visesu gavesiu  $  sāṇu laevi sīhu parisesiu
text.10781: kharu saṃgahĕvi turaṅgamu vañciu  $  jiṇu pariharĕvi ku-devaü añciu
text.10782: chālaü dharĕvi gaïndu vimukkaü  $  vaḍḍantarĕṇa mitta tuhũ cukkaü
text.10783: ekku vi uvaẏāru ṇa sambhariẏaü  $  rāvaṇu muĕvi rāmu jaṃ variẏaü
text.10784: jasu ṇāmeṇa ji hāsaü dijjaï  $  tāsu kema dūattaṇu kijjaï
text.10787: so evahĩ tuhũ vandhevvaü  $  coru va milĕvi vahuttaĕhĩ
text.10791: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi haṇuvantu kiha  $  jhatti palittu davaggi jiha
text.10792: "jaṃ paĩ rāmahŏ ṇinda kaẏa  $  kiha saẏa-khaṇḍu ṇa jīha gaẏa
text.10794: aṇṇu vi jasu sahāu bhaḍa-bhañjaṇu  $  jhaḍajhaḍanti (?) somitti-pahañjaṇu
text.10795: tehĩ viruddhaehĩ ko chuṭṭaï  $  jāhã ṇiṇāeṃ amvaru phuṭṭaï
text.10796: kaṇhahŏ kiṇṇa parakkamu vujjhiu  $  khara-dūsaṇĕhĩ samaü jeṃ jujjhiu
text.10797: cāliẏa koḍisila vi avioleṃ  $  lacchi va gaĕṇa gilla-gilloleṃ
text.10798: sāhasagaï vi viẏāriu rāmeṃ  $  ko jagĕ aṇṇu teṇa āẏāmeṃ
text.10799: ahavaï rāvaṇo vi jasa-luddhaü  $  ṇavara cāru-sīleṇa na laddhaü
text.10800: corahŏ paraẏāriẏahŏ ajjoevi  $  tāsu sahāu hoi kiṃ koi vi
text.10802: aṇṇu vi ṇava-komala-vāhĕhĩ  $  jasu dijjaï āliṅgaṇaü
text.10803: mandovari tahŏ ṇiẏa-kantahŏ  $  kiha kijjaï dūattaṇaü"
text.10808: taṃ mandoari kuiẏa maṇĕ  $  vijju pagajjiẏa jiha gaẏaṇĕ
text.10809: "arĕ arĕ haṇuva haṇuva vala-gāvahũ  $  diḍhu hojjahi eẏahũ ālāvahũ
text.10810: jaï ṇa vihāṇaĕ paĩ vandhāvami  $  to ṇiẏa-gottĕ kalaṅkaü lāvami
text.10811: aṇṇu mi ghariṇi ṇa homi ṇisindahŏ  $  ṇaü paṇivāu karemi jiṇindahŏ"
text.10812: ema bhaṇevi turiu saṃcalliẏa  $  vela samuddahŏ jiha utthalliẏa
text.10815: pakkhalanti ṇivaḍanti kisoẏari  $  gaẏa ṇiẏa-ṇilaü patta mandoẏari
text.10818: ṇaṃ jiṇavara-paḍima surindĕṇa  $  paṇamiẏa sīẏa sa ẏaṃ bhu ĕhĩ
text.10820: gaẏa mandoẏari ṇiẏa-gharahŏ haṇuvantu vi sīẏahĕ sammuhaü
text.10821: aggaĕ thiu ahiseẏa-karu ṇaṃ suravara-lacchihĕ matta-gaü
text.10828: "kahĕ kahĕ vaccha vaccha vahu-ṇāmahŏ  $  kusala-vatta kiṃ akusalu rāmahŏ
text.10829: kahĕ kahĕ vaccha vaccha kamalekkhaṇu  $  kiṃ viṇihaü kiṃ jīvaï lakkhaṇu"
text.10830: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi sirasā paṇamanteṃ  $  akkhiẏa kusala-vatta haṇuvanteṃ
text.10831: "māĕ māĕ karĕ dhīraü ṇiẏa-maṇu  $  jīvaï rāmacandu sa-jaṇaddaṇu
text.10832: ṇavari pariṭṭhiu līha-visesaü  $  tavasi va savva-saṅga-parisesaü
text.10833: candu va vahula-pakkha-khaẏa-khīṇaü  $  ṇivaï va rajja-vihoẏa-vihīṇaü
text.10834: rukkhu va patta-riddhi-paricattaü  $  sukaï va dukkara kaha cintantaü
text.10835: taraṇi va ṇiẏa-kiraṇĕhĩ parivajjiu  $  jalaṇu va toẏa-tusāra-parajjiu
text.10837: indu va cavaṇa-kālĕ lhasiu  $  dasamihĕ āgamaṇĕ jema jalahi
text.10838: khāma-khāmu parijhīṇa-taṇu  $  tiha tumha vioeṃ dāsarahi
text.10843: ṇiẏa jaṇaṇi vi eva ṇa aṇusaraï  $  somitti jema paĩ saṃbharaï
text.10845: sumaraï ṇiẏa-ṇandaṇu māẏā iva  $  sumaraï sihi pāusa-chāẏā iva
text.10847: sumaraï bhiccu su-sāmi-daẏā iva  $  sumaraï karahu karīra-laẏā iva
text.10848: sumaraï matta-hatthi vaṇarāi va  $  sumaraï muṇivaru gaï-pavarā iva
text.10849: sumaraï ṇiddhaṇu dhaṇa-saṃpatti va  $  sumaraï suravaru jammuppatti va
text.10850: sumaraï bhaviu jiṇesara-bhatti va  $  sumaraï vaïẏākaraṇu vihatti va
text.10851: sumaraï sasi saṃpuṇṇa pahā iva  $  sumaraï vuhaẏaṇu sukaï-kahā iva
text.10852: tiha paĩ sumaraï devi jaṇaddaṇu  $  rāmahŏ pāsiu so dūmiẏa-maṇu
text.10854: ekku tuhāraü parama-duhu  $  aṇṇekku vi rahu-taṇaẏahŏ taṇaü
text.10855: ekku ratti aṇṇekku diṇu  $  somittihĕ sokkhu kahĩ taṇaü"
text.10860: kañcuu phuṭṭĕvi saẏa-khaṇḍu gaü  $  ṇaṃ khalu alahantu visiṭṭha-maü
text.10862: paḍhamu sarīru tāhĕ romañciu  $  pacchaĕ ṇavara visāeṃ khañciu
text.10863: "dukkaru rāma-dūu ehu āiu  $  mañchuḍu aṇṇu ko vi saṃpāiu
text.10864: atthi aṇeẏa etthu vijjāhara  $  je ṇāṇāviha-rūva-bhaẏaṅkara
text.10865: savvahã maĩ sabbhāva ṇirikkhiẏa  $  candaṇahi vi ciru ṇāhĩ parikkhiẏa
text.10866: ṇaṃ vaṇa-devaẏa thāṇahŏ cukkī  $  "maĩ pariṇahŏ" pabhaṇanti paḍhukkī
text.10867: ṇavara ṇiẏāṇĕ hūa vijjāhari  $  kilikilanti thiẏa amhahã uppari
text.10868: lakkhaṇa-khaggu ṇievi paṇaṭṭhī  $  hariṇi va vāha-silīmuha-taṭṭhī
text.10869: aṇṇekkaĕ kiu ṇāu bhaẏaṅkaru  $  haü mi chaliẏa vicchoiu halaharu
text.10871: kahĩ lakkhaṇu kahĩ dāsarahi  $  āẏahŏ dūattaṇu kahĩ taṇaü
text.10872: māẏā-rūveṃ piu karĕvi  $  maṇu joaï ko vi mahu ttaṇaü
text.10876: āḍhavami kheḍḍu vari eṇa sahũ  $  pekkhahũ kavaṇuttaru dei mahu
text.10877: māṇavĕṇa hovi āsaṅghiẏaü  $  kiha lavaṇa-mahovahi laṅghiẏaü"
text.10878: paccāriu ṇiẏa-maṇĕ cintantiĕ  $  "jaï tuhũ rāma-dūu viṇu bhantiĕ
text.10879: to kiha kamiu vaccha paĩ paĩ sāẏaru  $  jo so ṇakka-ggāha-bhaẏaṅkaru
text.10881: joẏaṇa-saẏaĩ satta jala-vittharu  $  ṇicca-ṇigou jema aï-duttaru
text.10882: ekku mahovahi duppaïsāro  $  aṇṇu vi āsālī-pāẏāro
text.10883: so savvahũ dulaṅghu saṃsāru va  $  avuhahũ visamaü paccāhāru va
text.10885: aṇṇu mahāhavĕ vipphuriẏāhari  $  kema parajjiẏa laṅkāsundarī
text.10887: āẏaĩ savvaĩ pariharĕvi  $  tuhũ laṅkā-ṇaẏari païṭṭhu kiha
text.10888: aṭṭha vi kammaĩ ṇiddalĕvi  $  vara-siddhi-mahāpuri siddhu jiha
text.10892: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vaẏaṇu mahagghaviu  $  vihaseppiṇu aṃjaṇeu caviu
text.10893: "paramesari ajja vi bhanti taü  $  jāvĕhĩ vajjāuhu samarĕ haü
text.10894: jāvĕhĩ vasikiẏa laṅkāsundari  $  laïẏa sā vi kuñjarĕṇa va kuñjari
text.10895: ṇihaẏāsāli mahovahi laṅghiu  $  evahĩ rāvaṇo vi āsaṅghiu
text.10896: eva vi jaï ṇa devi pattijjahi  $  to rāhava-saṅkeu suṇejjahi
text.10903: eẏaĩ cindhaĩ pāẏaḍaĩ  $  avarāi mi kiẏaĩ jāĩ chalaĩ
text.10908: suṇi jiha jaḍāi saṃghāriẏaü  $  raṇĕ raẏaṇakesi vitthāriẏaü
text.10909: sahasagaï sarehĩ viẏāriẏaü  $  suggīu rajjĕ vaïsāriẏaü
text.10910: taṃ ṇisuṇevi sīẏa pariosiẏa  $  "sāhu sāhu bho" ema paghosiẏa
text.10912: puṇu puṇu ema pasaṃsa karantiĕ  $  parihiu aṅgutthalaü turantiĕ
text.10914: tāva caütthaü paharu samāhaü  $  laṅkahĩ diṇṇu ṇāĩ jama-paḍahaü
text.10915: ṇāĩ paghosaï "ahŏ ahŏ loẏahŏ  $  dhammu karahŏ dhaṇa-riddhi ma joẏahŏ
text.10916: saccu cavahŏ para-davvu ma hiṃsahŏ  $  jeṃ cukkahŏ tahŏ vaïvasa-mahisahŏ
text.10917: para-tiẏa majju maṃsu mahu vañcahŏ  $  jeṃ cukkahŏ saṃsāra-pavañcahŏ
text.10919: maṃ jāṇejjahŏ paharu gaü  $  jamarāẏahŏ keraü āṇa-karu
text.10924: ṇaṃ puṇu vi paghosaï ghaḍiẏa-saru  $  "haũ tumhahũ guru uvaesa-karu
text.10925: jaggahŏ jaggahŏ kettiu suahŏ  $  maccharu ahimāṇu māṇu muahŏ
text.10926: kiṇṇa ṇiẏacchahŏ āu galantaü  $  ṇāḍi-pamāṇĕhĩ parimijjantaü
text.10928: ṇāḍi-pamāṇu pagāsiu ehaü  $  vihĩ ṇāḍihĩ muhuttu taṃ kehaü
text.10930: ekku muhutta-pamāṇu ṇivaddhaü  $  du-muhuttĕhĩ paharaddhu pasiddhaü
text.10931: paharaddhu vi sattaddha-sahāsĕhĩ  $  aṇṇu vi chāẏālĕhĩ ūsāsĕhĩ
text.10932: vihĩ addhĕhĩ diṇaddhahŏ addhaü  $  vāṇavaī-ūsāsĕhĩ vaddhaü
text.10933: aṇṇu vi paṇṇārahahĩ sahāsĕhĩ  $  paharu pagāsiu sokkha-ṇivāsĕhĩ
text.10935: ṇāḍihĕ ṇāḍihĕ kumbhu gaü  $  caüsaṭṭhihĩ kumbhĕhĩ ratti-diṇu
text.10936: ettiu chijjaï āu-valu  $  teṃ kajjeṃ thuvvaï parama-jiṇu"
text.10940: ṇisi-paharĕ caütthaĕ tāḍiẏaĕ  $  ṇaṃ jaga-kavāḍĕ ugghāḍiẏaĕ
text.10941: tahĩ tehaĕ kālĕ pagāsiẏaü  $  tiẏaḍaĕ siviṇaü viṇṇāsiẏaü
text.10942: "halĕ halĕ lavaliĕ laïĕ lavaṅgiĕ  $  sumaṇĕ suvuddhiĕ tārĕ taraṅgiĕ
text.10943: halĕ kakkoliĕ kuvalaẏa-loẏaṇĕ  $  halĕ gandhāri gori goroẏaṇĕ
text.10944: halĕ vijjuppahĕ jālāmāliṇi  $  halĕ haẏamuhi gaẏamuhi kaṅkāliṇi
text.10945: siviṇaü ajju māĕ maĩ diṭṭhaü  $  ekku johu ujjāṇĕ païṭṭhaü
text.10946: taru taru savvu teṇa ākarisiu  $  vajjeṃ jiha vaṇa-bhaṅgu padarisiu
text.10947: so vi ṇivaddhaü indaï-rāeṃ  $  pāva-piṇḍu ṇaṃ garua-kasāeṃ
text.10948: paṭṭaṇĕ païsāriu veḍheppiṇu  $  gaü dasasira-sirĕ pāu ṭhaveppiṇu
text.10949: puṇu thovantarĕ harisiẏa-gatteṃ  $  kiu ghara-bhaṅgu ṇāĩ du-kalatteṃ
text.10956: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi tiẏaḍahĕ taṇaü  $  tahĩ ekkahĕ maṇĕ vaddhāvaṇaü
text.10957: "halĕ caṅgaü siviṇaü diṭṭhu paĩ  $  rāvaṇahŏ kahevaü gampi maĩ
text.10958: eu jaṃ diṭṭhu maṇoharu uvavaṇu  $  taṃ vaïdehihĕ keraü jovvaṇu
text.10959: ṇiddaramaliu jeṇa so rāvaṇu  $  jo ṇivaddhu so sattu bhaẏāvaṇu
text.10960: jo dahagīvahŏ uvari padhāiu  $  so ṇimmalu jasu kahi mi ṇa māiu
text.10961: jaṃ puhaī-jaẏagharu viddhaṃsiu  $  taṃ para-valu dahamuhĕṇa viṇāsiu
text.10962: jaṃ parighitta laṅka raẏaṇāẏarĕ  $  sā mihiliẏa païsāriẏa siriharĕ"
text.10963: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi aṇṇekka pavolliẏa  $  gaggara-vaẏaṇī aṃsu-jalolliẏa
text.10964: "avaseṃ siviṇaü hoi asundaru  $  jahĩ paḍivakkhahŏ pakkhiu sundaru
text.10965: muṇivara-bhāsiu ḍhukku pamāṇahŏ  $  jiha laṅkahĕ viṇāsu ujjāṇahŏ
text.10967: ehu siviṇaü sīẏahĕ sahalu  $  jasu rāmahŏ vi jaü jaṇaddaṇahŏ
text.10968: sahũ parivāreṃ sahũ valĕṇa  $  khaẏa-kālu paḍhukku dasāṇaṇahŏ"
text.10973: ira-aïraü viṇṇi mi pesiẏaü  $  haṇuvantahŏ pāsu gavesiẏaü
text.10975: tahĩ saṃpattaü viṇṇi vi juvaïu  $  ṇaṃ siva-sāsaĕ tavasiri-sugaïu
text.10976: ṇaṃ khama-daẏaü jiṇāgamĕ diṭṭhaü  $  jaẏakāreppiṇu pāsĕ ṇiviṭṭhaü
text.10977: teṇa vi tāhĩ samaü piu jampĕvi  $  kaṇṭhaü kañcī-dāmu samappĕvi
text.10978: puṇu viṇṇatta halīsa-maṇohari  $  "bhoaṇu tumha kema paramesari"
text.10979: akkhaï sīẏa samīraṇa-puttahŏ  $  "vāsara ekkavīsa maĩ bhuttahŏ
text.10980: jāma ṇa patta vatta bhattārahŏ  $  tāma ṇivitti majjhu āhārahŏ
text.10981: ajju ṇavara paripuṇṇa maṇoraha  $  taṃ jĕ bhojju jaṃ sua rāmahŏ kaha"
text.10983: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pavaṇahŏ suĕṇa  $  avaloiu muhu aïrahŏ taṇaü
text.10984: "gampiṇu akkhu vihīsaṇahŏ  $  vuccaï sīẏahĕ kari pāraṇaü
text.10988: irĕ tuhu mi jāhi paramesarihĕ  $  taṃ mandiru laṅkāsundarihĕ
text.10989: lahu bhoẏaṇu āṇahi maṇaharaü  $  jaṃ sa-rasu sa-ṇehaü jiha suraü"
text.10990: taṃ ṇisuṇevi ve vi saṃcalliu  $  ṇaṃ surasari-jaüṇaü utthalliu
text.10991: raddhu bhattu lahu leviṇu āẏaü  $  ṇaṃ sarasaï-lacchiu vikkhāẏaü
text.10992: vaḍḍhiu bhoẏaṇu bhoẏaṇa-sejjaĕ  $  acchaĕ pacchaĕ laṇhaĕ pejjaĕ
text.11003: acchaü eu (?) muharasiu  $  aviẏaṇhaü ulhāvaṇaü kiha
text.11004: jahĩ jĕ laïjjaï tahĩ jĕ tahĩ  $  guliẏāraü jiṇavara-vaẏaṇu jiha
text.11008: taṃ tehaü bhuñjĕvi bhoẏaṇaü  $  puṇu karĕvi vaẏaṇa-pakkhālaṇaü
text.11009: samalahĕvi aṅgu vara-candaṇĕṇa  $  viṇṇatta devi maru-ṇandaṇĕṇa
text.11010: "caḍu mahu taṇaĕ khandhĕ paramesari  $  ṇemi tetthu jahĩ rāhava-kesari
text.11011: milahŏ ve vi pūrantu maṇoraha  $  phiṭṭaü jaṇavaĕ rāmāẏaṇa-kaha"
text.11012: taṃ ṇisuṇevi devi gañjolliẏa  $  sāhukkāru karanti pavolliẏa
text.11013: "sundara ṇiẏa-gharu gaẏa-guṇa-vahuahĕ(?)  $  eha ṇa ṇitti hoi kula-vahuahĕ
text.11014: gammaï vaccha jaï vi ṇiẏa-kulaharu  $  viṇu bhattāreṃ gamaṇu asundaru
text.11015: jaṇavaü hoi duguñchaṇa-sīlaü  $  khala-sahāu ṇiẏa-citteṃ maïlaü
text.11016: jahĩ jĕ ajuttu tahĩ jĕ āsaṅkaï  $  maṇu rañjĕvi sakko vi ṇa sakkaï
text.11017: ṇihaĕ dasāṇaṇĕ jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṃ  $  maĩ jāevaü sahũ valahaddeṃ
text.11020: laï cūḍāmaṇi mahu taṇaü  $  ahiṇāṇu samappahi rāhavahŏ
text.11024: aṇṇu vi āliṅgĕvi guṇa-ghaṇaü  $  sandesaü akkhu mahu ttaṇaü
text.11025: "vala tujjhu vioeṃ jaṇaẏa-suẏa  $  thiẏa līha-visesa ṇa kaha vi mua
text.11026: jhīṇa maẏaṅka-leha gaha-gahiẏa va  $  jhīṇa surinda-riddhi tava-rahiẏa va
text.11027: jhīṇa kudesa-majjhĕ vāsāṇi va  $  jhīṇāvuha-muhĕ sukaï-suvāṇi
text.11028: jhīṇa divāẏara-daṃsaṇĕ ratti va  $  jhīṇa ku-jaṇavaĕ jiṇavara-bhatti va
text.11029: jhīṇa dubhikkhĕ attha-sampatti va  $  jhīṇa vuḍhattaṇĕṇa vala-satti va
text.11030: jhīṇa caritta-vihūṇahŏ kitti va  $  jhīṇa ku-kulaharĕ kulavahu-ṇitti va
text.11032: raṇĕ duvvāra-vaïri-viṇivārahŏ  $  tahŏ saṃdesaü ṇehi kumārahŏ
text.11033: vuccaï "paĩ honteṇa vi lakkhaṇa  $  acchaï sīẏa ruẏanti alakkhaṇu
text.11035: ṇaü devĕhĩ ṇaü dāṇavĕhĩ  $  ṇaü rāmeṃ vaïri-viẏāraĕṇa
text.11036: para mārevvaü dahavaẏaṇu  $  sa ĩ bhu a-jualeṇa tuhāraĕṇa""
text.11038: taṃ cūḍāmaṇi levi gaü lacchi-ṇivāsahŏ akhaliẏa-māṇahŏ
text.11039: ṇaṃ sura-kari kamaliṇi-vaṇahŏ mārui valiu samuhu ujjāṇahŏ
text.11045: "tāma ṇa jāmi ajju jāma ṇa romāviu maĩ dasāṇaṇo
text.11054: ummūlantu asesa taru  $  ekku muhuttu etthu parisakkami
text.11055: jovvaṇu jema vilāsiṇihĕ  $  vaṇu daramalami ajju jiha sakkami"
text.11060: puṇaravi vāravāra pariañcĕvi ṇiẏaẏa-maṇeṇa sundaro  $  ṇandaṇa-vaṇĕ païṭṭhu ṇaṃ māṇasa-saravarĕ amara-kuñjaro
text.11061: ṇavari uvavaṇālae tetthu ṇijjhāiẏāsoga-ṇāraṅga-puṇṇāga-ṇāgā lavaṅgā piẏaṅgū-viḍaṅgā samuttuṅga-sattacchaẏā
text.11063: taru tarala-tamāla-tālela-kakkola-sālā visālañjaṇā vañjulā ṇimva-sindīu sindūra-mandāra-kundenda-sajjajjuṇā
text.11065: tilaẏa-vaüla-campaẏā ṇāgavellī-vaẏā pippalī pupphalī pāḍalī keẏaī māhavī malliẏā māhuliṅgī-tarū
text.11068: kaṇaïra-kaṇiẏāri-sellū-karīrā karañjāmalī-kaṅguṇī-kañcaṇā evamāitti aṇṇe vi je pāẏavā keṇa te vujjhiẏā
text.11071: ṇaṃ dharaṇihĕ jemaṇaü karu  $  uppāḍeppiṇu ṇahaẏalĕ bhāmiu
text.11078: kaḍḍhiu vara-pāẏavu tharaharantu  $  ṇaṃ vaïri rasāẏalĕ païsarantu
text.11079: ṇaṃ ṇandaṇa-vaṇahŏ rasantu jīu  $  ṇaṃ dharaṇihĕ vāhā-daṇḍu vīu
text.11080: ṇaṃ dahavaẏaṇahŏ ahimāṇa-khambhu  $  ṇaṃ puhaï-pasūẏaṇe pavara-gabbhu
text.11083: kalaẏaṇṭhi-kalāvārāva-muhalu  $  ṇimmaüru vi sappuriso vva suhalu
text.11086: ṇāvaï gaṅgahĕ jaüṇahĕ vi  $  majjhĕ paẏāgu pariṭṭhiu taïẏaü
text.11091: vaḍa-pāẏavu ghivevi ummūliu puṇu kaṅkelli-taruvaro  $  ubhaẏa-karehĩ levi ṇaṃ vāhuvalindeṃ bharaha-ṇaravaro
text.11095: kaṅkelli-vacchu iẏa-guṇa-vicittu  $  ṇaṃ dahamuha-māṇu malevi ghittu
text.11096: puṇu laïu ṇāẏa-campaü kareṇa  $  ṇaṃ disa-pāẏavu disa-kuñjareṇa
text.11099: so campaü gaẏaṇaṅgaṇa-samaggu  $  dahavaẏaṇa-maḍappharu ṇāĩ bhaggu
text.11101: campaẏa-pāẏavu parighivĕvi  $  kaḍḍhiẏa vaüla-tilaẏa mahi tāḍĕvi
text.11102: gajjaï matta-gaïndu jiha  $  ve ālāṇa-khambha uppāḍĕvi
text.11107: campaẏa-tilaẏa-vaüla-vaḍapāẏava-surataru bhagga jāvĕhĩ  $  caürujjāṇapāla saṃpāiẏa galagajjanta tāvĕhĩ
text.11111: so haṇuvahŏ bhiḍiu palamva-vāhu  $  ṇaṃ gaṅgā-vāhahŏ jaüṇa-vāhu
text.11112: jo teṇa pamelliu laüḍi-daṇḍu  $  so bhañjĕvi gaü saẏa-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍu
text.11113: sirisaïlu vi pahasiu pulaïẏaṅgu  $  "vaṇa-bhaṅgahŏ vīẏaü suhaḍa-bhaṅgu
text.11114: darisāvami" ema cavantaeṇa  $  ummūliu tālu turantaeṇa
text.11115: ku-jaṇu va sura-bhāẏaṇu thaḍḍha-bhāu  $  dūra-halaü aṇṇu vi duppaṇāu
text.11117: teṇa ṇisāẏaru āhaẏaṇĕ  $  āẏāmevi samāhaü tāleṃ
text.11118: paḍiu ghuleppiṇu dharaṇiẏalĕ  $  ghāiu desu ṇāĩ dukkāleṃ
text.11123: jaṃ haṇuveṇa ṇihaü samaraṅgaṇĕ dāḍhāvali sa-maccharo
text.11124: dhāiu ekkadantu galagajjĕvi ṇaṃ gaẏavarahŏ gaẏavaro
text.11125: jo puvva-vārĕ vaṇa-rakkhavālu  $  saṃpāiu ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālĕ kālu
text.11127: āẏāmĕvi satti pamukka teṇa  $  ṇaṃ sari sāẏarahŏ mahīhareṇa
text.11128: sā sāmīraṇihĕ parāẏaṇattha  $  asaï va sappurisahŏ akiẏattha
text.11129: haṇuveṇa vi raṇaühĕ duṇṇirikkhu  $  uppāḍiu vara-sāhāru rukkhu
text.11135: ekkadantu ghummantu raṇĕ  $  pāḍiu rukkhu jema duvvāeṃ
text.11140: tāma kaẏantavakku āhavĕ asakku sakkakka-sama-valo  $  hatthi va gilla-gaṇḍu tiẏasahũ pacaṇḍu kodaṇḍa-karaẏalo
text.11141: jo dāhiṇa-vārahŏ rakkhavālu  $  kokkantu padhāiu muha-karālu
text.11142: "vaṇu bhañjĕvi kahĩ haṇuvanta jāhi  $  laï paharaṇu ahimuhu thāhi thāhi
text.11143: jiha haü dāḍhāvali uttharantu  $  aṇṇu vi viṇivāiu ekkadantu
text.11144: tiha paharu paharu bho pavaṇajāẏa  $  dahavaẏaṇahŏ kerā kuddha pāẏa"
text.11145: paccārĕvi pāvaṇi dhaṇudhareṇa  $  vihĩ sarĕhĩ viddhu raṇĕ duddhareṇa
text.11146: pariañcĕvi ṇivaḍiẏa puraü tāsu  $  ṇami-viṇami va paḍhama-jiṇesarāsu
text.11147: etthantarĕ raṇĕ ṇīsandaṇeṇa  $  āruṭṭheṃ pavaṇahŏ ṇandaṇeṇa
text.11148: āẏāmĕvi ummūliu tamālu  $  ṇaṃ diṇaẏareṇa tama-timira-jālu
text.11150: ubhaẏa-karĕhĩ bhāmevi taru  $  pahaü kaẏantavakku daṇu-dāreṃ
text.11151: vihalaṅghalu ghummanta-taṇu  $  giri va paloṭṭiu kulisa-pahāreṃ
text.11156: ṇihaĕ kaẏantavakkĕ aṇṇekku ṇisāẏaru bhaẏa-vivajjio  $  vara-karavāla-hatthu kokkantu padhāiu mehagajjio
text.11161: etthantarĕ aṇilahŏ ṇandaṇeṇa  $  uppāḍiu candaṇu diḍha-maṇeṇa
text.11162: sappurisu jema vahu-khama-sarīru  $  sappurisu jema chee vi dhīru
text.11163: sappurisu jema sīẏala-sahāu  $  sappurisu jema sāmaṇṇa-bhāu
text.11164: sappurisu jema jaṇavaĕ mahagghu  $  sappurisu jema savvahũ salagghu
text.11167: laüḍi-pahāreṃ ghāiẏaü  $  paḍiu phaṇindu ṇāĩ mahi-maṇḍalĕ
text.11172: pavarujjāṇavāla cattāri vi haẏa haṇuveṇa jāvĕhĩ  $  sesārakkhiehĩ dahavaẏaṇahŏ gampiṇu kahiu tāvĕhĩ
text.11177: ṇiccintaü acchahi kāĩ deva  $  vaṇu bhaggu ku-muṇivara-hiẏaü jeva
text.11179: uppāḍĕvi tarala-tamāla-tāla  $  ceẏāri vi haẏa ujjāṇa-pāla"
text.11180: tahĩ avasarĕ āẏa 'ṇṇekka vatta  $  vajjāuhu āsālī samatta
text.11182: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu dahavaẏaṇu  $  kuviu davaggi va sittu ghieṇa
text.11183: "ko jama-rāeṃ sambhariu  $  uvavaṇu bhaggu mahāraü jeṇa"
text.11188: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu mandoẏari pisuṇaï ṇisiẏarindahŏ  $  "kiṇṇa kaẏāvi deva paĩ vujjhiu dhīẏā-suu mahindahŏ
text.11189: jasu taṇiẏa jaṇaṇi pavaṇañjaeṇa  $  vāraha varisaĩ paricattaeṇa
text.11191: kulaharahŏ visajjiẏa ṇa gaẏa tahi mi  $  vaṇavāsĕ pasūiẏa gampi kahi mi
text.11192: vijjāharĕhĩ caüdisu gaviṭṭha  $  giri-kuharabbhantarĕ ṇavara diṭṭha
text.11193: kiu haṇuruha-dīvantarĕ ṇivāsu  $  haṇuvantu pagāsiu ṇāmu tāsu
text.11194: pariṇāviu paĩ vi aṇaṅgakusuma  $  kaṅkelli-laẏa va ubbhiṇṇa-kusuma
text.11195: iẏa uvaẏārahã ekku vi ṇa ṇāu  $  aṇṇu vi vaïrihĩ pāikku jāu
text.11196: jaṃ āiu aṅgutthalaü levi  $  mahu uṭṭhiu galagajjiu karevi"
text.11198: ekku vi uvavaṇĕ daramaliĕ  $  dahamuha-huavahu jhatti palittaü
text.11199: aṇṇu vi puṇu mandoẏariĕ  $  levi palāla-bhāru ṇaṃ ghittaü
text.11204: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu dahavaẏaṇeṃ pavarāṇatta kiṅkarā  $  akka-miẏaṅka-sakka-vara-vikkama paharaṇa-kara-bhaẏaṅkarā
text.11211: hatthi vva saṃkhuhiẏa  $  sūra vva vahu-uiẏa
text.11212: jalahi vva utthalla  $  sela vva saṃcalla
text.11218: eva dasāṇaṇa-kiṅkarahũ  $  valu saṇṇahĕvi saẏalu saṃcalliu
text.11224: khohiu sāẏaro vva laṅkā-ṇaẏarī jāẏā samāulā  $  rahavara-gaẏavaroha-jampāṇa-vimāṇa-turaṅga-saṅkulā
text.11225: valu kahi mi ṇa māiu ṇīsarantu  $  saṃcallu paoliẏa daramalantu
text.11227: viṇu kheveṃ paharaṇa-vara-karehĩ  $  vaṇu veḍhiu rāvaṇa-kiṅkarehĩ
text.11228: ṇaṃ tārā-maṇḍalu ṇava-ghaṇehĩ  $  ṇaṃ tihuaṇu tihi mi pahañjaṇehĩ
text.11229: tiha veḍhĕvi rahavara-gaẏavarehĩ  $  paccāriu mārui ṇaravarehĩ
text.11230: "pāẏāru paloṭṭiu jiha visālu  $  vajjāuhu haü raṇĕ koṭṭavālu
text.11231: vaṇa-pāla vahiẏa vaṇu bhaggu jema  $  khala khudda pisuṇa maru paharu tema"
text.11235: ṇaṃ sīheṇa viruddhaĕṇa  $  maẏagala-jūhu disahĩ osāriu
text.11240: jaü jaü pavaṇaputtu parisakkaï taü taü valu ṇa thakkaī  $  kuddhaĕ ṇiẏaẏa-kantĕ sukalattu va ṇaü ṇāsaï ṇa ḍhukkaī
text.11241: su-kalattu jema aḍḍaḍḍu jāi  $  su-kalattu jema bhiuḍihĩ ṇa thāi
text.11242: su-kalattu jema vivariu ṇa hoi  $  su-kalattu jema vaẏaṇu vi ṇa joi
text.11243: su-kalattu jema dūriu maṇeṇa  $  su-kalattu jema ḍhukkaï khaṇeṇa
text.11244: su-kalattu jema osāru dei  $  su-kalattu jema karaẏalu dhuṇei
text.11245: su-kalattu jema lhikkantu jāi  $  su-kalattu jema pāseu lei
text.11246: su-kalattu jema roseṇa valaï  $  su-kalattu jema sampattu khalaī
text.11247: su-kalattu jema saṃkuiẏa-vaẏaṇu  $  su-kalattu jema maülanta-ṇaẏaṇu
text.11248: su-kalattu jema kiẏa-vaṅka-bhamuhu  $  su-kalattu jema dhāvantu samuhu
text.11250: rokkaï kokkaï ḍhukkaï vi  $  veḍhaï valaï dhāi paripellaï
text.11251: haṇuvahŏ valu su-kalattu jiha  $  piṭṭijjantu vi maggu ṇa mellaï
text.11268: urasā vi aṇṇu  $  sirasā vi aṇṇu
text.11280: riusāhaṇa-ṇandaṇavaṇaĩ  $  veṇṇi vi raṇĕ sarisāĩ samattaĩ
text.11285: pāḍiẏa vara-turaṅga raha moḍiẏa sūriẏa matta kuñjarā  $  vesa va ṇaha-vilukka thiẏa kevala ukkhaẏa-duma-vasundharā
text.11287: mahiẏalĕ sohanti paḍantāĩ  $  ṇaṃ jiṇa-paḍimahĕ paṇamantāĩ
text.11288: vaṇa-valaĩ ṇisaṇṇaĩ dharaṇiẏalĕ  $  jalaẏaraĩ va sukkaĩ uvahi-jalĕ
text.11289: vaṇa-valaĩ su-saṃtāviẏaĩ kiha  $  dupputtĕhĩ ubhaẏa-kulāĩ jiha
text.11290: vaṇa-valaĩ paropparu mīsiẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ vara-mihuṇāĩ padīsiẏaĩ
text.11291: sāmīraṇi-ṇiddaĕ bhuttāĩ  $  raṇĕ raẏaṇihĩ milĕvi pasuttāĩ
text.11292: vaṇa-valaĩ haṇuva-paharāhaẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ kālahŏ pāhuṇāĩ gaẏaĩ
text.11293: ahavaï ṇaṃ valahŏ hiẏattaṇeṇa  $  vaṇu bhaggu bhaḍaggihĕ kāraṇeṇa
text.11295: samarĕ mahāsarĕ ruhira-jalĕ  $  ṇara-sira-kamalaĩ disahĩ paḍhoĕvi
text.11296: mārui matta-gaïndu jiha  $  vaggaï sa ĩ bhu va-jualu pajoĕvi
text.11298: viṇivāiĕ sāhaṇĕ  $  bhaggaĕ uvavaṇĕ  $  ṇaṃ hari harihĕ samāvaḍiu
text.11299: sa-turaṅgu sa-sandaṇu  $  dahamuha-ṇandaṇu  $  akkhaü haṇuvahŏ abbhiḍiu
text.11303: phuriẏāṇaṇaü vihuṇiẏa-vāhudaṇḍao ṇaṃ gaẏavaraü ṇibbhara-gilla-gaṇḍao  $  taṃ dahavaẏaṇu jaẏakārevi akkhao ṇaṃ ṇīsariu garuḍahŏ samuhu takkhao
text.11304: saṃcallantaĕ raha-gaẏa-vāhaṇĕ  $  raṇĕ paḍahaü devāviu sāhaṇĕ
text.11306: dhūmakeu dhaẏa-daṇḍĕ thaveppiṇu  $  kāladiṭṭhi sāratthi kareppiṇu
text.11307: parihiu māẏā-kavaü kumāreṃ  $  rahu saṃcalliu pacchima-dāreṃ
text.11309: siva phekkāru karanti paḍhukkaï  $  sukkaĕ pāẏavĕ vukkaṇu vukkaï
text.11310: pahu chindantu sappu saṃcallaï  $  puṇu paḍikūlu pavaṇu paḍipellaï
text.11311: rāsahu rasaï kumārahŏ pacchaĕ  $  ṇāvaï sajjaṇu laggu kaḍacchaĕ
text.11313: avagaṇṇĕvi tāi mi  $  saüṇa-saẏāi mi  $  duppariṇāmeṃ chāiẏaü
text.11314: ṇaṅgūla-paīhahŏ  $  sīhu va sīhahŏ  $  haṇuvahŏ samuhu padhāiẏaü
text.11318: etthantare pabhaṇaï pavara-sārahi "samaraṅgaṇaĕ keṇa samaü pahārahi  $  ṇa turaṅga gaẏa dhaẏa-cindhaĩ vihāvami savaḍammuhaü rahavaru kāsu vāhami"
text.11320: sārahi samara-saĕhĩ jasavantahŏ  $  rahavaru vāhi vāhi haṇuvantahŏ
text.11321: rahavaru vāhi vāhi jahĩ rahavara  $  saṃcūriẏa saturaṅga saṇaravara
text.11322: rahavaru vāhi vāhi jahĩ kuñjara  $  daliẏa-siragga bhagga-bhuva-pañjara
text.11323: rahavaru vāhi vāhi jahĩ chattaĩ  $  paḍiẏaĩ mahihĩ ṇāĩ saẏavattaĩ
text.11324: rahavaru vāhi vāhi jahĩ cindhaĩ  $  aṇṇu paṇaccāviẏaĩ kavandhaĩ
text.11325: rahavaru vāhi vāhi jahĩ giddhaĩ  $  paribhamaṃti vasa-maṃsa-païddhaĩ
text.11326: rahavaru vāhi vāhi jahĩ uvavaṇu  $  ṇaṃ daramaliu viẏaḍḍheṃ jovvaṇu
text.11328: sārahi ehu pāvaṇi  $  haũ so rāvaṇi  $  vihi mi bhiḍantahã eu dalu
text.11329: jima haṇuvahŏ māẏari  $  jima mandoẏari  $  muaï sudukkhaü aṃsu-jalu"
text.11333: jaṃ jāṇiẏaü akkhaü raṇa-rasāhiu rahu sārahiṇa haṇuvahŏ sammuhu vāhiu  $  ḍhukkantu raṇĕ teṇa vi diṭṭhu kehaü raẏaṇāẏarĕṇa gaṅgā-vāhu jehaü
text.11334: jaṃ ṇijjhāiu ṇisiẏara-sandaṇu  $  maṇĕ āruṭṭhu samīraṇa-ṇandaṇu
text.11335: valiu divāẏara-cakkahŏ rāhu va  $  raï-bhattārahŏ tihuvaṇa-ṇāhu va
text.11336: valiu tiviṭṭhu va assaggīvahŏ  $  rāhavo vva māẏāsuggīvahŏ
text.11337: dahavaẏaṇo vva valiu sahasakkhahŏ  $  tiha haṇuvantu samuhu raṇĕ akkhahŏ
text.11339: "caṅgaü pavaṇa-putta paĩ jujjhiu  $  jiṇavara-vaẏaṇu kaẏāvi ṇa vujjhiu
text.11340: aṇuvaü guṇavaü ṇaü sikkhāvaü  $  paradhaṇa-vaü suṇāmu jiha sāvaü
text.11341: ettiẏa jīva jeṇa saṃghāriẏa  $  ṇa vi jāṇahũ kahĩ thatti samāriẏa
text.11343: maĩ ghaĩ suku-līvahŏ  $  savvahŏ jīvahŏ  $  kiẏa ṇivitti mārevāhŏ
text.11344: para ekku pariggahu  $  ṇāhĩ avaggahu  $  paĩ samāṇu paharevāhŏ
text.11348: akkhattahŏ vaẏaṇu suṇevi taṇuvĕṇa paṅkaẏa-muhĕṇa sarahasu hasiu haṇuvĕṇa  $  "jiha ettiẏahũ tujjhu vi bhiḍantaho jīviu harami ettiu raṇĕ rasantaho
text.11349: eva cavanta suhaḍa-cūḍāmaṇi  $  bhiḍiẏa paropparu rāvaṇi-pāvaṇi
text.11350: ṇaṃ viṇṇi mi āsīvisa visahara  $  ṇaṃ viṇṇi mi mukkaṅkusa kuñjara
text.11351: ṇaṃ viṇṇi mi sarahasa pañcāṇaṇa  $  ṇaṃ viṇṇi vi kulisahara-dasāṇaṇa
text.11352: ṇaṃ viṇṇi mi galagajjiẏa jalahara  $  ṇaṃ veṇṇi vi utthalliẏa sāẏara
text.11353: viṇṇi vi rāvaṇa-rāhava-kiṅkara  $  viṇṇi vi viẏaḍa-vaccha vihuṇiẏa-kara
text.11354: viṇṇi vi ratta-ṇetta ḍasiẏāhara  $  viṇṇi vi vahu-parivaḍḍhiẏa-raṇa-bhara
text.11355: viṇṇi vi ṇāmu linti arahantahŏ  $  taru ṇisiẏarĕṇa mukku haṇuvantahŏ
text.11356: teṇa vi tikkha-khuruppĕhĩ khaṇḍiu  $  vali jiha disihĩ vihañjĕvi chaṇḍiu
text.11358: puṇu mukku mahīharu  $  sa-taru sa-kandaru  $  so vi paḍīvaü chiṇṇu kiha
text.11363: aṇṇekku kira girivaru muaï jāvĕhĩ āruṭṭhaĕṇa pavaṇa-sueṇa tāvĕhĩ  $  ṇiẏa-bhua-valĕṇa bhāmĕvi ṇahaẏalantare sahu rahavarĕṇa ghattiu puvva-sāẏare
text.11364: sārahi ṇihaü turaṅgama ghāiẏa  $  āsāliẏahĕ mahāpahĕ lāiẏa
text.11365: akkhaü gaẏaṇa-maggĕ uppālĕvi  $  āu khaṇaddheṃ sila saṃcālĕvi
text.11366: kira parighivaï viẏaḍa-vaccha-tthalĕ  $  haṇuveṃ ṇavara bhamāḍĕvi ṇahaẏalĕ
text.11367: ghattiu dāhiṇa-lavaṇa-mahaṇṇavĕ  $  āu paḍīvaü bhiḍiu mahāhavĕ
text.11368: puṇaravi ghattiu pacchima-sāẏarĕ  $  tahi mi parāiu ṇivisabbhantarĕ
text.11369: puṇu āvāhiu uttara-vāseṃ  $  pattu paḍīvaü sahũ ṇīsāseṃ
text.11370: puṇu ṇahaẏalahŏ ghittu bhāmeppiṇu  $  meruhĕ pāsĕhĩ bhāmari deppiṇu
text.11371: pattu khaṇantarĕ ṇahĕ gajjantaü  $  "mārui paharu paharu" pabhaṇantaü
text.11373: (taṃ) ṇisuṇevi pavolliẏa  $  sura maṇĕ ḍolliẏa  $  "chaṇḍahŏ kaha dūahŏ taṇiẏa
text.11374: dukkaru jīvesaï  $  rāmahŏ ṇesaï  $  kusala-vatta-sīẏahĕ taṇiẏa"
text.11378: joẏaṇa-saĕṇa jo ghalliu āvaï (?) aï-cañcalaü maṇu kāmiṇihĕ ṇāvaï  $  jaṃ āhaẏaṇĕ jiṇevi ṇa sakkiu arī vimbhāvio maṇĕ haṇuvanta-kesarī
text.11379: rāvaṇa-taṇaẏahŏ phuraṇu pasaṃsiu  $  "valu vaḍḍantareṇa mahu pāsiu
text.11380: jasu saṃcāru surehĩ ṇa vujjhiu  $  teṇa samāṇu kema haũ jujjhiu
text.11381: kiha jasu laddhu ṇihaü maĩ āhavĕ  $  kusala-vatta kiha pāviẏa rāhavĕ"
text.11382: mārui maṇĕṇa viẏappaï jāvĕhĩ  $  mandoẏari-sueṇa raṇĕ tāvĕhĩ
text.11383: sāvaṭṭhambheṃ bhaḍu vollāviu  $  kiṃ bho pavaṇa-putta cintāviu
text.11384: ṇāsu ṇāsu jaï pāṇaĩ bhīẏaü  $  indaï jāma ṇa āvaï vīẏaü"
text.11385: taṃ ṇisuṇevi pahañjaṇa-jāeṃ  $  riu vacchaẏalĕ viddhu ṇārāeṃ
text.11386: teṇa pahāreṃ ṇisiẏaru mucchiu  $  paḍivaü dukkhu dukkhu omucchiu
text.11388: tahĩ avasarĕ jhāiẏa  $  pāsu parāiẏa  $  akkhahŏ akkhaẏa-vijja kiha
text.11389: devattaṇĕ laddhaĕ  $  kevali-siddhaĕ  $  parama-jiṇindahŏ riddhi jiha
text.11393: pabhaṇiẏa bhaḍĕṇa "cintiu kiṇṇa vujjhahi ettaḍaü karĕ eṇa samāṇu jujjhahi"  $  pahasiẏa-muhaĕ ṇara-sura-pujjaṇijjae saṃvohiẏaü akkhaü akkhaẏa-vijjae (?)
text.11395: jaṃ pabhaṇahi taṃ kāĩ ṇa icchami  $  sirasā vajjāsaṇi vi paḍicchami
text.11396: jaï haũ akkhaẏa-vijjā rūsami  $  to ṇivisaddheṃ sāẏaru sosami
text.11397: indahŏ indattaṇu uddālami  $  meru vi vāma-karaggeṃ ṭālami
text.11398: ṇavari ekku guru savvahũ pāsiu  $  ṇaü a-pamāṇu hoi muṇi-bhāsiu
text.11399: paï mi maï mi haṇuvantahŏ hatthĕ  $  jāevaü vajjāuha-pantheṃ
text.11401: ema vi jaï jujjhahi  $  kajju ṇa vujjhahi  $  to paḍivāraü karahi raṇu
text.11402: ṇimmavĕvi sa-vāhaṇu  $  māẏā-sāhaṇu  $  homi sahejjī ekku khaṇu"
text.11406: to ṇimmaviu māẏā-valu aṇantaü mehaülu jiha dasa-disi-vahu bharantaü  $  jalĕ thalĕ gaẏaṇĕ bhuvaṇantarĕ ṇa māio añjaṇa-suahŏ paharaṇa-karu [pa]dhāio
text.11407: keṇa vi laïu mahākula-pāvaü  $  keṇa vi huvavahu jaga-saṃtāvaü
text.11408: keṇa vi ummūliu vaḍa-pāẏavu  $  keṇa vi tāmasu keṇa vi vāẏavu
text.11409: keṇa vi jala-dhārā-haru vāruṇu  $  keṇa vi diṇaẏaratthu aï-dāruṇu
text.11410: keṇa vi ṇāga-pāsu keṇa vi ghaṇu  $  ema padhāiu saẏalu vi sāhaṇu
text.11411: to paṇṇatti-vijja haṇuvanteṃ  $  cintiẏa ahiṇava-valu cintanteṃ
text.11412: "daï pesaṇu" pabhaṇanti parāiẏa  $  māẏā-sāhaṇu karĕvi padhāiẏa
text.11413: veṇṇi vi valaĩ paropparu bhiḍiẏaĩ  $  jala-thalāĩ ṇaṃ ekkahĩ miliẏaĩ
text.11417: joijjaï indeṃ  $  sahũ sura-vindeṃ  $  ṇāvaï chāẏā-pekkhaṇaü
text.11421: veṇṇi vi valaĩ jaẏa-siri-laddha-pasaraĩ paharanti raṇĕ jīva-bhaẏāvaṇa-saraĩ  $  phuriẏāharaĩ bhaḍa-bhiuḍī-karālaĩ e[kke]kkamekkahŏ pesiẏa-vāṇa-jālaĩ
text.11422: katthaï vollāvolli varāvari  $  katthaï ḍhukkāḍhukki dharādhari
text.11423: katthaï hūlāhūli marāmari  $  katthaï kaṇḍākaṇḍi sarāsari
text.11424: katthaï daṇḍādaṇḍi ghaṇāghaṇi  $  katthaï kesākesi haṇāhaṇi
text.11425: katthaï chindāchindi luṇāluṇi  $  katthaï kaḍḍhākaḍḍhi dhuṇādhuṇi
text.11426: katthaï bhindābhindi dalādali  $  katthaï musalāmusali halāhali
text.11427: katthaï sellaselli ṇarindahũ  $  katthaï pellāpelli gaïndahũ
text.11428: katthaï pāḍāpāḍi turaṅgahũ  $  katthaï moḍāmoḍi rahaṅgahũ
text.11431: viṇṇi vi a-ṇiviṇṇaĩ  $  māẏā-seṇṇaĩ  $  tāva paropparu jujjhiẏaĩ
text.11432: kahĩ gampi païṭṭhaĩ  $  kahi mi ṇa diṭṭhaĩ  $  jāva ṇa keṇa vi vujjhiẏaĩ
text.11436: uvvariẏa para duddama-daṇu-vimaddaṇā saṃgara-sama-gaẏa rāvaṇa-pavaṇa-ṇandaṇā  $  ṇaṃ matta gaẏa dhāiẏa ekkamekkahŏ sahasotthariẏa raṇa-dhava denta sakkahŏ
text.11437: to āruṭṭhu samīraṇa-ṇandaṇu  $  cūriu raṇĕ raẏaṇīẏara-sandaṇu
text.11438: sārahi ṇihaü turaṅgama ghāiẏa  $  vaïvasa-puravara-pantheṃ lāiẏa
text.11439: akkhakumāra-haṇuva thiẏa kevala  $  vāhā-jujjheṃ bhiḍiẏa mahā-vala
text.11440: to māruva-sueṇa āẏāmiu  $  calaṇĕhĩ levi ṇisāẏaru bhāmiu
text.11441: tāma jāma āmelliu pāṇĕhĩ  $  kaha vi kaha vi ṇiẏa-bhicca-samāṇĕhĩ
text.11442: loẏaṇaï mi ucchaliẏaĩ phuṭṭĕvi  $  viṇṇi vāhu-daṇḍa gaẏa tuṭṭĕvi
text.11443: siru ṇivaḍiu ṇīluppala-komalu  $  kiu sarīru tahŏ haḍḍahã poṭṭalu
text.11444: eha vatta gaẏa maẏa-māriccahũ  $  anteurahũ asesahũ bhiccahũ
text.11446: to ṇisiẏara-ṇāheṃ  $  kova-saṇāheṃ  $  hiẏaü haṇevvaĕ ḍhoiẏaü
text.11447: raṇa-rasa-saṇṇaddhua  $  ṇiĕvi sa ẏaṃ bhu va  $  candahāsu avaloiẏaü
text.11449: bhaṇaï vihīsaṇu  $  "laï ajju vi kajju ṇa ṇāsaï
text.11454: bho bhuvaṇekka-sīha  $  vīsaddha-jīha  $  taü thāu eha vuddhī
text.11455: ajju vi vigaẏa-ṇāmĕṇaṃ  $  samaü rāmĕṇaṃ  $  kuṇahi gampi saṃdhī
text.11456: ajja vi ṇiẏa jāṇaï  $  ko vi ṇa jāṇaï  $  dharaṇiẏalĕ
text.11457: ajja vi siẏa māṇahi  $  kula-khaü mā ''ṇahi  $  ṇiẏaẏa-valĕ
text.11458: ajja vi saṃ-sā-raĕ  $  mā saṃsāraĕ  $  païsarahi
text.11460: ajja vi tuhũ rāvaṇu  $  jaga-jūrāvaṇu  $  sā jĕ siẏa
text.11461: ajja vi mandoari  $  sā mandoari  $  pāṇa-piẏa
text.11462: ajja vi te sandaṇa  $  ṇaravara-sandaṇa  $  te turaẏa
text.11463: ajja vi taṃ sāhaṇu  $  gahiẏa-pasāhaṇu  $  te ji gaẏa
text.11464: ajja vi karĕ khaṇḍaü  $  kari-sira-khaṇḍaü  $  taṃ ji taü
text.11465: ajja vi bhaḍa-sāẏaru  $  laddha-jasāẏaru  $  raṇĕ ajaü
text.11466: ajja vi pavarāhaü  $  jāma ṇa rāhaü  $  ovaḍaï
text.11467: ajja vi vahu-lakkhaṇu  $  jāma ṇa lakkhaṇu  $  abbhiḍaï
text.11470: paraẏāru ramantŏ  $  kahŏ vi jiẏantahŏ  $  ṇāhĩ suhu
text.11471: acchahi tamĕ chūḍhaü  $  ṇiẏa-maṇĕ mūḍhaü  $  kāĩ tuhũ"
text.11473: jāma vihīsaṇu  $  dahavaẏaṇahŏ hiẏaü ṇa bhindaï
text.11474: mahi apphālĕvi  $  bhaḍu tāva samuṭṭhiu indajaï
text.11478: "bho daṇuinda-maddaṇā  $  paĩ vihīsaṇā  $  kāĩ eva vuttaṃ
text.11479: akkha-kumārĕ ghāie  $  haṇuĕ āie  $  lhikkiuṃ ṇa juttaṃ
text.11480: evahĩ mantu mantijjaï  $  jalĕ visaṭṭĕ kiṃ varuṇu raïjjaï
text.11481: pittiẏa ṇāsu ṇāsu jaï bhīẏaü  $  uttara-sakkhi samarĕ mahu vīẏaü
text.11482: ekku pahuccaï toẏadavāhaṇu  $  acchaü bhāṇukaṇṇu pañcāṇaṇu
text.11483: acchaü maü māricci sahoẏaru  $  acchaü aṇṇu mi jo jo kāẏaru
text.11484: mahu puṇu caṅgaü avasaru vaṭṭaï  $  jo kira ajju kallĕ abbhiṭṭaï
text.11485: jeṇāsāla-vijja viṇivāiẏa  $  vaṇu bhaggaü vaṇa-pāla vi ghāiẏa
text.11486: kiṅkara-khandhāvāru paloṭṭiu  $  akhaü kumāru jeṇa dalavaṭṭiu
text.11487: so mahu kaha vi kaha vi abbhiḍiẏaü  $  sīhahŏ hariṇu jema kamĕ paḍiẏaü
text.11489: dūu bhaṇeppiṇu  $  samaraṭṭhāṇĕ jaï vi ṇa mārami
text.11490: to vi dhareppiṇu  $  tumhahã samakkhu vitthārami
text.11494: puṇaravi riu-ṇisumbha  $  ahimāṇa-khambha  $  suṇi vaẏaṇu tāẏa tāẏa
text.11495: jaï ṇa dharemi sattu  $  raṇĕ uttharantu  $  tā chitta tumha pāẏa
text.11507: sīheṇa va vara-kari  $  dhariu purandari  $  rahĕ caḍĕvi
text.11508: tahĩ indaï ghosiu  $  ṇāmu pagāsiu  $  suravarĕhĩ
text.11510: to ekkeṃ haṇuveṃ  $  aṇṇu vi maṇuveṃ  $  ko gahaṇu"
text.11513: hari dhurĕ deppiṇu  $  dhaĕ vijaü jaṇahŏ pekkantahŏ
text.11520: so vi padhāiu rahavarĕ caḍiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ kesari-kisoru ṇivvaḍiẏaü
text.11521: saṃcallantaĕ toẏadavāhaṇĕ  $  tūraĩ haẏaĩ asesa vi sāhaṇĕ
text.11523: ke vi tikkha-khaggukkhaẏa-hatthā  $  ke vi guruhŏ oṇāmiẏa-matthā
text.11524: ke vi caḍiẏa hiṃsanta-turaṅgĕhĩ  $  ke vi rasanta-matta-māẏaṅgĕhĩ
text.11525: ke vi rahĕhĩ kĕ vi siviẏā-jāṇĕhĩ  $  ke vi pariṭṭhiẏa pavara-vimāṇĕhĩ
text.11526: āucchanti ke vi ṇiẏa-kantaü  $  ko vi ṇivāriu raṇĕ païsantaü
text.11527: keṇa vi ṇiẏa-kalattu ṇibbhacchiu  $  "ekku su-sāmi-kajju paĩ icchiu"
text.11534: pucchiu ṇiẏaẏa-sārahī  $  "ahŏ mahārahī  $  diḍhaĩ jāĩ jāĩ
text.11535: kahi kettiẏaĩ atthaïṃ  $  raṇahŏ satthaïṃ  $  rahĕ caḍāviẏāĩ
text.11536: to etthantarĕ pabhaṇaï sārahi  $  "atthaĩ atthi deva chuḍu paharahi
text.11537: cakkaĩ pañca satta vara-cāvaĩ  $  dasa asivaraĩ aṇiṭṭhiẏa-gāvaĩ
text.11538: vāraha jhasa paṇṇāraha moggara  $  solaha laüḍi-daṇḍa raṇĕ duddhara
text.11539: vīsa parasu caüvīsa tisūlaĩ  $  kontaĩ tīsa sattu-paḍikūlaĩ
text.11540: ghaṇa paṇatīsa cāla vasuṇandā  $  vāvañcāsa tikkha addhendā
text.11541: sellaĩ saṭṭhi khuruppaĩ sattari  $  aṇṇu vi kaṇaẏa caḍiẏa caühattari
text.11542: asī tisattiu ṇavaï musuṇḍhiu  $  jāu divĕ divĕ raṇa-rasa-ẏaḍḍhiu
text.11543: saü ṇārāẏahũ jaṃ parimāṇami  $  aṇṇahã puṇu parimāṇu ṇa jāṇami
text.11545: vāraha ṇiẏalaĩ  $  solaha vijjaü rahĕ caḍiẏaü
text.11546: jehĩ dharijjaï  $  samaraṅgaṇĕ indu vi bhiḍiẏaü"
text.11550: taṃ ṇisuṇevi rāvaṇī  $  jetthu pāvaṇī  $  tetthu rahĕ paẏaṭṭo
text.11552: pariveḍḍhiu mārui dujjaĕhĩ  $  kevalu va avahi-maṇapajjaĕhĩ
text.11553: jamvū-dīvu va raẏaṇāẏarĕhĩ  $  pañcāṇaṇo vva kuñjara-varĕhĩ
text.11554: loẏantaü vva ti-pahañjaṇĕhĩ  $  divasāhiu vva ṇahĕ ṇava-ghaṇĕhĩ
text.11555: ekkallaü suhaḍu aṇantu valu  $  papphullu to vi tahŏ muha-kamalu
text.11556: parisakkaï thakkaï ullalaï  $  hakkāraï paharaï daṇu dalaï
text.11557: ārokkaï ḍhukkaï uttharaï  $  paviẏambhaï rumbhaï vittharaï
text.11558: ṇa vi chijjaï bhijjaï paharaṇĕhĩ  $  jiha jiṇu saṃsārahŏ kāraṇĕhĩ
text.11559: haṇuvahŏ pāsĕhĩ paribhamaï valu  $  ṇaṃ mandara-koḍihĩ uvahi-jalu
text.11561: dharĕvi ṇa sakkaï  $  valu saẏalu vi ukkhaẏa-paharaṇu
text.11567: haü rahu rahavareṇa  $  gaü gaẏavareṇa  $  turaĕṇa va turaṅgo
text.11568: suhaḍeṃ suhaḍu kavandhu kavandheṃ  $  chatteṃ chattu cindhu haü cindheṃ
text.11569: vāṇeṃ vāṇu cāu vara-cāveṃ  $  khaggeṃ khaggu aṇiṭṭhiẏa-gāveṃ
text.11570: cakkeṃ cakka tisūlu tisūleṃ  $  muggaru muggareṇa huli hūleṃ
text.11571: kaṇaeṃ kaṇaü musalu vara-musaleṃ  $  konteṃ kontu raṇaṅgaṇĕ kusaleṃ
text.11572: selleṃ sella khuruppu khuruppeṃ  $  phaliheṃ phalihu gaẏa vi gaẏa-ruppeṃ
text.11573: janteṃ jantu entu paḍikhaliẏaü  $  valu ujjāṇu jema daramaliẏaü
text.11584: ve vi paẏaṇḍa ve vi vijjāhara  $  veṇṇi vi akkhaẏa-toṇa dhaṇuddhara
text.11585: veṇṇi vi viẏaḍa-vaccha pulaïẏa-bhua  $  veṇṇi vi añjaṇa-mandoẏari-sua
text.11586: veṇṇi vi pavaṇa-dasāṇaṇa-ṇandaṇa  $  veṇṇi vi duddama-dāṇava-maddaṇa
text.11588: veṇṇi vi rāhava-rāvaṇa-pakkhiẏa  $  veṇṇi vi suravahu-ṇaẏaṇa-kaḍakkhiẏa
text.11589: veṇṇi vi samara-saĕhĩ jasavantā  $  veṇṇi vi pahu-sammāṇu sarantā
text.11590: veṇṇi vi parama-jiṇindahŏ bhattā  $  veṇṇi vi dhīra vīra bhaẏa-cattā
text.11591: veṇṇi vi atula malla raṇĕ duddhara  $  veṇṇi vi ratta-ṇetta phuriẏāhara
text.11593: vihi mi mahāhavu  $  jo asura-surendĕhĩ dīsaï
text.11600: "gampiṇu ṇiẏaẏa-parakkamu darisahi  $  jiha sakkahi tiha uppari varisahi"
text.11603: kahiṃ ji vijju-gajjiẏaṃ  $  ghaṇehĩ kaṃ visajjiẏaṃ
text.11604: kahiṃ jĕ ṇīrajaṃ jalaṃ  $  vahāviẏaṃ mahīẏalaṃ
text.11606: iẏa ṇava-pāusa-līla padarisiẏa  $  thira-thorahĩ jala-dhārahĩ varisiẏa
text.11607: vāẏa-sueṇa vi vāẏavu pesiu  $  teṇa ghaṇāgamu saẏalu viṇāsiu
text.11616: "mārui thāhi thāhi kahĩ gammaï  $  siraĩ samoḍḍĕvi raṇa-paḍu rammaï
text.11619: suravahu-ṇaṭṭa-saĕhĩ paricaḍḍiu  $  acchaï eu jujjha-paḍu maṇḍiu
text.11620: jo vihĩ jiṇaï tāsu liha dijjaï  $  jāṇaï-dharaṇaü mellāvijjaï
text.11621: jima rāmaṇahŏ hou jima rāmahŏ  $  haũ puṇu kuḍhĕ laggaü ṇiẏa-ṇāmahŏ
text.11622: jiha ujjāṇu bhaggu haü akkhaü  $  paharu paharu tiha āu kula-kkhaü"
text.11623: ema bhaṇevi samīraṇa-puttahŏ  $  indaï bhiḍiu samarĕ haṇuvantahŏ
text.11631: sara ceẏāri mukka  $  aṭṭhahi vilukka  $  ujjāṇa-maddaṇeṇaṃ
text.11632: jaṃ vāṇehĩ vāṇa viddhaṃsiẏa  $  bhāmĕvi bhīma gaẏāsaṇi pesiẏa
text.11633: dhāiẏa dhuddhuvanti haṇuvantahŏ  $  karaẏalĕ lagga su-kanta va kantahŏ
text.11634: puṇu vi paḍillaü melliu moggaru  $  kiu haṇuveṇa so vi saẏa-sakkaru
text.11635: puṇu vi ṇisindeṃ cakku visajjiu  $  jaṃ saṅgāma-saĕhĩ a-parajjiu
text.11636: kaha vi ṇa laggu pavaddhiẏa-harisahŏ  $  dujjaṇa-vaẏaṇu jema sappurisahŏ
text.11637: jaṃ jaṃ indaï paharaṇu ghattaï  $  taṃ taṃ ṇaṃ saẏavattu pavattaï
text.11638: dahamuha-suĕṇa ṇiratthīhūeṃ  $  hasiu sa-vibbhamu rāmahŏ dūeṃ
text.11639: "caṅgaü maĩ samāṇu olaggaü  $  paharahi ṇaṃ uvavāsĕhĩ bhaggaü"
text.11641: haṇuvahŏ vaẏaṇĕhĩ  $  so indaï jhatti  palittaü
text.11646: "maru maru kāĩ eṇa  $  raṇĕ ṇipphaleṇa  $  saẏavāra-gajjieṇaṃ
text.11648: ṇivviseṇa kiṃ pavara-bhuaṅgeṃ  $  kim adanteṇa matta-māẏaṅgeṃ
text.11649: kiṃ jala-virahieṇa ṇahĕ meheṃ  $  kiṃ ṇīsabbhāveṇa saṇeheṃ
text.11650: kiṃ dhutta-ẏaṇa-majjhĕ duviẏaḍḍheṃ  $  kavaṇu gahaṇu kira ku-purisa-saṇḍheṃ
text.11651: jaï paharami to ghāeṃ mārami  $  kira tuhũ dūu teṇa ṇa viẏārami"
text.11652: eva bhaṇevi bhuvaṇĕ jasavantahŏ  $  melliu ṇāga-pāsu haṇuvantahŏ
text.11653: tehaĕ avasarĕ teṇa vi cintiu  $  "acchami riu saṃghārami kettiu
text.11654: to vari vandhāvami appāṇaü  $  jeṃ vollami rāvaṇeṇa samāṇaü"
text.11655: ema bhaṇevi paḍicchiu entaü  $  ṇāĩ sahoẏaru sāiu dentaü
text.11658: sa ĩ bhu va-pañjaru  $  veḍhāviu pavaṇahŏ putteṃ
text.11668: saṃcāliu laṅkahĕ sammuhaü  $  ṇaṃ ṇiẏala-ṇivaddhaü matta-gaü
text.11669: ṇivisaddheṃ purĕ païsāriẏaü  $  ṇiẏa-ṇāsu ṇāĩ hakkāriẏaü
text.11674: "suṇu māĕ kāĩ dūeṇa kiu  $  jaṃ ṇisiẏara-ṇāhahŏ pāṇa-piu
text.11677: indaïṇa ṇavara avamāṇu kiu  $  vandhĕvi dahavaẏaṇahŏ pāsu ṇiu"
text.11679: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi  $  ṇīluppalaĩ va ḍolliẏaĩ
text.11684: jaṃ jasu diṇṇaü aṇṇa-bhavĕ  $  jīvahŏ kahi mi thiẏāsu
text.11685: tāsu ki ṇāsĕvi sakkiẏaï  $  kammahŏ puvva-kiẏāsu
text.11687: "khala khudda pisuṇa haẏa daḍḍha vihi  $  pūrantu maṇoraha hou dihi
text.11688: dasaraha-kuḍumvu jaṃ chattariu  $  vali jiha dasa-disihĩ pavikkhiriu
text.11689: aṇṇahĩ haũ aṇṇahĩ dāsarahi  $  aṇṇahĩ lakkhaṇu antarĕ uvahi
text.11691: jo kira ṇivvūḍha-mahāhavahŏ  $  sandesaü ṇesaï rāhavahŏ
text.11692: paĩ samarĕ so vi vandhāviẏaü  $  valahaddahŏ pāsu ṇa pāviẏaü
text.11693: ahavaï kiṃ tuhu mi karahi chalaĩ  $  eẏaĩ dukkiẏa-kammahŏ phalaĩ"
text.11696: ṇaṃ ravi-kiraṇehĩ  $  tappaï jaüṇa vi sura-sari vi
text.11701: tāvasa je phala-bhoẏaṇā  $  te paĩ seviẏa dīṇa"
text.11702: ettahĕ vi suhaḍa-pañcāṇaṇahŏ  $  ṇiu mārui pāsu dasāṇaṇahŏ
text.11703: vaïsārĕvi kajjālāva kiẏa  $  "he sundara kāĩ du-vuddhi thiẏa
text.11704: caṅgaü kusalattaṇu sikkhiẏaü  $  aha uttamu kulu ṇa parikkhiẏaü
text.11705: sura-ḍāmaru rāvaṇu muĕvi maĩ  $  pariẏariu varāẏaü rāmu paĩ
text.11706: pañcāṇaṇu mellĕvi dhariu gaü  $  jiṇu muĕvi pasaṃsiu para-samaü
text.11707: jo jasu bhāẏaṇu so taṃ dharaï  $  kaï ṇāliẏareṇa kāĩ karaï
text.11709: pujjijjahi so evahĩ dhariu  $  lampikku jema jaṇa-pariẏariu
text.11711: maĩ muĕvi su-sāmi  $  mārui kiẏaĩ jāĩ chalaĩ
text.11717: āṇiẏa sīẏa ṇa eha paĩ  $  ṇiẏa-kula-vaṃsahŏ māri"
text.11720: āehĩ asesahĩ bhāviẏaü  $  so kavaṇu ṇa āvaï pāviẏaü"
text.11721: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi kaïddhaĕṇa  $  ṇibbhacchiu vehāviddhaĕṇa
text.11722: "kira kāĩ dasāṇaṇa hasahi maĩ  $  appaṇu salagghu kiu kāĩ paĩ
text.11732: jovvaṇu jīviu dhaṇiẏa gharu  $  sampaẏa-riddhi ṇarinda
text.11733: bhāvĕvi eha aṇicca tuhũ  $  paṭṭhavi sīẏa ṇisinda
text.11734: para-dhaṇu para-dāru majja-vasaṇu  $  āẏaraï ko vi jo mūḍha-maṇu
text.11736: jāṇantu ṇa appahi jaṇaẏa-sua  $  addhuva-aṇuvekkha kāĩ ṇa sua
text.11737: ko kāsu savvu māẏā-timiru  $  jala-vindu jema jīviu a-thiru
text.11738: sampatti samudda-taraṅga-ṇiha  $  siẏa cañcala vijjula-leha jiha
text.11740: dhaṇu sura-dhaṇu-riddhihĕ aṇuharaï  $  khaṇĕ hoi khaṇaddheṃ osaraï
text.11741: jhijjaï sarīru āusu galaï  $  jiha gaü jala-ṇivahu ṇa saṃbhavaï
text.11743: gharu pariẏaṇu rajju  $  sampaẏa jīviu siẏa pavara
text.11744: eẏaĩ a-thirāĩ  $  ekku mueppiṇu dhammu para
text.11749: ṇaṃ to sampaï saẏala suẏa  $  paĩ tamvārahŏ ṇīẏa"
text.11750: ahŏ kekkasi-raẏaṇāsavahŏ suẏa  $  asaraṇa-aṇuvekkha kāĩ ṇa suẏa
text.11751: jāvĕhĩ jīvahŏ ḍhukkaï maraṇu  $  tāvĕhĩ jagĕ ṇāhĩ ko vi saraṇu
text.11752: rakkhijjaï jaï vi bhaẏaṅkarĕhĩ  $  asi-laüḍi-vihatthĕhĩ kiṅkarĕhĩ
text.11755: païsaraï jaï vi pāẏālaẏalĕ  $  giri-guhilĕ huāsaṇĕ uvahi-jalĕ
text.11756: raṇĕ vaṇĕ tiṇĕ ṇahaẏalĕ sura-bhavaṇĕ  $  raẏaṇappahāi-duggaï-gamaṇĕ
text.11757: mañjūsa-kūvĕ ghara-pañjaraĕ  $  kaḍḍhijjaï to vi khaṇantaraĕ
text.11759: tahĩ asaraṇa-kālĕ  $  jīvahŏ aṇṇa ṇa kā vi dhara
text.11760: para rakkhaï ekku  $  ahiṃsā-lakkhaṇu dhammu para
text.11764: rāvaṇa gaẏa-ghaḍa bhaḍa-ṇivahu  $  gharu pariẏaṇu suhi rajju
text.11765: ettiu chaḍḍĕvi jāsi tuhũ  $  para suhu dukkhu sahejju
text.11766: ahŏ rāvaṇa ṇava-kuvalaẏa-dalakkha  $  kiṃ ṇa suiẏa ekkattāṇuvekkha
text.11767: jagĕ jīvahŏ ṇatthi sahāu ko vi  $  raï vandhaï moha-vaseṇa to vi
text.11768: "iu gharu iu pariẏaṇu iu kalattu"  $  ṇaü vujjhahi jiha saẏalehĩ cattu
text.11769: ekkeṇa kaṇevvaü vihura-kālĕ  $  ekkeṇa vasevvaü jala-vamālĕ
text.11770: ekkeṇa vasevvaü tahĩ ṇigoĕ  $  ekkeṇa ruevvaü piẏa-vioĕ
text.11772: ekkahŏ jĕ dukkhu ekkahŏ jĕ sukkhu  $  ekkahŏ jĕ vandhu ekkahŏ jĕ mokkhu
text.11773: ekkahŏ jĕ pāu ekkahŏ jĕ dhammu  $  ekkahŏ jĕ maraṇu ekkahŏ jĕ jammu
text.11775: tahĩ tehaĕ vihurĕ  $  saẏaṇa-saẏāĩ ṇa ḍhukkiẏaĩ
text.11776: para veṇṇi saẏā i  $  jīvahŏ dukkiẏa-sukkiẏaĩ
text.11781: aṇṇu sarīru vi aṇṇu jiu  $  vihaḍaï eu khaṇeṇa"
text.11782: puṇu vi paḍīvaü uvavaṇa-maddaṇu  $  kahaï hiẏattaṇeṇa maru-ṇandaṇu
text.11783: aṇṇattāṇuvekkha dahagīvahŏ  $  aṇṇu sarīru aṇṇu guṇu jīvahŏ
text.11784: aṇṇahĩ taṇaü dhaṇṇu dhaṇu jovvaṇu  $  aṇṇahĩ taṇaü saẏaṇu gharu pariẏaṇu
text.11785: aṇṇahĩ taṇaü kalattu laïjjaï  $  aṇṇahĩ taṇaü taṇaü uppajjaï
text.11786: kaï vi divasa gaẏa melāvakkeṃ  $  puṇu vihaḍanti maranteṃ ekkeṃ
text.11787: aṇṇahĩ jīu sarīru vi aṇṇahĩ  $  aṇṇahĩ gharu ghariṇi vi aṇṇaṇṇahĩ
text.11788: aṇṇahĩ turaẏa mahaggaẏa rahavara  $  aṇṇahĩ āṇa-paḍicchā ṇaravara
text.11792: jiṇa-dhammu muevi  $  jīvahŏ ko vi ṇa appaṇaü
text.11797: appahi siẏa ma gāhu kari  $  maṃ paḍi ṇaraẏa-samuddĕ
text.11798: bho bhuvaṇa-bhaẏaṅkara duṇṇirikkha  $  suṇu caügaï saṃsārāṇuvekkha
text.11803: hammantu haṇantu marantu jantu  $  kaluṇaĩ ruantu khajjantu khantu
text.11804: geṇhantu muantu kalevarāĩ  $  aṇuhavaï jīu pāvahŏ phalāĩ
text.11805: ghariṇī vi māẏa māẏā vi ghariṇi  $  bhaïṇī vi dhīẏa dhīẏā vi bhaïṇi
text.11806: putto vi vappu vappo vi puttu  $  satto vi mittu mitto vi sattu
text.11808: ehaĕ saṃsārĕ  $  rāvaṇa sokkhu kahiṃ taṇaü
text.11809: appijjaü sīẏa  $  sīlu ma khaṇḍahi appaṇaü
text.11814: to i ṇa hūiẏa titti taü  $  appahi sīẏa ṇa kāĩ
text.11815: ahŏ sura-samara-saĕhĩ savaḍammuha  $  taïlokkāṇuvekkha suṇi dahamuha
text.11816: jaṃ taṃ ṇiravasesu āẏāsu vi  $  tihuaṇu majjhĕ pariṭṭhiu tāsu vi
text.11817: āi ṇihaṇu ṇaü keṇa vi dhariẏaü  $  acchaï saẏalu vi jīvahã bhariẏaü
text.11822: iẏa caüdaha-rajjuĕhĩ ṇivaddhaü  $  tihuaṇu tihĩ pavaṇĕhĩ uṭṭhaddhaü
text.11824: tahŏ majjhĕ asesu  $  jalu thalu ṇaẏaṇa-kaḍakkhiẏaü
text.11825: taṃ kavaṇu paesu  $  jaṃ ṇa vi jīveṃ bhakkhiẏaü
text.11829: vasĕvi cilivvilĕ deha-gharĕ  $  khaṇĕ bhaṅguraĕ asārĕ
text.11830: rāvaṇa sīẏaḥĕ luddhu tuhũ  $  jiha maṇḍalaü kaẏārĕ
text.11831: ahŏ ahŏ saẏala-bhuvaṇa-saṃtāvaṇa  $  asuittāṇuvvekkha suṇi rāvaṇa
text.11832: māṇusa-dehu hoi ghiṇi-viṭṭalu  $  sirĕhĩ ṇivaddhaü haḍḍahã poṭṭalu
text.11833: calu ku-jantu māẏamaü kuheḍaü  $  malahŏ puñju kimi-kīḍahũ mūḍaü
text.11835: antahã poṭṭalu pakkhihĩ bhoẏaṇu  $  vāhihĩ bhavaṇu masāṇahŏ bhāẏaṇu
text.11836: āẏaehĩ kalusiu jahĩ aṅgaü  $  kavaṇu paesu sarīrahŏ caṅgaü
text.11837: suṇṇaü suṇṇaharu va duppecchaü  $  kaḍiẏalu pacchāhara-sāricchaü
text.11841: sīẏahĕ vari to vi  $  hūu virattībhāu ṇa vi
text.11846: suhu dukkhaĩ jaṃ jema ṭhiẏa  $  taṃ bhuñjevaü sāu
text.11847: bho surakari-kara-saṃkāsa-bhua  $  āsava-aṇuvekkha kāĩ ṇa sua
text.11848: veḍhijjaï jīu moha-maĕhĩ  $  pañcāṇaṇu jema matta-gaĕhĩ
text.11852: vihĩ gottĕhĩ maïla-samujjalĕhĩ  $  pañcahi mi antarāiẏa-khalĕhĩ
text.11853: chāijjaï chijjaï bhijjaï vi  $  mārijjaï khajjaï pijjaï vi
text.11854: piṭṭijjaï vajjhaï muñcaï vi  $  jantehĩ dalijjaï ruñcaï vi
text.11861: bhaṇami saṇeheṃ dahavaẏaṇa  $  jāṇĕvi eu asāru
text.11864: rakkhijjaï jīu sa-rāgu kema  $  ṇaü ḍhukkaï aẏasa-kalaṅku jema
text.11865: dijjaï rakkhaṇu jo jāsu mallu  $  kāmahŏ a-kāmu sallahŏ a-sallu
text.11866: dambhahŏ a-dambhu dosahŏ a-dosu  $  pāvahŏ a-pāvu rosahŏ a-rosu
text.11867: hiṃsahŏ ahiṃsa mohahŏ a-mohu  $  māṇahŏ a-māṇu lohahŏ a-lohu
text.11868: ṇāṇu vi aṇṇāṇahŏ diḍha-kavāḍu  $  maccharahŏ a-maccharu dappa-sāḍu
text.11869: a-viou vioẏahŏ duṇṇivāru  $  jasu aẏasahŏ duppaïsāru vāru
text.11870: micchattahŏ diḍha-sammatta-paẏaru  $  bhellijjaï jema ṇa deha-ṇaẏaru
text.11873: vari rāmahŏ gampi  $  karĕ lāijjaü jaṇaẏa-suẏa
text.11877: rāvaṇa ṇijjara bhāvi tuhũ  $  jā daẏa-dhammahŏ mūlu
text.11878: to vari jāṇavi pariharahi  $  kijjaï tahŏ aṇukūlu
text.11889: so galaï asesu  $  varaṇĕ du-vaddhaĕ jema jalu
text.11893: dhammu ahiṃsā dahavaẏaṇa  $  jāṇahi tuhũ daha-bheu
text.11894: to vi ṇa jāṇaï pariharahi  $  kāi mi kāraṇu eu
text.11896: pahilaü eu tāma vujjhevvaü  $  jīva-daẏā-vareṇa hoevvaü
text.11897: vīẏaü maddavattu darisevvaü  $  taïẏaü ujjaẏa-cittu karevvaü
text.11898: caüthaü puṇu lāhavĕṇa jivevvaü  $  pañcamaü vi tava-caraṇu carevvaü
text.11899: chaṭṭhaü saṃjama-vaü pālevvaü  $  sattamu kim pi ṇāhĩ maggevvaü
text.11900: aṭṭhamu vambhaceru rakkhevvaü  $  ṇavamaü sacca-vaẏaṇu vollevvaü
text.11901: dasamaü maṇĕ paricāu karevvaü  $  ĕhu dasa-bheu dhammu jāṇevvaü
text.11902: dhammeṃ hontaeṇa suhu kevalu  $  dhammeṃ hontaeṇa cintiẏa-phalu
text.11905: viṇu ekkeṃ teṇa  $  saẏalu vi thāi parammuhaü"
text.11910: jāṇaï jāṇiẏa saẏala-jagĕ  $  kaha bhaẏa-bhīeṃ mukka"
text.11911: "aṇṇu vi dahavaẏaṇa maṇeṇa muṇĕ  $  ṇāmeṇa vohi-aṇuvekkha suṇĕ
text.11912: cintevvaü jīveṃ ratti-diṇu  $  "bhavĕ bhavĕ mahu sāmiu parama-jiṇu
text.11913: bhavĕ bhavĕ labbhaü samāhi-maraṇu  $  bhavĕ bhavĕ hojjaü suggaï-gamaṇu
text.11914: bhavĕ bhavĕ jiṇa-guṇa-sampatti mahu  $  bhavĕ bhavĕ daṃsaṇa-ṇāṇeṇa sahũ
text.11915: bhavĕ bhavĕ sammattu hou acalu  $  bhavĕ bhavĕ ṇāsaü haẏa-kamma-malu
text.11916: bhavĕ bhavĕ sambhavaü mahanta dihi  $  bhavĕ bhavĕ uppajjaü dhamma-ṇihi"
text.11918: jo paḍhaï suṇaï maṇĕ saddahaï  $  so sāsaẏa-sokkha-saẏaĩ lahaï"
text.11921: sa ĩ bhu va-juvaleṇa  $  kiu jaẏakāru jiṇesarahŏ
text.11928: "ettahĕ jiṇavara-vaẏaṇu ṇa cukkaï  $  ettahĕ vammahu vammahŏ ḍhukkaï
text.11930: ettahĕ ṇaraĕ paḍevvaü pāṇĕhĩ  $  ettahĕ bhiṇṇu aṇaṅgahŏ vāṇĕhĩ
text.11931: ettahĕ jīu kasāĕhĩ rumbhaï  $  ettahĕ suraẏa-sokkhu kahĩ labbhaï
text.11932: ettahĕ dukkhu dukammahŏ pāsiu  $  ettahĕ jāṇaï-vaẏaṇu suhāsiu
text.11933: ettahĕ haẏa-sarīru cilisāvaṇu  $  ettahĕ sundaru sīẏahĕ jovvaṇu
text.11934: ettahĕ dulahaĩ jiṇa-guṇa-vaẏaṇaĩ  $  ettahĕ muddhaĩ sīẏahĕ ṇaẏaṇaĩ
text.11935: ettahĕ jiṇavara-sāsaṇu sundaru  $  ettahĕ jāṇaï-vaẏaṇu maṇoharu
text.11936: ettahĕ asuhu kammu ṇiru bhāvaï  $  ettahĕ sīẏa-aharu ko pāvaï
text.11937: ettahĕ ṇindiu uttama-jāihĕ  $  ettahĕ kesa-bhāru varu sīẏahĕ
text.11938: ettahĕ ṇaraü raüddu duruttaru  $  ettahĕ sīẏahĕ kaṇṭhu su-sundaru
text.11939: ettahĕ ṇāraïẏahũ gira "maru maru  $  ettahĕ sīẏahĕ maṇaharu thaṇaharu
text.11940: ettahĕ jama-gira "laï laï dhari dhari"  $  ettahĕ jāṇaï laḍaha-kisoẏari
text.11941: ettahĕ dukkhu aṇantu duṇittharu  $  ettahĕ sīẏahĕ ramaṇu sa-vittharu
text.11942: ettahĕ jammantarĕ suhu viralaü  $  ettahĕ sulaliẏa-ūruva-juvalaü
text.11943: ettahĕ maṇuva-jammu aï-viralaü  $  ettahĕ jaṃghā-jualaü saralaü
text.11944: ettahĕ eu kammu ṇa vi vimalaü  $  ettahĕ sīẏahĕ varu kama-jualaü
text.11945: ettahĕ pāu aṇovamu vajjhaï  $  ettahĕ visaĕhĩ maṇu parirujjhaï
text.11946: ettahĕ kuviu kaẏantu su-bhīsaṇu  $  ettahĕ duttaru maẏaṇahŏ sāsaṇu
text.11947: kavaṇu laemi kavaṇu parisesami  $  to vari evahĩ ṇaraĕ paḍesami
text.11949: jāṇami jiha ṇa vi sokkhu  $  para-tiẏa para-davvu laẏantahŏ
text.11950: jaṃ ruccaï taṃ hou  $  tahŏ rāmahŏ sīẏa a-dentahŏ
text.11954: jaï appami to lañchaṇu ṇāmahŏ  $  jaṇu vollesaï "saṅkiu rāmahŏ""
text.11955: maṇĕ paricintĕvi jaẏa-siri-māṇaṇu  $  haṇuvahŏ sammuhu valiu dasāṇaṇu
text.11956: "arĕ govāla vāla dhī-vajjiẏa  $  vaddhaü jhaṅkhahi kāĩ alajjiẏa
text.11957: lavaṇu samuddahŏ pāhuḍu pesahi  $  sāsaẏa-thāṇĕ suhāĩ gavesahi
text.11958: meruhĕ kaṇaẏa-daṇḍu darisāvahi  $  diṇaẏara-maṇḍalĕ dīvaü lāvahi
text.11959: joṇhāvaïhĕ joṇha saṃpāḍahi  $  loha-piṇḍĕ saṇṇāhu bhamāḍahi
text.11960: indahŏ deva-lou apphālahi  $  mahu aggaĕ kahāu saṃcālahi
text.11963: "rāvaṇa tujjhu ṇa dosu  $  laï ḍhukkaü muṇivara-bhāsiu
text.11964: aṇṇahĩ kaïhĩ diṇehĩ  $  khaü dīsaï sīẏahĕ pāsiu"
text.11968: duvvaẏaṇĕhĩ dahavaẏaṇu palittaü  $  kesari kesaraggĕ ṇaṃ chittaü
text.11969: "maru maru lehu lehu siru pāḍahŏ  $  ṇaṃ to lahu vicchoḍĕvi dhāḍahŏ
text.11970: kharĕ vaïsārahŏ siru maṇḍāvahŏ  $  vellaĕ vandhĕvi gharĕ gharĕ dāvahŏ"
text.11972: tahĩ avasarĕ sarīru vihuṇeppiṇu  $  pavara-bhuaṅga-vandha toḍeppiṇu
text.11973: mārui bhaḍa bhañjantu samuṭṭhiu  $  saṇi avaloẏaṇĕ ṇāĩ pariṭṭhiu
text.11974: jaü jaü dei diṭṭhi parisakkaï  $  taü taü ahimuhu ko vi ṇa thakkaï
text.11975: bhaṇaï dasāṇaṇu "saĩ saṃghārami  $  jettahĕ jāi taṃ jĕ maru mārami"
text.11978: muhĕ masi-kuccaü devi  $  gaü uppari dahagīvahŏ
text.11982: thiu valu saẏalu maḍapphara-mukkaü  $  joisa-cakku va thāṇahŏ cukkaü
text.11983: kamala-vaṇu va hima-vāeṃ daḍḍhaü  $  duvilāsiṇi-vaẏaṇu va duviẏaḍḍhaü
text.11984: raẏaṇihĩ vara-bhavaṇu va ṇiddīvaü  $  kira uṭṭhavaṇu karei paḍīvaü
text.11985: bhaṇaï sahoaru "jāu ku-dūaü  $  ettaḍeṇa kiṃ uttimu hūaü
text.11986: girivara-uvari vihaṅgamu jantaü  $  to kiṃ so jjĕ hoi valavantaü"
text.11987: ema bhaṇevi ṇivāriu rāvaṇu  $  saṇṇajjhantu bhuvaṇa-saṃtāvaṇu
text.11988: tāvettahĕ vi teṇa haṇuvanteṃ  $  ṇāĩ vihaṅge ṇahaẏalĕ janteṃ
text.11989: cintiu ekku khaṇantaru thāĕvi  $  kova-davaggi muhuttuppāĕvi
text.11992: dahamuha-jīviu jema  $  vari emahĩ gharu uppāḍami"
text.12010: tahŏ sarisāĩ jāĩ aṇulaggaĩ  $  pañca sahāsaĩ gehahũ bhaggaĩ
text.12011: kiu kaḍamaddaṇu pavaṇāṇandeṃ  $  ṇaṃ saravarĕ païsarĕvi gaïndeṃ
text.12012: puṇu vi sa-icchaĕ parisakkanteṃ  $  pāḍiẏa pura-paoli ṇigganteṃ
text.12013: sahaï samīraṇi ṇahaẏalĕ jantaü  $  laṅkahĕ jīu ṇāĩ uḍḍantaü
text.12014: tahĩ avasarĕ suravara-pañcāṇaṇu  $  candahāsu kira lei dasāṇaṇu
text.12015: mantihĩ ṇavara kaḍacchaĕ dhariẏaü  $  "kiṃ pahu-ṇitti deva vīsariẏaü
text.12016: jaï ṇāsaï siẏālu vivarāṇaṇu  $  to kiṃ tahŏ rūsaï pañcāṇaṇu"
text.12017: eva bhaṇevi ṇivāriu jāvĕhĩ  $  jāṇaï maṇĕ pariosiẏa tāvĕhĩ
text.12019: jaṃ ghara-siharu dalevi  $  haṇuvantu paḍīvaü āiu
text.12020: sīẏahĕ rāhaü jema  $  parioseṃ aṅgĕ ṇa māiu
text.12024: jaṃ jĕ paẏaṭṭu samuhu kikkindhahŏ  $  pavarāsīsa diṇṇa kaïcindhahŏ
text.12025: "hohi vaccha jaẏavantu cirāusu  $  sūra-paẏāva-hāri jiha pāusu
text.12026: lacchī-saï-saṇāhu jiha saravaru  $  siẏa-lakkhaṇa-amukku jiha halaharu"
text.12027: teṇa vi dūrattheṇa samicchiẏa  $  siru ṇāmĕvi āsīsa paḍicchiẏa
text.12028: puṇu ekkalla-vīru jaga-kesari  $  lahu āucchĕvi laṅkāsundari
text.12029: miliu gampi ṇiẏa-khandhāvāraĕ  $  thiu vimāṇĕ ghaṇṭā-ṭaṅkāraĕ
text.12030: tūraĩ haẏaĩ samuṭṭhiu kalaẏalu  $  tārāvaï-puru pattu mahāvalu
text.12031: ṇiggaẏa aṅgaṅgaẏa sahũ vappeṃ  $  aṇṇa vi ṇiva ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-māhappeṃ
text.12032: tehĩ milĕvi païsārijjantaü  $  lakkhiu lakkhaṇa-rāmĕhĩ entaü
text.12035: so puṇṇodaẏa-kālĕ  $  jasu ṇāĩ paḍīvaü diṭṭhaü
text.12039: tahŏ taïlokka-cakka-mambhīsahŏ  $  mārui calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu halīsahŏ
text.12040: siru kama-kamala-ṇisaṇṇu padīsiu  $  ṇaṃ ṇīluppalu paṅkaẏa-mīsiu
text.12041: valĕṇa samuṭṭhāviu saĩ hattheṃ  $  kusalāsīsa diṇṇa paramattheṃ
text.12042: kaṇṭhaü kaḍaü maüḍu kaḍisuttaü  $  saẏalu samappĕvi maṇĕ pajalantaü
text.12043: addhāsaṇĕ vaïsāriu pāvaṇi  $  jo pesiu sīẏaĕ cūḍāmaṇi
text.12044: taṃ ahiṇāṇu samujjala-ṇāmahŏ  $  dāhiṇa-karaẏalĕ ghattiu rāmahŏ
text.12045: maṇi pekkhĕvi savvaṅgu paharisiu  $  urĕ ṇa mantu romañcu padarisiu
text.12046: jo pariosu tetthu saṃbhūaü  $  dukkaru sīẏa-vivāhĕ vi hūẏaü
text.12048: pabhaṇaï rāhavacandu  $  "mahu ajja vi hiẏaü ṇa ṇīvaï
text.12049: mārui akkhi davatti  $  kiṃ muiẏa kanta kiṃ jīvaï"
text.12054: "jāṇaï diṭṭha deva jīvantī  $  aṇudiṇu tumhahã ṇāmu laẏantī
text.12055: jahĩ avasarĕ ṇisiẏarĕhĩ gilijjaï  $  tahĩ tehaĕ vi kālĕ paḍivajjaï
text.12056: iha-loẏahŏ tuhũ sāmi piẏāraü  $  para-loẏahŏ arahantu bhaḍāraü
text.12057: jhāẏaï sāhu jema paramappaü  $  uvavāsĕhĩ lhasāvaï appaü
text.12058: maĩ puṇu gampi ṇientahũ tiẏasahũ  $  pārāviẏa vāsīsahã divasahũ
text.12059: aṅgutthalaü ṇavevi samappiu  $  tāvahĩ mahu cūḍāmaṇi appiu
text.12060: aṇṇu vi deva eu ahiṇāṇu  $  jaṃ kiu gutta-suguttahã dāṇu
text.12062: ṇivaḍiẏa gharĕ vasu-hāra  $  ṇisuṇiu akkhāṇu jaḍāihĕ
text.12063: aṇṇu mi taṃ ahiṇāṇu  $  kuḍhĕ laggu deva jaṃ bhāihĕ"
text.12067: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi valu harisiẏa-gattaü  $  "kahĕ haṇuvanta kema tahĩ pattaü"
text.12068: ehaĕ avasarĕ ṇaẏaṇāṇandeṃ  $  hasiu ṇiẏāsaṇĕ thiĕṇa mahindeṃ
text.12069: "eẏahŏ keraü vaḍḍaü ḍhaḍḍhasu  $  ṇisuṇĕ bhaḍārā jaṃ kiu sāhasu
text.12070: ṇaru ṇāmeṇa atthi pavaṇañjaü  $  palhāẏaẏahŏ puttu raṇĕ dujjaü
text.12071: tāsu diṇṇa maĩ añjaṇasundari  $  gaü ukkhandheṃ varuṇahŏ uppari
text.12072: vāraha-varisaha(hã) ekkaĕ vāraĕ  $  vāsaü devi miliu khandhāraĕ
text.12073: pavaṇa-jaṇeriĕ puṇu īsāĕvi  $  ghalliẏa gharahŏ kalaṅkaü lāĕvi
text.12074: maĩ vi tāhĕ païsāru ṇa diṇṇaü  $  vaṇĕ pasaviẏa tahĩ ĕhu uppaṇṇaü
text.12075: taṃ ji vaïru sumarĕvi haṇuvanteṃ  $  taü āeseṃ dūeṃ jaṃteṃ
text.12076: ṇaẏarĕ mahāraĕ kiu kaḍamaddaṇu  $  haü mi dhariu sa-kalattu sa-ṇandaṇu
text.12079: eẏahŏ raṇa-cariẏāĩ  $  ettiẏaĩ deva maĩ diṭṭhaĩ"
text.12083: taṃ ṇisuṇevi ti-kaṇṇa-sahāeṃ  $  puṇu pomāiu dahimuha-rāeṃ
text.12084: "appuṇu jaï vi purandaru āvaï  $  eẏahŏ taṇaü cariu ko pāvaï
text.12085: veṇṇi mahārisi paḍimā-joeṃ  $  aṭṭha divasa thiẏa ṇiẏaẏa-ṇioeṃ
text.12086: aṇṇekkettahĕ accāsaṇṇaü  $  mahu dhīẏaü imāu ti-kaṇṇaü
text.12087: tāma huāsaṇeṇa saṃdīviu  $  vaṇu cāuddisu  jālālīviu
text.12088: dhagadhagadhagadhaganta-dhūmantaĕ  $  chuḍu chuḍu guruhũ pāsĕ ḍhukkantaĕ
text.12089: tahĩ avasarĕ haṇuvanteṃ chāĕvi  $  māẏā-pāusu ṇahĕ uppāĕvi
text.12090: so dāvāṇalu pasamiu jāvĕhĩ  $  haü mi tetthu saṃpāiu tāvĕhĩ
text.12092: tahĩ kaṇṇāĕ samāṇu  $  maĩ tumhahũ pāsĕ visajjĕvi
text.12093: eẏahŏ raṇa-cariẏāĩ  $  ettiẏaĩ deva maĩ diṭṭhaĩ"
text.12097: dahimuha-vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi gañjolliu  $  pihumaï haṇuvahŏ manti pavolliu
text.12098: "ṇisuṇĕ bhaḍārā ṇahaẏalĕ janteṃ  $  paḍhamāsālī haẏa haṇuvanteṃ
