text.12099: puṇu vajjāuhu ṇaravara-kesari  $  kalahĕvi pariṇiẏa laṅkāsundari
text.12100: garuva-saṇeheṃ diṭṭhu vihīsaṇu  $  teṇa samāṇu karĕvi saṃbhāsaṇu
text.12102: ṇandaṇa-vaṇu mi bhaggu haü akkhaü  $  indaï kiu paharantu vilakkhaü
text.12103: eṇa vi vandhāviu appāṇaü  $  kira uvasamaï dasāṇaṇa-rāṇaü
text.12104: ṇavari viruddheṃ kaha vi ṇa ghāiu  $  tahŏ ghara-siharu daleppiṇu āiu"
text.12107: avaruṇḍiu haṇuvantu  $  rāhavĕṇa sa ĩ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ
text.12110: gajjĕvi dahavaẏaṇahŏ uppari  $  diṇṇu paẏāṇaü rāhavĕṇa
text.12114: haẏāṇanda-bherī daḍī diṇṇa saṅkhā  $  karapphāliẏāṇeẏa-tūrāṇa lakkhā
text.12115: jaẏaṃ ṇandaṇam ṇandighosaṃ sughosaṃ  $  suhaṃ sundaraṃ sohaṇaṃ devaghosaṃ
text.12116: varaṅgaṃ variṭṭhaṃ gahīraṃ pahāṇaṃ  $  jaṇāṇanda-tūraṃ sirīvaddhamāṇaṃ
text.12118: pasaṇṇajjhuṇi dunduhī ṇandisaddaṃ  $  pavittaṃ pasatthaṃ ca bhaddaṃ subhaddam
text.12119: vivāhappiẏaṃ patthivaṃ ṇāẏarīẏaṃ  $  paẏāṇuttamaṃ vaddhaṇaṃ puṇḍarīẏaṃ
text.12120: maṅgala-tūraĩ ṇāmĕhĩ eĕhĩ  $  puṇu aṇṇaṇṇaĩ aṇṇĕhĩ bheĕhĩ
text.12126: taṃ tūrahã saddu suṇeppiṇu  $  rāhava-sāhaṇu saṃmilaï
text.12127: sari-sottĕhĩ āvĕvi āvĕvi  $  salilu samuddahŏ jiha milaï
text.12133: saṇṇaddhu gavaü aṇṇu vi gavakkhu  $  jamvuṇṇaü dahimuhu duṇṇirikkhu
text.12134: saṇṇaddhu virāhiu sīhaṇāu  $  saṇṇaddhu kundu kumueṃ sahāu
text.12135: saṇṇaddhu ṇīlu ṇalu parimiẏaṅgu  $  saṇṇaddhu suseṇu i raṇĕ abhaṅgu
text.12136: saṇṇaddhu sīharahu raẏaṇakesi  $  saṇṇaddhu vāli-suu candarāsi
text.12137: saṇṇaddhu sa-taṇaü mahindarāu  $  bhaḍu lacchibhutti pihumaï-sahāu
text.12138: saṇṇaddhu candamarīci aṇṇu  $  saṇṇaddhu asesu vi rāma-seṇṇu
text.12141: lakkhijjaï lakkhaṇu kuddhaü  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālu dasāṇaṇahŏ
text.12145: aṇṇekka suhaḍa saṇṇaddha ke vi  $  ṇiẏa-kantahã āliṅgaṇaü devi
text.12146: aṇṇekkahŏ dhaṇa tamvolu dei  $  aṇṇekku samappiẏaü vi ṇa lei
text.12149: aṇṇekkahŏ jāĩ su-kanta dei  $  ohullaĩ phullaĩ ṇaru ṇa lei
text.12150: "ṇa samicchami haũ tuhũ lehi bhajjĕ  $  ettiu siru ṇivaḍaï sāmi-kajjĕ"
text.12151: aṇṇekkahŏ dhaṇa bhūsaṇaü dei  $  aṇṇekku taṃ pi tiṇa-samu gaṇei
text.12152: "kiṃ gandheṃ kiṃ candaṇa-raseṇa  $  maĩ aṅgu pasāhevvaü jaseṇa"
text.12159: aṇṇekkettahĕ vi suhaṅkarāĩ  $  sajjiẏaĩ vimāṇaĩ sundarāĩ
text.12166: suggīveṃ raẏaṇujjoviẏāĩ  $  vihĩ viṇṇi vimāṇaĩ ḍhoiẏāĩ
text.12176: ummeṭṭha ṇiraṅkusa jāi thāi  $  malhanti maṇohara vesa ṇāĩ
text.12177: aṇṇekka-pāsĕ raha rahiẏa-thaṭṭa  $  cūranta paropparu pahĕ paẏaṭṭa
text.12183: sukalattu jemva sukulīṇaü  $  paẏa-saṃcāru ṇa vīsaraï
text.12188: ekkeṇa vuttu "sosami samuddu"  $  aṇṇekku bhaṇaï "mahu ṇisiẏarindu"
text.12189: aṇṇekku bhaṇaï "haũ dharami seṇṇu"  $  aṇṇekku bhaṇaï "mahu kumbhaẏaṇṇu"
text.12190: aṇṇekku bhaṇaï "mahu mehaṇāu"  $  aṇṇekku bhaṇaï "mahu bhaḍa-ṇihāu"
text.12191: aṇṇekku bhaṇaï "bho ṇisuṇi mitta  $  haũ valahŏ sa-hattheṃ demi kanta"
text.12192: aṇṇekku bhaṇaï "kiṃ gajjieṇa  $  ajja vi saṅgāma-vivajjieṇa
text.12193: saẏalu vi jāṇijjaï tahĩ ji kālĕ  $  para-valĕ ovaḍiẏaĕ sāmi-sālĕ"
text.12194: aṇṇekku vīru ṇiẏa-maṇĕ visaṇṇu  $  "maĩ sāmihĕ avasarĕ kāĩ diṇṇu"
text.12196: aṇṇekku suhaḍu ovaggaï  $  aggaĕ thāĕvi halaharahŏ
text.12197: "jaṃ vūḍhaü maĩ siru khandhĕṇa  $  taṃ hosaï pahu avasarahŏ"
text.12204: sāmuddī ruddī kesavī  $  bhuvaïndī khandī vāsavī
text.12206: candī sūri vaïsāṇarī  $  māẏaṅgi maẏandī vāṇarī
text.12210: saṇṇaddhu asesu vi sāhaṇu  $  rāmahŏ suggīvahŏ taṇaü
text.12216: gandhovaü candaṇu siddha-sesa  $  jiṇa pujjĕvi vāhu suvesa vesa
text.12217: dappaṇaü su-saṅkhu su-sahasavattu  $  ṇiggantha-rūu paṇḍuraü chattu
text.12218: paṇḍuraü hatthi paṇḍuraü bhamaru  $  paṇḍuraü turaü paṇḍuraü camaru
text.12220: ṇiddhūmu jalaṇu aṇukūlu vāu  $  piẏamelāvaü kulugulaï kāu
text.12221: suṇimittaĩ ṇiĕvi jasuṇṇaeṇa  $  valaeu vuttu jamvuṇṇaeṇa
text.12222: "dhaṇṇo 'si deva taü sahalu gamaṇu  $  āẏaĩ su-ṇimittaĩ lahaï kavaṇu
text.12224: vihaseppiṇu vuccaï rāmĕṇa  $  saï su-ṇimittaĩ jantāhũ
text.12230: cindheṇa cindhu rahu rahavareṇa  $  chatteṇa chattu gaü gaẏavareṇa
text.12231: turaeṇa turaṅgamu ṇaru ṇareṇa  $  calaṇeṇa calaṇu karaẏalu kareṇa
text.12232: valu raṇa-rahasaḍḍhiu ṇahĕ ṇa māi  $  saṃcalliu devāgamaṇu ṇāĩ
text.12236: tahŏ uvari paẏaṭṭaü rāma-seṇṇu  $  ṇaṃ meha-jālu ṇahaẏalĕ ṇisaṇṇu
text.12243: thovantarĕ tahŏ sāẏarahŏ majjhĕ  $  velandhara-purĕ tiẏasahã asajjhĕ
text.12244: vijjāhara seu-samudda ve vi  $  thiẏa aggaĕ dāruṇu jujjhu devi
text.12245: "maru tumhahã kuiu kaẏantu ajju  $  ko sakkaï sakkahŏ harĕvi rajju
text.12246: ko païsaï bhīsaṇĕ jalaṇa-jālĕ  $  ko jīvaï ḍhukkaĕ palaẏa-kālĕ
text.12247: ko sesa-phaṇā-maṇi-raẏaṇu lei  $  ko laṅkahĕ ahimuhu paü vi dei"
text.12248: paccāriẏa saẏala vi amariseṇa  $  "ahŏ kikkindhāhiva ahŏ suseṇa
text.12249: ahŏ kumua kunda suṇi mehaṇāẏa  $  ṇala ṇīla virāhiẏa pavaṇa-jāẏa
text.12250: dahimuha māhinda mahinda-rāẏa  $  avara vi je ṇaravara ke vi āẏa
text.12252: laï valahŏ valahŏ jaï sakkahŏ  $  hevāiẏa pārakkaĕhĩ
text.12258: "ee je daṇu dīsanti ke vi  $  kasu kerā thiẏa paharaṇaĩ levi"
text.12259: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi paṇamiẏa-sireṇa  $  puṇu puṇu thottuggīriẏa-gireṇa
text.12260: suggīveṃ pabhaṇiu rāmacandu  $  "ĕhu seu bhaḍārā ĕhu samuddu
text.12261: dahavaẏaṇahŏ keraü ṇāmu levi  $  pāikkācāreṃ thakka ve vi
text.12262: āẏahũ paḍimallu ṇa ko vi samarĕ  $  jaï dinti jujjhu ṇala-ṇīla ṇavarĕ
text.12263: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi rāmahŏ hiẏaü bhiṇṇu  $  ṇiviseṇa vihi mi āesu diṇṇu
text.12266: ṇalu dhāiu samuhu samuddahŏ  $  seuhĕ ṇīlu samāvaḍiu
text.12267: gaü gaẏahŏ maïndu maïndahŏ  $  jiha orālĕvi abbhiḍiu
text.12271: te bhiḍiẏa paropparu raṇĕ raüdda  $  vijjāhara veṇṇi vi ṇala-samudda
text.12272: viṇṇāṇĕhĩ karaṇĕhĩ kararuhehĩ  $  aṇṇehĩ asesĕhĩ āuhehĩ
text.12274: etthantarĕ rāvaṇa-kiṅkareṇa  $  melliẏa maẏaraharī vijja teṇa
text.12276: ettahĕ vi ṇaleṇa viruddhaeṇa  $  samaraṅgaṇĕ jaẏasiri-luddhaeṇa
text.12277: āẏāmĕvi mahihara-vijja mukka  $  jalu saẏalu vi paḍipūranti ḍhukka
text.12280: ṇalu uppari ḍīṇu samuddahŏ  $  ṇīlu vi seuhĕ sira-kamalĕ
text.12281: vihĩ veṇṇi mi maṇḍa dhareppiṇu  $  ghalliẏa rāmahŏ paẏa-jualĕ
text.12285: seu-samudda ve vi jaṃ āṇiẏa  $  ṇala-ṇīlĕhĩ samāṇu sammāṇiẏa
text.12286: tehi mi pavara pasāhĕvi kaṇṇaü  $  tahŏ lakkhaṇahŏ sa-hattheṃ diṇṇaü
text.12287: saccasirī kamalacchi visālā  $  aṇṇa vi raẏaṇacūla guṇamālā
text.12288: pañca vi kaṇṇaü devi kumārahŏ  $  thiẏa pāikka sīẏa-bhattārahŏ
text.12289: ekka raẏaṇi gaẏa kaha vi vihāṇaü  $  puṇu aruṇuggamĕ diṇṇu paẏāṇaü
text.12290: sāhaṇu pattu suvelu mahīharu  $  tahi mi suvelu ṇavara vijjāharu
text.12291: dhāiu jiha gaïndu orālĕvi  $  bhīsaṇu karĕ dhaṇuharu apphālĕvi
text.12292: bhiḍaï ṇa bhiḍaï raṇaṅgaṇĕ jāvĕhĩ  $  seu-samuddĕhĩ vāriu tāvĕhĩ
text.12295: paḍu pāĕhĩ rāhavacandahŏ  $  maṃ mārāvahi appaṇaü
text.12299: valaevahŏ paṇamiu tā suvelu  $  ṇaṃ paḍhama-jiṇahŏ seẏaṃsa-dhavalu
text.12300: ṇisi ekka vasĕvi saṃcallu seṇṇu  $  ṇaṃ paṅkaẏa-vaṇu dhuvagāẏa-chaṇṇu
text.12301: ṇaṃ līlaĕ jiṇa-samasaraṇu jāi  $  puṇuruttĕhĩ devāgamaṇu ṇāĩ
text.12302: thovantaru valu cikkamaï jāma  $  lakkhijjaï laṅkāṇaẏari tāma
text.12313: jaṃ diṭṭha laṅka vijjāharehĩ  $  kiu haṃsadīve āvāsu tehĩ
text.12314: haṃsarahu raṇaṅgaṇĕ ṇijjiṇevi  $  ṇaṃ thiẏa riu-sirĕ asi ṇikkhaṇevi
text.12315: āvāsiẏa bhaḍa pāseiẏaṅga  $  raha melliẏa ujjottiẏa turaṅga
text.12316: khañciẏaĩ vimāṇaĩ vaddha goṇa  $  saṇṇāha vimukka sa-kavaẏa-toṇa
text.12318: sahũ vambheṃ ruddeṃ kesaveṇa  $  ṇaṃ mukku paẏāṇaü vāsaveṇa
text.12319: tahĩ suhaḍa ke vi pabhaṇanti eva  $  "jujjhevvaü sundaru ajju deva"
text.12320: aṇṇekku bhaṇaï "bho bhīru-citta  $  uttāvalihūaü kāĩ mitta"
text.12322: aṇekka ke vi ṇiẏa-bhavaṇĕhĩ  $  samaü kalattĕhĩ suhu ramahĩ
text.12323: ārāhĕvi añcĕvi pujjĕvi  $  jiṇu paṇamanti sa ĩ bhu ĕhĩ
text.12329: haṃsadīvĕ thiĕ rāma-valĕ  $  khohu jāu ṇisiẏara-saṅghāẏahŏ
text.12330: jhatti mahīhara-siharu jiha  $  ṇivaḍiu hiẏaü dasāṇaṇa-rāẏahŏ
text.12334: tūrahŏ saddu suṇevi  raüddahŏ  $  khuhiẏa laṅka ṇaṃ vela samuddahŏ
text.12335: ehaĕ kālĕ aṇeẏaĩ jāṇaü  $  maṇĕṇa visaṇṇu vihīsaṇu rāṇaü
text.12336: "ṇaṃ kula-selu samāhaü vajjeṃ  $  puri ṇandanti ṇaṭṭha viṇu kajjeṃ
text.12337: kallĕ ji meraü ṇa kiu ṇivāriu  $  evahĩ dūsanthavaü ṇirāriu
text.12338: to vi saṇeheṃ parihacchāvami  $  uppahĕ thiẏaü supantheṃ lāvami
text.12339: jaï kaẏā vi uvasamaï dasāṇaṇu  $  pāveṃ chāiu para-mahilāṇaṇu
text.12340: ema vi jaï mahu ṇa kiẏaü vuttaü  $  to riu-sāhaṇĕ milami ṇiruttaü
text.12341: appāṇu vi ṇa hoi saṃsāriu  $  pariharievaü pārāẏāriu
text.12343: suhi jĕ sūlu paḍikulaṇaü  $  paru jĕ sahoẏaru jo aṇuattaï
text.12344: osahu dūruppaṇṇaü vi  $  vāhi sarīrahŏ kaḍḍhĕvi ghattaï"
text.12348: jo paratiẏa-paradavvāhiṃsaṇu  $  maṇĕ paricintĕvi ema vihīsaṇu
text.12349: ahimuhu valiu dasāṇaṇa-rāẏahŏ  $  ṇaṃ guṇa-ṇivahu dosa-saṅghāẏahŏ
text.12350: "bho bho bhū-bhūsaṇa bhaḍa-bhañjaṇa  $  khalahu mi khala sajjaṇahu mi sajjaṇa
text.12351: rāvaṇa kiṇṇa gaṇahi mahu vaẏaṇaĩ  $  kiṇṇa ṇiẏahi ṇandantaĩ saẏaṇaĩ
text.12352: kiṃ sa-gehu ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaru ṇa icchahi  $  kiṃ vajjāsaṇi sirĕṇa paḍicchahi
text.12353: kiṃ devāvahi seṇṇu disā-vali  $  kiṃ urĕ dharahi jalaṇa-jālāvali
text.12354: kiṃ āroḍahi rāhava-kesari  $  kiṃ jāṇantu khāhi visa-mañjari
text.12355: kiṃ giri-samu vaḍḍattaṇu khaṇḍahi  $  kiṃ cārittu sīlu vaü chaṇḍahi
text.12356: kiṃ vihaḍantaü kajju ṇa sandhahi  $  taïẏaĕ ṇaraĕ āu kiṃ vandhahi
text.12357: ekku ajasu aṇṇekku amaṅgalu  $  jāṇaï dentaha para guṇu kevalu "
text.12359: bhaṇaï dasāṇaṇu "bhāi suṇi  $  jāṇami pekkhami ṇaraẏahŏ saṅkami
text.12360: ṇavara sarīrĕ vasantāĩ  $  pañcindiẏaĩ jiṇevi ṇa sakkami "
text.12369: dāṇĕ mahāhaẏaṇe turāvaṇo  $  ṇisuṇiu jaṃ jampantu rāvaṇo
text.12371: bhaṇaï vihīsaṇu kuiẏa-maṇu  $  vaẏaṇu ṇievi dasāṇaṇa-keraü
text.12372: "maraṇa-kālĕ āsaṇṇĕ thiĕ  $  savvahŏ hoi cittu vivareraü
text.12376: puṇu vi garuu saṃtāu vihīsaṇĕ  $  kāĩ ṇivāriu ṇa kiu vihīsaṇĕ
text.12377: kāĩ ṇarinda 'ppāṇaũ sosahi  $  eṇa ṇiheṇa païṭṭhu visosahi
text.12378: jaṇaẏa-videhi-dhīẏa paï-sāriẏa  $  paĩ saẏaṇahũ bhavitti païsāriẏa
text.12379: eha ṇa sīẏa vaṇĕ ṭṭhiẏa bhallī  $  savvahũ hiẏaĕ païṭṭhiẏa bhallī
text.12380: eha ṇa sīẏa soẏa-saṃpattī  $  laṅkahĕ vajjāsaṇi saṃpattī
text.12381: eha ṇa sīẏa dāḍha vara-sīhahŏ  $  gaẏa-gaṇḍatthala-vahala-rasīhahŏ
text.12382: eha ṇa sīẏa jīha jamarāẏahŏ  $  kevala hāṇi jasujjama-rāẏahŏ
text.12384: ṇandaü laṅka sa-toraṇiẏa  $  aṇuṇahi rāmu pamāẏahi jujjhu
text.12385: jāṇaï siviṇā-riddhi jiha  $  ṇa hua ṇa hoi ṇa hosaï tujjhu
text.12391: indaī ṇiẏa-maṇe viruddhao  $  jeṇa haṇuu paharevi ruddhao
text.12392: huavaho vva jāloli-bhāsuro  $  hara saṇe vva kuio vi bhāsuro
text.12393: kesari vva uddhasiẏa-kandharo  $  pāuso vva uṇṇaïẏa-kaṃ-dharo
text.12394: "taṃ vihīsaṇā paĩ pajampiẏaṃ  $  dahamuhassa ṇa kaẏāi jaṃ piẏaṃ
text.12396: ko tuhũ keṃ vollāviẏaü  $  ko so lakkhaṇu ko kira rāmu
text.12397: jaï tahŏ appiẏa jaṇaẏa-suẏa  $  to haũ ṇa vahami indaï ṇāmu"
text.12401: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vihīsaṇu jampaï  $  "viruvaü ṇindiu sīẏahĕ jaṃ paï
text.12405: te raṇĕ jāĕ ṇivārĕvi sakkahŏ  $  tumhahũ majjhĕ satti parisakkahŏ
text.12406: jeṇa samvu muhĕ chuddhu kiẏantahŏ  $  milĕvi asesĕhĩ kāĩ kiẏaṃ tahŏ
text.12407: jeṇa kharahŏ siru khuḍiu jiẏantahŏ  $  caüdaha-sahasĕhĩ kāĩ kiẏaṃ tahŏ
text.12408: so hari sārahi jasu pavarāhaü  $  dujjaü keṇa  parajjiu rāhaü
text.12410: aṇṇu vi haṇuvahŏ kāĩ kiu  $  tumhahã taṇaĕ païṭṭhaü jo vaṇĕ
text.12411: dakkhavantu ṇiẏa-cindhāĩ  $  jiha viẏaḍḍhu kaṇṇāḍihĕ jovvaṇĕ"
text.12415: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi rūsiu dasāṇaṇo  $  jo saẏaṃ surindassa hāṇaṇo
text.12416: karĕ samukkhaẏaṃ candahāsaẏaṃ  $  vipphurantam iva candahāsaẏaṃ
text.12417: "maru pāḍami mahi-maṇḍale siraṃ  $  mama ṇindaẏaraṃ para-pasaṃsiraṃ"
text.12418: tahĩ avasarĕ kuio vihīsaṇo  $  jo jaṇĕ sukkuio vihīsaṇo
text.12419: laïu khambhu maṇi-raẏaṇa-bhūsio  $  dahavaẏaṇassa jaso vva bhū-sio
text.12420: ve vi padhāiẏa ekkamekkaho  $  jaṇu jampaï siẏa e-kkame kkaho
text.12427: ṇaravaï dhariu kaḍacchaĕ mantihĩ  $  "karĕ avarāhu bhaḍārā maṃ tihĩ
text.12428: vihĩ bhāihĩ aṇṇekkahŏ taṇaẏahŏ  $  jo jīviẏahŏ sāru taü taṇaẏahŏ"
text.12429: to vi ṇa thakkaï amarisa-kuddhaü  $  jo caü-jalahi-vihūsiẏa-ku-ddhaü
text.12430: "arĕ khala khudda pisuṇa akalaṅkahĕ  $  maru maru ṇīsaru ṇīsaru laṅkahĕ"
text.12431: bhaṇaï vihīsaṇu "jaṇa-ahirāmahŏ  $  jaï acchami to dohaü rāmahŏ
text.12432: ṇavari ṇarinda mūḍha aviẏappaü  $  jiha sakkahi tiha rakkhahi appaü"
text.12433: ema bhaṇeppiṇu gaü ṇiẏa-bhavaṇahŏ  $  ṇāĩ gaïndu rambha-khambha-vaṇaho
text.12434: tīsakkhohaṇīhĩ hari-seṇṇahŏ  $  ṇiggaü ṇiddalantu hariseṃ ṇaho
text.12437: jasu muhu maïlĕvi rāvaṇahŏ  $  rāmahŏ saṃmuhu ṇāĩ ṇisariẏaü
text.12443: ṇiĕvi seṇṇu ravi-maṇḍala-ggae  $  dei diṭṭhi hari maṇḍalaggaĕ
text.12446: daṇḍapāṇi paṭṭhaviu mahavalo  $  jahĩ sa-kaṇhu paḍivakkha-maha-valo
text.12448: ekku vaẏaṇu pabhaṇaï vihīsaṇo  $  "tumha bhiccu evahĩ vihīsaṇo
text.12450: ṇa kiu ṇivāriu rāvaṇĕṇa  $  lajja vi māṇu vi maṇĕ paricattaü
text.12451: parama-jiṇindahŏ indu jiha  $  tema vihīsaṇu tumhahã bhattaü"
text.12455: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu tahŏ jŏhahŏ  $  je je ke vi rāẏa rajjohahŏ
text.12456: te te miliẏā raṇĕ i sumantahŏ  $  maïkanteṇa vuttu sāmantahŏ
text.12457: "icchahŏ valahŏ deva patti jjaï  $  to ṇa ṇisāẏarāhã pattijjaï
text.12458: eẏahũ taṇaü cāru ko jāṇaï  $  jehĩ chaleṇa chaliẏa vaṇĕ jāṇaï"
text.12459: pabhaṇaï maïsamuddu "imu āvaï  $  ettiu valu para-puṇṇĕhĩ āvaï
text.12460: pattiẏa evahĩ rāvaṇu jijjaï  $  ṇiẏa-maṇĕ saẏala saṅka vajjijjaï
text.12461: kiṅkara-vahuĕhĩ ĕhu ji pahuccaï  $  tāha mi sāhaṇĕ ĕhu ji pahuccaï
text.12462: miliu vihīsaṇu laṅka paīsahŏ  $  laggaü karaẏalĕ sīẏa halīsahŏ
text.12464: dijjaü rajju vihīsaṇahŏ  $  jeṇa ve vi jujjhanti paropparu
text.12465: amhahũ kāĩ mahāhavĕṇa  $  paru jĕ pareṇa jāu saẏa-sakkaru"
text.12469: taṃ ṇisuṇeviṇu pacaviu māruī  $  jo kira vammahu maẏaṇu mā-ruī
text.12470: "deva deva devinda-sāsaṇaṃ  $  saccaü kalahĕvi mahu dasāsaṇaṃ
text.12473: maĩ samāṇu eṇāsi jampiẏaṃ  $  taṃ karemi halaharahŏ jaṃ piẏaṃ
text.12474: jaï mahu vuttaü ṇa kiu rāĕṇaṃ  $  to riu-sāhaṇĕ milami rāĕṇaṃ"
text.12476: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu rāhavĕṇa  $  pesiu daṇḍapāṇi hakkāraü
text.12477: āu vihīsaṇu gaha-sahiu  $  eẏārahamu ṇāĩ aṅgāraü
text.12481: jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṃ miliu vihīsaṇu  $  vihi mi paropparu kiu saṃbhāsaṇu
text.12482: bhaṇaï rāmu "ṇaü paĩ lajjāvami  $  ṇīsāvaṇṇa laṅka bhuñjāvami
text.12483: siru toḍami rāvaṇahŏ jiẏantahŏ  $  saṃpesami pāhuṇaü kaẏantahŏ"
text.12484: teṇa vi vuttu "bhaḍārā rāhava  $  suhaḍa-sīha ṇivvūḍha-mahāhava
text.12485: jiha arahanta-ṇāhu para-loẏahŏ  $  tiha tuhũ sāmisālu iha-loẏahŏ"
text.12486: eva jāmva pacavanti paropparu  $  tāma videhahĕ ṇaẏaṇa-suhaṅkaru
text.12487: akkhohaṇi-sahāsu bhāmaṇḍalu  $  ṇāĩ surĕhĩ samāṇu ākhaṇḍalu
text.12490: maṇĕ parituṭṭheṃ rāhavĕṇa  $  ṇaravaï-vindu saẏalu osārĕvi
text.12491: avaruṇḍiu pupphavaï-suu  $  sarahasu  sa ĩ bhu a-jualu pasārĕvi
text.12494: atthāṇĕ dasāsahŏ  $  lacchi-ṇivāsahŏ  $  aṅgaü dūu visajjiẏaü
text.12498: valaeveṃ pabhaṇiu jamvavantu  $  "ettiẏahũ majjhĕ ko vuddhivantu
text.12499: kiṃ gavaü gavakkhu suseṇu tāru  $  kiṃ añjaṇeu raṇĕ duṇṇivāru
text.12500: kiṃ ṇalu kiṃ ṇīlu kim indu kundu  $  kiṃ aṅgaü kiṃ pihumaï mahindu
text.12501: kiṃ kumuu virāhiu raẏaṇakesi  $  kiṃ bhāmaṇḍalu kiṃ candarāsi"
text.12502: jaṃ eva papucchiu rāhaveṇa  $  viṇṇaviu ṇaveppiṇu jamvaveṇa
text.12503: "pesaṇĕ suseṇu viṇae vi kundu  $  pañcaṅgeṃ manteṃ maïsamuddu
text.12504: aṅgaṅgaẏa dūattaṇĕ mahattha  $  ṇala-ṇīla paẏāṇaĕ saï samattha
text.12505: mahumahaṇu haṇuvu āhava-vamālĕ  $  suggīu tuhu mi puṇu vijaẏa-kālĕ"
text.12507: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi rāmeṃ  $  ṇiggaẏa-ṇāmeṃ  $  aṅgaü jottiu dūa-bharĕ
text.12508: "bhaṇu "kiṃ vitthāreṃ  $  samaü kumāreṃ  $  ajja vi  rāvaṇa sandhi karĕ"
text.12512: aṇṇu mi sandesaü ṇehi tāsu  $  vahu-duṇṇaẏa-vantahŏ rāvaṇāsu
text.12513: vuccaï "laṅkesara cāru cāru  $  ko para-tiẏa lentahŏ purisaẏāru
text.12514: jaï saccaü raẏaṅāsavahŏ puttu  $  to eu kāĩ vavaharĕvi juttu
text.12515: haũ laggaü kuḍhĕ lakkhaṇahŏ jāma  $  paĩ chammĕvi ṇiẏa vaïdehi tāma
text.12516: ettiẏa vi to vi taü thāu vuddhi  $  ahimāṇu mueppiṇu karahi sandhi" "
text.12517: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi bhaḍa-kaḍamaddaṇeṇa  $  ṇibbhacchiu rāmu jaṇaddaṇeṇa
text.12518: "dāḍhiẏaü jāsu jasu vāhu-daṇḍa  $  jasu valĕ ettiẏa ṇaravara paẏaṇḍa
text.12519: so dīṇa-vaẏaṇu pahu cavaï kẽva  $  ekkallaü karĕ sandhāṇu deva
text.12521: āĕhĩ ālāvĕhĩ  $  galiẏa-paẏāvĕhĩ  $  haũ tumhahã vāhiraü kiha
text.12522: vāẏaraṇu suṇantahũ  $  sandhi karantahũ  $  ūdantāi-ṇivāu jiha"
text.12526: jaṃ sandhi ṇa icchiẏa duddhareṇa  $  taṃ vajjāvatta-dhaṇuddhareṇa
text.12536: līlaĕ jĕ dalesaï  $  kaḍḍhĕvi lesaï  $  jāṇaï-jasa-muttāhalaĩ""
text.12540: samaraṅgaṇĕ ekkeṃ lakkhaṇeṇa  $  sandesaü pesiu takkhaṇeṇa
text.12541: "bhaṇu "jahĩ jĕ jahĩ jĕ tuhũ kumua-saṇḍu  $  tahĩ tahĩ so diṇaẏaru teẏa-piṇḍu
text.12542: jahĩ jahĩ tuhũ girivaru sihara-khaṇḍu  $  tahĩ tahĩ so vāsava-kulisa-daṇḍu
text.12543: jahĩ jahĩ āsīvisu tuhũ phaṇindu  $  tahĩ tahĩ so bhīsaṇu vara-khagindu
text.12544: jahĩ jahĩ tuhũ galagajjiẏa-gaïndu  $  tahĩ tahĩ so vahu-māẏā-maïndu
text.12545: jahĩ tuhũ havi tahĩ jalaṇihi-ṇihāu  $  jahĩ tuhũ ghaṇu tahĩ so palaẏa-vāu
text.12546: jahĩ tuhũ ubbhaḍu tahĩ so viṇāsu  $  jahĩ tuhũ ca-saddu tahĩ so samāsu
text.12547: jahĩ tuhũ ṇisi tahĩ so  pavara-divasu  $  jahĩ tuhũ turaṅgu tahĩ so vi mahisu
text.12549: jalĕ thalĕ pāẏālĕhĩ  $  visama-khaẏālĕhĩ  $  tuhũ jara-pāẏavu jahĩ jĕ jahĩ
text.12550: laggesaï ghittaü  $  jhatti palittaü  $  lakkhaṇa-huavahu tahĩ jĕ tahĩ""
text.12555: "bhaṇu "rāvaṇa jāĩ kiẏaĩ chalāĩ  $  darisāvami tāĩ mahāphalāĩ
text.12556: jeṃ hattheṃ kaḍḍhiu candahāsu  $  jeṃ hattheṃ vaïrihĩ kiu viṇāsu
text.12557: jeṃ hattheṃ paṇaïhũ diṇṇu dāṇu  $  jeṃ hattheṃ dhaṇaẏahŏ maliu māṇu
text.12558: jeṃ hattheṃ sāhukkāru laddhu  $  jeṃ hattheṃ suravaï samarĕ vaddhu
text.12559: jeṃ hattheṃ saĩ samaladdhu aṅgu  $  jeṃ hattheṃ varuṇahŏ kiẏaü bhaṅgu
text.12560: jeṃ hattheṃ kaḍḍhiẏa rāma-ghariṇi  $  pañcāṇaṇeṇa vaṇĕ jema hariṇi
text.12561: tahŏ hatthahŏ āiu palaẏa-kālu  $  maĩ uppāḍevaü jiha muṇālu"
text.12563: aṇṇu vi savisesaü  $  kahi sandesaü  $  "paĩ pesĕvi jama-sāsaṇahŏ
text.12564: rāhava-saṃsaggī  $  puri āvaggī  $  hosaï paraĕ vihīsaṇahŏ""
text.12569: "bhaṇu "rāvaṇa kallaĕ kavaṇu cojju  $  suggīu karesaï samarĕ bhojju
text.12574: taṃ tehaü bhojju akāẏarehĩ  $  bhuñjevaü paraĕ ṇisāẏarehĩ
text.12578: acchevaü sāvĕhĩ  $  vigaẏa-paẏāvĕhĩ  $  mahu sara-sejjahĩ suttaĕhĩ
text.12582: puṇu pacchalĕ sura-kari-kara-bhueṇa  $  sandesaü dijjaï maru-sueṇa
text.12583: "bhaṇu indaï "icchiu dehi jujjhu  $  haṇuvantu bhiḍesaï paraĕ tujjhu
text.12588: diḍha guḍa toḍantu turaṅgamāhã  $  para-valu vali dentu vihaṅgamāhã
text.12589: darisantu caüddisu bhaḍa-ciẏāĩ  $  dhūmantaĩ jiha dujjaṇa-muhāĩ
text.12591: iẏa līlaĕ sāhaṇu  $  raha-vāhaṇu  $  jiha uvavaṇu tiha ṇiṭṭhavami
text.12592: jeṃ pantheṃ akkhaü  $  ṇiu duppekkhaü  $  teṇa pāva paĩ paṭṭhavami""
text.12603: tehaü bhāmaṇḍala-jalapavāhu  $  rellantu laṅka païsaï athāhu""
text.12605: vuccaï ṇala-ṇīlĕhĩ  $  dūsama-sīlĕhĩ  $  "aṅgaẏa gampiṇu ema bhaṇĕ
text.12606: "arĕ hattha-pahatthahŏ  $  paharaṇa-hatthahŏ  $  jiha sakkahŏ tiha thāhu raṇĕ""
text.12610: ṇiẏa-vaïru sarevi jasāhieṇa  $  sandesaü diṇṇu virāhieṇa
text.12611: bhaṇu "rāvaṇa jiha paĩ kiu akajju  $  candoẏaru mārĕvi laïu rajju
text.12612: vāẏaraṇu jema jaṃ pujjaṇīu  $  vāẏaraṇu jema sa-visajjaṇīu
text.12613: vāẏaraṇu jema āẏama-ṇihāṇu  $  vāẏaraṇu jema āesa-thāṇu
text.12614: vāẏaraṇu jema atthuvvahantu  $  vāẏaraṇu jema guṇa-viddhi dentu
text.12615: vāẏaraṇu jema viggaha-samāṇu  $  vāẏaraṇu jema sandhijjamāṇu
text.12616: vāẏaraṇu jema avvaẏa-ṇivāu  $  vāẏaraṇu jema kiriẏā-sahāu
text.12617: vāẏaraṇu jema paraloẏa-karaṇu  $  vāẏaraṇu jema gaṇa-liṅga-saraṇu
text.12619: taṃ rajju mahāraü  $  guṇa-garuāraü  $  diṇṇu jema khara-dūsaṇahũ
text.12620: tiha dhīru ma chaḍḍahi  $  aṅgu samoḍḍahi  $  mama ṇārāẏahũ bhīsaṇahũ""
text.12624: avaro vi ko vi jo jāsu mallu  $  jo jasu uppari uvvahaï sallu
text.12625: samaraṅgaṇĕ jeṇa samāṇu jāsu  $  sandesaü pesiu teṇa tāsu
text.12626: bhīsāvaṇu rāvaṇu rāu jetthu  $  gaü aṅgaü dūu païṭṭhu tetthu
text.12631: divĕ divĕ kiẏa-taïlokkĕkka-seva  $  sandhāṇu paẏatteṃ karahi deva
text.12638: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi hasiu dasāṇaṇeṇa  $  "kiṃ vujjhiẏa sandhi samāsu keṇa
text.12639: keṃ lakkhaṇu keṇa pamāṇu sāru  $  kiṃ valu kiṃ sāhaṇu duṇṇivāru
text.12640: jo ṇa khaliu devĕhĩ dāṇavehĩ  $  tahŏ kavaṇu gahaṇu kira māṇavehĩ
text.12645: jaï hoi sandhi savvari-diṇāhũ  $  jaï hoi sandhi vammaha-jiṇāhũ
text.12648: jaï sandhi pahāvaï  $  ko vi ghaḍāvaï  $  to raṇĕ rāhava-rāvaṇahũ"
text.12652: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi samarĕ abhaṅgaeṇa  $  puṇu puṇu vi pavolliu aṅgaeṇa
text.12654: bhaṇu sīẏa ṇa dentahŏ kavaṇu lāhu  $  kiṃ jo so sajjaṇa-hiẏaẏa-ḍāhu
text.12655: kiṃ jo so samvukumāra-ṇāsu  $  kiṃ jo so para-gaẏa-sūrahāsu
text.12656: kiṃ jo so candaṇahī-pavañcu  $  kiṃ jo so khara-vala-vali-virañcu
text.12657: kiṃ jo so āsālantakālu  $  kiṃ jo so viṇihaẏa-koṭṭavālu
text.12658: kiṃ jo so pavarujjāṇa-bhaṅgu  $  kiṃ jo so haü valu cāuraṅgu
text.12659: kiṃ jo so uppari diṇṇu pāu  $  kiṃ jo so moḍiu ghara-ṇihāu
text.12660: kiṃ jo so ekko ghara-vibheu  $  kiṃ jo so kallaĕ pāṇa-cheu
text.12662: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi rāvaṇu  $  bhaẏa-bhīsāvaṇu  $  amarisa-kuddhaü aṅgaẏahŏ
text.12667: "mahu aggaĕ bhaḍa-vokkehĩ kāĩ  $  saṅkanti jāsu raṇĕ sura-saẏāĩ
text.12668: dāhiṇĕ karĕ kaḍḍhiĕ candahāsĕ  $  maĩ sarisu kavaṇu tihuaṇĕ asesĕ
text.12669: kiṃ varuṇu pavaṇu vaïsavaṇu khandu  $  kiṃ hari haru vambhu phaṇindu candu
text.12670: jaṃ cukkaï haru taṃ kaluṇu bhāu  $  maṃ gaürihĕ hosaï kahi mi ghāu
text.12671: jaṃ cukkaï vambhu mahanta-vuddhi  $  taṃ kira vambhaṇĕ māriĕ ṇa suddhi
text.12672: jaṃ cukkaï jamu jaṇa-saṇṇivāu  $  taṃ ko kira ettiu lei pāu
text.12673: jaṃ cukkaï sasi sāraṅga-dharaṇu  $  taṃ kira raẏaṇihĕ ujjoẏa-karaṇu
text.12674: jaṃ tavaï bhāṇu vavagaẏa-tamālu  $  taṃ kira ĕhu pañcamu loẏapālu
text.12676: diṭṭhaĕ rahuṇandaṇĕ  $  sa-dhaĕ sa-sandaṇĕ  $  jaï ekku vi paü osarami
text.12681: tiẏasinda-vinda-kandāvaṇeṇa  $  jaṃ sandhi na icchiẏa rāvaṇeṇa
text.12682: taṃ indaï-muhĕ ṇīsariu vakku  $  "para sandhihĕ kāraṇu atthi ekku
text.12683: jaï maṇĕ pariẏacchĕvi paümaṇāhu  $  āmellaï sīẏahĕ taṇaü gāhu
text.12684: to tahŏ ti-khaṇḍa mahi ekka-chatta  $  caüraddha ṇihiu raẏaṇāĩ satta
text.12686: anteuru pariẏaṇu piṇḍavāsu  $  sa-kalattu sa-vandhaü haü mi dāsu
text.12687: kusa-dīu cīra-vāhaṇu asesu  $  vajjaraü cīṇu chohāra-desu
text.12688: vavvaraülu javaṇu suvaṇṇa-dīu  $  velandharu haṃsu suvela-dīu
text.12690: aṇṇaï mi paesaĩ  $  leu asesaĩ  $  giri veẏaḍḍhu jāmva dharĕvi
text.12691: rāvaṇu mandoẏari  $  sīẏa kisoẏari  $  tiṇṇi vi vāhirāĩ karĕvi"
text.12695: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi rosa-vasaṃ-gaeṇa  $  ṇibbhacchiu indaï aṅgaeṇa
text.12696: "khala khudda pisuṇa para-ṇāri-īha  $  saẏa-khaṇḍa kẽva taü ṇa gaẏa jīha
text.12697: jasu taṇiẏa ghariṇi tāsu jĕ ṇa dehi  $  rāhavĕ jiẏantĕ jammĕvi ṇa lehi
text.12698: jo rakkhaï para-parihava-saẏāĩ  $  so ṇiẏa-kajjeṃ osaraï kāĩ"
text.12700: sandesā te vajjarĕvi tāsu  $  gaü aṅgaü vala-lakkhaṇahã pāsu
text.12701: "so rāvaṇu sandhi ṇa karaï deva  $  sahũ sareṇa amī-īẏāru jemva"
text.12704: vehi mi ve cāvaĩ  $  atula-paẏāvaĩ  $  apphāliẏaĩ sa iṃ bhu ĕhĩ
text.12713: dhure aṅgalakkho samāruṭṭha-vaẏaṇo  $  dhae vandhuro rakkhaso ratta-ṇaẏaṇo
text.12714: rahe rāvaṇo duṇṇivāro asajjhe  $  kaẏantu vva khaẏakāla-maccūṇa majjhe
text.12716: mahā-palaẏa-kālo vva kahakahakahanto  $  samuppāẏa-jalaṇo vva dhagadhagadhaganto
text.12717: samālovaṇe saṇi va muha-vipphuranto  $  phaṇindo vva phara-phāra-phukkāra dento
text.12718: gaïndo vva mukkaṅkuso gulagulanto  $  maïndo vva mehāgame tharaharanto
text.12719: samuddo vva pakkhuhaṇĕ majjāẏa-catto  $  surindo vva vahu-raṇa-rasubbhiṇṇa-gatto
text.12720: ṇahĕ asaṇi-jalaü vva dhuddhuddhuvanto  $  mahā-vijju-puñjo vva taḍataḍataḍanto
text.12724: kiṅkara-sāhaṇu kahi mi ṇa mantaü  $  ṇiggaü pura-paoli bhellantaü
text.12730: ke vi ṇīsaranti vīra  $  bhūdhara vva tuṅga dhīra
text.12731: sāẏara vva appamāṇa  $  kuñjara vva diṇṇa-dāṇa
text.12737: kuddha juddha-luddha ke vi  $  ṇiggaẏā su-saṇṇahevi
text.12740: ko vi padhāiu haṇu-haṇu-saddeṃ  $  parihaï kavaü ko vi āṇandeṃ
text.12741: raṇa-rasiẏahŏ romañcubbhiṇṇahŏ  $  urĕ saṇṇāhu ṇa māiu aṇṇahŏ
text.12747: kā vi kanta cindhaĩ appāhaï  $  kā vi kanta ṇiẏa-kantu pasāhaï
text.12748: kā vi kanta muha-patti karāvaï  $  kā vi kanta dappaṇu darisāvaï
text.12749: kā vi kanta piẏa-ṇaẏaṇaĩ añjaï  $  kā vi kanta raṇa-tilaü paüñjaï
text.12750: kā vi kanta sa-viẏāraü jampaï  $  kā vi kanta tamvolu samappaï
text.12751: kā vi kanta vimvāharĕ laggaï  $  kā vi kanta āliṅgaṇu maggaï
text.12752: kā vi kanta ṇa gaṇei ṇivāriu  $  suraẏārambhu karei ṇirāriu
text.12753: kā vi kanta sirĕ vandhaï phullaĩ  $  vatthaĩ parihāvei amullaĩ
text.12754: kā vi kanta āharaṇaĩ ḍhoẏaï  $  kā vi kanta para-muhu jĕ paloẏaï
text.12757: kahĕ vi aṅgĕ roso jjĕ ṇa māiu  $  piẏa-raṇavahuẏaĕ sahũ īsāiu
text.12758: "jaï tuhũ tahĕ aṇurāiu vaṭṭahi  $  to mahu ṇaha-vaẏa devi paẏaṭṭahi"
text.12762: pabhaṇaï ko vi vīru "jaï cavahi eva bhajje
text.12763: to vari tāhĕ demi jā juttu sāmi-kajje"(helāduvaī)
text.12764: ko vi bhaṇaï "gaẏa-gaṇḍa-valaggaĩ  $  āṇãvi muttāhalaĩ dhaẏaggaĩ"
text.12765: ko vi bhaṇaï "ṇa vi lemi pasāhaṇu  $  jāma ṇa bhañjami rāhava-sāhaṇu
text.12766: ko vi bhaṇaï "muha-patti ṇa icchami  $  jāma ṇa suhaḍa-jhaḍakka paḍicchami
text.12767: ko vi bhaṇaï "ṇa ṇihālami dappaṇu  $  jāmva ṇa raṇĕ viṇivāiu lakkhaṇu
text.12768: ko vi bhaṇaï " ṇaü ṇaẏaṇaĩ añjami  $  jāmva ṇa suravahu-jaṇa-maṇu rañjami"
text.12769: ko vi bhaṇaï "muhĕ paṇṇu ṇa lāẏami  $  jāmva ṇa ruṇḍa-ṇivahu ṇaccāvami"
text.12770: ko vi bhaṇaï "ṇaü suraü samāṇami  $  jāmva ṇa bhaḍahũ kula-kkhaü āṇami"
text.12771: ko vi bhaṇaï "dhaṇĕ phulla ṇa vandhami  $  jāmva ṇa saravara-dhoraṇi sandhami"
text.12774: ko vi bhaṇaï "dhaṇĕ ṇaü āliṅgami  $  jāmva ṇa danti-dantĕ ālaggami"
text.12775: ko vi karaï ṇivitti āharaṇahŏ  $  jāmva ṇa diṇṇa sīẏa dahavaẏaṇahŏ
text.12779: garua-paoharāĕ accanta-ṇehiṇīe  $  raṇĕ païsantu ko vi sikkhaviu gehiṇīe (helāduvaī)
text.12783: kā vi ṇāri parihāsaï emaṃ  $  "tema jujjhu ṇaü lajjami jemaṃ"
text.12784: kā vi ṇāri paḍivohaï ṇāhaṃ  $  "bhaggamāṇĕ paĩ jīvami ṇāhaṃ"
text.12785: kā vi ṇāri paḍicumvaṇu dei  $  ko vi vīru avaheri karei
text.12786: "kantĕ kantĕ maĩ maṇḍa laevī  $  ajja vi kitti-vahua cumvevī
text.12787: kā vi ṇāhĕ ṇavakāru karei  $  ko vi vīru raṇa-dikkha laei
text.12791: ṇiggaü kumbhaẏaṇṇu maṇĕ kuiẏaü  $  ṇahaẏalĕ dhūmakeu ṇaṃ uiẏaü
text.12825: iẏa ṇaravaï saṇṇaddha samuṇṇaẏa  $  vaggha-mahāraha vaggha-mahādhaẏa
text.12842: emva ṇarāhiva aṇṇa vi ṇiggaẏa  $  hatthi-mahāraha hatthi-mahādhaẏa
text.12852: avare vi ke vi miga-samvarĕhiṃ  $  visa-mesa-mahisa-khara-sūarĕhiṃ
text.12854: avare vi ke vi giri-rukkha-dharā  $  havi-vāruṇa-vāẏava-vajja-karā
text.12865: vimāṇaṃ vimāṇeṇa chatteṇa chattaṃ  $  dhaẏaggaṃ dhaẏaggeṇa cindheṇa cindhaṃ
text.12866: gaïndo gaïndeṇa sīheṇa sīho  $  turaṅgo turaṅgeṇa vaggheṇa vaggho
text.12867: jaṇāṇandaṇo sandaṇo sandaṇeṇaṃ  $  ṇarindo ṇarindeṇa joheṇa joho
text.12868: tisūlaṃ tisūleṇa khaggeṇa khaggaṃ  $  vale evam aṇṇoṇṇa-ghaṭṭijjamāṇe
text.12869: kahimpi ppaese visūranti sūrā  $  raṇaṅke ciraṅke cirā vīra-lacchī
text.12870: kahimpi ppaese vimāṇehĩ dhantaṃ  $  bhaḍā sūrakantehĩ jāṇanti aṇṇaṃ
text.12871: kahimpi ppaese supāseiaṅgā  $  gaïndāṇa kaṇṇehĩ pāvanti vāẏaṃ
text.12872: sahassāĩ cattāri akkhohaṇīhĩ  $  vale jattha taṃ vaṇṇiuṃ kassa sattī
text.12875: hattha-pahattha ṭhaveppiṇu aggaĕ  $  rāvaṇu dei diṭṭhi ṇiẏa-khaggaĕ
text.12876: ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālu jagahŏ ārūsĕvi  $  thiu saṅgāma-bhūmi sa ĩ bhū sĕvi
text.12891: jaṃ seṇa-saṇaddhaĕ diṭṭhāe  $  taṃ lakkhaṇe vi āluṭṭhāe
text.12906: puṇu rāvaṇa-valu ṇijjhāiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ saẏalu jĕ diṭṭhihĕ māiẏaü
text.12909: jāsu kisoarĕ  $  jagu ji giromaü jettiu
text.12910: tāsu visālahũ  $  ṇaẏaṇahũ taṃ valu kettiu
text.12914: tahĩ tehaĕ avasarĕ ṇa kiu kheu  $  saṇṇajjhaï sarahasu añjaṇeu
text.12916: jo āsāliẏahĕ viṇāsa-kālu  $  jo vajjāuha-vaṇĕ jalaṇa-jālu
text.12921: jo jasa-lehaḍu ekkalla-vīru  $  so mārui romañciẏa-sarīru
text.12929: ema bhaṇevi vīra-cūḍāmaṇi  $  paümappaha-vimāṇĕ thiu pāvaṇi
text.12930: tahĩ avasarĕ suggīu virujjhaï  $  bhāmaṇḍalu sarosu saṇṇajjhaï
text.12932: gaẏa-raẏāĩ ṇaṃ siddhahã thāṇaĩ  $  bhaṅga-jaṇaĩ ṇaṃ kusumahŏ vāṇaĩ
text.12935: hari-valahaddahũ ve paṭṭhaviẏaĩ  $  ve appāṇahŏ kāraṇĕ ṭhaviẏaĩ
text.12936: jiṇu jaẏakārĕvi caḍiu vihīsaṇu  $  jo bhaẏa-bhīẏa-jīva-mambhīsaṇu
text.12940: ṇaṃ dhura-dhoriẏa  $  cha vi samāsa vāẏaraṇahŏ
text.12944: ke vi saṇṇaddha samaraṅgaṇe dujjaẏā  $  ke vi bhāmaṇḍalāicca-canda-ddhaẏā
text.12945: ke vi siri-saṅkha-āvariẏa-kalasa-ddhaẏā  $  ke vi kāraṇḍa-kalahaṃsa-koñca-ddhaẏā
text.12946: ke vi aliẏalla-māẏaṅga-sīhaddhaẏā  $  ke vi khara-turaẏa-visamesa-mahisa-ddhaẏā
text.12947: ke vi sasa-saraha-sāraṅga-riñcha-ddhaẏā  $  ke vi ahi-ṇaüla-maẏa-mora-garuḍaddhaẏā
text.12948: ke vi siva-sāṇa-gomāu-pamaẏa-ddhaẏā  $  ke vi ghaṇa-vijju-taru-kamala-kulisaddhaẏā
text.12949: ke vi suṃsuara-kari-maẏara-maccha-ddhaẏā  $  ke vi ṇakkohara-ggāha-kumma-ddhaẏā
text.12993: rahavara-gaẏavarehĩ ekkekkĕhĩ  $  tihĩ turaĕhĩ pañcahĩ pāikkĕhĩ
text.12994: vuccaï patti seṇa tihĩ pattihĩ  $  seṇāmuhu tihĩ seṇuppattihĩ
text.12996: tihĩ vāhiṇihĩ aṇṇa tihĩ piẏaṇĕhĩ  $  taṃ camu ṇāmu pagāsiu ṇiuṇĕhĩ
text.12997: tihĩ camūhĩ pabhaṇanti aṇikkiṇi  $  dasahĩ aṇikkiṇīhĩ akkhohaṇi
text.12998: eva'kkhohaṇīhĩ vi sahāsaĩ  $  jāĩ bhuvaṇĕ ṇiẏa-ṇāma-pagāsaĩ
text.12999: caü koḍīu sattatīsa lakkha  $  cālīsa sahasa raha-gaẏahũ saṅkha
text.13000: sattāsī lakkha sa-maccharāhũ  $  valĕ ekkavīsa koḍiu ṇarāhũ
text.13009: ekkaĕ pavuttu "valu kavaṇu thiru  $  jaṃ sāmi-kajjĕ ṇa gaṇei siru
text.13011: kavaṇahĩ pakkhariẏa turaṅga-thaḍa  $  kavaṇahĩ mukkaṅkusa hatthi-haḍa
text.13013: kavaṇahĩ sārahi sandaṇa-kusala  $  kavaṇahĩ seṇāvaï atula-vala
text.13014: kavaṇahĩ paharaṇaĩ bhaẏaṅkaraĩ  $  kavaṇahĩ cindhāĩ ṇirantaraĩ
text.13022: "halĕ veṇṇi mi atula-mahāvalāĩ  $  veṇṇi mi parivaḍḍhiẏa-kalaẏalāĩ
text.13023: veṇṇi mi kuruḍāĩ sa-maccharāĩ  $  veṇṇi mi dāruṇa-paharaṇa-karāĩ
text.13024: veṇṇi mi savaḍammuha kiẏa-gamāĩ  $  veṇṇi mi pakkhariẏa-turaṅgamāĩ
text.13025: veṇṇi mi galagajjiẏa-gaẏaghaḍāĩ  $  veṇṇi mi pavaṇuddhua-dhaẏavaḍāĩ
text.13026: veṇṇi mi sañjottiẏa-sandaṇāĩ  $  veṇṇi mi sura-ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇāĩ
text.13027: veṇṇi mi sārahi-duddarisaṇāĩ  $  veṇṇi mi seṇāvaï-bhīsaṇāĩ
text.13028: veṇṇi mi chattoha-ṇirantarāĩ  $  veṇṇi mi bhaḍa-bhiuḍi-bhaẏaṅkarāĩ
text.13031: vijaü ṇa jāṇahũ  $  kiṃ rāvaṇĕ kiṃ rāhavĕ"
text.13035: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi vahu-maccharāĕ  $  aṇṇāĕ ṇibbhacchiẏa accharāĕ
text.13036: "jahĩ raṇa-dhura-dhoriu kumbhaẏaṇṇu  $  sahũ bhīmeṃ bhīmaṇiṇāu aṇṇu
text.13037: jahĩ maü mārīci sumāli māli  $  jahĩ toẏadavāhaṇu jamvumāli
text.13038: jahĩ akkakitti mahu mehaṇāu  $  jahĩ maẏaru mahoẏaru bhīmakāu
text.13039: jahĩ hatthu pahatthu mahatthu vīru  $  jahĩ ghugghuru ghugghuddhāma dhīru
text.13040: jahĩ sambhu saẏambhu ṇisumbhu sumbhu  $  jahĩ sundu ṇisundu ṇikumbhu kumbhu
text.13041: jahĩ sīhaṇiẏamvu palamvavāhu  $  jahĩ ḍiṇḍimu ḍamvaru nakkagāhu
text.13042: jahĩ jamu jamaghaṇṭu jamakkhu sīhu  $  jahĩ mallavantu jahĩ vijjujīhu
text.13049: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vipphuriẏāṇaṇāĕ  $  aṇṇekkaĕ vuttu varaṅgaṇāĕ
text.13050: "jahĩ rāhaü viḍasuggīva-mahaṇu  $  jahĩ gavaü gavakkhu vivakkha-vahaṇu
text.13051: jahĩ lakkhaṇu khara-dūsaṇa-viṇāsu  $  jahĩ bhāmaṇḍalu jaẏasiri ṇivāsu
text.13052: jahĩ aṅgaü aṅgu suseṇu tāru  $  jahĩ ṇīlu ṇahusu ṇalu duṇṇivāru
text.13053: jahĩ ahimuhu dahimuhu maïsamuddu  $  maïkantu virāhiu kumuu kundu
text.13054: jahĩ jamvaü jamvava-raẏaṇakesi  $  jahĩ komui-candaṇu candarāsi
text.13055: jahĩ mārui ṇandaṇavaṇa-kaẏantu  $  jahĩ rambhu mahindu vihīsa-vantu
text.13056: jahĩ suhaḍu vihīsaṇu sūla-hatthu  $  seṇāvaï saĩ suggīu jetthu
text.13058: taṃ valu halĕ sahi  $  ettiu eu karesaï
text.13059: rāvaṇu pāḍĕvi  $  laṅka sa iṃ bhu ñjesaï"
text.13076: ṇaṃ ghaḍiẏaĩ  $  viṇṇi vi bhiḍiẏaĩ  $  paẏaĩ suvanta-tiṅantāĩ
text.13081: ko vi vīru ṇāsaṅkaï pāṇahũ  $  puṇu puṇu aṅgu samoḍaï vāṇahũ
text.13082: ko vi vīru paḍipaharaï para-valĕ  $  puraü dhāi paü dei ṇa pacchalĕ
text.13083: ko vi vīru asahantu raṇaṅgaṇĕ  $  jhampa dei para-ṇaravara-sandaṇĕ
text.13084: ko vi vaïri karĕ dharĕvi pakaḍḍhaï  $  paharĕ paharĕ pariosu pavaḍḍhaï
text.13085: ko vi sarāhaü paḍaï vimāṇahŏ  $  ṇāvaï vijju-puñju ṇiẏa-thāṇahŏ
text.13086: ko vi dharijjaï vāṇĕhĩ entaü  $  ṇaṃ gurūhĩ ṇaru ṇaraĕ paḍantaü
text.13087: ko vi danti-dantĕhĩ ālaggaï  $  karaṇu devi kŏ vi uvari valaggaï
text.13089: gaü mārĕvi  $  kumbhu viẏārĕvi  $  jāĩ tāĩ kundujjalaĩ
text.13090: guṇavantahĕ  $  pāhuḍu kantahĕ  $  ko vi lei muttāhalaĩ
text.13095: ṇa samicchiu jeṇa piẏahĕ taṇaü  $  teṃ ruhireṃ laïu pasāhaṇaü
text.13096: muhapatti ṇa icchiẏa jeṇa gharĕ  $  kiẏa teṇa suhaḍa bhañjĕvi samarĕ
text.13097: ciru jeṇa ṇa icchiu dappaṇaü  $  rahĕ teṇa ṇihāliu appaṇaü
text.13098: muhĕ paṇṇaĩ jeṇa ṇa lāviẏaĩ  $  teṃ ruṇḍa-saẏaĩ ṇaccāviẏaĩ
text.13099: ciru jeṇa ṇa suraü samāṇiẏaü  $  teṃ raṇa-vahuaĕ sahũ māṇiẏaü
text.13100: ṇiẏa-ṇāri ṇa icchiẏa āsi jĕṇa  $  āliṅgiẏa gaẏa-ghaḍa vahuẏa tĕṇa
text.13101: jo ṇahaĩ ṇa dentaü ṇiẏa-piẏāĕ  $  so phāḍiu samaraṅgaṇa-tiẏāĕ
text.13104: so raṇaühĕ suhaḍu paṇacciu  $  sāmihĕ aggaĕ devi siru
text.13118: kahiṃ ci āhaẏā haẏā  $  mahīẏalaṃ gaẏā gaẏā
text.13122: tahĩ āhavĕ paḍhama-bhiḍantaü  $  rāhava-sāhaṇu bhaggu kiha
text.13123: divĕ divĕ duviẏaḍḍhahŏ māṇĕṇa  $  poḍha-vilāsiṇi-suraü jiha
text.13127: rāhava-valu rāvaṇa-valĕṇa bhaggu  $  ṇaṃ duggaï-gamaṇeṃ sugaï-maggu
text.13128: ṇaṃ kali-pariṇāmeṃ parama-dhammu  $  ṇaṃ ghorācaraṇeṃ maṇua-jammu
text.13129: viẏaliẏa-paharaṇu ṇiẏa-maṇĕ visaṇṇu  $  bhajjantaü pekkhĕvi rāma-seṇṇu
text.13131: "halĕ pekkhu pekkhu ṇāsantu simiru  $  ṇaṃ ravi-ẏara-ṇiẏarahŏ raẏaṇi-timiru
text.13132: suṭṭhu vi sīẏālu mahanta-kāu  $  kiṃ visahaï kesari-ṇahara-ghāu
text.13133: suṭṭhu vi joiṅgaṇu teẏavantu  $  kiṃ teṇa tavaṇu jijjaï tavantu
text.13134: suṭṭhu vi sundara rāsahahŏ kīla  $  kiṃ pāvaï vara-māẏaṅga-līla
text.13136: suṭṭhu vi bhūgoẏaru dujjaü  $  kiṃ pujjaï vijjāharahŏ
text.13137: suṭṭhu vi vālāhiu vaḍḍaü  $  kiṃ sarisaü raẏaṇāẏarahŏ"
text.13145: dhāiẏa ṇaravara ṇaravara-vindahũ  $  sīhahũ sīha gaïnda gaïndahũ
text.13146: rahiẏahũ rahiẏa dhaẏagga dhaẏaggahũ  $  raha rahavarahũ turaṅga turaṅgahũ
text.13147: dhāṇukkiẏahũ bhiḍiẏa dhāṇukkiẏa  $  phārakkiẏahũ pavara phārakkiẏa
text.13148: asivara-hatthā asivara-hatthahũ  $  emva hūa kiliviṇḍi samatthahũ
text.13151: aḍḍāuha avasarĕ phiṭṭaĕ  $  vālāluñji karanti bhaḍa
text.13158: "halĕ vāsavaẏattĕ vasantalehĕ  $  halĕ kāmaseṇĕ halĕ kāmalehĕ
text.13159: halĕ kusuma-maṇohari halĕ aṇaṅgĕ  $  cittaṅgĕ varaṅgaṇĕ halĕ varaṅgĕ
text.13160: jo dīsaï raṇaühĕ suhaḍu ehu  $  kaṇṇiẏa-khuruppa-kappariẏa-dehu
text.13161: savvaü milevi ĕhu majjhu dehu  $  raṇĕ aṇṇu gavesavi tumhĕ lehu"
text.13165: halĕ dhāvahi kāĩ gahilliĕ  $  ĕhu bhattāru mahu ttaṇaü
text.13169: jāmva volla sura-kāmiṇi-satthahŏ  $  tāva valeṇa samarĕ kākutthahŏ
text.13170: bhaggu asesu vi rāvaṇa-sāhaṇu  $  viẏaliẏa-paharaṇu galiẏa-pasāhaṇu
text.13173: jaṃ ṇāsantu padīsiu para-valu  $  rāhava-pakkhiehĩ kiu kalaẏalu
text.13174: "halĕ halĕ vāravāra jaṃ vaṇṇahi  $  jeṇa samāṇu aṇṇu ṇaü maṇṇahi
text.13175: taṃ valu pekkhu pekkhu bhajjantaü  $  ṇaṃ uvavaṇu duvvāeṃ chittaü
text.13176: ṇaṃ sajjaṇa-kuḍumvu khala-saṅgeṃ  $  ṇāĩ kumuṇivara-cittu aṇaṅgeṃ
text.13178: riu-hariṇa-jūhu hiṇḍantaü  $  puṇṇahĩ kaha va samāvaḍiu
text.13179: ṇāseppiṇu kahĩ jāesaï  $  rāhava-sīhahŏ kamĕ paḍiu
text.13183: etthantarĕ valĕ mambhīsa devi  $  vitthakkā hattha-pahattha ve vi
text.13184: ṇaṃ palaĕ samuṭṭhiẏa canda-sūra  $  ṇaṃ rāhu-keu accanta-kūra
text.13185: ṇaṃ palaẏa-huāsaṇa pavaṇa-caṇḍa  $  ṇaṃ matta mahaggaẏa gilla-gaṇḍa
text.13186: ṇaṃ sīha samuddhūsiẏa-sarīra  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-jalaṇihi gambhīra dhīra
text.13189: jahĩ jahĩ bhiḍanti tahĩ maṇĕ visaṇṇu  $  sāhāru ṇa vandhaï rāma-seṇṇu
text.13190: vihaḍapphaḍu ṇāsaï pāṇa levi  $  tahĩ avasarĕ thiẏa ṇala-ṇīla ve vi
text.13192: ṇaṃ pavara-gaïndu gaïndahŏ  $  sīhahŏ sīhu samāvaḍiu
text.13193: ṇalu hatthahŏ ṇīlu pahatthahŏ  $  sarahasa-paharaṇu abbhiḍiu
text.13197: ṇala-hattha ve vi raṇĕ ovaḍiẏā  $  veṇṇi vi gaẏa-sandaṇehĩ caḍiẏā
text.13198: veṇṇi vi abhaṅga-māẏaṅga-dhaẏā  $  veṇṇi vi supasiddha laddha-vijaẏa
text.13199: veṇṇi vi bhiuḍī-bhaṅgura-vaẏaṇā  $  veṇṇi vi guñjāhala-sama-ṇaẏaṇā
text.13200: veṇṇi vi pacaṇḍa-kovaṇḍa-dharā  $  veṇṇi vi aṇavaraẏa-vimukka-sarā
text.13201: veṇṇi vi dhaṇu-viṇṇāṇanta-gaẏā  $  veṇṇi vi saẏavārocchiṇṇa-dhaẏā
text.13202: veṇṇi vi samaraṅgaṇĕ duvvisahā  $  veṇṇi vi saẏavāra-hūẏa-virahā
text.13203: veṇṇi vi thiẏa ahiṇava-rahavarehĩ  $  veṇṇi vi pomāiẏa suravarehĩ
text.13204: veṇṇi vi ṇīsandaṇa puṇu vi kiẏā  $  veṇṇi vi vimāṇa-vāhaṇĕhĩ thiẏā
text.13206: veṇṇi vi karanti raṇĕ ṇikkaü  $  pahu-sammāṇa-dāṇa-riṇahŏ
text.13207: paḍipaharĕ paharĕ ṇivaḍantaĕ  $  veṇṇi vi ṇāmu lenti jiṇahŏ
text.13220: jalĕ thalĕ pāẏālĕ ṇahaṅgaṇĕ  $  vāṇa-ṇivahu sandarisiẏaü
text.13225: taṃ hatthahŏ keraü vāṇa-jālu  $  pūrantu asesu diẏantarālu
text.13227: dhārā-timiru va kiraṇāẏareṇa  $  mīṇattheṃ jagu va saṇicchareṇa
text.13228: dahimuha-purĕ risi-kaṇṇovasaggĕ  $  haṇuveṇa va sāẏara-jalu kha-maggĕ
text.13229: aṇṇekkeṃ vāṇeṃ chiṇṇu cindhu  $  aṇṇekkeṃ riu vacchaẏalĕ viddhu
text.13230: vihalaṅghalu mahiẏalĕ paḍiu hatthu  $  ṇaṃ dahavaẏaṇahŏ jevaṇaü hatthu
text.13231: ettahĕ vi ve vi raṇa-bhara-samattha  $  ovaḍiẏa bhiḍiẏa ṇīla-ppahattha
text.13232: veṇṇi vi sa-rosa veṇṇi vi pacaṇḍa  $  veṇṇi vi gañjolliẏa-vāhudaṇḍa
text.13234: paccāriu ṇīlu pahatthĕṇa  $  "paharu paharu ekkahŏ jaṇahŏ
text.13235: jaẏa-lacchi deu āliṅgaṇu  $  jima rāmahŏ jima rāmaṇahŏ"
text.13239: etthantarĕ ṇīleṃ ṇa kiu kheu  $  ṇārāu visajjiu caṇḍa-veu
text.13240: guṇa-dhammāmelliu caliu kema  $  vindhaṇaü sahāveṃ pisuṇu jemva
text.13241: so entu pahattheṃ kuddhaeṇa  $  karivara-sandaṇĕṇa kari-ddhaeṇa
text.13242: chakkhaṇḍaĩ kiu chahĩ saravarehĩ  $  ṇaṃ mahiẏalu āgamĕ muṇivarehĩ
text.13243: caüvīsa ṇavara ṇīleṇa mukka  $  ekkekkahŏ ve ve vāṇa ḍhukka
text.13244: vihĩ kari kappariẏa samottharanta  $  vihĩ sārahi vihĩ dhaẏa tharaharanta
text.13245: rahu ekkeṃ ekkeṃ kavaü chiṇṇu  $  dhaü ekkeṃ ekkeṃ hiẏaü bhiṇṇu
text.13246: vihĩ vāhu-daṇḍa vihĩ vilua pāẏa  $  evaṃ tahŏ maraṇāvattha jāẏa
text.13249: lakkhijjaï suhaḍu paḍantaü  $  ṇaṃ bhūahã vali vikkhiriu
text.13253: jaṃ viṇihaẏa hattha-pahattha ve vi  $  thiu rāvaṇu muhĕ kara-kamalu devi
text.13254: ṇaṃ matta-mahāgaü gaẏa-visāṇu  $  ṇaṃ vāsarĕ teẏa-vihīṇu bhāṇu
text.13255: ṇaṃ ṇī-sasi-sūraü gaẏaṇa-maggu  $  ṇaṃ inda-paḍinda-vimukku saggu
text.13256: ṇaṃ muṇivaru iha-para-loẏa-cukku  $  ṇaṃ kukaï-kavvu lakkhaṇa-vimukku
text.13257: thiu valu vi ṇirujjamu galiẏa-gāu  $  rāhava-valu parivaddhiẏa-paẏāvu
text.13258: ettahĕ sa-paḍaha ṇīsadda saṅkha  $  ettahĕ apphāliẏa tūra-lakkha
text.13259: ettahĕ valĕ hāhākāru suṭṭhu  $  ettahĕ puṇu jaẏajaẏa-saddu ghuṭṭhu
text.13260: ettahĕ vi gaẏaṇĕ atthamiu mittu  $  ṇaṃ hattha-pahatthahã taṇaü mittu
text.13262: jujjhantaĩ veṇṇi vi seṇṇaĩ  $  raẏaṇiĕ ṇāĩ ṇivāriẏaĩ
text.13263: bhūĕhĩ sa ĩ bhū a-sahāsaĩ  $  raṇĕ bhoẏaṇĕ hakkāriẏaĩ
text.13265: pāḍiĕ hatthĕ pahatthĕ  $  valaĩ ve vi pariẏattaĩ
text.13270: gaĕ rāvaṇĕ ṇiẏa-mandirĕ païṭṭhĕ  $  hari-halaharĕ raṇa-vāhirĕ ṇiviṭṭhĕ
text.13271: tahĩ avasarĕ jaga-vitthiṇṇa-ṇāmu  $  jokkāriu ṇala-ṇīlehĩ rāmu
text.13272: teṇa vi vahu-raẏaṇa-samujjalāĩ  $  diṇṇaĩ ṇīlahŏ maṇi-kuṇḍalāĩ
text.13273: iẏarahŏ vi maüḍu maṇi-teẏa-bhiṇṇu  $  jo rāmaürihĩ jakkheṇa diṇṇu
text.13274: jaṃ ve vi papujjiẏa rāhaveṇa  $  pañcaṅgu vūhu kiu jamvaveṇa
text.13275: ṇara dāhiṇeṇa haẏa uttareṇa  $  gaẏa puvveṃ raha avarattaṇeṇa
text.13276: viraïẏaĩ vimāṇaĩ gaẏaṇa-maggĕ  $  thiẏa hari-halahara sīhāsaṇaggĕ
text.13277: devahu mi accheu abheu vūhu  $  ṇaṃ thiu milevi pañcamuhu jūhu
text.13279: tāva raṇaṅgaṇa-majjhĕ  $  puṇu puṇu siva phekkāraï
text.13284: kattha vi siva kā vi kaluṇu lavaï  $  "raṇu thovaü jaï aṇṇu vi havaï"
text.13285: kattha vi siva kā vi samalliẏaï  $  ṇaṃ joaï "ko muu ko jiẏaï
text.13286: kattha vi siva suhaḍahŏ ḍīṇa sirĕ  $  vivarokkhaĕ aṇṇuĕ bhutti karĕ
text.13287: kattha vi siva cumvaï muha-kamalu  $  ṇaṃ poḍha-vilāsiṇi ahara-dalu
text.13288: kattha vi siva bhaḍahŏ lei hiẏaü  $  puṇu mellaï "maru aṇṇahĕ hiẏaü"
text.13289: kattha vi raṇĕ bhūahũ kalahaṇaü  $  "siru tujjhu kavandhu mahu ttaṇaü"
text.13290: abbhiḍaï aṇṇu aṇṇeṇa sahũ  $  "ĕu bhaḍu āvaggaü dehi mahu"
text.13291: aṇṇeṃ vuccaï "khaṇḍu vi ṇa taü  $  chuḍu ekku gāsu mahu hou gaü"
text.13298: jaṃ ṇisuṇiu hatthu pahatthu haü  $  ṇala-ṇīla-sarĕhĩ tamvāru gaü
text.13299: taṃ palaẏa-kālu ovatthiẏaü  $  purĕ hāhākāru samutthiẏaü
text.13300: ṇaṃ pakkhiuleṇa vimukka raḍi  $  ṇaṃ ṇivaḍiẏa mahihara-siharĕ taḍi
text.13301: taṃ ṇaü gharu jetthu ṇa ruvaï dhaṇa  $  ubbhiẏa-kara dhāhāviẏa-vaẏaṇa
text.13302: so ṇaü bhaḍu jāsu ṇa aṅgĕ vaṇu  $  so ṇaü pahu jo ṇaü vimaṇa-maṇu
text.13303: so ṇaü rahu jo ṇa vi kappiẏaü  $  so ṇaü haü jo ṇa vi sara-bhariu
text.13304: so ṇa vi gaü jāsu ṇa asi-paharu  $  so ṇa vi hari jo abhagga-ṇaharu
text.13305: jaṇĕ ema kaṇantĕ pariṭṭhiẏaĕ  $  dukkhāurĕ ṇiddā-vasikiẏaĕ
text.13313: āhiṇḍaï raẏaṇihĩ gharĕṇa gharu  $  pekkhahũ ko kehaü cavaï ṇaru
text.13315: jahĩ suraẏārambhu ṇaṭṭa-sarisu  $  jiha taṃ tiha tiṃ (?) vaḍḍhiẏa-harisu
text.13316: jiha taṃ tiha bhū-bhaṅgura-vaẏaṇu  $  jiha taṃ tiha cala-cāliẏa-ṇaẏaṇu
text.13317: jiha taṃ tiha āẏaḍḍhiẏa-ṇaharu  $  jiha taṃ tiha uggāmiẏa-paharu
text.13318: jiha taṃ tiha gala-gambhīra-saru  $  jiha taṃ tiha darisiẏa-aṅgaharu
text.13319: jiha taṃ tiha karaṇa-vandha-paüru  $  jiha taṃ tiha chanda-sadda-gahiru
text.13326: thovantaru jāva paribbhamaï  $  sahũ kantaĕ ko vi vīru cavaï
text.13327: "sundari miga-ṇaẏaṇĕ marāla-gaï  $  taṃ pahu-pasāu kiṃ vīsaraï
text.13328: taṃ pesaṇu taṃ olaggiẏaü  $  taṃ jīviẏa-dāṇu amaggiẏaü
text.13329: taṃ uccāsaṇu maṇi-veẏaḍiu  $  taṃ matta-gaïnda-khandhĕ caḍiu
text.13330: taṃ mehalu taṃ kaṇṭhāharaṇu  $  taṃ celiu taṃ jĕ samālahaṇu
text.13331: taṃ phullu sahattheṃ tamvolu  $  taṃ asaṇu su-parimalu kaccolu
text.13332: taṃ cīru bhāru cāmīẏarahŏ  $  avara vi pasāẏa laṅkesarahŏ
text.13333: eẏahũ jasu ekku ṇa āvaḍaï  $  so sattamĕ ṇaraẏaṇṇavĕ paḍaï
text.13335: tahŏ uvagārahŏ kantĕ  $  ṇikkaü karami mahāhavĕ
text.13340: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi gaü rāvaṇu tettahĕ  $  mandoari-jaṇeru maü jettahĕ
text.13341: jāla-gavakkhaĕ thiu ekkantaĕ  $  ṇisuu cavantu so vi sahũ kantaĕ
text.13342: "dhaṇĕ vihāṇĕ maĩ eu karevaü  $  taṃ vaḍḍu pphara-jūu ramevaü
text.13343: dāruṇu raṇa-kaḍittu maṇḍevaü  $  jīviu visarisu ṭhaülu ṭhavevaü
text.13344: cāuraṅgu valu caü-dhura devī  $  jāṇaï khaḍiẏā-jutti laevī
text.13346: khagga-laṭṭhi karĕ katti karevī  $  jaẏasiri-līha dīha kaḍḍhevī
text.13347: suhaḍa-kavandhu lekkhu piṇḍevaü  $  jīvagāhi riu-gahaṇu laevaü
text.13354: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi rāvaṇu tuṭṭha-maṇu  $  sañcalliu māriccahŏ bhavaṇu
text.13355: pacchaṇṇu pariṭṭhiu pavara-bhuu  $  sahũ kantaĕ so vi cavantu suu
text.13364: jeṇa ṇa ḍhukkaï kantĕ  $  jammĕvi aẏasa-kalaṅkaü"
text.13368: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu adaẏāvaṇu  $  sua-sāraṇahã gharaĩ gaü rāvaṇu
text.13369: ekkeṃ vuttu puraü ṇiẏa-bhajjahĕ  $  "kallaĕ caḍami kantĕ raṇa-sejjahĕ
text.13374: aṇṇekkeṇa vuttu "suṇu sundari  $  guru-ṇiẏamvĕ viẏaḍa-urĕ kisoari
text.13384: thiu jāla-gavakkhaĕ vaïsarĕvi  $  ṇaṃ kesari giri-guha païsarĕvi
text.13386: "ṇiẏa līla kantĕ taü dakkhavami  $  haũ kallaĕ raṇa-vasantu ravami
text.13398: gaü rāvaṇu para-maṇa-uddahaṇu  $  jahĩ jamvumāli païjāruhaṇu
text.13399: teṇa vi galagajjiu gehiṇihĕ  $  sīheṇa va aggĕ sīhiṇihĕ
text.13400: "suṇu kantĕ kallĕ kāĩ karami  $  jiha khaẏa-pāusu tiha uttharami
text.13410: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi gaü laṅkesu tahĩ  $  sa-kalattaü indaï-rāu jahĩ
text.13411: teṇa vi galagajjiu ṇiẏa-bhavaṇĕ  $  ṇāvaï khala-jalahareṇa gaẏaṇĕ
text.13419: tahĩ haũ palaẏa-davaggi  $  kallaĕ vaṇĕ laggesami
text.13424: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi sañcallu tahĩ  $  bhaḍu kumbhaẏaṇṇu ṇiẏa-bhavaṇĕ jahĩ
text.13425: teṇa vi pavuttu "he haṃsagaï  $  kallaĕ raṇa-ṇahaẏalĕ bhāṇuvaï
text.13426: duppekkhu bhaẏaṅkaru duppagaü  $  saĩ hosami joisa-cakku haũ
text.13433: raha gaẏa haẏa ghaṭṭantu  $  haũ puṇu kahi mi ṇa saṇṭhami
text.13434: savvahŏ palaü karantu  $  dhūmakeu jiha uṭṭhami"
text.13439: appaü siṅgārĕvi ṇīsariu  $  lahu ṇiẏa-anteurĕ païsariu
text.13443: sasi-muhĕ miga-ṇaẏaṇĕ haṃsa-gamaṇĕ  $  ṇaṃ bhasalu païṭṭhaü bhisiṇi-vaṇĕ
text.13446: pahu emanteurĕ paribhamiu  $  suvihāṇu bhāṇu tā uggamiu
text.13453: jehĩ jehĩ raẏaṇihĩ galagajjiu  $  jehĩ jehĩ ṇiẏa-kajju vivajjiu
text.13454: jehĩ jehĩ laṅkāhiu icchiu  $  jehĩ jehĩ raṇa-bhāru paḍicchiu
text.13455: tāhã tāhã papphulliẏa-vaẏaṇeṃ  $  pesiẏa ṇiẏa pasāẏa dahavaẏaṇeṃ
text.13456: kāsu vi kuṇḍala-jualu ṇiuttaü  $  kahŏ vi kaḍaü kaṇṭhaü kaḍīsuttaü
text.13457: kahŏ vi maüḍu kāsu vi cūḍāmaṇi  $  kahŏ vi māla kāsu vi indāiṇi
text.13458: kahŏ vi gaïndu turaṅgamu kāsu vi  $  thoḍaü kahŏ vi diṇāra-sahāsu vi
text.13459: kahŏ vi bhāru tula kahŏ vi suvaṇṇahŏ  $  aṇṇahŏ lakkha koḍi puṇu aṇṇahŏ
text.13460: kahŏ vi phullu tamvolu sa-hattheṃ  $  kahŏ vi pasāhaṇu sahũ vara-vattheṃ
text.13462: je paṭṭhaviẏa pasāẏa  $  te ṇaravarĕhĩ pacaṇḍĕhĩ
text.13463: ṇāmĕvi sira-kamalāĩ  $  laïẏa sa iṃ bhu a-daṇḍĕhĩ
text.13470: so ṇīsariu rāmaṇo samaü sāhaṇeṇaṃ  $  raha-gaẏa-turaẏa-joha-pañcamuha-vāhaṇeṇaṃ
text.13485: saṇṇajjhanti joha saṇṇaddhae dasāse  $  khuhiẏa-mahovahi vva su-samuṭṭhie viṇāse
text.13486: saṇṇajjhaï sarahasu jamvumāli  $  ḍiṇḍimu ḍāmaru uḍḍamaru māli
text.13487: saṇṇajjhaï maü mārīci aṇṇu  $  indaï ghaṇavāhaṇu bhāṇukaṇṇu
text.13488: saṇṇajjhaï jaru ahimāṇa-khambhu  $  pañcamuhu ṇiẏamvu saïmbhu sambhu
text.13489: saṇṇajjhaï canduddāmu akku  $  dhūmakkhu jaẏāṇaṇu maẏaru ṇakku
text.13490: paḍivakkhĕ vi saṇṇajjhanti vīra  $  aṅgaṅgaẏa-gavaẏa-gavakkha dhīra
text.13500: bhiḍiẏaĩ ve vi seṇṇaïṃ jāu jujjhu ghoro  $  kuṇḍala-kaḍaẏa-maüḍa-ṇivaḍanta-kaṇaẏa-doro
text.13508: tahĩ tehaĕ raṇĕ raṇa-bhara-samatthu  $  rāhava-kiṅkaru vara-cāva-hatthu
text.13515: veṇṇi vi sīha-sandaṇā ve vi sīha-cindhā  $  veṇṇi vi cāva-karaẏalā ve vi jagĕ pasiddhā
text.13516: veṇṇi vi jasa-luddha viruddha kuddha  $  veṇṇi vi vaṃsujjala kula-visuddha
text.13517: veṇṇi vi suravahu-āṇanda-jaṇaṇa  $  veṇṇi vi sattuttama sattu-haṇaṇa
text.13518: veṇṇi vi raṇa-dhura-dhoriẏa mahanta  $  veṇṇi vi jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ bhattivanta
text.13519: veṇṇi vi dujjaẏa jaẏa-siri-ṇivāsa  $  veṇṇi vi paṇaī-ẏaṇa-pūriẏāsa
text.13520: veṇṇi vi ṇisiẏara-ṇaravara-variṭṭha  $  veṇṇi vi rāhava-rāvaṇahã iṭṭha
text.13521: veṇṇi vi jujjhanti silīmuhehĩ  $  ṇaṃ giri avaropparu sari-muhehĩ
text.13522: māriccahŏ bhaẏa-bhīsāvaṇeṇa  $  dhaṇu chiṇṇu ṇavara santāvaṇeṇa
text.13523: teṇa vi tahŏ cira-pesiẏa-sarehĩ  $  saṃsāru va parama-jiṇesarehĩ
text.13530: ghattĕvi dhaṇuvarāĩ laïo gaẏāsaṇīo  $  ṇāĩ kaẏanta-dāḍhao jaga-viṇāsaṇīo
text.13531: ṇaṃ pisuṇa-maïu dappubbhaḍāu  $  ṇaṃ asaïu para-ṇara-lampaḍāu
text.13532: ṇaṃ kugaïu bhaẏa-bhīsāvaṇāu  $  ṇaṃ dummahilaü kalahaṇā-maṇāu
text.13533: ṇaṃ diṭṭhiu kāla-saṇiccharāhã  $  ṇaṃ kuhiṇiu dūsaṃvaccharāhã
text.13534: ṇaṃ dittiu palaẏa-divāẏarāhã  $  ṇaṃ vīciu khaẏa-raẏaṇāẏarāhã
text.13536: rehanti karĕhĩ raẏaṇujjalāu  $  ṇaṃ meha-ṇiẏamvĕhĩ vijjulāu
text.13537: muccantiu saṅghaṭṭanti kemva  $  gaha-ghaṭṭaṇĕ gaha-pantīu jemva
text.13545: pāḍiĕ rāma-kiṅkarĕ rāvaṇa-kiṅkareṇaṃ  $  sīhaṇiẏamvu kokkio pahiẏa-ṇaravareṇaṃ
text.13546: "maru maru jiha maṇu saïẏahĕ vañchahi  $  tiha rahu vāhi vāhi kiṃ acchahi
text.13548: ema bhaṇevi sarāsaṇi pesiẏa  $  asaï va su-puriseṇa parisesiẏa
text.13549: teṇa vi sarĕhĩ ṇivāriẏa entī  $  ṇaṃ para-tiẏa āliṅgaṇu dentī
text.13550: puṇu āẏāmĕvi mukka mahā-sila  $  ṇaṃ para-ṇarahŏ pāsĕ gaẏa ku-mahila
text.13551: sīhaṇiẏamvahŏ lagga ura-thalĕ  $  ṇivaḍiu mucchā-viẏalu rasāẏalĕ
text.13552: ceẏaṇa lahĕvi paḍīvaü uṭṭhiu  $  ṇahaẏalĕ dhūmakeu ṇaṃ dutthiu
text.13560: pāḍiĕ pahiẏa-ṇaravare daṇu-vimaddaṇeṇaṃ  $  jaru dahavaẏaṇa-kiṅkaro variu ṇandaṇeṇaṃ
text.13567: vijjāhara-karaṇĕhĩ vāvarevi  $  ruhirāruṇu dāruṇu raṇu karevi
text.13568: cala-caḍula-pavāhiẏa-sandaṇeṇa  $  jaru kaha vi kileseṃ ṇandaṇeṇa
text.13575: paḍie jara-ṇarāhive bhīma-paharaṇāhũ  $  raṇu ālaggu ghoru akkosa-sāraṇāhũ
text.13576: te rāmaṇa-rāma-bhicca bhiḍiẏa  $  ṇaṃ matta mahāgaẏa ovaḍiẏa
text.13577: ṇaṃ sīha paropparu jaṇiẏa-kali  $  ṇaṃ bharaha-ṇarāhiva-vāhuvali
text.13578: ṇaṃ āsaggīva-tiviṭṭha ṇara  $  ṇaṃ viḍasuggīva-rāma pavara
text.13579: ṇaṃ inda-paḍinda visuddha-maṇa  $  ṇaṃ te vi paḍīvā ve vi jaṇa
text.13580: akkoseṃ roseṃ mukku saru  $  ṇaṃ jiṇavareṇa bhava-gahaṇa-ḍaru
text.13581: maüḍaggĕ laggu tahŏ sāraṇahŏ  $  ṇaṃ kumbhĕ varaṅkusu vāraṇahŏ
text.13590: jaṃ akkosu pāḍio jaẏa-sirī-ṇivāso  $  rahu durieṇa vāhio suva-ṇarāhivāso
text.13596: tahĩ tehaĕ āhavĕ utthariẏa  $  duppeccha acchi-macchara-bhariẏa
text.13597: rahu rahahŏ devi durieṇa suu  $  savvaṅgiu asi-paharehĩ luu
text.13598: teṇa vi khaggeṃ calaṇehĩ haü  $  ṇaṃ sandhi-visaĕ paẏa-cheu kiu
text.13605: duriẏāhivĕ paloṭṭie ve vi sāṇurāẏa  $  rāvaṇa-rāma-bhicca uddāma-vaggha-rāẏa
text.13606: ve vi viruddha kuddha vaddhāusa  $  veṇṇi vi uttharanti jiha pāusa
text.13608: ku-kalattā iva caḍula-sahāvaĩ  $  kāmiṇi-ṇaha iva cīraṇa-bhāvaĩ
text.13609: dujjaṇa-muha iva vindhaṇa-sīlaĩ  $  visa-hala iva mucchāvaṇa-līlaĩ
text.13610: chāiu ṇaha-ẏalu paharaṇa-jāleṃ  $  ṇaṃ avuhattaṇu moha-tamāleṃ
text.13611: āẏāmĕvi bhuva-phaliha-païggheṃ  $  saru aggeu visajjiu viggheṃ
text.13612: vāruṇu uddāmeṃ āmelliu  $  vāẏavu vigghaẏareṇa paghalliu
text.13613: puṇu uddāmeṃ mukku mahīharu  $  vāṇara-vukkarantu saẏa-kandaru
text.13620: jaṃ dāriẏa mahāhavĕ vāvaranta sigghe  $  haẏa-santāva-pahiẏa-akkosa-duriẏa-vigghe
text.13621: taṃ evaḍḍu dukkhu pekkheppiṇu  $  ravi atthamiu ṇāĩ asaheppiṇu
text.13626: ṇisi-ṇāriĕ khuḍḍĕvi jasa-luddhaĕ  $  ravi-phalu giliu ṇāĩ ṇiẏasaddhaĕ
text.13627: vahala-tamāleṃ jagu andhāriu  $  vihi mi valahã ṇaṃ jujjhu ṇivāriu
text.13628: ve vi valaĩ vaṇa-ṇisuḍhiẏa-gattaĩ  $  ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-āvāsahŏ pariẏattaĩ
text.13635: pabhaṇiu ko vi vīru "kiṃ dummaṇo 'si deva  $  ṇisiẏara-hariṇa-jūhĕ païsarami sīhu jema"
text.13636: ko vi mahāvalu para-valu ṇindaï  $  ko vi bhaṇaï "mahu kallaĕ indaï"
text.13637: ko vi bhaṇaï "mahu toẏadavāhaṇu"  $  ko vi bhaṇaï "sa-sūu mahu sāraṇu"
text.13638: ko vi bhaṇaï "ṇaü paĩ jaẏakārami  $  jāma ṇa kumbhaẏaṇṇu raṇĕ mārami"
text.13639: ko vi bhaṇaï "haũ maẏa-māriccahũ  $  bhiḍami rāhu jiha candāiccahũ"
text.13640: ko vi bhaṇaï "mahu maraï mahoaru  $  chuhami kaẏanta-vaẏaṇĕ vajjoaru"
text.13641: ko vi bhaṇaï "karami taü pesaṇu  $  pesami jamvumāli jama-sāsaṇu"
text.13642: ko vi bhaṇaï "haẏa-gaẏa-raha-vāhaṇu  $  mahu āvaggaü rāvaṇa-sāhaṇu"
text.13643: tāmva vihāṇu bhāṇu ṇahĕ uggaü  $  raẏaṇihĕ taṇaü gabbhu ṇaṃ ṇiggaü
text.13646: sampāiu  $  ṇāĩ sa iṃ bhu va ṇāhivaï
text.13653: abbhiṭṭaĩ ve vi sa-vāhaṇāĩ  $  vāẏaraṇa-paẏāĩ va sāhaṇāĩ
text.13654: jiha tāĩ temva hala-saṅgahāĩ  $  jiha tāĩ tema kiẏa-viggahāĩ
text.13655: jiha tāĩ tema sandhiẏa-sarāĩ  $  jiha tāĩ tema paccaẏa-karāĩ
text.13656: jiha tāĩ tema uvasaggirāĩ  $  jiha tāĩ temva jasa-maggirāĩ
text.13659: jiha tāĩ temva ṇāsāẏarāĩ  $  jiha tāĩ tema vahu-bhāsirāĩ
text.13662: jiha tāĩ tema āẏariẏaĩ  $  vāi-ṇivāẏahũ cariẏaĩ
text.13667: tahĩ tehaĕ raṇĕ raẏaṇīẏarāsu  $  saddūlu valiu vajjoarāsu
text.13669: paü aggaĕ denti ṇa osaranti  $  paharanti ṇa paharaṇu vīsaranti
text.13670: darisanti maḍappharu ṇeẏa puṭṭhi  $  jīviu siḍhilanti ṇa cāva-muṭṭhi
text.13671: mellanti vāṇa ṇa muanti dhīru  $  parihaü rakkhanti ṇa ṇiẏa-sarīru
text.13672: laggaï ṇārāu ṇa kulĕ kalaṅku  $  saru vaṅkaï vaẏaṇu ṇa hoi vaṅku
text.13673: guṇu chijjaï sīsu ṇa duṇṇivāru  $  dhaü paḍaï ṇa hiẏaü ṇa purisaẏāru
text.13674: ovuṇṇa-turaṅgama-dhura-visaṭṭu  $  rahu bhajjaï bhajjaï ṇaü maraṭṭu
text.13677: vihĩ ko garuāraü kijjaï  $  ekku vi jiṇaï ṇa jijjaï
text.13683: haridamaṇeṃ "paharu paharu" bhaṇĕvi  $  sirĕ moggara-ghāeṃ āhaṇĕvi
text.13684: mahi-maṇḍalĕ pāḍiu vāhuvali  $  toseṇa va parivaḍḍhanta-kali
text.13685: puṇu ceẏaṇa lahĕvi bhaẏaṅkarĕṇa  $  āruṭṭheṃ rāhava-kiṅkarĕṇa
text.13686: paḍivāraü āhaü moggarĕṇa  $  vacchatthalĕ ṇaṃ indīvarĕṇa
text.13687: tahĩ tehaĕ kālĕ samāvaḍiẏa  $  bhaḍa vijaẏa-saẏambhu ve vi bhiḍiẏa
text.13688: raṇĕ parisakkanti bhamanti kiha  $  cala cañcala vijjula-puñja jiha
text.13691: jaṭṭhiẏaĕ vijaü viṇibhiṇṇaũ  $  paḍiu ṇāĩ dumu chiṇṇaü
text.13695: raṇĕ vijaü saẏambhu vi ṇihaü jaṃ jĕ  $  khaviẏāri-vīra-saṅkoha taṃ jĕ
text.13696: abbhiṭṭa paropparu pulaïaṅga  $  ṇaṃ khara-ṇārāẏaṇa raṇĕ abhaṅga
text.13697: ṇaṃ rāvaṇinda vipphuriẏa-tuṇḍa  $  ṇaṃ gandhahatthi uddaṇḍa-suṇḍa
text.13698: etthantarĕ suravarahu mi asakku  $  saṅkoheṃ melliu paḍhamu cakku
text.13699: gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ taṃ pajalantu jāi  $  atthaïrihĕ diṇaẏara-vimvu ṇāĩ
text.13700: khaviẏāri-ṇivahŏ vacchaẏalĕ laggu  $  jiha ṇaliṇi-pattu tiha tahĩ ji bhaggu
text.13701: teṇa vi paḍivakkhahŏ cakku mukku  $  saṅkohahŏ ṇaṃ jamakaraṇu ḍhukku
text.13702: siru khuḍiu marāleṃ jema kamalu  $  ṇaṃ indindiru ruṇṭanta-muhalu
text.13704: siru gaẏaü kavandhu jĕ bhaṇḍaï  $  muhu bhaḍa-vokka ṇa chaṇḍaï
text.13705: ṇiẏa-sāmihĕ pesaṇu saraï (?)  $  viuṇaü ṇaṃ bhaḍu paharaï
text.13709: vala-kiṅkaru jaṃ saṅkohu haü  $  dhāviu vitāvi taṃ raṇĕ ajaü
text.13710: "kahĩ gacchahi acchami jāma haũ  $  rahu vāhĕ vāhĕ savaḍammuhaü
text.13711: saṅkohu jema ghāiu chaleṇa  $  tiha paharu paharu ṇiẏa-bhuva-valeṇa"
text.13712: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi kira ovaḍaï  $  vihi-rāu tāmva tahŏ abbhiḍaï
text.13713: te vihi-vitāvi āruṭṭha-maṇā  $  utthariẏa sa-macchara ve vi jaṇā
text.13714: ṇaṃ palaẏa-kālĕ palaẏamvuharā  $  jiha te tiha sara-dhārā-vaẏarā
text.13715: jiha te tiha paricakkaliẏa-dhaṇu  $  jiha te tiha vijjujjaliẏa-taṇu
text.13716: jiha te tiha bhīma-ṇiṇāẏa-karā  $  jiha te tiha sūra-cchāẏa-harā
text.13719: pāḍiu vitāvi ṇārāĕṇa  $  giri jiha vajja-ṇihāĕṇa
text.13723: jaṃ haü vitāvi taṃ ṇa kiu kheu  $  kovaggi-palittu visālateu
text.13724: vihi-rāẏahŏ bhiḍaï ṇa bhiḍaï jāma  $  hakkāriu sambhu-ṇiveṇa tāmva
text.13725: te ve vi paropparu abbhiḍanti  $  ṇaṃ giri sa-parakkama ovaḍanti
text.13726: etthantarĕ sambhũ ṇa kiu kheu  $  urĕ sattiĕ bhiṇṇu visālateu
text.13727: oṇalliu mahiẏalĕ vigaẏa-pāṇu  $  ṇiẏa-sāhaṇu pekkhĕvi loṭṭamāṇu
text.13728: suggīu padhāiu vipphurantu  $  "laï valahŏ valahŏ" samu uttharantu
text.13729: ṇaṃ ṇisiẏara-seṇṇahŏ maïẏavaṭṭu  $  ṇaṃ kesari miga-jūhahŏ visaṭṭu
text.13730: ṇaṃ tihuẏaṇa-cakkahŏ kāla-daṇḍu  $  ṇaṃ jalahara-vindahŏ palaẏa-caṇḍu
text.13737: haṇuvanteṃ vuccaï "māma māma  $  tuhũ acchahi jahĩ somitti-rāma
text.13738: haũ ekku pahuccami ṇisiẏarāhũ  $  jiha garuḍu asesahũ visaharāhũ
text.13739: jiha dhūmakeu jagĕ ṇaravarāhũ  $  palaẏāṇalu jiha jara-taruvarāhũ
text.13740: jiha palaẏa-pahañjaṇu jalaharāhũ  $  sura-kulisa-daṇḍu jiha girivarāhũ
text.13741: valu ṇaṃ vaṇu bhañjami rasamasantu  $  vaṃsujjala-mūla-tarukkhaṇantu
text.13747: para-valĕ païsaraï mahavvalu  $  viñjhĕ jema dāvāṇalu
text.13752: haẏavareṇa ṇavarāhao hao  $  gaẏavareṇa jo āgao gao
text.13753: rahavareṇa khaẏa-sūraho raho  $  dhaẏavaḍeṇa jasa-luddhao dhao
text.13754: ṇaravareṇa vaẏaṇubbhaḍo bhaḍo  $  para-sireṇa para-saṃsiraṃ siraṃ
text.13755: karaẏaleṇa su-bhaẏaṅkaro karo  $  bhaḍa-kameṇa sa-parakkamo kamo
text.13758: jattha tattha atthamiẏa-sūraẏaṃ  $  ṇisi-ṇahaṃ va atthamiẏa-sūraẏaṃ
text.13760: ṇirasi pāṇi ṇīvikkamaṃ thiẏaṃ  $  khīra-jalahi-salilaṃ va manthiẏaṃ
text.13762: jaṃ haṇuvahŏ valu ālaggaü  $  līlaĕ jimva timva bhaggaü
text.13763: savaḍammuhu vajjiẏa-saṅkaü  $  ekku māli para thakkaü
text.13767: thakkanteṃ kokkiu pavaṇa-puttu  $  "kiṃ kāẏarehĩ sahũ bhiḍĕvi juttu
text.13768: valu valu sāmīraṇi dehi jujjhu  $  maĩ muĕvi mallu ko aṇṇu tujjhu
text.13769: tuhũ rāmahŏ haũ rāmaṇahŏ dāsu  $  jiha tuhũ tiha haü mi mahi-ppagāsu
text.13770: chuḍu ekku ma maïlaü ṇiẏaẏa-vaṃsu  $  jasu ruccaï jaẏa-siri hou tāsu"
text.13772: "tuhũ kavaṇu gahaṇu maĩ dujjaeṇa  $  haṇuvanta-kaẏanteṃ kuddhaeṇa
text.13773: kiṃ ṇa suaü khaü vajjāuhāsu  $  ujjāṇa-bhaṅgu kiṅkara-viṇāsu
text.13774: akkhahŏ kaẏantu paṭṭaṇahŏ keu  $  haũ so jjĕ paḍīvaü añjaṇeu
text.13776: rahu vāhi vāhi savaḍammuhu  $  paharu paharu laï āuhu
text.13777: haũ paĩ ghāeṇa ji mārami  $  pahilaü teṇa ṇa paharami"
text.13781: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi māliṃ ṇa kiu kheu  $  sara-jāleṃ chāiu añjaṇeu
text.13782: ṇaṃ suaṇu aṇeĕhĩ dujjaṇehĩ  $  ṇaṃ pāusĕ diṇaẏaru ṇava-ghaṇehĩ
text.13783: haṇuveṇa vi sara aṭṭha-uṇa mukka  $  pasaranta haṇanta diẏanta ḍhukka
text.13784: āẏāsĕ ṇa manti ṇa dharaṇi-vīḍhĕ  $  ṇa dhaẏaggĕ ṇa rahavarĕ haẏa-pagīḍhĕ
text.13785: aggalĕ pacchalĕ a-parippamāṇa  $  jaü jaü jĕ diṭṭhi taü taü ji vāṇa
text.13786: osariu māli ṇivisantareṇa  $  rahu diṇṇu tāmva vajjoareṇa
text.13787: hakkāriu ahimuhu pavaṇa-jāu  $  "kahĩ jāhi pāva khaẏa-kālu āu
text.13788: ettaḍeṇa ji tujjhu maraṭṭu jāu  $  jaṃ bhaggu bhiḍanteṃ māli-rāu
text.13791: abbhiḍahũ ve vi bhaẏa-bhāsura  $  raṇu pekkhantu surāsura"
text.13795: te viṇṇi vi galagajjanta emva  $  mukkaṅkusa matta-gaïnda jemva
text.13799: vihĩ sarĕhĩ sarāsaṇu chiṇṇu tāsu  $  ṇaṃ hiẏaü khuḍiu vajjoẏarāsu
text.13800: kira avaru cāu karĕ caḍaï jāmva  $  saẏa-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍu rahu kiẏaü tāmva
text.13801: jāmaṇṇa-mahārahĕ caḍaï vīru  $  dhaṇuharu vi tāvã kiu haẏa-sarīru
text.13802: taïẏaü kovaṇḍu ṇa lei jāma  $  vīo vi mahārahu chiṇṇu tāma
text.13804: to ṇisiẏaru jujjha-piẏāraü  $  vi-rahu kiẏaü ve-vāraü
text.13805: puṇu pacchalĕ vāṇĕhĩ salliu  $  mahiharu jiha oṇalliu
text.13809: jaṃ haü vajjoaru bhaggu māli  $  taṃ sa-rahasu dhāiu jamvumāli
text.13810: mandoari-ṇandaṇu daṇu-viṇāsu  $  saü sīhahũ rahĕ sañjuttu tāsu
text.13813: āĕhĩ kari-kumbha-viẏāraṇehĩ  $  jasu ujjhaï rahu pañcāṇaṇehĩ
text.13815: ālaggu su-karaẏalĕ karĕvi cāu  $  su-kalattu jeṃva jaṃ su-ppaṇāu
text.13816: taṃ āẏāmĕvi vahu-macchareṇa  $  ṇārāu visajjiu ṇisiẏareṇa
text.13819: vindheppiṇu mahiẏalĕ pāḍiu  $  ṇaha-siri-hāru va toḍiu
text.13823: jaṃ chiṇṇu mahaddhaü duddhareṇa  $  taṃ pavaṇa-sueṇa dhaṇuddhareṇa
text.13824: do dīhara vara-ṇārāẏa mukka  $  riu-rahavara-vīḍhāsaṇṇa ḍhukka
text.13825: ekkeṇa kavaü ekkeṇa cāu  $  viddhaṃsiu ṇāĩ jiṇeṇa pāu
text.13826: saṇṇāhu aṇṇu parihĕvi bhaḍeṇa  $  dhaṇuharu vi levi vihaḍapphaḍeṇa
text.13828: haṇuveṇa vi melliu addhaẏandu  $  aï-dīharu ṇāĩ samāsa-daṇḍu
text.13837: valu saẏalu vi kiu bhaẏa-vihalu jāmva  $  haṇuvantu dasāṇaṇĕ bhiḍiu tāma
text.13838: pañcāṇaṇa-sandaṇu pamaẏa-cindhu  $  thiu uḍḍĕvi raṇa-bhara-dhurahĕ khandhu
text.13839: so jujjhamāṇu jaṃ diṭṭhu teṇa  $  saṇṇāhu laïu laṅkāhiveṇa
text.13840: raṇa-rahasucchaliẏahŏ urĕ ṇa māi  $  suhi-saṅgamĕ garua-saṇehu ṇāĩ
text.13841: puṇu dukkhu dukkhu āiddhu aṅgĕ  $  sīsakku kareppiṇu uttamaṅgĕ
text.13842: āẏāmiu dhaṇuharu laïu vāṇu  $  pāraddhu samaru haṇuveṃ samāṇu
text.13843: tahĩ tehaĕ kālĕ dhaṇuddhareṇa  $  rahu antarĕ diṇṇu mahoareṇa
text.13844: hakkāriu mārui "thāhi thāhi  $  savaḍammuhu rahavaru vāhi vāhi"
text.13846: taṃ suṇĕvi mahoaru jettahĕ  $  rahavaru vāhiu tettahĕ
text.13847: utthariẏa ve vi samaraṅgaṇĕ  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-meha ṇahaṅgaṇĕ
text.13851: haṇuvantĕ mahoaru bhiḍiu jāma  $  so jamvumāli sampattu tāmva
text.13852: sañjottĕvi rahavarĕ saẏala sīha  $  uddaṇḍa caṇḍa laṅgūla-dīha
text.13853: sahũ teṇa parāiu mallavantu  $  dhundhuru dhūmakkhu kaẏantadantu
text.13854: hālāhalu vijjulu vijjujīhu  $  bhiṇṇañjaṇu pahu bhua-phaliha-dīhu
text.13855: jamahaṇṭu jamāṇaṇu kāladaṇḍu  $  vihi ḍiṇḍimu ḍamvaru ḍamaru caṇḍu
text.13856: kusumāuhu akku maẏaṅku sakku  $  khaviẏāri sambhu kari maẏaraṇakku
text.13857: suu sāraṇu maü māricci-rāu  $  vībhacchu mahoaru bhīmakāu
text.13860: jeṃ savvĕhĩ laïu akhattĕṇa  $  haṇuveṃ harisiẏa-gattĕṇa
text.13861: āẏāmiẏa samarĕ pacaṇḍĕhĩ  $  vaïri sa ĩ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ
text.13868: para-valu aṇantu haṇuvantu ekku  $  gaẏa-jūhahŏ ṇāĩ maïndu thakku
text.13869: ārokkaï kokkaï samuhu thāi  $  jahĩ jahĩ jĕ thaṭṭu tahĩ tahĩ jĕ dhāi
text.13870: gaẏa-ghaḍa bhaḍa-thaḍa bhañjantu jāi  $  vaṃsatthalĕ laggu davaggi ṇāĩ
text.13871: ekku  rahu mahāhavĕ rasa-visaṭṭu  $  paribhamaï ṇāĩ valĕ maïẏavaṭṭu
text.13872: so ṇa vi bhaḍu jāsu ṇa maliu māṇu  $  so ṇa vi dhaü jāsu ṇa laggu vāṇu
text.13873: so ṇa vi pahu jāsu ṇa kavaü chiṇṇu  $  so ṇa vi gaü jāsu ṇa kumbhu bhiṇṇu
text.13874: so ṇa vi turaṅgu jasu guḍu ṇa tuṭṭu  $  so ṇa vi rahu jasu ṇa rahaṅgu phuṭṭu
text.13875: so ṇa vi bhaḍu jāsu ṇa chiṇṇu gattu  $  taṃ ṇa vi vimāṇu jaṃ saru ṇa pattu
text.13877: jagaḍantu valu  $  mārui hiṇḍaï jahĩ jĕ jahĩ
text.13882: jaṃ jiṇĕvi ṇa sakkiu vara-bhaḍehĩ  $  veḍhāviu mārui gaẏa-ghaḍehĩ
text.13886: jaṃ veḍhiu raṇa-muhĕ pavaṇa-jāu  $  taṃ dhāiu kaïdhaẏa-bhaḍa-ṇihāu
text.13887: jahĩ jamvaü ṇīlu suseṇu haṃsu  $  gaü gavaü gavakkhu visuddha-vaṃsu
text.13888: santāsu virāhiu sūrajotti  $  pīiṅkaru kiṅkaru lacchibhutti
text.13889: candappahu candamarīci rambhu  $  saddūlu viulu kulapavaṇathambhu
text.13892: ṇaṃ ṇiẏa-guṇĕhĩ  $  jīu va bhava mellāviẏaü
text.13897: ṇāsaï vihaḍapphaḍu galiẏa-khaggu  $  cūrantu paropparu calaṇa-maggu
text.13898: bhajjantaü pekkhĕvi ṇiẏaẏa-seṇṇu  $  rāvaṇu jaẏakārĕvi kumbhaẏaṇṇu
text.13899: dhāiu bhaẏa-bhīsaṇu bhīma-kāu  $  ṇaṃ rāma-valahŏ khaẏa-kālu āu
text.13900: parisakkaï raṇa-bhūmihĕ ṇa māi  $  giri mandaru thāṇahŏ caliu ṇāĩ
text.13901: jaü jaü jĕ sa-maccharu dei diṭṭhi  $  taü taü jĕ paḍaï ṇaṃ palaẏa-viṭṭhi"
text.13902: kŏ vi vāeṃ kŏ vi bhiuḍiĕ paṇaṭṭhu  $  kŏ vi ṭhiu avaṭhambhĕvi dharaṇi-vaṭṭhu
text.13903: kŏ vi kaha vi kaḍacchaĕ ṇiru ṇilukku  $  kŏ vi dūrahŏ jjĕ pāṇĕhĩ vimukku
text.13910: uvveḍhāviu haṇuvantu jehĩ  $  ṇaü sakkiu vaẏaṇu vi ṇiĕvi tehĩ
text.13911: paricintiu "laï āiu viṇāsu  $  kiẏa(?) valu jĕ karesaï ekku gāsu"
text.13912: tahĩ avasarĕ dhāiu amiẏavindu  $  dahimuhu māhindu mahindu indu
text.13913: raïvaddhaṇu ṇandaṇu kumuu kundu  $  maïkantu mahovahi maïsamuddu
text.13914: kolāhalu taralu taraṅgu tāru  $  suggīu aṅgu aṅgaẏakumāru
text.13915: sammeu seu sasimaṇḍalo vi  $  candāhu kandu bhāmaṇḍalo vi
text.13916: pihumaï vasantu velandharo vi  $  velacchu suvelu jaẏandharo vi
text.13917: āẏāmĕvi vaïrihi taṇaü seṇṇu  $  samakaṇḍiu savvĕhĩ kumbhaẏaṇṇu
text.13924: jaṃ khattu muevi kaïddhaehĩ  $  samakaṇḍiu vehāviddhaehĩ
text.13927: sovāviu sāhaṇu saẏalu teṇa  $  ṇaṃ jagu atthanteṃ diṇaẏareṇa
text.13928: ko vi ghummaï ko vi sarīru valaï  $  kāsu vi kivāṇu karaẏalahŏ galaï
text.13929: ghuruhuraï ko vi ṇiddaĕ bhuttu  $  ko vi gabbhantarĕ ṇaru ṇāĩ suttu
text.13931: ummohiu uṭṭhiu valu turantu  $  "kahĩ kumbhaẏaṇṇu valu valu" bhaṇantu
text.13938: para-valu ṇievi raṇĕ uttharantu  $  laṅkāhiveṇa tharatharaharantu
text.13939: karĕ kaḍḍhiu ṇimmalu candahāsu  $  uggamiu ṇāĩ diṇaẏara-sahāsu
text.13940: riu-sāhaṇĕ bhiḍaï ṇa bhiḍaï jāma  $  soṇḍīra vīra ṇara tiṇṇi tāmva
text.13942: "amhĕhĩ jīvantĕhĩ kiṅkarehĩ  $  tuhũ appaṇu paharahi kiṃ karehĩ"
text.13943: sāmiu sammāṇĕvi vaddha-koha  $  tiṇṇi vi samaraṅgaṇĕ bhiḍiẏa joha
text.13945: indaï suggīvahŏ samuhu valiu  $  ṇaṃ meru mahoahi mahahũ caliu
text.13954: "khala khudda pisuṇa kaï-keu rāẏa  $  laṅkāhiva-kerā kuddha pāẏa
text.13955: jiha rāvaṇu mellĕvi dhariu rāmu  $  tiha paharu paharu taü luhami ṇāmu"
text.13957: ṇibbhacchiu indaï "arĕ ku-malla  $  ko tuhũ ko rāvaṇu kavaṇu (?) volla"
text.13958: docchanta paropparu bhiḍiẏa ve vi  $  su-paṇāmaĩ cāvaĩ karĕhĩ levi
text.13959: dīhara-ṇārāĕhĩ uttharanta  $  ṇaṃ palaẏa-jalaẏa ṇava-jalu muanta
text.13961: vihĩ mi jaṇĕhĩ  $  chāiu gaẏaṇu mahāsarĕhĩ
text.13969: taṃ pekkhĕvi tārāvaï palittu  $  dhūmaddhaü ṇaṃ māruĕṇa chittu
text.13970: vāẏava-saru suggīveṇa mukku  $  ṇaṃ palaẏa-kālu para-valahŏ ḍhukku
text.13972: dugghoṭṭa-thaṭṭa loṭṭantu savva  $  moḍantu mahāraha atula-gavva
text.13973: duvvāu āu jaṃ vala-viṇāsu  $  teṇa vi āmelliu ṇāga-vāsu
text.13985: āẏāmĕvi raṇĕ rosiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  aggeu mukku ghaṇavāhaṇeṇa
text.13986: āmelliu āiu dhagadhagantu  $  aṅgāra-varisu ṇahĕ dakkhavantu
text.13987: vāruṇu vimukku bhāmaṇḍaleṇa  $  ṇaṃ girihĕ vajju ākhaṇḍaleṇa
text.13988: ulhāviu jalaṇu jaleṇa jaṃ jĕ  $  saru ṇāga-pāsu pammukku taṃ jĕ
text.13995: jaṃ jiu tārāvaï pavara-bhuu  $  aṇṇu vi bhāmaṇḍalu jaṇaẏa-suu
text.13996: taṃ bhaggu asesu vi rāma-valu  $  ṇaṃ pavaṇa-galitthaü uvahi-jalu
text.13997: ettahĕ vi tāma samāvaḍiẏa  $  maruṇandaṇa-kumbhaẏaṇṇa bhiḍiẏa
text.13999: puṇu vāhāuddheṃ lagga kiha  $  uddaṇḍa-soṇḍa veẏaṇḍa jiha
text.14000: haṇuvantu laïu raẏaṇīẏarĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ meru-mahāgiri jiṇavarĕṇa
text.14001: caraṇehĩ dharĕvi uccāiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ giri-sihareṇa caḍāviẏaü
text.14002: puṇu laṅkā-ṇaẏarihĩ uccaliu  $  tārā-taṇaeṇa tāma khaliu
text.14009: jaṃ kiu vivatthu raṇĕ raẏaṇiẏaru  $  taṃ laggu hasevaĕ sura-ṇiẏaru
text.14011: santhavaï jāmva ṇiẏa-parihaṇaü  $  mārui vimāṇu gaü appaṇaü
text.14012: tahĩ avasarĕ bhaḍa-bhañjaṇa-maṇĕṇa  $  jaẏakāriu rāmu vihīsaṇeṇa
text.14013: "maĩ deva bhiḍantaü pekkhu raṇĕ  $  jiha jalaṇu jalantaü sukka-vaṇĕ
text.14014: jaï maïlami vaẏaṇu ṇa para-valahŏ  $  to païsami dhūmaddhaĕ salahŏ"
text.14015: galagajjĕvi ema ṇisāẏarĕṇa  $  kiu karĕ kovaṇḍu a-kāẏareṇa
text.14016: saṇṇāhu laïu rahavarĕ caḍiu  $  rāvaṇa-ṇandaṇahŏ gampi bhiḍiu
text.14017: hakkāraï paharaï ṇindaï vi  $  paṇavaï ghaṇavāhaṇu indaï vi
text.14018: "tuhũ amhahã vandaṇa-joggu kiha  $  tihĩ sañjhahĩ parama-jiṇindu jiha
text.14020: jo jaṇaṇa-samu  $  tahŏ kiṃ pāveṃ cintiĕṇa
text.14021: kira kavaṇu jasu  $  jujjhantahũ sahũ pittiĕṇa"
text.14025: raṇu pittieṇa sahũ pariharĕvi  $  viṇṇi vi kumāra gaẏa osarĕvi
text.14026: ekkeṃ bhāmaṇḍalu dharĕvi ṇiu  $  aṇṇekkeṃ tārā-pāṇapiu
text.14027: kuḍhĕ laggĕvi ko vi ṇa sakkiẏaü  $  amvarĕ amarĕhĩ kalaẏalu kiẏaü
text.14028: tahĩ avasarĕ āsaṅkiẏa-maṇĕṇa  $  vuccaï valaeu vihīsaṇĕṇa
text.14029: "jaï viṇṇi vi ṇiẏa ṇaravaï pavara  $  to ṇa vi haũ ṇa vi tuhũ ṇa vi iẏara
text.14030: ṇa vi haẏa ṇa vi gaẏa rahavarĕhĩ sahũ  $  jaṃ jāṇahi taṃ cintavahi lahu"
text.14031: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vūḍha-mahāhavĕṇa  $  mahaloẏaṇu cintiu rāhavĕṇa
text.14039: so garuḍu deu jhāiu maṇĕṇa  $  tharahariu ṇavara sahũ āsaṇĕṇa
text.14040: kira avahi paüñjĕvi saṅkiẏaü  $  "laï vujjhiu rāmeṃ cintiẏaü"
text.14041: puṇu cintĕvi deu samuṭṭhiẏaü  $  lahu vijjaü leppiṇu paṭṭhaviu
text.14042: harivāhaṇi satta-saĕhĩ sahiẏa  $  gāruḍa tāhĕ vi ti-saĕhĩ ahiẏa
text.14043: ve chattaĩ sasi-sūra-ppahaĩ  $  raẏaṇāĩ tiṇṇi raṇĕ dūsahaĩ
text.14044: gaẏa vijja patta ṇārāẏaṇahŏ  $  hala-musalaĩ sīra-ppaharaṇahŏ
text.14046: tahĕ gāruḍa-vijjahĕ daṃsaṇĕṇa  $  gaẏa ṇāga-pāsa ṇāsĕvi khaṇĕṇa
text.14049: jokkāriẏaü  $  lāĕvi sirĕ sa ĩ bhu va-juvalu
text.14056: gaẏavara-turaẏa-joha-raha-sīha-vimāṇa-pavāhaṇāiṃ  $  raṇa-tūraĩ haẏāĩ kiu kalaẏalu bhiḍiẏaĩ sāhaṇāiṃ
text.14071: khura-khara-chajjamāṇu ṇaṃ ṇāsaï bhaïẏaĕ haẏavarāhuṃ  $  ṇaṃ āiu ṇivārao ṇaṃ hakkāraü suravarāhuṃ
text.14072: ṇaṃ pāẏa-pahārahŏ osarĕvi  $  dhāiu ṇiẏa-parihaü sambharĕvi
text.14073: ṇaṃ dujjaṇu sīsa-valaggu kiu  $  ṇaṃ uttamu savvahũ uari thiu
text.14074: so ṇa vi rahu jetthu ṇa païsariu  $  so ṇa vi gaü jo ṇa vi dhūsariu
text.14075: so ṇa vi haü jo ṇa vi maïliẏaü  $  so ṇa vi dhaü jo ṇa vi kavaliẏaü
text.14076: jaü ramaï diṭṭhi taü raẏa-ṇiẏaru  $  ṇaü ṇāvaï maṇusu ṇa raẏaṇiẏaru
text.14077: tettahĕ vi ke vi dhāvanti bhaḍa  $  jettahĕ galagajjaï hatthi-haḍa
text.14079: jettahĕ dhaṇuhara guṇa-gahiẏa-sara  $  jettahĕ huṅkāra muanti ṇara
text.14081: tehaĕ samarĕ  $  sūrāha mi bhajjanti maï
text.14090: taṃ ṇaï tarevi kĕ vi vāvaranti  $  vuḍḍanti ke vi kĕ vi uvvaranti
text.14091: ke vi raẏa-dhūsara kĕ vi ruhira-litta  $  kĕ vi hatthi-haḍaĕ vihuṇevi ghitta
text.14092: kĕ vi lagga paḍīvā danta-musalĕ  $  ṇaṃ dhutta vilāsiṇi-sihiṇa-jualĕ
text.14093: kĕ vi ṇiẏaẏa-vimāṇahŏ jhampa denti  $  ṇahĕ ṇivaḍĕvi vaïrihĩ siraĩ lenti
text.14094: tahĩ tehaĕ raṇĕ soṇiẏa-jaleṇa  $  raü ṇāsiu sajjaṇu jiha khaleṇa
text.14101: ṇisiẏara-pavara-pahara-paḍipelliĕ valĕ mambhīsa devi  $  hattha-pahattha-sattu seṇāvaï thiẏa ṇala-ṇīla ve vi
text.14112: ṇa taṃ sattu-cindhaṃ  $  raṇe jaṇṇa viddhaṃ
text.14113: ṇa so matta-hatthī  $  vaṇo jassa ṇatthī
text.14114: ṇa taṃ hatthi-gattaṃ  $  khaẏaṃ jaṇṇa pattaṃ
text.14116: so ṇatthi bhaḍu  $  jo ḍhukkaï savaḍammuhaü
text.14117: so rahu jĕ ṇa vi  $  jo raṇĕ ṇa kiu parammuhaü
text.14121: valĕ mambhīsa devi rahu vāhiu tāva dasāṇaṇeṇaṃ  $
text.14123: aggi va taruvarāhã sīho va kuñjarāhã  $
text.14125: tāmva vihīsaṇeṇa rahu diṇṇu antarāle  $  galagajjanta ḍhukka meha vva varisaẏāle
text.14126: bhīsaṇa visahara vva saddūla-vaggha-caṇḍā  $  orālanta matta hathi vva gilla-gaṇḍā
text.14127: vara-ṇaṅgūla-dīha sīha va ṇivaddha-rosā  $  acala mahīhara vva jalahi vva garua-ghosā
text.14128: veṇṇi vi pavara-sandaṇā ve vi cāva-hatthā  $  veṇṇi vi rakkhasa-ddhaẏā samara-bhara-samatthā
text.14129: veṇṇi vi mahihara vva ṇa kaẏāvi cala-sahāvā  $  veṇṇi vi suddha-vaṃsa veṇṇi vi mahāṇubhāvā
text.14130: veṇṇi vi dhīra vīra vijju vva veẏa-cavalā  $  veṇṇi vi vāla-kamala-somāla-calaṇa-juvalā
text.14131: veṇṇi vi viẏaḍa-vaccha thira-thora-vāhu-daṇḍā  $  veṇṇi vi catta-jīviẏāsāhave pacaṇḍā
text.14133: tahĩ ekku para  $  ettiu dosu dasāṇaṇahŏ
text.14134: jaṃ jaṇaẏa-sua  $  khaṇu vi ṇa phiṭṭaï ṇiẏa-maṇahŏ
text.14138: amarisa-kuddhaeṇa amara-varaṅgaṇa-jūrāvaṇeṇaṃ  $  ṇibbhacchiu viḥīsaṇo paḍhama-bhiḍanteṃ rāvaṇeṇaṃ
text.14139: "arĕ khala duvviẏaḍḍha kula-phaṃsaṇa  $  maĩ laṅkāhiu muĕvi vihīsaṇa
text.14140: caṅgaü sāmisālu olaggiu  $  mahi-goaru varāu ekkaṅgiu
text.14141: uddhuva-puccha-daṇḍu ṇaha-dīharu  $  kesari muĕvi pasaṃsiu migavaru
text.14142: savvaṅgiu cāmiẏara-pasāhaṇu  $  meru muevi pasaṃsiu pāhaṇu
text.14143: teẏa-rāsi ṇahasiri-āliṅgaṇu  $  bhāṇu muevi dhariu joiṅgaṇu
text.14145: ṇaraü dharĕvi siva-sāsaü vañciu  $  jiṇu pariharĕvi ku-devaü añciu
text.14146: jāsu ṇa keṇa vi ṇāvaï ṇāuṃ  $  so paĩ gahiu vihīsaṇa rāuṃ
text.14148: vaïrihĩ milĕvi  $  jiha uggāmiu khambhu mahu
text.14149: tiha āhaẏaṇĕ  $  parisara sāiu dehi lahu"
text.14153: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi soṇḍīra-vīra(?)-santāvaṇeṇaṃ  $  ṇibbhacchiu dasāṇaṇo kuiẏa-maṇeṇa vihīsaṇeṇaṃ
text.14154: "saccaü jĕ āsi tuhũ deva-deva  $  evahĩ lahuāraü ku-muṇi jeva
text.14155: saccaü ji āsi tuhũ vara-maïndu  $  evahĩ vuṇṇāṇaṇu hariṇa-vindu
text.14156: saccaü jĕ āsi tuhũ meru caṇḍu  $  evahĩ ṇigguṇu pāhāṇa-khaṇḍu
text.14157: saccaü ji āsi ravi teẏavantu  $  evahĩ joiṅgaṇu jigijigantu
text.14158: saccaü ji āsi jalaṇihi pahāṇu  $  evahĩ vaṭṭahi goppaẏa-samāṇu
text.14159: saccaü ji āsi saru sāravindu  $  evahĩ puṇu toẏa-tusāra-vindu
text.14160: saccaü ji āsi tuhũ gandha-hatthi  $  evahĩ taü sarisaü kharu vi ṇatthi
text.14161: giri-samu khaṇḍiu cārittu jeṇa  $  kiṃ kīraï jīvanteṇa teṇa
text.14163: saccaü jĕ maĩ  $  taïu khambhu uppāḍiẏaü
text.14164: laï evahĩ mi  $  kettahĕ jāhi a-pāḍiẏaü
text.14168: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu dahavaẏaṇeṃ amarisa-kuddhaeṇaṃ  $  melliu addhaẏandu samaraṅgaṇĕ jaẏa-jasa-luddhaeṇaṃ
text.14169: muṇivarindo vva saru mokkha-paẏa-kaṅkhao  $  taru visosu vva aï-tikkha-paẏa-sañjuo
text.14170: kavva-vandho vva vahu-vaṇṇa-vaṇṇabbhuo  $  kulavahū-citta-maggo vva suṭṭhujjuo
text.14171: muccamāṇeṇa kaha kaha vi ṇaü bhiṇṇao  $  teṇa tassa vi dhao ṇavara ucchiṇṇao
text.14172: rāvaṇeṇa vi dhaṇu samarĕ dohāiẏaṃ  $  tāmva taṃ danda-jujjhaṃ samohāiẏaṃ
text.14185: keṇa vi ko vi docchio "maru savaḍammuhu thāhi thāhi"  $  keṇa vi ko vi vuttu samaraṅgaṇĕ "rahavaru vāhi vāhi"
text.14186: keṇa vi ko vi mahā-sara-jāleṃ  $  chāiu jiha su-kālu dukkāleṃ
text.14187: keṇa vi ko vi bhiṇṇu vaccha-tthalĕ  $  paḍiu ghulevi ko vi mahi-maṇḍalĕ
text.14188: keṇa vi kahŏ vi sarāsaṇu tāḍiu  $  ṇaṃ heṭṭhā-muhu hiẏavaü pāḍiu
text.14189: keṇa vi kahŏ vi kavaü ṇīvaṭṭiu  $  vali jiha dasa-disehĩ āvaṭṭiu
text.14190: keṇa vi kahŏ vi mahaddhaü pāḍiu  $  ṇaṃ maü māṇu maḍappharu sāḍiu
text.14191: keṇa vi danti-dantu uppāḍiu  $  ṇāvaï jasu appaṇaü bhamāḍiu
text.14192: keṇa vi jhampa diṇṇa riu-rahavarĕ  $  garuḍeṃ jiha bhuaṅga-bhuvaṇantarĕ
text.14193: keṇa vi kahŏ vi sīsu acchoḍiu  $  ṇaṃ avarāha-rukkha-phalu toḍiu
text.14195: keṇa vi samarĕ  $  diṇṇu vivakkhahŏ hiẏaü thiru
text.14196: jīviu jamahŏ  $  paharahŏ uru sāmiẏahŏ siru
text.14200: keṇa vi kahŏ vi mukka paṇṇattī ṇaravara-pujjaṇijjā  $  keṇa vi gulagulanti māẏaṅgī keṇa vi sīha-vijjā
text.14201: keṇa vi melliu aggeu vāṇu  $  keṇa vi vāruṇu galagajjamāṇu
text.14202: keṇa vi vāẏaü jhaḍajhaḍajhaḍantu  $  keṇa vi kula-pavvaü dhuddhuvantu
text.14203: keṇa vi bhaẏa-bhīsaṇu kulisa-daṇḍu  $  kiu mahiharatthu saẏa-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍu
text.14204: keṇa vi āsīvisu ṇāga-vāsu  $  keṇa vi gāruḍu paṇṇaẏa-viṇāsu
text.14205: tahĩ tehaĕ raṇĕ kamalekkhaṇāsu  $  indaïṇā 'melliu lakkhaṇāsu
text.14215: virahu karevi dhariu dahamuha-ṇandaṇu ṇārāẏaṇeṇa  $  toẏadavāhaṇo vi valaeveṃ vipphuriẏāṇaṇeṇa
text.14216: ettahĕ vi haṇuu vahu-macchareṇa  $  kira āẏāmijjaï ṇisiẏareṇa
text.14217: tāṇantarĕ rāmeṃ sarahĩ chiṇṇu  $  jiu kaha vi kileseṃ kumbhaẏaṇṇu
text.14218: pekkhantahŏ tahŏ rāvaṇa-valāsu  $  vandhĕvi appiu bhāmaṇḍalāsu
text.14219: avaro vi ko vi jo bhiḍiu jāsu  $  paramappaü vva so siddhu tāsu
text.14220: ettahĕ vi tāva bhaẏa-bhīsaṇeṇa  $  rāvaṇa-dhaṇu chiṇṇu vihīsaṇeṇa
text.14221: pariẏaliĕ cāvĕ siẏa-māṇaṇeṇa  $  āmelliu sūlu dasāṇaṇeṇa
text.14222: saravarĕhĩ taṃ pi akkhittu kema  $  vali bhukkhiehĩ bhūehĩ jema
text.14223: rosiu dahagīu vi laïẏa satti  $  ṇāvaï darisāvaï ṇiẏaẏa satti
text.14234: sā satti sattu-santāsaṇahŏ  $  kira muaï ṇa muaï vihīsaṇahŏ
text.14235: tāvahĩ khara-dūsaṇa-maddaṇĕṇa  $  rahu antarĕ diṇṇu jaṇaddaṇeṇa
text.14236: "arĕ khala jīvantu ṇa jāhi mahu  $  jaï satti satti to melli lahu"
text.14238: vindhantahũ ṇala-ṇīlaṅgaẏahũ  $  avarahu mi asesahũ kaïdhaẏahũ
text.14240: to lakkhaṇahŏ  $  paḍiẏa ura-tthalĕ satti kiha
text.14245: taṃ pāḍiu kumāru mahimaṇḍalĕ taṃ ṇīsariẏa-ṇāmu  $  jiha kuñjarĕ maïndu tiha samare sarahasu bhiḍiu rāmu
text.14250: to etthantarĕ gaẏa-saẏa-thāmeṃ  $  kiu riu virahu cha-vāraü rāmeṃ
text.14251: pahilaü rahavaru rāsaha-vāhaṇu  $  vīẏaü sarahasu saraha-pavāhaṇu
text.14256: dupputta jiha  $  cha vi rahavara ṇipphala gaẏa (?)
text.14260: raha chaha chaha dhaṇūṇi cha chattaĩ vi chiṇṇaĩ halahareṇa  $  to vi ṇa diṇṇa puṭṭhi vijjāhara-pura-paramesareṇa
text.14261: veṇṇi vi avaropparu sāmarisa  $  veṇṇi vi paürusĕ sāhasĕ sarisa
text.14262: veṇṇi vi sura-samara-saehĩ thira  $  veṇṇi vi jiṇa-ṇāmeṃ ṇamiẏa-sira
text.14263: veṇṇi vi pahu kaï-ṇisiẏara-dhaẏahũ  $  jiha disa-gaẏa sesa-mahaggaẏahũ
text.14264: jiṇaï ṇa jijjaï ekko vi jaṇu  $  gaü tāma divāẏaru atthavaṇu
text.14266: ṇa vi tuhũ mahu ṇa vi haũ tujjhu ari  $  laï ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-ṇilaẏahũ jāhũ vari"
text.14267: teṃ vaẏaṇeṃ raṇu uvasaṅgharĕvi  $  gaü laṅkāhiu kalaẏalu karĕvi
text.14268: sīrāuho vi pariẏattu tahĩ  $  sattiĕ ṇibbhiṇṇu kumāru jahĩ
text.14271: ṇivaḍiu mahihĩ  $  siru pahaṇantu sa iṃ bhu ĕhĩ
text.14273: lakkhaṇĕ sattiĕ viṇibhiṇṇaĕ  $  laṅka païṭṭhaĕ dahavaẏaṇĕ
text.14274: ṇiẏa-seṇṇahŏ muhaĩ ṇiẏantaü  $  ruaï sa-dukkhaü rāmu raṇĕ
text.14278: bhiṇṇu kumāru dasāṇaṇa-sattiĕ  $  para-ganthu va gamaẏattaṇa-sattiĕ
text.14279: kukaï va sukaï-kavva-sampattiĕ  $  kupurisa-kaṇṇo iva para-tattiĕ
text.14280: suaṇo iva khala-vaẏaṇa-paüttiĕ  $  para-samaü vva jiṇāgama-juttiĕ
text.14281: jiṇa-maggo iva kevala-bhuttiĕ  $  visaẏāsattu muṇi vva ti-guttiĕ
text.14282: saddo iva savvāĕ vihattiĕ  $  chando iva maṇahara-gāẏattiĕ
text.14283: selu va vajjāsaṇiĕ paḍantiĕ  $  viñjho iva revāĕ vahantiĕ
text.14284: meho iva vijjulaĕ lavantiĕ  $  jalaṇihi vva gaṅgāĕ milantiĕ
text.14285: tāma samara-daṃsaṇu alahantiĕ  $  ṇāĩ divasu osāriu rattiĕ
text.14287: dahamuha-siraccheu ṇa diṭṭhaü  $  rahuvaï-ṇandaṇĕ vijaü ṇa vi
text.14292: diṇaẏarĕ ṇaha-kusumĕ vva galīṇaĕ  $  diṇĕ ṇisi-vaïriĕ vva volīṇaĕ
text.14293: sañjhā rakkhasi (?) vva allīṇaĕ  $  tamĕ masi-sañcae vva vikkhiṇṇaĕ
text.14294: kañcuva(?) saẏaṇĕ va soāuṇṇaĕ  $  cakka-juvalĕ mihuṇĕ vva paruṇṇaĕ
text.14296: ṇisiẏara-jaṇavaĕ dihi-sampaṇṇaĕ  $  gharĕ gharĕ puṇu sohalaĕ ravaṇṇaĕ
text.14297: lakkhaṇĕ sattiĕ haĕ paḍivaṇṇaĕ  $  thiĕ ṇicceẏaṇĕ dharaṇi-pavaṇṇaĕ
text.14299: kaïdhaẏa-sāhaṇĕ cintāvaṇṇaĕ  $  hariṇa-ule vva suṭṭhu ādaṇṇaĕ
text.14306: "hā lakkhaṇa kumāra ekkoara  $  hā bhaddiẏa uvinda dāmoara
text.14307: hā māhava mahumaha mahusūaṇa  $  hā hari kaṇha viṇhu ṇārāẏaṇa
text.14308: hā kesava aṇanta lacchīhara  $  hā govinda jaṇaddaṇa mahihara
text.14311: hā hā ruddabhutti-viṇivāraṇa  $  hā hā vālikhilla-sāhāraṇa
text.14319: kahĩ tuhũ kahĩ haũ kahĩ piẏaẏama  $  kahĩ jaṇeri kahĩ jaṇaṇu gaü
text.14320: haẏa-vihi vicchou kareppiṇu  $  kavaṇa maṇoraha puṇṇa taü"
text.14324: hari-guṇa sambharantu viddāṇaü  $  ruvaï sa-dukkhaü rāhava-rāṇaü
text.14325: "vari pahariu para-ṇaravara-cakkaĕ  $  vari khaẏa-kālu ḍhukku atthakkaĕ
text.14326: vari taṃ kālakūḍu visu bhakkhiu  $  vari jama-sāsaṇu ṇaẏaṇakaḍakkhiu
text.14327: vari asi-pañjarĕ thiu thovantaru  $  vari seviu kaẏanta-dantantaru
text.14328: jhampa diṇṇa vari jalaṇĕ jalantaĕ  $  vari vagalāmuhĕ bhamiu bhamantaĕ
text.14329: vari vajjāsaṇi sirĕṇa paḍicchiẏa  $  vari ḍhukkanti bhavitti samicchiẏa
text.14331: vari visahiu kesari-ṇaha-pañjaru  $  vari joiu kali-kālu saṇiccharu
text.14334: vari ṇaraẏa-dukkhu āẏāmiu  $  ṇaü viou bhāihĕ taṇaü"
text.14339: mukka dhāha bhāmaṇḍala-rāeṃ  $  mukka dhāha pavaṇañjaẏa-jāeṃ
text.14340: mukka dhāha candoẏara-putteṃ  $  aṇṇu vihīsaṇeṇa dukkhatteṃ
text.14341: mukka dhāha aṅgaṅgaẏa-vīrĕhĩ  $  tāra-suseṇahĩ raṇaühĕ dhīrĕhĩ
text.14347: raṇĕ rāmeṃ kaluṇu ruantaĕṇa  $  sandīviu santāva-havi
text.14348: so ṇatthi kaïddhaẏa-sāhaṇĕ  $  jeṇa ṇa mukkī dhāha ṇavi
text.14353: dāṇĕ mahāhaẏaṇĕhĩ paricheihĕ  $  keṇa vi kahiu tāmva vaïdehihĕ
text.14355: "sīĕ sīĕ laï acchaï kāiṃ  $  sīĕ sīĕ laï āharaṇāiṃ
text.14356: sīĕ sīĕ añjahi ṇaẏaṇāiṃ  $  sīĕ sīĕ caü piẏa-vaẏaṇāiṃ
text.14357: sīĕ sīĕ karĕ vaddhāvāṇaü  $  valu loṭṭāviu suggīvāṇaü
text.14358: laï dappaṇu jovahi appāṇaü  $  muhu paricumvahi dahavaẏaṇāṇaü
text.14360: rāvaṇa-sattiĕ viṇibhiṇṇaü  $  dukkaru jiaï kumāru raṇĕ
text.14361: parihava-ahimāṇa-vihūṇaü  $  laï rāmu vi muaü jjĕ gaṇĕ"
text.14365: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vaïdehi pamucchiẏa  $  hariẏandaṇĕṇa sitta ummucchiẏa
text.14366: ceẏaṇa lahĕvi ruvanti samuṭṭhiẏa  $  "hā khala khudda pisuṇa vihi dutthiẏa
text.14367: lakkhaṇu maraï dasāṇaṇu chuṭṭaï  $  hiẏaü kema taü uddhu ṇa phuṭṭaï
text.14368: chiṇṇa-sīsa hā daïva duhāvaha  $  kavaṇa tujjha kira puṇṇa maṇoraha
text.14369: hā kaẏanta taü kavaṇa suhacchī  $  jaṃ raṇḍattaṇu pāviẏa lacchī
text.14370: hā lakkhaṇa pesaṇahŏ ṇiuttī  $  kahŏ chaḍḍiẏa jaẏa-siri kula-utti
text.14371: hā lakkhaṇa paĩ viṇu mahi suṇṇī  $  dhāha muevi sarāsaï ruṇṇī
text.14372: hā lakkhaṇa kallaĕ pavarāhavu  $  kahŏ ekkallaü melliu rāhaü
text.14375: maĩ jehī dukkhahã bhāẏaṇa  $  tihuaṇĕ kā vi ma hojja tiẏa"
text.14379: tahĩ avasarĕ sura-miga-santāvaṇu  $  ṇiẏa-sāmanta gavesaï rāvaṇu
text.14380: ko muu ko jīvaï ko paḍiẏaü  $  ko saṅgāmĕ kāsu abbhiḍiẏaü
text.14384: ajja vi kumbhaẏaṇṇu ṇaü āvaï  $  toẏadavāhaṇu so vi cirāvaï
text.14385: vatta ṇa suvvaï indaï-rāẏahŏ  $  sīhaṇiẏamvahŏ ṇaü mahakāẏahŏ
text.14386: jamvumāli jamaghaṇṭu ṇa dīsaï  $  ekku vi ṇāhĩ seṇṇĕ kiṃ sīsaï
text.14388: laï jehĩ jehĩ vaggantaü  $  te te viṇivāiẏa samarĕ
text.14389: thiu evahĩ sūḍiẏa-vakkhaü  $  jaṃ jāṇahi taṃ deva karĕ"
text.14393: taṃ ṇisuṇevi dasāṇaṇu halliu  $  ṇaṃ vaccha-tthalĕ sūleṃ salliu
text.14394: thiu heṭṭhāmuhu rāvaṇa-rāṇaü  $  hima-haü saẏavattu va viddāṇaü
text.14396: "hā hā kumbhaẏaṇṇa ekkoara  $  hā hā maẏa māricca mahoẏara
text.14397: hā indaï hā toẏadavāhaṇa  $  hā jamaghaṇṭa aṇiṭṭhiẏa-sāhaṇa
text.14398: hā kesariṇiẏamva daṇu-dāraṇa  $  jamvumāli hā sua hā sāraṇa"
text.14399: dukkhu dukkhu puṇu maṇḍa ṇivāriu  $  soẏa-samuddahŏ appaü tāriu
text.14400: "tikkha-ṇahahŏ laṅgūla-paīhahŏ  $  kira kettiẏa sahāẏa vaṇĕ sīhahŏ
text.14402: acchaü acchaü jo acchaï  $  to vi ṇa appami jaṇaẏa-sua
text.14403: kiha vuccami haũ ekkallaü  $  jāsu sahejjā vīsa bhua
text.14407: jo tahĩ sāru kaïddhaẏa-sāhaṇĕ  $  so maĩ sattiĕ bhiṇṇu raṇaṅgaṇĕ
text.14408: evahĩ ekku vahevaü rāhaü  $  kallaĕ tahŏ vi mahu vi pavarāhaü
text.14409: kallaĕ tahŏ vi mahu vi jāṇijjaï  $  ekkamekka-ṇārāẏahĩ bhijjaï
text.14410: kallaĕ tahŏ vi mahu vi ekkantaru  $  jimva tahŏ jimva mahu bhaggu maḍappharu
text.14411: kallaĕ vaddhāvaṇaü tahekkahĕ  $  jimva ujjhā-ṇaẏarihĕ jimva laṅkahĕ
text.14412: kallaĕ jimva mandoari rovaï  $  jimva jāṇaï appāṇaü sovaï
text.14413: kallaĕ ṇaccaü gahiẏa-pasāhaṇu  $  jimva mahu jimva tahŏ keraü sāhaṇu
text.14414: kallaĕ huavaha-dhagadhagamāṇahŏ  $  jimva so jimva haũ ḍhukku masāṇahŏ
text.14416: jima maĩ jimva teṇa ṇihāliu  $  khara-dūsaṇa-samvukka-pahu
text.14417: jima maĩ jimva teṇāliṅgiẏa  $  kallaĕ raṇĕ jaẏalacchi-vahu"
text.14421: to etthantarĕ rāhava-vīreṃ  $  dhīriu appaü carama-sarīreṃ
text.14424: dhīriu ṇalu ṇīlu vi bhāmaṇḍalu  $  diḍharahu kumuu kandu sasimaṇḍalu
text.14425: dhīriu raẏaṇakesi raïvaddhaṇu  $  aṅgaü aṅgu taraṅgu vihīsaṇu
text.14426: dhīriu candarāsi bhāmaṇḍalu  $  haṃsu vasantu seu velandharu
text.14427: dhīriu dahimuhu kaluṇa-rasāhiu  $  gavaü gavakkhu suseṇu virāhiu
