text.14428: dhīriu taralu tāru tārāmuhu  $  kundu mahindu indu indāuhu
text.14430: aṇṇu vi jo koi ruvantaü  $  so sāhārĕvi sakkiẏaü
text.14431: para ekku dasāsahŏ uppari  $  rosu ṇa dhīrĕvi sakkiẏaü
text.14436: kiẏa païjja raṇĕ rāhavacandeṃ  $  "riu rakkhijjaï jaï vi surindeṃ
text.14437: jaï vi jaṇaddaṇeṇa mahi-māṇeṃ  $  jaï vi tiloẏaṇeṇa vamhāṇeṃ
text.14438: jaï vi jameṇa kiẏanteṃ dhaṇaeṃ  $  khandeṃ jaï vi tiẏakkhahŏ taṇaeṃ
text.14439: jaï vi pahañjaṇeṇa jaï varuṇeṃ  $  jaï vi miẏaṅkeṃ akkeṃ aruṇeṃ
text.14440: païsaï jaï vi saraṇu kali-kālahŏ  $  lhikkaï ṇahĕ jalĕ thalĕ pāẏālahŏ
text.14441: païsaï jaï vi vivarĕ giri-kandarĕ  $  sappa-kiẏantamitta-dantantarĕ
text.14442: pesami sattu to i saĩ hattheṃ  $  tahŏ māẏāsuggīvahŏ pantheṃ
text.14444: kallaĕ kumārĕ atthantaĕ  $  ṇivisu vi rāvaṇu jiaï jaï
text.14445: to appaü ḍahami valantaĕ  $  huvavahĕ kikkindhāhivaï"
text.14449: païjārūḍhĕ rāmĕ kula-dīveṃ  $  viraïu valaẏa-vūhu suggīveṃ
text.14450: māẏā-valu vi viuvviu takkhaṇĕ  $  thiu parirakkha kareviṇu lakkhaṇĕ
text.14454: saṭṭhi sahāsa matta-māẏaṅgahũ  $  gaẏavarĕ gaẏavarĕ pavara-rahaṅgahũ
text.14455: rahavarĕ rahavarĕ tuṅga-turaṅgahũ  $  turaĕ turaĕ ṇaravarahũ abhaṅgahũ
text.14456: viraïu ema vūhu ṇicchiddaü  $  ṇaṃ su-kaïnda-kavvu ghaṇa-saddaü
text.14459: ṇaṃ hiẏavaü sīẏahĕ keraü  $  acalu abheu dasāṇaṇahŏ
text.14463: puvva-disāĕ vijaü jasa-luddhaü  $  pahilaĕ vārĕ sa-rahu sa-rahaddhaü
text.14464: vīẏaĕ mārui taïẏaĕ dummuhu  $  kundu caütthaĕ pañcamĕ dahimuhu
text.14465: chaṭṭhaĕ mandahatthu sattamĕ gaü  $  uttara-vārĕ pahillaĕ aṅgaü
text.14466: vīẏaĕ aṅgadu taïaĕ ṇandaṇu  $  caütthĕ (?) kumuu pañcamĕ raïvaddhaṇu
text.14467: chaṭṭhaĕ candaseṇu phuriẏāṇaṇu  $  sattamĕ candarāsi daṇu-dāraṇu
text.14468: pacchima-vārĕ pahillaĕ sasimuhu  $  vīẏaĕ suhaḍu pariṭṭhiu diḍharahu
text.14469: taïaĕ gavaü gavakkhu caütthaĕ  $  pañcamĕ tāru virāhiu chaṭṭhaĕ
text.14471: jo savvahũ vuddhiĕ vaḍḍaü  $  jāsu bhaẏaṅkaru ricchu dhaĕ
text.14472: so jamvaü taruvara-paharaṇu  $  vārĕ pariṭṭhiu sattamaĕ
text.14476: dāhiṇa-disaĕ pariṭṭhiu duddharu  $  vārĕ pahillaĕ ṇīlu dhaṇuddharu
text.14477: vīẏaĕ ṇalu vara-laüḍi-bhaẏaṅkaru  $  kulisa-vihatthaü ṇāĩ purandaru
text.14478: taïaĕ vārĕ vihīsaṇu thakkaü  $  sūla-pāṇi parivajjiẏa-saṅkaü
text.14479: caüthaĕ vārĕ kumuu jamu jehaü  $  toṇā-jualāvīliẏa-dehaü
text.14480: pañcamĕ vārĕ suseṇu samatthaü  $  vipphuriẏāharu konta-vihatthaü
text.14482: sattamĕ bhāmaṇḍalu asi lintaü  $  ṇāvaï palaẏa-davaggi palittaü
text.14483: ema kiẏaĩ raṇĕ duppaïsāraĩ  $  vūhahŏ aṭṭhāvīsa i vāraĩ
text.14485: tahĩ tehaĕ kālĕ paḍīvaü  $  ruvaï sa-dukkhaü dāsarahi
text.14486: pavarehĩ sa iṃ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ  $  puṇu puṇu apphālantu mahi
text.14488: bhāi-vioeṃ kaluṇa-saru  $  raṇĕ rāhavu rovaï jāvĕhĩ
text.14489: ṇaṃ ūsāsu jaṇaddaṇahŏ  $  paḍicandu parāiu tāvĕhĩ
text.14497: gaü tettahĕ jettahĕ jaṇaẏa-suu  $  thiu vūha-vārĕ karavāla-bhuu
text.14499: vijjā-paramesara bhaṇami paĩ  $  tihũ māsahũ avasaru laddhu maĩ
text.14500: jaï darisāvahi rahu-ṇandaṇahŏ  $  to jīviu demi jaṇaddaṇahŏ"
text.14501: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi asahantaĕṇa  $  ṇiu rāmahŏ pāsu turantaĕṇa
text.14504: jīvaï lakkhaṇu dāsarahi  $  para ṇhavaṇa-jaleṇa visallahĕ
text.14509: sasimaṇḍalu atthi ṇarāhivaï  $  suppaha mahaevi marāla-gaï
text.14510: paḍicandu tāsu uppaṇṇu suu  $  so haũ romañcubbhiṇṇa-bhuu
text.14511: sa-kalattaü keṇa vi kāraṇĕṇa  $  kira līlaĕ jāmi ṇahaṅgaṇĕṇa
text.14512: mehuṇiẏahĩ taṇaü vaïru sarĕvi  $  to sahasavijaü thiu uttharĕvi
text.14513: sa-kasāẏa ve vi ṇahĕ abbhiḍiẏa  $  ṇaṃ disa-dugghoṭṭa samāvaḍiẏa
text.14514: teṃ āẏāmeppiṇu abhava-bhava  $  mahu satti visajjiẏa caṇḍa-rava
text.14515: viṇibhindĕvi paḍiu tāĕ raṇĕ  $  ujjhahĕ vāhirĕ ujjāṇa-vaṇĕ
text.14519: jāu visallu puṇaṇṇavaü  $  ṇaṃ ṇehu vilāsiṇikeraü
text.14523: puṇu pucchiu bharaha-ṇarindu maĩ  $  "ĕu gandha-salilu kahĩ laddhu paĩ"
text.14524: teṇa vi mahu gujjhu ṇa rakkhiẏaü  $  sattuhaṇa-variṭṭheṃ akkhiẏaü
text.14526: ura-ghāu arocaü dāhu jaru  $  kala-saṇṇivāu gahu chaddi-karu
text.14527: sirĕ sūlu kavāla-rou pavaru  $  sappaḍisaü (?) khāsu sāsu avaru
text.14528: tehaĕ kālĕ tahĩ ekku jaṇu  $  sa-kalattu sa-puttu sa-vandhujaṇu
text.14529: sa-dhaü sa-valu sa-ṇaẏaru sa-pariẏaṇu  $  parijiẏaï saïttaü doṇaghaṇu
text.14532: teṇa visallahĕ taṇaü jalu  $  āṇeppiṇu uppari ghittaü
text.14533: paṭṭaṇu paccujīviẏaü  $  sa-paüru ṇaṃ amieṃ sittaü"
text.14537: jaṃ paccujīviu saẏalu jaṇu  $  taṃ bharaheṃ pucchiu doṇaghaṇu
text.14538: "ahŏ māma eu kahĩ laddhu jalu  $  ṇāṇāviha-gandha-riddhi-vahulu
text.14539: para-kajju jema jaṃ sīẏalaü  $  jiṇa-sukka-jhāṇu jiha ṇimmalaü
text.14540: jiṇa-vaẏaṇa jema jaṃ vāhi-haru  $  suhi-daṃsaṇu jiha āṇanda-ẏaru"
text.14541: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi doṇu ṇarāhivaï  $  papphulliẏa-vaẏaṇa-kamalu cavaï
text.14543: viṇu bhantiĕ amiẏahŏ aṇuharaï  $  jasu laggaï tāsu vāhi haraï"
text.14544: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi bharaheṃ pujjiẏaü  $  ṇiẏa-ṇaẏarahŏ doṇu visajjiẏaü
text.14546: appuṇu gaü taṃ jiṇa-bhavaṇu  $  jaṃ sāsaẏa-sokkha-ṇihāṇu
text.14547: ṇāvaï saggahŏ ucchalĕvi  $  mahi-maṇḍalĕ paḍiu vimāṇu
text.14551: tahĩ siddha-kūḍĕ sura-sārāhŏ  $  kiẏa thui arahanta-bhaḍārāhŏ
text.14566: jiṇu vandĕvi vandiu parama-risi  $  jeṃ darisiẏa dasaviha-dhamma-disi
text.14568: jo tava-guṇa-sañjama-ṇiẏama-dharu  $  tihĩ guttihĩ guttaü khanti-ẏaru
text.14569: jo tihĩ sallehĩ ṇa salliẏaü  $  jo saẏala-kasāẏahĩ melliẏaü
text.14571: jo kiḍikiḍijanta-puḍiẏa-ṇaẏaṇu  $  jo sisira-kālĕ vāhirĕ saẏaṇu
text.14572: jo uṇhālaĕ attāvaṇiu  $  jo candāẏaṇiu atoraṇiu
text.14574: jo meru-giri va dhīrattaṇĕṇa  $  jo jalahi va gambhīrattaṇĕṇa
text.14576: so muṇivaru caü-ṇāṇa-dharu  $  paṇaveppiṇu bharaheṃ vuccaï
text.14577: "kāĩ visallaĕ taü kiẏaü  $  jeṃ māṇusu vāhiĕ muccaï"
text.14581: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu bhaṇaï risi  $  ṇiẏa khaẏahŏ jeṇa aṇṇāṇa-ṇisi
text.14584: tahŏ suẏa ṇāmeṇāṇaṅgasara  $  ummilla-paohara kaṇṇa vara
text.14586: ṇaṃ sulaliẏa saraẏa-miẏaṅka-paha  $  ṇaṃ vibbhama-kāriṇi kāma-kaha
text.14587: ṇaṃ maṇahara candaṇa-rukkha-laẏa  $  gabbhesari rūvahŏ pāru gaẏa
text.14591: taṃ māṇusu ghummāviẏaü  $  dukkaru ṇiẏa-jīviu pāvaï
text.14595: tahĩ avasarĕ mahiẏalĕ pasariẏa-jasu  $  vijjāharu ṇāmeṃ puṇṇavvasu
text.14596: maṇi-vimāṇĕ dhūvanta-dhaẏaggaĕ  $  tahĩ āruhĕvi āu olaggaĕ
text.14597: ṇivaḍiẏa diṭṭhi tāva tahŏ tettahĕ  $  vasaï aṇaṅgavāṇa sā jettahĕ
text.14599: sahaï pariṭṭhiẏa mandirĕ maṇaharĕ  $  lacchi va kamala-vaṇahŏ abbhantarĕ
text.14601: viṇu cāveṃ viṇu viraïẏa-thāṇeṃ  $  viṇu guṇehĩ viṇu sara-sandhāṇeṃ
text.14602: viṇu paharaṇĕhĩ to vi jajjariẏaü  $  ṇa gaṇaï kiṃ pi puṇavvasu jariẏaü
text.14605: pekkhantahŏ savvahŏ jaṇahŏ  $  ṇiẏa kaṇṇa vimāṇĕ caḍāvĕvi
text.14610: sa-vimāṇu pavaṇa-maṇa-gamaṇa-gaü  $  devahũ dāṇavahu mi raṇĕ ajaü
text.14613: gajjanta padhāiẏa takkhaṇeṇa  $  ṇaṃ sa-jala jalaẏa gaẏaṇaṅgaṇeṇa
text.14614: "khala khudda pāva dakkhavahi muhu  $  kahĩ kaṇṇa laeviṇu jāi tuhũ
text.14615: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi kovāṇala-jaliu  $  ṇaṃ sīhu gaïnda-thaṭṭĕ valiu
text.14616: teṃ paḍhama-bhiḍanteṃ bhaggu valu  $  ṇāvaï avasaddeṃ kavva-dalu
text.14618: kaha vi paropparu santhavĕvi  $  sa-dhaẏaggu sa-hei sa-vāhaṇu
text.14619: girivarĕ jalahara-vindu jiha  $  utthariu paḍīvaü sāhaṇu
text.14624: savvĕhĩ ṇippasaru ṇiratthu kiu  $  pāḍiu vimāṇu paricchiṇṇu dhaü
text.14625: ṇāsaṅghiu jaṃ arivara-ṇivahu  $  taṃ vijja sareppiṇu paṇṇalahu
text.14626: ghattiẏa dharaṇiẏalĕ aṇaṅgasarā  $  ṇaṃ saraẏa-miẏaṅkeṃ joṇha varā
text.14627: su paṇaṭṭhu puṇavvasu gīḍha-bhaü  $  ṇaṃ hariṇu sarāsaṇi-tāsu gaü
text.14628: alahanta vatta kaṇṇahĕ taṇiẏa  $  kiṅkara vi patta puri appaṇiẏa
text.14629: anteuru lakkhiu vimaṇa-maṇu  $  ṇaṃ tuhiṇa-chittu saẏavatta-vaṇu
text.14630: atthāṇu vi soha ṇa dei kiha  $  jovvaṇu viṇu kāma-kahāĕ jiha
text.14632: kahiu ṇarindahŏ kiṅkarĕhĩ  $  "jalĕ thalĕ gaẏaṇaẏalĕ gaviṭṭhī
text.14633: siddhi jema ṇāṇeṇa viṇu  $  tiha amhahĩ kaṇṇa ṇa diṭṭhī"
text.14638: paṇṇalahua-vijjaĕ ghitta tahĩ  $  suṇṇāsaṇu bhīsaṇu raṇṇu jahĩ
text.14646: tahĩ tehaĕ vaṇĕ kāmasara  $  jala-vāhiṇi viula vihāvaï
text.14651: tahĩ jalavāhiṇi-taḍĕ vaïsarĕvi  $  dhāhāviu kulaharu sambharĕvi
text.14652: "hā tāẏa tāẏa maĩ santhavahi  $  hā māĕ māĕ sirĕ karu thavahi
text.14653: hā bhāi bhāi mambhīsa karĕ  $  gaẏa vaggha siṅgha ḍhukkanta dharĕ
text.14654: hā vihi hā kāĩ kiẏanta kiu  $  eu vasaṇu kāĩ mahu dakkhaviu
text.14655: hā kāĩ kiẏaĩ maĩ dukkiẏaĩ  $  jaṃ ṇihi dāvĕvi ṇaẏaṇaĩ hiẏaĩ
text.14656: evahĩ āiu ettahĕ maraṇu  $  to vari muiẏahĕ jiṇavaru saraṇu
text.14658: sā ema bhaṇĕvi saṇṇāsĕ thiẏa  $  hattha-saẏahŏ uvari ṇivitti kiẏa
text.14660: varisahũ saṭṭhi sahāsa thiẏa  $  tava-caraṇĕ pariṭṭhiẏa jāvĕhĩ
text.14665: chuḍu chuḍu tahĩ pavara-bhuaṅgamĕṇa  $  dehaddhu giliu ura-jaṅgamĕṇa
text.14666: vollijjaï to vijjāharĕṇa  $  "kiṃ hammaü ajagaru asivarĕṇa"
text.14667: paramesari pabhaṇaï savva-saha  $  "kiṃ tavasihĩ juttī pāṇa-vaha
text.14668: akkhejjahi tāẏahŏ eha vihi  $  tuha duhiẏaĕ rakkhiẏa sīla-ṇihi
text.14669: tava-caraṇu ṇirosahu ujjaviu  $  ajaẏarahŏ sarīru samallaviu"
text.14670: saüdāseṃ jaṃ tahĩ lakkhiẏaü  $  taṃ saẏalu ṇarindahŏ akkhiẏaü
text.14672: saẏaṇahũ uppāiu dāhu para  $  jiṇu jaẏa-bhaṇanti mua 'ṇaṅgasara
text.14673: ṇiẏa jeṇa so vi taü karĕvi muu  $  dasarahahŏ puttu somitti huu
text.14675: eha vi marĕvi aṇaṅgasara  $  uppaṇṇa visallā-sundari
text.14676: vala tahĕ taṇĕṇa jaleṇa para  $  sa ĩ bhu va dhuṇantu uṭṭhaï hari'
text.14679: ṇahĕ paḍivā-ẏandeṃ diṭṭhaĕṇa  $  kahi mi ṇa māiu uvahi jiha
text.14684: "kiṃ kahŏ vi atthi maṇu saïẏa-aṅgĕ  $  jo ei aṇuṭṭhantaĕ paẏaṅgĕ
text.14685: jo jaṇaï maṇoraha mahu maṇāsu  $  jo jīviu dei jaṇaddaṇāsu"
text.14686: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi maru-ṇandaṇeṇa  $  vuccaï rāvaṇa-vaṇa-maddaṇeṇa
text.14687: "mahu atthi deva maṇu saïẏa-aṅgĕ  $  haũ emi aṇuṭṭhantaĕ paẏaṅgĕ
text.14688: haũ jaṇami maṇohara tuha maṇāsu  $  haũ jīviu demi jaṇaddaṇāsu"
text.14689: tārā-taṇaeṇa vi vuttu eva  $  "haũ haṇuvahŏ homi sahāu deva"
text.14690: bhāmaṇḍalu pabhaṇaï "suṇu susāmi  $  haũ vihĩ uttara-sakkhiṇaü jāmi"
text.14692: te jaṇaẏa-pavaṇa-suggīva-suẏa  $  rāmahŏ calaṇĕhĩ paḍiẏa kiha
text.14693: kallāṇa-kālĕ titthaṅkarahŏ  $  tiṇṇi vi tihuvaṇa-inda jiha
text.14697: ārūḍha vimāṇĕhĩ sundarehĩ  $  amarehi va savva-suhaṅkarehĩ
text.14698: cumvaṇĕhĩ va ṇāṇāviha-sarehĩ  $  siva-paẏahĩ va muttāvali-dharehĩ
text.14699: kāmiṇi-muhĕhĩ va vaṇṇujjalehĩ  $  chiñchaï-cittehĩ va cañcalehĩ
text.14700: mahakaï-kavvehĩ va sughaḍiehĩ  $  supurisa-cariehĩ va paẏaḍiehĩ
text.14701: therāsaṇehĩ va ali-muhaliehĩ  $  saï-cārittehĩ va akhaliehĩ
text.14702: ṇava-jovvaṇĕhĩ va ṇaha-goẏarehĩ  $  jiṇa-sirĕhĩ va bhāmaṇḍala-dharehĩ
text.14703: vaẏaṇehĩ va haṇuva-pasaṅgaehĩ  $  pāhuṇĕhĩ va gamaṇa-maṇaṅgaehĩ
text.14704: thiẏa tehĩ vimāṇĕhĩ maṇimaehĩ  $  ṇaṃ vara-phullanduẏa paṅkaehĩ
text.14706: maṇa-gamaṇĕhĩ gaẏaṇĕ paẏaṭṭaĕhĩ  $  lakkhiu lavaṇa-samuddu kiha
text.14711: dīsaï raẏaṇāẏaru raẏaṇa-vāhu  $  viñjhu va sa-vāri chandu va sa-gāhu
text.14712: atthāhu suhi va hatthi va karālu  $  bhaṇḍāriu vva vahu-raẏaṇa-pālu
text.14713: sūhava-puriso vva saloṇa-sīlu  $  suggīvu va paẏaḍiẏa-indaṇīlu
text.14714: jiṇa-suva-cakkavaï va kiẏa-vaselu  $  majjhaṇṇu va upparĕ caḍiẏa-velu
text.14715: tavasi va paripāliẏa-samaẏa-sāru  $  dujjaṇa-puriso vva sahāva-khāru
text.14716: ṇiddhaṇa-ālāvu va appamāṇu  $  joisu va mīṇa-kakkaḍaẏa-thāṇu
text.14717: maha-kavva-ṇivandhu va sadda-gahiru  $  cāmīẏara-casaẏu va pīẏa-maïru
text.14718: taṃ jalaṇihi ullaṅghantaehĩ  $  vohitthaĩ diṭṭhaĩ jantaehĩ
text.14721: aṇṇu vi thovantaru jantaĕhĩ  $  tihi mi ṇihāliu giri malaü
text.14730: jahĩ mahura-vāṇi avahatthiẏāĩ  $  koila-kulāĩ kasaṇaĩ thiẏāĩ
text.14733: taṃ malaü muĕvi viharanti jāva  $  dāhiṇa-mahuraĕ āsaṇṇa tāva
text.14742: jahĩ maragaẏa-khāṇi vi vipphuranti  $  sasi-vimvu bhisiṇi-pattu va karanti
text.14743: taṃ mellĕvi rahasucchaliẏa-gatta  $  ṇivisaddheṃ sari kāveri patta
text.14744: jā laïẏa vihañjĕvi ṇaravarehĩ  $  mahakavva-kahā iva kaïvarehĩ
text.14745: sāmiẏa-āṇā iva kiṅkarehĩ  $  titthaṅkara-vāṇi va gaṇaharehĩ
text.14746: siva-sāsaẏa-motti va heuehĩ  $  vara-sadduppatti va dhāuehĩ
text.14750: ṇaṃ sajjheṃ suṭṭhu tisāiĕṇa  $  jīha pasāriẏa sāẏarahŏ
text.14754: puṇu diṭṭha pavāhiṇi kiṇhavaṇṇa  $  kiviṇattha-paütti va mahi-ṇisaṇṇa
text.14755: puṇu indaṇīla-kaṇṭhiẏa dhareṇa  $  dakkhaviẏa samuddahŏ āẏareṇa
text.14756: puṇu sari bhīmarahi jaloha-phāra  $  jā seuṇa-desahŏ amiẏa-dhāra
text.14757: puṇu golā-ṇaï manthara-pavāha  $  sajjheṇa pasāriẏa ṇāĩ vāha
text.14758: puṇu veṇṇi-paüṇhiu vāhiṇīu  $  ṇaṃ kuḍila-sahāvaü kāmiṇīu
text.14759: puṇu tāvi mahāṇaï suppavāha  $  sajjaṇa-metti vva aladdha-thāha
text.14760: thovantarālĕ puṇu viñjhu thāi  $  sīmantaü pihimihĕ taṇaü ṇāi
text.14761: puṇu revā-ṇaï haṇuvaṅgaehĩ  $  sā ṇindiẏa rosa-vasaṅgaehĩ
text.14762: "kiṃ viñjhahŏ pāsiu uvahi cāru  $  jo sa-visu kiviṇu accanta-khāru"
text.14765: "jaṃ viñjhu muĕvi gaẏa sāẏarahŏ  $  mā rūsahŏ revā-ṇaïhĕ
text.14766: ṇilloṇu muaï saloṇu saraï  $  ṇiẏa-sahāu ĕu tiẏamaïhĕ"
text.14770: sā ṇammaẏa dūrantarĕṇa catta  $  puṇu ujjaẏaṇi ṇiviseṇa patta
text.14771: jahĩ jaṇavaü sa-dhaṇu mahā-ghaṇo vva  $  rāmovari vacchalu lakkhaṇo vva
text.14772: guṇavantaü dhaṇuhara-saṅgaha vva  $  amuṇiẏa-kara-sira-taṇu vammaho vva
text.14773: sa vi dummahila va ujjeṇi mukka  $  puṇu pāriẏattu mālavaü ḍhukka
text.14774: jo dhaṇṇālaṅkiu ṇaravaï vva  $  ucchuhaṇu kusumasaru raïvaï vva
text.14775: taṃ mellĕvi jaüṇā-ṇaï pavaṇṇa  $  jā alaẏa-jalaẏa-gavalāli-vaṇṇa
text.14776: jā kasiṇa bhuaṅgi va visahŏ bhariẏa  $  kajjala-reha va ṇaṃ dharaĕ dhariẏa
text.14779: amhahã vihĩ garuvaü kavaṇu jaĕ  $  jujjhĕvi āeṃ maccharĕṇa
text.14780: himavantahŏ ṇaṃ avaharĕvi ṇiẏa  $  dhaẏa-vaḍāẏa raẏaṇāẏarĕṇa
text.14784: thovantarĕ tihi mi aüjjha diṭṭha  $  puṇu siddhipurihĩ siddha va païṭṭha
text.14785: jahĩ mihuṇaĩ ārambhiẏa-raẏāĩ  $  panthiẏa iva uccāiẏa-paẏāĩ
text.14786: pāhuṇa iva avaruṇḍaṇa-maṇāĩ  $  girivara-gattā iva savvaṇāĩ
text.14787: avicala-rajjā iva su-karaṇāĩ  $  risiula iva bhāva-parāẏaṇāĩ
text.14788: dhaṇuhara iva guṇa-melliẏa-sarāĩ  $  aharattā iva paharāurāĩ
text.14789: puṇu ṇaravaï maṃdirĕ gaẏa turanta  $  muṇi-suvvaẏa-jiṇa-maṅgalaĩ ganta
text.14791: titthaẏara-parama-devāhã jāĩ  $  pañca vi kallāṇaĩ honti tāĩ
text.14793: "mahi mandaru sāẏaru jāva ṇahu  $  jāva disaü mahaṇaï-jalaĩ
text.14794: taü hontu tāva jiṇa-kerāĩ  $  puṇṇa-pavittaĩ maṅgalaĩ"
text.14798: teṃ maṅgala-saddeṃ pahu viuddhu  $  ṇaṃ chaṇa-maẏalañchaṇu addha-addhu
text.14799: ṇaṃ uaẏa-mahīharĕ taruṇa-mittu  $  ṇaṃ māṇasa-saru ravi-kiraṇa-chittu
text.14800: ṇaṃ vāla-līlu kesari-kisoru  $  ṇaṃ suravaï sura-vahu-citta-coru
text.14802: ṇaṃ ṇahaẏala-kamalaĩ vihasiẏāĩ  $  sajjaṇa-vaẏaṇāĩ va pahasiẏāĩ
text.14803: ṇikkāraṇĕ jāĩ papphulliẏāĩ  $  su-kalattaĩ ṇāĩ samalliẏāĩ
text.14805: paripucchiẏa "tumhĕ paẏaṭṭa ketthu  $  kiṃ māẏāpurisa paḍhukka etthu
text.14808: kiṃ tiṇṇi vi hari-hara-caüvaẏaṇa  $  āeṃ veseṃ avaẏariẏa"
text.14812: vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa bharahahŏ taṇeṇa  $  vollijjaï jaṇaẏahŏ ṇandaṇeṇa
text.14813: "haũ bhāmaṇḍalu haṇuvantu ehu  $  uhu aṅgaü rahasucchaliẏa-dehu
text.14814: tiṇṇi vi āiẏa kajjeṇa jeṇa  $  suṇu akkhami kiṃ vahu-vitthareṇa
text.14815: sīẏahĕ kāraṇĕ rosiẏa-maṇāhã  $  raṇu vaṭṭaï rāhava-rāvaṇāhã
text.14816: lakkhaṇu sattiĕ viṇibhiṇṇu tetthu  $  dukkaru jīvaï teṃ āẏa etthu"
text.14817: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi paripālielu  $  ṇaṃ kulisa-samāhaü paḍiu selu
text.14818: ṇaṃ cavaṇa-kālĕ saggahŏ surindu  $  ummucchiu kaha vi kaha vi ṇarindu
text.14819: dukkhāuru dhāhāvaṇahĩ laggu  $  puṇṇa-kkhaĕ hari va muantu saggu
text.14821: "hā paĩ somitti marantaĕṇa  $  maraï ṇiruttaü dāsarahi
text.14822: bhattāra-vihūṇiẏa ṇāri jiha  $  ajju aṇāhīhūẏa mahi
text.14826: hā bhāẏara ekkasi dehi vāẏa  $  hā paĩ viṇu jaẏa-siri vihava jāẏa
text.14827: hā bhāẏara mahu sirĕ paḍiu gaẏaṇu  $  hā hiẏaü phuṭṭu dakkhavahi vaẏaṇu
text.14828: hā bhāẏara varahiṇa-mahura-vāṇi  $  mahu ṇivaḍio 'si dāhiṇaü pāṇi
text.14829: hā kiṃ samuddĕ jala-ṇivahu khuṭṭu  $  hā kiha diḍhu kumma-kaḍāhu phuṭṭu
text.14830: hā kiha suravaï lacchiĕ vimukku  $  hā kiha jamarāẏahŏ maraṇu ḍhukku
text.14831: hā kiha diṇaẏaru kara-ṇiẏara-cattu  $  hā kiha aṇaṅgu dohaggu pattu
text.14832: hā cañcalihūaü kema meru  $  hā kema jāu ṇiddhaṇu kuveru
text.14834: hā ṇivvisu kiha dharaṇindu thiu  $  ṇippahu sasi sihi sīẏalaü
text.14835: ṭalaṭalihūī kema mahi  $  kema samīraṇu ṇiccalaü
text.14839: labbhaï raẏaṇāẏarĕ raẏaṇa-khāṇi  $  labbhaï koila-kulĕ mahura-vāṇi
text.14840: labbhaï candaṇu giri-malaẏa-siṅgĕ  $  labbhaï suhavattaṇu juvaï-aṅgĕ
text.14841: labbhaï dhaṇu dhaṇaĕ dharā-pavaṇṇu  $  labbhaï kañcaṇa-pāvaĕ suvaṇṇu
text.14842: labbhaï pesaṇĕ sāmiẏa-pasāu  $  labbhaï kiĕ viṇaĕ jaṇāṇurāu
text.14843: labbhaï sajjaṇĕ guṇa-dāṇa-kitti  $  siẏa asivarĕ guru-kulĕ parama titti
text.14844: labbhaï vasiẏaraṇĕ kalatta-raẏaṇu  $  mahakavvĕ suhāsiu sukaï-vaẏaṇu
text.14846: labbhaï para-tīrĕ mahagghu bhaṇḍu  $  vara-velu-mūlĕ veḍujja-khaṇḍu
text.14848: gaĕ mottiu siṅghala-dīvĕ maṇi  $  vaïrāgarahŏ vajju paüru
text.14849: āẏaĩ savvaĩ labbhanti jaĕ  $  ṇavara ṇa labbhaï bhāi-varu"
text.14854: dukkhāuru rovaï saẏalu lou  $  ṇaṃ cappĕvi cappĕvi bhariu sou
text.14855: rovaï bhiccaẏaṇu samudda-hatthu  $  ṇaṃ kamala-saṇḍu hima-pavaṇa-ghatthu
text.14856: rovaï anteuru soẏa-puṇṇu  $  ṇaṃ chijjamāṇu saṅkha-ulu vuṇṇu
text.14858: rovaï suppaha vicchāẏa jāẏa  $  rovaï sumitta somitti-māẏa
text.14859: "hā putta putta kettahi gao 'si  $  kiha sattiĕ vaccha-tthalĕ hao 'si
text.14860: hā putta marantu ṇa joio 'si  $  daïveṇa keṇa vicchoio 'si
text.14863: kāruṇṇaĕ kavva-kahāĕ jiha  $  ko va ṇa aṃsu muāviẏaü"
text.14867: pariharĕvi sou bharahesareṇa  $  karavālu laïu dāhiṇa-kareṇa
text.14868: raṇa-bheri samāhaẏa diṇṇa saṅkha  $  sāhaṇu saṇṇaddhu aladdha saṅkha
text.14869: raha jottiẏa kiẏa kari sāri-sajja  $  pakkhariẏa turaṅgama jaẏa-jasajja
text.14870: sarahasu saṇṇajjhaï bharahu jāva  $  bhāmaṇḍaleṇa viṇṇattu tā̃va
text.14871: "paĩ gaĕṇa vi sijjhaï ṇāhĩ kajju  $  taṃ kari hari jīvaï jeṇa ajju
text.14872: jaï diṇṇu visallahĕ taṇaü ṇhavaṇu  $  to akkhahi pesaṇu ṇa kiu kavaṇu"
text.14873: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu bhaṇaï rāu  $  "kiṃ salileṃ saĩ jĕ visalla jāu"
text.14874: paṭṭhaviẏa mahallā gaẏa turanta  $  kaütikamaṅgalu ṇiviseṇa patta
text.14876: viṇṇaviu ṇaveppiṇu doṇaghaṇu  $  "jīviu deva dehi harihĕ
text.14881: ettaḍiẏa volla paḍivaṇṇa jāva  $  kekkaï sampāviẏa tahĩ ji tāva
text.14882: paṇaveppiṇu bhāẏaru vuttu tīĕ  $  "karĕ gamaṇu visallā-sundariĕ
text.14883: jīvaü lakkhaṇu hammaü dasāsu  $  pūrantu maṇoraha rāhavāsu
text.14884: āṇandu pavaḍḍhaü jāṇaīhĕ  $  taṇu tāraü dukkha-mahāṇaīhĕ
text.14885: aṇṇu vi visalla tahŏ puvva-diṇṇa  $  laggaü karaẏalĕ sabbhāva-bhiṇṇa"
text.14886: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi parituṭṭhu doṇu  $  "uṭṭhaü ṇārāẏaṇu akhaẏa-toṇu"
text.14887: paṭṭhaviẏa visalla khaṇantareṇa  $  sahũ kaṇṇa-sahāseṃ uttareṇa
text.14888: gaẏa jaẏakāreppiṇu doṇamehu  $  kekkaïẏa parāiẏa ṇiẏaẏa-gehu
text.14891: ṇaṃ majjha-padesĕ païṭṭhiẏaĕ  $  caü maẏarahara vasundhariĕ
text.14895: sa vi ṇaẏaṇakaḍakkhiẏa dujjaehĩ  $  siẏa ṇāvaï caühu mi disa-gaehĩ
text.14896: teṃ pulaïẏa ṇava-ṇīluppalacchi  $  vavasāu karantahŏ kahŏ ṇa lacchi
text.14897: puṇu pomāiu lakkhaṇu kumāru  $  "saṃsārahŏ laï ettaḍaü sāru
text.14898: jaï jīviu keva vi kaha vi pattu  $  to dhaṇṇaü jasu ehaü kalattu"
text.14900: tiṇṇi vi saṃcalla ṇahaṅgaṇeṇa  $  gaẏa laṅka parāiẏa takkhaṇeṇa
text.14901: jiha jiha kaṇṇaü ḍhukkanti tāu  $  tiha tiha vimalīhūẏaü disāu
text.14902: rāmeṇa vuttu "jamvava vihāṇu  $  laï appaü dahami hariṃ samāṇu"
text.14904: dhīriu rāhavu ricchaddhaĕṇa  $  "jaṇiẏa visallaĕ vimala disi
text.14905: kiṃ kahami bhaḍārā dāsarahi  $  tihĩ paharĕhĩ sambhavaï ṇisi
text.14909: ṇa vihāṇu ṇa bhāṇu maṇoharīhĕ  $  uhu teu visallā-sundarīhĕ"
text.14910: vala-jamvava ve vi cavanti jāva  $  ṇīsariẏa sarīrahŏ satti tāva
text.14911: puṇṇāli ṇāĩ para-ṇaravarāu  $  ṇaṃ ṇammaẏa viñjha-mahīharāu
text.14912: ṇaṃ sadda-māla vara kaïvarāu  $  ṇaṃ divva vāṇi titthaṅkarāu
text.14913: etthantarĕ amvarĕ dhagadhaganti  $  pavaṇañjaẏa-taṇaeṃ dhariẏa janti
text.14914: ṇaṃ vesa viẏaḍḍheṃ ṇaravareṇa  $  ṇaṃ pavara mahāṇaï sāẏareṇa
text.14915: pacaviẏa vevanti amoha-satti  $  "maṃ dharĕ maṃ dharĕ muĕ muĕ davatti
text.14916: ṇaü duṭṭha-savattihĕ samuhu thāmi  $  ĕha acchaü haũ ṇiẏa-ṇilaü jāmi
text.14919: savvahĕ bhattāreṃ ghattiẏahĕ  $  kula-vahuahĕ kulaharu saraṇu
text.14923: kiṃ ṇa muṇiẏa paĩ mahu taṇiẏa thatti  $  haũ sā ṇāmeṇāmoha-satti
text.14925: saṅgāma-kālĕ lakkhaṇahŏ mukka  $  hari-āṇaĕ vijju va girihĕ ḍhukka
text.14926: asahanti visallahĕ taṇaü teu  $  ṇāsami laggī kiṃ karahi kheu
text.14927: āẏaĕ avalamvĕvi parama-dhīru  $  aṇṇahĩ jammantarĕ ghora-vīru
text.14928: tava-caraṇu ṇirosahu ciṇṇu tā̃va  $  gaẏa varisahũ saṭṭhi sahāsa jā̃va"
text.14929: haṇueṇa vuttu "jaï saccu dehi  $  to muẏami paḍīvī jaï ṇa ehi"
text.14930: vijjaĕ pabhaṇiu "laï diṇṇu diṇṇu  $  ṇaü bhiṇṇami jiha evahĩ vibhiṇṇu"
text.14931: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pavaṇa-sueṇa mukka  $  vihaḍapphaḍa gaẏa ṇiẏa-ṇilaü ḍhukka
text.14932: ettahĕ vi tāva sarahasa païṭṭha  $  sa-valeṇa valeṇa visalla diṭṭha
text.14934: siu santi karanti haranti duhu  $  sīẏahĕ rāmahŏ lakkhaṇahŏ
text.14935: atthakkaĕ ḍhukka bhavitti jiha  $  laṅkahĕ rajjahŏ rāvaṇahŏ
text.14940: samaladdhu suandheṃ candaṇeṇa  $  rāmahŏ vi samappiu takkhaṇeṇa
text.14948: avaraha mi asesahũ ṇaravaïhũ  $  diṇṇu vihañjĕvi gandha-jalu
text.14949: atthakkaĕ jāu puṇaṇṇavaü  $  saẏalu vi rāmahŏ taṇaü valu
text.14955: vajjantĕhĩ paḍahĕhĩ maddalehĩ  $  gijjantĕhĩ dhavalĕhĩ maṅgalĕhĩ
text.14958: savvĕhĩ uṇṇiddāviu aṇantu  $  uṭṭhiu "kettahĕ rāvaṇu" bhaṇantu
text.14959: vihaseppiṇu uccaï halahareṇa  $  "kiṃ khalĕṇa gaviṭṭheṃ ṇisiẏareṇa
text.14960: tā duddama-daṇu-ṇiddalaṇa-dappa  $  uva vaẏaṇu visallahĕ taṇaü vappa
text.14961: jamamuhahŏ jāĕ ṇīsārio 'si  $  laṅkahĕ viṇāsu païsārio 'si"
text.14963: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi joiẏa lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  takkhaṇa maẏaṇāalliẏaü
text.14964: ṇaṃ ekkaĕ sattiĕ parihariu  $  puṇu aṇṇekkaĕ salliẏaü
text.14968: sā kaṇṇa ṇiĕvi harisiẏa-maṇāsu  $  uppaṇṇa bhanti ṇārāẏaṇāsu
text.14970: kiṃ ūru paropparu bhiṇṇa-teẏa  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ ṇava-rambhā-khambha eẏa
text.14971: kiṃ kaṇaẏa-doru gholaï visālu  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ ahi raẏaṇa-ṇihāṇa-pālu
text.14972: kiṃ tivaliu jaḍharĕ padhāviẏāu  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kāmaürihĕ khāiẏāu
text.14973: kiṃ romāvali ghaṇa kasaṇa eha  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ maẏaṇāṇala-dhūma-leha
text.14974: kiṃ ṇava-thaṇa ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kaṇaẏa-kalasa  $  kiṃ kara ṇaṃ ṇaṃ pāroha-sarisa
text.14975: kiṃ āẏamvira kara-ẏala calanti  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ asoẏa-pallava lalanti
text.14976: kiṃ āṇaṇu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ canda-vimvu  $  kiṃ aharaü ṇaṃ ṇaṃ pakka-vimvu
text.14977: kiṃ dasaṇāvaliu sa-muttiẏāu  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ malliẏa-kaliẏaü imāu
text.14978: kiṃ gaṇḍavāsa ṇaṃ danti-dāṇa  $  kiṃ loẏaṇa ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kāma-vāṇa
text.14979: kiṃ bhaüha imāu pariṭṭhiẏāu  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ vammaha-dhaṇulaṭṭhiẏāu
text.14980: kiṃ kaṇṇa kuṇḍalāharaṇa eẏa  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ ravi-sasi vipphuriẏa-teẏa
text.14981: kiṃ bhālaü ṇaṃ ṇaṃ sasaharaddhu  $  kiṃ siru ṇaṃ ṇaṃ ali-ula-ṇivaddhu"
text.14988: tā jamvavantĕ pabhaṇiu kumāru  $  "phagguṇa-pañcami tahĩ sukka-vāru
text.14989: uttara-āsāḍhaü siddhi-joggu  $  aṇṇu vi vaṭṭaï thiru kumbha-laggu
text.14990: eẏārasamaü gaha-cakku ajju  $  sa-maṇoharu saẏalu vivāha-kajju
text.14991: āroggiu sampaẏa riddhi viddhi  $  aïreṇa hoi saṅgāma-siddhi
text.14992: āẏaĕ avasarĕ pariṇevi deva  $  rijjhahu suravara-mihuṇāĩ jeva"
text.14993: taṃ suṇĕvi sumittihĕ ṇandaṇeṇa  $  kiu pāṇi-ggahaṇu jaṇaddaṇeṇa
text.14997: ucchāhĕhĩ dhavalĕhĩ maṅgalĕhĩ  $  saṅkhehĩ tūrĕhĩ aïhavĕhĩ
text.14998: sa ĩ bhū sĕvi sāhukkāriẏaü  $  ṇaravaï-saehi (?) kiẏa-ucchavĕhĩ
text.15001: tūrahã saddu suṇevi  $  sūleṇa va bhiṇṇu dasāṇaṇu
text.15006: canda-vihaṅgame samuḍḍāviẏae (gaẏa-)andhāra-mahuẏare  $  tārā-kusuma-ṇiẏarĕ pariẏaliĕ moḍie raẏaṇi-taruvare
text.15008: tāva parajjiẏa-sura-saṅghāẏahŏ  $  keṇa vi kahiu dasāṇaṇa-rāẏahŏ
text.15009: "ahŏ ahŏ deva deva jaga-kesari  $  āiẏa kā vi visallā-sundari
text.15010: tāĕ jaṇaddaṇu paccujjīviu  $  ṇaṃ ghiẏa-dhārahĩ sihi saṃdīviu"
text.15011: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi kala-koila-vāṇī  $  cintāviẏa mandoẏari rāṇī
text.15012: "ajja vi vuddhi ṇa thāi aẏāṇahŏ  $  kevali-bhāsiu ḍhukku pamāṇahŏ"
text.15013: ema viẏappeṃ amarohāvaṇu  $  puṇu sabbhāveṃ pabhaṇiu rāvaṇu
text.15014: "je muā vi jīvanti khaṇaṃ khaṇĕ  $  dujjaẏa hari-vala honti raṇaṅgaṇĕ
text.15016: dehi dasāṇaṇa sīẏa  $  ajja vi laṅkāuri rijjhaü
text.15022: indaï bhāṇukaṇṇu ghaṇavāhaṇu vandhāviẏa akajjĕṇaṃ  $  saẏaṇa-vihūṇaeṇa kiṃ kijjaï evahĩ rāẏa rajjĕṇaṃ
text.15023: kiṃ uḍḍiu ṇippakkhu vihaṅgamu  $  kiṃ ṇivvisu saṃḍasaü bhuaṅgamu
text.15024: kiṃ vā tavaü ṇiteu divāẏaru  $  kiṃ ṇijjalu ucchallaü sāẏaru
text.15025: gaẏa-visāṇu kiṃ gajjaü kuñjaru  $  kiṃ kareu hari haẏa-ṇaha-pañjaru
text.15026: kiṃ vipphuraü candu gaha-gahiẏaü  $  kiṃ pajjalaü jalaṇu jala-sahiẏaü
text.15027: kiṃ chajjaü taru pāḍiẏa-ḍālaü  $  kiṃ sijjhaü risi vaẏaĩ a-pālaü
text.15028: kiṃ karehi tuhũ suṭṭhu vi bhallaü  $  vandhava-saẏaṇa-hīṇu ekkellaü
text.15029: to vari vuddhi mahārī kijjaü  $  ajja vi eha ṇāri appijjaü
text.15030: uvveḍḍhevi jantu hari-rāhava  $  mellijjantu tuhārā vandhava
text.15032: ajja vi eu jĕ rajju  $  raha-haẏa-gaẏa-dhaẏa-darisāvaṇu
text.15033: te jĕ sahoẏara savva  $  tuhũ so jjĕ paḍīvaü rāvaṇu"
text.15038: mandovari-viṇiggaẏālāva pasaṃsiẏa saẏala-mantihĩ  $  keẏaï-kusuma-gandha paricumviẏa ṇāvaï bhamara-pantihĩ
text.15040: kiẏa-kara-maüli-ṇamiẏa-sira-kamalĕhĩ  $  pujjiu taṃ ji vaẏaṇu maï-vimalĕhĩ
text.15041: caṅgaü māĕ māĕ paĩ vuttaü  $  atthasatthĕ eu vi su-ṇiruttaü
text.15042: akusalu kusalehĩ ṇa jujjhevaü  $  rāeṃ rajja-kajju vujjhevaü
text.15043: para-valu pavaru ṇiĕvi vañcevaü  $  ahavaï thoḍaü to jujjhevaü
text.15044: samu sāhaṇu sarisaü ji samappaü  $  avaru pavaru para-cakkiu cappaü
text.15045: teṃ kajjeṃ jāṇevaü avasaru  $  suiṇae vi saṅgāmu asundaru
text.15046: karĕvi paẏattu tantu rakkhevvaü  $   maṇḍala-kajju eu lakkhevvaü
text.15048: jaṃ uvvariẏaü kiṃ pi  $  taṃ seṇṇu jāva ṇāvaṭṭaï
text.15049: tāva samappahi sīẏa  $  ĕhu sandhihĕ avasaru vaṭṭaï"
text.15054: taṃ paramattha-vaẏaṇu ṇisuṇeppiṇu dahavaẏaṇeṇa cintiẏaṃ  $  "vari mehali ṇa-iṇṇa ṇaü pujjiu mantihĩ taṇaü mantiẏaṃ
text.15056: kavaṇu etthu kira sandhihĕ avasaru  $  uttima-purisahŏ maraṇu jĕ sundaru
text.15061: tahĩ ji kālĕ jaṃ ṇa kiu ṇivāriu  $  taṃ kiṃ evahĩ thāi ṇirāriu
text.15062: to i tuhārī iccha ṇa bhañjami  $  māṇiṇi eha sandhi paḍivajjami
text.15064: jaï uvveḍhaï rāmu  $  ṇihi-raẏaṇaĩ rajju laeppiṇu
text.15065: paĩ maĩ sīẏāevi  $  tiṇṇi vi vāhiraĩ kareppiṇu
text.15070: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu dahavaẏaṇahŏ ṇaravaï ke vi jampiẏā  $  "ekkae mahilāĕ kiṃ ko vi ṇa icchaï mahi samappiẏā"
text.15071: ke vi cavanti manti paramattheṃ  $  "sapparihavĕṇa kāĩ kira attheṃ
text.15072: chalu jĕ ekku pāikkahŏ maṇḍaṇu  $  puttu kalattu mittu omaṇḍaṇu"
text.15073: pabhaṇaï mandovari "ko jāṇaï  $  jaï mahi lei samappaï jāṇaï
text.15074: tā sāmantaü dūu visajjahi  $  saẏalu vi dei sandhi paḍivajjahi
text.15075: jaï rāmaṇu jĕ maraï sahũ saẏaṇĕhĩ  $  to kira kāĩ tehĩ ṇihi-raẏaṇĕhĩ
text.15076: ema bhaṇĕvi pesiu sāmantaü  $  jo so parimiẏattha-guṇavantaü
text.15077: caḍiu mahārahĕ haẏa kasa-tāḍiẏa  $  mahi khuppantĕhĩ cakkehĩ phāḍiẏa
text.15078: ṇiẏa-ṇisiẏara-valeṇa pariẏariẏaü  $  vīẏaü rāvaṇu ṇaṃ ṇīsariẏaü
text.15081: kiṇṇa paḍīvaü āu  $  sarahasu saṇṇahĕvi dasāṇaṇu
text.15086: jampaï jamvavantu "ṇaü rāvaṇu rāvaṇa-dūu dīsae"  $  e ālāva jāva tāṇantarĕ so jĕ tahĩ paīsae
text.15087: tahĩ païsanteṃ dahamuha-dūeṃ  $  diṭṭhu seṇṇu āsaṇṇīhūeṃ
text.15089: maharisi-vindu va dhamma-parāẏaṇu  $  paṅkaẏa-vaṇu va silīmuha-bhāẏaṇu
text.15090: kāmiṇi-vaẏaṇu va phāliẏa-ṇettaü  $  mahakaï-kavvu va lakkhaṇa-vantaü
text.15091: mīṇa-ulu va dahavaẏaṇāsaṅkiu  $  ṇava-kanduṭṭu va ṇīla-ṇalaṅkiu
text.15092: ṇandaṇa-vaṇu va kunda-vaddhāraü  $  ṇisi-ṇahaẏalu va sa-indu sa-tāraü
text.15093: puṇu atthāṇu diṭṭhu uvvaẏaṇaü  $  sāẏara-mahaṇu va paẏaḍiẏa-raẏaṇaü
text.15094: khaẏa-ravi-vimvu va vaḍḍhiẏa-teẏaü  $  saï-cittu va para-ṇara-dubbheẏaü
text.15097: saggahŏ inda-paḍinda  $  ve vi ṇāĩ tahĩ avaẏariẏā
text.15102: tehĩ vi vāsueva-valaevahĩ paharisiehĩ takkhaṇe  $  hakkārevi pāsu sammāṇĕvi vaïsāriu varāsaṇe
text.15104: "ahŏ ahŏ rāma rāma rāmā-piẏa  $  suravara-samara-saehĩ akampiẏa
text.15108: sandhi dasāṇaṇeṇa sahũ kijjaü  $  indaï-kumbhaẏaṇṇu mellijjaü
text.15109: laṅka du-bhāẏa ti-khaṇḍa vasundhara  $  chattaĩ pīḍhaĩ haẏa-gaẏa-ṇaravara
text.15110: ṇihi-raẏaṇaĩ addhaddhu laïjjaü  $  sīẏahĕ taṇiẏa tatti chaḍḍijjaü"
text.15113: savvaĩ so jjĕ laeu  $  amhahũ para sīẏaĕ kajjū"
text.15118: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu kākutthahŏ īsīsi vi ṇa kampio  $  tiṇa-samu gaṇĕvi saẏalu atthāṇu dasāṇaṇa-dūu jampio
text.15119: "ahŏ valaeva deva mā vollahi  $  kantahĕ taṇiẏa vatta āmellahi
text.15120: laṅkāhiu hemantu jĕ vīẏaü  $  jo ṇivisu vi ṇaü hoi ṇisīẏaü
text.15121: jo rattiddiu parikaaṇappaṇĕ  $  dīsaï suviṇaĕ asivara-dappaṇĕ
text.15122: jeṇa dhaṇaü kiẏantu kiu ṇippahu  $  sahasakiraṇu ṇalakuvvaru sura-pahu
text.15123: jeṇa varuṇu samaraṅgaṇĕ dhariẏaü  $  aṭṭhāvaü pāvaü uddhariẏaü
text.15124: teṇa samaü jaï sandhi ṇa icchahi  $  to avajjha jīvantu ṇa pecchahi"
text.15125: taṃ ṇisuṇevi kuiu bhāmaṇḍalu  $  ṇaṃ uṭṭhiu sa-khaggu ākhaṇḍalu
text.15126: "arĕ khala khudda sa-maüḍu sa-kuṇḍalu  $  pāḍami sīsu jema tālahŏ phalu
text.15127: ko tuhũ kahŏ keraü so rāvaṇu  $  jaṃ muhumuhu jampahi a-suhāvaṇu"
text.15129: lakkhaṇu ghosaï ema  $  "taü rāmahŏ kerī āṇā
text.15136: eṇa haeṇa kavaṇu suhaḍattaṇu  $  aẏasa-bhāru kevalu kula-lañchaṇu"
text.15137: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pasamiu kovāṇalu  $  ṇiẏa-āsaṇĕ ṇiviṭṭhu bhāmaṇḍalu
text.15138: tehaĕ kālĕ vilakkhīhūeṃ  $  pabhaṇiu rāhavu rāmaṇa-dūem
text.15139: "caṅgaü bhiccu deva paĩ laddhaü  $  jiha su-kavvĕ avasaddu ṇivaddhaü
text.15140: sira-vihīṇu ṇaü laggaï kaṇṇahũ  $  tiha aviẏaḍḍhu viẏaḍḍhahũ aṇṇahũ
text.15141: āeṃ hohi tuhu mi lahuẏāraü  $  lavaṇa-raseṇa samuddu va khāraü
text.15142: ahavaï kallĕ ji āvaï pāviẏa  $  raṇḍaü jema savva rovāviẏa
text.15143: evahĩ gajjahŏ kāĩ akāraṇĕ  $  valu vujjhesaü (?) saĩ jĕ mahāraṇĕ
text.15145: jo ekkaĕ sattīĕ  $  ehī avattha darisāvaï
text.15146: so paharaṇa-lakkhehĩ  $  kaï vihaẏa jeva uḍḍāvaï
text.15151: tumha siruppalāĩ toḍeppiṇu pīḍhu raevi tatthĕṇaṃ  $  indaï-bhāṇukaṇṇa-ghaṇavāhaṇa mellesaï sa-hatthĕṇaṃ
text.15152: ṇihaĕ vāsueva-valaeveṃ  $  lesaï saĩ jĕ sīẏa avaleveṃ
text.15153: ahavaï jaï vi āu tahŏ jhijjaï  $  tumhārisĕhĩ to vi ṇaü jijjaï
text.15154: kiṃ joijjaï sīhu kuraṅgĕhĩ  $  kiṃ vasikijjaï garuḍu bhuẏaṅgĕhĩ
text.15155: kiṃ khajjoĕhĩ kiu ravi ṇippahu  $  kiṃ vaṇa-tiṇĕhĩ dharijjaï huẏavahu
text.15156: kiṃ sari-sottĕhĩ phuṭṭaï sāẏaru  $  kiṃ karehĩ chāijjaï sasaharu
text.15157: kiṃ cālijjaï viñjhu pulindĕhĩ  $  hāsaü tahŏ tumhĕhĩ ku-ṇarindĕhĩ"
text.15158: taṃ ṇisuṇevi bhaḍĕhĩ galathalliu  $  ṭakkara-paṇhiẏa-ghāĕhĩ ghalliu
text.15159: gaü sa-parāhavu laṅka parāiu  $  kahiu "deva haũ kaha vi ṇa ghāiu
text.15161: dujjaẏa lakkhaṇa-rāma  $  ṇa karanti sandhi ṇaü vuttaü
text.15162: jaṃ jāṇahi taṃ cintĕ  $  āẏaü khaẏa-kālu ṇiruttaü
text.15167: samvu-kumāru jehĩ viṇivāiu ghāiu kharu vi dūsaṇo  $  jehĩ mahaṇṇavo samullaṅghiu ṇakka-ggāha-bhīsaṇo
text.15169: āṇiẏa jehĩ visallā-sundari  $  muu jīvāviu lakkhaṇa-kesari
text.15170: tehĩ samāṇu ṇaü sohaï viggahu  $  lahu vaïdehi dehi muĕ saṅgahu"
text.15171: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaravaï cintāviu  $  mahaṇāvattha samuddu va pāviu
text.15172: "hosaï kema kajju ṇaü jāṇami  $  kiṃ ukkhandheṃ vandhĕvi āṇami
text.15173: kiṃ pāḍami samasuttī para-valĕ  $  kiṃ sara-dhoraṇi lāẏami hari-valĕ
text.15174: jaï vi sa-sāhaṇu sa-rahu samappami  $  to vi ṇa rāmahŏ gehiṇi appami
text.15175: atthu uvāu ekku jeṃ sāhami  $  vahurūviṇiẏa vijja ārāhami
text.15177: paṭṭaṇĕ ghosaṇa demi  $  jīva aṭṭha divasa mambhīsami
text.15183: ema bhaṇevi teṇa chuḍu jĕ cchuḍu māhahŏ taṇaĕ ṇiggame  $  ghosiẏa purĕ amāri ahiṇava-phagguṇa-ṇandīsarāgame
text.15184: "aṭṭha divasa jiṇavaru jaẏakārahŏ  $  aṭṭha divasa mahimaü ṇīsārahŏ
text.15185: aṭṭha divasa jiṇa-bhavaṇaĩ sārahŏ  $  aṭṭha divasa jīvāĩ ma mārahŏ
text.15186: aṭṭha divasa samaraṅgaṇu chaḍḍahŏ  $  aṭṭha divasa indiẏa-daṇu daṇḍahŏ
text.15187: aṭṭha divasa uvavāsa karejjahŏ  $  aṭṭha divasa maha-dāṇaĩ dejjahŏ
text.15188: aṭṭha divasa appāṇaü bhāvahŏ  $  eẏāraha guṇa-thāṇaĩ dāvahŏ
text.15189: aṭṭha divasa guṇa-vaẏaĩ paüñjahŏ  $  sejjahŏ jajjahŏ aṇuhuñjejjahŏ
text.15190: aṭṭha divasa piẏa-vaẏaṇaĩ bhāsahŏ  $  aṇuvaẏa-sikkhāvaẏaĩ pagāsahŏ
text.15191: aṭṭha divasa āmellahŏ maccharu  $  jāmva ehu phagguṇa-ṇandīsaru
text.15193: paccakkhāṇu laehu  $  paḍikavaṇu suṇahŏ maṇu khañcahŏ
text.15194: toḍĕvi tāmarasāĩ  $  sa ĩ bhu ĕhĩ bhaḍāraü añcahŏ"
text.15196: hari-halahara-guṇa-gahaṇĕhĩ dūahŏ vaẏaṇĕhĩ pahu paharevvaü pariharaï
text.15197: vijjahĕ kāraṇĕ rāvaṇu jaga-jagaḍāvaṇu santi-jiṇālaü païsaraï
text.15204: riddhi-gaẏahĕ kokkaṇaẏahĕ kaṇaẏahĕ  $  haṃsabbhaṃsiĕ kuvalaĕ ku-valaĕ
text.15205: mahuarĕ mahu-majjantaĕ jantaĕ  $  kovila-kulĕ vāsantaĕ santaĕ
text.15206: kīra-vandĕ uṭṭhantaĕ ṭhantaĕ  $  malaẏāṇilĕ āvantaĕ vantaĕ
text.15207: mahuari paḍisallāvaĕ lāvaĕ  $  jahĩ ṇa vi titti raẏahŏ tittiraẏahŏ
text.15208: ṇāu ṇa ṇāvaï kiṃ suĕ kiṃsuĕ  $  jahĩ vaseṇa gaẏaṇāhahŏ ṇāhahŏ
text.15211: acchaü kiṃ sāvaṇṇeṃ  $  keṇa vi aṇṇeṃ  $  jahĩ aïmuttaü raï karaï
text.15212: taṃ jaṇa-[maṇa-]majjāvaṇu  $  savva-suhāvaṇu  $  ko mahu-māsu ṇa sambharaï
text.15216: katthaï aṅgarāẏa-saṅkāsaü  $  rehaï tamviru phullu palāsaü
text.15217: ṇaṃ dāvāṇalu āu gavesaü  $  ko maĩ daḍḍhu ṇa daḍḍhu paesaü
text.15218: katthavi māhaviẏaĕ ṇiẏa-mandiru  $  entu ṇivāriu taṃ indindiru
text.15219: "osaru osaru tuhũ apavittaü  $  aṇṇaĕ ṇava-pupphavaïĕ chittaü
text.15221: katthaï pavaṇa-haẏaĩ puṇṇāẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ jagĕ ucchaliẏaĩ puṇṇāẏaĩ
text.15222: katthaï ahiṇavāĩ bhamara-ulaĩ  $  thiẏaĩ vasanta-sirihĕ ṇaṃ kurulaĩ
text.15223: phaṇasaĩ avuha-muhā iva jaḍḍaĩ  $  sirihalāĩ siri-hala iva vaḍḍaĩ
text.15225: tehaĕ kālĕ maṇoharĕ  $  ṇava-ṇandīsarĕ  $  laṅka purandara-puri va thiẏa
text.15226: raẏaṇiẏarĕhĩ guru-attiĕ(?)  $  avicala-bhattiĕ  $  jiṇaharĕ jiṇaharĕ pujja kiẏa
text.15230: gharĕ gharĕ mahimaü ṇīsāriẏaü  $  gharĕ gharĕ paḍimaü ahisāriẏaü
text.15231: gharĕ gharĕ tūraĩ apphāliẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ sīha-ulaĩ orāliẏaĩ
text.15232: gharĕ gharĕ ravi-kiraṇa-ṇivāraṇaĩ  $  ubbhiẏaĩ vitāṇaĩ toraṇaĩ
text.15233: gharĕ gharĕ mālaü gandhukkaḍaü  $  gharĕ gharĕ ṇivaḍiẏa-candaṇa-chaḍaü
text.15234: gharĕ gharĕ mottiẏa-raṅgāvaliu  $  gharĕ gharĕ davaṇullaü ṇava-phaliu
text.15235: gharĕ gharĕ ahiṇava-pupphaccaṇiẏa  $  gharĕ gharĕ caccari koḍḍāvaṇiẏa
text.15236: gharĕ gharĕ mihuṇaĩ pariosiẏaĩ  $  gharĕ gharĕ maha-dāṇaĩ ghosiẏaĩ
text.15237: gharĕ gharĕ bhoẏaṇa-sāmaggi kiẏa  $  gharĕ gharĕ siri-devaẏa ṇāĩ thiẏa
text.15239: karĕvi mahocchaü paṭṭaṇĕ  $  daṇu-dalavaṭṭaṇĕ  $  sapparivāru ṇirāuhaü
text.15240: aṭṭhāvaẏa-kampāvaṇu  $  sarahasu rāvaṇu  $  gaü santiharahŏ sammuhaü
text.15248: jaṇu ṇiggaü ṇiggaü ṇitturaü  $  mahirakkhahŏ rakkhahŏ thiu puraü
text.15249: dappa-rahiẏa para-hiẏa ke vi ṇara  $  uvavāsiẏa vāsiẏa dhamma-para
text.15250: daï(?ẏa)-mahiẏaĕ mahiẏaĕ kā vi tiẏa  $  kaṃjaẏa-kari jaẏa-kari ṇāĩ siẏa
text.15251: ka vi rāma rāma-ullāvaẏari  $  ka vi vattī vattī-dīvaẏari
text.15254: ṇaha-saravara-āvāseṃ  $  sasahara-haṃseṃ  $  khuṭṭĕvi ghattiu kamalu jiha
text.15258: vimalaṃ ravi-rāsi-haraṃ siharaṃ  $  lakkhijjaï santi-haraṃ tiharaṃ
text.15259: vuḍhḍhattaṇa-jamma-raṇaṃ maraṇaṃ  $  vārei va kampavaṇaṃ pavaṇaṃ
text.15260: vīsamaï va rambha-vaṇe bhavaṇe  $  paṅguraï va kusuma-vaḍaṃ avaḍaṃ
text.15261: bhaṇaï va alimā bhamare bhamare  $  vaḍḍhaï va (?) sasi-samaẏaṃ sa-maẏaṃ
text.15262: toḍei va ṇaha-ẏalaẏaṃ alaẏaṃ  $  āruhaï va akka-rahĕ kara-he
text.15263: maïlei va ujjalaẏaṃ jalaẏaṃ  $  parihei va divvalaẏaṃ valaẏaṃ
text.15264: chaḍḍei va avaṇilaẏaṃ ṇilaẏaṃ  $  hasaï va parimukka-malaṃ kamalaṃ
text.15265: joei va savva-suhaṃ vasuhaṃ  $  dharaï va ahiṭhāṇaṃ ahi-ṭhāṇaṃ
text.15267: puṇṇa-pavittu visālaü  $  santi-jiṇālaü  $  savvahŏ loahŏ santi-karu
text.15282: pavīṇa vīṇa pāviẏā  $  paḍū jhuṇī suhāviẏā
text.15284: surāṇa jaṃ ṇivandhaṇaṃ  $  kaẏaṃ ca tehĩ pesaṇaṃ
text.15290: ṇaravaï bhāmari deppiṇu  $  ṇāhu ṇaveppiṇu  $  ekku khaṇantaru ekku maṇu
text.15291: rāvaṇahatthaü vāĕvi  $  maṅgalu gāĕvi  $  puṇu pārambhaï jiṇa-ṇhavaṇu
text.15311: aha para-dukkheṇa va sīẏaleṇa  $  sajjaṇa-vaẏaṇeṇa va ujjaleṇa
text.15312: malaẏa-ruha-vaṇeṇa va surahieṇa  $  saï-citteṇa va mala-virahieṇa
text.15315: himagiri-sihareṇa va sāḍieṇa  $  sasahara-vimveṇa va pāḍieṇa
text.15316: mottiẏa-hāreṇa va tuṭṭaeṇa  $  saraẏabbha-ureṇa va phuṭṭaeṇa
text.15317: khīreṇa teṇa su-maṇohareṇa  $  puṇu sisira-pavāheṃ manthareṇa
text.15318: aviṇaẏa-puriseṇa va thaḍḍhaeṇa  $  ṇava-dumĕṇa va sāhā-vaddhaeṇa
text.15322: diṇṇu vihañjĕvi rāeṃ  $  ṇaṃ aṇurāeṃ  $  hiẏaü savvu anteurahŏ
text.15331: evaṃ ca mālāhĩ aṇṇaṇṇa-rūvāhĩ  $  kaṇṇāḍiẏāhĩ va sara-sāra-bhūāhĩ
text.15332: āhīriẏāhĩ va vāẏāla-bhasalāhĩ  $  vara-lāḍiẏāhĩ va muha-vaṇṇa-kusalāhĩ
text.15333: soraṭṭhiẏāhĩ va savvaṅga-maüāhĩ  $  mālaviṇiẏāhĩ va majjhāra-chaüāhĩ
text.15334: marahaṭṭhiẏāhĩ va uddāma-vāẏāhĩ  $  geẏa-jhuṇihĩ va aṇṇaṇṇa-chāẏāhĩ
text.15337: accaṇa kiẏa jaga-ṇāhahŏ  $  kevala-vāhahŏ  $  puṇṇa-saehĩ va akkhaĕhĩ
text.15341: pacchā carueṇa maṇohareṇa  $  gaṅgā-vāheṇa va dīhareṇa
text.15342: muttā-ṇiẏareṇa va paṇḍureṇa  $  su-kalatta-muheṇa va su-mahureṇa
text.15343: vara-amiẏa-raseṇa va surahieṇa  $  suaṇeṇa va suṭṭhu saṇehieṇa
text.15344: titthaẏara-vareṇa va siddhaeṇa  $  suraeṇa va timmaṇa-riddhaeṇa
text.15345: puṇu dīvaehĩ ṇāṇāvihehĩ  $  varahiṇĕhĩ va aïdīhara-sihehĩ
text.15346: suhaḍehĩ va vaṇiĕhĩ valiẏaehĩ  $  ṭiṇṭāuttehĩ va jaliẏaehĩ
text.15348: puṇu phala-ṇivaheṇa susohieṇa  $  kavveṇa va savva-rasāhieṇa
text.15349: sāhāreṇa va aï-pakkaeṇa  $  takkeṇa va sāhā-mukkaeṇa
text.15350: pahu-accaṇa emva karei jāma  $  gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ sura vollanti tāmva
text.15352: "jaï vi santi ehu ghosaï  $  kallaĕ hosaï  $  to vi rāma-lakkhaṇahũ jaü
text.15353: indiẏa-vasi ṇa karantahũ  $  sīẏa ṇa dentahũ  $  siẏa-maṅgalu kallāṇu kaü"
text.15359: soma-suhaṃ paripuṇṇa-pavittaṃ  $  jassa ciraṃ cariẏaṃ su-pavittaṃ
text.15362: jassa bhavāhi-ulesu khagattaṃ  $  aṭṭha-saẏaṃ ciẏa lakkhaṇa-gattaṃ
text.15364: daṇḍiẏa jeṇa maṇindiẏa chattaṃ  $  ṇomi jiṇottamam ambuja-ṇettaṃ
text.15372: haraṃ huẏavahaṃ vā  $  hariṃ caümuhaṃ vā
text.15374: mahāpāva-bhīruṃ pi ekkalla-vīraṃ  $  kalā-bhāẏa-hīṇaṃ pi merūhi dhīraṃ
text.15375: vimuttaṃ pi muttāvali-saṇṇikāsaṃ  $  viṇiggantha-maggaṃ pi ganthāvaẏāsaṃ
text.15376: mahā-vīẏarāẏaṃ pi sīhāsaṇatthaṃ  $  a-bhūbhaṅguratthaṃ pi ṇaṭṭhāri-satthaṃ
text.15377: samāṇaṅgadhammaṃ pi devāhidevaṃ  $  jiīsā-vihīṇaṃ pi savvūḍha-sevaṃ
text.15378: aṇāẏappamāṇaṃ pi savva-ppasiddhaṃ  $  aṇantaṃ pi santaṃ aṇeẏatta-viddhaṃ
text.15379: malulitta-gattaṃ pi ṇiccāhiseẏaṃ  $  ajaḍḍaṃ pi loe ṇirāṇeẏa-ṇeẏaṃ
text.15380: surā-ṇāma-ṇāsaṃ pi ṇāṇā-suresaṃ  $  jaḍā-jūḍa-dhāraṃ pi dūrattha-kesaṃ
text.15381: amāẏā-virūvaṃ pi vikkhiṇṇa-sīsaṃ  $  saẏā-āgamillaṃ pi ṇiccaṃ adīsaṃ
text.15383: mahā-guruṃ vi ṇibbharaṃ  $  aṇiṭṭhiẏaṃ pi dummaraṃ
text.15384: paraṃ pi savva-vacchalaṃ  $  varaṃ pi ṇicca-kevalaṃ
text.15385: pahuṃ pi ṇippariggahaṃ  $  haraṃ pi duṭṭha-ṇiggahaṃ
text.15386: suhiṃ pi suṭṭhu-dūraẏaṃ  $  a-viggahaṃ pi sūraẏaṃ
text.15387: ṇirakkharaṃ pi vuddhaẏaṃ  $  amaccharaṃ pi kuddhaẏaṃ
text.15388: mahesaraṃ pi ṇiddhaṇaṃ  $  gaẏaṃ pi mukka-vandhaṇaṃ
text.15389: arūviẏaṃ pi sundaraṃ  $  a-vaḍḍhiẏaṃ pi dīharaṃ
text.15390: a-sāriẏaṃ pi vitthaẏaṃ  $  thiraṃ pi ṇicca-patthaẏaṃ"
text.15393: aggaĕ thuṇĕvi jiṇindahŏ  $  bhuvaṇāṇandahŏ  $  mahiẏalĕ jaṇṇu-jottu karĕvi
text.15394: ṇāsaggāṇiẏa-loaṇu  $  aṇimisa-joaṇu thiu  $  maṇĕ acalu jhāṇu dharĕvi
text.15399: to jāẏa volla valĕ rāhavahŏ  $  suggīvahŏ haṇuvahŏ jamvavahŏ
text.15400: somittihĕ aṅgahŏ aṅgaẏahŏ  $  sa-gavakkhahŏ taha gavaẏahŏ gaẏahŏ
text.15401: tārahŏ rambhahŏ bhāmaṇḍalahŏ  $  kumuẏahŏ kundahŏ ṇīlahŏ ṇalahŏ
text.15402: avarahu mi asesahũ kiṅkarahũ  $  ekkeṇa vuttu "laï kiṃ karahũ
text.15403: aṭṭhāhiĕ āhaü pariharĕvi  $  thiu santi-jiṇālaü païsarĕvi
text.15405: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vihīsaṇu viṇṇavaï  $  "sāhiẏa vahurūviṇi-vijja jaï
text.15406: to ṇa vi haũ ṇa vi tuhũ ṇa vi ẏa hari  $  vari ehaĕ avasarĕ ṇihaü ari
text.15408: cora-jāra-ahi-vaïrahũ  $  huavaha-ḍamarahũ  $  jo avaheri karei ṇaru
text.15409: so aïreṇa viṇāsaï  $  vasaṇu paẏāsaï  $  mūla-talukkhaü jema taru
text.15413: sakkeṇa vi kiẏa avaheri ciru  $  jaṃ vaddhāviu vīsaddha-siru
text.15414: taṃ khaü appāṇahŏ āṇiẏaü  $  ṇittihĕ ahiẏāru ṇa jāṇiẏaü
text.15415: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi sīrāuhu bhaṇaï  $  "jo riu paṇamantaü āhaṇaï
text.15416: so khattiẏa-kulĕ kalaṅku karaï  $  jo ghaĩ puṇu tavasi ṇa pariharaï
text.15417: tahŏ kiṃ pucchijjaï cārahaḍi  $  vari bhindaï ṇiẏa-sirĕ chāra-haḍi
text.15418: jettiu daṇu dujjaü saṃbhavaï  $  tettiu paharantahũ jasu bhamaï"
text.15419: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi kaṇṭaïẏaṅgaĕhĩ  $  rahu-taṇaü vuttu aṅgaṅgaĕhĩ
text.15420: "tā khohahũ jāma jhāṇu daliu"  $  maṇu harĕvi kumāra-seṇṇu caliu
text.15422: taṃ sa-vimāṇu sa-vāhaṇu  $  ukkhaẏa-paharaṇu  $  ṇiĕvi kumārahŏ taṇaü valu
text.15423: ṇisiẏara-ṇaẏaru paḍolliu  $  thiu paccolliu  $  mahaṇa-kālĕ ṇaṃ uvahi-jalu"
text.15430: appaṃparihūaü savvu jaṇu  $  sāhāru ṇa vandhaï taṭṭha-maṇu
text.15431: tahĩ avasarĕ mambhīsantu maü  $  saṇṇahĕvi dasāsahŏ pāsu gaü
text.15432: thiu aḍḍĕvi sāhaṇu appaṇaü  $  kiẏa-kālahŏ pheḍiu jampaṇaü
text.15433: mandoari antarĕ tāma thiẏa  $  "kiṃ rāvaṇa-ghosaṇa ṇa vi suiẏa
text.15434: jaṃ bhāvaï taṃ karantu a-ṇaü  $  ṇandīsaru jāma tāma abhaü"
text.15436: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi dūmiẏa-maṇu  $  āmelliẏa-raṇu  $  maü paẏaṭṭu appaṇaü gharu
text.15437: paviẏambhiẏa aṅgaṅgaẏa  $  matta mahāgaẏa  $  ṇāĩ païṭṭhā paüma-saru
text.15441: ṇavara paviẏambhamāṇehĩ dohĩ pi suggīva-puttehĩ  $  aṇṇāẏa-vantehĩ uggiṇṇa-khaggehĩ rekkārio rāvaṇo
text.15442: taha vi amaṇo ṇa khohaṃ gao savva-rāẏāhirāẏassa  $  ṇikkampamāṇassa taïlokka-cakkekkavīrassa sakkāriṇo
text.15447: garuẏa-uvasagga-vigghe samārambhie [e?]samuggiṇṇa-  $  ṇāṇāuhaṃ ruṭṭha-daṭṭhāharaṃ jakkha-seṇṇaṃ samuddhāiẏaṃ
text.15448: pharusa-vaẏaṇāhĩ hakkāra-ḍakkāra-phekkāra-huṅkāra-  $  bhīsāvaṇaṃ picchiūṇaṃ paṇaṭṭhā kaïndaddhaẏā (?)
text.15450: bhaggu kumārahũ sāhaṇu  $  galiẏa-pasāhaṇu  $  pacchalĕ laggaü jakkha-valu
text.15451: (ṇaṃ) ṇava-pāusĕ aï-mandahŏ  $  tārā-candahŏ  $  meha-samūhu ṇāĩ sa-jalu
text.15455: tahĩ avasarĕ jaṇiẏa-mahāhavĕṇa  $  jaṃ aṅghiu pujjiu rāhavĕṇa
text.15456: taṃ jakkha-seṇṇu seṇṇahŏ pavaru  $  thiu aggaĕ khagguggiṇṇa-karu
text.15457: "arĕ jakkhahŏ rakkhahŏ kiṅkarahŏ  $  jiha sakkahŏ tiha raṇĕ uttharahŏ
text.15458: valu vujjhahŏ jujjhahŏ āhaẏaṇĕ  $  pekkhantu surāsura thiẏa gaẏaṇĕ
text.15459: tā acchahũ rāmaṇa-rāmahu mi  $  samaraṅgaṇu amhahã tumhahu mi"
text.15461: "dummaṇusahŏ duṭṭhahŏ dummuhahŏ  $  jaṃ kiẏa dohāiṃ dahamuhahŏ
text.15462: taṃ so jji bhaṇesaï savvahu mi  $  tumhahã hari-vala-suggīvahu mi"
text.15464: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi āsaṅkiẏa  $  māṇa-kalaṅkiẏa  $  jakkha pariṭṭhiẏa muĕvi chalu
text.15465: puṇu vi samuṇṇaẏa-khaggā  $  pacchalĕ laggā  $  jāva patta riu rāma-valu
text.15470: "ahŏ ṇara-paramesara dāsarahi  $  jaï tuhu mi aṇitti ema karahi
text.15471: to hosaï kahŏ parihāsa puṇu  $  ṇiẏamatthu haṇantahũ kavaṇu guṇu"
text.15472: taṃ suṇĕvi vuttu ṇārāẏaṇĕṇa  $  "ĕu volliu kavaṇeṃ kāraṇĕṇa
text.15473: ahŏ ahŏ jakkhahŏ duccāriẏahŏ  $  duṭṭhahŏ corahŏ paraẏāriẏahŏ
text.15474: sāhejjaü dentahũ kavaṇu guṇu  $  kiṃ maĩ āruṭṭheṃ santi puṇu"
text.15475: taṃ garahiu devahũ cittĕ thiu  $  "saccaü amhehĩ ajuttu kiu
text.15476: saccaü viruẏāraü dahavaẏaṇu  $  ṇa samappaï para-kalatta-raẏaṇu"
text.15478: ema bhaṇĕvi sa-vilakkhĕhĩ  $  vuccaï jakkhĕhĩ  $  "hari avarāhu ekku khamahi
text.15479: aṇṇa vāra jaï āvahũ  $  muhu darisāvahũ  $  to sa ĩ bhu ĕhĩ savva damahi"
text.15481: puṇa vi paḍīvaĕhĩ  $  jiṇu jaẏakārĕvi vikkama-sārĕhĩ
text.15490: jā ṇa vi laṅghijjaï ravi-haehĩ  $  dahavatta-turaṅgama-bhaẏa-gaehĩ
text.15492: jahĩ paharĕ paharĕ osaraï dūru  $  vahu-sūrahũ uvari ṇa jāi sūru
text.15493: jahĩ rāmāṇaṇa-candehĩ candu  $  pīḍijjaï kijjaï teẏa-mandu
text.15494: jahĩ uṇhu ṇa ṇāvaï ahiṇaveṇa  $  vahu-puṇḍarīẏa-kiẏa-maṇḍaveṇa
text.15495: jahĩ pāusu kari-kara-sīẏarehĩ  $  uṭṭhanti ṇaïu dāṇojjharehĩ
text.15496: maṇi-avaṇihĕ turaẏa-khurehĩ paṃsu  $  vollaï ravikanta-pahāĕ haṃsu
text.15499: kiṃ ravi rikkha sasi  $  aṇṇa vi je jiẏanti vāvāreṃ
text.15508: cintāviẏa "kettahĕ paẏaĩ dehũ  $  maṇa-khohu dasāsahŏ kiha karehũ"
text.15509: kira candaṇa-chaḍa-maggeṇa janti  $  kaddama-bhaïẏaĕ ṇa paīsaranti
text.15510: kira phaliha-paheṇa samuccalanti  $  āẏāsāsaṅkaĕ puṇu valanti
text.15511: maragaẏa-vidduma-meiṇi ṇievi  $  paü denti ṇa "kiraṇāvali" bhaṇevi
text.15512: pekkhĕvi ālekkhima-sappa-saẏaĩ  $  "khajjesahũ" bhaṇĕvi ṇa dinti paẏaĩ
text.15514: puṇu gaẏa sasikanta-maṇi-ppaheṇa  $  osariẏa "vilesahũ kiṃ daheṇa"
text.15527: jaṃ vidduma-maragaẏa-kantiẏāhĩ  $  thiu gaẏaṇu va suradhaṇu pantiẏāhĩ
text.15528: jaṃ indaṇīla-mālā-masīĕ  $  ālihaï va disa-bhittīĕ tīĕ
text.15529: jahĩ pomarāẏa-maṇi-gaṇu vihāi  $  thiu ahiṇava-sañjhā-rāu ṇāĩ
text.15530: jahĩ sūrakanti-kheijjamāṇu  $  gaü uttaraesahŏ ṇāĩ bhāṇu
text.15544: dhāvanti ke vi ṇa karanti kheu  $  khambhehĩ ghiḍanti mellanti veu
text.15545: vahu-phalaha-silā-bhittihĩ bhiḍevi  $  saruhira-sira pariẏattanti ke vi
text.15546: kĕ vi indaṇīla-ṇīlehĩ jāẏa  $  kehi mi thiẏa tumhaĩ etthu āẏa
text.15547: jaccandha-līla kĕ vi dakkhavanti  $  uṭṭhanti paḍanti silĕhĩ bhiḍanti
text.15548: kĕ vi sūrakanta-kantīhĩ bhiṇṇa  $  vahu sūraĕ mellĕvi purĕ 'vaïṇṇa
text.15549: kĕ vi candakanta-kantehĩ jāẏa  $  muha-ẏandahŏ uppari ṇāĩ āẏa
text.15551: kĕ vi ālekkhima-kuñjarahŏ taṭṭha  $  kĕ vi sīhahũ kĕ vi paṇṇaẏahũ ṇaṭṭha
text.15553: ṇiggaẏa tahŏ gharahŏ  $  puṇu vi paḍīvā tehĩ ji vārĕhĩ
text.15562: cihurehĩ sihaṇḍi-olamvu bhāi  $  kurulĕhĩ indindira-vindu ṇāĩ
text.15563: bhaühĕhĩ aṇaṅga-dhaṇuhara-laẏa vva  $  ṇaẏaṇahĩ ṇīloppala-kāṇaṇaṃ va
text.15564: muha-vimvĕhĩ maẏalañchaṇa-valaṃ va  $  kala-vāṇihĩ kala-koila-kulaṃ va
text.15565: komala-vāhehĩ laẏāharaṃ va  $  pāṇihĩ rattuppala-saravaraṃ va
text.15566: ṇakkhĕhĩ keaï-sūī-thalaṃ va  $  sihiṇĕhĩ suvaṇṇa-ghaḍa-maṇḍalaṃ va
text.15568: tivalihĩ aṇaṅga-puri-khāiẏaṃ va  $  gujjhehĩ maẏaṇa-majjaṇa-haraṃ va
text.15569: ūrūhĩ taruṇa-kelī-vaṇaṃ va  $  calaṇaggĕhĩ pallava-kāṇaṇaṃ va
text.15571: haṃsa-ulu va gaï(e)hĩ  $  kuñjara-jūhu va vara-līlāhĩ
text.15572: cāva-valu va guṇĕhĩ  $  chaṇa-sasi-vimvu va saẏala-kalāhĩ
text.15579: thiu raẏaṇihĩ ṇiẏa-  $  hiẏaĕ guṇantu va
text.15594: kāu vi deviu  $  kāha vi ṇārihĩ
text.15598: halĕ dālimīĕ dālimaĩ dehi  $  vijjaüriĕ vijjaürāĩ lehi
text.15601: kusumiĕ kusumĕhĩ accaṇa karehi  $  maṇidīviĕ maṇi-dīvaü dharehi
text.15602: kappuriĕ ḍahĕ kappūra-dāli  $  viddumiĕ caḍāvahi viddumāli
text.15603: muttāvali lahu muttāvalīu  $  saṃcūrĕvi chuhu raṅgāvalīu
text.15604: maragaĕ maragaẏa-veihĕ caḍevi  $  sammajjaṇu karĕ kamalāĩ levi
text.15605: halĕ lavaliĕ candaṇa-chaḍaü dehi  $  gandhāvali gandhu laevi ehi
text.15606: kuṅkumalehiĕ laï ghusiṇa-sippi  $  ālāvaṇi ālāvehi kiṃ pi
text.15607: kiṇṇariĕ turiu kiṇṇaraü lehi  $  tilaẏāvali tilaẏa-paẏāĩ dehi"
text.15608: āẏaĕ līlaĕ acchanti jāva  $  āsaṇṇīhūa kumāra tā̃va
text.15619: uddālĕvi hatthahŏ akkha-suttu  $  dasasiru suggīva-sueṇa vuttu
text.15620: "ĕhu kāĩ rāẏa āḍhattu ḍambhu  $  thiu ṇiccalu ṇaṃ pāhāṇa-khambhu
text.15621: taü kavaṇu dhīru ko vā 'himāṇu  $  sā kavaṇa vijja iu kavaṇu jhāṇu
text.15622: uppāiẏa loẏahũ kāĩ bhanti  $  para-ṇāri laẏantahŏ kavaṇa santi
text.15623: kiṃ bhāṇukaṇṇa-indaï-duheṇa  $  ṇaü vollahi ekkeṇa vi muheṇa
text.15624: kiṃ lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ osarevi  $  thiu santihĕ bhavaṇu paīsarĕvi"
text.15626: āḍhattaü vandhahũ dharahũ lehũ  $  vicchārahũ dārahũ haṇahũ ṇehũ
text.15628: tahŏ anteurahŏ  $  bhaü uppaṇṇu bhaḍehĩ bhiḍantĕhĩ
text.15637: ka vi kaḍḍhiẏa ṇeura-calavalanti  $  saravara-lacchi va kamala-kkhalanti
text.15638: ka vi kaḍḍhiẏa rasaṇā-dāma levi  $  su-ṇihi vva bhuaṅgamu vasikarevi
text.15639: ka vi kaḍḍhiẏa tivaliu dakkhavanti  $  kāmāuri-parihaü pāẏaḍanti
text.15640: ka vi kaḍḍhiẏa bhajjaṇa-bhaẏahŏ janti  $  kisa-romāvali-khambhuddharanti
text.15641: ka vi kaḍḍhiẏa thaṇa-ẏalasuvvahanti  $  lāẏaṇṇa-vāri-pūrĕ va taranti
text.15642: ka vi kaḍḍhiẏa kara-kamalaĩ dhuṇanti  $  chappaẏa-riñcholi va mucchalanti(?)
text.15643: ka vi kaḍḍhiẏa savvahũ saraṇu janti  $  muttāvaliṃ pi kaṇṭhaĕ dharanti
text.15644: ka vi kaḍḍhiẏa "hā rāvaṇa" bhaṇanti  $  dīhara-bhuva-pañjarĕ païsaranti
text.15647: tāhã vivakkhiẏahũ  $  avaseṃ sūra ṇa honti sahejjā
text.15657: paramesara kiṃ ohaṭṭa-thāmu  $  kiṃ rāmaṇu aṇṇahŏ kahŏ vi ṇāmu
text.15658: kiṃ aṇṇeṃ sāhiu candahāsu  $  kiṃ aṇṇeṃ dhaṇaẏahŏ kiu viṇāsu
text.15659: kiṃ aṇṇeṃ vasikiu uddha-soṇḍu  $  vaṇa-hatthi tijagabhūsaṇu pacaṇḍu
text.15660: kiṃ aṇṇeṃ bhaggu kiẏanta-rāu  $  kiṃ aṇṇahŏ vasĕ suggīu jāu
text.15661: kiṃ aṇṇeṃ giri kaïlāsu deva  $  helaĕ jĕ tuliu jhinduvaü jeva
text.15662: kiṃ aṇṇeṃ ṇijjiu sahasakiraṇu  $  pheḍiu ṇalakuvvara-sakka-phuraṇu
text.15665: jaï tuhũ dahavaẏaṇu  $  to kiṃ amhahũ eha avatthā"
text.15669: to vi ṇa jhāṇahŏ  $  ṭāliu rāṇaü
text.15671: jogi va siddhihĕ  $  rāma va bhajjahŏ
text.15673: saṃkhuhiu ṇa laṅkāhivahŏ cittu  $  taṃ aṅgaü huavahu jiha palittu
text.15674: mandoẏari kaḍḍhiẏa macchareṇa  $  kappadduma-sāha va kuñjareṇa
text.15675: hariṇi va sīheṇa viruddhaeṇa  $  sasi-paḍima va rāhuṃ kuddhaeṇa
text.15676: uragindi va garuḍa-vihaṅgameṇa  $  logāṇi va pavara-jiṇāgameṇa
text.15677: paramesari to vi ṇa bhaẏahŏ jāi  $  ṇikkampa pariṭṭhiẏa dharaṇi ṇāĩ
text.15678: "re re jaṃ kiu mahu kesa-gāhu  $  aṇṇu vi mahaevihũ hiẏaẏa-ḍāhu
text.15679: taṃ pāva phalesaï paraĕ pāvu  $  dahagīu gilesaï valu jĕ sāvu"
text.15683: sahũ anteurĕṇa  $  paĩ mahaevi karami suggīvahŏ"
text.15691: jaṃ eva vi khohahŏ ṇa gaü rāu  $  taṃ vijjahĕ āsaṇa-kampu jāu
text.15692: āiẏa andhāraü jaü karanti  $  vahurūviṇi vahu-rūvaĩ dharanti
text.15693: thiẏa aggaĕ siddhahŏ siddhi jẽva  $  "kiṃ pesaṇu pahu" pabhaṇanti ẽva
text.15694: "kiṃ dijjaü vasumaï vasikarevi  $  kiṃ dijjaü disa-kari-thaṭṭu(?) dharevi
text.15695: kiṃ dijjaü phaṇi-maṇi-raẏaṇu levi  $  kiṃ dijjaü mandaru daramalevi
text.15696: kiṃ dijjaü suraṇandiṇi duhevi  $  kiṃ dijjaü jamu ṇiẏalĕhĩ chuhevi
text.15697: kiṃ dijjaü vandhĕvi amara-rāu  $  kiṃ kusumasarāuhu raï-sahāu
text.15698: kiṃ dijjaü dhaṇaẏahŏ taṇiẏa riddhi  $  kiṃ dijjaü savvovāẏa-siddhi
text.15700: sahũ devāsurĕhĩ  $  kiṃ taïlokku vi seva karāvami
text.15701: ṇavara ṇarāhivaï  $  ekkahŏ cakkavaïhĕ ṇa pahāvami"
text.15709: aṅgaṅgaẏa ṇaṭṭha païṭṭha seṇṇĕ  $  sampatta vatta kākuttha-kaṇṇĕ
text.15711: uppaṇṇa vijja ṇivvūḍhu dhīru  $  evahĩ ṇicintu tiẏasahu mi cīru
text.15712: ṇaü jāṇahũ hosaï eu keva  $  laï sīẏahĕ chaṇḍahi tatti deva"
text.15713: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi kumāru kuiu  $  khaẏa-kālĕ divāẏaru ṇāĩ uiu
text.15714: "ṇāsahŏ ṇāsahŏ jaï ṇāhi satti  $  haũ lakkhaṇu ekku karemi tatti
text.15715: kahŏ taṇiẏa vijja kahŏ taṇiẏa satti  $  kallaĕ pekkhesahŏ tahŏ asanti
text.15716: maĩ dasaraha-ṇandaṇĕ kiẏa-païjjĕ  $  vitthahĕ atthāhĕ alaṅghaṇijjĕ
text.15727: tahŏ majjhĕ mahā-siri-māṇaṇeṇa  $  mandoẏari diṭṭha dasāṇaṇeṇa
text.15728: chuḍu chuḍu āmelliẏa aṅgaeṇa  $  ṇaṃ kamaliṇi matta-mahāgaeṇa
text.15729: ṇaṃ kutavasi-vāṇi jiṇāgameṇa  $  ṇaṃ ṇāiṇi garuḍa-vihaṅgameṇa
text.15730: ṇaṃ diṇaẏara-soha varāhaveṇa  $  ṇaṃ pavara-mahāḍaï huavaheṇa
text.15732: "ekkellaü jehaü keṇa sahiu  $  aṇṇu vi vahurūviṇi-vijja-sahiu
text.15733: kiu jehĩ ṇiẏamviṇi eu kammu  $  laï vaṭṭaï tahŏ ettaḍaü jammu
text.15734: jaï maṇusa honti to kāĩ etthu  $  ḍhukkanti pariṭṭhiu ṇiẏamĕ jetthu
text.15736: jeṇa maraṭṭiĕṇa  $  sīsĕ tuhāraĕ lāiẏa hatthā
text.15737: kallaĕ tāsu dhaṇĕ  $  pekkhu kāĩ dakkhavami avatthā"
text.15745: ṇavara pahuṇo calantassa diṇṇā mahāṇanda-bherī maündā daḍī daddurā
text.15746: paḍaha ṭivilā ẏa ḍhaḍḍhaḍḍharī jhallarī bhambha bhambhīsa kaṃsāla-kolāhalā
text.15747: murava tiriḍikkiẏā kāhalā ḍhaḍḍhiẏā saṅkha dhummukka ḍhakkā huḍukkā varā
text.15748: tuṇava paṇavekkapāṇi tti evaṃ va sijjhevi (?) sesā uṇā(?ṇo) keṇa te vujjhiẏā
text.15749: kahi mi caliẏaṃ calanteṇa anteuraṃ thora-muttāvalī-hāra-keūra-kañcī-kalāvehĩ
text.15756: ṇavara pisuṇo jaṇo taṃ ca mā pecchahīmīĕ saṅkāĕ pāẏamvuehĩ va chāẏantaẏaṃ
text.15765: vasumaï vasikarĕvi  $  ṇāĩ sa ẏaṃ bhu va ṇāhiva-ṇandaṇu
text.15772: païsĕvi bhavaṇu bhicca avaẏajjiẏa  $  ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-ṇilaẏahŏ turiẏa visajjiẏa
text.15773: kaïvaẏa-sevahĩ sahiu dahammuhu  $  gaü majjaṇa-bhavaṇahŏ savaḍammuhu
text.15774: osāriẏaĩ asesāharaṇaĩ  $  duddiṇĕ diṇaẏareṇa ṇaṃ kiraṇaĩ
text.15775: laïẏa potti risaheṇa daẏā iva  $  gujjhāvaraṇasīla māẏā iva
text.15776: saṇha-sutta vāẏaraṇa-kahā iva  $  pallava-gahiẏa mahā-vaṇarāi va
text.15779: tāva vimaddiu jāva pahaggaü  $  savvaṅgiu pāseu valaggaü
text.15782: ṇaṃ tuṭṭheṇa sameṇa  $  kaḍḍhĕvi diṇṇaĩ muttāhalaĩ
text.15786: puṇu vāraṅgaṇehĩ uvvaṭṭiu  $  ṇaṃ kari kariṇi-karehĩ vihaṭṭiu
text.15787: gaü cāmiẏara-doṇi paramesaru  $  ṇaṃ kaṇiẏāri-kusuma-thali mahuaru
text.15788: vārihĕ majjhĕ païṭṭhu va kuñjaru  $  dappaṇa-sirihĕ va chāẏā-ṇaravaru
text.15789: sarasihĕ majjhĕ va paḍimā-sasaharu  $  puvva-disahĕ va taruṇa-divāẏaru
text.15790: gandhāmalaĕhĩ cihura pasāhiẏa  $  vaïri va bhañjĕvi vandhĕvi sāhiẏa
text.15792: phaliha-silā-maṇiẏahĕ (?) thiu chajjaï  $  hima-siharolliĕ ṇaṃ ghaṇu gajjaï
text.15793: paṇḍu-silahĕ va kāma-kari-kesari  $  vahula-pakkhu puṇṇivahĕ va uppari
text.15802: kahi mi su-sarehĩ gāẏaṇĕhĩ jhaṅkāriẏaṃ  $  maṅgalaṃ vandi-loeṇa uccāriẏaṃ
text.15803: kahi mi vara-vaṃsa-vīṇā-pavīṇā ṇarā  $  ganti gandhavva vijjāharā kiṇṇarā
text.15805: kahi mi sirikhaṇḍa-kappūra-katthūriẏā-  $  kuṅkumuppaṅka-paṅkeṇa ekkekkamo āhao
text.15806: kahi mi ahiseẏa-siṅgambu-dhārā-ṇivāẏa-  $  ppavāheṇa dūrāhĩ ekkekkamo siñcio
text.15807: kahi mi ṇaḍa-chatta-phamphāva-vandehĩ  $  sohagga-sūrāṇa ṇāmāvali se samuccāriẏā
text.15814: ka vi ahisiñcaï kañcaṇa-kumbheṃ  $  lacchi purandaraṃ va vimalambheṃ
text.15815: ka vi ruppima-kalaseṃ jala-gāheṃ  $  puṇṇiva sasim iva joṇhā-vāheṃ
text.15816: ka vi maragaẏa-kalaseṇa ura-tthalu  $  ṇaliṇi va ṇaliṇa-uḍeṇa mahīẏalu
text.15817: ka vi kuṅkuma-kalaseṇāẏamveṃ  $  sañjha va divasu divāẏara-vimveṃ
text.15818: āẏaĕ līlaĕ jaẏasiri-māṇaṇu  $  jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṃ ṇhāu dasāṇaṇu
text.15819: vimala-sarīru jāu cakkesaru  $  ṇaṃ uppaṇṇa-ṇāṇu titthaṅkaru
text.15820: diṇṇaĩ taṇu-luhaṇāĩ su-saṇhaĩ  $  khala-kuṭṭaṇi-vaẏaṇā iva laṇhaĩ
text.15821: melliẏa potti jiṇeṇa va duggaï  $  moāviẏa kesāĩ jaluggaĩ
text.15822: leppiṇu seẏamvaru vi sahāvaï (?)  $  veḍhiu sīsu vaïri-puru ṇāvaï
text.15829: gampiṇu deva-bhavaṇu jiṇu vandĕvi  $  vāra-vāra appāṇaü ṇindĕvi
text.15830: bhoẏaṇa-bhūmi païṭṭhu pahāṇaü  $  kañcaṇa-vīḍhĕ pariṭṭhiu rāṇaü
text.15831: javaṇi bhamāḍiẏa asaï va dhuttĕhĩ  $  avuha-maï va vāẏaraṇahŏ suttĕhĩ
text.15832: gaṅga va saẏara-suĕhĩ ṇiẏa-ṇāsaĕhĩ  $  mahakaï-kitti va sīsa-sahāsĕhĩ
text.15833: diṇṇaĩ ruppima-kañcaṇa-thālaĩ  $  ṇaṃ supurisa-cittaĩ va visālaĩ
text.15834: vitthāriu pariẏalu pahu-keraü  $  jaraḍhāiccu va kanti-jaṇeraü
text.15835: saravaro vva saẏavatta-visaṭṭaü  $  paṭṭaṇa-païsāru va vahu-vaṭṭaü
text.15836: uvahi va sippi-saṅkha-sandohaü  $  vara-juvaï-ẏaṇu va kañcī-sohaü
text.15843: dhūmavatti paripiĕvi pahāṇaü  $  bhuñjĕvi aṇṇa-vāsĕ thiu rāṇaü
text.15844: malaẏaruheṇa pasāhiu appaü  $  gandhu laẏantu ṇāĩ thiu chappaü
text.15845: puṇu tamvolu diṇṇu caüraṅgaü  $  ṇaḍa-vekkhaṇaü ṇāĩ vahu-raṅgaü
text.15846: puṇu diṇṇaĩ amvaraĩ amollaĩ  $  jiṇa-vaẏaṇāĩ va abbharuhullaĩ
text.15847: veṅgi-visaẏa-mihuṇaĩ va suandhaĩ  $  ahorattāĩ va ghaḍiẏā-vandhaĩ
text.15848: muddhaṅgaṇa-cittāĩ va maüaĩ  $  duṭṭhakkura-dāṇāĩ va chaüaĩ
text.15849: dīhaĩ dujjaṇa-duvvaẏaṇāĩ va  $  pihulaĩ gaṅgā-ṇaï-puliṇāĩ va
text.15850: virahiẏaĩ va vahu-kāmāvatthaĩ  $  vandiṇa-jaṇa-vandaĩ va ṇiẏatthaĩ
text.15863: giri vva tuṅga-gattao  $  mahaṇṇaü vva mattao
text.15864: ghaṇo vva bhūri-ṇīsaṇo  $  jamo vva suṭṭhu bhīsaṇo
text.15865: maṇo vva lola-veẏao  $  ravi vva ugga-teẏao
text.15867: savvāharaṇu ṇarindu  $  tahĩ kasaṇa-mahaggaĕ caḍiu kiha
text.15872: jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṃ sattu-khaẏāṇaṇu  $  sīẏahĕ pāsu paẏaṭṭu dasāṇaṇu
text.15873: vahurūviṇi-rūvaĩ bhāvantaü  $  khaṇĕ vāsaru khaṇĕ ṇisi dāvantaü
text.15874: khaṇĕ candima khaṇĕ mehandhāraü  $  khaṇĕ vāoli-dhūli-jaladhāraü
text.15876: khaṇĕ pāusu hemantu uṇhālaü  $  khaṇĕ gaẏaṇa-ẏalu saẏalu sama-jālaü
text.15878: taṃ tehaü ṇievi sasi-muhiẏaĕ  $  tiẏaḍa papucchiẏa jaṇaẏahŏ duhiẏaĕ
text.15879: "eu mahantu kāĩ accariẏaü  $  kiṃ keṇa vi jagu uvasaṅghariẏaü"
text.15882: āvaï laggaü ehu  $  taü vaẏaṇu ṇihālaü dahavaẏaṇu"
text.15886: taṃ ṇisuṇevi mahāsaï kampiẏa  $  vāhu bharanti cakkhu dara jampiẏa
text.15887: "māĕ ṇa jāṇahũ kāĩ karesaï  $  sīlu mahāraü kiṃ maïlesaï"
text.15889: sīẏahĕ pāsu paḍhukkiu sarahasu  $  ṇāvaï vammahasarahĕ puṇavvasu
text.15890: ṇāvaï dīha-samāsu vihattihĕ  $  ṇāvaï chandu deva-gāittihĕ
text.15891: vollāviẏa "vollahi paramesari  $  homi ṇa homi dasāṇaṇa-kesari
text.15892: suaü ṇa suaü mahāraü ḍhaḍḍhasu  $  diṭṭhu ṇa diṭṭhu viuvvaṇa-sāhasu
text.15893: evahĩ kiṃ karanti te hari-vala  $  ṇala-suggīva-ṇīla-bhāmaṇḍala
text.15895: aṇṇa vi je je duṭṭha  $  te te mahu savva samāvaḍiẏa
text.15896: evahĩ kahĩ ṇāsanti  $  sāraṅga va sīhahŏ kamĕ paḍiẏa
text.15901: rāmu tuhāraü jama-pahĕ lāẏami  $  indaï kumbhakaṇṇu mellāvami
text.15902: jo visallu kiu kaha vi visallaĕ  $  so vi bhiḍantu ṇa cukkaï kallaĕ
text.15903: jīviẏāsa tahũ kerī chaṇḍahi  $  caḍu vimāṇĕ appāṇaü maṇḍahi
text.15904: sa-raẏaṇa sa-ṇihi pihimi paripālahi  $  jāhũ meru jiṇaharaĩ ṇihālahi
text.15905: pekkhu samudda dīva sari saravara  $  ṇandaṇa-vaṇaĩ maha-dduma mahihara
text.15906: aha ettaḍaü kālu jaṃ cukkī  $  taṃ mahu vaẏa-cārahaḍi gurukkī
text.15907: jaï vi tilottima rambhāevī  $  jā ṇa samicchaï sā ṇa laevī
text.15908: vāra-vāra teṃ taĩ abbhatthami  $  daẏa kari anteuru avahatthami
text.15909: tuhũ jĕ ekka mahaeviẏa vuccahi  $  cāmara-gāhiṇīhĩ mā muccahi
text.15911: suravara seva karantu  $  ghaṇa chaḍaü dintu purĕ païsarahi
text.15912: lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ tatti  $  duvvuddhi va dūreṃ pariharahi"
text.15918: jāsu ima i evaḍḍaĩ cindhaĩ  $  vahurūviṇi-vahu-rūvaĩ siddhaĩ
text.15919: aṇṇa i suravara seva karāviẏa  $  vandi-vinda kaluṇaĩ kandāviẏa
text.15920: so kiṃ maĩ ṇa lei piu ṇa haṇaï"  $  āsaṅkevi devi puṇu pabhaṇaï
text.15921: "dahamuha bhuvaṇa-viṇiggaẏa-ṇāmeṃ  $  khaṇu mi ṇa jiẏami maranteṃ rāmeṃ
text.15922: jetthu paīvu tetthu siha ṇajjaï  $  jetthu aṇaṅgu tetthu raï jujjaï
text.15923: jetthu saṇehu tetthu paṇaẏañjali  $  jetthu paẏaṅgu tetthu kiraṇāvali
text.15925: jahĩ sasaharu tahĩ joṇha  $  jahĩ parama-dhammu tahĩ jīva-daẏa
text.15926: jahĩ rāhavu tahĩ sīẏa"  $  sā ema bhaṇeppiṇu muccha gaẏa
text.15930: muccha ṇieppiṇu rahuvaï-ghariṇihĕ  $  kari osariu va pāsahŏ kariṇihĕ
text.15932: maĩ pāveṇa kāĩ kiu ehaü  $  jeṃ vicchoiu mihuṇu sa-ṇehaü
text.15933: ko vi ṇa maĩ sarisaü viruvāraü  $  dūhaü dummuhu dukkiẏa-gāraü
text.15934: dujjaṇu duṭṭhu durāsu dullakkhaṇu  $  ku-purisu manda-bhaggu a-viẏakkhaṇu
text.15936: ṇiddaü para-kalatta-santāvaü  $  vari jalaẏaru thalaẏaru vaṇa-sāvaü
text.15937: vari pasu vari vihaṅgu kimi kīḍaü  $  ṇaü amhārisu jaga-paripīḍaü
text.15939: vari tiṇu vari pāhāṇu  $  vari loha-piṇḍu vari sukka-taru
text.15940: ṇaü ṇigguṇu vaẏa-hīṇu  $  māṇusu uppaṇṇu mahīhĕ bharu
text.15944: ahŏ ahŏ dārā paribhava-gārā  $  kaẏali va savvaṅgiu ṇīsārā
text.15945: cālaṇi vva kevala-mala-gāhiṇi  $  sari va kuḍila heṭṭhāmuha-vāhiṇi
text.15946: pāusa-kuhiṇi va dūsañcāriṇi  $  kumuiṇi vva gahavaï-uvagāriṇi
text.15947: kamaliṇi vva paṅkeṇa ṇa muccaï  $  maṇu dārei dāra teṃ vuccaï
text.15948: vaṇiẏa vaṇei sarīru samattaü  $  gaṇiẏa gaṇei asesu viḍhattaü
text.15949: daïẏahŏ daïu lei teṃ daïẏā  $  paru tiviheṇa teṇa tiẏamaïẏā
text.15950: dhaṇiẏa dhaṇei appu avaẏāreṃ  $  jāẏa jāi ṇījantī jāreṃ
text.15951: ku vasundhari tahĩ māri kumārī  $  ṇā ṇaru tāsu aritteṃ ṇārī
text.15953: vaṭṭaï suravaï jema  $  vandheppiṇu lakkhaṇu rāmu raṇĕ
text.15954: demi vihāṇaĕ sīẏa  $  saccaü parisujjhami jema jaṇĕ"
text.15958: ema bhaṇeppiṇu gaü ṇiẏa-gehahŏ  $  anteurahŏ pavaḍḍhiẏa-ṇehahŏ
text.15959: rāẏahaṃsu ṇaṃ haṃsī-jūhahŏ  $  ṇaṃ gaẏavaru gaṇiẏāri-samūhahŏ
text.15960: ṇaṃ maẏalañchaṇu tārā-vandahŏ  $  ṇaṃ dhuvagāu ṇaliṇi-maẏarandahŏ
text.15961: paṇaïṇīu paṇaeṃ paṇavantaü  $  māṇiṇīu saĩ sammāṇantaü
text.15964: sīẏa vi ṇiẏa-jīviẏahŏ aṇiṭṭhiẏa  $  ṇaṃ dasasirahŏ siratti samuṭṭhiẏa
text.15965: tāva ṇihāẏa paḍiẏa mahi kampiẏa  $  "ṇaṭṭha laṅka" ṇahĕ deva pajampiẏa
text.15967: "dahamuha mūḍhaü kāĩ  $  para-ṇāri ramantahŏ kavaṇu suhu
text.15968: ṇacchahi suravaï jeva  $  ṇiẏa-rajju sa iṃ bhu ñjantu tuhũ"
text.15976: anteuru païsaraï  $  karaï raẏaṇi saĩ bhoggĕ āẏaru
text.15977: tā tāḍiẏa caü-pahari  $  uaẏa-siharĕ uṭṭhiu divāẏaru
text.15981: tahĩ avasarĕ pakkhāliẏa-ṇaẏaṇu  $  atthāṇĕ pariṭṭhiu dahavaẏaṇu
text.15983: ṇaṃ kesari ṇaharāruṇa-gahiu  $  ṇaṃ gahavaï tārāẏaṇa-sahiu
text.15984: ṇaṃ diṇaẏaru pasariẏa-kara-ṇiẏaru  $  ṇaṃ vipphāliẏa-jalu maẏaraharu
text.15985: ṇaṃ suravaï sura-pariveḍḍhiẏaü  $  toḍantu karaggeṃ dāḍhiẏaü
text.15987: suẏa-bhāẏara-paribhaü sambharevi  $  bhaü jīviu rajju vi pariharevi
text.15990: sajjaṇa-dujjaṇahã jaṇantu bhaü  $  phuriẏāharu āuha-sāla gaü
text.15999: "mā ṇāsaü sundaru purisa-raẏaṇu  $  jaï kaha vi tuhāraü karaï vaẏaṇu
text.16000: to pariacchāvahi vuddhi devi  $  ālāvĕhĩ tehĩ paẏaṭṭa devi
text.16001: vihaḍapphaḍa pāsu dasāṇaṇāsu  $  hari-bhaĕṇa kareṇu va vāraṇāsu
text.16002: ṇaṃ saï-mahaevi purandarāsu  $  ṇaṃ raï sarasuttha-dhaṇuddharāsu
text.16003: paṇaveppiṇu kappiṇu paṇaẏa-kou  $  darisanti aṃsu-jalu thovu thovu
text.16004: pabhaṇaï "paramesara kāĩ mūḍhu  $  mohandha-kūvĕ kiṃ deva chūḍhu
text.16006: ku-sarīrahŏ kāraṇĕ jāṇaïhĕ  $  mā ṇivaḍahi ṇaraẏa-mahāṇaïhĕ
text.16007: laï vūhi kim icchahi puhaïvaï  $  kiṃ homi suraṅgaṇa lacchi raï"
text.16013: kiṃ sīẏaĕ kiṃ raïĕ  $  paĩ vi kāĩ kuvalaẏa-dalacchiĕ
text.16016: lakkhaṇĕ puṇu mi satti saṃcārami  $  aṅgaṅgaẏa jamaüri païsārami
text.16019: vāruṇu bhāmaṇḍalĕ bhaẏa-bhīsaṇĕ  $  dhagadhagantu aggeu vihīsaṇĕ
text.16022: tāra-suseṇa demi vali bhūẏahũ  $  avara vi ṇemi pāsu jama-dūẏahũ
text.16024: jasu indādeva vi āṇakara  $  dāsi vva kiẏañjali sa-dhara dhara
text.16025: so jaï ārūsami dahavaẏaṇu  $  to hari-vala saṇḍha kavaṇu gahaṇu"
text.16034: aṇṇa vi vahu-dukkha-jaṇerāĩ  $  cariẏaĩ haṇuvantahŏ kerāĩ
text.16035: paĩ rāvaṇa kāĩ ṇa diṭṭhāĩ  $  hiẏavaĕ sallaĩ va païṭṭhāĩ
text.16036: ajja vi acchanti mahantāĩ  $  dujjaṇa-vaẏaṇa vva duhantāĩ
text.16037: aṇṇa i ṇala-ṇīla keṇa sahiẏa  $  raṇĕ hattha-pahattha jehĩ vahiẏa
text.16038: rahuvaïhĕ ṇihāliu keṇa muhu  $  cha-vvāra vi-rahu jeṃ kiẏaü tuhũ
text.16039: aṅgaṅgaehĩ kira ko gahaṇu  $  kiu tehi mi mahu kesa-ggahaṇu
text.16051: "jaï aṇṇeṃ keṇa vi vuttu eva  $  to siru pāḍami tāla-halu jema
text.16052: tuhũ ghaĩ paṇaïṇi paṇaeṇa cukka  $  osaru pāsahŏ mā puraü ḍhukka
text.16053: kiṇṇa karami sandhi tahĩ jĕ kālĕ  $  khara-dūsaṇa-raṇĕ haẏa-koṭṭavālĕ
text.16056: evahĩ puṇu dūsanthavaü kajju  $  ekkantaru tāha mi mahu mi ajju
text.16058: evahĩ tuha vaẏaṇĕhĩ vibhava-jua  $  vihĩ gaïhĩ samappami jaṇaẏa-sua
text.16059: jima lakkhaṇa-rāmahĩ bhaggaĕhĩ  $  jima mahu pāṇĕhĩ mi viṇiggaĕhĩ"
text.16064: tūraĩ apphāliẏaĩ  $  diṇṇa saṅkha ubbhiẏa mahaddhaẏa
text.16065: sajjiẏa raha jutta haẏa  $  sāri-sajja kiẏa danti dujjaẏa
text.16069: tuṅga-rahaṅgu ṇahĕ jjĕ ṇa māiu  $  vīẏaü mandaru ṇaṃ uppāiu
text.16070: tahĩ gaẏavara-sahāsu jotteppiṇu  $  dasa sahāsa paẏa-rakkha kareppiṇu
text.16071: jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṃ caḍiu dasāṇaṇu  $  ṇaṃ giri-siharovari pañcāṇaṇu
text.16072: dahahĩ muhehĩ bhaẏaṅkaru dahamuhu  $  bhuvaṇa-kosu ṇaṃ jaliu disā-muhu
text.16073: viviha-vāhu vivihukkhaẏa-paharaṇu  $  ṇāĩ viuvvaṇĕ thiu sura-vāraṇu
text.16074: dasa-viha loẏa-pāla maṇĕ jhāĕvi  $  daïveṃ mukka ṇāĩ uppāĕvi
text.16075: bhuvaṇa-bhaẏaṅkaru kahŏ vi ṇa bhāvaï  $  daṇḍu jameṇa visajjiu ṇāvaï
text.16078: purĕ (?) sāẏarĕ raha-vohittha-kaü  $  paravala-paratīrahŏ ṇāĩ gaü
text.16084: kaṇṭaïeṃ rāvaṇĕṇa  $  urĕ ṇa mantu saṇṇāhu parihiu
text.16087: pahilaĕ karĕ dhaṇuharu saru vīẏaĕ  $  gaẏahũ kaẏanta gaẏāsaṇi taïẏaĕ
text.16088: saṅkhu caütthaĕ pañcamĕ aḍḍaü  $  chaṭṭheṃ asi sattamĕ vasuṇandaü
text.16089: aṭṭhamĕ citta-daṇḍu ṇavamaĕ halu  $  jhasu dasameẏārasamaĕ savvalu
text.16090: bhīsaṇu bhiṇḍimālu vārahamaĕ  $  cakku asaṅku thakku terahamaĕ
text.16091: pattu mahantu kontu caüdahamaĕ  $  satti bhaẏaṅkara paṇṇārahamaĕ
text.16092: solahamaĕ tisūlu aï-bhīsaṇu  $  sattārahamaĕ kaṇaü dudarisaṇu
text.16093: aṭṭhārahamaĕ moggaru dāruṇu  $  eguṇavīsamĕ ghaṇu ghusiṇāruṇu
text.16094: vīsamae musuṇḍhi uggāmiu  $  kāleṃ kāla-daṇḍu ṇaṃ bhāmiu
text.16096: vīsahi mi bhua(daṇḍe)hĩ vīsāuhĕhĩ  $  dasahi mi bhiuḍi-bhaẏaṅkara-muhĕhĩ
text.16097: bhīsāvaṇu rāvaṇu jāu kiha  $  sahũ gahĕhĩ kaẏantu viruddhu jiha
text.16102: dasa-bhālahĩ tilaẏa dasa  $  dasa-sirehĩ dasa maüḍa pajaliẏa
text.16103: dahahi mi kuṇḍala-juĕhĩ  $  kaṇṇa-juala sukaüla(?) muhaliẏa
text.16106: paḍhama-vaẏaṇu khaẏa-sūra-sama-ppahu  $  sindūrāruṇu suraha mi dūsahu
text.16109: vaẏaṇu caütthaü vuha-muha-bhāsuru  $  pañcamaeṇa saĩ jĕ ṇaṃ sura-guru
text.16111: sattamu kasaṇu saṇicchara-bhīsaṇu  $  danturu viẏaḍa-dāḍhu duddarisaṇu
text.16112: aṭṭhamu rāhu-vaẏaṇu vikarālaü  $  ṇavamaü dhūmakeu dhūmālaü
text.16116: vahu-kaṇṭhaü vahu-karu vi vahu-paü  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṭṭa-purisu rasa-bhāva-gaü
text.16124: "deva deva ṇaṃ ṇaṃ ĕhu rahĕ thiu rāvaṇu"
text.16125: "kiṃ giri-siharaĩ ṇahĕ dīsirāĩ"  $  "ṇaṃ ṇaṃ āẏaĩ dasasira-sirāĩ"
text.16134: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  loẏaṇaĩ virillĕvi takkhaṇĕṇa
text.16135: avaloiu rāvaṇu maccharĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ rāsi-gaeṇa saṇiccharĕṇa
text.16145: bhāmaṇḍalu akkhohaṇi-sahāsu  $  saṇṇahĕvi ḍhukku lakkhaṇahŏ pāsu
text.16148: tīsakkhohaṇi-valu ahiẏa-māṇi  $  rahĕ caḍiu vihīsaṇu sūla-pāṇi
text.16149: tīsahĩ dahimuhu tīsahĩ mahindu  $  vīsahĩ suseṇu vīsahĩ jĕ kundu
text.16150: solahahĩ kumuu caüdahahĩ saṅkhu  $  vārahahĩ gavaü aṭṭhahĩ gavakkhu
text.16151: candoẏara-suu sattahĩ sahāu  $  suu vālihĕ tehattarihĩ āu
text.16153: saṇṇahĕvi pāsu ḍhukkaĩ valahŏ  $  akkhohaṇi-vīsa-saẏaĩ valahŏ
text.16154: viraevi vūhu saṃcalliẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ uvahi-muhaĩ utthalliẏaĩ
text.16159: cindhāĩ samubbhiẏaĩ  $  laïẏa kavaẏa kiẏa hei-saṅgaha
text.16160: gaẏa-ghaḍaü pacoiẏaü  $  mukka turaẏa vāhiẏa mahāraha
text.16161: rāma-seṇṇu raṇa-rahasiu kahi mi ṇa māiu
text.16162: jagu gilevi ṇaṃ para-valu gilahũ padhāiu
text.16173: raẏa-ṇiẏaru samuṭṭhiu jhatti kiha  $  ṇiẏa-kulu maïlantu du-puttu jiha
text.16179: ahava vi mucchāviẏahĕ  $  andhaẏāru jīu vva melliu
text.16184: ucchaliu mandu maẏarandu ṇāĩ  $  raẏa-ṇihĕṇa va ṇahahŏ dharitti jāi
text.16185: uḍḍaï va samara-paḍa-vāsacuṇṇu  $  ṇāsaï va so jjĕ rahu turaẏa-chaṇṇu
text.16186: vārei va raṇu viṇṇi vi valāhã  $  sāiu dei va vaccha-tthalāhã
text.16187: maïlei va vaẏaṇaĩ ṇaravarāhã  $  āruhaï va upparĕ rahavarāhã
text.16188: majjaï va maeṇa mahā-gaẏāhã  $  ṇaccaï va kaṇṇa-tālehĩ tāva (?hã)
text.16189: vīsamaï va chatta-dhaĕhĩ caḍevi  $  tavaï va gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ ṇivvaḍevi
text.16191: pasarantuṭṭhantu mahantu raü  $  lakkhijjaï kavilaü kavvuraü
text.16192: mahi-maḍaü gilantahŏ sa-rahasahŏ  $  ṇaṃ kesa-bhāru raṇa-rakkhasahŏ
text.16196: so ṇa sandaṇu so ṇa māẏaṅgu
text.16197: ṇa turaṅgamu ṇa vi ẏa dhaü  $  ṇāẏavattu jaṃ ṇaü kalaṅkiu
text.16198: para ṇimmalu āhaẏaṇĕ  $  bhaḍahũ cittu maïlĕvi ṇa sakkiu
text.16200: tahi mi ke vi paharanti sa-sāhukkāraü
text.16201: kehi mi kari-kumbhaĩ paramaṭṭhaĩ  $  ṇaṃ saṅgāma-sirihĕ thaṇavaṭṭaĩ
text.16202: kehi mi laïẏaĩ ṇara-sira-pavaraĩ  $  ṇaṃ jaẏalacchi-varaṅgaṇa-camaraĩ
text.16203: kehi mi hiẏaĩ valā riu-chattaĩ  $  ṇaṃ jaẏasiri-līlā-saẏavattaĩ
text.16204: kehi mi cakkhu-pasaru alahantĕhĩ  $  pahariu vālāluñci karantĕhĩ
text.16205: keṇa vi khagga-laṭṭhi pariẏaḍḍḥiẏa  $  raṇa-rakkhasahŏ jīha ṇaṃ kaḍḍhiẏa
text.16206: keṇa vi kari-kumbhatthalu phāḍiu  $  ṇaṃ raṇa-bhavaṇa-vāru ugghāḍiu
text.16207: katthaï musumūriẏa asi-dhārĕhĩ  $  mottiẏa-danturu hasiẏaü aharĕhĩ
text.16208: katthaï ruhira-pavāhiṇi dhāvaï  $  jāu mahāhaü pāusu ṇāvaï
text.16211: pajjalaï valaï dhūmāi raṇu  $  ṇaṃ juga-khaẏa-kālĕ kāla-vaẏaṇu
text.16220: lakkhijjaï pallaṭṭantu reṇu  $  raṇa-vasahahŏ ṇaṃ romantha-pheṇu
text.16221: somittihĕ rāmahŏ rāvaṇāsu  $  ṇaṃ surĕhĩ visajjiu kusuma-vāsu
text.16222: raṇaevihĕ ṇaṃ suravahu-jaṇeṇa  $  dhūmohu diṇṇu ṇaha-bhāẏaṇeṇa
text.16223: sara-ṇiẏara-ṇirantara-jajjaraṅgu  $  ṇaṃ dhūlihovi ṇahu paḍahũ laggu
text.16224: saẏam eva sūra-kara-kheiu vva  $  tisiu vva suṭṭhu pāseiu vva
text.16225: jalu piẏaï va gaẏa-maẏa-dahĕ atthāhĕ  $  ṇhāï va soṇiẏa-vāhiṇi-pavāhĕ
text.16226: siñcaï va kumbhi-kara-sīẏarehĩ  $  vijjijjaï vva cala-cāmarehĩ
text.16227: ṇaṃ sāvarāhu asivara-karāhã  $  kama-kamalĕhĩ ṇivaḍaï ṇaravarāhã
text.16229: muaü va paharaṇa-saẏa-salliẏaü  $  daḍḍhu va kovaggihĕ ghalliẏaü
text.16230: sahasatti samujjalu jāu raṇu  $  khala-virahiu ṇaṃ sajjaṇa-vaẏaṇu
text.16237: raha rahāhã ṇara ṇarahũ turaṅga turaṅgahũ
text.16239: ko vi bhaḍahŏ bhaḍu bhiḍĕvi ṇa icchaï  $  sagga-gamaṇu sahũ surĕhĩ paḍicchaï
text.16240: ko vi sarāūriẏa-karu dhāvaï  $  raṇa-vahu-avaruṇḍantaü ṇāvaï
text.16241: kāsu i vāhu-daṇḍu vāṇaggeṃ  $  ṇiu bhuaṅgu ṇaṃ garuḍa-vihaṅgeṃ
text.16242: kāsu i vāṇa ṇirantara laggā  $  paḍiva ṇa devi ṇa keṇa vi bhaggā
text.16243: ṇigguṇa jaï vi dhamma-paricattā  $  te ji vandhu je avasarĕ pattā
text.16244: ṇaccaï kahi mi ruṇḍu raṇa-bhūmihĕ  $  ṇīriṇu huu ṇiẏa-sirĕṇa su-sāmihĕ
text.16245: kāsu i bhaḍahŏ sīsu utthaliẏaü  $  gaẏaṇahŏ gampi paḍīvaü valiẏaü
text.16248: keṇa vi siru diṇṇu sāmi-riṇahŏ  $  uru vāṇahũ hiẏaü savvu jiṇahŏ
text.16249: saüṇahũ sarīru jīviu jamahŏ  $  aï-cāeṃ ṇāsu ṇa hoi kahŏ
text.16256: ko vi suṭṭhu heṭṭhāmuhu ṭhiu cintantaü
text.16258: jeṃ ṇiriṇu homi tīhi mi jaṇahũ  $  sāmiẏa-saraṇāiẏa-sajjaṇahũ"
text.16259: kŏ vi sāmihĕ aggaĕ vāvaraï  $  sira-kamalĕhĩ patta-vāḍu karaï
text.16260: keṇa vi asahāeṃ hontaĕṇa  $  cintiu raṇa-muhĕ jujjhantaĕṇa
text.16261: "ve vāhaü taïẏaü hiẏaü chuḍu  $  vaïsārami gaẏa-ghaḍa-pīḍhe phuḍu"
text.16262: kāsu vi sa-vāhu asi-laṭṭhi gaẏa  $  ṇaṃ soraga candaṇa-rukkha-laẏa
text.16263: kattha i antĕhĩ guppantu haü  $  sāmiu leppiṇu ṇiẏa-simiru gaü
text.16265: kattha i gaẏa-ghaḍa kovāruhiẏa  $  dhāiẏa suhaḍahŏ savaḍammuhiẏa
text.16266: siru dhuṇaï ṇa ḍhukkaï pāsu kiha  $  pahilāraĕ raĕ ṇava-vahua jiha
text.16271: āruhĕvi maïndu jiha  $  asivareṇa kumbha-ẏalu dāraï
text.16272: kaḍḍhĕvi muttāhalaĩ  $  karĕvi dhūli dhavalei ṇāvaï
text.16274: muaï taṃ jĕ paharaṇu aṇṇahŏ gaẏa-vindahŏ
text.16276: kari-kaṇṇa-camara-vijjijjamāṇu  $  ṇaṃ suvaï ko vi raṇa-vahu-samāṇu
text.16278: asi kaḍḍhĕvi pharu tappaü karevi  $  jujjhaṇa-maṇa vīra taranti ke vi
text.16280: ubhaẏa-valaĩ pekkhā-jaṇu karevi  $  andoliẏa andolanti ke vi
text.16281: raṇa-piḍi(?) rahavara-sāriu karevi  $  gaẏa-pāsā pihu pāḍanti ke vi
text.16282: kattha i siva suhaḍahŏ hiẏaü levi  $  gaẏa vesa va cāḍu-saẏaĩ karevi
text.16284: kattha i bhaḍu gaẏa-ghaḍa-pelliẏaü  $  bhāmĕvi āẏāsahŏ melliẏaü
text.16285: pallaṭṭu paḍīvaü asi dharĕvi  $  ṇaṃ sāmihĕ avasaru sambharĕvi
text.16294: tārāṇaṇu tārahŏ ovaḍiu  $  kallolu taraṅgahŏ abbhiḍiu
text.16295: jālakkhu suseṇahŏ utthariu  $  candamuheṃ candoẏaru dhariu
text.16299: pavi kundahŏ kumuahŏ sīharahu  $  saddūlahŏ dummuhu duvvisahu
text.16301: viẏaḍoẏaru ṇahusahŏ ovaḍiu  $  taḍikesi raẏaṇakesihĕ bhiḍiu
text.16303: raṇĕ eva ṇarāhiva utthariẏa  $  sa-rahasa sāmarisa rosa-bhariẏa
text.16304: daṇu-dāraṇa-paharaṇa-saṃjuĕhĩ  $  paharanta paropparu sa ĩ bhu ĕhĩ
text.16307: jiha uttara-gaü dāhiṇa-gaẏahŏ  $  bhiḍiu rāmu raṇĕ rāvaṇahŏ
text.16340: sa-turaṅgu sa-sārahi sa-dhaü rahu  $  haṇĕvi sarĕhĩ saẏa-khaṇḍu kaü
text.16341: ṇaha-laṅghaṇa-karaṇĕhĩ uppaĕvi  $  aṇṇahĩ sandaṇĕ caḍiu maü
text.16350: to tahiṃ ṇieūṇa ṇiẏa-bhaḍaṃ  $  bhagga-rahavaraṃ chiṇṇa-dhaẏavaḍaṃ
text.16358: haṇuvanteṃ vihalīhūaĕṇa  $  rahu duputtu iva chaṇḍiẏaü
text.16367: siẏa-cāmaru dhariẏa-siẏāẏavattu  $  vāhĕvi rahu kovāiddhu pattu
text.16368: "raẏaṇīẏara-lañchaṇa thāhi thāhi  $  valu valu uri rahavaru vāhi vāhi
text.16369: paĩ muĕvi mahīẏalĕ maṇusu kavaṇu  $  dahasīsa-sasuru sura-manti-damaṇu"
text.16370: to ẽva bhaṇĕvi bhāmaṇḍaleṇa  $  riu chāiu sahũ ravi-maṇḍaleṇa
text.16372: to maĕṇa vi rosa-vasaṃgaeṇa  $  vaïdehi samāhaü sara-saeṇa
text.16374: saṇṇāhu chattu dhaẏavara-turaẏa  $  sārahi rahu raṇĕ jajjariu
text.16375: bhāmaṇḍalu a-viṇaẏavantu jiha  $  para ekkellaü uvvariu
text.16383: viñjhu va jiha dāhiṇa-uttarāhã  $  abbhiṭṭu parupparu samaru tāhã
text.16387: saṃcaraï kaïddhaü jahĩ ji jahĩ  $  rivu sarahĩ ṇirumbhaï tahĩ jĕ tahĩ
text.16388: jahĩ jahĩ rahavarĕ āruhaï gampi  $  indaï-māẏāmahu haṇaï taṃ pi
text.16389: jaṃ jaṃ dhaṇuharu suggīvu lei  $  taṃ taṃ raẏaṇīẏaru khaẏahŏ ṇei
text.16391: kiṃ ekkahŏ kikkindhāhivahŏ  $  hiẏaïcchiẏaü ṇa saṃpaḍaï
text.16392: dhaṇu savvahŏ lakkhaṇa-virahiẏahŏ  $  laïu laïu hatthahŏ paḍaï
text.16400: maĩ muĕvi vihīsaṇu jhaḍa-jhaḍakka  $  ko sahaï tuhārī ṇara-caḍakka"
text.16401: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi mandoẏari-jaṇeru  $  ṇikkampu pariṭṭhiu ṇāĩ meru
text.16402: "osaru osaru maṃ puraü thāhi  $  chala-virahiu raṇu pariharĕvi jāhi
text.16403: pārakkaĕ thakkaĕ haṃsa-dīvĕ  $  guṇu jaï vi ṇāhi vīsaddha-gīvĕ
text.16404: tahĩ avasarĕ kiṃ taü muĕvi juttu  $  jaï saccaü raẏaṇāsavahŏ puttu"
text.16405: to ẽva bhaṇĕvi vavagaẏa-bhaeṇa  $  rahu kavaü chattu chijjaï maeṇa
text.16409: gaẏa-pāeṃ vuḍḍhīhūẏaĕṇa  $  maĕṇa ji kaha va ṇa māriẏaĩ
text.16418: dhavalaü jĕ sahāveṃ dhavala-vaṃsu  $  dhavalacchi-marālihĕ rāẏahaṃsu
text.16419: dhavalāhã dhavalu dhavalāẏavatta  $  rahuṇandaṇu daṇu paharantu pattu
text.16420: helaĕ jĕ viṇāsiu maẏa-maraṭṭu  $  rahu khañcĕvi pacchāmuhu paẏaṭṭu
text.16421: tahĩ avasarĕ sura-saṃtāvaṇeṇa  $  rahu antarĕ dijjaï rāvaṇeṇa
text.16423: dasa sahasa pariṭṭhiẏa gatta-rakkha  $  sāraccha karāviẏa aggalakkha
text.16426: kovāruṇĕ dāruṇĕ āhaẏaṇĕ  $  rāmaṇa-rāma ve vi bhiḍiẏa
text.16434: ṇaṃ gajjiu palaẏa-mahāghaṇeṇa  $  ṇaṃ ghoriu ghoru jamāṇaṇeṇa
text.16435: appāṇu ghittu ṇaṃ ṇahaẏaleṇa  $  ṇaṃ virasiu virasu rasāẏaleṇa
text.16436: ṇaṃ mahiẏalĕ ṇivaḍiu vajja-ghāu  $  valĕ rāmahŏ kampu mahantu jāu
text.16437: maẏa viẏaliẏa matta-mahāgaẏāhã  $  raha phuṭṭa tuṭṭa paggaha haẏāhã
text.16438: hallohalihūa ṇarinda savva  $  ṇipphanda ṇirāuha galiẏa-gavva
text.16439: dhaẏa-chattĕhĩ kaḍaẏaḍa-saddu ghuṭṭhu  $  kāẏara vāṇara tharahariẏa suṭṭhu
text.16440: vollanti paropparu "ṇaṭṭhu kajju  $  saṃghāra-kālu laĕ ḍhukku ajju
text.16442: ettahĕ raẏaṇāẏaru duppagamu  $  ettahĕ dāruṇu dahavaẏaṇu
text.16443: evahĩ jīvevaü kahi taṇaü  $  diṭṭhu ṇa pariẏaṇu gharu saẏaṇu"
text.16450: apphāliu vajjāvattu cāu  $  tahŏ saddeṃ kahŏ ṇa vi gaẏaü gāu
text.16451: tahŏ saddeṃ vahiriu ṇahu asesu  $  thiu jagu jĕ ṇāĩ maraṇāvasesu
text.16452: tahŏ saddeṃ ṇaṃ ṇāẏaülu tuṭṭu  $  kaha kaha vi ṇa kumma-kaḍāhu phuṭṭu
text.16453: rasarasiẏa susāviẏa sāẏarā vi  $  kampāviẏa canda-divāẏarā vi
text.16454: ḍollāviẏa kulagiri diggaẏā vi  $  appaṃparihūa surindaẏā vi
text.16455: dasakandhara-raha-kari-ṇiẏaru raḍiu  $  laṅkahĕ pāẏāru daḍatti paḍiu
text.16457: kŏ vi pāṇĕhĩ mukku aṇāhavo vi  $  ṇaru kāẏaru kāha mi kahaï ko vi
text.16459: "lahu ṇāsahũ laṅghĕvi maẏaraharu  $  ettha vasantahã ṇāhi dhara
text.16460: dhaṇuhara-ṭaṅkāru jĕ pāṇaharu  $  jaï ghaĩ āiẏa rāma-sara"
text.16464: tāva dasāṇaṇeṇa apamāṇĕhĩ bāṇĕhĩ chāiẏaṃ ṇahaṃ
text.16465: dasaraha-ṇandaṇeṇa te chiṇṇa ṇahĕ cciẏa paḍiẏa paḍivahaṃ
text.16483: vīsahi mi karĕhĩ vīsāuhaĩ  $  ekka-vāra raṇĕ mukkāĩ
text.16484: gharu kiviṇahŏ bhāmantu vaï jiha   $  rāmahŏ pāsu ṇa ḍhukkāĩ
text.16489: ṇavara dasāṇaṇeṇa vāmohu tamohu saro visajjio
text.16490: so vi valuddhureṇa rāmeṇa paẏaṅga-sareṇa ṇijjio
text.16491: rāmaṇĕṇa visajjiu kulisa-daṇḍu  $  sŏ vi rāmeṃ kiu saẏa-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍu
text.16492: rāmaṇĕṇa samāhaü pāẏaveṇa  $  sŏ vi bhaggu mahattheṃ vāẏaveṇa
text.16493: rāmaṇĕṇa visajjiu giri vicittu  $  sŏ vi rāmeṃ vali jiha disahĩ ghittu
text.16494: aggeu mukku dasa-kandhareṇa  $  ulhāviu so vi vāruṇa-sareṇa
text.16495: rāmaṇĕṇa visajjiu paṇṇaẏatthu  $  sŏ vi gāruḍa-vāṇĕhĩ kiu ṇiratthu
text.16496: rāmaṇĕṇa gaẏāṇaṇa-sara vimukka  $  tāha mi vala-vāṇa-maïnda ḍhukka
text.16497: rāmaṇĕṇa visajjiu sāẏaratthu  $  taṃ mandara-ghāeṃ ṇiu ṇiratthu
text.16498: jaṃ jaṃ āmellaï ṇisiẏarindu  $  taṃ taṃ vi ṇivāraï rāmacandu
text.16508: vihĩ hatthĕhĩ paharaï rāmacandu  $  vīsahĩ bhuva-daṇḍĕhĩ ṇisiẏarindu
text.16509: a-pavāṇa vāṇa rāhavahŏ to vi  $  jajjariẏa laṅka raẏaṇāẏaro vi
text.16511: vāevaü cattu pahañjaṇeṇa  $  rahu khañciu aditihĕ ṇandaṇeṇa
text.16512: disa-karihũ asesahuṃ galiu gāu  $  hallohalihūaü jagu jĕ sāu
text.16513: bhijjanti valaĩ jalĕ jalaẏarā vi  $  ṇahĕ ṇaṭṭha deva thalĕ thalaẏarā vi
text.16514: so ṇa vi gaẏavaru so ṇa vi turaṅgu  $  so ṇa vi rahavaru taṇ ṇa vi rahaṅgu
text.16515: so ṇa vi dhaü taṇ ṇa vi āẏavattu  $  jahĩ rāma-sarahã saü saü ṇa pattu
text.16517: gaẏa satta divaha jujjhantāhũ  $  to i ṇa cheu mahāhavahŏ
text.16518: lahu lakkhaṇu antarĕ devi rahu  $  vijaü ṇāĩ thiu rāhavahŏ
text.16523: "vala maĩ kiṅkareṇa kiṃ kīraï jaï tuhũ dharahi dhaṇuharaṃ
text.16524: ṇisiẏara-kula-kiẏantu haũ acchami rāvaṇa vāhĕ rahavaraṃ
text.16525: dummuha duccariẏa durāẏa-rāẏa  $  taü rāhava-kerā kuddha pāẏa
text.16526: valu urĕ kaü cukkahi mahu jiẏantu  $  vahu-kāleṃ pāvaü dhaü kiẏantu
text.16527: to kova-jalaṇa-jāloli-jaliu  $  "haṇu haṇu" bhaṇantu lakkhaṇahŏ valiu
text.16529: gaẏa-gāruḍa-sandaṇa kasaṇa-deha  $  uṇṇaïẏa ṇāĩ ṇahĕ palaẏa-meha
text.16530: ṇaṃ sīha mahīhara-matthaẏattha  $  ṇaṃ viñjha-sajjha uaẏācalattha
text.16531: ṇaṃ añjaṇa-mahihara viṇṇihūa  $  ṇaṃ ṇara-ṇiheṇa thiẏa kāla-dūẏa
text.16532: ṇaṃ ravi-rattuppala-toḍaṇattha  $  ṇaṃ dharaĕ pasāriẏa uhaẏa hattha
text.16535: veẏāla-sahasāĩ ṇacciẏaĩ  $  "jaï para hosaï ajja dhava
text.16540: jaṃ kiu rāhaveṇa taṃ tuhu mi karesahi bhūmi-goẏarā"
text.16542: pahileṇa pavaru ṇaggoha-rukkhu  $  vīeṇa mahaggiri diṇṇa-dukkhu
text.16543: jalu taïeṃ jalaṇu caütthaeṇa  $  pañcamĕṇa sīhu phaṇi chaṭṭhaeṇa
text.16546: dasa divva mahā-sara palaẏa-bhāva  $  dasa disaü ṇirumbhĕvi ṭhanti jāva
text.16547: to lakkhaṇu vuttu vihīsaṇeṇa  $  "divvatthaĩ laïẏaĩ rāvaṇeṇa
text.16548: ekkekku jĕ hoi aṇeẏa-bhāẏa  $  ekkekku jĕ darisaï viviha māẏa
text.16549: ekkekku jĕ jagu jagaḍĕvi samatthu  $  laï ehaĕ avasarĕ vāhi hatthu
text.16551: jaï āẏaĩ paĩ ṇa ṇivāriẏaĩ  $  āẏāmeppiṇu bhua-jualu
text.16552: to ṇa vi haũ ṇa vi tuhũ rāmu ṇa vi  $  ṇa vi suggīu ṇa pamaẏa-valu"
text.16559: vāẏaveṇa viṇāsiu vāruṇatthu  $  vāruṇeṇa huāsaṇu kiu ṇiratthu
text.16560: saraheṇa sīhu garuḍeṇa ṇāu  $  pañcāṇaṇeṇa gaẏa(?) diṇṇu ghāu
text.16561: ṇisiẏaru ṇiruddhu ṇārāẏaṇeṇa  $  tamu ṇāsiu diṇaẏara-paharaṇeṇa
text.16562: sosiu samuddu vaḍavāṇaleṇa  $  tahĩ avasarĕ āẏaü ṇahaẏaleṇa
text.16566: jaẏa ṇanda vaḍḍha siddhatthu hohi"  $  taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi harisiu hari-virohi
text.16568: siddhatthu atthu maṇĕ sambharĕvi  $  mukku ṇisāẏara-ṇāẏagĕṇa
text.16569: tami(?taṃ) dhariu kumāreṃ entu ṇahĕ  $  attheṃ viggha-viṇāẏagĕṇa
text.16574: jaṃ jaṃ kiṃ pi paharaṇaṃ muaï ṇisāẏara-vaï dasāṇaṇo
text.16575: taṃ taṃ sara-saehĩ viṇivāraï addha-vahĕ jjĕ lakkhaṇo
text.16577: "de de āesu" bhaṇanti āẏa  $  muha-kuharĕ viṇiggaẏa tahŏ vi vāẏa
text.16578: "jaṃ aṭṭha divasa ārāhiẏā-si  $  vahu-mantĕhĩ thottĕhĩ sāhiẏā-si
text.16579: teṃ sahala maṇoraha karahi ajju  $  bhū-goẏara-mahiharĕ hohi vajju
text.16580: dahavaẏaṇahŏ keraü rūvu levi  $  māẏāmaü rahavaru hohi devi"
text.16581: utthariẏa vijja sahũ lakkhaṇeṇa  $  dohāviẏa teṇa vi takkhaṇeṇa
text.16582: darisāviẏa vijjaĕ parama māẏa  $  atthakkaĕ rāvaṇa veṇṇi jāẏa
text.16583: te pahaẏa caẏāri samottharanti  $  paḍipahaẏa caẏāri vi aṭṭha honti
text.16591: jalĕ thalĕ gaẏaṇĕ chattĕ dhaĕ toraṇĕ pacchaĕ purĕ vi rāvaṇo
text.16593: tahŏ sarahŏ pahāveṃ vijja pavara  $  thiu ekku dasāṇaṇu hovi ṇavara
text.16594: utthariu aṇantĕhĩ saravarehĩ  $  ṇārāĕhĩ tīrĕhĩ tomarehĩ
text.16595: vāvallĕhĩ bhallĕhĩ kaṇṇiehĩ  $  avarahi mi asesahĩ vaṇṇiehĩ
text.16596: somittiṃ taṃ sara-jālu chiṇṇu  $  rahu khaṇḍĕvi puṇu vali disahĩ diṇṇu
text.16597: aṇṇahĩ rahavarĕ āruhaï jāva  $  siru haṇĕvi khuruppeṃ chiṇṇu tāva
text.16598: ṇaṃ haṃseṃ toḍiu āraṇālu  $  cala-jīhu viẏaḍa-dāḍhā-karālu
text.16602: siru sa-maüḍu paṭṭa-vihūsiẏaü  $  sahaï phurantĕhĩ kuṇḍalĕhĩ
text.16608: tāva samuggaẏāĩ riu-dehahŏ aṇṇaĩ veṇṇi sīsaïṃ
text.16610: tāĩ vi toḍiẏaĩ sa-kalaẏalāĩ  $  ṇaṃ dahavaẏaṇahŏ duṇṇaẏa-phalāĩ
text.16611: to ṇavari caẏāri samuṭṭhiẏāĩ  $  ṇaṃ thala-kamaliṇi-kamalaĩ thiẏāĩ
text.16612: puṇu aṇṇaĩ aṭṭha samuggaẏāĩ  $  ṇaṃ phaṇasahŏ phaṇasaĩ ṇiggaẏāĩ
text.16613: puṇu solaha puṇu vattīsa honti  $  caüsaṭṭhi siraĩ puṇu ṇīsaraṃti
text.16614: saü aṭṭhāvīsaü takkhaṇeṇa  $  pāḍijjaï sīsahũ lakkhaṇeṇa
text.16615: chappaṇṇaĩ viṇṇi saẏaĩ kiẏāĩ  $  chiṇṇaï kumāru jiha dukkiẏāĩ
text.16616: puṇu pañca saẏāĩ sa-vārahāĩ  $  kamalāĩ va toḍaï turiu tāĩ
