text.16619: sīsaĩ chindantahŏ lakkhaṇahŏ  $  viuṇaü viuṇaü vittharaï
text.16620: raṇĕ dakkhavantu vahu-rūvāĩ  $  rāvaṇu chandahŏ aṇuharaï
text.16625: jiha ṇiṭṭhanti ṇāhi riu-sīsaĩ tiha lakkhaṇa-mahāsarā
text.16626: "dukkaru thatti etthu raṇĕ hosaï" ṇahĕ vollanti suravarā
text.16628: riu-siraĩ tāva viṇivāiẏāĩ  $  raṇa-bhūmihĩ jāva ṇa māiẏāĩ
text.16629: jiha sīsaĩ tiha haẏa vāhu-daṇḍa  $  ṇaṃ garuḍeṃ visahara kaẏa du-khaṇḍa
text.16630: saẏa sahasa lakkha a-parippamāṇa  $  ekkekkaĕ tahi mi aṇeẏa vāṇa
text.16631: ṇaggohahŏ ṇaṃ pāroha chiṇṇa  $  ṇaṃ sura-kari-kara keṇa vi païṇṇa
text.16632: savvaṅguli savva-ṇahujjalaṅga  $  ṇaṃ pañca-phaṇāvali thiẏa bhuaṅga
text.16633: kŏ vi karaẏalu sahaï sa-maṇḍalaggu  $  ṇaṃ taruvara-pallaü laẏahŏ laggu
text.16634: kŏ vi sahaï silimmuha-saṅgameṇa  $  ṇaṃ laïu bhuaṅgu bhuaṅgameṇa
text.16636: mahi-maṇḍalu maṇḍiu kara-sirĕhĩ  $  chuḍu khuḍiehĩ sa-komalĕhĩ
text.16637: raṇa-devaẏa acciẏa lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  ṇāĩ sa-ṇālĕhĩ uppalĕhĩ
text.16642: gaẏa dasa divasa vihi mi jujjhantahã to vi ṇa ṇiṭṭhiẏaṃ raṇaṃ
text.16644: to jaṃ jāṇahi taṃ karĕ davatti  $  laṅkesara mahu ettaḍiẏa satti"
text.16645: sa-vilakkhu rakkhu saẏam eva thakku  $  palaẏakka-sama-ppahu laïu cakku
text.16649: taṃ ṇiĕvi ṇaṭṭha ṇahĕ suravarā vi  $  osarĕvi dūrĕ thiẏa vāṇarā vi
text.16650: to vuttu kumāreṃ ṇisiẏarindu  $  "paĩ jeṇa paẏāveṃ dhariu indu
text.16651: laï teṇa paẏāveṃ duṭṭha-bhāva  $  muĕ cakku cirāvahi kāĩ pāva"
text.16654: ṇahĕ teṇa bhamāḍijjantaĕṇa  $  jagu jĕ savvu ṇaṃ bhāmiẏaü
text.16660: tīriẏa-tomarehĩ ṇārāĕhĩ tahŏ vi valā samāgaẏaṃ
text.16662: raṇĕ dharĕvi ṇa sakkiu lakkhaṇeṇa  $  pahaṇanti asesa vi takkhaṇeṇa
text.16663: suggīvu gaeṃ rāhaü haleṇa  $  sūleṇa vihīsaṇu paccaleṇa
text.16665: aṅgaü tikkhĕṇa kuṭṭhāraeṇa  $  ṇalu cakkeṃ vaïri-viẏāraṇeṇa
text.16666: jamvaü jhaseṇa phaliheṇa ṇīlu  $  kaṇaeṇa virāhiu visama-sīlu
text.16667: kunteṇa kundu dahimuhu ghaṇeṇa  $  keṇa vi ṇa ṇivāriu paharaṇeṇa
text.16668: bhañjantu asesāuha-saẏāĩ  $  ṇaṃ tuhiṇu dahantu saroruhāĩ
text.16669: paribhamiu ti-vāraü tarala-tuṅgu  $  ṇaṃ meruhĕ pāsĕhĩ bhāṇu-vimvu
text.16671: jaṃ aṇṇa-bhavantarĕ ajjiẏaü  $  taṃ appaṇahi(?) samāvaḍiu
text.16672: āṇā-viheu su-kalattu jiha  $  cakku kumārahŏ karĕ caḍiu
text.16677: jaṃ uppaṇṇu cakku somittihĕ taṃ sura-ṇiẏaru tosiu
text.16678: dunduhi diṇṇa mukka kusumañjali sāhukkāru ghosiu
text.16679: ahiṇandiu lakkhaṇu vāṇarehĩ  $  "jaẏa ṇanda vaddha maṅgala-ravehĩ
text.16680: cintavaï vihīsaṇu jāẏa saṅka  $  "laï ṇaṭṭhu kajju ucchiṇṇa laṅka
text.16681: muu rāvaṇu santaï tuṭṭa ajju  $  mandoẏari vihava viṇaṭṭhu rajju"
text.16682: pabhaṇaï kumāru "karĕ cittu dhīru  $  chuḍu sīẏa samappaï khamaï vīru"
text.16684: "laï paharu paharu kiṃ karahi kheu  $  tuhũ ekkeṃ cakkeṃ sāvaleu
text.16685: mahu ghaĩ puṇu āeṃ kavaṇu gaṇṇu  $  kiṃ sīhahŏ hoi sahāu aṇṇu"
text.16686: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vipphuriẏāhareṇa  $  melliu rahaṅgu lacchīhareṇa
text.16688: uaẏaïrihĕ ṇaṃ atthaïri gaü  $  sūra-vimvu kara-maṇḍiẏaü
text.16689: sa ĩ bhu ĕhĩ haṇantahŏ dahamuhahŏ  $  maṇḍa ura-tthalu khaṇḍiẏaü
text.16691: ṇihaĕ dasāṇaṇĕ kiu surĕhĩ  $  kalaẏalu bhuvaṇa-maṇoraha-gāraü
text.16692: loa-pāla sacchanda thiẏa  $  dunduhi pahaẏa paṇacciu ṇāraü
text.16696: ṇivaḍiĕ rāvaṇĕ tihuaṇa-kaṇṭaĕ  $  kula-maṅgala-kalasĕ vva visaṭṭaĕ
text.16697: ṇaha-siri-dappaṇĕ vva vicchuṭṭaĕ  $  lacchi-varaṅgaṇa-hārĕ va tuṭṭaĕ
text.16698: puhaï-vilāsiṇi-māṇĕ va galiẏaĕ  $  raṇavahu-jovvaṇe vva daramaliẏaĕ
text.16699: dāhiṇa-disa-gaĕ vva oṇallaĕ  $  ṇīsāriĕ va surāsura-sallaĕ
text.16700: raṇa-devaẏa-ṇamaṃsiĕ va diṇṇaĕ  $  toẏadavāhaṇa-vaṃsĕ va chiṇṇaĕ
text.16701: cavaṇa-purandarĕ vva saṃkamiĕ  $  kālahŏ diṇaẏarĕ vva atthamiĕ
text.16702: laṅkāuri-pāẏārĕ va paḍiẏaĕ  $  sīẏa-saẏattaṇĕ vva ṇivvaḍiẏaĕ
text.16703: tama-saṅghāĕ va puñjĕvi mukkaĕ  $  añjaṇa-selĕ va thāṇahŏ cukkaĕ
text.16705: teṇa paḍanteṃ pāḍiẏaĩ  $  cittaĩ raṇĕ raẏaṇīẏara-ṇāmahũ
text.16706: pāṇa mahārahĕ mahiharahŏ  $  sura-kusumaĩ sirĕ lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ
text.16710: amarĕhĩ sāhukkāriĕ hari-valĕ  $  vijaĕ paghuṭṭhĕ samuṭṭhiĕ kalaẏalĕ
text.16711: tahĩ avasarĕ maṇi-gaṇa-vipphuriẏahĕ  $  upparĕ karu karevi ṇiẏa-churiẏahĕ
text.16712: appaü haṇaï vihīsaṇu jāvĕhĩ   $  mucchaĕ ṇāĩ ṇivāriu tāvehĩ
text.16713: ṇivaḍiu dharaṇi-paṭṭĕ ṇicceẏaṇu  $  dukkhu samuṭṭhiu pasariẏa-veẏaṇu
text.16714: caraṇa dharevi ruevaĕ laggaü  $  "hā bhāẏara maĩ muĕvi kahiṃ gaü
text.16715: hā hā bhāẏara ṇa kiu ṇivāriu  $  jaṇa-viruddhu vavahariu ṇirāriu
text.16716: hā bhāẏara sarīrĕ sukumāraĕ  $  kema viẏāriu cakkahŏ dhāraĕ
text.16717: hā bhāẏara duṇṇiddaĕ bhuttaü  $  sejja muĕvi kiṃ mahiẏalĕ suttaü
text.16719: kiṃ avaheri karevi thiu  $  sīsĕ caḍāviẏa calaṇa tuhārā
text.16720: acchami suṭṭhummāhiẏaü  $  hiẏaü phuṭṭu āliṅgi bhaḍārā"
text.16724: ruaï vihīsaṇu soẏakkamiẏaü  $  "tuhũ ṇatthamiu vaṃsu atthamiẏaü
text.16725: tuhũ ṇa jio 'si saẏalu jiu tihuaṇu  $  tuhũ ṇa muo 'si muaü vandiẏa-jaṇu
text.16726: tuhũ paḍio 'si ṇa paḍiu purandaru  $  maüḍu ṇa bhaggu bhaggu giri-mandaru
text.16727: diṭṭhi ṇa ṇaṭṭha ṇaṭṭha laṅkāuri  $  vāẏa ṇa ṇaṭṭha ṇaṭṭha mandoẏari
text.16728: hāru ṇa tuṭṭu tuṭṭu tārāẏaṇu  $  hiẏaü ṇa bhiṇṇu bhiṇṇu gaẏaṇaṅgaṇu
text.16729: cakku ṇa ḍhukku ḍhukku ekkantaru  $  āu ṇa khuṭṭu khuṭṭu raẏaṇāẏaru
text.16730: jīu ṇa gaü gaü āsā-poṭṭalu  $  tuhũ ṇa suttu suttaü mahi-maṇḍalu
text.16731: sīẏa ṇa āṇiẏa āṇiẏa jamaüri  $  hari-vala kuddha ṇa kuddhā kesari
text.16734: rāvaṇa paĩ sīheṇa viṇu  $  te vi ajju sacchandīhūẏā
text.16739: khala-khuddahũ pisuṇahũ duviẏaḍḍhahũ  $  ajju maṇoraha suravara-saṇḍhahũ
text.16740: dunduhi vajjaü gajjaü sāẏaru  $  ajju tavaü sacchandu divāẏaru
text.16741: ajju miẏaṅku hou pahavantaü  $  vāu vāu jagĕ ajju saïttaü
text.16742: ajju dhaṇaü dhaṇa-riddhi ṇiẏacchaü  $  ajju jalantu jalaṇu jagĕ acchaü
text.16743: ajju jamahŏ ṇivvahaü jamattaṇu  $  ajju kareu indu indattaṇu
text.16744: ajju ghaṇahã pūrantu maṇoraha  $  ajju ṇiraggala hontu mahāgaha
text.16745: ajju papphullaü phalaü vaṇāsaï  $  ajju gāu mokkalaü sarāsaï
text.16747: tāva dasāṇaṇu āhaẏaṇĕ  $  paḍiu suṇevi sa-doru sa-ṇeuru
text.16757: ṇaṃ koila-kulu kahi mi paẏaṭṭaü  $  ṇaṃ gaṇiẏāri-jūhu vicchuṭṭaü
text.16758: ṇaṃ kamaliṇi-vaṇu thāṇahŏ cukkaü  $  ṇaṃ haṃsiulu mahāsara-mukkaü
text.16759: kaluṇa-sareṇa rasantu padhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ raṇa-dharitti sampāiu
text.16762: rattaü parihĕvi paṅgurĕvi  $  thiẏa rāvaṇa-aṇumaraṇeṃ ṇāvaï
text.16769: kahi mi āẏavattaĩ sasi-dhavalaĩ  $  ṇaṃ raṇa-devaẏa-accaṇa-kamalaĩ
text.16770: kahi mi turaṅga vāṇa-viṇibhiṇṇā  $  raṇa-devaẏahĕ ṇāĩ vali diṇṇā
text.16771: kahi mi sarehĩ dhariẏa ṇahĕ kuñjara  $  ṇaṃ jala-dhārā-ūriẏa jalahara
text.16772: kahi mi rahaṅga-bhagga thiẏa rahavara  $  ṇaṃ vajjāsaṇi-sūḍiẏa mahihara
text.16773: tahĩ dahavaẏaṇu diṭṭhu vahu-vāhaü  $  kappa-taru vva paloṭṭiẏa-sāhaü
text.16776: daha diẏahāĩ sa-rattiẏaĩ  $  jaṃ jujjhantu ṇa ṇiddaĕ bhuttaü
text.16777: teṇa cakka-sejjahĩ caḍĕvi  $  raṇa-vahuaĕ samāṇu ṇaṃ suttaü
text.16781: diṭṭhu puṇo vi ṇāhu piẏa-ṇārihĩ  $  suttu matta-hatthi va gaṇiẏārihĩ
text.16782: vāhiṇihĩ va sukkaü raẏaṇāẏaru  $  kamaliṇihĩ va atthavaṇa-divāẏaru
text.16783: kumuiṇihi vva jaraḍha-maẏalañchaṇu  $  vijjuhi vva chuḍu chuḍu varisiẏa-ghaṇu
text.16784: amara-vahūhĩ va cavaṇa-purandaru  $  gimbha-disāhĩ va añjaṇa-mahiharu
text.16785: bhamarāvalihi mva sūḍiẏa-taruvaru  $  kalahaṃsīhi mva a-jalu mahā-saru
text.16786: kalaẏaṇṭhīhi mva māhava-ṇiggamu  $  ṇāiṇihĩ va haẏa-garuḍa-bhuẏaṅgamu
text.16787: vahula-paosu va tārā-pantihĩ  $  tema dasāsa-pāsu ḍhukkantihĩ
text.16788: dasa-siru dasa-seharu dasa-maüḍaü  $  giri va sa-kandaru sa-taru sa-kūḍaü
text.16790: ṇiĕvi avattha dasāṇaṇahŏ  $  "hā hā sāmi" bhaṇantu sa-veẏaṇu
text.16791: anteuru mucchā-vihalu  $  ṇivaḍiu mahihĩ jhatti ṇicceẏaṇu
text.16795: tārā-cakku va thāṇahŏ cukkaü  $  dukkhu dukkhu mucchaĕ āmukkaü
text.16796: lagga ruevvaĕ tahĩ mandoẏari  $  uvvasi rambha tilottama sundari
text.16798: mālaï campaẏamāla maṇohari  $  jaẏasiri candaṇaleha taṇūari
text.16799: lacchi vasantaleha migaloẏaṇa  $  joẏaṇagandha gori goroẏaṇa
text.16800: raẏaṇāvali maẏaṇāvali suppaha  $  kāmaleha kāmalaẏa saẏampaha
text.16801: suhaẏa vasantatilaẏa malaẏāvaï  $  kuṅkumaleha paüma paümāvaï
text.16802: uppalamāla guṇāvali ṇiruvama  $  kitti vuddhi jaẏalacchi maṇorama
text.16810: paĩ viṇu samara-tūru kahŏ vajjaï  $  paĩ viṇu vāla-kīla kahŏ chajjaï
text.16811: paĩ viṇu ṇava-gaha-ekkīkaraṇaü  $  ko parihesaï kaṇṭhāharaṇaü
text.16812: paĩ viṇu ko vi vijja ārāhaï  $  paĩ viṇu candahāsu ko sāhaï
text.16813: ko gandhavva-vāvi āḍohaï  $  kaṇṇahã cha vi sahāsu saṃkhohaï
text.16814: paĩ viṇu ko kuveru bhañjesaï  $  tijagavihūsaṇu kahŏ vasihosaï
text.16815: paĩ viṇu ko jamu viṇivāresaï  $  ko kaïlāsuddharaṇu karesaï
text.16817: ko ṇihāṇa-raẏaṇaĩ pālesaï  $  ko vahurūviṇi vijja laesaï
text.16819: sāmiẏa paĩ bhavieṇa viṇu  $  puppha-vimāṇĕ caḍĕvi guru-bhattiĕ
text.16820: meru-siharĕ jiṇa-mandiraĩ  $  ko maĩ ṇesaï vandaṇa-hattiĕ"
text.16824: puṇu vi puṇu vi gaẏaṇaṅgaṇagoẏari  $  kaluṇakkandu karaï mandoẏari
text.16826: vuḍḍaṇa-vāvihĕ thaṇa-paricaḍḍaṇu  $  sumarami īsi īsi avaruṇḍaṇu
text.16829: sumarami dijjamāṇu daṇu-dāvaṇi  $  dharaṇindahŏ keraü cūḍā-maṇi
text.16834: to i mahāraü vajjamaü  $  hiẏaü ṇa ve-dalu hoi ṇirāsu"
text.16838: puṇu vi puṇu vi mandoẏari jampaï  $  "uṭṭhĕ bhaḍārā kettiu suppaï
text.16839: jaï vi ṇirāriu ṇiddaĕ bhuttaü  $  to vi ṇa sohahi mahiẏalĕ suttaü
text.16840: sāmiẏa ko avarāhu mahāraü  $  sīẏahĕ dūī gaẏa saẏa-vāraü
text.16841: to i a-kāraṇĕ jjĕ āruṭṭhaü  $  jeṇa pariṭṭhiu pārāuṭṭhaü"
text.16842: tahĩ avasarĕ piu pekkhĕvi ghāiu  $  kā vi karei alīẏaï (?) sāiu
text.16843: āliṅgeppiṇu savvāẏāmeṃ  $  kā vi ṇivandhaï rasaṇā-dāmeṃ
text.16844: kā vi varaṃsueṇa ka vi hāreṃ  $  kā vi suandha-kusuma-pabbhāreṃ
text.16845: ka vi urĕ tāḍĕvi līlā-kamaleṃ  $  pabhaṇaï maülieṇa muha-kamaleṃ
text.16847: "tumhahã cakka-dhāra-vahua  $  jaï vi ṇirāriu pāṇahã ruccaï
text.16848: to kiṃ mahu pekkhantiẏahĕ  $  hiẏaĕ païṭṭhī ṇivisu ṇa muccaï"
text.16852: ka vi kesāvali raṅkholāvaï  $  ṇaṃ kasaṇāhi-panti khelāvaï
text.16853: kā vi kuḍila-bhaühāvali dāvaï  $  haṇaï maẏaṇa-dhaṇu-laṭṭhiĕ ṇāvaï
text.16854: kā vi ṇiei diṭṭhiĕ su-visālaĕ   $  ṇaṃ ḍhaṅkaï ṇīluppala-mālaĕ
text.16855: ka vi ahisiñcaï avirala-vāheṃ  $  pāusa-siri giri vva jala-vāheṃ
text.16856: kā vi piẏāṇaṇĕ āṇaṇu lāẏaï  $  ṇaṃ kamalovari kamalu caḍāvaï
text.16857: ka vi āliṅgaï bhuahĩ visālahĩ  $  ṇaṃ omālaï mālaï-mālahĩ
text.16858: ka vi parimasaï agga-hatthaẏaleṃ  $  chivaï ṇāĩ ṇava-līlā-kamaleṃ
text.16859: ka vi ṇimmala-kararuha paẏaḍāvaï  $  ṇaṃ daha-muhahũ va dappaṇu dāvaï
text.16860: kā vi paohara-ghaḍa-jualeṇaṃ  $  ṇaṃ siñcaï lāẏaṇṇa-jaleṇaṃ
text.16862: tahĩ avasarĕ keṇa vi ṇarĕṇa  $  indaï-kumbhaẏaṇṇa-āvāsaĕ
text.16863: sahasā jiha ṇa maranti tiha  $  rāvaṇa-maraṇu kahiu parihāsaĕ
text.16867: "ajju mahantu diṭṭhu accariẏaü  $  kiha kamaleṇa kulisu jajjariẏaü
text.16868: kiha muṭṭhiĕ meru i musumūriu  $  kiha pāẏālu tiladdheṃ pūriu
text.16869: kiha indhaṇĕṇa daddhu vaïsāṇaru  $  kiha culueṇa susiu raẏaṇāẏaru
text.16870: kiha poṭṭalĕṇa ṇivaddhu pahañjaṇu  $  kiha kareṇa ḍhaṅkiu maẏalañchaṇu
text.16871: diṇaẏaru teẏa-rāsi kara-dūsahu  $  kiha joiṅgaṇeṇa kiu ṇippahu
text.16872: kiha paḍeṇa pacchaṇṇu pahāẏaü  $  kiha siva-pahu aṇṇāṇeṃ ṇāẏaü
text.16873: kiha paramāṇueṇa ṇahu chāiu  $  kiha goppaĕ mahi-maṇḍalu māiu
text.16874: kiha masaeṇa tuliu bhuvaṇa-ttaü  $  maraṇāvattha kālu kaha pattaü"
text.16876: taṃ erisaü vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi  $  rāvaṇa-taṇaẏahũ vikkama-sārahũ
text.16881: ṇivaḍiu kumbhaẏaṇṇu sahũ puttĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ maẏalañchaṇu sahũ ṇakkhattĕhĩ
text.16882: ṇaṃ amarāhiu sahiẏaü amarĕhĩ  $  sittu jaleṇa pavijjiu camarĕhĩ
text.16883: uṭṭhiu dukkhu dukkhu dukkhāuru  $  soẏahŏ taṇaü ṇāĩ paḍhamaṅkuru
text.16884: laggu ruevaĕ "hā hā bhāẏari  $  hā hā haü hariṇehĩ va kesari
text.16885: hā vihi tuhu mi hūu dāliddiu  $  hā savvaṇhu tuhu mi kiha chiddiu
text.16886: hā jama tuhu mi mahāhavĕ ghāiu  $  hā raẏaṇāẏara tuhu mi tisāiu
text.16887: hā maru tuhu mi ṇivandhaṇu pattaü  $  hā ravi tuhu mi kiraṇa-paricattaü
text.16888: hā daḍḍho 'si tuhu mi dhūmaddhaẏa  $  ṇīsohaggu tuhu mi maẏaraddhaẏa
text.16890: hā acalinda tuhu mi caliu  $  tuhu mi paẏāvaï bhukkhaĕ bhaggaü
text.16891: puṇṇa-mahakkhaĕ pekkhu kiha  $  vajjamae vi khambhĕ ghuṇu laggaü"
text.16895: tāva sa-veẏaṇu uṭṭhiu indaï  $  appaü haṇaï ghivaï pariṇindaï
text.16896: "hā hā tāẏa tāẏa māṇuṇṇaẏa  $  suravara-samara-sahāsahĩ dujjaẏa
text.16904: dukkhu dasāṇaṇa-pariẏaṇahŏ  $  sīẏahĕ dihi jaü lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ
text.16905: sura vi sa iṃ bhu va ṇahũ caliẏa  $  laṅka païṭṭha kaïddhaẏa-ṇāmahũ
text.16907: bhāi-vioeṃ  $  jiha jiha karaï vihīsaṇu sou
text.16914: teṇa samāṇu viṇiggaẏa-ṇāmĕhĩ  $  diṭṭhu dasāṇaṇu lakkhaṇa-rāmĕhĩ
text.16915: diṭṭhaĩ sa-maüḍa-siraĩ paloṭṭaĩ  $  ṇāĩ sa-kesarāĩ kandoṭṭaĩ
text.16916: diṭṭhaĩ bhālaẏalaĩ pāẏaḍiẏaĩ  $  addhaẏanda-vimvāĩ va paḍiẏaĩ
text.16917: diṭṭhaĩ maṇi-kuṇḍalaĩ sa-teẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-ravi-maṇḍalaĩ aṇeẏaĩ
text.16918: diṭṭhaü bhaühaü bhiuḍi-karālaü  $  ṇaṃ palaẏaggi-sihaü dhūmālaü
text.16919: diṭṭhaĩ dīha-visālaĩ ṇettaĩ  $  mihuṇā iva āmaraṇāsattaĩ
text.16920: muha-kuharaĩ daṭṭhoṭṭhaĩ diṭṭhaĩ  $  jamakaraṇāĩ va jamahŏ aṇiṭṭhaĩ
text.16921: diṭṭha mahabbhuva bhaḍa-sandoheṃ  $  ṇaṃ pāroha mukka ṇaggoheṃ
text.16922: diṭṭhu ura-tthalu phāḍiu cakkeṃ  $  diṇa-majjhu a(?) majjhattheṃ akkeṃ
text.16923: avaṇiẏalu va viñjheṇa vihañjiu  $  ṇaṃ vihĩ bhāĕhĩ timiru va puñjiu
text.16933: ṇiẏa-parihavĕ para-vihurĕ ṇa jujjaï  $  tehaü purisu vihīsaṇa rujjaï
text.16934: aṇṇu i dukkiẏa-kamma-jaṇeraü  $  garuaü pāva-bhāru jasu keraü
text.16935: savvaṃsaha vi sahevi ṇa sakkaï  $  ahŏ aṇṇāu bhaṇanti ṇa thakkaï
text.16936: vevaï vāhiṇi kiṃ maĩ sosahi  $  dhāhāvaï khajjantī osahi
text.16937: chijjamāṇa-vaṇasaï ugghosaï  $  kaïẏahũ maraṇu ṇirāsahŏ hosaï
text.16938: pavaṇu ṇa bhiḍaï bhāṇu kara khañcaï  $  dhaṇu rāula-coraggihũ sañcaï
text.16939: vindhaï kaṇṭehĩ va duvvaẏaṇĕhĩ  $  visa-rukkhu va maṇṇijjaï saẏaṇĕhĩ
text.16963: "ettiu ruami dasāsahŏ  $  bhariu bhuvaṇu jaṃ aẏasahŏ
text.16965: suracāveṇa va athira-sahāveṃ  $  taḍi-phuraṇeṇa va takkhaṇa-bhāveṃ
text.16966: rambhā-gabbheṇa va ṇīsāreṃ  $  pakva-phaleṇa va saüṇāhāreṃ
text.16967: suṇṇa-hareṇa va vihaḍiẏa-vandheṃ  $  pacchahareṇa va aï-duggandheṃ
text.16968: ukkaruḍeṇa va kīḍāvāseṃ  $  akulīṇeṇa va sukiẏa-viṇāseṃ
text.16969: parivāheṇa va kimi-koṭṭhāreṃ  $  asuihĕ bhuvaṇeṃ bhūmihĕ bhāreṃ
text.16973: taü ṇa ciṇṇu maṇa-turaü ṇa khañciu  $  mokkhu ṇa sāhiu ṇāhu ṇa añciu
text.16974: vaü ṇa dhariu mahu ṇa kiu ṇivāriu  $  appaü kiu tiṇa-samaü ṇirāriu"
text.16975: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vihīraï halaharu  $  "ehu vaṭṭaï ṇijjāvaṇa-avasaru"
text.16977: ema bhaṇeppiṇu  $  puṇu āesu diṇṇu parivārahŏ
text.16989: kāmiṇi-jovvaṇaĩ va jaṇa-ghaṭṭhaĩ  $  ku-kuḍumvāĩ va thāṇahŏ bhaṭṭhaĩ
text.16990: vaïri-kulāĩ va ukkhaẏa-mūlaĩ  $  vāi-purisa-cittāĩ va thūlaĩ
text.16991: taṃ ṇisuṇevi viṇiggaẏa-ṇāmeṃ  $  uccallāviu rāmaṇu rāmeṃ
text.16994: so vihi-chandĕṇa  $  sāmaṇṇahi mi tulijjaï laggaü
text.17000: kelī-vaṇa ucchu-vaṇa-samāṇaĩ  $  khalaĩ va uddhaĩ thiẏaĩ vitāṇaĩ
text.17001: dhaẏa tharahariẏa masāṇa-bhaeṇa va  $  pūriẏa saṅkha vandhu dukkheṇa va
text.17002: tūraĩ haẏaĩ puvva-vaïrā iva  $  vaddhaĩ toraṇāĩ corā iva
text.17003: camaraĩ pāḍiẏāĩ cittāĩ va  $  ghittaĩ paṇṇaĩ ku-kalattāĩ va
text.17004: phāḍiẏāĩ dohāĩ va ṇettaĩ  $  dhariẏaĩ saṃgahaṇāĩ va chattaĩ
text.17005: cūriẏāĩ khala-muhaĩ va raẏaṇaĩ  $  khuddhaĩ saṅkha-ulāĩ va vaẏaṇāĩ
text.17007: ṇiu masāṇu suravara-santāvaṇu  $  viraïu salu vaïsāriu rāvaṇu
text.17010: so puṇṇa-kkhaĕ  $  pekkhu kema pahu pelliu kaṭṭhĕhĩ
text.17016: vāra-vāra ṇivaḍaï ṇicceẏaṇu  $  vāra-vāra ubbhiẏaï sa-veẏaṇu
text.17017: vāra-vāra ummuhu dhāhāvaï  $  chijjamāṇu saṅkhiṇi-ulu ṇāvaï
text.17019: chattaĩ ema bhaṇanti varāẏā  $  "paĩ viṇu kāsu karesahũ chāẏā"
text.17020: tūrahĩ ema ṇāĩ ghosijjaï  $  "paĩ viṇu kāsu pāsĕ vajjijjaï"
text.17021: "ko juppesaï raṇa-bhara-lakkhĕhĩ"  $  eva ṇāĩ dhāhāviu saṅkhĕhĩ
text.17022: tahĩ avasarĕ tajjoṇi-viṇāsaṇu  $  sīẏāsāu va diṇṇu huāsaṇu
text.17023: sahasā upparĕ caḍĕvi ṇa sakkaï  $  kampaï tasaï lhasaï ṇa jhulukkaï
text.17026: puṇu vi paḍīvaü  $  cintaï eva ṇāĩ dhūmaddhaü
text.17027: "kāĩ dahesami  $  eẏahŏ jo aẏaseṇa ji daḍḍhaü"
text.17033: gaẏaĩ kalattaĩ jammantaraĩ va  $  tūra-sahāsaĩ suiṇantaraĩ va
text.17034: saṅkha ṇiẏanta (?) ruĕvi saẏaṇā iva  $  kiṅkara laddha-phalaĩ saüṇā iva
text.17035: vandiṇa dāṇa-bhoga-ṇivahā iva  $  vandhava ṇava-jovvaṇa-diẏahā iva
text.17038: gaẏa gaẏa gaẏa ji ṇa diṭṭha paḍīvā  $  haẏa haẏa haẏa ji ṇa hūẏa sa-jīvā
text.17039: raha raha raha rahevi thiẏa dūreṃ  $  ko dīsaï atthamieṃ sūreṃ
text.17040: tahĩ avasarĕ parituṭṭha-pahiṭṭhaĩ  $  eva cavanti va candaṇa-kaṭṭhaĩ
text.17041: "jāhã pasāẏa tāhã ekkeṇa vi  $  tumhāvasaru ṇa sāriu keṇa vi
text.17042: sāmiẏa amhĕ jaï vi paĩ ghaṭṭhaĩ  $  gaṇiẏaĩ jaṇahŏ majjhĕ aï-kaṭṭhaĩ
text.17044: jaï vi sa-hatthĕṇa  $  ṇa kiu āsi garuẏaü sammāṇu
text.17045: to vi ḍahevvaü  $  huẏavahĕ paĩ samāṇu appāṇu"
text.17051: dasa-disi-vaha maïlantu padhāiu  $  jiha akulīṇaü kahi mi ṇa māiu
text.17052: dhūma-majjhĕ dhūmaddhaü dhāvaï  $  vijju-valaü jalaantarĕ ṇāvaï
text.17053: paḍhama (?) paehĩ laggu akulīṇu va  $  pacchaĕ upparĕ caḍiu ṇihīṇu va
text.17054: je ṇaravara-cūḍāmaṇi-cumviẏa  $  jāhã ṇahĕhĩ ravi-sasi paḍivimviẏa
text.17055: te kama-kamala kanti-pariẏaḍḍhā  $  sihi-khaleṇa suẏaṇā iva daḍḍhā
text.17058: taṃ ṇiẏamvu jalaṇeṇa vihattiu  $  takkhaṇĕ chārahŏ puñju parattiu
text.17063: alasanteṇa va  $  taṃ pahu-hiẏaü huāseṃ daḍḍhaü
text.17069: je thira thora palamva paīhara  $  suhi-mambhīsa vīsa-paharaṇa-dhara
text.17070: je vālattaṇĕ vālakkīlaĕ  $  paṇṇaẏa-muhĕhĩ chuhantaü līlaĕ
text.17079: te ṇivisaddhĕṇa  $  vīsa vi vāhu-daṇḍa masihūẏā
text.17085: so jjĕ jīu kaṇṭha-ṭṭhiu ṇāvaï  $  ṇāvaï daha-muhehĩ vīhāvaï
text.17094: tehaü evahĩ  $  hoi ṇa hoi va kiha muha-rāu
text.17095: āeṃ koḍḍĕṇa  $  huavahu ṇāĩ ṇihālaü āu
text.17101: gaü sarahasu dahevi daha vaẏaṇaĩ  $  gahakallolu va dasa-sasi-gahaṇaĩ
text.17108: tāĩ muhaĩ accanta-viẏaḍḍhaĩ  $  ṇiviseṃ suṇṇaharāĩ va daḍḍhaĩ
text.17122: tāĩ siraĩ saẏa-kuntala-kesaĩ  $  kiẏaĩ khaṇantareṇa masi-sesaĩ
text.17124: jo suravarahã āsi avahariẏaü  $  so rāvaṇu teu va ṇīsariẏaü
text.17125: sīẏā-sāvaggi va ṇivvaḍiẏaü  $  lakkhaṇa-kovaggi va pāẏaḍiẏaü
text.17126: sesa-visaggi va dūrucchaliẏaü  $  vasumaï-hiẏaẏa-paesu va jaliẏaü
text.17128: suravara-ḍāmaru  $  rāvaṇu daḍḍhu jāsu jagu kampaï
text.17129: "aṇṇu kahiṃ mahu  $  cukkaï" eva ṇāĩ sihi jampaï
text.17133: "re re jaṇa ṇīsāraü  $  viṭṭalu khalu saṃsāraü
text.17135: jahĩ uḍḍanti mahīhara vāeṃ  $  tahĩ kiṃ gahaṇu reṇu-saṃghāeṃ
text.17136: jahĩ jalaṇeṇa jalanti jalāĩ vi  $  tahĩ tiṇohu kiṃ cukkaï kāĩ vi
text.17137: jahĩ kulisāĩ janti saẏa-sakkaru  $  tahĩ kamalahũ kettaḍaü maḍappharu
text.17138: hoi mahaṇṇavo vi jahĩ ṇippaü  $  tahiṃ pajjharaï kāĩ kira goppaü
text.17139: jahĩ aïrāvaṇo vi ummajjaï  $  tahĩ kira kāĩ sasaü galagajjaï
text.17140: jahĩ ṇitteu taraṇi ṇaha-maṇḍaṇu  $  tahĩ kiṃ karaï kanti joiṅgaṇu
text.17141: jahĩ vuḍḍaï acalindu samatthaü  $  tahĩ kira kavaṇu gahaṇu siddhatthaü
text.17142: kumma-kaḍāha-ẏalu vi jahĩ phuṭṭaï  $  tahĩ kumhāra-ghaḍaü kiṃ chuṭṭaï
text.17145: uṇṇaïvantaü  $  tahĩ sāmaṇṇu kāĩ kira māṇusu"
text.17151: kamalāẏara-tīrantarĕ thakvĕvi  $  pabhaṇaï rahuvaï ṇaravara kokkĕvi
text.17156: indaï-kumbhaẏaṇṇa lahu āṇahŏ  $  loẏācāru karahŏ sarĕ ṇhāṇahŏ"
text.17158: "ṇāha ṇa hoi ehu bhallāraü"  $  savvahã jaṇaṇa-vaïru vaḍḍāraü
text.17160: indaï-rāṇaü  $  salilu ṇiĕvi jaï kaha vi viẏaṭṭaï
text.17165: kiṇṇa parakkamu vujjhiu  $  jaïẏahũ sura-valĕ jujjhiu
text.17166: jiṇĕvi valā valavantahŏ  $  bhaggu maraṭṭu jaẏantahŏ
text.17167: aṇṇu vi pavaṇa-puttu jasa-luddhaü  $  so vi ṇāga-vāsehĩ ṇivaddhaü
text.17168: bhāmaṇḍalu suggīu sahattheṃ  $  vaddha te vi teṇa ji divvattheṃ
text.17169: aṇṇu vi kumbhaẏaṇṇu kiṃ dhariẏaü  $  jaïẏahũ saṇṇahevi ṇīsariẏaü
text.17170: tahĩ avasarĕ jeṃ teṇa viẏambhiu  $  kiṇṇa diṭṭhu valu saẏalu vi thambhiu
text.17171: aṇṇu vi mārui āvaï pāviu  $  tārā-suĕṇa dukkhu choḍāviu
text.17172: te viṇṇi aṇilāṇala-sarisā  $  keṇa paḍicchiẏa vaddhāmarisā
text.17173: vaddhā kiṇṇa hunti maṇi ujjala  $  vaddhā maü muanti kiṃ maẏagala
text.17174: vaddhā kavvālāva bhaḍārā  $  kiṇṇa hunti jaṇavaĕ guruārā
text.17177: eu ṇa jāṇahũ   $  kāĩ karesaï cheĕ vihīsaṇu"
text.17183: viṇaẏavantu accanta-saṇehaü  $  aṇṇu vi khattiẏa-maggu ṇa ehaü
text.17184: jeṇa samāṇu rosu so hammaï  $  avaseṃ sahũ avasāṇu ṇa gammaï
text.17185: ahavaï kiṃ karanti te kuddhā  $  bhagga-maḍapphara saṃsaĕ chuddhā
text.17186: ukkhaẏa-danta matta māẏaṅga va  $  dāḍhuppāḍiẏa pavara bhuvaṅga va
text.17187: ṇahara-pahara-parihīṇa maïnda va  $  uṇṇaï-bhagga mahīhara-vinda va"
text.17189: gampiṇu teṇa asesa vi rāṇā  $  dummaṇa dīṇa ṇiruṇṇaẏa-māṇā
text.17190: lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ pāsu parāṇiẏa  $  sahũ anteureṇa sare ṇhāṇiẏa
text.17193: añjali-uḍĕhĩ va   $  para ghivanti lāẏaṇṇu sarīrahŏ
text.17199: ahavaï vasumaīĕ jaṃ diṇṇaü  $  sokkhu asesu vi āsi uchiṇṇaü
text.17200: taṃ pahu pacchaĕ maggijjantaĩ  $  dinti ṇāĩ vevanta-ruvantaĩ
text.17201: puṇu vi paḍīvaĩ vuḍḍaĩ saravarĕ  $  ṇaṃ pāviṭṭhaĩ ṇaraẏabbhantarĕ
text.17202: puṇu ṇīsariẏaĩ sarahŏ raüddahŏ  $  ṇaṃ bhaviẏaĩ saṃsāra-samuddahŏ
text.17203: jalu lāẏaṇṇu ṇāĩ mellantaĩ  $  ṇaṃ tivalīu taraṅgahũ dentaĩ
text.17204: vaḍḍima sarahŏ marālahũ thira-gaï  $  cakkavāla-juvalahũ thaṇa-saṅgaï
text.17209: pīlĕvi pīlĕvi  $  kaluṇu mahā-rasu ṇāĩ laïnti
text.17216: sohaü taṃ jĕ tuhāraü pesaṇu  $  chattaĩ tāĩ taṃ ji sīhāsaṇu
text.17217: camaraĩ tāĩ tāĩ dhaẏa-daṇḍaĩ  $  raẏaṇa-ṇihāṇaĩ vasuha-ti-khaṇḍaĩ
text.17218: te ji turaṅga te ji gaẏa sandaṇa  $  te ji tuhārā saẏala vi ṇandaṇa
text.17219: te ji asesa bhicca hiẏaïcchā  $  te ji ṇarāhiva āṇa-vaḍicchā
text.17220: sā tuhũ sā jĕ laṅka paramesari  $  indaï bhuñjaü saẏala vasundhari"
text.17222: "lacchi kumāri va cañcala-cittī  $  kiha bhuñjami jā tāeṃ bhuttī
text.17229: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇīsāmĕṇa  $  pulaü vahanteṃ rāmĕṇa
text.17231: ema bhaṇĕvi jaẏalacchi-ṇivāsahŏ  $  savvaĩ ṇiẏaĩ ṇiẏaẏa-āvāsahŏ
text.17232: parihāviẏaĩ dukūlaĩ vatthaĩ  $  vāẏaraṇaĩ va laddha-saddatthaĩ
text.17233: parihāviẏaü dasāṇaṇa-pattiu  $  sahu keurĕhĩ vimukkaü pottiu
text.17234: ṇeura-ṇivahu samaü laẏa-maggeṃ  $  rasaṇā-dāmaĩ sahũ sohaggeṃ
text.17237: maṇi-kuṇḍalaĩ samaü taṇu-teĕhĩ  $  vara-kaṇṇāvaẏaṃsa sahũ geĕhĩ
text.17238: luhiẏa hiẏa(?) tilaẏa sahũ māṇĕhĩ  $  cūḍāmaṇi piẏa-paṇaẏa-paṇāmĕhĩ
text.17241: ṇavara ṇa mukkaĩ  $  diḍhaĩ sa iṃ bhu eṇa guru-vaẏaṇaĩ
text.17247: rāvaṇĕṇa maranteṃ diṇṇu suhu  $  surahũ dukkhu vandhava-jaṇahŏ
text.17248: rāmahŏ kalattu lakkhaṇahŏ  $  jaü avicalu rajju vihīsaṇahŏ
text.17254: ṇāmeṇa sāhu apameẏavalu  $  thiu ṇandaṇa-vaṇĕ meru va acalu
text.17255: uppaṇṇu ṇāṇu tahŏ muṇivarahŏ  $  ettahĕ vi parama-titthaṅkarahŏ
text.17257: je vandaṇahattiĕ tetthu gaẏa  $  te iha vi parāiẏa amara-saẏa
text.17258: ettahĕ rahu-taṇaü sa-sāhaṇu vi  $  ettahĕ indaï ghaṇavāhaṇu vi
text.17259: saẏalehĩ vi vandaṇahatti kiẏa  $  raẏaṇīẏara puṇu vollanta thiẏa
text.17262: gaẏa-divasĕ bhaḍārā hontu jaï  $  to marantu kiṃ dahavaẏaṇu"
text.17268: ko kāla-bhuẏaṅgahŏ uvvaraï  $  jo jagu jĕ savvu uvasaṅgharaï
text.17269: tahŏ jahĩ jahĩ kahi mi diṭṭhi ramaï  $  tahĩ tahĩ ṇaṃ maïẏavaṭṭu bhamaï
text.17270: kĕ vi gilaï gilĕvi kĕ vi uggilaï  $  kāhi (?) mi jammāvasāṇĕ milaï
text.17271: kĕ vi ṇaraẏa-vilĕhĩ païsĕvi gasaï  $  kāhi (?) vi aṇulaggaü jjĕ vasaï
text.17272: kĕ vi kaḍḍhaï saggahŏ vari caḍĕvi  $  kĕ vi khaẏahŏ ṇei upparĕ paḍĕvi
text.17273: kĕ vi ghāraï ghŏraĕ pāva-visĕṇa  $  kĕ vi bhakkhaï ṇāṇāviha-misĕṇa
text.17275: tahŏ ko vi ṇa cukkaï bhukkhiẏahŏ  $  kāla-bhuaṅgahŏ dūsahahŏ
text.17276: jiṇa-vaẏaṇa-rasāẏaṇu lahu piẏahŏ  $  jeṃ ajarāmaru paü lahahŏ
text.17280: jaï kāla-bhuaggu ṇa uvaḍasaï  $  to kiṃ suravaï saggahŏ khasaï
text.17281: kahĩ rāvaṇu suravara-ḍamara-karu  $  dasa-kandharu dasa-muhu vīsa-karu
text.17282: vahurūviṇi jasu pesaṇu karaï  $  jasu ṇāmeṃ tihuẏaṇu tharaharaï
text.17283: jasu candu ṇa ṇahaẏalĕ tavaï ravi  $  jamu talavaru vatthaĩ dhuvaï havi
text.17284: jasu paṅgaṇu vohāraï pavaṇu  $  kosāṇupālu jasu vaïsavaṇu
text.17285: ghaṇa chaḍaü denti sarasaï jhuṇaï  $  jasu vaṇasaï pupphaccaṇu kuṇaï
text.17286: sā sampaẏa gaẏa kahĩ rāvaṇahŏ  $  kahĩ rāvaṇu kahĩ suhu pariẏaṇahŏ
text.17288: amha vi tumha vi avaraha mi (?)  $  savvaĩ ekkahĩ miliẏāĩ
text.17289: pekkhesahũ kāla-bhuaṅgamĕṇa  $  ajja va kalla va giliẏāĩ
text.17293: so kāla-bhuaṅgamu duvvisahŏ  $  aṇṇu vi visamaü parivāru tahŏ
text.17295: ekkekkahĕ tiṇṇi tiṇṇi samaẏa  $  su-du-paḍhama-samuttara-ṇāma ṇaẏa
text.17296: tāhã vi uppaṇṇa saṭṭhi taṇaẏa  $  saṃvacchara-ṇāma pasiddhi gaẏa
text.17297: ekkekkahŏ viṇṇi kalattāĩ  $  aẏaṇaĩ ṇāmeṇa pahuttāĩ
text.17299: ekkekkahŏ tahŏ vi dhavala-kasaṇa  $  uppaṇṇa putta dui dui jĕ jaṇa
text.17300: ekkekkahŏ tahĩ vi pāṇa-piẏaü  $  paṇṇāraha paṇṇāraha tiẏaü
text.17302: ĕhu pariẏaṇu kāla-bhuaṅgamahŏ  $  avaru gaṇĕvi keṃ sakkiẏaü
text.17303: so tehaü tihuaṇĕ ko vi ṇa vi  $  jo ṇa vi āeṃ ḍaṅkiẏaü
text.17308: maẏa-kumbhaẏaṇṇa-māricci tiha  $  avara vi ṇarinda amarinda-ṇiha
text.17312: pavvaïu ko vi pavvaïu ṇa vi  $  ṇahĕ ṇāĩ ṇihālaü āu ravi
text.17313: ravi uiu vihīsaṇu gaẏaü tahĩ  $  ṇandaṇa-vaṇĕ jaṇaẏahŏ taṇaẏa jahĩ
text.17314: āharaṇaĩ vatthaĩ ḍhoiẏaĩ  $  vaïdehiĕ tāĩ ṇa joiẏaĩ
text.17316: "malu kevalu āẏaĩ savvaï mi  $  jaï maṇĕ maliṇu maṇammaṇaü
text.17317: ṇiẏa-païhĕ milantihĕ kula-vahuhĕ  $  sīlu ji hoi pasāhaṇaü"
text.17321: "jaï jāmi āsi paricatta-bhaẏa  $  to sahũ haṇuvanteṃ kiṇṇa gaẏa"
text.17322: "viṇu ṇiẏa-bhattāreṃ jantiẏahĕ   $  kulaharu jĕ pisuṇu kulaüttiẏahĕ
text.17323: purisahũ cittaĩ āsīvisaĩ  $  alahanta vi uddisanti misaĩ
text.17324: vīsāsu janti ṇaü iẏarahu mi  $  suẏa-devara-bhāẏara-piẏarahu mi"
text.17325: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi mahāsaïhĕ  $  gaü pāsu vihīsaṇu rahuvaïhĕ
text.17326: "ahŏ ahŏ paramesara dāsarahi  $  pacchaĕ laṅkāuri païsarahi
text.17327: mili tāva bhaḍārā jāṇaïhĕ  $  taru duttara-viraha-mahāṇaïhĕ
text.17330: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi halaharu cakkaharu  $  sīẏahĕ pāsĕ samuccaliẏa
text.17331: ahiseẏa-samaĕ siri-devaẏahĕ   $  diggaẏa viṇṇi ṇāĩ miliẏa
text.17335: vaïdehi diṭṭha hari-halaharĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ candaleha vihĩ jalaharĕhĩ
text.17336: ṇaṃ saraẏa-lacchi paṅkaẏa-sarĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ puṇṇima vihĩ pakkhantarĕhĩ
text.17337: ṇaṃ sura-sari himagiri-sāẏarĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ ṇaha-siri canda-divāẏarĕhĩ
text.17338: paripuṇṇa maṇoraha jāṇaïhĕ  $  taraï va lāẏaṇṇa-mahāṇaïhĕ
text.17339: ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaṇa-sarāsaṇi sandhaï va  $  piu paguṇa-guṇehĩ ṇivandhaï va
text.17340: jasa-kaddamĕ ṇaṃ jagu limpaï va  $  harisaṃsu-pavāheṃ sippaï va
text.17341: vijjei va karaẏala-pallavĕhĩ  $  accei va ṇaha-kusumĕhĩ ṇavĕhĩ
text.17342: païsaraï va hiẏaĕ halāuhahŏ  $  karaï va ujjou disāmuhahŏ
text.17344: mehaliĕ milantahŏ rahuvaïhĕ  $  suhu uppaṇṇaü jettaḍaü
text.17345: indahŏ indattaṇu pattāhŏ    $  hojja ṇa hojja va tettaḍaü
text.17350: "jaṃ kiu khara-dūsaṇa-tisira-vahu  $  jaṃ haṃsadīvĕ jiu haṃsarahu
text.17351: jaṃ satti paḍicchiẏa samara-muhĕ  $  jaṃ lagga visalla karamvuruhĕ
text.17352: jaṃ raṇĕ uppaṇṇu cakka-raẏaṇu   $  jaṃ ṇihaü valuddharu dahavaẏaṇu
text.17353: jaṃ devi pasāeṃ taü taṇĕṇa  $  kulu dhavaliu jāĕ saïttaṇĕṇa"
text.17354: ahivāẏaṇu kiu lakkhaṇĕṇa jiha  $  suggīva-pamuha-ṇaravarahĩ tiha
text.17355: saẏala vi ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-vāhaṇĕhĩ thiẏa  $  para-pura-pavesa-sāmaggi kiẏa
text.17359: ṇaṃ surahũ dharanta-dharantāhũ  $  tuṭṭĕvi sagga-khaṇḍu paḍiu
text.17368: ĕhu aṅgaü jeṇa maṇoharihĕ  $  kesaggahu kiu mandoẏarihĕ
text.17370: ĕhu kumuu virāhiu ṇīlu ṇalu  $  ĕhu gavaü gavakkhu saṅkhu pavalu"
text.17372: tahĩ kālĕ laṅka païsantāhŏ  $  parama riddhi jā halaharahŏ
text.17373: so amarāuri bhuñjantāhŏ  $  hojja ṇa hojja purandarahŏ
text.17377: païsaraï rāmu rāvaṇa-bhavaṇu  $  dakkhavaï ṇivāṇaĩ saẏalu jaṇu
text.17378: "iha meha-ulĕhĩ dijjaï chaḍaü  $  iha sakku pasāhaï gaẏa-ghaḍaü
text.17379: kiẏa accaṇa etthu vaṇassaïĕ  $  iha gāẏ(?)aü geu sarassaïĕ
text.17380: iha ṇikkaü karaï āsi pavaṇu  $  iha bhaṇḍāgāriu vaïsavaṇu
text.17381: iha vatthaĩ sihiṇa paḍicchiẏaĩ  $  sura-vandi-saẏaĩ iha acchiẏaĩ
text.17383: āẏaraṇu etthu jama-talavarahŏ  $  iha melaü ṇāga-ṇarāmarahŏ
text.17384: iha ṇava-gaha damiẏa dasāṇaṇĕṇa  $  iha acchiu sahũ vaṇiẏāẏaṇĕṇa"
text.17386: pekkhantu ṇivāṇaĩ rāvaṇahŏ   $  kahi mi ṇa rahuvaï raï karaï
text.17405: thui ema karĕvi kira vīsamaï  $  tāva paḍicchiẏa-pesaṇĕṇa
text.17406: sa-kalattu sa-lakkhaṇu sa-valu valu  $  ṇiu ṇiẏa-ṇilaü vihīsaṇĕṇa
text.17410: su-viẏaḍḍha viẏaḍḍhāevi lahu  $  vara-juvaïhũ dasahĩ saehĩ sahũ
text.17413: ucchāhĕhĩ dhavalĕhĩ maṅgalĕhĩ  $  paḍu-paḍahĕhĩ saṅkhĕhĩ mandalĕhĩ
text.17416: mandiru païsaraï vihīsaṇahŏ  $  majjaṇaü bhariu rahu-ṇandaṇahŏ
text.17419: gaü divasu savvu pāhuṇṇaĕṇa  $  labbhaï to vi pamāṇu ṇa vi
text.17420: "suhu suaü sīẏa sahũ rahu-suĕṇa"  $  ema bhaṇĕvi ṇaṃ lhikku ravi
text.17424: to bhaṇaï vihīsaṇu "dāsarahi  $  aṇuhuñji bhaḍārā saẏala mahi
text.17425: sīẏa 'gga-mahisi tuhũ rajja-dharu  $  somitti manti haũ āṇa-karu
text.17426: ramaṇīẏa eha laṅkā-ṇaẏari  $  ĕhu tijagavihūsaṇu pavara-kari
text.17427: ĕhu puppha-vimāṇu pahāṇu gharĕ  $  ĕu candahāsu karavālu karĕ
text.17429: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pabhaṇaï dāsarahi  $  "aṇuhuñji vihīsaṇu tuhũ jĕ mahi
text.17430: amhahũ gharĕ bharahu jĕ rajja-dharu  $  jasu jaṇaṇihĕ tāeṃ diṇṇu varu
text.17431: tumhahũ gharĕ tujjhu jĕ rāẏa-siẏa  $  saï jāsu viẏaḍḍhāevi tiẏa
text.17433: ṇahĕ suravara mahiẏalĕ meru-giri  $  jāva mahā-jalu maẏaraharĕ
text.17434: paribhamaï kitti jagĕ jāva mahu  $  tāva vihīsaṇa rajju karĕ"
text.17438: ahiseu vihīsaṇĕ āḍhaviu  $  bhāmaṇḍalu kalasu laevi thiu
text.17439: suggīu virāhiu ṇīlu ṇalu  $  dahimuhu mahindu mārui pavalu
text.17440: aṭṭhahi mi tehĩ suha-daṃsaṇahŏ  $  palhatthiẏa kalasa vihīsaṇahŏ
text.17441: saĩ vaddhu paṭṭu rahu-ṇandaṇĕṇa  $  vahu-divasĕhĩ rāma-jaṇaddaṇĕṇa
text.17442: jāu vi māṇiẏaü ṇa māṇiẏaü  $  tāu vi tahĩ turiu parāṇiẏaü
text.17444: kallāṇamāla vaṇamāla taha  $  jiẏapoma soma jiṇa-paḍima jiha
text.17447: vahu-vindaĩ āẏaĩ avaraï mi  $  savvaĩ tahĩ jĕ samāgaẏaĩ
text.17448: acchantahã vala-ṇārāẏaṇahã  $  laṅkahĕ varisaĩ chaha gaẏaĩ
text.17454: ghara-paṅgaṇĕ vāẏasu kulakulaï  $  ṇaṃ bhaṇaï "māĕ rahuvaï milaï"
text.17455: risi ṇāraü tāva parāiẏaü  $  thuu pucchiu "kettahŏ āiẏaü"
text.17456: teṇa vi ṇiẏa-vaïẏaru vimalu kaü  $  "paramesari puvva-videhĕ gaü
text.17457: vandantahŏ tetthu tittha-saẏaĩ  $  sattāraha varisaĩ vavagaẏaĩ
text.17458: puṇu tetthahŏ laṅkā-ṇaẏari gaü  $  jahĩ lakkhaṇa-cakkeṃ vaïri haü
text.17459: paḍi puvva-videhu parāiẏaü  $  tevīsahũ varisahũ āiẏaü
text.17461: lakkhaṇu visalla vaïdehi valu  $  laṅkahĩ rajju karantāĩ
text.17462: acchanti māĕ luhi loẏaṇaĩ  $  taü dakkhavami jiẏantāĩ
text.17468: taru-tīra-laẏāharĕ kusumaharĕ  $  jahĩ aṅgaü kīlaï kamala-sarĕ
text.17470: "kiṃ kusalu kumāra viẏakkhaṇahŏ  $  vaïdehihĕ rāmahŏ lakkhaṇahŏ"
text.17471: teṇa vi jiẏa-saẏala-mahāhavahŏ  $  païsāriu mandiru rāhavahŏ
text.17472: halaharĕṇa vi abbhutthāṇu kiu  $  "āgamaṇu kāĩ" ettiu caviu
text.17473: tāvasĕṇa vuttu "taü māiẏahĕ  $  āẏaü pāsahŏ aparāiẏahĕ
text.17474: sā tumha vioeṃ dummaṇiẏa  $  acchaï hariṇi va vuṇṇāṇaṇiẏa
text.17476: suhu ekku vi divasu ṇa jāṇiẏaü  $  paĩ vaṇa-vāsu pavaṇṇaĕṇa
text.17477: acchaï kandanti sa-veẏaṇiẏa  $  ṇandiṇi jiha viṇu taṇṇaĕṇa"
text.17481: ummāhiu taṃ ṇisuṇevi valu  $  vollaï maülāviẏa-muha-kamalu
text.17482: "ahŏ maha-risi sundaru kahiu paĩ  $  jaï ajju kallĕ ṇaü diṭṭha maĩ
text.17484: ṇiẏa-jammabhūmi jaṇaṇiĕ sahiẏa  $  sagge vi hoi aï-dullahiẏa
text.17485: laï jāmi vihīsaṇa ṇiẏaẏa-gharu  $  paĩ muĕvi aṇṇu ko sahaï bharu
text.17487: labbhaï pamāṇu sāẏara-jalahŏ  $  labbhaï pamāṇu vāṇara-valahŏ
text.17488: labbhaï pamāṇu lakkhaṇa-sarahŏ  $  labbhaï pamāṇu diṇaẏara-karahŏ
text.17491: parimāṇu vihīsaṇa laddhu ṇa vi  $  ṇiruvama-guṇahã tuhārāhũ"
text.17496: "jaï rahuvaï vijaẏa-jatta karahi  $  to solaha vāsara pariharahi
text.17497: haũ jāva karemi puṇaṇṇaviẏa  $  ujjhāuri savva suvaṇṇamiẏa"
text.17498: vala-lakkhaṇa eva pariṭṭhaviẏa  $  aggaĕ vaddhāvā paṭṭhaviẏa
text.17499: puṇu pacchaĕ vijjāhara-pavara  $  ṇahaẏalu bharanta ṇaṃ amvuhara
text.17500: ovuṭṭhu tehĩ kañcaṇa-varisu  $  kiu puravaru laṅkāuri-sarisu
text.17501: gharĕ gharĕ maṇikūḍāgāra kiẏa  $  gharĕ gharĕ ṇaṃ ṇava-ṇihi saṅkamiẏa
text.17502: purĕ ghosaṇa to vi paribbhamaï  $  "so leu laevaĕ jāsu maï"
text.17505: dentaü jĕ atthi para saẏalu jaṇu  $  jasu dijjaï so ko vi ṇa vi
text.17509: gaü laṅka vihīṣaṇu bhicca-valu  $  solahamaĕ divasĕ paẏaṭṭu valu
text.17510: sa-vimāṇu sa-sāhaṇu gaẏaṇa-vahĕ  $  dāvantu ṇivāṇaĩ piẏaẏamahĕ
text.17511: "ĕhu sundari dīsaï maẏaraharu  $  ĕhu malaẏa-dharāharu surahi-taru
text.17513: haũ lakkhaṇu eṇa paheṇa gaẏa  $  ettahĕ khara-dūsaṇa-tisira haẏa
text.17514: iha samvu-kumārahŏ khuḍiu siru  $  iha pheḍiu risi-uvasaggu ciru
text.17515: iha so uddesu ṇiẏacchiẏaü  $  jiẏapoma-jaṇaṇu jahĩ acchiẏaü
text.17516: ĕhu desu asesu vi(?) cāru-cariu  $  aïvīra-ṇarāhiu jahĩ dhariu
text.17518: taṃ sundari eu jiẏantaüru  $  jahĩ vaṇamāla samāvaḍiẏa
text.17519: lakkhijjaï lakkhaṇa-pāẏavahŏ  $  ahiṇava velli ṇāĩ caḍiẏa
text.17523: rāmaüri eha guṇa-gāraviẏa  $  jā pūẏaṇa-jakkheṃ kāraviẏa
text.17524: ĕhu aruṇu gāmu kavilahŏ taṇaü  $  tahĩ galathallāviu appaṇaü
text.17525: ĕhu dīsaï sundari viñjhaïri   $  jahĩ vasikiu vālikhillu vaïri
text.17526: vaïdehi eu kuvvara-ṇaẏaru  $  kallāṇamāla jahĩ jāu ṇaru
text.17527: ĕu dasaüru jahĩ lakkhaṇu bhamiu  $  sīhoẏara-sīhu samarĕ damiu
text.17528: ĕha sā gambhīra samāvaḍiẏa  $  jahĩ mahu kara-pallavĕ tuhũ caḍiẏa
text.17529: uhu dīsaï savvu suvaṇṇamaü  $  ṇimmaviu vihīsaṇĕ ṇaṃ ṇavaü
text.17532: kira jamma-bhūmi jaṇaṇīĕ sama  $  aṇṇu vihūsiẏa jiṇaharĕhĩ
text.17533: puri vandiẏa sirĕ sa ĩ bhu va karĕvi  $  jaṇaẏa-taṇaẏa-hari-halaharĕhĩ
text.17535: sīẏahĕ rāmahŏ lakkhaṇahŏ  $  muha-ẏanda-ṇihālaü bharahu gaü
text.17536: vuddhihĕ vavasāẏahŏ vihihĕ  $  ṇaṃ puṇṇa-ṇivahu savaḍammuhaü
text.17541: aṇṇettahĕ sattuhaṇu sa-vāhaṇu  $  sa-rahasu sālaṅkāru sa-sāhaṇu
text.17543: tūraĩ haẏaĩ koḍi-parimāṇĕhĩ  $  dunduhi diṇṇa gaẏaṇĕ givvāṇĕhĩ
text.17544: jaṇavaü ṇiravasesu saṃkhubbhaï  $  raha-gaẏa-turaĕhĩ maggu ṇa labbhaï
text.17547: hari-vala sa-mahila puppha-vimāṇahŏ  $  avara vi ṇaravaï ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-jāṇahŏ
text.17550: dīsaï vihĩ rattuppalahã  $  ṇīluppalu majjhĕ ṇāĩ thiẏaü
text.17554: jiha rāmahŏ tiha ṇamiu kumārahŏ  $  anteurahŏ pagholira-hārahŏ
text.17555: valĕṇa valuddhareṇa hakkārĕvi  $  sarahasa ṇiẏa-bhuva-daṇḍa pasārĕvi
text.17556: avaruṇḍiu bhāẏaru lahuvāraü  $  matthaĕ cumviu puṇu saẏa-vāraü
text.17557: saẏa-vāraü ucchaṅgĕ caḍāviu  $  saẏa-vāraü bhiccahũ darisāviu
text.17559: "bhuñji sahoẏara rajju ṇiraṅkusu  $  ṇanda vaddha jaẏa jīva cirāusu
text.17560: acchaü vīra-lacchi bhuva-daṇḍaĕ  $  ṇivasaü vasuha tuhāraĕ khaṇḍaĕ"
text.17561: ema bhaṇevi pagāsiẏa-ṇāmeṃ  $  puppha-vimāṇĕ caḍāviu rāmeṃ
text.17564: dhammu puṇṇu vavasāu siẏa  $  ṇaṃ milĕvi aüjjha païṭṭhāĩ
text.17578: avarahũ tūrahũ tūriẏahũ  $  kaï koḍiu kiṃ pariẏāṇiẏaü
text.17587: bhaṭṭĕhĩ vaẏaṇucchāha paḍhantĕhĩ  $  vāẏālīsa vi sara sumarantĕhĩ
text.17591: purĕ païsantahŏ rāhavahŏ  $  ṇa kalā-viṇṇāṇaĩ kevalaĩ
text.17592: dunduhi tāḍiẏa surĕhĩ ṇahĕ  $  accharĕhĩ mi gīẏaĩ maṅgalaĩ
text.17596: purĕ païsantĕ rāma-ṇārāẏaṇĕ  $  jāẏa volla vara-ṇāẏariẏā-ẏaṇĕ
text.17597: "ĕhu so rāmu jāsu vihi vīẏaü  $  dīsaï ṇahĕṇāvantu sa-sīẏaü
text.17598: ĕhu so lakkhaṇu lakkhaṇavantaü  $  jeṇa dasāṇaṇu ṇihaü bhiḍantaü
text.17599: ĕhu so vahiṇi vihīsaṇa-rāṇaü  $  suvvaï viṇaẏavantu vahu-jāṇaü
text.17600: ĕhu so sahi suggīvu suṇijjaï  $  giri-kikkindha-ṇaẏaru jo bhuñjaï
text.17601: ĕhu so vijjāharu bhāmaṇḍalu  $  ṇaṃ sura-sāmisālu āhaṇḍalu
text.17602: ĕhu so sahi ṇāmeṇa virāhiu  $  dūsaṇu jeṇa mahāhavĕ sāhiu
text.17603: ĕhu so haṇuu jeṇa vaṇu bhaggaü  $  rāmahŏ diṇṇu rajju āvaggaü3
text.17604: jāma ṇaẏaru ṇāma-ggahaṇālaü  $  tiṇṇi mi tāva païṭṭhaĩ rāulu
text.17606: valu dhavalaü hari sāmalaü  $  vaïdehi suvaṇṇa-vaṇṇu haraï
text.17611: tiṇṇi vi gaẏaĩ tetthu jahĩ kosala  $  paṇha-bharanta-ghaṇa-tthaṇa-maṇḍala
text.17612: sāiu diṇṇaü maṇu sāhāriẏa  $  jiṇavara-paḍima jema jaẏakāriẏa
text.17613: tāĕ vi diṇṇāsīsa maṇohara  $  "jāva mahā-samudda sa-mahīhara
text.17614: dharaï dharatti jāva saẏarāẏara  $  jāva meru ṇahĕ canda-divāẏara
text.17615: jāva disā-gaïnda gaha-maṇḍalu  $  jāva surĕhĩ samāṇu āhaṇḍalu
text.17616: jāva vahanti mahāṇaï-vattaĩ  $  jāva tavanti gaẏaṇĕ ṇakkhattaĩ
text.17617: tāva putta tuhũ siẏa aṇuhuñjahi  $  sīẏāevihĕ paṭṭu paüñjahi
text.17618: lakkhaṇu hou ti-khaṇḍa-pahāṇaü  $  bharahu aüjjhā-maṇḍalĕ rāṇaü
text.17620: kaïkaï-kekkaẏa-suppahaü  $  tiṇṇi vi puṇu tihĩ ahiṇandiẏaü
text.17621: meruhĕ jiṇa-paḍimāu jiha  $  saĩ inda-paḍindĕhĩ vandiẏaü
text.17625: hari-halaharĕhĩ tetthu acchantĕhĩ  $  vahavĕhĩ vāsarehĩ gacchantĕhĩ
text.17626: bharahahŏ rāẏa-lacchi māṇantahŏ  $  tantāvāẏa ve vi jāṇantahŏ
text.17628: chagguṇṇaü asesu jujjantahŏ  $  taha sattaṅgu rajju bhuñjantahŏ
text.17629: vuddhi-mahāguṇa-aṭṭha vahantahŏ  $  dasameṃ bhāeṃ paẏa pālantahŏ
text.17631: ekkahĩ divasĕ jāu ummāhaü  $  kamala-saṇḍu thiu ṇāĩ himāhaü
text.17633: "te raha te gaẏa te turaẏa  $  te miliẏa sa-kiṅkara bhāi-ṇara
text.17634: tāu jaṇeriu so ji haũ  $  para tāu ṇa dīsaï ekku para
text.17638: jiha ṇa tāu tiha haü mi ṇa kāleṃ  $  para vāmohiu mohaṇa-jāleṃ
text.17639: rajju dhigatthu dhigatthaĩ chattaĩ  $  gharu pariẏaṇu dhaṇu putta-kalattaĩ
text.17640: dhaṇṇaü tāu jeṇa parihariẏaĩ  $  duggaï-gāmiẏāĩ duccariẏaĩ
text.17641: haũ puṇu ku-purisu duṇṇaẏa-vantaü  $  ajja vi acchami visaẏāsattaü
text.17642: muṇihĕ pāsĕ ciru laïu avaggahu  $  "rāmāgamaṇĕ homi a-pariggahu
text.17643: jahĩ jĕ divasĕ tiṇṇi vi ṇiddiṭṭhaĩ  $  jahĩ jĕ divasĕ ṇiẏa-ṇaẏarĕ païṭṭhaĩ
text.17644: tahĩ jĕ kālĕ jaṃ ṇa gaü tavovaṇu  $  maṃ vollesaï ko i a-sajjaṇu
text.17645: "duṭṭha-sahāu kasāeṃ laïẏaü  $  rāmāgamĕ ji bharahu pavvaïẏaü"
text.17647: agga-mahisi karĕ jaṇaẏa-suẏa  $  mantittaṇu devi jaṇaddaṇahŏ
text.17648: appuṇu pālahi saẏala mahi  $  haũ rahuvaï jāmi tavovaṇahŏ
text.17652: tāeṃ kavaṇu saccu kira jampiu  $  tumhahã vaṇu mahu rajju samappiu
text.17653: tahŏ aviṇaẏahŏ suddhi para maraṇeṃ  $  ahavaï ghora-vīra-tava-caraṇeṃ
text.17654: teṇa ṇivitti bhaḍārā rajjahŏ  $  evahĩ jāmi thāmi pāvajjahŏ
text.17655: to jiẏa-jāuhāṇa-saṅgāmeṃ  $  bharahu cavantu ṇivāriu rāmeṃ
text.17656: "ajju vi tuhũ jĕ rāu te kiṅkara  $  te gaẏa te turaṅga te rahavara
text.17657: te sāmanta amhĕ te bhāẏara  $  sā samudda-parianta-vasundhara
text.17658: chattaĩ tāĩ taṃ jĕ siṃhāsaṇu  $  taṃ cāmīẏara-cāmara-vāsaṇu
text.17659: bhāmaṇḍalu suggīvu vihīsaṇu  $  saẏala vi taü karanti gharĕ pesaṇu"
text.17661: eva vi jaṃ avaheri kiẏa  $  cala-valaẏa-muhala-kala-ṇeurahŏ
text.17662: "jiha sakkahŏ tiha paḍikhalahŏ"  $  āesu diṇṇu anteurahŏ
text.17666: jaṃ āesu diṇṇu vara-vilaẏahũ  $  jāṇaï-pamuhahũ guṇa-gaṇa-ṇilaẏahũ
text.17676: devara thoḍī vāra vari  $  acchahũ jala-kīla karantāĩ"
text.17680: taṃ paḍivaṇṇu païṭṭhu mahā-saru  $  jala-kīlahĕ vi acalu paramesaru
text.17684: to vi ṇa khuhiu bharahu sahasuṭṭhiu  $  avicalu ṇaṃ giri meru pariṭṭhiu
text.17685: acchaï jāva tīrĕ suha-daṃsaṇu  $  tāva mahā-gaü tijagavihūsaṇu
text.17687: paribhamantu gaü taṃ jĕ mahā-saru  $  bharahu ṇievi jāu jāī-saru
text.17688: "parama-mittu ihu aṇṇa-bhavantarĕ  $  ṇivasiẏa saggĕ ve vi vambhottarĕ
text.17690: puṇṇa-pahāveṃ sambhaviu  $  ihu ṇaravaï haũ puṇu matta-gaü"
text.17691: kavalu ṇa lei ṇa piẏaï jalu  $  atthakkaĕ thiu leppamaü
text.17695: kari sambharaï bhavantaru jāvahĩ  $  puppha-vimāṇu caḍeppiṇu tāvahĩ
text.17696: lakkhaṇa-rāma parāiẏa bhāẏara  $  ṇaṃ sañcārima canda-divāẏara
text.17697: ṇavara visallāsundari-vīẏaĕ  $  bharaha-ṇarāhivo vi sahũ sīẏaĕ
text.17698: caḍiu mahā-gaĕ tihuaṇabhūsaṇĕ  $  suravara-ṇāhu ṇāĩ aïrāvaṇĕ
text.17701: kavalu ṇa lei ṇa geṇhaï pāṇiu  $  kuñjara-cariu ṇa keṇa vi jāṇiu
text.17704: taṃ gaẏavara-vaïẏaru suṇĕvi  $  uppaṇṇa cinta vala-lakkhaṇahũ
text.17709: risi-āgamaṇu suṇĕvi paramantiĕ  $  gaü rahu-ṇandaṇu vandaṇahattiĕ
text.17710: gaẏa sattuhaṇa-bharaha sa-jaṇaddaṇa  $  sa-turaṅgama sa-gaïnda sa-sandaṇa
text.17714: sāhuhũ vandaṇahatti kareppiṇu  $  dasa-paẏāru jiṇa-dhammu suṇeppiṇu
text.17715: pucchiu jeṭṭha-mahārisi rāmeṃ  $  "ĕhu kari tijagavihūsaṇu ṇāmeṃ
text.17716: kavalu ṇa lei ṇa ḍhukkaï salilahŏ  $  jema mahārisindu kali-kalilahŏ"
text.17724: thiu bharahu mahārisi-rūvu levi  $  maṇi-raẏaṇāharaṇaĩ pariharevi
text.17725: tahĩ juvaï-saĕhĩ sahũ kekkaẏā vi  $  thiẏa kesuppāḍu karevi sā vi
text.17726: so tijagavihūsaṇu marĕvi ṇāu  $  vamhuttarĕ saggĕ surindu jāu
text.17727: bharahāhivo vi uppaṇṇa-ṇāṇu  $  vahu-divasĕhĩ gaü logāvasāṇu
text.17732: vaddhu paṭṭu rahu-ṇandaṇahŏ  $  kañcaṇa-kalasĕhĩ ahiseu kiu
text.17733: lakkhaṇu cakka-raẏaṇa-sahiu  $  dhara sa-dhara sa iṃ bhu ñjantu thiu
text.17735: rahuvaï rajju karantu thiu  $  gaü bharahu tavovaṇu
text.17736: diṇṇa vihañjĕvi saẏala mahi  $  sāmantahũ jīvaṇu
text.17744: rahaṇeura-puru bhāmaṇḍalahŏ  $  kaï-dīvu diṇṇu ṇīlahŏ ṇalahŏ
text.17747: valu jīvaṇu dei vighosaï vi  $  "jo ṇaravaï hūvaü hosaï vi
text.17748: so saẏalu vi maĩ abbhatthiẏaü  $  mā hou ko vi jagĕ dutthiẏaü
text.17751: devahã savaṇahã vambhaṇahã  $  maṃ pīḍa karejjahŏ
text.17755: puṇu puṇu abbhatthaï dāsarahi  $  "so ṇaravaï jo pālei mahi
text.17756: aṇurattu paẏaĕ ṇaẏa-viṇaẏa-paru  $  so avicalu rajju karei ṇaru
text.17757: jo ghaĩ puṇu deva-bhoga haraï  $  vara-thāvara-vitti-cheu karaï
text.17758: so khaẏahŏ jāi tihĩ vāsarĕhĩ  $  tihĩ māsahĩ tihĩ saṃvaccharĕhĩ
text.17759: jaï kaha vi cukku tahŏ avasarahŏ  $  to akusalu aṇṇa-bhavantarahŏ"
text.17760: sāmanta ṇijantĕvi rāhavĕṇa  $  sattuhaṇu vuttu jīẏāhavĕṇa
text.17761: "ṇa pahuccaï kāĩ eha pihimi  $  somittihĕ tujjhu majjhu tihi mi
text.17762: paẏaḍijjaï to i majjhĕ jaṇahŏ  $  laï maṇḍalu jaṃ bhāvaï maṇahŏ"
text.17765: to vari mahurāẏahŏ taṇiẏa  $  mahurāuri dijjaï"
text.17769: to maṇĕ cintāviu dāsarahi  $  "duggejjha mahura kiha païsarahi
text.17770: dummahu mahu mahu vi asajjhu raṇĕ  $  ajju vi rāvaṇu ṇaü muu jĕ gaṇĕ
text.17772: so mahura-ṇarāhiu keṇa jiu  $  phaṇavaïhĕ phaṇāmaṇi keṇa hiu
text.17773: tuhũ ajju vi vālu kālu kavaṇu  $  tiẏasahu mi bhaẏaṅkaru hoi raṇu
text.17775: paṇaveppiṇu pabhaṇaï sattuhaṇu  $  "haũ deva ṇiruttaü sattu-haṇu
text.17776: jaï mahura-ṇarāhiu ṇaü haṇami  $  to rahuvaï paï mi ṇa jaẏa bhaṇami
text.17778: païsaï jaï vi saraṇu jamahŏ  $  ahavaï jama-vappahŏ
text.17783: gajjantu ṇivāriu suppahaĕ  $  "kiṃ putta païjjā sampaẏaĕ
text.17784: vollijjaï taṃ jaṃ ṇivvahaï  $  bhaḍa-vokkĕhĩ suhaḍu ṇa jaü lahaï
text.17785: kiṃ sāhasu diṭṭhu ṇa bhāẏarahũ  $  kiu vihĩ jĕ viṇāsu ṇisāẏarahũ
text.17787: taü dasaraha-bharahahĩ ghoru kiu  $  ikkhukka-vaṃsu ĕhu ema thiu
text.17788: tuhũ ṇavara karesahi jampaṇaü  $  to vari jasu rakkhiu appaṇaü
text.17789: jaï mahu uppaṇṇu maṇorahĕṇa  $  jaï jaṇiu jaṇereṃ dasarahĕṇa
text.17790: to paü vi ma dehi parammuhaü  $  paḍivakkhu jiṇesahi sammuhaü
text.17793: putta paẏatteṃ bhuñjĕ tuhũ  $  taṃ mahura-vilāsiṇi"
text.17798: to sa-saru sarāsaṇu rāhavĕṇa  $  dijjaï ṇivvūḍha-mahāhavĕṇa
text.17800: ṇāmeṇa kiẏantavattu pavalu  $  seṇāvaï diṇṇu samanta-valu
text.17801: sāmantahã lakkheṃ pariẏariu  $  sattuhaṇu aüjjhahĕ ṇīsariu
text.17802: su-ṇimittaĩ hūaĩ jantāhũ  $  savvaĩ milanti siẏavantāhũ
text.17804: to mantihĩ pabhaṇiu sattuhaṇu  $  "jaẏa ṇanda vaddha vahu-sattu-haṇu
text.17811: karĕ laggaï jāva ṇa sūlu tahŏ  $  laï tāva mahura mahurāhivahŏ
text.17812: vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa rahasucchaliu  $  paḍivaṇṇaĕ addha-rattĕ caliu
text.17813: purĕ veḍhiĕ vāraĩ ruddhāĩ   $  bhaẏa-vihalaĩ saṃsaĕ chuddhāĩ
text.17814: kiu kalaẏalu tūraĩ āhaẏaĩ  $  virasiẏaĩ asaṅkha-saṅkha-saẏaĩ
text.17821: "paṭṭaṇĕ jiṇavara-dhammĕ jiha  $  mahu kahi mi ṇa dīsaï"
text.17826: uppaṇṇu rosu rahavarĕ caḍiu  $  saṇṇāhu laïu para-valĕ bhiḍiu
text.17827: kiu kalaẏalu tūra-ravabbhaïu  $  saravarĕhĩ kiẏantavattu chaïu
text.17828: teṇa vi ohāmiẏa-sandaṇahŏ  $  dhaẏa-daṇḍu chiṇṇu mahu-ṇandaṇahŏ
text.17829: dhaṇu tāḍiu pāḍiu āhaẏaṇĕ  $  duvvāeṃ ṇaṃ mehāgamaṇĕ
text.17830: teṇa vi kiẏantavattahŏ taṇaü  $  sahũ cindheṃ chiṇṇu sarāsaṇaü
text.17834: vihi mi paropparu vi-rahu kiu  $  thiẏa ve vi gaïndĕhĩ
text.17853: jaṃ lavaṇamahaṇṇaü ṇihaü raṇĕ  $  taṃ mahura-ṇarāhiu kuiu maṇĕ
text.17856: haẏa samara-bheri amarisa-caḍiu  $  sa-rahasu kiẏantavattahŏ bhiḍiu
text.17857: "mahu taṇaü taṇaü jiha ṇihaü raṇĕ  $  tiha paharu paharu diḍhu hohi maṇĕ"
text.17858: tahĩ avasarĕ antarĕ thiu sa-dhaṇu  $  saĩ dasaraha-ṇandaṇu sattuhaṇu
text.17859: te bhiḍiẏa paropparu kuiẏa-maṇa  $  ṇaṃ ve vi purandara-dahavaẏaṇa
text.17863: viñjhahŏ sañjhahŏ majjhĕ thiu  $  ghaṇa-ḍamvaru ṇāvaï
text.17867: avaropparu vāṇĕhĩ chāiẏaü  $  avaropparu kaha vi ṇa ghāiẏaü
text.17868: avaropparu kavaẏaĩ tāḍiẏaĩ  $  avaropparu cindhaĩ phāḍiẏaĩ
text.17869: avaropparu chattaĩ chiṇṇāĩ  $  avaropparu aṅgaĩ bhiṇṇāĩ
text.17870: avaropparu haẏaĩ sarāsaṇaĩ  $  jala-thalaĩ vi jāẏaĩ sa-vvaṇaĩ
text.17871: avaropparu sārahi ṇiṭṭhaviẏa  $  sa-turaṅgama jamaüri paṭṭhaviẏa
text.17872: avaropparu khaṇḍiẏa pavara raha  $  thiẏa matta-gaïndĕhĩ duvvisaha
text.17873: te mahura-ṇarāhiva-sattuhaṇa  $  ṇaṃ ṇahaẏala-laṅghaṇa sa-ghaṇa ghaṇa
text.17874: ṇaṃ kesari giri-siharĕhĩ caḍiẏa  $  ṇaṃ rāvaṇa-rāma samāvaḍiẏa
text.17876: ve vi sa-paharaṇa sāmarisa  $  karivarĕhĩ valaggā
text.17881: samuddhāiẏā sindhurā juddha-luddhā  $  valuttāla-dukkāla-kāla vva kuddhā
text.17885: calantehĩ sañcālio sesa-ṇāo  $  bhamantehĩ pabbhāmio bhūmi-bhāo
text.17886: girindā samuddāvalībhāva jāẏā  $  gaïndesu tesuṭṭhiẏā ve vi rāẏā
text.17888: karindeṇa ohāmio vāraṇindo  $  kumāreṇa ohāmio māhurindo
text.17895: avasāṇĕ kālu jaṃ ḍhukkiẏaü  $  jaṃ rahu-suu jiṇĕvi ṇa sakkiẏaü
text.17896: jaṃ sūlu ṇa dāhiṇa-karĕ caḍiu  $  jaṃ puttahŏ maraṇu samāvaḍiu
text.17897: taṃ parama-visāu jāu mahuhĕ  $  "maĩ ṇa kiẏa pujja tihuaṇa-pahuhĕ
text.17898: pañcendiẏa duddama damiẏa ṇa vi  $  dhamma-kkiẏa ekka vi ṇa kiẏa ka vi
text.17899: maĩ pāveṃ pāvāsattaĕṇa   $  ṇaü vandiẏa deva jiẏantaĕṇa
text.17900: saṃjou savvu ko kahŏ taṇaü  $  ṇipphalu jammu gaü mahu ttaṇaü
text.17901: vari evahĩ sallehaṇu karami  $  vaẏa pañca mahā-duddhara dharami"
text.17902: to ema bhaṇĕvi ṇigganthu thiu  $  saĩ hattheṃ kesuppāḍu kiu
text.17904: "ekku ji jīu mahu ttaṇaü  $  savvahŏ parihāraü
text.17905: raṇu jĕ tavovaṇu jiṇu saraṇu  $  gaẏavaru santhāraü"
text.17909: je bhavva-jaṇahŏ suha-vasuhārā  $  puṇu ghosiẏa pañca ṇamokkārā
text.17910: arahantahũ kerā satta sarā  $  je savvahã sokkhahã paḍhamaẏarā
text.17911: puṇu siddhahũ kerā pañca sarā  $  je sāsaẏa-puravara-siddhiẏarā
text.17912: āẏariẏahũ kerā satta sarā  $  je paramācāra-vicāra-parā
text.17916: "mahu suha-gaï dentu" bhaṇantu thiu  $  kuñjarahŏ jĕ upparĕ kālu kiu
text.17919: mahura sa iṃ bhu ñjantu thiu  $  sattuhaṇu kumāru
text.17921: vaṇu seviu sāẏaru laṅghiẏaü  $  ṇihaü dasāṇaṇu rattaĕṇa
text.17922: avasāṇa-kālĕ puṇu rāhavĕṇa  $  ghalliẏa sīẏa virattaĕṇa
text.17926: loẏahũ chandĕṇa  $  tĕṇa tĕṇa tĕṇa citteṃ
text.17929: jiha vaṇĕ ghalliẏā  $  tĕṇa tĕṇa tĕṇa citteṃ. jaṃbheṭṭiẏā
text.17931: ekkahĩ divasĕ maṇohara-gārī  $  pāsĕ pariṭṭhiẏa sīẏa bhaḍārī
text.17933: "ṇāha ṇāha jaga-mohaṇa-sattihĩ  $  suiṇaü ajju diṭṭhu maĩ rattihĩ
text.17934: puppha-vimāṇahŏ paḍĕvi pahiṭṭhaü  $  saraha-jualu mahu vaẏaṇĕ païṭṭhaü"
text.17937: ṇavara ekku mahu hiẏaeṃ caḍiẏaü  $  sundari saraha-jualu jaṃ paḍiẏaü"
text.17939: to aṇṇĕhĩ divasĕhĩ thovaĕhĩ  $  sīẏaṅgaĩ guruhārāĩ
text.17947: valu vollāvaï ṇaravara-kesari  $  "ko dohalaü akkhu paramesari"
text.17950: piẏa-vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa sāṇandeṃ  $  parama pujja kiẏa rāhava-candeṃ
text.17956: tahĩ tehaĕ uvavaṇĕ païsarĕvi  $  jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṃ pujja kiẏa
text.17957: jiha jiṇavara-dhammahŏ jīva-daẏa  $  jāṇaï rāmahŏ pāsĕ thiẏa
text.17964: "phurĕvi āsi paĩ para-duggejjhahĕ  $  tiṇṇi mi ṇīsāriẏaĩ aüjjhahĕ
text.17966: raṇa-rakkhasĕṇa gilĕvi uggiliẏaĩ  $  kaha vi kaha vi ṇiẏa-gottahŏ miliẏaĩ
text.17967: evahĩ eu ṇa jāṇahũ ikkhaṇu  $  kāĩ karesaï phurĕvi a-lakkhaṇu"
text.17968: to etthantarĕ sāhuddhāreṃ  $  āiẏa paẏa asesa kūvāreṃ
text.17971: jaï avarāhu ṇāhĩ dhara-dhārā  $  to paṭṭaṇu viṇṇavaï bhaḍārā
text.17973: para-purisu ramevi dummahilaü  $  denti paḍuttara paï-ẏaṇahŏ
text.17974: "kiṃ rāmu ṇa bhuñjaï jaṇaẏa-sua  $  varisu vasĕvi gharĕ rāmaṇahŏ""
text.17981: cintaï maüliẏa-vaẏaṇa-saroruhu  $  vasuha lihantu ṭhantu heṭṭhā-muhu
text.17982: "viṇu para-tattiĕ ko vi ṇa jīvaï  $  saĩ viṇaṭṭhu aṇṇaĩ uddīvaï
text.17985: kaï saï jaï ṇaravaï ṇaü bhāvaï  $  avaseṃ kiṃ pi kalaṅkaü lāvaï
text.17986: hoi huāsaṇo vva aviṇīẏaü  $  gimbhu va suṭṭhu aṇicchiẏa-sīẏaü
text.17987: candu va dosa-gāhi khaï kha-tthaü  $  sūru va kara-caṇḍaü dūra-tthaü
text.17988: vāṇu va loha-phalu gguṇa-mukkaü  $  vindhaṇasīlaü dhammahŏ cukkaü
text.17990: jaï kaha vi ṇiraṅkusa hoi paẏa  $  to hatthi-haḍahĕ aṇuharaï
text.17991: jo kavalu dei jalu dakkhavaï  $  tāsu jĕ jīviu avaharaï
text.17998: aṇṇu ṇiei aṇṇu vollāvaï  $  cintaï aṇṇu aṇṇu maṇĕ bhāvaï
text.17999: hiẏavaĕ ṇivasaï visu hālāhalu  $  amiu vaẏaṇĕ diṭṭhihĕ jamu kevalu
text.18000: mahilahĕ taṇaü cariu ko jāṇaï  $  ubhaẏa-taḍaĩ jiha khaṇaï mahā-ṇaï
text.18001: canda-kala va savvovari vaṅkī  $  dosa-ggāhiṇi saĩ sa-kalaṅkī
text.18002: ṇava-vijjuliẏa va cañcala-dehī  $  gorasa-mantha va kārima-ṇehī
text.18004: ṇihi va paẏatteṃ parirakkhevī  $  gulahiẏa-khīri va kahŏ vi ṇa devī"
text.18005: appāṇeṇa jĕ appaü vohiu  $  "vari gaẏa sīẏa ma lou virohiu
text.18007: ṇiẏa-ṇeha-ṇivaddhaü āvaḍaï  $  jaï vi mahā-saï mahu maṇahŏ
text.18008: ko pheḍĕvi sakkaï lañchaṇaü   $  jaṃ gharĕ ṇivasiẏa rāvaṇahŏ"
text.18015: kaḍḍhiu sūrahāsu karĕ ṇimmalu  $  vijju-vilāsu jalaṇu jālujjalu
text.18016: "dujjaṇa-maïẏavaṭṭu haũ acchami  $  jo jampaï tahŏ palaü samicchami
text.18017: jaṃ kiu kharahŏ mahā-khala-khuddahŏ  $  jaṃ kiu raṇĕ rāvaṇahŏ raüddahŏ
text.18019: ko ghallāvaï sīẏa mahā-saï  $  ṇāma-ggahaṇĕ jāhĕ duhu ṇāsaï
text.18020: jā suravarĕhĩ païvvaẏa vuccaï  $  jāhĕ pasāeṃ vasumaï paccaï
text.18021: jāhĕ pahāveṃ rahu-kulu ṇandaï  $  palaẏahŏ pisuṇu jā ujo ṇindaï
text.18022: jāhĕ pāẏa-paṃsu vi vandijjaï  $  tāhĕ kalaṅku kema lāijjaï
text.18024: jo rūsaï sīẏa-mahāsaïhĕ  $  so muhu aggaĕ thāu khalu
text.18025: tahŏ pāvahŏ virasu rasantāhŏ  $  khuḍami sa-hattheṃ sira-kamalu
text.18032: "jaï samuddu ṇiẏa-samaẏahŏ cukkaï  $  to tahŏ ko savaḍammuhu ḍhukkaï
text.18033: jaï vi ḍahanti ṇimitteṃ kandahã  $  to vi ṇa rūsaï viñjhu pulindahã
text.18034: candaṇu chijjaï bhijjaï ghāsaï  $  to i ṇa ṇiẏaẏa-gandhu tahŏ ṇāsaï
text.18035: dantu dalijjaï pāvaï kappaṇu  $  to vi ṇa muaï ṇiẏaẏa-dhavalattaṇu
text.18036: paẏa ṇaravaïhĩ ṇaeṇa laevī  $  dummuha jaï vi to vi pālevī"
text.18037: to viṇṇaviu kumāreṃ rāhavu  $  "ahŏ paramesara parama-parāhavu
text.18038: jaṃ jaṇavaü ṇiẏa-ṇāhu ṇa pucchaï  $  laddha-pasaru rāẏa-ulu duguñchaï
text.18041: ikkhukka-vaṃsĕ uppaṇṇaĕhĩ  $  savvĕhĩ pāliu puru acalu
text.18048: halu vi ṇa bhāvaï  $  sīẏahĕ ṇāmeṇaṃ
text.18049: "etthu vaccha avaheri karevī  $  jaṇaẏa-taṇaẏa vaṇĕ kahi mi thavevī
text.18050: jīvaü maraü kāĩ kira tattiĕ  $  kiṃ diṇamaṇi sahũ ṇivasaï rattiĕ
text.18051: maṃ rahu-kulĕ kalaṅku uppajjaü  $  tihuaṇĕ aẏasa-paḍahu maṃ vajjaü"
text.18052: jāu ṇiruttaru kaïkaï-ṇandaṇu  $  lahu seṇāṇī ḍhoiu sandaṇu
text.18053: devi caḍāviẏa ṇiẏa-pariesahŏ  $  pekkhantahŏ puravarahŏ asesahŏ
text.18056: gharu viṇaṭṭhu khala-pisuṇahũ chandeṃ  $  dhi-dhi ajuttu kiu rāhavacandeṃ
text.18059: vari jāẏa ṇāri vaṇĕ vellaḍiẏa  $  jā ṇavi muccaï taruvarĕṇa"
text.18067: ciñciṇī campaẏaṃ cūa-cavi-candaṇā  $  vaṃsu visu vañjulaṃ vaüla-vaḍa-vandaṇā
text.18068: timira-taru tarala-tālūra-tāmicchiẏaṃ  $  simvalī sallaī sellu sattacchaẏaṃ
text.18072: ṇimva-kosamva-jamvīra-jamvū varaṃ  $  khiṅkhiṇī rāiṇī toraṇī tumvaraṃ
text.18075: jaṃ jeṇa jemva kammaü kiẏaü  $  taṃ tahŏ teva samāvaḍaï
text.18076: kiṃ rajjahŏ ṭālĕvi jaṇaẏa-sua  $  daïveṃ ṇijjaï taṃ aḍaï
text.18090: mukka tetthu sūeṇa jāṇaī  $  "mahu ṇa dosu rahuvaï jĕ jāṇaī
text.18092: vari visu hālāhaü bhakkhiẏaü  $  vari jama-lou ṇihāliẏaü
text.18100: sevā-dhammu hoi dujjāṇaü  $  pahu pekkhevaü vaggha-samāṇaü
text.18102: jahĩ atthāṇu ṇivandhaï rāṇaü  $  tahĩ pāikku jaï vi porāṇaü
text.18103: ṇaü vaïsaṇaü ṇa vaḍḍaü jīvaṇu  $  ṇa karevaü kaẏāvi ṇiṭṭhīvaṇu
text.18106: ṇaü ṇiẏaḍaĕ ṇa dūrĕ vaïsevaü  $  ratta-viratta-cittu jāṇevaü
text.18107: aggala pacchala pariharievī  $  jiha tūsaï tiha seva karevī
text.18109: paṇaveppiṇu vamphaï vaḍḍamihĕ   $  siru vikkiṇaï jievāhŏ
text.18110: sokkhahŏ aṇudiṇu pesaṇu karĕvi  $  ṇavari ṇa ekku vi sevāhŏ"
text.18117: vāra-vāra tahĕ diṇṇu visesaṇu  $  "jāmi māĕ mahu ettiu pesaṇu"
text.18118: jaṃ asahejjī mukka vaṇantarĕ  $  mucchaü enti janti tahĩ avasarĕ
text.18119: dhāhāviu ukkaṇṭhula-bhāvaĕ  $  "kammu raüddu kiẏaü maĩ pāvaĕ
text.18120: mañchuḍu sārasa-jualu vioiu  $  cakkavāẏa-mihuṇu va vicchoiu
text.18121: jammahã laggĕvi dukkhahã bhāẏaṇa  $  hā bhāmaṇḍala hā ṇārāẏaṇa
text.18122: hā sattuhaṇa ṇāhĩ mambhīsahi  $  hā jaṇeri hā jaṇaṇa ṇa dīsahi
text.18123: hā haẏa-vihi haũ kāĩ vioiẏa  $  siva-siẏāla-saddūlahã ḍhoiẏa
text.18124: hā haẏa-vihi tuhũ kāĩ viruddhaü  $  jeṇa rāmu mahu upparĕ kuddhaü
text.18126: vari tiṇa-siha vari vaṇĕ vellaḍiẏa  $  vari sila loẏahũ pāṇa-piẏa
text.18127: dūhava-durāsa-duha-bhāẏaṇiẏa  $  ṇaü maĩ jehī kā vi tiẏa
text.18132: jalu thalu vaṇu tiṇu  $  bhuvaṇu vicittaü
text.18133: jaṃ ji ṇihālami  $  taṃ ji palittaü
text.18134: bhaṇu bhaṇu bhāṇu bhāṇu bhū-bhāvaṇu  $  jaï maĩ maṇĕṇa samicchiu rāvaṇu
text.18135: vaṇasaï tuhu mi tāva tahĩ hontī  $  jaïẏahũ ṇiẏa ṇisiẏarĕṇa ruvantī
text.18136: ṇahaẏala tuhu mi hontu tahĩ avasarĕ  $  jaïẏahũ jiu jaḍāu saṅgara-varĕ
text.18137: jaïẏahũ raẏaṇakesi dalavaṭṭiu  $  vijjā-cheu karĕvi āvaṭṭiu
text.18138: vasumaï paï mi diṭṭha taruvara-ghaṇĕ  $  jaïẏahũ ṇivasiẏāsi ṇandaṇavaṇĕ
text.18139: acchiu varuṇu pavaṇu sihi bhakkharu  $  keṇa vi volliu ṇa vi dhammakkharu
text.18140: loẏahũ kāraṇĕ duppariṇāmeṃ  $  haũ ṇikkāraṇĕ ghalliẏa rāmeṃ
text.18141: jaï muẏa kaha vi saïttaṇa-dhārī  $  to tumhahã tiẏa-hacca mahārī"
text.18143: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi sīẏahĕ taṇaü  $  deva-lou cintāviẏaü
text.18154: "haũ ṇillakkhaṇa ṇijjaṇa-thāmeṃ  $  loẏahŏ chandeṃ ghalliẏa rāmeṃ
text.18155: rāma-ṇāri lakkhaṇu mahu devaru  $  bhāmaṇḍalu ekkoẏaru bhāẏaru
text.18156: jaṇaü jaṇeru videha jaṇerī  $  suṇha ṇarindahŏ dasaraha-kerī"
text.18157: pabhaṇaï vajjajaṅghu "mahi-pālā  $  lakkhaṇa-rāma māĕ mahu sālā
text.18158: tuhũ puṇu dhamma-vahiṇi haũ bhāẏaru"  $  sāhukkāriu surĕhĩ ṇaresaru
text.18160: lāẏaṇṇu ṇiĕvi sīẏahĕ taṇaü  $  tihuaṇĕ kāsu ṇa khuhiu maṇu
text.18161: giri dhīreṃ sāẏaru gahirimaĕ  $  vajjajaṅghu para ekku jaṇu
text.18169: sasa bhaṇevi paḍahaü devāviu  $  jaṇu āsaṅkā-thāṇu muāviu
text.18170: tahĩ uppaṇṇa putta lavaṇaṅkusa  $  lakkhaṇa-lakkhaṅkiẏa dīhāusa
text.18174: tehĩ pahāveṃ tahĩ riu thambhiẏa  $  rahukula-bhavaṇa-khambha ṇaṃ ubbhiẏa
text.18177: riu lavaṇaṅgusĕhĩ ṇiraṅkusĕhĩ  $  daṇḍa-sajjhu kiu ṇāĩ ahi
text.18178: cappĕvi vappikkī dāsi jiha  $  laïẏa sa ẏam bhu va leṇa mahi
text.18181: bhiḍiẏā āhavĕ ve vi jaṇa  $  lavaṇaṅkusa lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ
text.18194: māṇusa-veseṃ avaẏarĕvi  $  ve bhāẏa ṇāĩ thiẏa kāmahŏ
text.18195: "kiha pariṇāvami jamala-maï"   $  uppaṇṇa cinta maṇĕ māmahŏ
text.18199: paṭṭhaviẏa mahantā teṇa tāsu  $  pihimī-puravarĕ pihu-pahuhĕ pāsu
text.18201: dūẏahŏ vaẏaṇeṃ dūmiu ṇarindu  $  ṇaṃ phuriẏa-phaṇā-maṇi thiu phaṇindu
text.18203: gaü dūu durakkhara-dūmiẏaṅgu  $  ṇaṃ daṇḍa-ghāẏa-ghāiu bhuaṅgu
text.18204: lavaṇaṅkusa-māmahŏ kahiu teva  $  "pihu-rāeṃ duhiẏa ṇa diṇṇa" jeva
text.18205: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu laïẏa kheri  $  devāviẏa lahu saṇṇāha-bheri
text.18208: tāva ṇarāhiu vaggharahu  $  pihu-pakkhiu raṇa-mahi maṇḍĕvi
text.18209: jalahara khīlĕvi sukku jiha  $  thiu aggaĕ jujjhu samoḍḍĕvi
text.18213: te vagghamahāraha-vajjajaṅgha  $  abbhiṭṭa paropparu raṇĕ alaṅgha
text.18214: vahu divasa kareppiṇu saṃpahāru  $  pariẏāṇĕvi para-vala-parama-sāru
text.18216: tahĩ kālĕ kuiu pihu pihula-kāu  $  sāmanta-saẏaĩ melavĕvi āu
text.18217: ettahĕ vi kumārĕhĩ dujjaehĩ  $  jaẏakāriẏa sīẏa raṇujjaehĩ
text.18220: "veḍhijjaï māĕ ṇa māmu jāva  $  jāevaü amhahĩ tetthu tāva"
text.18222: to volāviẏa ve vi jaṇa  $  jaṇaṇiĕ harisaṃsu-vimīsaĕ
text.18223: "sa-giri sa-sāẏara saẏala mahi  $  bhuñjejjahu mahu āsīsaĕ"
text.18227: āsīsa laĕvi vinni vi paẏaṭṭa  $  alamala-vala-maẏagala-maïẏavaṭṭa
text.18228: gaẏa tettahĕ jettahĕ raṇu alaṅghu  $  jaẏakāriu ṇaravaï vajjajaṅghu
text.18229: "amhĕhĩ jīvantĕhĩ dukkhu kavaṇu  $  jahĩ aṅkusu huavahu lavaṇu pavaṇu
text.18230: kā gaṇaṇa tetthu vihi-patthiveṇa  $  avareṇa vi pavara-ṇarāhiveṇa"
text.18232: rahu vāhiu tūraĩ vāiẏāĩ  $  kiu kalaẏalu seṇṇaĩ dhāiẏāĩ
text.18236: pihu-patthiu lavaṇaṅkusĕhĩ  $  helaĕ jĕ parammuhu laggaü
text.18237: ṇāvaï jhatti jhaḍappiẏaü  $  vihĩ sīhahĩ matta-mahāgaü
text.18241: tahĩ avasarĕ samara-ṇiraṅkusehĩ  $  paccāriu pihu lavaṇaṅkusehĩ
text.18242: "kula-sīla-vihūṇahũ lhasiẏa kema  $  valu valu dūvāgamĕ caviu jema"
text.18243: pihu-patthiu calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu tāhã  $  "rūsevaü ṇaü amhārisāhã
text.18244: laï lavaṇa tuhārī kaṇaẏamāla  $  maẏaṇaṅkusa tuhu mi taraṅgamāla"
text.18245: païsārĕvi puravarĕ kiu vivāhu  $  thiu vajjajaṅghu jaẏa-siri-saṇāhu
text.18246: teṇa vi vattīsa taṇubbhavāu  $  ṇiẏa-kaṇṇaü diṇṇa sa-vibbhamāu
text.18248: sāmantahã miliẏa aṇeẏa lakkha  $  pāikkahã vujjhiẏa keṇa saṅkha
text.18250: je alamala-vala pavala-vala  $  hari-vala-valĕhĩ ṇa sāhiẏa
text.18251: te ṇaravaï lavaṇaṅkusĕhĩ  $  savasikareppiṇu desa pasāhiẏa
text.18260: eẏa vi avara vi kiẏa vasa-viheẏa  $  pallaṭṭa paḍīvā mehileẏa
text.18261: taṃ puṇḍarīẏa-puravaru païṭṭha  $  thuu vajjajaṅghu vaïdehi diṭṭha
text.18262: tahĩ kālĕ akali-kaliẏāraeṇa  $  pomāiẏa veṇṇi vi ṇāraeṇa
text.18264: "maḍḍa laeppiṇu saẏala mahi  $  kiẏa dāsi va pesaṇa-gārī
text.18265: para jīvantĕhĩ hari-valĕhĩ  $  ṇaü tumhahã siẏa vaḍḍārī"
text.18269: taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi lavaṇaṅkuseṇa  $  vollijjaï parama-mahāuseṇa
text.18270: "kahi kahi ko hari-vala eu kavaṇu"  $  to kahaï kumārahŏ gaẏaṇa-gamaṇu
text.18272: tahŏ ṇandaṇa lakkhaṇa-rāma ve vi   $  vaṇa-vāsahŏ ghalliẏa teṇa te vi
text.18273: gaẏa daṇḍāraṇṇu païṭṭha jāva  $  avahariẏa sīẏa rāvaṇeṇa tāva
text.18274: tehi mi melāviu pamaẏa-seṇṇu  $  haẏa bheri paẏāṇaü ṇavara diṇṇu
text.18275: veḍhiẏa laṅkāuri haü dasāsu  $  paḍivalĕvi aüjjhahĩ kiu ṇivāsu
text.18276: jaṇa-vaẏa-vaseṇa saï suddha-citta  $  ṇikkāraṇĕ kāṇaṇĕ ṇevi ghitta
text.18278: vajjajaṅghu tahĩ kahi mi gaü  $  teṃ diṭṭha ruvanti varāiẏa
text.18279: sasa bhaṇevi saṅgahiẏa gharĕ  $  lavaṇaṅkusa putta viẏāiẏa"
text.18283: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi bhaṇaï aṇaṅgalavaṇu  $  "amhāṇa samāṇu kulīṇu kavaṇu
text.18284: kiu jeṇa ṇavara jaṇaṇihĕ malittu  $  tahũ haũ davaggi ḍahaṇekka-cittu
text.18285: vaṭṭaï jāṇijjaï tahĩ jĕ kālĕ  $  duddarisaṇĕ bhīsaṇĕ bhaḍa-vamālĕ
text.18286: jima lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ palaü jāu  $  jima amhahã vihi mi viṇāsu āu
text.18287: kahŏ taṇaü vappu kahŏ taṇaü puttu  $  jo haṇaï so jivaï riu ṇiruttu
text.18288: jāṇĕvi kumāra-vikkamu alaṅghu  $  suṭṭheriu rosiu vajjajaṅghu
text.18289: "jo tumhahã tihi mi aṇiṭṭhu pāu  $  so mahu mi ṇa bhāvaï pisuṇa-bhāu"
text.18290: paripucchiu ṇāraü parama-joi  $  "etthahŏ aüjjha kiṃ dūra hoi"
text.18292: kahaï mahā-risi gaẏaṇa-gaï  $  tahŏ lavaṇahŏ samarĕ samatthahŏ
text.18297: vaïdehi ṇivāraï dara ruvanti  $  "te dujjaẏa lakkhaṇa-rāma honti
text.18298: haṇuvantu jāhã gharĕ karaï seva  $  āruṭṭhahŏ jasu deva vi a-deva
text.18299: suggīu vihīsaṇu bhicca jāhã  $  ko raṇĕ dhura dharĕvi samatthu tāhã
text.18300: dasakandharu duddharu ṇihaü jehĩ  $  ko paharĕvi sakkaï samaü tehĩ"
text.18301: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi lavaṇaṅkusa palitta  $  ṇaṃ viṇṇi huāsaṇa ghiĕṇa sitta
text.18302: "kiṃ amhahã valĕ sāmanta ṇatthi  $  kiṃ amhahã ṇa-vi raha-turaẏa-hatthi
text.18303: kiṃ amhahã diḍhaĩ ṇa vāraṇāĩ  $  kiṃ amhahã karĕhĩ ṇa paharaṇāĩ
text.18304: kiṃ amhahã taṇaü ṇa hoi ghāu  $  sāmaṇṇa-maraṇĕ ko bhaẏahŏ thāu"
text.18307: jeṇa ruvāviẏa māẏa mahu  $  tahŏ taṇiẏa māẏa rovāvami"
text.18311: haẏa bheri paẏāṇaü diṇṇu tehĩ  $  raṇa-rasa-bhariẏahĩ lavaṇaṅkusehĩ
text.18312: aggaĕ dasa saẏa kuṭṭhāriẏāhã  $  dasa dāruṇa kuddala-dhāriẏāhã
text.18315: dasa lakkha gaẏahũ maẏa-ṇibbharāhũ  $  dasa rahahũ aṭṭhāraha haẏavarāhũ
text.18316: vattīsa lakkha phārakkiẏāhũ  $  caüsaṭṭhi pavara dhāṇukkiẏāhũ
text.18318: ṇaravaïhĩ koḍi dasa kiṅkarāhã  $  sāvaraṇahã vara-paharaṇa-karāhã
text.18320: sa-rahasu lavaṇaṅkusahã valu  $  pahĕ uppahĕ kaha vi ṇa māiẏaü
text.18321: ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālĕ samudda-jalu  $  rellantu aüjjha parāiẏaü
text.18325: to dappuddharĕhĩ ṇiraṅkusehĩ  $  paṭṭhaviu dūu lavaṇaṅkusehĩ
text.18326: gaü jhatti aüjjhāuri païṭṭhu  $  sa-jaṇaddaṇu sīẏā-daïu diṭṭhu
text.18327: "ahŏ rahuvaï ahŏ lakkhaṇa-kumāra  $  vollijjaï kettiu vāra-vāra
text.18329: ihu ghaĩ puṇu ṇaravaï vajjajaṅghu  $  uvahi va a-khohu meru va a-laṅghu
text.18332: lavaṇaṅkusa-māmu mahā-pacaṇḍu  $  so tumhahã āiu kāla-daṇḍu
text.18334: teṃ sahũ kāĩ mahāhavĕṇa  $  ṇiẏa-kosu asesu vi deppiṇu
text.18340: "jā jāhi dūa kiṃ gajjieṇa  $  jalaeṇa va jala-parivajjieṇa
text.18341: ko vajjajaṅghu ko 'ṇaṅgalavaṇu  $  ko aṅkusu tāsu paẏāvu kavaṇu
text.18342: jiha sakkahŏ tiha uttharahŏ tumhĕ  $  gahiẏāuha thiẏa saṇṇahĕvi amhĕ"
text.18343: gaü dūu turantu vahantu kheri  $  haẏa hari-vala-valĕ saṇṇāha-bheri
text.18344: saṇṇaddhu rāmu rāmāhirāmu  $  taïlokkabbhantarĕ bhamiu ṇāmu
text.18363: raṇa-bhoẏaṇu bhuñjantaĕṇa  $  ve muhaĩ kiẏaĩ ṇaṃ kāleṃ
text.18369: kahiṃ ji āgaẏā gaẏā  $  pahāra-saṃgaẏā gaẏā
text.18370: kahiṃ jĕ vāṇa-jajjarā  $  bhamanta matta kuñjarā
text.18371: kahiṃ jĕ danti dantaẏā  $  rasanti bhagga-dantaẏā
text.18372: kahiṃ jĕ te su-lohiẏā  $  giri vva dhāu-lohiẏā
text.18373: kahiṃ jĕ āhaẏā haẏā  $  paḍanti cindhaẏā dhaẏā
text.18380: tāva valuddhuru vaïri-valu  $  jagaḍantu majjhĕ saṃgāmahŏ
text.18381: dhāiu aṅkusu lakkhaṇahŏ  $  abbhiṭṭu lavaṇu raṇĕ rāmahŏ
text.18385: abbhiṭṭa paropparu lavaṇa-rāma  $  ṇaṃ daïveṃ ṇimmiẏa viṇṇi kāma
text.18386: viṇṇi vi bhūgoẏara-sāra-bhūẏa  $  thiẏa viṇṇi vi ṇāĩ kiẏanta-dūẏa
text.18387: ṇaṃ saggahŏ inda-paḍinda paḍiẏa  $  viṇṇi vi ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-rahavarĕhĩ caḍiẏa
text.18388: viṇṇi vi apphāliẏa-caṇḍa-cāva  $  viṇṇi vi avaropparu palaẏa-bhāva
text.18389: viṇṇi vi dappuddhara vaddha-rosa  $  viṇṇi vi surasundari-jaṇiẏa-tosa
text.18390: viṇṇi vi raṇa-rāmāliṅgiẏaṅga  $  viṇṇi vi dūrujjhiẏa-pisuṇa-saṅga
text.18391: viṇṇi vi avahatthiẏa-maraṇa-saṅka  $  viṇṇi vi pakkhāliẏa-pāva-paṅka
text.18400: suggīvahŏ jeṇa su-diṇṇa tāra  $  jeṃ rāvaṇu bhaggu aṇeẏa-vāra
text.18401: taṃ pavaru sarāsaṇu sa-saru levi  $  kira vindhaï ālakkhiu karevi
text.18402: rahu khaṇḍiu sīẏa-sueṇa tāva  $  pariosiẏa sura samarekka-bhāva
text.18403: haü sārahi āhaẏa vara turaṅga  $  ṇaṃ pārāvārahŏ hiẏa taraṅga
text.18404: pabhaṇiu aṇaṅgalavaṇeṇa rāmu  $  "tuhũ jaï uvavāsĕṇa huẏaü khāmu
text.18405: to vāvaru savva-parakkameṇa  $  jiẏa ṇisiẏara eṇa ji vikkameṇa"
text.18408: valĕvi paḍīvī lagga karĕ  $  ṇaṃ kula-vahu ṇiẏa-bhattārahŏ
text.18412: jiha mukku ṇa ḍhukkaï koi vāṇu  $  tiha halu tiha moggaru tiha kivāṇu
text.18413: tiha musalu gaẏāsaṇi tiha rahaṅgu  $  tiha avaru vi paharaṇu raṇĕ ahaṅgu
text.18414: lakkhaṇu vi tāva maẏaṇaṅkuseṇa  $  ṇaṃ ruddhu mahā-gaü aṅkuseṇa
text.18415: āmellaï paharaṇu jaṃ jĕ jaṃ jĕ  $  lavaṇāṇuu chindaï taṃ jĕ taṃ jĕ
text.18416: dhaṇu pāḍiu pāḍiu āẏavattu  $  haẏa haẏavara sārahi dharaṇi-pattu
text.18417: gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ to vollanti deva  $  "jiẏa vālĕhĩ lakkhaṇa-rāma keva"
text.18418: hāsaṃ gaü suravara-paüra-vindu  $  "haü aṇṇeṃ keṇa vi ṇisiẏarindu
text.18419: khara-dūsaṇu samvukumāru jo vi  $  aṇṇeṇa ji keṇa vi ṇihaü so vi"
text.18422: ṇahu mahiẏalu pāẏālaẏalu  $  saẏalu vi lavaṇaṅkusihūaü
text.18429: dhavalujjalu hari-karaẏalĕ vihāi  $  vara-kamalahŏ uppari kamalu ṇāĩ
text.18430: āẏāmĕvi melliu lakkhaṇeṇa  $  gaü pharaharantu ṇahĕ takkhaṇeṇa
text.18431: āsaṅkiẏa sura ṇara je 'ṇuratta  $  "laï evahĩ sīẏā-suẏa samatta"
text.18432: ti-paẏāhiṇa ṇavaraṅkusahŏ devi  $  thiu harihĕ paḍīvaü karĕ caḍevi
text.18433: paḍivāraü ghattiu lakkhaṇeṇa  $  paḍivāraü āiu takkhaṇeṇa
text.18435: hari āmellaï amarisĕṇa  $  tahŏ vālahŏ taṇṇa pahāvaï
text.18436: vāhira-viddhu kalattu jiha  $  paribhamevi puṇu puṇu āvaï
text.18441: "hari-valahŏ eha kira kavaṇa vuddhi  $  ṇiẏa-putta vahĕvi kahĩ lahahŏ suddhi
text.18442: guru-hāra vaṇantarĕ mukka devi  $  uppaṇṇa taṇaẏa tahĕ eẏa ve vi
text.18444: vīẏaü maẏaṇaṅkusu ehu deva  $  sahũ āẏahũ paharahŏ tumhi keva"
text.18445: risi-vaẏaṇu suṇevi mahā-valehĩ  $  paricattaĩ karaṇaĩ hari-valehĩ
text.18446: avaruṇḍiẏa cumviẏa vihĩ vi ve vi  $  kama-kamalahã ṇivaḍiẏa tāma te vi
text.18447: lavaṇaṅkusa-lakkhaṇa-rāma miliẏa  $  caü sāẏara ekkahĩ ṇāĩ miliẏa
text.18449: vajjajaṅghu sa ĩ bhu a juĕhĩ  $  avaruṇḍiu jāṇaï-kantĕṇa
text.18450: vāra-vāra pomāiẏaü  $  "mahu miliẏa putta paĩ hontĕṇa"
text.18459: rāmu aṇaṅgalavaṇu rahĕ ekkahĩ  $  lakkhaṇu maẏaṇaṅkusu aṇṇekkahĩ
text.18460: vajjajaṅghu thiu duddama-vāraṇĕ  $  vīẏā-ẏandu ṇāĩ gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ
text.18462: jaṇavaü rahaseṃ aṅgĕ ṇa māiu  $  ekkamekka-cūrantu padhāiu
text.18463: pekkhĕvi te kumāra païsantā  $  ṇāriu ṇa vi gaṇanti paï santā
text.18464: sīẏā-ṇandaṇa-rūvāloẏaṇĕ  $  lāẏaï kā vi alattaü loẏaṇĕ
text.18465: kā vi dei aharullaĕ kajjalu  $  kāĕ vi ghattiu pacchaĕ añcalu
text.18468: jagĕ kāmeṃ ko vi ṇa vaddhaü  $  sa-sareṃ kusuma-sarāsaṇĕṇa
text.18472: āẏallaü karanta taruṇī-ẏaṇĕ  $  lavaṇaṅkusa païsāriẏa paṭṭaṇĕ
text.18475: je paṭṭhaviẏa gāma-pura-desahũ  $  gaẏa hakkārā tāhũ asesahũ
text.18476: ṇāṇā-jāṇa-vimāṇĕhĩ āiẏa  $  ṇaṃ jiṇa-jammaṇĕ amara parāiẏa
text.18477: diṭṭhu rāmu somitti mahāusu  $  diṭṭhu aṇaṅgalavaṇu maẏaṇaṅkusu
text.18478: sattuhaṇo vi diṭṭhu tahĩ sundara  $  ekkahĩ miliẏa pañca ṇaṃ mandara
text.18479: puṇaravi rāmahŏ kiẏa ahivandaṇa  $  "dhaṇṇaü tuhũ jasu ehā ṇandaṇa
text.18481: ettaḍaü dosu para rahuvaïhĕ  $  jaṃ paramesari ṇāhĩ gharĕ
text.18482: ma pamāẏahi loẏahũ chandĕṇa  $  āṇĕvi kā vi parikkha karĕ"
text.18486: taṃ ṇisuṇevi cavaï rahuṇandaṇu  $  "jāṇami sīẏahĕ taṇaü saïttaṇu
text.18487: jāṇami jiha hari-vaṃsuppaṇṇī  $  jāṇami jiha vaẏa guṇa-saṃpaṇṇī
text.18488: jāṇami jiha jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ bhattī  $  jāṇami jiha mahu sokkhuppattī
text.18490: jāṇami jiha sāẏara-gambhīrī  $  jāṇami jiha sura-mahihara-dhīrī
text.18491: jāṇami aṅkusa-lavaṇa-jaṇerī  $  jāṇami jiha suẏa jaṇaẏahŏ kerī
text.18492: jāṇami sasa bhāmaṇḍala-rāẏahŏ  $  jāṇami sāmiṇi rajjahŏ āẏahŏ
text.18493: jāṇami jiha anteura-sārī  $  jāṇami jiha mahu pesaṇa-gārī
text.18495: mellepiṇu ṇāẏara-loĕṇa  $  mahu gharĕ ubbhā karĕvi kara
text.18496: jo dujjasu upparĕ ghittaü  $  eu ṇa jāṇahŏ ekku para"
text.18500: tahĩ avasarĕ raẏaṇāsava-jāeṃ  $  kokkiẏa tiẏaḍa vihīsaṇa-rāeṃ
text.18501: vollāviẏa ettahĕ vi turanteṃ  $  laṅkāsundari to haṇuvanteṃ
text.18502: viṇṇi vi viṇṇavanti paṇamantiu  $  sīẏa-saïttaṇa-gavvu vahantiu
text.18503: "deva deva jaï huavahu ḍajjhaï  $  jaï māruu paḍa-poṭṭalĕ vajjhaï
text.18504: jaï pāẏālĕ ṇahaṅgaṇu loṭṭaï  $  kālantarĕṇa kālu jaï tiṭṭhaï
text.18505: jaï uppajjaï maraṇu kiẏantahŏ  $  jaï ṇāsaï sāsaṇu arahantahŏ
text.18506: jaï avareṃ uggamaï divāẏaru  $  meru-siharĕ jaï ṇivasaï sāẏaru
text.18507: eu asesu vi sambhāvijjaï  $  sīẏahĕ sīlu ṇa puṇu maïlijjaï
text.18509: jaï eva vi ṇaü pattijjahi  $  to paramesara eu karĕ
text.18510: tula-cāula-visa-jala-jalaṇahã  $  pañcahã ekku ji divvu dharĕ"
text.18514: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi rahuvaï pariosiu  $  "eva hou" hakkāraü pesiu
text.18515: gaü suggīu vihīsaṇu aṅgaü  $  candoẏara-ṇandaṇu pavaṇaṅgaü
text.18516: pesiu puppha-vimāṇu paẏaṭṭaü  $  ṇaṃ ṇahaẏala-sarĕ kamalu visaṭṭaü
text.18517: puṇḍarīẏa-puravaru sampāiẏa  $  diṭṭha devi rahaseṇa ṇa māiẏa
text.18518: "ṇanda vaḍḍha jaẏa hohi cirāusa  $  viṇṇi vi jāhĕ putta lavaṇaṅkusa
text.18519: lakkhaṇa-rāma jehĩ āẏāmiẏa  $  sīhahĩ jiha gaïnda ohāmiẏa
text.18520: rakkhiẏa ṇāraeṇa samaraṅgaṇĕ  $  tehi mi te païsāriẏa paṭṭaṇĕ
text.18521: amhaĩ āẏa tumha-hakkārā  $  diahā hontu maṇoraha-gārā
text.18523: caḍu puppha-vimāṇĕ bhaḍāriĕ  $  milu puttahã paï-devarahã
text.18524: sahũ acchahĩ majjhĕ pariṭṭhiẏa  $  pihimi jema caü-sāẏarahã"
text.18528: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi lavaṇaṅkusa-māẏaĕ  $  vuttu vihīsaṇu gaggira-vāẏaĕ
text.18529: "ṇiṭṭhura-hiẏaẏahŏ a-laïẏa-ṇāmahŏ  $  jāṇami tatti ṇa kijjaï rāmahŏ
text.18533: jahĩ māṇusu jīvantu vi luccaï  $  vihi kali-kālu vi pāṇahũ muccaï
text.18534: tahĩ vaṇĕ ghallāviẏa aṇṇāṇeṃ  $  evahĩ kiṃ tahŏ taṇĕṇa vimāṇeṃ
text.18537: so dukkaru ulhāvijjaï  $  meha-saeṇa vi varisiĕṇa
text.18541: jaï vi ṇa kāraṇu rāhava-candeṃ  $  to vi jāmi laï tumhahã chandeṃ"
text.18542: ẽva bhaṇevi devi jaẏa-sundari  $  kama-kamalahĩ accanti vasundhari
text.18544: kosala-ṇaẏari parāiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  diṇamaṇi gaü atthavaṇahŏ tāvĕhĩ
text.18545: jetthahŏ piẏaẏameṇa ṇivvāsiẏa  $  tahŏ uvavaṇahŏ majjhĕ āvāsiẏa
text.18546: kaha vi vihāṇu bhāṇu ṇahĕ uggaü  $  ahimuhu sajjaṇa-lou samāgaü
text.18547: diṇṇaĩ tūraĩ maṅgalu ghosiu  $  paṭṭaṇu ṇiravasesu pariosiu
text.18548: sīẏa paviṭṭha ṇiviṭṭha varāsaṇĕ  $  sāsaṇa-devaẏa ṇaṃ jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ
text.18551: siẏa-pakkhahŏ divasĕ pahillaĕ  $  candaleha ṇaṃ sāẏarĕṇa
text.18555: kantahĕ taṇiẏa kanti pekkheppiṇu  $  pabhaṇaï pomaṇāhu vihaseppiṇu
text.18556: "jaï vi kuluggaẏāu ṇiravajjaü  $  mahilaü honti suṭṭhu ṇillajjaü
text.18558: vāhira-dhiṭṭhaü guṇa-parihīṇaü  $  kiha saẏa-khaṇḍa ṇa janti ṇihīṇaü
text.18559: ṇaü gaṇanti ṇiẏa-kulu maïlantaü  $  tihuaṇĕ aẏasa-paḍahu vajjantaü
text.18560: aṅgu samoḍḍĕvi dhiddhikkārahŏ  $  vaẏaṇu ṇienti kema bhattārahŏ"
text.18561: sīẏa ṇa bhīẏa saïttaṇa-gavveṃ  $  valĕvi pavolliẏa macchara-gavveṃ
text.18562: "purisa ṇihīṇa honti guṇavanta vi  $  tiẏahĕ ṇa pattijjanti maranta vi
text.18564: khaḍu lakkaḍu salilu vahantiẏahĕ  $  paürāṇiẏahĕ kuluggaẏahĕ
text.18565: raẏaṇāẏaru khāraĩ dentaü  $  to vi ṇa thakkaï ṇammaẏahĕ
text.18569: sāṇu ṇa keṇa vi jaṇĕṇa gaṇijjaï  $  gaṅgā-ṇaïhĩ taṃ ji ṇhāijjaï
text.18570: sasi sa-kalaṅku tahĩ ji paha ṇimmala  $  kālaü mehu tahĩ jĕ taḍi ujjala
text.18571: uvalu apujju ṇa keṇa vi chippaï  $  tahĩ ji paḍima candaṇĕṇa vilippaï
text.18572: dhujjaï pāu paṅku jaï laggaï  $  kamala-māla puṇu jiṇahŏ valaggaï
text.18573: dīvaü hoi sahāveṃ kālaü  $  vaṭṭi-sihaĕ maṇḍijjaï ālaü
text.18574: ṇara-ṇārihĩ evaḍḍaü antaru  $  maraṇĕ vi velli ṇa mellaï taruvaru
text.18575: ĕhu paĩ kavaṇa volla pārambhiẏa  $  saï-vaḍāẏa maĩ ajju samubbhiẏa
text.18576: tuhũ pekkhantu acchu vīsatthaü  $  ḍahaü jalaṇu jaï ḍahĕvi samatthaü
text.18578: kiṃ kijjaï aṇṇeṃ divveṃ  $  jaṃ ṇa vi sujjhaï mahu maṇahŏ
text.18579: jiha kaṇaẏa-loli ḍāhuttara  $  acchami majjhĕ huāsaṇahŏ"
text.18583: sīẏahĕ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi jaṇu harisiu  $  uccāraü romañcu padarisiu
text.18586: harisiẏa lavaṇaṅkusa dussīla vi  $  harisiẏa vajjajaṅgha-ṇala-ṇīla vi
text.18590: loẏavāla-giri-ṇaïu samudda vi  $  visaharinda amarinda ṇarinda vi
text.18593: para hiẏavaĕ kalusu vahantaü  $  rahuvaï ekku ṇa harisiẏaü
text.18597: sīẏaĕ jaṃ jĕ vuttu avaleveṃ  $  taṃ ji samatthiu puṇu valaeveṃ
text.18598: kokkiẏa khaṇaẏa khaṇāviẏa khoṇī  $  hattha-saẏāĩ tiṇṇi caü-koṇī
text.18601: caḍiẏa rāẏa āẏā givvāṇa vi  $  inda-canda-ravi-hari-vambhāṇa vi
text.18602: indhaṇa-puñjĕ caḍiẏa paramesari  $  ṇaṃ saṃthiẏa vaẏa-sīlahã uppari
text.18603: "ahŏ devahŏ mahu taṇaü saïttaṇu  $  joejjahŏ rahuvaï-duṭṭhattaṇu
text.18604: ahŏ vaïsāṇara tuhu mi ḍahejjahi  $  jaï viruārī to ma khamejjahi"
text.18606: kiu kalaẏalu diṇṇu huāsaṇu  $  mahi jĕ jāẏa sama-jālaḍiẏa
text.18607: so ṇāhĩ ko vi tahĩ avasarĕ  $  jeṇa ṇa mukkī dhāhaḍiẏa
text.18612: dhāhāviu somitti-kumāreṃ  $  "ajju māẏa mua mahu aviẏāreṃ"
text.18616: dhāhāviu savvĕhĩ sāmantĕhĩ  $  rāmahŏ dhiddhikkāru karantĕhĩ
text.18621: ṇaü jāṇahũ sīẏa vaheviṇu  $  rāmu lahesaï kavaṇa gaï"
text.18625: thiu etthantarĕ kāraṇu bhāriu  $  ṇiravasesu jagu dhūmandhāriu
text.18626: jālaü vipphuranti tahĩ avasarĕ  $  ṇaṃ vijjulaü jalaẏa-jālantarĕ
text.18627: sīẏa saïttaṇeṇa ṇaü kampiẏa  $  "ḍhukku ḍhukku sihi" ema pajampiẏa
text.18628: "ehu dehu guṇa-gahaṇa-ṇivāsaṇu  $  ḍahĕ ḍahĕ jaï saccaü jĕ huāsaṇu
text.18629: ḍahĕ ḍahĕ jaï jiṇa-sāsaṇu chaḍḍiu  $  ḍahĕ ḍahĕ jaï ṇiẏa-gottu ṇa maṇḍiu
text.18630: ḍahĕ ḍahĕ jaï haũ keṇa vi ūṇī  $  ḍahĕ ḍahĕ jaï cāritta-vihūṇī
text.18631: ḍahĕ ḍahĕ jaï bhattārahŏ dohī  $  ḍahĕ ḍahĕ jaï paraloẏa-virohī
text.18632: ḍahĕ ḍahĕ saẏala-bhuvaṇa-santāvaṇu  $  jaï maĩ maṇĕṇa vi icchiu rāvaṇu"
text.18633: taṃ evaḍḍu dhīru ko pāvaï  $  sihi sīẏalaü hoi ṇa pahāvaï
text.18635: tahĩ avasarĕ maṇĕ parituṭṭhaü  $  kahaï purandaru sura-ẏaṇahŏ
text.18636: "sihi saṅkaï ḍahĕvi ṇa sakkaï  $  pekkhu pahāu saïttaṇahŏ"
text.18640: tāma taruṇa-tāmarasĕhĩ chaṇṇaü  $  so jjĕ jalaṇu saravaru uppaṇṇaü
text.18642: jalu atthakkaĕ kahi mi ṇa māiu  $  mañca-saẏaĩ rellantu padhāiẏa
text.18643: ṇāsaï savvu lou sahũ rāmeṃ  $  salilu pavaḍḍhiu sīẏahĕ ṇāmeṃ
text.18644: aṇṇu vi sahasavattu uppaṇṇaü  $  diẏavaĕ āsaṇu ṇaṃ avaïṇṇaü
text.18645: tāsu majjhĕ maṇi-kaṇaẏa-ravaṇṇaü  $  divvāsaṇu samuccu uppaṇṇaü
text.18646: tahĩ jāṇaï jaṇa-sāhukkāriẏa  $  saĩ suravara-vahūhĩ vaïsāriẏa
text.18647: tahĩ velahĩ sohaï paramesari  $  ṇaṃ paccakkha lacchi kamalovari
text.18648: āhaẏa dunduhi suravara-sattheṃ  $  melliu kusuma-vāsu saĩ hattheṃ
text.18655: to etthantarĕ ṇiru dīhāusa  $  sīẏahĕ pāsu ḍhukka lavaṇaṅkusa
text.18656: jiha te tiha viṇṇi vi hari-halahara  $  tiha bhāmaṇḍala-ṇala-velandhara
text.18673: jaṃ aviẏappeṃ maĩ avamāṇiẏa  $  aṇṇu vi duhu evaḍḍu parāṇiẏa
text.18674: taṃ paramesari mahu marusejjahi  $  ekka-vāra avarāhu khamejjahi
text.18675: āu jāhũ ghara-vāsu ṇihālahi  $  saẏalu vi ṇiẏa-pariẏaṇu paripālahi
text.18676: puppha-vimāṇĕ caḍahi sura-sundarĕ  $  vandahi jiṇa-bhavaṇaĩ giri-mandarĕ
text.18680: maṇĕ dharahi eu mahu vuttaü  $  maccharu saẏalu vi pariharahi
text.18681: saï jiha suravaï-saṃsaggiĕ  $  ṇīsāvaṇṇu rajju karahi"
text.18685: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi paricatta-saṇehiĕ  $  eva pajampiu puṇu vaïdehiĕ
text.18686: "ahŏ rāhava maṃ jāhi visāẏahŏ  $  ṇa vi taü dosu ṇa jaṇa-saṅghāẏahŏ
text.18687: bhava-bhava-saĕhĩ viṇāsiẏa-dhammahŏ  $  savvu dosu ĕu dukkiẏa-kammahŏ
text.18688: ko sakkaï ṇāsaṇahã purāiu  $  jaṃ aṇulaggaü jīvahũ āiu
text.18689: vala maĩ vahuviha-desa-ṇiuttī  $  tujjhu pasāeṃ vasumaï bhuttī
text.18690: vahu-vāraü tamvolu samāṇiu  $  ihaloiu suhu saẏalu vi māṇiu
text.18691: vahu-vāraü paẏaḍiẏa-vahu-bhoggī  $  paĩ sahũ puppha-vimāṇĕ valaggī
text.18692: vahu-vāraü bhavaṇantarĕ hiṇḍiu  $  appaü vahu-maṇḍaṇĕhĩ pamaṇḍiu
text.18693: evahĩ tiha karemi puṇu rahuvaï  $  jiha ṇa homi paḍivārī tiẏamaï
text.18696: ṇivviṇṇī bhava-saṃsārahŏ  $  lemi ajju dhuvu tava-caraṇu"
text.18700: ema tāĕ ĕu vaẏaṇu caveppiṇu  $  dāhiṇa-karĕṇa samuppāḍeppiṇu
text.18702: kesa ṇievi so vi mucchaṃgaü  $  paḍiu ṇāĩ taruvaru maru-āhaü
text.18703: mahihĩ ṇisaṇṇu suṭṭhu ṇicceẏaṇu  $  jāva kaha vi kira hoi sa-ceẏaṇu
text.18705: sīẏaĕ sīla-taraṇḍaĕ thāĕvi  $  laïẏa dikkha risi-āsamĕ jāĕvi
text.18710: taṃ āsaṇu jāva ṇihālaï  $  jaṇaẏa-taṇaẏa tahĩ tāva ṇa vi
text.18714: puṇu savvāu disāu ṇiẏantaü  $  uṭṭhiu "kettahĕ sīẏa" bhaṇantaü
text.18715: keṇa vi sa-viṇaeṇa to sīsaï  $  "pavarujjāṇu eu jaṃ dīsaï
text.18716: iha ṇiẏa surĕhĩ susīlālaṅkiẏa  $  muṇi-puṅgavahŏ pāsu dikkhaṅkiẏa"
text.18717: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi rahu-ṇandaṇu kuddhaü  $  jua-khaĕ ṇāĩ kiẏantu viruddhaü
text.18718: ratta-ṇettu bhaühā-bhaṅgura-muhu  $  gaü tahŏ ujjāṇahŏ savaḍaṃmuhu
text.18721: "jaṃ kiu ciru māẏāsuggīvahŏ  $  jaṃ lakkhaṇĕṇa samarĕ dahagīvahŏ
text.18723: sahũ ṇiẏa-bhiccĕhĩ eva cavantaü  $  taṃ mahinda-ṇandaṇavaṇu pattaü
text.18724: pekkhĕvi ṇāṇuppaṇṇu muṇindahŏ  $  viẏaliu maccharu saẏalu ṇarindahŏ
text.18727: kara maüli karĕvi muṇi vandiu  $  ṇaẏa-sireṇa siri-halaharĕṇa
text.18731: jiha teṃ tiha vandiu sāṇandĕhĩ  $  lakkhaṇa-pamuha-asesa-ṇarindĕhĩ
text.18732: diṭṭha sīẏa tahĩ rāhava-candeṃ  $  ṇaṃ tihuaṇa-siri parama-jiṇindeṃ
text.18736: teṇa vi kahiu savvu saṅkheveṃ  $  bharahesarahŏ jeva puraeveṃ
text.18741: āẏaĩ avaraĩ vi asesaĩ  $  kahiẏaĩ muṇi-gaṇa-sāraĕṇa
text.18742: paramāgamĕ jiha uddiṭṭhaĩ  $  āsi sa ẏa m bhu-bhaḍāraĕṇa
text.18743: iẏa paümacariẏa-sese  $  saẏambhuevassa kaha vi uvvariĕ
text.18751: "kahĕ muṇivara sīẏa mahāsaï  $  kiṃ kajjeṃ hiẏa rāvaṇĕṇa
text.18755: aṇṇu vi jiẏa-raẏaṇiẏarāhaveṇa  $  aṇṇahĩ jammantarĕ rāhaveṇa
text.18756: kahĕ guru kiu sukkiu kāĩ eṇa  $  evaḍḍu pahuttaṇu pattu jeṇa
text.18758: dasakandharu taraṇi va dosa-cattu  $  kiha mūḍhaü pekkhĕvi para-kalattu
text.18759: jo ṇa vi āẏāmiu suravarehĩ  $  visahara-vijjāhara-ṇaravarehĩ
text.18760: so dahamuhu kamala-dalakkhaṇeṇa  $  kiha raṇĕ viṇivāiu lakkhaṇeṇa
text.18761: melleppiṇu ṇiẏa-bhāẏaru mahantu  $  haũ kiha hari-valahã saṇehavantu
text.18762: kiha bhāmaṇḍalu suggīu ehu  $  rāmovari vaḍḍhiẏa-garua-ṇehu
text.18764: aṇṇahĩ bhavĕ jaṇaẏahŏ duhiaĕ  $  kāĩ kiẏaĩ guru-dukkiẏaĩ
text.18765: jeṃ jammahŏ laggĕvi dussahaĩ  $  patta mahanta-dukkha-saẏaĩ"
text.18769: taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu haẏa-maẏaraddhaü  $  kahaï saẏalabhūsaṇu dhammaddhaü
text.18771: khemaürihĕ ṇaẏadattu vaṇīsaru  $  cāva-vaḍāu ṇāĩ koḍīsaru
text.18772: tahŏ suṇanda piẏa pīṇa-paohara   $  ṇaṃ dhaṇaẏahŏ dhaṇaevi maṇohara
text.18773: tahŏ dhaṇadattu puttu pahilāraü  $  puṇu vasudattu vīu dihi-gāraü
text.18774: tahŏ jaṇṇavali-ṇāu suhi diẏavaru  $  sāẏaradattu avaru purĕ vaṇivaru
text.18775: raẏaṇappaha-piẏa-gehiṇi-vantaü  $  tahŏ guṇavaï sua suu guṇavantaü
text.18776: viṇṇi vi ṇava-jovvaṇa-pāẏaḍiẏaĩ  $  suravara iva chuḍu saggahŏ paḍiẏaĩ
text.18780: tuha taṇiẏa taṇaẏa dhaṇadattahŏ  $  dijjaü suẏahŏ mahārāhŏ"
text.18784: taṇ ṇisuṇĕvi vaḍḍhiẏa-aṇurāeṃ  $  diṇṇa vāẏa tahŏ guṇavaï-tāeṃ
text.18785: to purĕ tahĩ jĕ avaru ṇiru vahu-dhaṇu  $  vaṇi-taṇuruhu kumāri-geṇhaṇa-maṇu
text.18787: tāsu jaṇaṇi suẏa devi samicchaï  $  thova-dhaṇahŏ cira-varahŏ na icchaï
text.18793: āẏāmĕvi āhaü asi-ghāeṃ  $  ṇāĩ mahīharu asaṇi-ṇihāeṃ
text.18794: teṇa vi duṇṇirikkha-tikkhaggeṃ  $  tāḍiu ṇandā-ṇandaṇu khaggeṃ
text.18795: viṇṇi vi vaṇa-viṇitta ruhirolliẏa  $  ṇaṃ phagguṇĕ palāsa papphulliẏa
text.18797: to tāva eva vahu-macchara  $  jujjhiẏa ujjhiẏa-maraṇa-bhaẏa
text.18798: jā pāṇa vihi mi sama-ghāĕhĩ  $  vihurĕ ku-bhicca va muĕvi gaẏa
text.18802: puṇu uttuṅga-visāla-paīharĕ  $  jāẏa ve vi miga viñjha-mahīharĕ
text.18803: dhaṇadattu vi guṇavaï a-lahantaü  $  bhāihĕ taṇaü dukkhu a-sahantaü
text.18804: muĕvi ṇiẏaẏa-gharu suṭṭhu ramāulu  $  gaü puravarahŏ desa-bhamaṇāulu
text.18805: vāla vi ṇiẏa-maṇĕ tahŏ aṇurattī  $  saẏalāvara-vara-varahã virattī
text.18806: dhaṇadattahŏ gamaṇeṃ vicchāiẏa  $  jaṇaṇeṃ aṇṇa-ṇioẏahŏ lāiẏa
text.18807: chāiẏa aï-raüdda-pariṇāmeṃ  $  sihi va palippaï sāhuhũ ṇāmeṃ
text.18809: akkosaï ṇindaï ṇibbhacchaï  $  jaïṇa-dhammu suiṇe vi ṇa icchaï
text.18812: uppaṇṇa tetthu puṇu kāṇaṇĕ  $  jahĩ vasanti te ve vi maẏa
text.18817: tahĩ vi tāhĕ kāraṇĕṇa virujjhĕvi  $  maraṇu patta avaropparu jhujjhĕvi
text.18818: jāẏa mahisa jama-mahisa-bhaẏaṅkara  $  puṇu varāha aṇṇoṇṇa-khaẏaṅkara
text.18821: puṇu visadaṃsa ghora puṇu vāṇara  $  puṇu viga puṇu kasaṇujjala migavara
text.18822: puṇu ṇāṇāviha avara vi thalaẏara  $  puṇu kameṇa ṇahaẏara puṇu jalaẏara
text.18826: teṃ kajjeṃ jagĕ riṇa-vaïraĩ  $  jo ṇa kuṇaï sa(?) viẏaḍḍhu para
text.18830: to dhaṇadattu vi suṭṭhummāhiu  $  mala-dhūsaru tisa-bhukkhahĩ vāhiu
text.18832: pattu jiṇālaü raẏaṇimuhantarĕ  $  laggu cavevaĕ ṇivisabbhantarĕ
text.18833: "ahŏ ahŏ sukkiẏa-kiẏa pavvaïẏahŏ  $  mahu tisa-chuha-mahavāhiṃ laïẏahŏ
text.18834: dehũ kahi mi jaï atthi jalosahu  $  jaṃ kāraṇu mahanta-pariosahŏ"
text.18835: vihasĕvi cavaï pahāṇa-muṇīsaru  $  "salilu pievaĕ ko kira avasaru
text.18836: mūḍha hiẏattaṇeṇa taü sīsaï  $  jahĩ andhāraĕ kiṃ pi ṇa dīsaï
text.18837: sūratthavaṇahŏ laggĕvi diḍha-maṇu  $  jahĩ bhaviẏa-ẏaṇu ṇa bhuñjaï bhoẏaṇu
text.18840: aï-pīḍiẏaha mi vara-vāhiĕ  $  ṇa laïjjaï osahu vi jahĩ
text.18841: iẏa savvari-samaĕ dusañcarĕ  $  kiha paripijjaï salilu tahĩ
text.18845: ṇahĕ ṇiĕvi saẏā ravi atthamiu  $  jo pālaï jīu aṇatthamiu
text.18846: so pāvaï maṇahara deva-gaï  $  suhu bhuñjaï hoĕvi amara-vaï
text.18847: aṇuattĕvi uttamu kulu lahaï  $  puṇu aṭṭha vi kammaĩ ṇiḍḍahaï
text.18848: ṇisi-bhojju ṇa chaṇḍiu jeṇa puṇu  $  tahŏ bhavĕ bhavĕ dukkhu aṇanta-guṇu
text.18849: allalla-maṃsu teṃ bhakkhiẏaü  $  teṃ piẏa maïrā mahu cakkhiẏaü
text.18850: saṇa-hullā ṇimva-samiddhāĩ  $  teṃ pañcumvaraï mi khaddhāĩ
text.18851: teṃ vaẏaṇu asaccaü jampiẏaü  $  teṃ aṇṇahŏ taṇaü davvu hiẏaü
text.18852: teṃ suṭṭhu ṇirantara hiṃsa kiẏa  $  para-ṇāri vi teṃ ṇiruttu laïẏa
text.18854: ahavaï kiṃ vahueṃ caviĕṇa  $  eu jĕ mūlu saccu vaẏahã
text.18855: jeṃ honteṃ hoi samīvaü  $  mokkhu vi bhavva-jīva-saẏahã"
text.18860: gaü tetthahŏ vi gaeṇa tamāleṃ  $  bhamĕvi mahīẏalĕ vahaveṃ kāleṃ
text.18861: samaü samāhiĕ maraṇu pavaṇṇaü  $  puṇu sohammĕ deu uppaṇṇaü
text.18862: tahĩ ve sāẏarāĩ ṇivaseviṇu  $  kiṃ pi sesĕ thiĕ puṇṇĕ caveppiṇu
text.18866: ekkahĩ diṇĕ sa-turaṅgu paẏaṭṭaü  $  goṭṭhu paloĕvi paḍipallaṭṭaü
