text.18868: tāvaggaĕ mahihĕ ṇisaṇṇaü  $  tuhiṇagirindu va ṇiru dhavalu
text.18873: taṃ goindu ṇiĕvi caḍulaṅgahŏ  $  meru-taṇaü oẏariu turaṅgahŏ
text.18874: pāsu paḍhukkĕvi tahŏ kaṇṇantarĕ  $  diṇṇa pañca ṇamukāra khaṇantarĕ
text.18875: tahŏ phaleṇa jiṇa-sāsaṇa-bhattahĕ  $  gabbhabbhantarĕ tahĕ siridattahĕ
text.18876: jāu puttu parivaḍḍhiẏa-chāẏahŏ  $  vasahaddhaü tahŏ chattacchāẏahŏ
text.18877: ekkahĩ diṇĕ ṇandaṇavaṇu jantaü  $  ṇiẏa ciru maraṇa-bhūmi sampattaü
text.18878: thiu ṇiccalu joẏantu ṇirantaru  $  sumariu saẏalu vi ṇiẏaẏa-bhavantaru
text.18879: disaü ṇiĕvi gaü parama-visāẏahŏ   $  puṇu uttariu aṇovama-ṇāẏahŏ
text.18880: "etthu āsi aṇaḍuhu haũ hontaü  $  etthu paesĕ āsi ṇivasantaü
text.18881: iha carantu iha salilu piẏantaü  $  iha ṇivaḍiu ciru pāṇakkantaü
text.18883: tahĩ kālĕ kaṇṇĕ mahu keraĕ   $  jeṇa diṇṇu javu jīva-hiu
text.18884: pekkhemi keṇovāeṇa (?) "  $  ema suiru cintantu thiu
text.18888: puṇu sahasā uttuṅgu visālaü  $  tetthu karāviu parama-jiṇālaü
text.18889: ṇiẏaẏa-bhavantaru paḍĕ vi lihāvĕvi  $  vāra-paesĕ tāsu vandhāvĕvi
text.18890: thavĕvi aṇeẏa suhaḍa parirakkhaṇu  $  gaü rāulu kumāru vahu-lakkhaṇu
text.18891: ekkahĩ diṇĕ paümarui mahāiu  $  vandaṇahattiĕ jiṇaharu āiu
text.18892: diṭṭhu tāva paḍu lihiẏa-kahantaru  $  vimbhiu jovaï jāva ṇirantaru
text.18893: tāvārakkhiehĩ duvvārahŏ  $  kahiu gampi tahŏ rāẏa-kumārahŏ
text.18894: so vi iṭṭha-saṅgama-aṇurāiu  $  jhatti parama-jiṇa-bhavaṇu parāiu
text.18895: diṭṭhu teṇa paḍĕ vittu ṇiẏantaü  $  acala-diṭṭhi vara-vimhiẏa-vantaü
text.18898: "ehu paḍu ṇiĕvi taü hūaü  $  koūhalu kiṃ kāraṇĕṇa"
text.18902: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi akkhaï vaṇi-taṇuruhu  $  "etthu paesĕ ekku muu aṇaḍuhu
text.18903: tahŏ ṇavakāra pañca maĩ diṇṇā  $  je paṇatīsakkhara-sampuṇṇā
text.18904: taṃ ĕu saẏalu vi ṇiĕvi cirāṇaü  $  gaü vimhaẏahŏ sarevi kahāṇaü
text.18906: "so govaï haũ" eva caveppiṇu  $  kara-maülañjali turiu kareppiṇu
text.18907: hāra-kaḍaẏa-kaḍisuttĕhĩ pujjiu  $  guru va su-sīseṃ kumaï-vivajjiu
text.18908: "ṇa vi taṃ karaï piẏaru ṇa vi māẏari  $  ṇa vi kalattu ṇa vi puttu ṇa bhāẏari
text.18909: ṇa vi sasa duhiẏa ṇa mitta ṇa kiṅkara  $  sahasaṇaẏaṇa-pamuha vi ṇa vi suravara
text.18910: jaṃ paĩ mahu suhi-iṭṭhu samāriu  $  ṇaraẏa-tiriẏa-gaï-gamaṇu ṇivāriu
text.18912: jaṃ diṇṇu samāhi-rasāẏaṇu  $  tetthu vihurĕ paĩ ṇiruvamaü
text.18913: tahŏ phalĕṇa ṇarindahŏ ṇandaṇu  $  puṇu etthu jĕ purĕ hūu haũ
text.18917: jaṃ uvaladdhaü maĩ maṇuattaṇu  $  aṇṇu vi ĕhu vihaḍaü vaḍḍattaṇu
text.18918: jaṃ thuvvami ṇaravara-saṅghāeṃ  $  taṃ saẏalu vi ĕu tujjhu pasāeṃ
text.18919: laï ṇīsesu rajju siṃhāsaṇu  $  haũ taü dāsu paḍicchiẏa-pesaṇu"
text.18920: evamāi saṃbhāsĕvi vaṇi-varu  $  puṇu ṇiu ṇiẏa-rāulu jaṇa-maṇaharu
text.18921: viṇṇi vi jaṇa ṇiviṭṭha ekkāsaṇĕ  $  candāicca ṇāĩ gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ
text.18926: jiha sāẏara-siri maṇi-raẏaṇĕhĩ  $  jiha kulavahu guṇehĩ varĕhĩ
text.18927: jiha sukaha suhāsiẏa-vaẏaṇĕhĩ  $  tiha mahi bhūsiẏa jiṇaharĕhĩ
text.18931: vahu-kāleṃ sallehaṇĕ marevi  $  īsāṇa-saggĕ sura jāẏa ve vi
text.18932: raẏaṇāẏarāĩ tahĩ dui gamevi  $  paümappahu suravaru puṇu cavevi
text.18935: tahĩ rajju amara-līlaĕ karevi  $  tava-caraṇu careppiṇu puṇu marevi
text.18936: māhinda-saggĕ givvāṇu jāu  $  sāẏaraĩ satta ṇivasevi āu
text.18939: muhaẏanda-rundu siricanda-ṇāmu  $  thiu māṇusa-veseṃ ṇāĩ kāmu
text.18940: vahu-kālu karevi maṇojju rajju  $  puṇu cintiu maṇĕ paraloẏa-kajju
text.18952: vahukāleṃ avasāṇu pavaṇṇaü  $  gampiṇu vambhaloĕ uppaṇṇaü
text.18955: tahĩ tiẏasāhiva-siẏa māṇĕvi  $  dasa-sāẏarĕhĩ gaehĩ cuu
text.18956: uppaṇṇu etthu ĕhu rāhaü  $  dasaraha-rāẏahŏ paḍhama-suu
text.18961: iẏa-bhuvaṇa-ttaĕ ko uvamijjaï  $  jāsu sahasa-ṇaẏaṇu vi ṇaü pujjaï
text.18962: jo ciru vasahamahaddhaü hontaü  $  jo īsāṇĕ surattaṇu pattaü
text.18963: dui sāẏaraĩ vaseppiṇu āẏaü  $  kāleṃ so tārāvaï jāẏaü
text.18968: jāu sambhu-ṇāmeṃ vara-ṇandaṇu  $  surahã mi dujjaü ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇu
text.18969: vasudattu vi jammantara-lakkhĕhĩ  $  uppajjantu kameṇa asaṅkhĕhĩ
text.18972: huu sambhuhĕ parama-purohiu  $  sarasaï-ṇāmeṃ bhajja tahŏ
text.18976: guṇavaï vi aṇeẏa-bhavehĩ āẏa  $  puṇu kariṇi amarasari-tīrĕ jāẏa
text.18977: ekkahĩ diṇĕ paṅkuppaṅkĕ khutta  $  pāṇāula maülīhūa-ṇetta
text.18978: pekkhĕvi taraṅgajava-kheẏareṇa  $  ṇavakāra pañca tahĩ diṇṇa teṇa
text.18979: puṇu siribhūihĕ uppaṇṇa duhiẏa  $  veẏavaï ṇāmu chaṇa-ẏanda-muhiẏa
text.18980: ṇaṃ kā vi devi pacchaṇṇa āẏa  $  sā maggiẏa sambhuṃ jaṇiẏa-rāẏa
text.18981: siribhūi pajampiu "kaṇaẏa-vaṇṇa  $  kiha micchādiṭṭhihĕ demi kaṇṇa
text.18982: to teṇa vi suṭṭhu viruddhaeṇa   $  ṇiṭṭhaviu purohiu kuddhaeṇa
text.18983: jiṇa-dhammeṃ suravaru saggĕ jāu  $  jaraḍhāruṇa-chavi sacchāẏa-chāu
text.18986: valimaṇḍaĕ ṇa samicchantihĕ  $  kiu tahĕ sīlahŏ khaṇḍaṇaü
text.18990: jaṃ cārittu viṇāsiu rāeṃ  $  jaṇaṇu vivāiu garua-kasāeṃ
text.18991: ṇaṃ sarasaï-sua jhatti palittī  $  jalaṇa-tiḍikka palālĕ va ghittī
text.18993: "re ṇisaṃsa kappurisa a-lajjiẏa  $  khala varāẏa duggaï-gama-sajjiẏa
text.18994: jaṃ paĩ mahu jaṇeru saṅghārĕvi  $  haũ parihutta valā tahŏ hārĕvi
text.18995: taṃ taü garua-kamma-saṃcaraṇahŏ  $  hosami vāhi va kāraṇu maraṇahŏ"
text.18996: eva bhaṇĕvi ṇaravaïhĕ ṇilukkĕvi  $  kaha vi kaha vi jiṇa-bhavaṇu paḍhukkĕvi
text.18997: harikantiẏahĕ pāsu ṇikkhantī  $  vambha-lou vahu-kāleṃ pattī
text.19000: micchāhimāṇu maṇĕ mūḍhaü  $  vahu-divasĕhĩ duggaïhĕ gaü
text.19004: tahĩ mahanta-dukkhaĩ pāveppiṇu  $  tiriẏa-gaï vi ṇīsesa bhameppiṇu
text.19005: puṇu sāvitti-gabbhĕ paṅkaẏa-muhu  $  jāu kusaddhaẏa-vippahŏ taṇuruhu
text.19008: tavu karantu paramāgama-juttiĕ  $  ekka-divasĕ gaü vandaṇahattiĕ
text.19009: sammeirihĕ parāẏaü jāvĕhĩ  $  kaṇaẏappahu vijjāharu tāvĕhĩ
text.19010: gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ lakkhijjaï jantaü  $  jo suravaïhĕ vi siẏaĕ mahantaü
text.19012: "hou tāva mahu sāsaẏa-sokkheṃ  $  vihava-vivajjieṇa teṃ mokkheṃ
text.19014: dūsahahŏ jiṇāgama-kahiẏahŏ  $  atthi kiṃ pi jaï tavahŏ phalu
text.19015: to ehaü aṇṇa-bhavantarĕ  $  hou pahuttaṇu mahu saẏalu"
text.19020: saggeṃ saṇakumārĕ uppajjĕvi  $  tahĩ sāẏaraĩ satta suhu bhuñjĕvi
text.19021: cavĕvi jāu suu jaẏa-siri-māṇaṇu  $  kaïkasi-raẏaṇāsavahũ dasāṇaṇu
text.19024: jo sambhuṃ siribhūi vivāiu  $  puṇu sohamma-saggu sampāiu
text.19025: cavĕvi pariṭṭhāpurĕ uppajjĕvi  $  khaẏaru puṇavvasu tavu āvajjĕvi
text.19026: taïẏaü tiẏasāvāsu caḍeppiṇu  $  satta samuddovamaĩ gameppiṇu
text.19028: so jāẏaü gabbhĕ sumittihĕ  $  dasasandaṇa-ṇaravaïhĕ suu
text.19033: jo guṇavaïhĕ āsi guṇavantaü  $  bhāẏaru lahuu paguṇa-guṇa-vantaü
text.19034: bhavĕ paribhamĕvi cāru-muha-maṇḍalu  $  so uppaṇṇu ehu bhāmaṇḍalu
text.19035: jo jaṇṇavali āsi guṇa-bhūsaṇu  $  so tuhũ ĕhu saṃjāu vihīsaṇu
text.19036: teṃ saẏala vi rāmahŏ aṇurattā  $  puvva-bhavantara-ṇeha-ṇiuttā
text.19037: jā ciru huntī guṇavaï vaṇi-suẏa  $  bhavĕ paribhamĕvi kamĕṇa diẏaharĕ huẏa
text.19038: siribhūihĕ sua rūva-ravaṇṇī  $  jā ciru vambha-kappĕ uppaṇṇī
text.19039: tahĩ teraha pallaĩ ṇivaseppiṇu  $  puṇṇa-puñjĕ thiĕ sesĕ caveppiṇu
text.19040: ĕha sā jāẏa sīẏa jaṇaẏahŏ suẏa  $  ṇiru mahurālāviṇi ṇaṃ parahuẏa
text.19041: ciru veẏavaï ṇeha-samvandheṃ  $  hiẏa dasakandhareṇa kāmandheṃ
text.19042: jaṃ muṇi puvva-jammĕ ṇindantī  $  taṃ iha duhaĩ mahantaĩ pattī
text.19044: siribhūi kālĕ sua-kāraṇĕ  $  jaṃ haü sambhu-ṇaresarĕṇa
text.19045: teṃ laṅkesaru ciru hiṃsaṇu  $  viṇivāiu lacchīharĕṇa"
text.19049: guru-vaẏaṇehĩ tehĩ gañjolliu  $  puṇu vi vihīsaṇu ema pavolliu
text.19050: "kahĕ keṃ kammeṃ jaṇaṇa-viṇīẏahĕ  $  saïhĕ vi lañchaṇu lāiu sīẏahĕ"
text.19051: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu muṇi-puṅgamu  $  akkhaï ṇāṇa-mahāṇaï-saṅgamu
text.19052: "muṇi suarisaṇu āsi viharantaü  $  maṇḍali-ṇāmu gāmu saṃpattaü
text.19053: thiu ṇandaṇavaṇĕ ṇiru ṇimmala-maṇu  $  taṃ vandeppiṇu gaü saẏalu vi jaṇu
text.19054: muṇivaro vi lahu-vahiṇiĕ savaṇaĕ  $  saï mahasaïhĕ samaü suarisaṇaĕ
text.19055: kiṃ pi cavantu ṇiĕvi veavaïĕ  $  kahiu asesahã loẏahã kumaïĕ
text.19057: kiṃ cojju eu jaṃ ṇāĕhĩ  $  dūsijjaï gharu harihĩ vaṇu
text.19063: maĩ puṇu ĕhu saẏam eva parikkhiu  $  sahũ mahilaĕ eantĕ pariṭṭhiu"
text.19064: ema tāĕ tava-ṇiẏama-saṇāhahŏ  $  loĕ aṇāẏaru kiu muṇi-ṇāhahŏ
text.19065: so vi karevi avaggahu thakkaü  $  "jā ṇa phiṭṭu saṃvāu gurukkaü
text.19066: tā ṇivitti mahu saẏalāhārahŏ"  $  jāṇavi ṇicchaü haẏa-saṃsārahŏ
text.19068: tāĕ vi eu vuttu "ahŏ loẏahŏ   $  ṇiẏa-maṇu mā sandehahŏ ḍhoẏahŏ
text.19069: jaṃ maĩ kahiu savvu taṃ aliẏaü  $  ajju vi pāu asesu vi phaliẏaü"
text.19071: jaṃ bhāi-jualu taṃ ṇindiẏaü  $  puvva-bhavantarĕ khala-maïĕ
text.19072: saṃvāu ettha uvaladdhaü  $  jaṇahŏ majjhĕ teṃ jāṇaïĕ"
text.19077: to kahaï bhaḍāraü gahira-giru  $  "vindāraṇṇa-tthalĕ viulĕ ciru
text.19078: hīṇaṅgu bhamantu vi ekku maü  $  so risi-sajjhāu suṇevi maü
text.19079: puṇu jāu kaṇaẏa-dhaṇa-kaṇa-paürĕ  $  aïrāvaĕ khettĕ ditti-ṇaẏarĕ
text.19080: sāvaẏahŏ vihiẏa-ṇāmahŏ su-bhuu  $  sivamaïhĕ gabbhĕ mahadattu suu
text.19081: tahĩ pālĕvi pañcāṇuvvaẏaĩ  $  tiṇṇi guṇavvaẏa (caü) sikkhāvaẏaĩ
text.19082: jiṇavara-pujjaü ṇhavaṇaü karĕvi  $  vahu-kāleṃ saṇṇāsĕṇa marĕvi
text.19083: īsāṇa-saggĕ vara-devu huu  $  vihĩ raẏaṇāẏarĕhĩ gaehĩ cuu
text.19085: ṇāmeṇa mattakoilaviulu  $  vara-gāmu rahaṅgi va dhaṇa-vahulu
text.19087: tahĩ kantasou vara-rāṇaü  $  raẏaṇāvaï piẏa haṃsa-gaï
text.19088: tahũ vīhi mi suppahu ṇāmĕṇa  $  ṇandaṇu jāu (?) vimala-maï
text.19092: teṇa juvāṇa-bhāu pāvanteṃ  $  ṇiẏa-maṇĕ jaïṇa-dhammu bhāvanteṃ
text.19093: sammattoru-bhāru pavahanteṃ  $  diṇĕ diṇĕ jiṇu ti-kālu paṇavanteṃ
text.19098: āūriu suha-jhāṇu pahāṇaü  $  kira uppajjaï kevala-ṇāṇaü
text.19099: tā avasāṇa-kālu tahŏ āiu  $  puṇu savvattha-siddhi sampāiu
text.19103: so amaru caveppiṇu etthahŏ   $  jāu vāli iha khaẏara-pahu
text.19108: jo ṇigganthu muĕvi sāmaṇṇahŏ  $  ṇa vi jaẏakāru karaï jagĕ aṇṇahŏ
text.19109: jo ṇivisantarĕ pihimi kameppiṇu  $  ei saẏala-jiṇaharaĩ ṇaveppiṇu
text.19110: jeṇa samarĕ sahũ puppha-vimāṇeṃ  $  aṇṇu candahāseṇa kivāṇeṃ
text.19111: dāhiṇa-bhuĕṇa bhuvaṇa-santāvaṇu  $  helāĕ jĕ uccāiu rāvaṇu
text.19112: pacchaĕ dhruva sasikiraṇa mueppiṇu  $  rāẏa-lacchi suggīvahŏ deppiṇu
text.19113: laïẏa dikkha bhava-gahaṇa-viratteṃ  $  giri-kaïlāsu caḍevi paẏatteṃ
text.19114: diṇṇu silovari paramattāvaṇu  $  ṇahĕ jantaü rosāviu rāvaṇu
text.19115: puṇu vi maḍappharu bhaggu khaṇantarĕ  $  ko uvamijjaï tahŏ bhuvaṇantarĕ
text.19118: jhāevi sa ẏa m bhu bhaḍāraü  $  siddhi-khetta-vara-ṇaẏaru gaü"
text.19119: iẏa paümacariẏa-sese  $  saẏambhuevassa kahi vi uvvarie
text.19130: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu jaga-bhavaṇa-bhūsaṇeṇaṃ  $  vuccaï muṇivarindeṇaṃ saẏalabhūsaṇeṇaṃ
text.19136: vihi mi jaṇehĩ tehĩ guruentie(?)  $  diṇṇu samujjala-avicala-bhattiĕ
text.19137: vahu-kāleṃ avasāṇu pavaṇṇā  $  uttarakuruhĕ gampi uppaṇṇā
text.19138: tahi mi tiṇṇi pallaĩ ṇivaseppiṇu  $  maṇĕ cintaviẏa bhoga bhuñjeppiṇu
text.19139: puṇu īsāṇa-saggĕ hua suravara  $  palaẏa-samuggaẏa ṇaṃ ravi-sasahara
text.19142: cavaṇa karevi puṇu  $  tahĕ kāẏandihĕ avaẏariẏā
text.19149: jāẏa ve vi jiṇavara-paẏa-sevihĕ  $  ṇandaṇa suarisaṇā-mahaevihĕ
text.19150: tahĩ pahilāraü ṇāmu piẏaṅkaru  $  taṇu taṇuaü puṇu aṇuu hiẏaṅkaru
text.19151: sohaï dittiĕ ṇāĩ diṇesara  $  ṇāĩ bharaha-pahu-vāhuvalīsara
text.19152: vahu-kāleṃ tava-caraṇu laeppiṇu  $  saṇṇāseṇa sarīru mueppiṇu
text.19156: tahĩ icchiẏaĩ suhaĩ māṇeppiṇu  $  sāẏarāĩ caüvīsa gameppiṇu
text.19157: cavĕvi jāẏa puṇu ari-kari-aṅkusa  $  sīẏahĕ ṇandaṇa iha lavaṇaṅkusa"
text.19165: jāṇĕvi puvva-vaïra-samvandhu vihi mi tāhaṃ  $  sīẏahĕ kāraṇeṇa somitti-rāvaṇāhaṃ
text.19166: aṇṇu vi vahu-dukkha-ṇirantarāĩ  $  a-pamāṇaĩ suṇĕvi bhavantarāĩ
text.19168: kĕ vi āsaṅkiẏa gaẏa bhaẏahŏ ke vi  $  kĕ vi thiẏa ṇiẏa-maṇĕ maccharu muevi
text.19169: kĕ vi thiẏa cintā-sāẏarĕ visevi  $  kĕ vi huva maha-dukkha viuddha ke vi
text.19170: kĕ vi saẏalu pariggahu pariharevi  $  atthakkaĕ thiẏa pāvajja levi
text.19171: aṇṇekka ke vi thiẏa vaü dharevi  $  sammatta-mahabbharĕ khandhu devi
text.19176: amhĕhĩ ĕu cariu  $  āẏaṇṇiu muṇihĩ pasāeṃ"
text.19181: to etthantarĕ tiloẏagga-patta-ṇāmo  $  vuttu kiẏantavattĕṇa sarahaseṇa rāmo
text.19187: devaṅgaĩ vatthaĩ parihiẏāĩ  $  icchaĕ aṅgāĩ pasāhiẏāĩ
text.19189: aṇuhuttu saẏalu ihaloẏa-sokkhu  $  jammahŏ vi ṇa lakkhiu kahi mi dukkhu
text.19190: mahu puttu vivāiu devi jujjhu  $  ṇiẏa-sattiĕ pesaṇu kiẏaü tujjhu
text.19192: evahĩ dāsarahi  $  uvaḍhukkaï jāva ṇa maraṇaü
text.19198: labbhaï jagĕ asesu kiẏa-ṇaravarinda-seva  $  dullahu ṇavara ekku pāvajja-raẏaṇu deva
text.19199: teṃ kajjeṃ lahu hatthutthallahi  $  maĩ paraloẏa-kaṅkha mokkallahi
text.19202: kiha cariẏaĕ para-harĕhĩ bhamesahi  $  pāṇi-pattĕ bhoẏaṇu bhuñjesahi
text.19203: kiha dūsaha parisaha vi sahesahi  $  aṅgĕ mahā-mala-paḍalu dharesahi
text.19204: kiha dharaṇiẏala-saẏaṇĕ sovesahi  $  kāṇaṇĕ viẏaṇĕ ghorĕ ṇisi ṇesahi
text.19205: kiha dukkara-uvavāsa karesahi  $  pakkhu māsu chammāsa gamesahi
text.19206: rukkha-mūlĕ āẏāvaṇu desahi  $  tuhiṇa-kaṇāvali dehĕ dharesahi
text.19207: to seṇāṇi bhaṇaï "suha-bhāẏaṇu  $  jo chaḍḍami tuha ṇeha-rasāẏaṇu
text.19208: jo lacchīharu ujjhĕvi sakkami  $  so kiṃ avaraĩ sahĕvi ṇa sakkami
text.19216: kāleṇa vi ṇarinda vaḍḍhiẏa-mahanta-sou  $  hosaï tuha samāṇu avarĕhĩ vi sahũ viou
text.19217: taïẏahũ dukkaru jīviu chuṭṭaï  $  vahu-dukkhĕhĩ mahu hiẏavaü phuṭṭaï
text.19218: teṃ kajjeṃ ṇa vi vāriu thakkami  $  caü-gaï-kāṇaṇĕ bhamĕvi ṇa sakkami"
text.19219: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi valu dummaṇa-vaẏaṇaü  $  vollaï aṃsu-jalolliẏa-ṇaẏaṇaü
text.19220: "tuhũ sa-kiẏatthaü jo iu vujjhĕvi  $  mahu-sama siẏa jara-tiṇam iva ujjhĕvi
text.19221: ghoru vīru tava-caraṇu samicchahi  $  iẏa jammeṃ jaï mokkhu ṇa pecchahi
text.19222: avasaru pariẏāṇĕvi saṃkheveṃ  $  samvohevaü haũ paĩ deveṃ
text.19223: jaï jāṇahi uvaẏāru ṇiruttaü  $  sambharejja to ĕu jaṃ vuttaü"
text.19224: sŏ vi sarahasu sa-viṇaü paṇaveppiṇu  $  "ema karemi deva" pabhaṇeppiṇu
text.19232: sahasā huu maharisi bhava-bhava-saẏāhã bhīu  $  sīlāharaṇa-bhūsio karaẏaluttarīu
text.19233: to muṇi ahiṇandĕvi amara-saẏa  $  ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-bhavaṇahã sahasatti gaẏa
text.19234: sīrāuho vi saṃcallu tahĩ  $  sā acchaï sīẏāevi jahĩ
text.19236: ṇaṃ samaẏa-lacchi vimalamvariẏa  $  ṇaṃ sāsaṇa-devaẏa avaẏariẏa
text.19237: pekkhĕvi puṇu thiu āsaṇṇu valu  $  ṇaṃ saraẏa-jalaẏa-mālahĕ acalu
text.19239: "jā ciru ghaṇa-ravahŏ vi tasaï maṇĕ  $  sovaï hiẏa-icchiẏa-vara-saẏaṇĕ
text.19241: vara-kāṇaṇĕ paguṇa guṇabbhahiẏa  $  kiha raẏaṇi gamesaï bhaẏa-rahiẏa
text.19249: dhi maĩ kiẏaü asundaraṃ jaṇahũ kāraṇeṇaṃ  $  jaṃ ghallāviẏāsi piẏa vaṇĕ akāraṇeṇaṃ"
text.19250: cintĕvi eva sīẏa ahiṇandiẏa  $  ṇaṃ jiṇa-paḍima surindeṃ vandiẏa
text.19251: jiha teṃ tema sumittihĕ jāeṃ  $  tiha vara-vijjāhara-saṅghāeṃ
text.19254: kanta-jaṇera-kulaĩ appaü jaṇu  $  paĩ ujjāliu saẏalu vi tihuẏaṇu"
text.19255: puṇu ṇīsallu karevi mahavvala  $  jāṇaï ahiṇandĕvi gaẏa hari-vala
text.19256: lavaṇaṅkusa-kumāra vicchāẏā  $  ṇaṃ ravi-sasahara ṇippaha jāẏā
text.19265: etthantarĕ ṇievi valaeu païsaranto  $  risaha-jiṇinda-paḍhama-ṇandaṇahŏ aṇuharanto
text.19267: "ĕhu so valu ṇiẏa-bhua-vala-vīẏaü  $  dīsaï gimbhu jema ṇissīẏaü
text.19268: soha ṇa pāvaï uttama-sattaü  $  ṇaṃ jiṇa-dhammu daẏā-paricattaü
text.19269: ṇaṃ joṇhaĕ āmelliu sasaharu  $  ṇaṃ dittiĕ dūrujjhiu diṇaẏaru
text.19270: ĕhu so jeṃ viṇivāiu rāvaṇu  $  lakkhaṇu lakkhaṇa-lakkhaṅkiẏa-taṇu
text.19271: iẏa veṇṇi vi jaṇa te lavaṇaṅkusa  $  sīẏā-ṇandaṇa kari va ṇiraṅkusa
text.19275: ĕhu so sattuhaṇu  $  sattuhaṇu samarĕ aṇivāriu
text.19276: ṇandaṇu suppahahĕ  $  jeṃ mahu mahurāhiu māriu
text.19281: ĕhu so jaṇaẏa-ṇandaṇo jaẏasirī-ṇivāso  $  rahaṇeura-purāhivo tihuaṇe paẏāso
text.19283: kikkindha-ṇarāhivu vāli-bhāi  $  tārāvaï tārā-vaï va bhāi
text.19284: ĕhu so mārui akkhaẏa-viṇāsu  $  jeṃ diṇṇu pāu sirĕ rāvaṇāsu
text.19285: ĕhu so suviẏaḍḍhāevi-kantu  $  laṅkesu vihīsaṇu viṇaẏa-vantu
text.19286: ĕhu so ṇalu ghāiu jeṇa hatthu  $  ĕhu ṇīlu vivāiu jeṃ pahatthu
text.19287: ĕhu so aṅgaü thira-thora-vāhu  $  jeṃ kiu mandoẏari-kesa-gāhu
text.19288: ĕhu so pavaṇañjaü suhaḍa-pavaru  $  paripālaï jo āicca-ṇaẏaru
text.19289: ĕhu so mahindu añjaṇahĕ tāu  $  maṇaveẏa-mahāeviĕ sahāu
text.19290: āẏaü sahi tiṇṇi vi jaṇiu tāu  $  avarāiẏa-kaïkaẏa-suppahāu
text.19298: ṇāẏariẏā-ẏaṇāsu ālāva eva jā̃va  $  lakkhaṇa-paümaṇāha rāulĕ païṭṭha tā̃va
text.19299: surasari-jaüṇa-pavāha va sāẏarĕ  $  sasi-divasaẏara va attha-dharāharĕ
text.19300: kesari vva giri-kuharabbhantarĕ  $  saddattha va vāẏaraṇa-kahantarĕ
text.19301: cintaï valu piẏa-soẏabbhaïẏaü  $  "pekkhu keva sīẏaĕ tavu laïẏaü
text.19302: haũ bhattāru jaṇaddaṇu devaru  $  jaṇaü jaṇaṇu bhāmaṇḍalu bhāẏaru
text.19303: ṇandaṇa dui vi eẏa lavaṇaṅkusa  $  avarāiẏa sāsuva dīhāusa
text.19304: iha mahi eu rajju ĕu paṭṭaṇu  $  ĕu gharu ĕhu avaru vi vandhava-jaṇu
text.19305: iẏa puṇṇima-sasi-saṇṇiha-chattaĩ  $  kaha savvaï mi jhatti paricattaĩ
text.19306: suravaraha mi asakku kiu sāhasu  $  vahu-kālahŏ vi thaviu mahiẏalĕ jasu
text.19314: to ettahĕ vi tāva paï-putta-moha-cattā  $  tiẏa-saṃbhūi-ṇindiẏā aï-mahanta-sattā
text.19315: jā pāusa-siri vva su-paohara  $  āsi tiẏasa-juvaïhĩ va maṇohara
text.19316: sā taveṇa parisosiẏa jāṇaï  $  ṇaṃ divasaẏareṃ gimbhĕ mahā-ṇaï
text.19321: ghoru vīru tava-caraṇu kareppiṇu  $  hāẏaṇāĩ vāsaṭṭhi gameppiṇu
text.19322: diṇa tettīsa samāhi laheppiṇu  $  thiẏa indahŏ indattaṇu leppiṇu
text.19326: hari-rāmujjhiẏaü  $  avaru vi jo dikkha laesaï
text.19327: sagga-mokkha-suhaĩ  $  so savvaĩ sa ĩ bhu ñjesaï
text.19328: iẏa pomacariẏa-sese  $  saẏambhuevassa kaha vi uvvarie
text.19334: tihi mi jagĕhĩ jaṃ ṇiruvamaü  $  jaï para taṃ ji tāsu uvamijjaï"
text.19339: to uttamaṅgĕ lāiẏa-kareṇa  $  pabhaṇiu gottamu magahesareṇa
text.19342: kantujjhiu evahĩ daṇu-vimaddu  $  kahi kāĩ karesaï rāmacandu
text.19343: kiṃ lakkhaṇu kāĩ samīra-taṇaü  $  kiṃ bhāmaṇḍalu kiṃ jaṇaü kaṇaü
text.19344: kiṃ lavaṇu kāĩ aṅkusu kumāru  $  kiṃ laṅkāhivu suggīu tāru
text.19345: kiṃ pavaṇañjaü dahimuhu mahindu  $  candoẏari jamvavu indu kundu
text.19346: kiṃ ṇalu ṇīlu vi sattuhaṇu aṅgu  $  pihumaï suseṇu aṅgaü taraṅgu
text.19347: aṭṭha vi ṇārāẏaṇa-taṇaẏa kāĩ  $  aṇṇu vi āhuṭṭha vi sua-saẏāĩ
text.19348: gaü gavaü candakaru dummuho vi  $  avaru vi kiṅkaru jo valahŏ ko vi
text.19350: kiṃ avarāiẏa vimala-maï  $  kiṃ sumitta suppaha guṇa-sārā
text.19351: kāĩ karesaï doṇa-suẏa  $  ĕu saẏalu vi vajjarahi bhaḍārā"
text.19360: "mahu ghariṇi jaẏaddaha jagĕ pasiddha  $  sura-sari va suvāṇiẏa kula-visuddha
text.19361: dui duhiẏaü tāhĕ viẏakkhaṇāu  $  ahiṇava-jovvaṇaü sa-lakkhaṇāu
text.19362: mandāiṇi-ṇāmeṃ tahĩ mahanta  $  lahu candabhāẏa puṇu rūvavanta
text.19364: tāhã saẏamvara-kāraṇĕṇa  $  miliẏa saẏala mahi-goẏara kheẏara
text.19365: tumhahĩ viṇu sohanti ṇa vi  $  inda-paḍinda-rahiẏa ṇaṃ suravara
text.19369: ĕu pariẏāṇĕvi sahasatti tehĩ  $  sarahasĕhĩ rāma-cakkesarehĩ
text.19370: paripesiẏa aṅkusa-lavaṇa ve vi  $  hari-ṇandaṇa aṭṭha kumāra je vi
text.19371: ṇaṃ pacaliẏa aṭṭha vi disa-karinda  $  ṇaṃ vasu ṇaṃ aṭṭha vi visaharinda
text.19373: avara vi kumāra diḍha-kaḍhiṇa-deha  $  avaropparu parivaḍḍhiẏa-saṇeha
text.19375: ṇaṃ juga-khaĕ huavahu canda-sūra  $  saṇi-kaṇaẏa-keu-guru-rāhu kūra
text.19376: joẏanta caüddisu mahi samatta  $  taṃ kañcaṇathāṇu khaṇeṇa patta
text.19379: ṇaṃ vivāha-maṇḍavu viulu  $  ṇimmiu lavaṇaṅkusahã vihāeṃ
text.19383: to ṇahĕ pekkhĕvi āgamaṇu tāhã  $  dasasandaṇa-ṇandaṇa-ṇandaṇāhã
text.19384: veẏaḍḍha-ṇivāsiẏa sāṇurāẏa  $  ahimuha vijjāhara saẏala āẏa
text.19385: sahũ tehĩ milĕvi kañcaṇarahāsu  $  gaẏa samuha saẏamvara-maṇḍavāsu
text.19386: jahĩ gāḍha ṇiviḍa vahu mañca vaddha  $  ṇāvaï sakkaï-kaẏa kavva-vandha
text.19387: jahĩ ṇaravara paẏaḍiẏa-vahu-viẏāra  $  khaṇĕ galĕ vandhanti muẏanti hāra
text.19388: khaṇĕ lenti aṇeẏaĩ bhūsaṇāĩ  $  caü-disu joẏanti ṇiẏaṃsaṇāĩ
text.19390: jahĩ maṇaharu kĕ vi gāẏanti geu  $  aï-su-saru suhāvaü viviha-bheu
text.19391: tahĩ te kumāra saẏala vi païṭṭha  $  ṇāṇā-maṇimaẏa-mañcĕhĩ ṇiviṭṭha
text.19398: to rūva-pasaṇṇaü  $  veṇṇi vi kaṇṇaü  $  gahiẏa-pasāhaṇaü
text.19402: sa-viseseṃ bhalliu  $  ṇaṃ dui bhalliu  $  maẏaṇeṃ melliẏaü
text.19404: thiẏa caühu mi pāsahĩ  $  mañca-sahāsahĩ  $  vara joẏantiẏaü
text.19406: ṇaṃ sukaï-ṇivaddhaü  $  kahaü rasaḍḍhaü  $  maṇĕ païsantiẏaü
text.19409: ṇaṃ raṇĕ ḍhukkantiu  $  maggaṇa-pantiu  $  virahu karantiẏaü
text.19413: aggaĕ kariṇi samāruhiẏa  $  dhāi saẏala darisāvaï ṇaravara
text.19414: ṇāvaï cāru vasanta-siri  $  vihĩ phullandhua-pantihĩ taruvara
text.19418: joẏavi bhū-goẏara catta keva  $  khama-daĕhĩ kugaï-gaï-maggu jeva
text.19419: puṇu melliẏa vijjāhara-ṇarinda  $  ṇaṃ gaṅgā-jaüṇĕhĩ vahu-girinda
text.19420: avarĕ vi pariharĕvi gaẏāu tetthu  $  te sīẏā-ṇandaṇa ve vi jetthu
text.19422: ravikanta-pahujjoiẏa-diẏantu  $  avarĕhi mi maṇihĩ maha-soha dintu
text.19423: pekkhĕvi lavaṇaṅkusa turiu savvu  $  gaü parigalevi ciru rūva-gavvu
text.19424: jeṭṭhovari puṇu mandāiṇīĕ  $  parighitta māla gaẏa-gāmiṇīĕ
text.19425: aṅkusahŏ candabhāẏāĕ teva  $  pariosiẏa ṇahaẏalĕ saẏala deva
text.19426: kiu kalaẏalu tūraĩ āhaẏāĩ  $  vicchāẏaĩ jāẏaĩ vara-saāĩ
text.19429: "kiṃ viṇibhindahũ mahi gaẏaṇu  $  kiṃ sāẏarĕ giri-vivarĕ paīsahũ
text.19430: dhīsohagga-bhagga-rahiẏa  $  jāhũ tetthu jahĩ jaṇĕṇa ṇa dīsahũ"
text.19436: muṇĕvi vāla vikkama-gurukkaẏā  $  saẏala avara vara pāsĕ ḍhukkaẏā
text.19437: saṇṇiẏaṃ duaṃ tehĩ seṇṇaẏaṃ  $  ghaṇa-ulaṃ va ṇaha-ẏalĕ ṇisaṇṇaẏaṃ
text.19441: jāva valaï kira bhīsaṇāuhaṃ  $  vihi mi rāma-ṇandaṇahã sammuhaṃ
text.19443: tāva tehĩ aṭṭhahĩ vi tahĩ  $  lacchīhara-mahaevī-jāĕhĩ
text.19444: dhariu ṇiẏaẏa-bhāẏarĕhĩ sahũ  $  ṇaṃ taïlokka-cakku disa-ṇāĕhĩ
text.19448: "ahŏ ahŏ bhāẏarahŏ ma karahŏ kohu  $  maṃ vaḍḍhārahŏ rahu-kulĕ virohu
text.19449: jo jāẏa-diṇahŏ laggĕvi saṇehu  $  so vala-lakkhaṇahã ma khaẏahŏ ṇehu
text.19450: āẏahã para kaṇṇahã kāraṇeṇa  $  avaropparu kāĩ mahā-raṇeṇa
text.19452: kalahanti e vi para jeva rāẏa  $  ku-purisa viṇṇāṇa-kalā-aṇāẏa
text.19453: tumhĕhĩ puṇu saẏalaĩ aï-samattha  $  guṇavanta viẏāṇiẏa-atthasattha
text.19454: lajjijjaï aṇṇu vi rāhavāsu  $  kiha vaẏaṇu ṇiesahũ gampi tāsu
text.19455: suṭṭhu vi maẏa-mattaü miliẏa-bhiṅgu  $  kiṃ ṇiẏa-karu paricappaï maẏaṅgu"
text.19457: iẏa piẏa-vaẏaṇĕhĩ avarĕhi mi  $  te uvasāmiẏa māṇa-samuṇṇaẏa
text.19458: ṇaṃ vara-guru-mantakkharĕhĩ  $  kiẏa gaï-muha-ṇivaddha vahu paṇṇaẏa
text.19462: puṇu te avaloĕvi vāra-vāra  $  sahũ kaṇṇahĩ lavaṇaṅkusa-kumāra
text.19464: ṇisuṇĕvi gijjantaĩ maṅgalāĩ  $  tūraĩ gahirāĩ sa-kāhalāĩ
text.19466: appāṇaü pariṇindanti kẽva  $  hari-daṃsaṇĕ sura tava-hīṇa jẽva
text.19469: ṇa vi jāṇahũ hīṇa guṇeṇa keṇa  $  ekkahŏ vi ṇa ghattiẏa māla jeṇa
text.19471: ahavaï kāĩ visūriĕṇa  $  labbhaï saẏalu vi ciru kaẏa-puṇṇĕhĩ
text.19472: jīvahŏ maṇĕṇa samicchiẏaü  $  kiṃ saṃpaḍaï kiĕhĩ païsuṇṇĕhĩ
text.19476: vari turiu gampi tava-caraṇu lehũ  $  jeṃ siddhi-vahua-karaẏalu dharehũ"
text.19477: ĕu cintĕvi avahatthiẏa-bhaẏāsu  $  puṇu gaẏa valevi lakkhaṇahŏ pāsu
text.19478: viṇṇaviu ṇaveppiṇu "ṇisuṇi tāẏa  $  pajjattaü visaẏa-suhehĩ rāẏa
text.19485: paribhamiẏa suiru a-lahanta dhammu  $  kaha kaha vi laddhu puṇu maṇua-jammu
text.19487: evahĩ eṇa kalevarĕṇa  $  jahiṃ kahiṃ vi ṇatthi jama-ḍāmaru
text.19488: jiṇa-pāvajja-taraṇḍaĕṇa  $  jāhũ desu jahĩ jaṇu ajarāmaru"
text.19492: suẏa-vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu lakkhaṇeṇa  $  avaloĕvi puṇu puṇu takkhaṇeṇa
text.19493: paricumvĕvi matthaĕ vāra-vāra  $  gaggara-gireṇa pabhaṇiẏa kumāra
text.19494: "iha siẏa iha sampaẏa eu rajju  $  ĕhu sura-tiẏa-samu piẏa-ẏaṇu maṇojju
text.19495: kula-jāẏaü āẏaü māẏarīu  $  āẏaü savvaha mi mahattarīu
text.19497: āẏaĩ avarāĩ vi pariharevi  $  kiha vaṇĕ ṇivasesahũ dikkha levi
text.19498: haũ tumha ṇeha-vandhaṇĕ ṇiuttu  $  kiṃ parisesĕvi savvahu mi juttu"
text.19499: paḍivuttu kumārĕhĩ "kāĩ eṇa  $  vahueṇa ṇirattheṃ jampieṇa
text.19500: mokkalli tāẏa mā hou vigghu  $  sijjhaü tava-caraṇa-ṇihāṇu sigghu"
text.19503: pāsĕ mahavvala-muṇivarahã  $  laïẏa dikkha ṇīsesahũ takkhaṇĕ
text.19513: ekkahĩ diṇĕ sihi-ula-kaẏa-vamālu  $  sampāiu vāsārattu kālu
text.19518: matthaĕ paḍiẏa taḍatti taḍi  $  sela-siharĕ ṇaṃ paharaṇu sakkahŏ
text.19522: jaṃ uttamaṅgĕ ṇivaḍiu ṇihāu  $  taṃ pāṇahĩ melliu jaṇaẏa-jāu
text.19523: gaẏa turiẏa rāma-lakkhaṇahŏ vatta  $  "bhāmaṇḍala-kaha kālahŏ samatta"
text.19524: tehi mi pabhaṇiu "raṇa-saẏa-samatthu  $  amhahã ṇivaḍiu dāhiṇaü hatthu"
text.19525: lavaṇaṅkusa sattuhaṇeṇa sahiẏa  $  ṇisuṇeviṇu soẏa-ggahĕṇa gahiẏa
text.19526: "hā māma māma guṇa-raẏaṇa-khāṇi  $  kahĩ gaü muevi garuāhimāṇi
text.19527: ettiẏa-kālahŏ sihi-mahura-vāẏa  $  hā muẏa amhāriẏa ajju māẏa"
text.19528: ṇisuṇāviu jaṇaü vi turiu āu  $  lahu-bhāẏareṇa kaṇaeṃ sahāu
text.19529: tahŏ puṇu pucchijjaï dukkhu kāĩ  $  to vaṇṇijjaï jaï vahu-muhāĩ
text.19532: sahasā loẏācāru kiu  $  diṇṇu salilu bhāmaṇḍala-rāẏahŏ
text.19536: to vahu-divasĕhĩ māruvi sa-jāu  $  sa-vimāṇu kaṇṇakuṇḍala-purāu
text.19538: gaü vandaṇa-hattiĕ turiu meru  $  ṇaṃ jakkhiṇi-jakkhĕhĩ sahũ kuveru
text.19541: guha-kūḍaĩ khettaĩ kāṇaṇāĩ  $  viṇṇi vi kuru-bhūmiu uvavaṇāĩ
text.19542: savvaĩ piẏa-ghariṇihĩ dakkhavantu  $  vihasantu khaṇe khaṇĕ puṇu ramantu
text.19545: pavara-vimāṇahŏ oẏarĕvi  $  karĕvi paẏāhiṇa turiẏa sa-kanteṃ
text.19546: ṇimmala-bhattiĕ jiṇa-bhavaṇĕ  $  thui pārambhiẏa puṇu haṇuvanteṃ
text.19552: jaẏa jaẏa suṭṭhu puṭṭha-duṭṭhaṭṭha-kamma-diḍha-vandha-toḍaṇā  $  jaẏa jaẏa koha-loha-aṇṇāṇa-māṇa-duma-panti-moḍaṇā
text.19553: jaẏa jaẏa bhavva-jīva saṃsāra-samuddahŏ turiu tāraṇā  $  jaẏa jaẏa haẏa-tisalla jaẏa jāi-jarā-maraṇaĩ ṇivāraṇā
text.19555: jaẏa jaẏa tijaẏa-kamala-vaẏa-daẏa-ṇaẏa-ṇiruvama-guṇa-gaṇālaẏā  $  jaẏa jaẏa visaẏa-vigaẏa jaẏa jaẏa dasa-viha-dhammāṇuvālaẏā
text.19556: tuhũ savvaṇhu savva-ṇiravekkhu ṇirañjaṇu ṇikkalo paro  $  tuhũ ṇiravaẏavu suhumu paramappaü paramu lahu paramparo
text.19557: tuhũ ṇilleu a-guru paramāṇuu akkhaü vīẏarāẏao  $  tuhũ gaï maï jaṇeru sasa māẏari bhāẏari suhi sahāẏao"
text.19559: ẽva viviha-thottĕhĩ thuṇĕvi  $  [puṇu] puṇu jiṇavaru pujjĕvi añcĕvi
text.19565: ṇiẏa-līlaĕ entahŏ bharaha-khettu  $  parigaliu divasu atthamiu mittu
text.19566: aṇuratta sañjha ṇaṃ vesa āẏa  $  ṇaṃ rakkhasi rattāratta jāẏa
text.19567: vahalandhaẏāra puṇu ḍhukka rāi  $  masi-khapparu vihiu samattha (?) ṇāĩ
text.19568: tahĩ kālĕ haṇuu taṇu-paha-jiẏakku  $  suradunduhi-selĕ sa-seṇṇu thakku
text.19569: joaï kasaṇujjalu jāva gaẏaṇu  $  sasi-virahiu ṇiddīvaü va bhavaṇu
text.19570: tahĩ tāva ṇiẏacchiẏa ṇiru gurukka  $  ṇahaẏalahŏ paḍanti samujjalukka
text.19571: savvahŏ vi jaṇahŏ sajjhasu karanti  $  ṇaṃ vijjula-leha paripphuranti
text.19573: sā thovantarĕ a-muṇiẏa-pamāṇa  $  atthakkaĕ ṇiĕvi vilīẏamāṇa
text.19576: taṃ tila-mittu vi kiṃ pi ṇa vi  $  jāsu ṇa dīsaï bhuvaṇĕ viṇāsu
text.19580: divasĕhĩ maṇa-mūḍhahũ ārisāhũ  $  eha jĕ avattha amhārisāhũ
text.19581: lhikkantahã giri-vara-kandare vi  $  mañjūsahã asivara-pañjare vi
text.19582: caü-disahĩ bhavantahã amvare vi  $  lukkantahã sāẏarĕ mandare vi
text.19583: āĕhĩ avarehĩ ṇa muaï mittu  $  to vari para-loẏahŏ diṇṇu cittu
text.19587: tusa-muṭṭhi va ṇiru ṇīsāru dehu  $  jala-reha va diṭṭha-paṇaṭṭhu ṇehu
text.19589: ĕu jāṇantu vi pekkhu kiha  $  acchami chāiu mohaṇa-jāleṃ
text.19590: iẏa girivarĕ sūruggamaṇĕ  $  kallĕ ji dikkha lemi kiṃ kāleṃ"
text.19594: cintantahŏ hiẏavaĕ tāsu eva  $  gaẏa raẏaṇi kameṇa ku-vuddhi jeva
text.19595: uggamiu divāẏaru ṇahĕ vihāi  $  pāvajja-ṇihālaü āu ṇāĩ
text.19597: ṇīsarĕvi vimāṇahŏ aṇila-puttu  $  ṇara-jāṇu caḍiu maṇi-gaṇa-ṇiuttu
text.19598: gaü ṇaravara-sahiu jiṇinda-bhavaṇu  $  cāraṇa-risi lakkhiu dhammaraẏaṇu
text.19599: pariẏañcĕvi jiṇa-vandaṇa karevi  $  puṇu du-vihu pariggahu pariharevi
text.19600: paṇṇāsahĩ satta-saĕhĩ sahāu  $  khaẏarahã dikkhaṅkiu sāṇurāu
text.19602: sāṇaṅgakusuma tiha kharahŏ dhīẏa  $  tiha sirimāliṇi ṇala-suẏa viṇīẏa
text.19603: tiha laṅkāsundari guṇahã rāsi  $  jā pariṇiẏa laṅkāurihĩ āsi
text.19604: avaraü vi maṇohara tiẏaü tāva  $  ṇikkhantaü aṭṭha sahāsa jāva
text.19607: aṇṇaü puṇu kiṃ jāṇiẏaü  $  jāu tetthu pavvaïẏaü ṇāriu
text.19611: vatta suṇĕvi rovaï maru-añjaṇa  $  "hā haṇuvanta rāma-maṇa-rañjaṇa
text.19617: hā hā ṇāga-pāsa-vahu-toḍaṇa  $  hā hā rāvaṇa-mandira-moḍaṇa
text.19618: hā hā laṅkā-paüli-ṇiloṭṭaṇa  $  hā hā vajjoẏara-dalavaṭṭaṇa
text.19620: amhahũ vihi mi putta ṇa kahantaü  $  kiha ekkallaü jji ṇikkhantaü"
text.19621: eva bhaṇĕvi suẏa-soẏabbhaïẏaĩ  $  jiṇaharu gampi tāĩ pavvaïẏaĩ
text.19623: sŏ vi maẏaraddhaü vīsamaü  $  mārui ghora-vīra-tava-tattaü
text.19624: vahu-divasĕhĩ kevalu lahĕvi  $  jetthu sa ẏa mbhu-deu tahĩ pattaü
text.19627: iẏa pomacariẏa-sese  $  saẏambhuevassa kaha vi uvvarie
text.19632: vahu-divasĕhĩ te lakkhaṇa-sua vi  $  duddharu dūsahu tavu karĕvi
text.19633: jiha haṇuu tema dhuẏa-kamma-raẏa  $  thiẏa siva-sāsaĕ païsarĕvi
text.19638: to iẏa vatta suṇĕvi riu-maddeṃ  $  vihasĕvi vollijjaï valahaddeṃ
text.19639: "lahavi eẏa vara-bhoẏa maṇohara  $  haẏavara gaẏavara rahavara ṇaravara
text.19642: mahu ṇa muṇantahŏ bhava-bhaẏa-laïẏā  $  pekkhu keva saẏala vi pavvaïẏā
text.19643: maṃchuḍu te vāeṃ uṭṭhaddhā  $  ahavaï kahi mi pisāeṃ laddhā
text.19644: jima vāmohiẏa jima ummāhiẏa  $  kusalu ṇa atthi vejjĕ ṇa vi vāiẏa
text.19645: teṃ kajjeṃ vihoẏa parisesĕvi  $  gaẏa taveṇa appāṇaü bhūsĕvi"
text.19648: rāhavahŏ vi jahĩ jaḍa-maï havaï  $  tahĩ aṇṇahŏ ṇa vi hoi kahŏ
text.19652: aṇṇahĩ diṇĕ suravarahã variṭṭhaü  $  sahasaṇaẏaṇu ṇiẏa-sahaĕ ṇiviṭṭhaü
text.19655: vivihāharaṇa-phuranta-sarīraü  $  giri va dhīru jalahi va gambhīraü
text.19657: loẏavāla-pamuhahã suha-pavarahã  $  vollaï samaü asesahã amarahã
text.19658: "jāsu pasāeṃ ĕu indattaṇu  $  labbhaï devattaṇu siddhattaṇu
text.19660: jo bhava-sāẏara-duhaĩ ṇivāraï  $  bhaviẏa-lou helāĕ ji tāraï
text.19662: uppaṇṇahŏ jasu mandara-siharĕ  $  tiẏasendĕhĩ ahiseu kiu
text.19663: taṃ paṇavahŏ saĩ savvāẏarĕṇa  $  jaï icchahŏ bhava-maraṇa-khaü
text.19667: jo saẏarāẏara pihimi mueppiṇu  $  thiu bhuvaṇa-ttaẏa-siharĕ caḍeppiṇu
text.19668: jāsu ṇāmu sivu sambhu jiṇesaru  $  deva-devu mahaevu mahesaru
text.19669: jiṇu jiṇindu kāleñjaru saṅkaru  $  thāṇu hiraṇṇagabbhu titthaṅkaru
text.19670: vihu saẏambhu saddhammu saẏampahu  $  bhaẏaü aruhu arahantu jaẏappahu
text.19671: sūri ṇāṇa-loẏaṇu tihuẏaṇa-guru  $  kevali ruddu viṇhu haru jaga-guru
text.19672: suhumu sokkhu ṇiravekkhu paramparu  $  paramappaü paramāṇu paramaparu
text.19673: a-guru a-lahuu ṇirañjaṇu ṇikkalu  $  jaga-maṅgalu ṇiravaẏavu su-ṇimmalu
text.19675: iẏa ṇāmĕhĩ sura-ṇara-visaharĕhĩ  $  jo saṃthuvvaï bhuvaṇa-ẏalĕ
text.19676: tahŏ aṇudiṇu risaha-bhaḍārāhŏ  $  bhattiĕ laggahŏ paẏa-juvalĕ
text.19680: jīvu aṇāi-ṇihaṇu bhava-sāẏarĕ  $  kamma-vaseṇa bhamantu duhāẏarĕ
text.19681: kema vi maṇuẏa-jammĕ uppajjaï  $  dhammahŏ ṇavara tahi mi mohijjaï
text.19682: micchā-tavĕṇa jāu hīṇāmaru  $  mujjhaï cavĕvi hoi vi paḍivaü ṇaru
text.19683: maha-riddhiẏahŏ vi surahŏ su-vallaha  $  hoi ṇarattĕ vohi aï-dullaha
text.19684: dukkhu dukkhu so dhammahŏ laggaï  $  aṇṇāṇiu puṇu kira kahĩ laggaï
text.19685: aha devo vi hovi paḍivaü ṇaru  $  ṇaru vi hovi puṇu paḍivaü suravaru
text.19686: ahŏ devahŏ kaïẏahã maṇuattaṇĕ  $  vohi lahesahũ jiṇavara-sāsaṇĕ
text.19688: ekkeṃ sureṇa vuttu to suravaï  $  "saggĕ vasantahã amhahã iẏa maï
text.19689: maṇuattaṇĕ puṇu savvahã mujjhaï  $  koha-loha-maẏa-māṇĕhĩ rujjhaï
text.19690: ahavaï jaï ṇa vi maṇĕ pariacchahi  $  to kiṃ paümaṇāhu ṇa ṇiẏacchahi
text.19691: cavĕvi vamha-ṇāmahŏ sura-loẏahŏ  $  kiha āsattaü maṇua-vihoẏahŏ
text.19694: saṃsārĕ saṇeha-ṇivandhu diḍhu  $  majjhĕ asesahã vandhaṇahã
text.19699: ekku vi ṇivisu viou ṇa icchaï  $  uvagarehũ pāṇehĩ vi vañchaï
text.19700: ettiu jāṇami haũ ahŏ devahŏ  $  maraṇahŏ ṇāmeṇa ji valaevahŏ
text.19701: ṇa vi jīvaï ṇiruttu dāmoẏaru  $  rāmu muaü teṃ kema sahoẏaru
text.19703: kiha vīsaraü aüjjha muevaü  $  samaü saẏalĕ vaṇa-vāsĕ bhamevaü
text.19705: kiha vīsaraü samarĕ paharevaü  $  indaï vi-rahu karevi dharevaü
text.19706: kiha vīsaraü sa-rosu bhiḍevaü  $  laṅkesara-sira-kamala khuḍevaü
text.19708: avara vi uvaẏāra jaṇaddaṇahŏ  $  kiha rahuvaï maṇĕ vīsaraï
text.19709: teṃ acchaï paḍiuvaẏāra-maï  $  ṇeha-vasaṃgaü kiṃ karaï"
text.19713: āẏaṇṇĕvi iẏa vaẏaṇaĩ cavantu  $  aṇṇu vi jāṇĕvi āsaṇṇa-mittu
text.19714: jaẏakārĕvi vāsavu cāru-vesa  $  gaẏa ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-ṇilaẏahã sura asesa
text.19715: tahĩ ṇavara sa-vibbhama viṇṇi deva  $  pacaliẏa lakkhaṇahŏ viṇāsu jeva
text.19716: "valu muẏaü suṇevi saṇehavantu  $  pekkhahũ so kāĩ karaï aṇantu
text.19717: kiha rūaï pajampaï kāĩ vaẏaṇu  $  ārūsaï kahŏ kahĩ kuṇaï gamaṇu
text.19718: muhu soeṃ kehaü hoi tāsu  $  kerisaü dukkhu anteurāsu"
text.19719: eu vaẏaṇu pajampĕvi raẏaṇacūlu  $  aṇṇekku vi ṇāmeṃ amiẏacūlu
text.19720: viṇṇi vi kaẏa-ṇicchaẏa gaẏa turanta  $  ṇiviseṇa aüjjhā-ṇaẏari patta
text.19722: māẏāmaü valaevahŏ bhavaṇĕ  $  devahĩ kaluṇu saddu garaü
text.19727: jaṃ halahara-maraṇa-saddu ṇisuu  $  taṃ bhaṇaï visaṇṇu sumitti-suu
text.19728: "hā kāĩ jāu phuḍu rāhavahŏ"  $  lahu addhu cavantahŏ eva tahŏ
text.19729: sahũ vāẏaĕ jīviu ṇiggaẏaü  $  hari-dehahŏ ṇaṃ rūsĕvi gaẏaü
text.19731: a-ṇimīliẏa-loẏaṇu thaḍḍha-taṇu  $  leppamaü ṇāĩ thiu mahumahaṇu
text.19732: taṃ pekkhĕvi suravara ve vi jaṇa  $  appaü ṇindanti visaṇṇa-maṇa
text.19736: āḍhattu paṇaẏa-kuviẏaĩ karĕvi  $  savvĕhĩ suṭṭhu saṇehiṇihĩ
text.19740: to pāsĕ ḍhukka āula-maṇāhã  $  sattāraha sahasa varaṅgaṇāhã
text.19741: ka vi paṇaïṇi paṇaeṃ bhaṇaï eva  $  "rosāviu kavaṇeṃ akkhu deva
text.19742: jo ku-maïĕ kiu avarāhu tujjhu  $  so saẏalu vi ekkasi khamahi majjhu'
text.19743: sabbhāveṃ aggaĕ kā vi ṇaḍaï  $  ka vi daïẏahŏ calaṇa-ẏalehĩ paḍaï
text.19744: ka vi maṇaharu vīṇā-vajju vāi  $  ka vi viviha-bheu gandhavvu gāi
text.19745: ka vi āliṅgaï ṇibbhara-saṇeha  $  cumvaï kavolu somāla-deha
text.19746: ka vi kusumaĩ sīsĕ samuddharevi  $  tosāvaï sirĕ seharikarevi
text.19747: ka vi muhu joĕvi maliẏaṅgavaṅgu  $  uṭṭhāvaï kiẏa-kara-sāha-bhaṅgu
text.19749: aṇṇāu vi ceṭṭhaü vahu-vihaü  $  juaïhĩ jāu jāu kiẏaü
text.19750: jiha kiviṇa-loĕ siẏa-sampaẏaü  $  savvaü gaẏaü ṇiratthiẏaü
text.19754: to ĕha vatta ṇisuṇeppiṇu rāmu  $  sahasatti āu jagĕ ṇāẏa-ṇāmu
text.19755: lakkhaṇu kumāru jahĩ tahĩ païṭṭhu  $  vahu-piẏahã majjhĕ ṇiẏa-bhāu diṭṭhu
text.19756: savvarĕ (?) virāmĕ sasi-vaẏaṇa-chāu  $  ṇiru ṇiccalu siri-parihariẏa-kāu
text.19757: kākutthu pacintaï raṇĕ dusajjhu  $  "maṃchuḍu lacchīharu kuiu majjhu
text.19758: teṃ kajjeṃ ṇa vi āẏaü vi gaṇaï  $  ṇa vi kāĩ vi abbhutthāṇu kuṇaï"
text.19759: sirĕ cumvĕvi pabhaṇiu "sundaraccha  $  kiṃ mahu ālāvu ṇa dehi vaccha
text.19760: kahĕ kāĩ thiẏaü kaṭṭhamaü ṇāĩ"  $  pariẏāṇiu ciṇhĕhĩ muaü bhāi
text.19761: avaloiu puṇu saẏalu vi sarīru  $  mucchāviu khaṇĕ valaeva-vīru
text.19763: jiha taruvaru chiṇṇaü mūlĕ tiha  $  mahihĕ paḍiu ṇicceẏaṇaü
text.19764: maru-hāra-ṇīra-candaṇa-jalĕhĩ  $  huu kaha kaha vi sa-ceẏaṇaü
text.19769: taṃ bhāu ṇievi sa-ṇeurĕṇa  $  dhāhāviu hari-anteurĕṇa
text.19770: "hā ṇāha āu saĩ dāsarahi  $  kiṃ sīhāsaṇahŏ ṇa oẏarahi
text.19771: hā ṇāhatthāṇu samāgaẏahã   $  sammāṇu karahi ṇaravara-saẏahã
text.19772: hā ṇāha pasaṇṇa-cittu havahi  $  ṇiẏa-piẏaü ruantiu saṃthavahi"
text.19774: "hā lakkhaṇa putta" bhaṇantiẏaü  $  appaü karaẏalĕhĩ haṇantiẏaü
text.19775: tiha āu khaṇaddheṃ sattuhaṇu  $  ṇivaḍiu hari-calaṇahĩ vimaṇa-maṇu
text.19778: paĩ viṇu dhuvu jāẏaü ajju mahu  $  disaü asesaü suṇṇiẏaü"
text.19782: to hari-māẏari sumitti ruaï  $  guṇa sumarĕvi garua dhāha muaï
text.19783: " hā putta putta kahĩ gaẏaü tuhũ  $  hā thiu vicchāẏaü kāĩ muhu
text.19784: hā maĩ atthāṇĕ ṇiacchiẏaü  $  evahĩ jĕ cavantaü acchiẏaü
text.19785: hā kāĩ jāu ĕu acchariu  $  jeṃ mahu ṇillakkhaṇa ṇāmu kiu
text.19786: hā putta putta sīẏāhavahŏ  $  kiṃ maṇĕ ṇivviṇṇaü rāhavahŏ
text.19787: ekkellaü chaḍḍĕvi jeṇa gaü  $  hā putta ajuttaü eu taü"
text.19788: etthantarĕ suṇĕvi mahāusĕhĩ  $  asahantĕhĩ duhu lavaṇaṅkusĕhĩ
text.19789: pariẏāṇĕvi jīviu dehu calu  $  jaẏakārĕvi rāmahŏ paẏa-jualu
text.19791: gampiṇu jiṇaharu jahĩ amiẏasaru  $  ṇivasaï muṇi bhava-bhaẏa-haraṇu
text.19792: kaïvaẏa-kumāra-ṇaravarĕhĩ sahũ  $  vīhi mi laïẏaü tava-caraṇu
text.19797: ekkeṇa ji khaṇeṇa mucchijjaï  $  vihĩ duhehĩ puṇu kiṃ pucchijjaï
text.19798: bhāi ṇiĕvi pariẏaḍḍhiẏa-malaharu  $  puṇu vi puṇu vi dhāhāvaï halaharu
text.19799: "hā lakkhaṇa lakkhaṇa-lakkhaṅkiẏa  $  pekkhu kema mahu sua dikkhaṅkiẏa
text.19800: paĩ viṇu ko mahu sahũ gamu sandhaï  $  ko sīhoẏaru samarĕ ṇivandhaï
text.19801: paĩ viṇu ko mahu pesaṇu sāraï  $  vajjaẏaṇṇu ṇaravaru sāhāraï
text.19802: paĩ viṇu vālikhillu ko dhāraï  $  ko taṃ ruddabhutti viṇivāraï
text.19803: paĩ viṇu ko bhañjaï dharaṇīdharu  $  dharaï aṇantavīru ko duddharu
text.19805: sattiu aridamaṇa-ṇarāhivahŏ  $  pañca paḍicchĕvi saĩ samarĕ
text.19806: paĩ viṇu lakkhaṇa khemañjalihĕ  $  kahŏ laggaï jiẏapaüma karĕ
text.19810: hā lakkhaṇa paĩ viṇu guṇaharāhã  $  uvasaggu haraï ko muṇivarāhã
text.19811: paĩ viṇu a-kileseṃ bhuvaṇĕ kāsu  $  karĕ laggaï asivaru sūrahāsu
text.19812: paĩ viṇu ko helaĕ garua-dhīru  $  viṇivāẏaï samvukumāru vīru
text.19813: paĩ viṇu saṃdarisiẏa-vahu-viẏāru  $  ko pariẏāṇaï candaṇahi-cāru
text.19814: paĩ viṇu ko jīviu haraï tāhã  $  tīhi mi tisiraẏa-khara-dūsaṇāhã
text.19815: paĩ viṇu ko dhīraï pamaẏa-satthu  $  ko koḍi-siluddharaṇahũ samatthu
text.19816: paĩ viṇu laṅkā-ṇaẏarihĕ samīvĕ  $  ko jiṇaï haṃsarahu haṃsa-dīvĕ
text.19817: paĩ viṇu ko indaï dharaï bhāi  $  ko rāvaṇa-sattiĕ samuhu thāi
text.19818: paĩ viṇu kahŏ āvaï kiẏa-visalla  $  divasaẏarĕ aṇuṭṭhantaĕ visalla
text.19819: paĩ viṇu uppajjaï kahŏ rahaṅgu  $  ko darisaï vahurūviṇihĕ bhaṅgu
text.19820: paĩ viṇu kiẏantu ko rāvaṇāsu  $  ko siẏa-dāẏāru vihīsaṇāsu
text.19822: paĩ viṇu maṇiṭṭha mahu bhāiṇara  $  ko melāvaï piẏa-ghariṇi
text.19823: pālesaï ṇiru ṇiruvaddaviẏa  $  ko ti-khaṇḍa-maṇḍiẏa dharaṇi
text.19827: hā tavahŏ vigaẏa mahu putta ve vi  $  lacchīhara gampiṇu āu levi
text.19828: hā muĕ maccharu lahu pāliela  $  vaṭṭaï aṇagāra-muṇinda-vela
text.19829: hā kiṃ mahu uvari paṇaṭṭhu ṇehu  $  hā jaṇu saṃthavahi ruvantu ehu
text.19830: iha cakkeṃ jeṃ haü vaïri-cakku  $  so visahahi keva kiẏanta-cakku
text.19831: hā kāĩ karami saṃcarami ketthu  $  ṇa vi taṃ paesu suhu lahami jetthu
text.19832: ṇiḍḍahaï jema bhāẏara-viou  $  tiha ṇa vi visu visamu ṇa pisuṇu lou
text.19833: ṇa vi gimha-ẏālĕ khara-diṇaẏaro vi  $  ṇa vi pajjāliu vaïsāṇaro vi
text.19836: puṇu āliṅgaï cumvaï pusaï  $  aṅkĕ thaveppiṇu puṇu ruvaï
text.19837: jīviĕṇa vi mukkaü mahumahaṇu  $  rāmu saṇeheṃ ṇa vi muẏaï
text.19842: ruṇṇu aüjjhā-jaṇĕṇa aseseṃ  $  avarāiĕ suppahaĕ viseseṃ
text.19843: ruṇṇu sallasundariĕ visālaĕ  $  ruṇṇu visallaĕ tiha guṇamālaĕ
text.19847: ruṇṇu aṇeẏahĩ vandhava-saẏaṇĕhĩ  $  khaṇĕ khaṇĕ vihihĕ diṇṇa-duvvaẏaṇĕhĩ
text.19849: jasu soeṃ mukkala mukka-sara  $  saĩ jaẏa-siri lacchi vi ruvaï
text.19850: tahĕ ujjhāurihĕ kamāgaĕhĩ  $  ko vi ṇa garua dhāha muaï
text.19854: to dasa-disu pasariẏa eha vatta  $  sahasā vijjāharavarahã patta
text.19855: saẏala vi sa-kalatta sa-putta āẏa  $  suggīva-vihīsaṇa-sīhaṇāẏa
text.19860: valaevahŏ calaṇĕhĩ paḍiẏa kẽva  $  taïlokka-guruhĕ givvāṇa jẽva
text.19862: avaloiu puṇu asahantaĕhĩ  $  cakkāhiu sampattu khaü
text.19863: vigaẏa-ppahu dara-oṇalla-siru  $  ṇaṃ kiu keṇa vi leppamaü
text.19867: taṃ ṇiĕvi sumittā-taṇaü tehĩ  $  dhāhāviu vara-vijjāharehĩ
text.19869: hā hā kahĕ pesaṇu kiṃ pi ṇāha  $  hā ajju jāẏa amhaĩ aṇāha
text.19870: hā hā jaṇa-maṇa-jaṇiẏāṇurāẏa  $  kahĕ ko pesesaï vahu-pasāẏa
text.19871: hā hā sāmiẏa jaẏa-siri-ṇivāsa  $  paĩ viṇu ṇa vi rāhava-jīviẏāsa
text.19872: hā hā sāmiẏa savvovaẏāri  $  hā hā maẏaraharāvatta-dhāri
text.19873: hā sāmiẏa tuha daẏa-riṇu imeṇa  $  parisujjhaï ṇa vi ekkeṃ bhaveṇa
text.19874: teṃ kajjeṃ kiṃ ĕu juttu tujjhu  $  jeṃ muĕvi jāhi ṇa kahantu gujjhu"
text.19876: teṃ kaluṇārāveṃ ṇaravarahã  $  dasa-disi kaṇṇaü suravara vi
text.19877: vaṇasaïu ṇaïu maha-jalahi giri  $  rovāviẏa vara visahara vi
text.19881: appaü santhaviu vihīsaṇeṇa  $  puṇu pabhaṇiu rāhavacandu teṇa
text.19882: "parisesahi deva mahantu sou  $  kāsu ṇa bhuvaṇantarĕ huu viou
text.19883: ṇa vi ekkahŏ eẏahŏ antakaraṇu  $  savvahŏ vi jaṇahŏ jara-jamma-maraṇu
text.19884: jīvahŏ bhava-gahaṇĕ ṇa kā vi bhanti  $  cañcalaĩ sarīraĩ honti janti
text.19885: uppatti jeva tiha dhuvu viṇāsu  $  kiṃ rovahi kāraṇĕ lakkhaṇāsu
text.19886: kaïu vi amhehĩ tumhehĩ eva  $  pahu gamaṇu karevaü eṇa jeva
text.19887: jaï jīva-rāsi āvaï ṇa jāi  $  to meiṇi-maṇḍalĕ ketthu māi
text.19888: jaï maraṇu ṇāhĩ bho rāmaẏanda  $  to kahĩ gaẏa kulaẏara jiṇavarinda
text.19889: kahĩ bharaha-pamuha cakkavaï pavara  $  kahĩ rudda-kaṇha-valaeva avara
text.19891: ĕu jāṇĕvi saẏalāgama-kusala  $  vaẏaṇu mahāraü maṇĕ dharahi
text.19892: jhāẏahi sa ẏa mbhu taïlokka-guru  $  duhu du-kalattu va pariharahi
text.19893: iẏa pomacariẏa-sese  $  saẏambhuevassa kaha vi uvvarie
text.19898: paümacariẏassa cūlāmaṇi vva  $  sesaṃ kaẏaṃ jeṇa
text.19900: tahĩ avasarĕ sirasā paṇavantĕhĩ  $  valu viṇṇaviu saẏala-sāmantĕhĩ
text.19906: pabhaṇaï sīrāuhu iẏa vaẏaṇĕhĩ  $  "ḍajjhahŏ tumhĕhĩ sahũ ṇiẏa-saẏaṇĕhĩ
text.19907: ḍajjhaü māẏa-vappu tumhāraü  $  hou cirāusu bhāi mahāraü
text.19908: uṭṭhi jāhũ lakkhaṇa lahu tettahĕ  $  khala-vaẏaṇaĩ suvvanti ṇa jettahĕ
text.19909: ẽva cavĕvi cumvĕvi ālāvĕvi  $  vāsueu ṇiẏa-khandhĕ caḍāvĕvi
text.19910: gaü valaeu aṇṇu thāṇantaru  $  païṭhu turantu pavara-majjaṇaharu
text.19911: "bhāi viujjhahi kettiu sovahi  $  ṇhāṇa-vela parilhasiẏa ṇa joẏahi"
text.19912: puṇu pīḍhovari thavĕvi ṇavamhĕhĩ  $  ahisiñcaï vara-kañcaṇa-kumbhĕhĩ
text.19914: puṇu vollaï samāṇu sūẏārahŏ  $  "bhoẏaṇa-vihi lahu karahŏ kumārahŏ
text.19915: teṇa vi vitthāriu hari-pariẏalu  $  dei piṇḍa muhĕ maṇĕ mohiu valu
text.19916: ṇa vi ahilasaï ṇa pekkhaï lakkhaṇu  $  jiṇa-vaẏaṇu va a-bhavvu a-viẏakkhaṇu
text.19918: tahŏ āẏaĩ avaraĩ vi karantahŏ  $  ṇiẏa-khandheṃ hari-maḍaü vahantahŏ
text.19923: to tāva eu vaïẏaru suṇevi  $  lacchīhara-maraṇaü maṇĕ muṇevi
text.19928: "maru chindahũ ajju kumāra-sīsu  $  vahu-kālahŏ saṃbhāiu havīsu
text.19929: jaṃ laïu khaggu ciru sūrahāsu  $  jaṃ samvukumārahŏ kiu viṇāsu
text.19932: jaṃ vahu-ṭhāĕhĩ amhahã aṇudiṇu  $  diṇṇu aṇantaru vaïru mahā-riṇu
text.19933: taṃ saẏalu vi melĕvi ṇiẏa-vuddhiĕ  $  pheḍahũ ajju savvu sahũ viddhiĕ"
text.19937: to suṇĕvi āẏa rivu rāhaveṇa  $  āẏāmiu vajjāvattu teṇa
text.19938: rahĕ caḍĕvi thaviu ucchaṅgĕ bhāi  $  joiẏa paḍivakkha jameṇa ṇāĩ
text.19939: etthantarĕ je māhinda patta  $  sura jāẏa jaḍāi-kiẏantavatta
text.19940: te takkhaṇĕ āsaṇa-kampa hovi  $  avahiĕ pariẏāṇĕvi āẏa ve vi
text.19941: guṇa sumarĕvi sāmihĕ bhatti-vanta  $  sampāiẏa ujjhāuri turanta
text.19942: viuruvviu suravara-valu aṇantu  $  "maru valahŏ valahŏ ḍhukkahŏ" bhaṇantu
text.19943: taṃ pekkhĕvi hari-vala-rivu paṇaṭṭha  $  laṅghanti disaü ṇaṃ hariṇa taṭṭha
text.19944: vollaï raẏaṇakkhu sa-vajjamāli  $  "duhu ko va ṇa pāvaï kiẏa-duvāli
text.19945: amhahĩ saẏala vi galiẏāhimāṇa  $  ṇillajja duṭṭha dujjaṇa aẏāṇa
text.19946: kiha laṅka gampi suha-daṃsaṇāsu  $  pekkhesahũ vaẏaṇu vihīsaṇāsu"
text.19948: ema bhaṇĕvi indiẏa-dubbheẏahŏ  $  gampiṇu pāsĕ muṇihĕ raïveẏahŏ
text.19953: to rivu-bhaĕ vigaẏaĕ saẏalĕ guṇa-raẏaṇa-sāẏareṇaṃ  $  seṇāṇiẏa-surĕṇa rāma-vohaṇa-kiẏāẏareṇaṃ
text.19954: ṇimmiu siñcijjamāṇu salileṇa sukka-rukkho  $  sampattĕ vasanta-māsĕ virahi vva suṭṭhu sukkho
text.19955: olaggiu ku-pahu ṇāĩ ṇipphalu adiṇṇa-chāo  $  kiviṇu va saĩ patta-phulla-paricattu samala-kāo
text.19956: vasaha-kalevara-juammi halu thavĕvi ṇa-kiẏa-khevo  $  vāhaï pakkhiraï vīu silavaṭṭĕ vīẏa-devo
text.19957: rovaï pāhāṇe kamala-uppala-ṇihāu pavaro  $  pavirolaï manthaṇīĕ pāṇiu kiẏanta-amaro
text.19958: puṇu pīlaï vāluāĕ ghāṇaü jaḍāi-ṇāmo  $  attha-viruddhāĩ tāĩ avaraï mi ṇiĕvi rāmo
text.19959: pabhaṇaï "bho bho aẏāṇa tuhũ mūḍha ṇiẏa-maṇeṇaṃ  $  kiṃ salilahŏ karahi hāṇi jara-rukkha-siñcaṇeṇaṃ
text.19960: māẏāsahi piẏara maḍaẏa-juale ẏa vīẏa-sīre  $  ṇa vi loṇiu hoi parimanthie vi ṇīre (?)
text.19961: vālua-paripīlaṇeṇa tellovaladdhi katto  $  icchiẏa-phalu kiṃ vi ṇatthi āẏāsu para mahanto"
text.19963: to vuccaï kiẏanta-givvāṇeṃ  $  "tuhu mi eu parivajjiu pāṇeṃ
text.19964: vahahi sarīru jeṇa avisiṭṭhaü  $  kahĕ phalu kāĩ etthu paĩ diṭṭhaü"
text.19968: taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu ṇīsāmeṃ  $  hari avaruṇḍĕvi vuccaï rāmeṃ
text.19969: "kiṃ siri-ṇilaü kumāru dugucchahi  $  jaï ṇa muṇahi to seraü acchahi
text.19970: kettiu cavahi aṇiṭṭhu amaṅgalu  $  dosu paḍhukkaï taü para kevalu"
text.19971: jampaï jāva vaẏaṇu iu halaharu  $  tāva laeviṇu suhaḍa-kalevaru
text.19972: āu jaḍāi vahantaü khandheṃ  $  vuttu valeṇa bhāi-soandheṃ
text.19973: ṇeha-vaseṇa vivajjiẏa-rajjeṃ  $  "ĕhu ṇara-dehu vahahi kiṃ kajjeṃ"
text.19974: teṇa caviu "maĩ kira kiṃ pucchahi  $  appāṇaü kira kāĩ ṇa pecchahi
text.19975: jiha haũ tema tuhu mi maṇĕ mūḍhaü  $  acchahi khandhĕ kalevara-vūḍhaü
text.19976: paĩ pekkheppiṇu mahu aṇurūvaü  $  maṇĕ pariaḍḍhiu ṇehu garūaü
text.19978: bho bho maĩ-pamuhahũ ciru jāẏahũ  $  tuhũ rāṇaü savvahu mi pisāẏahũ
text.19979: āu dui vi maha-moha-bbhantā  $  hiṇḍahũ gahilaü lou karantā"
text.19983: iẏa vaẏaṇĕhĩ hali-vala-paüma-ṇāmu  $  aïlajjiu siḍhiliẏa-mohu rāmu
text.19984: sahasā huu viẏasiẏa-kamala-ṇaẏaṇu  $  paricintahũ laggu jiṇinda-vaẏaṇu
text.19985: jaṃ dukkiẏa-kammaĩ khaẏahŏ ṇei  $  jaṃ avicala-sāsaẏa-suhaĩ dei
text.19986: "haũ ṇeha-vasaṅgaü pekkhu keva  $  jāṇanto vi acchami mukkhu jema
text.19987: dhaṇṇaü tihuaṇĕ aṇaraṇṇa-rāu  $  jo chindĕvi mohu muṇindu jāu
text.19988: dhaṇṇaü dasarahu ciru jāsu jhatti  $  kañcui pekkheppiṇu hua viratti
text.19989: dhaṇṇaü bharahu vi jeṃ cattu rajju  $  voddahĕṇa vi kiu paraloẏa-kajju
text.19990: dhaṇṇaü seṇāṇi kiẏantavattu  $  jeṃ muṇĕvi aṇāgaẏa (?) laïu tattu
text.19991: dhaṇṇī sīẏa vihaẏa-kugaï-pantha  $  ṇa vi diṭṭha jāĕ ehī avattha
text.19992: dhaṇṇaü haṇuvantu vi jo garūvĕ  $  ṇa vi ṇivaḍiu iẏa-mohandha-kūvĕ
text.19993: dhaṇṇā lavaṇaṅkusa hari-suā vi  $  je dikkhālaṅkiẏa ṇava-juvā vi
text.19995: haũ ghaĩ puṇu pāeṇa gaeṇa vi  $  aṇṇu vi lacchīharĕṇa maeṇa vi
text.19996: karami kāiṃ vi appa-hiẏattaṇu  $  kahŏ ṇiẏa-kajjĕ ṇa hoi vaḍhattaṇu"
text.20000: puṇu puṇu rahukula-gaẏaṇaẏala-candu  $  paricintaï hiẏavaĕ rāmacandu
text.20003: labbhanti hatthi raha turaẏa pavara  $  aï-dullahu vohi-ṇihāṇu ṇavara"
text.20004: pariẏāṇĕvi valu paḍibuddhu eva  $  ṇiẏa-riddhi ve vi darisanti deva
text.20006: "ahŏ rahuvaï kiṃ gaẏa-diṇa-suheṇa"  $  teṇa vi pavuttu viẏasiẏa-muheṇa
text.20007: "ciru puṇṇa-vihūṇahŏ majjhu etthu  $  maṇĕ mūḍhahŏ ṇivisu vi sokkhu ketthu
text.20008: iẏa maṇuẏa-jammĕ para kusalu tāhã  $  jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ avicala bhatti jāhã
text.20010: aṇṇu vi ṇisuṇahŏ kahami viseseṃ  $  tāhã kusalu te mukka kileseṃ
text.20011: catta-pariggaha vaẏahĩ alaṅkiẏa  $  je jiṇa-pāẏa-mūlĕ dikkhaṅkiẏa"
text.20015: puṇar avi eva vuttu kākuttheṃ  $  "ke tumhe akkhahŏ paramattheṃ
text.20016: keṃ kajjeṃ iẏa riddhi pagāsiẏa  $  rivu-sāhaṇahŏ paẏatti viṇāsiẏa"
text.20017: sarahasu ekku pajampiu suravaru  $  "kiṃ sāmiẏa vīsariẏaü ṇahaẏaru
text.20018: tujjhu païṭṭhahŏ ciru daṇḍaẏa-vaṇĕ  $  jo allīṇu mahārisi-daṃsaṇĕ
text.20019: tuha ghariṇiĕ jo lāliu tāliu  $  ṇiẏaẏa-sarīrubbhavu jiha pāliu
text.20020: sīẏāharaṇĕ samuḍḍĕvi gaẏaṇahŏ  $  jo abbhiḍiu āsi dahavaẏaṇahŏ
text.20021: jāsu marantahŏ suha-vaḍḍhāriẏa  $  paĩ ṇavakāra pañca uccāriẏa
text.20022: tujjhu pasāeṃ riddhi-pasaṇṇaü  $  suru māhenda-saggĕ uppaṇṇaü
text.20024: jo accanta āsi uvaẏāriu  $  bhava-sāẏarĕ paḍantu uddhāriu
text.20025: haũ so deu jaḍāi mahāiu  $  paḍiuvaẏāru karevaĕ āiu"
text.20029: to tāva kiẏanta-deu cavaï  $  "kiṃ maĩ vīsariu ṇarāhivaï
text.20030: jo seṇāvaï taü hontu ciru  $  lallakka-mahāraṇa-saĕhĩ thiru
text.20031: jo pesiu paĩ sahũ bhāẏarahŏ  $  sattuhaṇahŏ samarĕ kiẏāẏarahŏ
text.20032: jeṃ veḍhĕvi mahura palamba-bhuu  $  haü lavaṇa-mahaṇṇaü mahuhĕ suu
text.20034: pariẏāṇĕvi caü-gaï-bhavaṇa-ḍaru  $  sahasā vaïrāu jāu pavaru
text.20035: jo paĩ pabhaṇiu "avasaru muṇĕvi  $  vohijjahi maĩ āẏaru kuṇĕvi"
text.20036: so haũ kiẏa-ghora-tavaccaraṇu  $  māhindĕ jāu suru divva-taṇu
text.20037: avahiĕ pariẏāṇĕvi hari-maraṇu  $  aṇṇu vi uddhāiu vaïri-gaṇu
text.20038: iha āẏaü akkhahi kiṃ karami  $  taü savva-paẏāreṃ uvagarami"
text.20039: teṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu cavaï valu  $  "haũ vohiu bhaggu arāi-valu
text.20040: appaü darisiu riddhīĕ sahũ  $  ṇa pahuccaï eṇa jĕ kāĩ mahu"
text.20041: iẏa vaẏaṇĕhĩ te parituṭṭha maṇĕ  $  gaẏa saggahŏ suravara ve vi khaṇĕ
text.20043: puṇu pariharĕvi sou saṅkheveṃ  $  aṭṭhamu vāsueu valaeveṃ
text.20044: ṇiẏa-khandhahŏ mahiẏalĕ oẏāriu  $  saraū-sarihĕ tīrĕ saṃkāriu
text.20048: taṃ ḍahĕvi sahattheṃ mahumahaṇu  $  puṇu pabhaṇiu rāmeṃ sattuhaṇu
text.20049: "laï vaccha sahoẏara rajju karĕ  $  rahu-kula-siri-ṇava-vahu dharahi karĕ
text.20050: haũ saẏalu pariggahu pariharĕvi  $  tavu lemi tavovaṇu païsarĕvi"
text.20051: taṃ suṇĕvi cavaï mahurāhivaï  $  "jā tumhahã gaï sā mahu vi gaï"
text.20052: pariẏāṇĕvi ṇicchaü tahŏ taṇaü  $  avaloiu suu lavaṇahŏ taṇaü
text.20053: tahŏ sirĕ viṇivaddhu paṭṭu pavaru  $  sahasatti samappiu rajja-bharu
text.20055: parisesĕvi mohu guṇabbhaïu  $  uppaṇṇa-vohi valu pavvaïu
text.20057: to givvāṇĕhĩ dunduhi tāḍiẏa  $  kusuma-viṭṭhi gaẏaṇa-ẏalahŏ pāḍiẏa
text.20058: surahi-gandha-māruu khaṇĕ ā(?)iu  $  tūra-mahāraü jagĕ jĕ ṇa māiu
text.20062: mellĕvi rāẏa-lacchi viẏasiẏa-muhu  $  ṇiẏa-santāṇĕ ṭhavĕvi ṇiẏa-taṇuruhu
text.20063: sattuhaṇu vi sa-bhiccu risi jāẏaü  $  vajjajaṅghu ṇiẏa-bhajja-sahāẏaü
text.20064: laṅkahĕ ṇiẏa-paĕ thavĕvi su-bhūsaṇu  $  sahũ tiẏaḍaĕ pavvaïu vihīsaṇu
text.20065: ṇiẏa-paü aṅgaẏa-taṇaẏahŏ deppiṇu  $  suggīvu vi thiu dikkha laeppiṇu
text.20066: tiha ṇala-ṇīla seu sasivaddhaṇu  $  tāru taraṅgu rambhu raïvaddhaṇu
text.20067: gavaü gavakkhu saṅkhu gaü dahimuhu  $  indu mahindu virāhiu dummuhu
text.20068: jamvaü raẏaṇakesi mahusāẏaru   $  aṅgaü aṅgu suvelu guṇāẏaru
text.20069: jaṇaü kaṇaü sasikiraṇu jaẏandharu  $  kundu pasaṇṇakitti velandharu
text.20070: iẏa avara vi jiṇa-guṇa sumarantā  $  solaha sahasa pahuhũ ṇikkhantā
text.20073: pavvaïẏaĩ jagĕ ṇāma-pagāsaĩ  $  juvaïhiṃ sattatīsa sahāsaĩ
text.20083: viharantu pattu dhaṇa-kaṇaẏa-pavaru  $  sandaṇathali-ṇāmu païṭṭhu ṇaẏaru
text.20086: tahŏ sura-dunduhi sāhukkāraü  $  gandha-vāu vasu-varisu apāraü
text.20087: kusumañjaliĕ samaü vitthariẏaĩ  $  atthakkaĕ pañca vi acchariẏaĩ
text.20091: puṇu pahuhĕ aṇeẏaĩ vaẏaĩ devi  $  taṃ sandaṇathali-paṭṭaṇu evi (?)
text.20092: viharaï mahiẏalĕ valu muṇivarindu   $  ṇaṃ āsi pahillaü jiṇa-varindu
text.20093: tava-caraṇu caraï aï-ghoru vīru  $  sahasaüṇu pavaḍḍhaï hiẏaĕ dhīru
text.20094: gaẏa-māsāhāriu maẏavaï vva  $  savvovari sīẏalu uḍuvaï vva
text.20095: rasa-rahiu hīṇa-ṇaṭṭāvaü vva  $  para-bhavaṇa-ṇivāsiu paṇṇaü vva
text.20096: mokkhahŏ aï-ujjaü loddhaü vva  $  paẏaliẏa-maẏa-vindu mahāgaü vva
text.20097: vahu-diṇĕhĩ bhamĕvi mahiẏalu asesu  $  sampāiu koḍi-silā-paesu
text.20098: muṇivarahã koḍi jahĩ āsi siddha   $  jā tittha-bhūmi tihuaṇĕ pasiddha
text.20099: uddhariẏa bhuĕhĩ jā lakkhaṇeṇa  $  tahĕ devi ti-bhāmari takkhaṇeṇa
text.20101: uvari caḍevi palamviẏa-vāhaü  $  ṇaṃ taruvaru giri-siharĕ sa-sāhaü
text.20102: suggīvāi-muṇinda-gaṇesaru  $  thiu jhāẏantu sa ẏa mbhu-jiṇesaru
text.20103: iẏa pomacariẏa-sese  $  saẏambhuevassa kaha vi uvvarie
text.20110: to avahiĕ jāṇĕvi tetthu  $  rāhaü muṇi thiẏaü
text.20116: ṇiẏaẏa-bhavantarāĩ sumareppiṇu  $  jiṇa-dhammahŏ vi pahāu muṇeppiṇu
text.20117: cintaï takkhaṇĕ accua-suravaï  $  "ĕhu so maĩ maṇĕ jāṇiu rahuvaï
text.20118: jo maṇuattaṇĕ kantu mahāraü  $  jasu cakkavaï bhāi lahuāraü
text.20119: so gaü ṇaraẏahŏ ṇeheṃ chaïẏaü  $  ehu vi tahŏ vioĕ pavvaïẏaü
text.20120: khavaẏa-seḍhi ārūḍhahŏ āẏahŏ  $  tiha karemi iha jhāṇa-sahāẏahŏ
text.20121: jiha maṇu ṭalaï ṇa hoi pahāṇaü  $  dhavalujjala-vara-kevala-ṇāṇaü
text.20122: jiha vaïmāṇiu jāẏaï suravaru  $  mittu maṇiṭṭhu majjhu maṇi-gaṇa-dharu
text.20123: puṇu teṃ sahũ bhamevi ahiṇandĕvi  $  savvaĩ jiṇa-bhavaṇaĩ jagĕ vandĕvi
text.20124: pañca vi mandara ṇavĕvi surohaĕ  $  jāmi dīvu ṇandīsaru sohaĕ
text.20125: puttu sumittahĕ ṇaraẏahŏ hontaü  $  āṇĕvi laddha-vohi-sammattaü
text.20126: puṇu taïlokka-cakka-jasa-bhāmeṃ  $  jampami suha-dukkhaĩ sahũ rāmeṃ"
text.20128: cintantu ema so deu  $  āu ṇahantarĕṇa
text.20133: puṇu caü-pāsiu tahĩ viṇu kheveṃ  $  kaü ujjāṇu saẏampaha-deveṃ
text.20142: tahĩ viẏaṇĕ mahāvaṇĕ rammĕ  $  mantharu ṇāĩ gaü
text.20143: suru jāṇaï-rūvu dharevi  $  rāmahŏ pāsu gaü
text.20147: puṇu ṇiẏaḍantarĕ līlaĕ jāĕvi  $  ẽva pavollaï aggaĕ thāĕvi
text.20149: ṇiẏa-puṇṇĕhĩ garuehĩ maṇiṭṭhaü  $  vahu-kālahŏ kema vi tuhũ diṭṭhaü
text.20150: ṇivisu vi sahĕvi ṇa sakkami rāhava  $  de sāiu ṇivvūḍha-mahāhava
text.20151: piẏa-mahurālāvĕhĩ sammāṇahi  $  kiṃ taveṇa mahu jovvaṇu māṇahi
text.20152: ṇiccalu pāhāṇu va kiṃ acchahi  $  savaḍammuhu sa-viāru ṇiẏacchahi
text.20153: laïu pisāeṃ jema alajjiu  $  kālu ma khevahi vattha-vivajjiu
text.20155: so loẏāhāṇaü ehu  $  saccaü paĩ kiẏaü
text.20160: haũ sā sīẏa tuhũ jĕ so rahuvaï  $  eha jĕ pihimi te ji iẏa ṇaravaï
text.20162: rāulu taṃ jĕ te ji haẏa-gaẏa-vara  $  puppha-vimāṇu taṃ jĕ te rahavara
text.20163: ĕu maĩ-pamuhu savvu anteuru  $  avaïṇṇaü maẏaraddhaẏa ṇaṃ puru
text.20164: bhuñjahi kāma-bhoẏa hiẏaïcchiẏa  $  chaḍḍahi lacchīhara-dukkhu cciẏa
text.20165: aṇṇu vi paüma honti aï-dūsaha  $  caü kasāẏa vāvīsa parīsaha
text.20166: pañca vi indiẏa satta mahabbhaẏa  $  ko visahaï puṇu aṭṭha mahā-maẏa
text.20167: jiṇa-tavacaraṇu jāi kahŏ cheẏahŏ  $  bhajjevaü kāleṇa vi eẏahŏ
text.20169: to vari evahĩ jĕ ṇa laggu  $  hāsaü diṇĕhĩ para
text.20174: mahu kāraṇĕ paĩ āsi caḍantaĩ  $  cāvaĩ sāẏara-vajjāvattaĩ
text.20175: mahu kāraṇĕ sāhasagaï māriu  $  kikkindhesaru ṇiru uvaẏāriu
text.20176: mahu kāraṇĕ mārui paṭṭhaviẏaü  $  teṃ vajjāuhu raṇĕ ṇiṭṭhaviẏaü
text.20177: mahu kāraṇĕ koḍi-siluccāiẏa  $  aṇṇu vi āsālī viṇivāiẏa
text.20178: mahu kāraṇĕ bhaggaü ṇandaṇa-vaṇu  $  ghāiu akkha-kumāru sa-sāhaṇu
text.20179: mahu kāraṇĕ raẏaṇāẏaru laṅghiu  $  jiu haṃsarahu seu āsaṅghiu
text.20180: paripesiu aṅgaü mahu kāraṇĕ  $  māriẏa hattha-pahattha mahāraṇĕ
text.20181: indaï vandhĕvi raṇĕ levāviu  $  ṇārāẏaṇu sattiĕ bhindāviu
text.20184: teṃ maĩ sahũ rāhavacanda  $  avicalu rajju karĕ
text.20188: taü pekkhantahŏ uvavaṇu gaïẏa  $  jaïẏahũ sahasā haũ pavvaïẏa
text.20190: puṇu tehĩ pavolliu "daẏa karahi  $  darisāvahi amhahũ dāsarahi
text.20191: jeṃ so bhattāru turiu varahũ  $  paĩ-pamuhaü gampi kīla karahũ"
text.20194: aṇṇaü maṇaharu gāẏantiẏaü  $  aṇṇaü vīṇaü vāẏantiẏaü
text.20195: aṇṇaü caüdisĕhĩ ṇaḍantiẏaü  $  sa-kaḍakkha diṭṭhi paẏaḍantiẏaü
text.20199: thiu ṇiccalu rāmu muṇindu  $  ṇāvaï meru-giri
text.20203: jaṃ kema vi duriẏa-khaẏaṅkarāsu  $  maṇu ṭaliu ṇa rāhava-muṇivarāsu
text.20204: taṃ māha-māsĕ siẏa-pakkhĕ pavarĕ  $  vārasi-diṇĕ ṇisihĕ caüttha-paharĕ
text.20206: khaṇĕ kevala-cakkhuhĕ jāu saẏalu  $  gopaẏa-samu loẏāloẏa-jualu
text.20208: kiẏa bhattiĕ vandaṇa jā 'ṇavajja  $  vara kevala-ṇāṇuppatti-pujja
text.20209: to tāva saẏampaha-ṇāmu evi  $  sīendu kevalaccaṇa karevi
text.20210: ṇaviuttamaṅgu so bhaṇaï eva  $  "maĩ tumhahĕ aṇṇāṇeṇa deva
text.20217: appāṇaü garahĕvi saẏa-vāraü  $  kaha vi khamāvĕvi rāmu bhaḍāraü
text.20218: puṇu puṇu vandaṇa-hatti kareppiṇu  $  somittihĕ guṇa-gaṇa sumareppiṇu
text.20219: paḍivohaṇahĩ paẏaṭṭu saẏampahu  $  laṅghĕvi paḍhama-ṇaraü raẏaṇappahu
text.20220: puṇu aïkamĕvi puḍhavi-sakkarapahu  $  sampāiu khaṇeṇa vāluppahu
text.20221: tetthu ko vi kaṇu jiha kaṇḍijjaï  $  kŏ vi puṇu rukkhu jeva khaṇḍijjaï
text.20222: kŏ vi sarasucchu jema pīlijjaï  $  tilu tilu karavattĕhĩ kappijjaï
text.20223: kŏ vi vali jiha dasa-disu ghallijjaï  $  kŏ vi maẏagala-dantĕhĩ pellijjaï
text.20224: kŏ vi piṭṭijjaï vajjhaï muccaï  $  kŏ vi loṭṭijjaï rujjhaï luñcaï
text.20225: kŏ vi puṇu ḍajjhaï rajjhaï sijjhaï  $  kŏ vi ṇaru chijjaï chajjaï vijjhaï
text.20226: kŏ vi mārijjaï khajjaï pijjaï  $  kŏ vi cūrijjaï puṇu mūrijjaï
text.20227: kŏ vi paülijjaï ko vi vali dijjaï  $  ko vi dalijjaï ko vi malijjaï
text.20228: ko vi kaṇaï kandaï dhāhāvaï  $  ko vi puvva-riu ṇiĕvi padhāvaï
text.20235: puṇu samvukumārahŏ samaü teṇa  $  vollijjaï jhatti surāhiveṇa
text.20236: "re re khala-bhāvaṇa asura pāva  $  āḍhattu kāĩ ĕu duṭṭha-bhāva
text.20237: ajja vi durāsa uvasamu ṇa hoi  $  duhu pattaü aṇṇu ji ṇāĩ koi
text.20238: kūrattaṇu muĕ karĕ vimala-cittu"  $  taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaṃ amieṇa sittu
text.20239: uvasama-bhāvahŏ samvukku ḍhukku  $  puṇu puṇu vi pavohaï sīẏa-sakku
text.20240: to ṇavari vimāṇovari ṇievi  $  lakkhaṇa-rāvaṇa pucchanti ve vi
text.20241: "ko tuhũ keṃ kajjeṃ etthu āu"  $  vihaseppiṇu akkhaï amara-rāu
text.20242: "haũ sā ciru hontī jaṇaẏa-dhīẏa  $  jā rāvaṇa paĩ avaharĕvi ṇīẏa
text.20243: jā mattĕ sāra rāmā-ẏaṇāsu  $  jā jama-diṭṭhi va ṇisiẏara-jaṇāsu
text.20244: tava-caraṇa-pahāveṃ jāẏa indu  $  aṇṇu vi dikkhaṅkiu rāmacandu
text.20245: tahŏ koḍi-silāẏalĕ ṇāṇu jāu  $  haũ puṇu tumhahã vohaṇahã āu
text.20247: mahu kāraṇĕ vihi mi jaṇehĩ  $  jāĩ mahantāĩ
text.20252: kohu mūlu savvahũ vi aṇatthahũ  $  kohu mūlu saṃsārāvatthahũ
text.20253: kohu viṇāsa-karaṇu daẏa-dhammahŏ  $  kohu jĕ mūlu ghora-dukkammahŏ
text.20254: kohu jĕ mūlu jaga-ttaẏa-maraṇahŏ  $  kohu jĕ mūlu ṇaraẏa-païsaraṇahŏ
text.20255: kohu jĕ vaïriu savvahŏ jīvahŏ  $  teṃ kajjeṃ ahŏ hari-dahagīvahŏ
text.20256: kohu visajjahŏ visama-sahāvahŏ  $  avaropparu mittattaṇu bhāvahŏ"
text.20257: taṇ ṇisuṇĕvi iẏa vaẏaṇāṇantarĕ  $  tiṇṇi vi te uvasamiẏa khaṇantarĕ
text.20258: "kiṃ daẏa-dhammĕ ṇa kiẏa dihi taïẏahũ  $  āsi laddhu maṇuattaṇu jaïẏahũ
text.20259: hā hā kāĩ pāu kiu vaḍḍaü  $  jeṃ sampāiẏa duhu evaḍḍaü
text.20261: tuhũ para dhaṇṇaü jiẏa-loẏaĕ  $  jeṃ chaṇḍiẏa ku-maï
text.20266: to parivaḍḍhiẏa maṇĕ kāruṇṇeṃ  $  vāsaveṇa duvvaṅkura-vaṇṇeṃ
text.20269: viṇṇi vi jaṇa sahasā solahamaü  $  saggu parāṇami accua-ṇāmaü"
text.20270: ẽva bhaṇevi lei kira jāvahĩ  $  loṇiu jema vilĕvi gaẏa tāvahĩ
text.20271: jalaṇeṃ tuppu jema tiha tāviẏa  $  aï-dugejjha dappaṇa-chāẏa va thiẏa
text.20272: savvovāẏahĩ bhaggāṇandeṃ  $  kema vi levi ṇa sakkiẏa indeṃ
text.20273: aha jahĩ jeṇa jeva pāvevaü  $  suhu va duhu va tihuaṇĕ bhuñjevaü
text.20274: taṃ samatthu ko viṇivārevaĕ  $  kāsu satti parirakkha karevaĕ
text.20275: puṇu vahu-dukkhāṇala-santattā  $  ve vi cavanti eva vevantā
text.20278: jeṃ puṇu vi ṇa pāvahũ eha  $  bhīsaṇa ṇaraẏa-gaï"
text.20282: teṇa vi pavuttu "jaï karahŏ vaẏaṇu  $  to lehu turiu sammatta-raẏaṇu
text.20283: jaṃ paramuttamu tihuaṇĕ pasiddhu  $  aï-dullahu puṇṇa-pavittu suddhu
text.20284: jaṃ kamma-mahaṇu kallāṇa-tattu  $  duṇṇeu abhavvahã bhava-bhaẏantu
text.20286: jaṃ sundaru kāleṃ vohi dei  $  sāsaẏa-siva-thāṇu pahāṇu ṇei"
text.20287: iẏa-vaẏaṇĕhĩ dūrujjhiẏa-bhaehĩ  $  sammattu vihi mi paḍivaṇṇu tehĩ
text.20288: gaü sīẏā-hari vi sa-saṅku tetthu  $  valaeu sa-kevala-ṇāṇu jetthu
text.20289: samasaraṇabbhantarĕ païsarevi  $  bhattiĕ puṇu puṇu vandaṇa karevi
text.20296: tuhũ para ekku viẏaḍḍhu viẏaḍḍhahũ  $  sūrahũ sūru guṇaḍḍhu guṇaḍḍhahũ
text.20298: uttama-lesa-tisūleṃ duddharu  $  jeṃ kiu moha-vaïri saẏa-sakkaru
text.20299: diḍha-mahanta-vaïraggahŏ pāsiu  $  jeṇa ṇeha-ṇāmu vi ṇiṇṇāsiu
text.20300: aṇṇu vi eu kāĩ taü juttaü  $  siva-paü ekkeṃ jaï vi viḍhattaü
text.20301: to vi kiṃ maĩ muĕvi jāijjaï  $  āvami jema haü mi taha kijjaï"
text.20302: pabhaṇaï muṇivarindu "suṇĕ sundara  $  dūrĕ pamāẏahi rāu purandara
text.20303: jiṇĕhĩ pagāsiu mokkhu vi-rāẏahŏ  $  kamma-vandhu diḍhu hoi sa-rāẏahŏ"
text.20306: sīendeṃ rāma-muṇindu  $  ṇamiu sa ẏa mbhu ĕhĩ
text.20312: tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-dhavalassa  $  ko guṇe vaṇṇiuṃ jae taraï
text.20315: paramesara kahĕ saṅkhevĕṇa  $  dasaraha-rāṇaü ketthu huu
text.20320: aṇṇu vi paĩ lakkhiẏa suddha-maï  $  kahĕ lavaṇaṅkusaha mi kavaṇa gaï
text.20321: kā jaṇaẏahŏ kaṇaẏahŏ kekkaẏahĕ  $  kā avarāiẏahĕ su-suppahahĕ
text.20322: kā lakkhaṇa-māẏahĕ kekkaẏahĕ  $  kā bhāmaṇḍalahŏ cāru-maïhĕ"
text.20323: akkhaï kevali sura-ṇamiẏa-paü  $  "dasarahu terahamaü saggu gaü
text.20324: paramāu vīsa sāẏaraĩ jahĩ  $  jaṇaü vi kaṇaü vi uppaṇṇu tahĩ
text.20325: parimāṇu jetthu āhuṭṭha kara  $  avara vi aṇeẏa tahĩ jāẏa ṇara
text.20327: aṇṇaü vi ghora-tava-tattiẏaü  $  savvaü devattaṇu pattiẏaü
text.20329: je puvva-jammĕ taü ṇandaṇa  $  viṇṇi vi tihuaṇĕkka-vijaï
text.20336: pucchiu suravaïṇa "keṇa phalĕṇa"  $  "āẏaṇṇahi" taṃ pi vuttu valĕṇa
text.20337: ujjhahĕ ciru kulavaï pavara-bhuu  $  maẏariĕ maṇiṭṭha-mehaliẏa-juu
text.20339: ṇivvāsiẏa sīẏa muṇevi khaṇĕ  $  so cintāviẏaü sa-sou maṇĕ
text.20341: vara-rūveṃ siri-devaẏahĕ ṇiha  $  kā 'vattha pekkhu vaṇĕ patta kiha
text.20343: vaïrāu taṃ jĕ teṃ bhāvĕvi  $  putta-kalattaĩ pariharĕvi
text.20344: dui-muṇihĕ pāsĕ tavu laïẏaü  $  muṇi-suvvaẏa-jiṇu maṇĕ dharĕvi
text.20349: sahũ kantĕhĩ vaïrāeṃ laïẏā  $  tĕ vi dui-muṇihĕ pāsĕ pavvaïẏā
text.20350: vahu-divasahĩ taü ghoru karantā  $  paramāgama-juttiĕ viharantā
text.20351: tamvacūḍa-puravaru gaẏa attiĕ  $  tiṇṇi vi gaẏa jiṇa-vandaṇa-hattiĕ
text.20352: tāva 'ggaĕ vāluẏa-raẏaṇāẏaru  $  dīsaï ṇaraü va duggama-duttaru
text.20354: so kaha kaha vi dukkhu āsaṅghiu  $  siddhĕhĩ bhava-saṃsāru va laṅghiu
text.20356: te tiṇṇi vi jaṇa muṇi-puṅgava  $  ṇiṇṇāsiẏa-duṭṭhaṭṭha-maẏa
text.20369: taṃ pekkhĕvi ṇiru āsaṇṇaü  $  viẏaṇĕ mahā-vaṇĕ bhaẏa-rahiẏa
text.20370: vaḍa-pāẏava-mūlĕ su-vitthaĕ  $  tiṇṇi vi jogu laevi thiẏa
text.20374: tahĩ avasarĕ sirimāliṇi-kanteṃ  $  ujjhāuri gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ janteṃ
text.20375: jaṇaẏahŏ ṇandaṇeṇa vikkhāeṃ  $  pekkhĕvi cintiu viṇaẏa-sahāeṃ
text.20376: ĕu mahantu accariu maṇohara  $  kahĩ vāluẏa-samuddu kahĩ muṇivara
text.20377: kahĩ bhava-pahu kahĩ siddha-bhaḍārā   $  kahĩ a-ṇiuṇu kahĩ guṇa-garuārā
text.20378: kahĩ desiu kahĩ vara-ṇihi-raẏaṇaĩ  $  kahĩ dujjaṇu kahĩ sundara-vaẏaṇaĩ
text.20379: kahĩ duggandha-raṇṇu kahĩ mahuẏara  $  kahĩ maha-ṇaraẏa-bhūmi kahĩ suravara
text.20388: ṇimmiẏāĩ viulaĩ a-pamāṇaĩ  $  thāmĕ thāmĕ maṇahara-ujjāṇaĩ
text.20390: thāmĕ thāmĕ jiṇahara-devaülaĩ  $  ḍimbhaĩ ṇāĩ mahacchuha-vahulaĩ
text.20391: thāmĕ thāmĕ vahu-gāma purovama  $  thāmĕ thāmĕ ārāma maṇorama
text.20392: thāmĕ thāmĕ pokkharaṇiu saravara  $  vāvī-kūva-talāẏa laẏāhara
text.20393: thāmĕ thāmĕ ṇimmala ṇiru ṇīraĩ  $  mahiẏa-sasāha-sisira-ghiẏa-khīraĩ
text.20394: thāmĕ thāmĕ sāliu phala-sāraü  $  ikkhu-mahārasu aï-guliẏāraü
text.20397: taṃ karĕvi eva ṇivisaddhĕṇa  $  cariẏā-gaẏa khama-dama-darisi
text.20402: jiha te tiha avara vi vahu-desahĩ  $  duggama-dīva-samudduddesahĩ
text.20405: teṇa phaleṇa marevi sa-kantaü  $  uttama-bhoga-bhūmi sampattaü
text.20406: tahĩ acchaï jaṇa-ṇaẏaṇa-maṇoharu  $  tuha keraü cira-paḍhama-sahoẏaru
text.20408: taṇ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu siẏa-indeṃ(?)  $  puṇu vi papucchiu guru-āṇandeṃ
text.20409: "ṇārāẏaṇu dasa-kandharu dummaï  $  veṇṇi vi jaṇa sampāiẏa duggaï
text.20411: duriẏahŏ avasāṇĕ viṇiggĕvi  $  kahĕ kiṃ hosaï mahumahaṇu
text.20412: ko haü mi bhaḍārā hosami  $  ko hoesaï dahavaẏaṇu"
text.20416: taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi kevala-ṇāṇa-dharu  $  pabhaṇaï sīrāuhu muṇi-pavaru
text.20419: rohiṇihĕ gabbhĕ diḍha-kaḍhiṇa-bhua  $  to aruhadāsa-risidāsa sua
text.20420: vahu-kāleṃ vaẏa-guṇa-ṇiẏama-dhara  $  hosanti surālaĕ puṇu amara
text.20421: tetthahŏ cavevi ṇimmala-viulĕ  $  hosanti paḍīvā tahĩ jĕ kulĕ
text.20422: darisāviẏa caüviha-dāṇa-guṇu  $  hari-khettĕ ve vi hosanti puṇu
text.20423: tetthahŏ vi pīẏa-jiṇa-dhamma-rasa  $  hosanti saṇaẏa-kumārĕ tiẏasa
text.20425: sāẏaraĩ satta suhu bhuñjĕvi  $  cavaṇu kareppiṇu surapurihĕ
text.20426: hosanti paḍīvā veṇṇi vi  $  tāhĕ jĕ vijaẏāvaï-purihĕ
text.20432: tahĩ dharĕvi ghora-tava-bhāra-dhura  $  sattamaĕ saggĕ hosanti sura
text.20433: tahĩ kālĕ saẏala-ṇihi-raẏaṇavaï  $  tuhũ bharahĕ havesahi cakkavaï
text.20434: lantava-saggahŏ cavevi vivuha   $  hosanti ve vi taü aṅgaruha
text.20435: ṇāmeṃ indarahambhoẏaraha  $  tiẏasahã vi raṇaṅgaṇĕ duvvisaha
text.20436: raẏaṇatthalĕ ṇaẏarĕ rajju karĕvi  $  pacchaĕ puṇu duddharu taü carĕvi
text.20437: pāvĕvi samāhi tuhũ vimala-maṇu  $  hoesahi vejaẏantĕ sumaṇu
text.20438: indarahu vi jo ciru dahavaẏaṇu  $  jeṃ vasikiu ṇīsesu vi bhavaṇu
text.20440: sŏ maṇuattaṇĕ devattaṇĕhĩ  $  kaïhi mi bhavĕhĩ bhavevi ṇaru
text.20446: puṇu gaṇaharu hosahi tāsu tuhũ  $  tahĩ kālĕ lahesahi mokkha-suhu
text.20447: ambhoẏaraho vi jŏ āsi hari  $  ṇāmeṇa ji jasu kampanti ari
text.20450: bharahesara-saṇṇihu cakkaharu  $  puṇu hosaï titthahŏ titthaẏaru
text.20453: volīṇĕhĩ sattĕhĩ varisĕhĩ  $  gamaṇu karesami haü mi tahĩ
text.20458: suṇĕvi bhavissa-kāla-bhava-vaïẏaru  $  puṇu puṇu paṇavĕvi halaharu muṇivaru
text.20459: appaü so sīendu paṇindaï  $  garahaï maṇu jiṇa-bhavaṇaĩ vandaï
text.20462: suṭṭhu visāla tuṅga sakkandara  $  khaṇĕ pariañcĕvi pañca vi mandara
text.20463: puṇu gampiṇu ṇandīsara-dīvahŏ  $  thui karevi taïlokka-paīvahŏ
text.20464: kuru-bhūmihĕ ciru bhāi gavesĕvi  $  bhāmaṇḍalu sa-kantu saṃbhāsĕvi
text.20468: ṇiẏa-līlaĕ sīẏā-suravaï  $  saĩ accharahĩ ramantu thiu
text.20472: lavaṇaṅkusa vi ve vi vahu-divasĕhĩ  $  ṇāṇuppaṇṇa ṇamiẏa vara-tiẏasĕhĩ
text.20476: jiha so tiha aṇanta-suha-thāṇahŏ  $  gaü ghaṇavāhaṇo vi ṇivvāṇahŏ
text.20477: jasu keraü ajja vi ahiṇandaï  $  lou meharahu titthu pavandaï
text.20478: kumbhaẏaṇṇu puṇu sāsaẏa-sokkhahŏ  $  so vi vaḍahĕ kheḍḍahĕ gaü mokkhahŏ
text.20480: gaü rahuvaï kaïhi mi divasĕhĩ  $  tihuaṇa-maṅgalagārāhŏ
text.20482: iẏa pomacariẏa-sese  $  saẏambhuevassa kaha vi uvvarie
text.20488: siri-vijjāhara-kaṇḍe saṃdhīo honti vīsa-parimāṇā  $  ujjhā-kaṇḍammi tahā vāvīsa muṇeha gaṇaṇāe
text.20489: caüdaha sundara-kaṇḍe ekkāhiẏa-vīsa jujjha-kaṇḍe ẏa  $  uttara-kaṇḍe teraha sandhīo ṇavaï savvāu
text.20490: tihuaṇa-saẏambhu ṇavaram ekko kaïrāẏa-cakkiṇuppaṇṇo  $  paümacariẏassa cūlāmaṇi vva sesaṃ kaẏaṃ jeṇa
text.20491: kaïrāẏassa vijaẏa-sesiẏassa vitthārio jaso bhuvaṇe  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhuṇā pomacariẏa-seseṇa ṇisseso
text.20492: tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-dhavalassa ko guṇe vaṇṇiuṃ jae taraï  $  vāleṇa vi jeṇa saẏambhu-kavva-bhāro samuvvūḍho
text.20493: vāẏaraṇa-daḍha-kkhandho āgama-aṅgo pamāṇa-viẏaḍa-pao  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-dhavalo jiṇa-titthe vahaü kavva-bharaṃ
text.20494: caümuha-saẏambhuevāṇa vāṇiẏatthaṃ acakkhamāṇeṇa  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-raïẏaṃ pañcamicariẏaṃ mahacchariẏaṃ
text.20495: savve vi suā pañjara-sua vva paḍhiẏakkharāĩ sikkhanti  $  kaïrāẏassa suo puṇa suẏa vva sui-gabbha-sambhūo
text.20496: tihuaṇa-saẏambhu jaï ṇa hontu (?) ṇandaṇo siri-saẏambhudevassa  $  kavvaṃ kulaṃ kavittaṃ to pacchā ko samuddharaï
text.20497: jaï ṇa huu chandacūḍāmaṇissa tihuaṇa-saẏambhu lahu-taṇao  $  to paddhiḍaẏā-kavvaṃ siri-pañcami ko samāreu
text.20498: savvo vi jaṇo geṇhaï ṇiẏa-tāẏa-viḍhatta-davva-santāṇaṃ  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhuṇā puṇu gahiẏaṃ sukaïtta-santāṇaṃ
text.20499: tihuaṇa-saẏambhum ekkaṃ mottūṇa saẏambhu-kavva-maẏaraharo  $  ko taraï gantum antaṃ majjhe ṇissesa-sīsāṇaṃ
text.20500: iẏa cāru pomacariẏaṃ saẏambhueveṇa raïẏaṃ(ẏama?) samattaṃ  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhuṇā taṃ samāṇiẏaṃ parisamattam iṇaṃ
text.20501: "ceṣṭitam ayanaṃ caritaṃ karaṇaṃ cāritram ity amī yac-chabdāḥ  $  paryāyā rāmāyaṇam ity uktaṃ tena ceṣṭitaṃ rāmasya
text.20502: vācayati śruṇoti janas tasyāyur vṛddhim īyate puṇyaṃ ca  $  ākṛṣṭa-khaṅga-hasto ripur api na karoti vairam upaśamam eti"
text.20504: goinda-maẏaṇa-suẏaṇanta-viraïẏaṃ vandaï-paḍhama-taṇaẏassa  $  vacchalladāĕ tihuaṇa-saẏambhuṇā raïẏaṃ (?) mahappaẏaṃ
text.20506: satta-mahāsaggaṅgī ti-raẏaṇa-bhūsā su-rāmakaha-kaṇṇā  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-jaṇiẏā pariṇaü vandaïẏa-maṇa-taṇaẏaṃ
